What truly shocked me was her recommendation to stop breastfeeding my daughter due to concerns about cavities, despite the fact that my daughter does not have cavities. Our pediatric dentist never mentioned this as an issue. Furthermore, she claimed that breastfeeding was causing my daughter to lack proper nutrition, despite the fact that my daughter eats a well-balanced diet with protein, vegetables, and nutrient-dense foods. Dr. Iskander only asked if my daughter was eating three times a day, without considering the quality of the food.

Additionally, my husband and older son have several food allergies and sensitivities. When I expressed concerns that my daughter might have similar issues and requested an allergy test, Dr. Iskander incorrectly attributed my daughter's diarrhea to breastfeeding. She effectively denied my daughter necessary medical services based on her outdated views on breastfeeding.

Lastly, Dr. Iskander made an uninformed comment about why my daughter does not sleep through the night, adding to my frustration. Overall, I cannot recommend Dr. Iskander due to her lack of professionalism, outdated practices, and judgmental attitude. Parents deserve a pediatrician who is supportive, knowledgeable, and up-to-date with current medical standards.

Not to mention it took them 48 minutes to be seen. Do not go to this place, not worth it if you really care for your kids health

If your child needs help with medical help at school such as 504 plan. The location on Wickham Rd does not help at all. Send referrals that's out of my child age group and will not help.  Receptionist are rude and talk about customer in front of you. Poor customer service and help for your kids. Finally got all documentation done without the help and all I need is a signature.  The doctor refused to sign. Says they need 7 days to read a paper and sign it so my child gets help with a 504 plan at school.  I had Silver Palm called to let them know I was coming and they still did not help. Waited 20 minutes for the Doctor to leave and not even look at the paper. Do what is best for the kids but they do not care obviously.

From the moment I met Dr. Kelly Claytor, I felt comfortable. She is energetic, inspirational, and "knows her stuff." I felt I was in good hands as she led me through the evaluation process and introduced me to the beginning exercises. For me, "exercise" has always been a four-letter word, but I actually found myself enjoying them today and looking forward to doing them at home between PT sessions with her. I'm expecting great improvement in my ability to walk and hope to resume my daily walks in the park.
Leighton was thorough and extremely knowledgeable. He quickly ruled out significant pathology and initiated treatment in the same day. I highly recommend FL Physio!

First time going to Florida Physio, and I can definitely say I will be back. Leighton was wonderful in assessing the strengths and weaknesses of my golf swing especially considering my age and flexibility. He quickly  helped me understand much better what I could do (exercise wise and swing wise) to hit the ball more solidly and consistently.  I look forward to more sessions and direction to help me play better and enjoy the game even more! Thanks!

I worked with Paige today. I‚Äôve been told to go to her for a while from a friend and I finally did it. Very grateful I did. I‚Äôm always banged up from years of sports and now constant activity and pushing myself. Once again I got hurt back in September before one of my races and kept pushing it off until I couldn‚Äôt take it anymore. I‚Äôve been to other places and it‚Äôs always the same routine Heat, Stem, massage etc. Paige took her time to fully assess me and instantly could tell what my issue was. Even though it was my first day I can tell why she is the one to be recommended to me. Her wealth of knowledge is comforting and I look forward to being back at it and training for races. I would highly recommend Paige as your next PT appointment.
Great attention to both my golf swing and my physical fitness and condition! Dr. Leighton is exceptional!!

Janeille is hands down the kindest and most helpful provider I've ever had the pleasure of a first meeting with. Just great vibes all around with a professional process without making the visit too clinical. A smile on her face from beginning to end. Thanks so much!
They are amazing! Their quality of care us absolutely top-notch. The staff is always so kind and thoughtful and helpful and really care about their patients in the community. Recommend 1M times over!

I saw Erin for a new patient consultation. She was wonderful. Patient, compassionate, pleasant, sympathetic, professional..There are not enough positive adjectives to describe my visit. Just talking to her made me feel better. Looking forward to working with her in the near future. Donna M

I have been working with Dr VanVleet for some time now. She is a real pro who knows her stuff and takes her time get to know her patients. She has made me feel welcome, she takes her time and really listens and because of that she is able to take care of me better than anyone else in town. If your looking for a specialist in this field don‚Äôt waste any more time looking call Dr VanVleet and get started right away. A very happy patient

;m

I absolutely love everyone at this practice from the wonderful staff in the front to all of the practitioners. My doctor Janelle Nelson really care‚Äôs about me. I‚Äôve been suffering with anxiety and sleep disorders for many years and she has brought me back to life. Most doctors don‚Äôt really listen to your problems. They just write you a script and go. However, EVERYONE here really values the impact they have on there patients.  My doctor cares she provides healthy mechanisms to keep my anxiety at bay. I finally feel  I have control of my LIFE!  She really wants to make a healthy change for me and I‚Äôve never felt that before. Every physician at this practice is very kind, compassionate, empathetic and very professional  to any situation that you're going through. Lastly, Anyone that suffers with anxiety, depression, sleep issues, ADHD or Fibromyalgia. This is the practice you should be calling I bet my last dollar they will help you. In closing, locals or anyone coming from another state or another county, I highly recommend FPA. They also do tele-health in case you‚Äôre at work or have other obligations. They‚Äôre very accommodating and YOU will still Experience  that compassionate ear whether it‚Äôs face to face or through Telehealth.

Respectfully, Jacqueline C
Amazing place.

Florida Rehab group has been a blessing for my son. They have helped him improve his speech and so much more. The best part is that they are SO KIND and so professional,  they truly care about their patients. I will forever be grateful for all of what they did for my son.

My son went to therapy here for a few months, we had to stop going because it was too far from home :(. The girls are excellent, Linda, the owner cares about having contact with the parents and checking the children's progress. Graciela is very sweet and efficient, and Karen is a very good pathologist. 100% recommended
My daughter takes her speech therapy here and we are very grateful for the service and dedication with which she is cared for.

On behalf of my dad:
From the moment I arrived, the care and attention I received were outstanding. The transportation from the hospital was smooth and professional, and I was warmly welcomed upon arrival.

My room was spacious, spotless, and had a beautiful view truly a calming environment to recover in. The team helped me get settled in and made sure all my belongings were arranged comfortably.

The food was consistently delicious, with a variety of options that made me feel well taken care of.

What stood out most was the warm, welcoming nature of the nurses and staff. They were kind, attentive, and always ready to help with a smile.

The physical and occupational therapy team was exceptional. The therapy gym was modern and well-equipped, including computer technology and electronic devices that allowed me to work on different areas of recovery. The therapists were knowledgeable, encouraging, and truly dedicated to helping me make progress.

I‚Äôm so grateful for the care I received and would highly recommend this facility to anyone in need of rehabilitation.

I attended this inpatient rehab hospital for a few weeks to help improve my balance. (My neurological issue, at birth, is starting to act up in mid-life. I needed the extra push to teach me how to deal with the specialized health issues.)  I had a wonderful stay. The therapy was great: Shannon and Marisol were my therapists! Therapy was three hours a day. The nurses and CNAs were all accessible to my needs. The food was excellent. I am gluten intolerant, and the menu was carefully selected to accommodate my dietary needs. The room was spacious! Highly recommend. Jessica H was my liaison and was helpful throughout the process.

This is not your typical rehab facility.  Dr's and nurses are visiting your room several times a day. Physical therapy is awesome.  3 hours a day 7 days a week. Brand new facility, it's like a resort, food is like a 3 star restaurant.  I have been and will continue to tell everyone i know about this place.
I give it 5 out of 5 stars.

I am a 79 year old female.  I broke my femur as a result of a slip and fall.  After emergency surgery at a trauma center, I was transported to Florida Rehabilitation for intensive rehab.  The hospital was not only a beautiful clean  facility, but the staff was terrific.  I had 1 1/2 hours of Occupational Therapy and 1 1/2 Hours of Physical therapy DAILY, including weekends,  for two whole weeks.  The therapists were excellent, very encouraging and knowledgeable, and got me to be able to bathe and walk (aided by a walker) independently, within 5-6 days of my arrival.  The gym is not only clean but beautiful, with floor-ceiling windows overlooking a lake, and excellent equipment, including electronic and conventional equipment as well as a ‚Äúfake‚Äù car to teach you how to safely get in and out with a broken leg. The staff included two physicians who visited every patient daily, responded to your needs and held weekly multidisciplinary meetings with each patient and their families.  The food was outstanding for a hospital (I was served delicious, moist salmon, at least three times a week.  The dietician also visited the patients to obtain feedback and help with the patient‚Äôs nutrition.

It is now 7 weeks since my injury and, with continued PT, I am now able to walk carefully without a walker or a cane.  I attribute my miraculous recovery in large part to Florida Rehab and their amazing staff, care and encouragement.  I would strongly recommend this Rehabilitation facility to anyone  wishing to jump start their recovery from a serious injury!

First of all the facility is very new and very clean and hospitable one nice thing is that each room has its own heat control so you can be comfortable whatever your desire is.

The staff is very friendly very helpful and try to make sure that you have everything that you need and that you‚Äôre safe at all times.

I was there for physical therapy and on the first day you have an evaluation and they are very open to what your goals are. They‚Äôre not setting up a bunch of goals that they think are right for you but what it is that you‚Äôre having difficulty with and how best to correct that. I had therapy three hours each day Even on the weekends.

The physical therapy department is really up-to-date. They have a lot of the standard equipment, but the most interesting are the interactive programs that project you onto a screen, and then you have to do different activities on the screen to help with whatever skill you‚Äôre trying to work on. They also put an app onto your phone if you want where they will upload your exercise routine and it involves a video as well as description of what the exercise that you‚Äôre supposed to do and then it will correspond with the therapist and if you have any questions you can ask that through the app. One of the things that I always worry about in a hospital setting is the food and the most outstanding thing is that every meal that I had arrived hot, there is no food getting cold and they‚Äôre very flexible about what you want. If you need extra of something they will give it to you and if you have dietary restrictions, which I had quite a few, they were quite happy to meet those and even went out and bought some things that they didn‚Äôt have so that I would have those food.

Thanks to all the staff that took the time to take care of me and help my stay not only be very helpful to my condition but also very pleasant in general. One nice thing is also that you don‚Äôt have to eat in your room by yourself if you want to eat out in the hallway, they have an area set aside for us to get together and talk and get to know each other and Enjoy our Copy that if

DO NOT GO TO THIS OFFICE unless you want to get treated badly, lied to, and ignored.  Dr Kirshbaum is just out to make money.  He has no compassion or emailed for his patients.  I went to him after 2 years.  There had been no changes in my medical history or medications over the past 2 years.  He refused to give me a simple muscle relaxer that he had prescribed to me many times before. I was not asking for any prayed at all.    He said the pharmacy wouldn't fill them since I am also prescribed klonpin.  So I called CVS from the office and they had LIED TO ME!!! CVS said the 2 medications where fine together. He would not come speak to me when I told the office staff of this.   He had no time for me because I did not want his high priced procedures like injections or epidurals. He only wants the big money making patients.  He is rude and has a very bad bedside manner.  The office is also on board with every other new money making medical fade there is. Just another way to pump more cash out of your pocket.  It was a waste of time for me and a waste on my insurance company money.  Pain doctors are supposed to help improve your quality of life.  Find another doctor.  There are allot out there.  Go to someone who is going to test you with respect.
Dr Kirschbaum has an excellent bedside manner . He takes as much time as you need to understand you and your issues. He is the best!!

I had an MRI done by a different provider and wants pain management to review the results bc they looked really bad. I was able to get an appt the same day and saw Dr K who agreed that the MRI looked horrible. He wanted me to see a neurosurgeon and reached out to someone and was able to get me scheduled with them in a few days. I‚Äôm so grateful for Dr K. He really went above and beyond for me.

Hello everyone so today was my second visit the doctor that saw me today for my procedure was DR. Neil K. To understand my situation is basically this I am coming from another pain management office. I have been suffering for years with pain that I thought was just do to age weight or stress. Yet to find out I have been battling multiple autoimmune diseases on top of my spine problems. My last pain management office was a horrible experience I was treated like I was just a number I was told while midway of my procedure to stop screaming that I will scare his patients away. Besides the area were I was getting that procedure the whole room was full of dust yes dust. I was desperate for relief so I did what I needed to do. Mind you I got 6 epidural shots that day. I did not even go to my followup I just went to this new location. My first visit was with Dr. Kelly where she explained to me about all the stuff that is wrong with me. On top of that she suggested for me to get a Brain MRI to be on the safe side gave me paperwork of what I need to get done. Also, the other pain management doctor I had the procedure I had done was not even needed. Okay so back to what was done today. I had 1 epidural shot today with no pain no screaming no discomfort doctor K spoke to me through the whole process explained everything and was very patient. The assistant with him his name was Lincoln was also a pleasure to be around. I felt heard, understood and cared for. I will never go to any other place at all. All I will say is you will not regret being in their care at all this place is the best and mind you today was just my second visit. Thank you Dr. K and Lincon for your help and patience today.

MA was wonderful and positive. Nurse Practitioner was excellent , very welcoming , helpful, and supportive of treatment being needed . Quick appointment. Straightforward . Front desk provided all documentation for referrals. Wonderful experience and would recommend

I have been a patient since June and I am very grateful to Dr. Goodman for his help in my treatment. I think a good doctor is one who knows how to listen and then starts with the treatment plan. He is always smiling and has a very good vibe that makes his patient feel safe. His girls are attentive, educated, and very professional. The best place for your chiropractic treatment.

After diagnosis & treatment by a leading So FL HMO, and a leading healthcare facility in Jacksonville, finally, the Spine and Wellness practice in Coral Springs provided an effective treatment therapy on my first visit. This is the only physician to give me the relief without masking the health disorder with medication. Thank you, Dr. Goodman, thank you. I can see me regaining life quality, again.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Dr. Roy. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and genuinely cared for. The atmosphere is calm, clean, and professional. What really stands out is the level of attention and care‚Äîevery adjustment is done with precision and a deep understanding of how the body works.
Dr. Goodman is very professional with his work. The ladies in office are very good at what they do and take your comfortability into consideration. Highly suggest!

I can‚Äôt recommend Dr Goodman enough! The staff is welcoming and made me feel comfortable immediately. The doctor listened to all my concerns and provided adjustments that gave me relief. After a few short visits I noticed huge improvement in my mobility. I highly recommend!

If you are looking for the best therapist, look no further! Therapist Bronson is an exceptional professional to whom we are endlessly grateful. He played a crucial role in my husband's recovery after two hip surgeries and helped him walk again ‚Äì something that seemed impossible to us! Bronson is not only extremely competent and knowledgeable, but he is also incredibly responsible ‚Äì always punctual, never cancels sessions, and carefully progresses the exercises. The variety of equipment and his individual approach show true dedication. Moreover, his smile and friendly attitude make every therapy session easier and more enjoyable. I hope this review helps others who need a highly qualified and compassionate therapist. Thank you to everyone for the previous reviews that guided us to Bronson! Huge thanks to Bronson for his invaluable help. We wish him health and much success!üôÇ

I was in a horrible car accident in late May of last year (2023). I was in several hospitals. I needed PT after I got home. I met with Melanie from FSPT, and right from day 1 I knew she was going to be wonderful. Melanie worked with me for many months. She was always so kind and motivating. She helped me stand and walk again! Melanie is so knowledgeable about her work. She always made me feel comfortable. She is an amazing PT! Whoever has the opportunity to meet and work with Melanie will be so happy with their choice! Thank you so much Melanie for you tremendous help! Thank you for all your hard work Melanie!

I‚Äôve been a client of Mel‚Äôs for almost 2 years and it‚Äôs been a game changer! She‚Äôs very personable and listens to what my body needs. She creates an individualized plan and experience that has healed many of my ailments from my lower back, hip and sciatica issues. I am her BIGGEST FAN!!! You will NOT be disappointed, EVER! Thank you Mel! Strength is my love language and I feel stronger because of her quality of care and exercise recommendations.

Florida Strong Therapy is the best therapist agency we have experienced in 5 years since my husband had a major stroke where he lost the ability to move his right arm. Kathy Martinez is my husband‚Äôs Occupational Therapist and she is AMAZING. Kathy works on his full upper body which has strengthened, so important. And, equally important, is Kathy‚Äôs highly personable, kind nature. We love Kathy and my husband always looks forward to his OT with Kathy, as do I. Kathy introduced us to Florida Strong and we are so grateful. Dr. Bronson and Melanie are excellent Physical Therapists, their treatment sessions are tailored to my husband and we greatly appreciate them as well.

Bronson and his team were instrumental in getting me back on my feet after a knee replacement/fractured femur. I had in-home physical therapy 3x a week for 7 weeks and it was great.  Very professional, well educated and caring. Would trust Florida Strong with any physical therapy needs.

I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. Evelyn Mora for TMJ treatment, and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful to have found her. She is incredibly kind, patient, and extremely knowledgeable. I had been going to another therapist for over a month with little progress, but after just one session with Dr. Mora, I finally started to notice real improvement.

What sets Dr. Mora apart is how she customizes each treatment based on your specific symptoms and how you‚Äôre feeling that day. She genuinely cares about her patients, and it shows‚Äîshe has a real passion for what she does and takes great pride in her work. It‚Äôs clear that this isn‚Äôt just a job for her; she‚Äôs committed to helping people heal.

TMJ treatment is definitely a process with its ups and downs, but every time I leave an appointment with Dr. Mora, I feel noticeably better. I could go to another therapist covered by my insurance where I wouldn‚Äôt have to pay anything out of pocket‚Äîbut Dr. Mora‚Äôs care is absolutely worth it. The quality and attention she provides makes all the difference.

I also want to thank Natasha, who helps manage appointments. She‚Äôs always so helpful and friendly, and she does an amazing job accommodating schedule changes with kindness and patience.

From the moment you step into Florida TMJ Physical Therapy, you realize you're in a place where patient care is not just a motto, but a deeply ingrained practice. My experience here has been nothing short of exceptional, largely thanks to two outstanding individuals: Natasha and Dr. Evelyn Mora.

Natasha, at the front desk, truly embodies excellent customer service. Her warm demeanor, efficiency, and genuine willingness to help makes every interaction a pleasure. She handles scheduling, inquiries, and all administrative tasks with remarkable grace and professionalism, ensuring a smooth and stress-free experience from start to finish. Her ability to make you feel welcomed and valued truly sets the tone for your visit.

And then there's Dr. Evelyn Mora, whose level of care is, quite simply, unmatched. Dr. Mora possesses a rare combination of profound expertise, meticulous attention to detail, and a deeply empathetic approach. She takes the time to thoroughly understand your symptoms, explain the intricacies of your condition, and develop a personalized treatment plan that addresses the root cause of the issue. Her hands-on therapy is incredibly precise and effective, bringing noticeable relief and progress with each session. What truly sets Dr. Mora apart is her unwavering commitment to her patients' well-being; she listens intently, educates patiently, and empowers you with the knowledge and exercises needed for long-term recovery. Her dedication and compassionate spirit instill confidence and hope, making the journey to healing feel genuinely supported.

Florida TMJ Physical Therapy, under the guidance of Dr. Mora and with the invaluable support of Natasha, provides a holistic and highly effective approach to TMJ treatment. If you are seeking relief and comprehensive care for TMJ-related issues, look no further. This clinic is a beacon of professionalism, expertise, and genuine human kindness. Highly, highly recommended!

Dr. Mora and her patient coordinator Natasha have been essential is my TMJ treatment. Their kindness and willingness to help me feel better have really made a difference. Dr. Mora‚Äôs expertise have significantly improved my TMJ while Natasha‚Äôs excellent customer service has assisted me with planning and scheduling my weekly appointments around my busy work and personal schedule.

When I started my treatment I could not sleep from my TMJ pain, ringing in my ears, and dizziness and now I have been able to find sleep again and no longer hear ringing bothering me all day. I recommend this practice 10/10.

Prior to seeing Dr. Mora, I was having pain, clicking and locking of my jaw. After just a few PT treatments, she has increased the range of motion in my jaw and substantially decreased the pain and clicking.  I can recommend her without hesitation.  Her expertise for TMJ issues has made all the difference!

I came to Healers in Motion after suffering a grade 3 ankle sprain and I couldn‚Äôt be more thankful for the care I received. From day one, the team was knowledgeable and very supportive.  Dr. Mora guided me through each phase of healing with clear instructions and adjusting the exercises to match my progress. I highly recommend Dr. Mora to anyone looking for expert PT and compassionate care.

Highly recommended
I am very grateful for Josh's excellent work. His dedication, knowledge, and compassion made all the difference in my recovery. From day one, he demonstrated professionalism, patience, and motivation, helping me move forward step by step with confidence. Thanks to his support, I feel much better and more mobile today. I recommend his work without hesitation!

I had a frozen shoulder that is now all thawed out thanks to their amazing Occupational Therapist! In just 12 weeks I have almost my complete range of motion back and no pain. Thank you so much for the hands-on support and guidance. Highly Recommend!

I‚Äôve been suffering for years with my back problem and fooling myself saying it‚Äôs going to get better, but that wasn‚Äôt the case. As Time passed I didn't think anything would get any better. After attending Florida Therapy Center and working with my therapist, Josh I am a believer. I am now back pain-free and I have Josh and the Center to thank for that. It was a comfortable clean atmosphere .Josh made sure I was doing my exercise correctly and I now have a better quality of life. just giving a heads up, Florida therapy Center is on my speed dial. Thank you.

I had both knees replaced & Josh was very helpful both times.The facility is easy to get to. It's clean they always wipe down the beds or equipment that has previously been used before you use it.Josh was great to work with. I'd recommend it to everyone.

The planned exercises and the therapy worked quite well for me. When I arrived with low back problems I was in pain and with reduced mobility. By the end of my insurance approved therapy allowance my mobility was back to where it used to be before the injury .All the staff is great and they have a sincere interest in your recovery ,plus they exercise a great deal of attention to detail to help you maximize the effect the threrapy and to adjust your exercises regime as you progress while keeping you safe. I defienetely recommend the facility.

Love these guys!!
I had gone to another PT place not too far from this one, and was not pleased with their services. They made it difficult to deal with their admin department trying to work on my insurance authorization, and I never got better after 2 months of PT, but I digress. It‚Äôs about Florida Therapy Center!

Josh is great and keeps that place lively and fun. You might feel a little intimidated at first because they treat several patients at the same time, so there‚Äôs not much privacy, but I soon came to absolutely love this style and felt like I was walking into a room with friends every time.

And the best news is, my shoulder is 99% back to full ROM and zero pain!!!! ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞

Thanks Josh and team!!!

I completed therapy with Lauren following repair for a ruptured distal bicep tendon and the process was better than I could have ever hoped for. They were very accommodating to my schedule and I was able to complete my therapy by using all three of their locations. Lauren, Josh, and Matt were extremely friendly, supportive, and helpful. They each have a vast knowledge of what they are doing and care personally for each and everyone of their patients. I would highly recommend any one of them for any and all rehabilitation needs you may have or for any of the other services they offer.

Was with Florida Therapy for a few months for knee pain. They have very flexible schedules and learned loads to continue working on strengthening my knee going forward. Worked with Josh and he is awesome to work with. Highly recommend if you find yourself needing PT.

The care I received from Josh was definitely the best! My range of motion with my shoulder was restored. I continue with his home care plan to maintain the improvement I gained. He is professional, yet created a friendly atmosphere of knowledge and support that I looked forward to my sessions. I would recommend Florida Therapy Center and return here should I need any future therapy.
Thank you Josh!

I had reached out to the Florida therapy center located in Palm Bay as I was transferring down from Ohio and needed after surgery care for workman's comp. I spoke with Matthew who said of course we can do that he would just need to get some information from my doctor in Ohio. We went back and forth a couple of days and was able to get the information down to him as requested. My Ohio doctor reached out and said they've got all the information and was told that everything should be fine and he would get a hold of me to schedule an appointment. I had left a message on Monday & Tuesday, as well as text messages to assure that he received all the information needed so I could start therapy. I  received zero responses from message's,  but did see text messeges were read. Today is Wednesday the 16th and I reached out one more time with a message as well as a text message again no response. I was finally able to get a hold of Matthew on the phone this afternoon when I gave him my name he hung up the phone on me. I've never seen such unprofessionalism in my entire life for someone that is supposed to be running a business.I did try to call back with no avail that phone just kept going to voicemails as well as sent two text messages which went unanswered as well. I've never seen anything like it very poor professionalism.

provider_name: Florida Veterinary Rehabilitation and Sports Medicine
review_text: What an amazing experience with Dr Brown and the team! My dog has been suffering from leg pain for several months and without high dollar images (and sedation) we couldn‚Äôt get an accurate diagnosis. Within our 1 hour visit, Dr Brown was able to take images (without sedation) and diagnose the issue. The scheduling process was simple and the communication with the team was fantastic! We would highly recommend this group for any vet rehab needs.

provider_name: Florida Veterinary Rehabilitation and Sports Medicine
review_text: Shelby was having trouble walking and Dr. A and the amazing staff came up with a plan involving exercises, laser, underwater treadmill (as cool as it sounds), and acupuncture. After her first 8 sessions, there was a marked improvement in her walk and she's even running. I am so grateful to this place and the wonderful people who work there. I was so scared it was only downhill, but she's doing better every day. Thanks to them. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Florida Veterinary Rehabilitation and Sports Medicine
review_text: Dr. Brown and her staff are absolutely amazing. The facility is top notch. We highly recommend if you have a üê∂ in need of rehab.

provider_name: Florida Veterinary Rehabilitation and Sports Medicine
review_text: Is it pricy? Yes. Is therapy here worth it? YES! Dr. Brown is so sweet, insightful, and caring towards my sweet girl. I love that in between our full service appointments we have check-ups with Dr. Brown to discuss progress and game plan our next steps. Our weekly appointments are filled with laughs and numerous muscle strengthening exercises to help my dog heal at a safe rate. Would 100% recommend.

provider_name: Florida Veterinary Rehabilitation and Sports Medicine
review_text:
From the moment you open the door and through and through you know rehab is the focus. The soft rubberized (not mean slippery tile) flooring greets pups along with a friendly team. Regardless of the physical ailment the team is helpful, patient, and caring (with the pups and the humans).

We love the variety of treatment options and the package discounts! Safety absolutely comes first here. I love the team will communicate with us via email and/or phone!

We feel so lucky to have found Dr Brown and her amazing team!

provider_name: Florida Wellness & Rehabilitation Center of Tallahassee
review_text: The staff is really nice and helpful. They are caring and have a very friendly attitude. Dr. Fedore is amazing. He is very knowledgeable and always shows a lot of care, compassion and concern about me as a patient.

provider_name: Florida Wellness & Rehabilitation Center of Tallahassee
review_text: I Was referred to this chiropractic rehabilitation center by patient's first urgent care. The center has been very helpful with assisting me with medical evaluations and physical rehabilitation after my auto accident injuries from last year. I would highly recommend this place to anyone in need of chiropractic care, rehabilitation, and so forth.

provider_name: Florida Wellness & Rehabilitation Center of Tallahassee
review_text: Friendly staff, I feel very comfortable talking with the doctor.

provider_name: Florida Wellness & Rehabilitation Center of Tallahassee
review_text: Best place to go they cared for me well!

provider_name: Florida Wellness & Rehabilitation Center of Tallahassee
review_text: I attend this facility for therapy twice a week. I am Very grateful to have been referred to these group of great doctors and medical assistants. Everyone here has a great attitude and are always calm, courteous and professional. They have been taking very good care of me and treat my 3 year old son with so much love and care. Couldn‚Äôt have came to a better facility. You guys are the best! üôå

Called concerned about a trapped kingfisher in the pond near my house. Florida Wildlife Hospital answered immediately and was able to send someone out within a few hours. The woman who came out was very sweet with my young son. Thank you for saving that beautiful bird.
If you ever have a sick animal or hurt animal this is definitely the place to take them they‚Äôre the best they love the animals and they get them back to health
So thankful for this invaluable service assisting and protecting Florida‚Äôs wildlife. Very nice staff and handlers. Would like information on available support for after-hours rescues.

Absolutely wonderful and lovely people working here... We found a baby bird covered in grease while working on our truck and they are taking the bird in to heal and rescue it.. we can not express how grateful we are for the people here and what they do. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts at ABC Supply.

A young (juvenile) crow got trapped in our chimney and could not fly out and could not get passed the small flu opening either.  Josie and Chris were the volunteers who came and were able to release the restriction on the flu damper to expand the opening so they could successfully access and retrieve the bird. They took the bird to the hospital for evaluation and will be caring for it there until it can survive on its own.  Everyone involved--at the hospital as well as these two volunteers---were remarkably compassionate.  Thank you!

Absolutely amazing groomer! I brought my husky in and he came out looking like a fluffy new pup! Brought him a second time for same grooming service AND to get his teeth cleaned! Highly recommend this place for both services! Wish I would have taken a before of his scruffy raggedy looking self and you can‚Äôt appreciate the afters because it was dark. But he looked so fresh and he knew it too!!

After vetting many places to take our Pomeranian we gave Fluffy Paws Pet Salon  a try and it was an AMAZING experience. Our dog was so relaxed and happy, the ladies were very sweet and Luisa made sure I was happy with the style. Very clean place, the smell was incredible and the price so affordable which allowed me to give a much better tip. We will be coming very often!

Fluffy Paws does an overall great job grooming. Our dog is always met with a warm welcome from the owner. They do a thorough job and ensure your requests were met. It‚Äôs great to have a knowledgeable, flexible and caring groomer you can trust.

My dog knows he‚Äôs going to the groomer, and is still very excited. He gets there, he‚Äôs super happy. That‚Äôs the way I know they treat him very well there. He‚Äôs 65 pounds, he‚Äôs a Labradoodle, not easy to deal with. But they‚Äôre very patient and very gentle. My dog loves it there. I love that. I don‚Äôt feel bad when I leave him there, he‚Äôs not crying or trying to run after me. The staff is really professional and you could tell their all dog lovers. Plus I love the fact that you could see them working on your puppy. No hidden room stuff.  I highly recommend them. I drive about 45 minutes just to get there. But it‚Äôs completely worth it. Ghost loves it there, so, he barked, 5 stars!!! ‚≠êÔ∏è

We recently took our Goldendoodle, Bombon, to Fluffy Paws Pet Salon, and we couldn't be happier with the experience! From start to finish, the service was exceptional.

The staff was incredibly friendly and professional, making both us and our dog feel welcome and comfortable. The groomers took the time to listen to our specific requests and provided great suggestions based on our dog's coat type and temperament.

When we picked up our @Bombondoodle, we were thrilled with the results. He looked absolutely adorable, and his coat was perfectly groomed and soft. It's clear that the team at Fluffy Paws takes pride in their work and genuinely cares about the pets they serve.

We also appreciated the clean and well-maintained salon environment. It was evident that hygiene and pet safety are top priorities here.

Overall, Fluffy Paws Pet Salon exceeded our expectations in every way. We highly recommend them to anyone looking for top-notch grooming services for their furry friends. We'll definitely be returning for all our grooming needs!

Pictures:  Before and after

Thank you, Fluffy Paws, for the amazing experience!

After coming to the studio for almost a year, I feel so much better all around. It's like mental and physical therapy for me. I never considered myself an athletic person but all the instructors are so welcoming and help me feel confident trying new things. I love the reformer and aerial yoga classes. The small class sizes and well-designed studio mean there's always enough space and the instructor can spot you. Class passes are affordable and you get a discount buying more at once. Totally worth it!

Fluid Form is amazing. I love the aerial classes. Aerial yoga is something you must experience, it is so unique and Kyra is an amazing instructor. Relaxation in the silks at the end is the best part, but the whole class is amazing. Regular yoga moves are completely transformed using the hanging silk.  Amanda's aerial dance class was so much fun and really stretched me to try new things that I didn't think I could do. The professional instructors make me feel like I'm a celebrity in a training program!

What a welcoming space! Kyra and team are so knowledgeable and encouraging. When I blew my knee out in a skiing accident, Kyra helped bring me back to full range of motion. Can't say enough positive things about the professional instruction and caring approach. They also switch it up for interest with aerial classes, reformer, cadillac, floor exercises, etc, Highly recommend.

I couldn‚Äôt love this place more! I had never taken a Pilates class before, so I was pretty nervous going into it, but truly it could not have been a more welcoming environment. The instructors are incredible and so positive, and the studio is gorgeous and so, so clean. Absolutely love and am so addicted now 10000/10 ü§ç‚ú®

I used to really enjoy coming to this Pilates studio. The classes were solid, and the space had potential to feel like a welcoming place for regulars. Unfortunately, I stopped going after being told I couldn‚Äôt bring my children even though they were old enough to quietly sit by the front door with their iPads. They never disrupted the class or made a sound. It was my one hour to do something for myself, and they were completely respectful of that.

What made it worse was the double standard: the owner regularly brought in her dog, which not only wandered into my space but actually licked me. I‚Äôm allergic to dogs. She never asked if anyone was OK with it.

So let me get this straight. kids quietly watching a screen in the corner are an issue, but a dog licking clients is fine? That kind of selective enforcement and lack of empathy made it clear this studio wasn‚Äôt the right fit. Moms deserve a space too. And basic respect goes both ways.

Thankfully, I found another studio with more experienced, ones who aren‚Äôt still in training for their certifications, and a much more inclusive, professional vibe. Total upgrade.

Neurofeedback with Kelly is a wonderful experience. From the first appointment she made sure I was comfortable and explained how everything works. I saw great improvement in many areas and found neurofeedback to be a very supportive tool to my overall healing goals. I most appreciate Kelly‚Äôs genuine care and patience. She‚Äôs a gem to work with and I appreciate the work we‚Äôve done together so much! I love knowing of I ever need a tune up, I can jump right back in. Highly recommend!

I would recommend Focus NeuroRehab to anyone interested in exploring neurofeedback. Kelley is extremely knowledgeable, caring and communicative. We are so happy we found Focus -- we take our son there and Kelley works on improving his seizures and language capabilities.
I thoroughly enjoyed my rehabilitation here. The staff is so friendly and the therapists are extremely good and knowledgeable. I highly recommend!!!
Neurofeedback has helped me focus and sleep better!

I‚Äôve been to many PT places in my life. They were all similar in making me feel as if I am just one cattle in the herd. First of all, Elizabeth Soika has to be the best kept secret treasure in the PT world. She actually figures out issues that I had doctors previously give up trying to help me with. I actually enjoy PT with her and its not because I like exercising. I actually make progress because of her. She is outstanding. Also. If you get referred to focus and get assigned to another therapist, guess what? You will still be in great hands. I have worked with probably all of them at some point and it will still be the best experience you have ever had doing PT, I assure you.

I have been to Focus for several ailments in the past few years.  The staff is consistently professional and friendly all at the same time.  Elizabeth Soika has been my therapist primarily, and she is very discerning and thorough.  But truly, all the therapists, assistants, and desk staff are welcoming and caring.  Happy to leave this review!

Love, love, love the staff. The owner is very pleasant & actually cares for the patients. Elizabeth is my homegirl now üòÜ‚ù§Ô∏è. Front staff very friendly, and who ever you are paired with for therapy will be awesome guaranteed. Never a hit or miss, just a HIT ‚ù§Ô∏èüëèüèæ 10/10 service!

Scott and his team are very professional. They adapt well to your level of pain, healing speed, and muscle growth around the injury. If you want to recover fast and resume normal life and sports I recommend Focus Physical Therapy.

I did pool therapy at Good Shepard Episcopal Church. Rashawn helped me with my mobility over a period of 6 weeks. It was a great workout and I recovered my range of motion and my leg pain decreased greatly. I would recommend Focus Physical Therapy!

I was having some range of motion and pain problems with my shoulder and elbow.  I worried I would need surgery but was assured early on that it was very unlikely.  I wasn't sure how effective physical therapy would be because I've never done it before but I learned the right exercises can really help.  I had a few appointments with Scott and a few with Andrew.  Both are really great with explaining why we're doing certain things and making sure the form is correct.  We actually had a lot of fun in there fixing my shoulder.  I would recommend them to any of my family or friends.

Best physical therapy in Jacksonville!  Scott and his team truly care, and it shows.  I love how clean and organized the office is.  They offer amazing, methodical, physical therapy, and I have never felt better!  Thanks to Scott and the Focus team!

I have received great service, care and support from Focus Physical Therapy. Scott Crawley along with Rashaun and Chetana makes a great PT team who prioritizes a very tailored routine with a clear focus on results. Pain management and strength were given extra importance which were key to my recovery. Assessments were done from time to time to determine progress and adjustments. Overall I had a very professional and satisfactory experience with the team and would highly recommend to anyone looking for PT.

I LOVE it here!!! Overall wonderful experiences from each secretary to Scott, the owner, and Rashaun his assistant. Everyone here is dependable! I always know Scott has set up, is watching my progress and will take care of any of my concerns in any situation. Rashaun is caring too‚Ä¶very knowledgeable, attentive and willing to adjust and adapt to what works best when needed.  I say they both have ‚Äúmagic hands and fingers ‚Äù.  All staff members match their kindness, confidence and support their professional efforts in getting your body back on track. I‚Äôve had multiple physical issues to work on and they are able to handle each one. The dedication, positivity, understanding, sympathy, flexibility and encouragement of every staff member working on each problem as a finely tuned team takes the worry away with great pain free results.  You can‚Äôt go wrong with Focus‚Ä¶ they are truly focused on your care and healing. Thank you all very much, Focus team!!!

This was my first-time getting treatment at Focus Physical Therapy, and I‚Äôm glad I did. The environment and genuine care and concern for all patients is very evident.

Thanks Focus for helping me improve my range of motion after my shoulder procedure. Scott Crowley, and his team, showed personal care and concern while illustrating the exercises needed to regain full use of my shoulder.

Thanks again for your help, I‚Äôm very impressed and appreciative for the experience.

My wife was so happy to pick a Doctor off of Google reviews that deserved the high ratings that they have. She had a toe that was nearly infected and ended up being saved.  The Nurse , name unfortunately escapes me, and Dr. Dr Sheingold were great in caring and answering any questions and fears that I may of had.
Thanks Again to the fine staff and friendly staff.

This was my first visit with this office.  The office is not fancy which doesn‚Äôt matter to me. However service does. The service was great ! They are kind and caring. I have a terminal disease so my skin is not in the best shape ‚Ä¶ but not only didn‚Äôt they make me feel uncomfortable, but when she noticed i was putting cream on my feet she offered to help ! This may seem like a small gesture but it was huge to me. everyone was professional‚Ä¶ I was lucky to find this office. They are wonderful! I am grateful‚Ä¶

Dr Adler and staff are friendly and knowledgeable.  Many years ago I worked for a podiatrist and I feel I have a good understanding of what you should expect and it's obvious he is a kind and professional man and treats his staff well.  The office is undergoing some changes in their system but staff handle it very professionally. I would recommend this group without hesitation.

The doctor and staff were absolutely wonderful. So caring, so professional, quickly called back. Had X-rays done, the doctor didn't make me or any of the other patients waiting too long. He also talked to me like I was a person not just the next thing he had to take care of. Definitely think anyone needs help, should go to this office. First rate

I found the doctor and staff to be kind and accommodating. Everyone was very knowledgeable and bedside manner could not be beat. It was my first time at this office and they worked me in the same day. Usually this means a long wait but the wait was just a few minutes. I'm very grateful for the help I received and the relief I feel from just one visit. Thank you guys! WELL DONE!

I have been through about 9 treatment centers. The cravings are always there, I am afraid and resistant to getting help. I usually leave or give up after week two or three. I've noticed a significant change here at Footprints Beachside Recovery for me. I don't want to leave, my cravings have almost gone down completely and I look forward to learning something new everyday. I am an escape artist. I run when things get tough. The way the beach is utilized here is perfect for me to find serenity, peace and calmness within myself. Meetings are enforced everyday and recreational activities. We are also able to go to the gym as I am a world class martial artist. I was about to give up on myself before I found this program. Thank God I came here.

My time at Footprints Beachside Recovery was truly transformative. The staff's dedication and compassion created an environment where I felt supported and encouraged every step of the way. Through their guidance, I not only overcame challenges but also discovered valuable insights about myself. My therapist provided invaluable support, fostering growth and self-awareness. I'm immensely grateful for the positive impact Footprints had on my journey to recovery. What sets Footprints apart was the genuine connections I made with the staff, relationships that I know will endure beyond my time there.

What a memorable experience. Had I known treatment centers like Footprints existed I would have checked in a lot sooner. Im very happy with the tools and resources I have received from them. A very welcoming environment with knowledgeable staff and counselors. If you are in need of a recovery program for yourself or a loved one,  Footprints Beachside is in my opinion top tier. Currently 5 months sober and thanks to everyone at Footprints I have the tools to make it a lifetime.

I completed 90 days at Footprints Beachside Recovery.  30 days partial hospitalization and 60 days intensive outpatient. Staff and counselors are excellent. The atmosphere, curriculum and general recovery plan is quite effective and feels personal and genuine. John, the proprietor, and his family are caring and involved.  I highly recommend for anyone who needs a treatment center for their journey to recovery.

So where do I begin, let‚Äôs start with my background I‚Äôm 41 years old I‚Äôve been struggling with addiction for over 20 years I‚Äôve been to 24 different rehabs throughout the state of Florida I‚Äôve had troubles with both alcohol and drugs my whole life. I‚Äôve been locked up I‚Äôve been kicked out of my home I have been hospitalized and shined from my family. I have been in many facilities that I thought was going to work but never did. I couldn‚Äôt ever stay sober when I was released from any facility for mor than a few months and I lived at programs for years before. I found footprints beachside recovery online and said I‚Äôm gonna try it it was just another rehab when I signed up but when I got there everything changed. Today I am 6 months free and sober thanks to footprints. The difference in this rehab compared to others is once you walk through the door you feel like family you don‚Äôt feel like a number everyone is on the same page when it comes to you and everything that goes on with you. Your living quarters are above expectation and the cleanest I‚Äôve ever been in compared to other facilities. The groups are very informational but also taught in a way I could understand and relate with. All the clients were on my level and felt the same. Whatever I needed was supplied for me and even John‚Äôs dad comes up and shakes your hand your on a first name bases with every staff member. John‚Äôs brother Shane helped me with many face to face talks as did John. At footprints they get involved and they care they want to know what‚Äôs going on with you and they want to help. I am now still going to iop after my residency and my 30 days tuned into almost 5 months now with them. If your looking for a place to get your shit together call ask for John and let him and his crew help they did for me what I couldn‚Äôt do myself and nobody else could either. Today I‚Äôm as sober and happy as I‚Äôve ever been they helped me save my life. It can be done it‚Äôs up to you to keep trying. Thank you footprints!

I‚Äôve been coming to USA Sports Therapy in Aventura for a while now for upper, mid, and lower back pain, plus some neck issues following a motor vehicle collision ‚Äîand the difference has been amazing! Everyone here is so friendly and welcoming, from the front desk to the doctors. You can tell they really know their stuff and care about their patients. They make it super easy to talk about what‚Äôs going on, and the treatments have helped me feel so much better. Definitely recommend them!

Dr. Nigel is the best! Very caring and helpful. Thank you so much for all you‚Äôve done. USA Sports Therapy has worked with me so well on my ever changing schedule. Also, when I‚Äôm not feeling the greatest. Thank you all so much!

I‚Äôm so grateful for all the help I‚Äôve received here at USA Sports Therapy. From the ladies behind the counter all the way to my doctor, Dr. Nigel. He was always so patient with me and understanding. Thank you so much!

Warm and friendly staff, very accommodating when scheduling appointments, but knowledgeable doctors, new and clean environment, ladies at the front desk are wonderful, make you feel at home! Also they make the best coffee if you are into that stuff!

I‚Äôve had an amazing experience at USA Sports Therapy. I have been going to them for a few months and I am very happy with the results! From the moment I walk in, the staff is welcoming and kind. The facility is clean, well-equipped, and has a positive, encouraging atmosphere. I highly recommend Dr. Tersigni to anyone looking for top-notch care and results. Thank you to the entire team for helping me get back to feeling my best!

I highly recommend the Force PT Coconut Grove team! I spent a couple of months working with Dr. Alex Jones, recovering from tendonitis in both knees as well as IT band issues. When I first started PT, I was in chronic pain and could barely walk without sharp, shooting pain in my knees. My legs constantly hurt, even at rest, disrupting my sleep and everyday life. As a runner, my goal was to be able to run long distances again, and Alex and the Force team were tremendous in helping me get there. We used a variety of therapy techniques, including dry needling, cupping, electrical stimulation, blood flow restriction, strength training, and exercises I could continue on my own. I‚Äôm happy to share that not only am I no longer in chronic pain, but I'm able to run again! Thank you Force!!

I‚Äôve been working with Simon for a little over a year, and he‚Äôs seriously the best. I play D1 soccer, so keeping my knees healthy is a huge priority, and he‚Äôs been amazing at helping me stay on top of everything. His attention to detail is incredible. He really notices the little things that make a big difference and tailors everything to what I need. The whole team at Force is also great and makes the environment so positive and motivating. I always leave feeling better and more confident going back on the field. Couldn‚Äôt recommend Simon and the Force team enough!I‚Äôm

Dr. Un is the best of the best. He's friendly, communicative, and has vision for your recovery. Oh, and he has the thumbs of a Greek harpist with the strength of Hercules.

I was there for 5-month recovery, building strength back up after I got surgery on my foot/lower leg. He listened to my needs and limits while also pushing me to get stronger, more stable, and more flexible.

He makes Force Physical Therapy in Coconut Grove great and he deserves recognition and credit for helping shape what it is today.

Ask for Simon!

The team at Force Physical Therapy in Coconut Grove was amazing! My physical therapist, Dr. Alex Jones, was incredibly attentive and made sure every session was tailored to exactly what I needed. He helped me safely and steadily build back my strength after a collarbone injury, and I always felt supported throughout the process. Highly recommend to anyone looking for personalized, professional care!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this clinic. My PT, Alex Jones, has been incredible throughout my recovery journey. He‚Äôs pushed me to get as strong as possible while helping me return to my pre-injury fitness level and keeping pain to a minimum. The facility is always clean, and the entire team is friendly, professional, and extremely knowledgeable. Highly recommend to anyone needing physical therapy!

Dr. Niko is unmatched and I can‚Äôt recommend him enough! From the moment I walked in, he was incredibly personable and made me feel at ease. He took the time to explain everything clearly, and his approach was gentle yet effective. I was initially nervous about starting therapy, but Dr. Niko‚Äôs comforting demeanor and professional expertise put me at ease right away. He made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire session, and I left feeling better after each visit. If you‚Äôre looking for a physical therapist who genuinely cares about your well-being, Dr. Niko is the one.

Life-Changing Treatment for My Frozen Shoulder
I cannot express enough gratitude to Dr. Niko Tejada at Force Physical Therapy in Fort Lauderdale for the incredible care he provided in helping me recover from my frozen shoulder. After months of struggling with pain, limited range of motion, and frustration, I finally found relief through Dr. Niko's treatment.
From the very first appointment, I was impressed by the thorough assessment and clear explanation of my condition. He took the time to explain the anatomy of the shoulder, the nature of a frozen shoulder, and the specific approach he would take to treat it. He was patient, empathetic, and tailored every session to my needs and progress. I felt supported every step of the way, and what really stood out was Dr. Niko's ability to motivate and encourage me throughout the process. Thanks to his dedication and expertise, my shoulder is now nearly pain-free, and I have regained full range of motion.
I highly recommend Dr. Niko Tejada who made all the difference in my recovery journey.
Maryrose G.

OMG Niko knows, Niko Knows!!! IYK IYK!!‚Ä¶If my body could speak‚Ä¶wouldn‚Äôt matter words still wouldn‚Äôt be able to explain the comfort and the hands of magic from Niko and Christina. I‚Äôm only a week in from ACL & MCL reconstruction and I‚Äôm back at work moving with limits and feeling great üôèüèæü§óthank you Thankyou!!!

I can‚Äôt recommend Niko enough! In just 4 months, we‚Äôve made amazing progress with my knee recovery. His professionalism, knowledge, and patience really stand out. Every session is focused and tailored to what I need, and he always makes sure I‚Äôm not just doing the exercises but understanding why they matter. On top of that, the staff is super welcoming and the vibe at his place makes you feel motivated and comfortable every time you walk in. Thanks to his guidance, I‚Äôm moving with more strength and confidence than I thought possible this soon. If you‚Äôre looking for someone who truly cares about your progress and knows how to get results, Niko is the one!

I visited Force PT after struggling with knee pain. From day one, Niko was professional and thorough, assessing my knee and explaining the issue clearly.  He designed a personalized plan with excerises and hands-on therapy that targeted my pain and mobility.   After about 12 sessions, my knee feels stronger and I am back exercising w/out pain.   I highly recommend Niko for anyone with knee issues.

As a college baseball player recovering from a low back fracture, I didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd be able to squat or deadlift again. But from day one, Sarah Segan at Force Physical Therapy changed that mindset. She not only told me I could get back to lifting‚Äîbut helped me come back even stronger than before.

Sarah is incredibly hands-on and truly cares about her patients. She was always attentive, made sure I was progressing safely, and answered every question I had‚Äîeven when it came to navigating insurance. The peace of mind meant everything during my recovery.

I‚Äôm not usually the type of person who enjoys physical therapy, but I genuinely looked forward to going each day. Sarah‚Äôs energy, encouragement, and belief in me made all the difference. Knowing that she cared as much as I did about my recovery kept me motivated through the entire process.

Thanks to her, I‚Äôm not only pain-free but back in the gym and on the field with more confidence than ever. If you're an athlete‚Äîor anyone‚Äîlooking to recover the right way, Sarah is the one you want in your corner.

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Sarah at Forced Physical Therapy! From day one, she‚Äôs been incredibly kind, knowledgeable, and genuinely committed to helping me heal. She takes the time to explain every step of the process and always tailors the treatment to my specific needs. Her positive attitude and encouragement make a real difference during every session. You can tell she truly cares about her patients and their progress. If you‚Äôre looking for a physical therapist who is both skilled and compassionate, Sarah is the one to see. Highly recommended!

Sarah is great!  üòä
I can't thank her enough for the incredible care and expertise she provided in helping me with my recovery. Her attention to detail and consistent encouragement made all the difference in my recovery journey. Not only did she address the injury itself, but she also guided me in building strength and in accomplishing everyday tasks. I highly recommend Sarah and Force physical therapy in Wynwood to anyone in need of exceptional physiotherapy.
Sarah is amazing! I‚Äôve been dealing with Achilles tendinitis for years. I‚Äôve done PT other places, I even did PRP shots and nothing worked. She is the only one who has made me feel better.

Sarah is AMAZING!!! After years of agonizing pain from nerve impingement/slight damage, she's come up with ways to allow me to finally feel my fingers, which I lost feeling in, & I'm not having flare-ups like I usually do because of what she's taught me. I appreciate her help and expertise. I recommend her to anyone I know, and also anyone reading this comment. I wish her, and Force PT- Wynwood, immense success!

Agh, I love this place. The horses are treated like kings and queens, the location is beautiful and the team is the nicest. I have been riding Marley, one of their horses, and I‚Äôm in love. Lauren has been teaching me and has made this experience even better: she is so patient, funny, caring and an amazing teacher. I recommend 100%.

What can I say to express how I truly feel about this place? Sport Horse Stables has been a sanctuary for me for the past five years. It is a place that I can always turn to. My trainer, Lauren, has been my favorite teacher in my eleven years of riding. She is easy to contact and get lessons with and in each lesson, I learn something new. Furthermore, the horses are spectacular and have something to give that‚Äôs more than just experience in the saddle. They also teach love and compassion for the animal. I would recommend coming here if a beginner that has no experience with horses to expert level. 11/10 would recommend.

I've gone riding at Sport Horse Stables only a handful of times, but every time I go the staff are excellent, scheduling is always a breeze, and the head trainer Lauren is amazing. In just a few lessons, I learned so much, she conveys the information to the clients learning style and really gets you to understand everything that goes into being a good equestrian. The horses are also all amazing, I had the pleasure of riding a couple different horses and was never disappointed. 10/10 would recommend.

Sport horse stables has a prime location with great spacious facilities. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable, and the horses available are great too. Ask for Lauren, she‚Äôs the best trainer I‚Äôve had!

The boarders and lesson students are great, one of the most harmonious equine environments I've ever had the pleasure of being a part of. The grooms are attentive and truly care about the animals too!

I had a wonderful experience with Forever Puppies! The facility is very clean, welcoming, and has such a warm, positive atmosphere. You can tell right away that the puppies are well taken care of they‚Äôre happy, playful, and healthy. The staff is also incredibly friendly and knowledgeable, making the whole process feel smooth and trustworthy. I‚Äôm so excited to bring my new puppy home and feel confident knowing they came from a place that truly cares. Highly recommend Forever Puppies to anyone looking to add a furry family member!
We just bought our golden retriever puppy from here. Marvin was super helpful and friendly. He made the process so easy and let us pet a few of our favorites.

My Fianc√© and I came to find our dream dog, immediately we found our boy, and asked the store associate Marvin if we could take a look, he was patient, knowledgeable and he was very friendly! Although the place was packed with customers he made sure to acknowledge us every chance he could and it made the experience that much better. He got us the best deal and when we come back for another fur baby we‚Äôll be asking for him and coming back to this facility. The store was clean, organized and easy to navigate. Thank you Forever Love Puppies!

reviewer_name: Andrea serrano M√©dico veterinario y zootecnista
review_text:
An experience that exceeded my expectations
My visit to Forever Love Puppies Ft. Lauderdale was so much more than just a purchase ‚Äî it was a meaningful experience filled with care, attention, and genuine kindness. From the moment I walked in, I felt supported by a team that is not only knowledgeable, but truly passionate about what they do. You can see how much they love the puppies and truly value each customer.
They listened to me with patience, answered all of my questions, and guided me through the entire process with empathy and professionalism. The help and support I received was exceptional, and thanks to them, my family now has a new little member who has brought so much joy into our home.
If you‚Äôre looking for a place where you‚Äôll be treated with respect, love, and care ‚Äî this is it. I highly recommend them with total confidence. üíñüêæ

This was a WONDERFUL experience. This was my first time ever in a pet / puppy store. I was able to bond and play with 3 puppies of my choice and I picked my dream dog (Corgi)! I would 100% recommend coming here for your dream dog. Everyone was super helpful and nice also!

provider_name: Forever Vets Animal Hospital at Nocatee
review_text:
I had a great experience bringing my 4 year old bearded dragon here for the first time for her annual health exam and fecal test for parasites. I previously was bringing my beardie to the St Johns Vet near Target in St Augustine for the first 3 years of her life, but their reptile and exotic veterinarian moved away. I chose to come to Forever Vets Nocatee based on a recommendation from a friend who brought his tortoise here. The facility is very clean and the staff were very friendly. Dr. Shannon Quinn was the reptile and exotic veterinarian who saw us and she was awesome! The only part of our visit I didn't like was that the vet tech took my beardie out of the room to be examined, but I believe that was due to another animal having an emergency so Dr. Quinn wasn't able to come in at our scheduled time. Either way, Dr. Quinn did come back to the room I was in after the exam and she was able to answer my questions and take more information from me about my beardie.

I was also pleasantly surprised how fast the results came back for the fecal test, it was the same day! It took at least a few days to hear back about results at our last vet. I recommend Dr. Quinn and Forever Vets for anyone else with a reptile or exotic pet. It's really nice knowing we have a good quality facility in the area that can handle reptiles and exotics. Thank you!

provider_name: Forever Vets Animal Hospital at Nocatee
review_text: LOVE how informative this location is and love that anytime I bring my three cavapoos in they never get skiddish. Wonderful staff and location. Thank you forever vets Nocatee for giving my babies so much love!

provider_name: Forever Vets Animal Hospital at Nocatee
review_text: Dr Quinn and Jonah were so amazing today! This facility has always taken fantastic care of our pup. They‚Äôve always been very reasonable on their suggestions/approach to any issues we‚Äôve brought  our dog in for. Highly recommend!

provider_name: Forever Vets Animal Hospital at Nocatee
review_text: I‚Äôve been bringing my Boston Terrier since she was 8 weeks and everything has gone perfect! The whole staff is amazing, very friendly and helpful! DR Quinn and Jonah just did my babies spay 2 weeks ago and she is healing up great! Highly recommend!!

provider_name: Forever Vets Animal Hospital at Nocatee
review_text: The staff was very kind. My rabbit had a dental infection, she was in a lot of pain. They got me in quickly, the staff were all kind. However Dr.Tank went above and beyond. You can see she‚Äôs there because she actually cares about the animals. She talked to me for about 40 minutes after my appointment about my rabbits condition and helped me find the best care that I was able to afford for her. And they have checked on her twice since we‚Äôve left. Dr.Tank has a heart for her patients!

I met Paul and Megan at Jiu Jitsu camp in Maine where they held two mobility workshops. Based on the experience I decided to sign up for 12 virtual sessions to address some knee issues I‚Äôve been experiencing after getting into CrossFit earlier in the year.

I‚Äôve been working with Paul for about a month now, and can already see improvements in hip and ankle mobility, and reduced pain in the knees. My squat has improved and feels better. Unlike my local physio who told me I should stop running and  lifting, Paul is laying out a structured program for improving mobility to be able to continue with physical activities.

Highly recommend Forge PT for people looking to get to the root cause of mobility issues and making improvements to stay physically active!

üî• Forge Performance PT is a game-changer. As a BJJ athlete, I‚Äôve dealt with knee injuries, and working with Megan has been absolutely invaluable. She helped me rehab a prior injury, and more recently, her prehab programming before my ACL surgery made a huge difference in my recovery and surgical outcome.

Now post-op, Megan‚Äôs rehab plans work seamlessly with my in-person PT and are 100% tailored to my sport and goals. Even as an online client, the support and expertise have been top-tier. If you‚Äôre a combat athlete dealing with injury or looking to level up ‚Äî Forge is the real deal. üí™

Megan & Paul care about their patients and have a 10,000 foot view of the HOW and the WHY.  How to get their patients not just back from injury but past where they are before.  Why matters even more, and they focus on dialing in their patients with education to back up what they are doing.  If you want to feel the difference between run-of-the-mill care and outstanding physical therapy, Forge Performance is the right place.  Highly recommend  - 6 Stars!

I am so grateful for the incredible care I received from Megan during my recovery after a partial lobectomy back in 2023, her expertise and dedication played a crucial role in helping me regain my mobility and return to my daily activities and even getting back into CrossFit!
Megan is not only highly skilled, but also incredibly kind and patient, always taking the time to work with me at my pace.
Thanks to her guidance, my mobility is now fully back to normal. I can‚Äôt recommend her enough for anyone looking for a physical therapist who truly cares and delivers amazing results.

After curing my vertigo, I have worked with Forge to improve my overall physical health with a focus on preventing neck, back and headach issues. I highly recommend Forge Performance PT to anyone looking to improve their physical health. Not only are Paul and Megan extremely knowledgeable, they care about each of their clients and have worked tirelessly to accommodate my individual needs and provide the tools necessary to accomplish my personal physical goals!

Forge Wellness has brought something to the Cape that is amazing! I have a stubborn back injury that has been following me around for the last 2 years. Despite stretching, chiropractic visits and pt, I‚Äôve not been able to shake it. After just ONE visit, I‚Äôve already noticed much less pain in that area. The targeted treatment is powerful, and you can tell right away that it‚Äôs helping to stop the inflammation and allow better blood flow to promote healing. Heidi is incredibly knowledgeable and friendly and can surely help you if you‚Äôre experiencing something like this, and have tried everything else with no relief!
Heidi is amazing!!! She was kind, knowledgeable, and had the best equipment to help my son who pulled his hamstring during a baseball game! We are very grateful for her! Highly recommend her practice

Heidi and her magic machines!! These treatments have overall improved my life.  She has snatched my waist, calmed my anxiety, and weakened my sciatica pain. I couldn‚Äôt say enough positive feedback! If you have ever thought about trying cryotherapy, this is the place!

Heidi is a very kind woman‚Äîjust talking to her makes you feel good. Her treatments are incredible; she knows exactly what she‚Äôs doing and explains everything in detail. She is simply amazing. I recommend her 100% üôèüèºüå∑she‚Äôll change your life

Discovering Cryotherapy has been a life changer on my wellness journey. The (unintentional) weight loss benefits have just been an added bonus. After roughly 2 months of weekly sessions, I can confidently say that I would recommend cryotherapy at Forge to everyone who is looking to improve their overall health. It is clean and the atmosphere is extremely relaxing. Heidi and her team are amazing.

Yesterday was my first visit with this vet office. I have a new 5 month old puppy, Victor, that I recently adopted and wanted to make sure he was up to date on shots and everything he needs. This office came highly recommended and I see why. The front desk staff was AMAZING! Explained all my options and quickly got us back to our personal room. Everyone was so friendly. Shots went easy and Victor had a great experience. I was able to talk to them about food issues I am having with Victor. He‚Äôs a picky eater and I did not feel judged when I explained I was not getting it right because he has loose stool. They offered suggestions and even provided dog food to try. I also found them to be very affordable. I haven‚Äôt had a puppy in years but I‚Äôm happy that I chose this office to care for Victor. They gave this dog momma the little boost of confidence I needed. Thank you!

I‚Äôm so glad we found Forgotten Coast Animal Hospital. The staff here are phenomenal. They are genuinely caring, patient, and incredibly knowledgeable. They take their time answering every question without ever making you feel rushed or unheard. What truly stood out to me is how they help you make the best decision for your loved one, not what brings in the most profit. I left the appointment feeling educated, accommodated, and completely at peace with the choices we made. Thank you, Forgotten Coast, for treating us like family!

Our first visit was a rough one, we had to put our 16 year old Jack Russel to sleep after months of battling the repercussions of a snake bite. The staff was great . they were very understanding and comforting when needed the most. We later received a card of condolences and a paw print we'll have forever.  One year later and we have not only relocated our other pet to the facility but just rescued/ adopted a new puppy and have visit #2 outta the way already üëç
Convenient location for us, inside lobby was clean and open, staff and Dr. Gerrell friendly, professional. She offered me alternative solutions to help my dog be more comfortable.

My beautiful 14 year old Black Lab passed away on August 13th.  I had her cremated.  Forgotten Coast Animal Hospital arranged her pick up from Allied Veterinary Emergency Hospital and the cremation itself.  Enola loved her visits with her doctor and staff. She was a beautiful girl and is missed by her K-9 brother and myself.  Thank you to the staff at Forgotten Coast for your love and respect for my Enola, it's so appreciated.

I have seen numerous Psychologists throughout my 46 years of marriage & none have compared with Dr Susie Mendelsohn. She is either one of a kind or truly unique. Her methodology is through education. Her program when followed can lead to a better understanding of difficult situations and a plausible path to successful reconciliation.  Everyone can benefit from her guidance.

Dr. Susie is simply fantastic. I feel blessed that our paths have crossed as we share several clients. To say she is dedicated is truly an understatement. She values her clients and their progress more than anyone I have ever seen. I am grateful to have her as a referral source for my clients! If you are looking for a psychologist who will see you as a human instead of a patient please look no further - you found her!

Dr. Susie‚Äôs dedication to her patients is unparalleled. My life has completely turned around for the better and I owe it all to her! Through her deep listening, and empathetic questions and inquiries, she helped me work through challenging times that helped me grow and change. She will help you with any and all of your needs with patience and perseverance. I HIGHLY recommend Dr Susie! She‚Äôs a true gem in her field.
