provider_name: Give Me 5 Therapy and PPEC Center
review_text: Very professional and friendly atmosphere the staff is a great asset through the Therapy!

My dog loves it here. As soon as we pull up, park & get out, he's jumping to try to get out. When he gets home, he's happy and exhausted! The ladies do a great job of taking care of them, and when he goes for grooming they take care of everything from nose to tail.

Our Jack looks so very handsome after his grooming today!   Sherri (she‚Äôs wonderful) bathed him, clipped his nails did a sanitary shave for him.  She is very kind and nice. I‚Äôm sure he feels better.  He looks great!   Thank you so much Sherri.

Wanna give some facts of our emotional support animal in our private practice. Chris the owner is always kind and letting Gracie come in for a haircut. However quality care should never be compromised.. Gracie was picked up after day care and 100.00 fee for haircut.
However when she was picked up she was unable to open her eyes. When asked what occurred no one knew‚Ä¶ Gracie at 8 pm  was taken to Colonial hospital .Chris did an amazing job and helping us get Gracie in however, as she was picked up, she could not open her eyes and has a chemical Burn to her eyes which she was taken to colonial animal Hospital after $300 in a gram of 100 bucks where now she‚Äôs unable to open her eyes because both eyes have a chemical burn. We are very upset and sad that our family dog and emotional support animal to our practice is now unable to attend our event Today Due to negligence of the Groomer ..

Amazing people!  My  little guy is so afraid of people (due to mistreatment of previous owners) he is quite aggressive to other humans, except me.  He has to be sedated to go to the vet and to the groomers.  And the first time I brought him in, they tried to so hard to get him relaxed but he wasn't having it. But they didn't give up on him.  They had me bring him in the following week.  And when I came to pick him up, he was being lovingly cuddled / held by a staff member and groomer was finishing the job.  I am overjoyed! I now feel that my little companion is getting the best and I no longer have to worry.  Thank you for being there and taking care of him.
We were very happy with our first experience. The staff was very friendly and professional.  Our girl Izzy was groomed and was beautiful when we pick her up, we highly recommend Glamor Paws.

provider_name: Global Speech and Rehab Services, LLC
review_text: So happy I chose Global for my son's speech issues. In just a few months he has progressed so much! They not only work with him, but teach me how to incorporate techniques everyday. His therapist, Pauline is the best!! Full of knowledge, patience, and positivity! She knows exactly how to keep him engaged and enjoying his sessions. The office staff is polite, knowledge, communicative, and extremely helpful!

provider_name: Global Speech and Rehab Services, LLC
review_text:
As the owner of a preschool dedicated to children on the Autism Spectrum, I wanted to make sure my little students receive the best therapies available. Partnering with Global Speech and Rehab Services was one of the best decision I made. Every single therapist sent to my school was a dedicated professional who put her heart and passion in making a difference for my little students, one day at a time. The owner of the company, Hasina Echoles is nothing but exceptional. She always goes above and beyond to give the best services to each child. She recently fought for one of my non verbal student to get him a device he could use to communicate. She came on her own time to the school to make sure the staff was properly trained on it. He now has it for a little over two weeks and he is already formulating complete sentence with it. My little Stanley finally has a voice thanks to her and her wonderful therapist!
I was so pleased with this company that I started using them for my own son who is also on the Autism Spectrum. My son's speech has improved tremendously in the past year and I know his therapist as a lot to do with it.
I am definitely looking forward to many more years of partnership and will continue to highly recommend Global Speech and Rehab Services to every parent crossing my path. THANK YOU FOR ALL YOU DO!!!!!!

provider_name: Glory to God Care, PPEC Fort Lauderdale
review_text: Glory to God PPEC in Ft. Lauderdale provides highest standard of care in nursing, therapy, and behavioral services for children who have complex medical conditions. The facility provides a safe, spacious, sensory gym, and modern indoor playground, to enhance children imagination, exploration, and improve their development. Children enjoy coming to the center always smiling and happy. I recommend parents and caregivers to visit this center if they are looking for quality services for their children.

provider_name: Glory to God Care, PPEC Fort Lauderdale
review_text: Glory to God PPEC is a place full of quality care, love, and joy. The children are provided with professional care that assists them in physically progressing and achieving milestones.  It is a complete joy to experience these moments! The facility has state of the art equipment that assists in the progress and development of the children. Not only are they cared for professionally and medically, but they're also loved immensely. These children are a gift from God and it's a joy to experience such a blessing.

provider_name: Glory to God Care, PPEC Fort Lauderdale
review_text: As a single parent of 2 children with special needs it's hard to find let alone trust  people to care for your kids the way that you do. Im eternally grateful to have a reliable, wonderfully child-centric staff that understands your kids like family. Well organized. Watching the therapists work with my kids keeping them engaged in soo many activities, helping them focus, and noticing the milestones and accomplishments that they attack every day and meet goals is fantastic. It also helps that you have transportation for them to make it easier for us parents to get to work on time. Definitely Hands Down The Best PPEC in Broward County!!!

provider_name: Glory to God Care, PPEC Fort Lauderdale

review_text: Glory to God represents it's name to the fullest! I needed a place that did everything in one and Praise God lead me to a place that was right under my nose. Everyone from the owner, nurses, physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, Certified nursing assistants,(CNA), RBT,  the chef and Sal which handles transportation, I give them all 10 stars ‚≠ê‚≠ê. Why? Because when my daughter started going to Glory To God I have seen sooo much improvement, I have tried so many other places and didn't see much improvements in my daughter which makes this place from my daughter experience number one in Florida... provider_name: Glory to God Care, PPEC Fort Lauderdale
review_text: The staff at this PPEC are caring, attentive, and professional! They create a safe and nurturing environment for every child. Therapy and activities are engaging and well-structured. We love this Center ‚ù§Ô∏è

Our horses haven‚Äôt seen Debra for about 4 years. Why? Just let things slip‚Ä¶. Today she worked on both their bodies. You can see the change in their attitudes as well as their physical bodies! By the time we  left the their  physical
As well as mental bodies change was amazing. We will never go so long again! We promise to our horses and Debra! What a gem she is! See you in the fall! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

They should be ashamed! After suggesting my 9 yr old ride bareback (no saddle) due to storms in area, instead of rescheduling the session! After she falls due to the horse being spooked by lighting and she lands square on her tailbone 7 days ago, we politely let her know we will be missing this week due to sore tailbone and pain when leaning back is still too present to get back on when again chance of bareback due to storms in area- we are met with being told sorry she‚Äôs sore but we will still need payment this week! There is NO agreement to prepay, we have been weekly rider since first week of January and because she can‚Äôt make it, your trainer feels entitled to respond demanding payment due to it not being fair to ‚Äúwaist the horses time or hers‚Äù  when she‚Äôs there anyways for other riders at 530 & 630!!! Greedy gets none! My child came with all her own Proper gear, does all grooming by herself with no assistance from said  trainer and gets maybe 30 minutes of shared lesson time for $60 a week!! Be ware of the trainers greed!!!!!!!

Glover stables is absolutely wonderful for learning horsemanship and riding. Debbie is a horse wizard and she is so knowledgeable about not just riding but also ground skills, it makes you feel like you‚Äôre in the best hands. I‚Äôve ridden at 3 other barns prior to this one and I feel like I‚Äôve learned more valuable skills in 2 lessons here than months at the other barns. I would highly recommend Debbie and Glover Stables to anyone pursuing their dream of riding horses.

This stable is awesome!!! We arranged a lesson this morning for our 3 and 4 year old grandchildren. Deborah (the owner) is the most kind, calm, cool and collected horse person we have ever met!  We were looking for a place for pony rides, but found this place which elevated our experience to next level! An affordable safe, educational, excellent, place to ride!!  We will be back!!

I'm 69 and have mobility problems. I had to put my horse down last year and I miss her so much. My husband asked what I wanted to do for Mothers Day this year. So I had an idea. I called Glovers and spoke to Debra. Told her what my issues were and asked if there was any possibility of us visiting. Told her I just wanted to spend time around horses, smell them, pet them, feed them.
Debra was amazing - she said "come on down".
So we went. We were allowed to freely walk around, visit, pet, feed, and bond with the beautiful horses there. The workers told us which were the snugglers and their names.
It was my dream. Due to my health issues, I cannot walk far and my doctors keep telling me I need to get out and exercise. I know that I walked more that day than I have in a long time. And it felt so good.
The ladies told us to come visit whenever we wanted.
It was the best Mothers Day EVER.
Debra and her people at Glovers could not have been nicer. And the horses were beautiful and so gentle and cared for.
I can't wait to go back.
THANK YOU.
Go Healthy Pet is the finest pet store in South Florida! Brian and Maryjo are so knowledgeable and caring...as long as we in in SOFLA we'll be loyal customers!

This is the absolute best pet food store in South Florida!  Super friendly service, very professional, the knowledgeable owners can provide suggestions based on your pets' needs.  Our little Dobie girl had kidney failure and required special food that the store owner recommended. We highly believe this is what prolonged her life an additional 18 months!   If you care for your pet like a family member, then this is your go to pet food store!

MaryJo is so accommodating! Our pet‚Äôs favorite treats were not a stock item, and she made sure we had them in her store within the week. She just made our lives so much easier!

Thank you for stocking up on so many healthy items for our pets and for always taking the time to explain ingredients, how toys work, and for being in a location that‚Äôs so easy to get to any time of day!

We buy a large bag of chicken chips each week - we dare not go home if they are depleted. Here‚Äôs what our dogs look like when we don‚Äôt have them.

I normally don‚Äôt do reviews, but this store is now my favorite store to go to. There every professional from the time your on the phone to the time in which you walk inside the door. I called and ask questions regarding some dog food I was looking into and every one in there store made me feel relevant and gave me recommendations on diff foods. I usually order from chewy but why not have other options where I can pick up locally and STILL for a reasonable buck. I HONESTLY like seeing my items in person and this store is huge with a nice variety.  The only thing I regret Is not brining my pup, I‚Äôm sure he would have enjoyed the visit as well.  In addition to that they also offer deliveries if it‚Äôs locally, huge bonus for me üòá
Amazing selection of pet products and the nicest owners who are very knowledgeable, get to know their customers and genuinely care about their pets! Highly recommend!

I had rotator cuff surgery in May of 2025, and 8 weeks later, I had a full tear of my long head bicep in the same arm. The ladies at Gold Coast Physical Therapy were outstanding and treated me with professionalism, kindness, and a sense of humor. August 21 was my last day, and by then, I had full mobility in my arm. I would highly recommend this amazing team. All of the ladies are 5 stars out of 5 stars.  Bryce Warren

I just finished a 3 months physical therapy treatment at this facility. Fantastic professionals that also have great people skills. It was very obvious to me that the entire staff enjoys helping patients.
Shinequa, Patti, Jenelle, Adamaris, Alani ,Erin are a few of the professionals I am very thankful for their help.I recommend this facility without any reservation.
I had the best experience there after my back surgery they did phenomenal things for me and I really appreciate them for that. Keep up the great work guys

I was referred to Fysical after major back surgery in December 2023 where I met Paul in the admission process, and Barbara, physical therapists at such location.

I needed to bring back full functionality of my left calf muscles and Achilles tendon which had suffered indirect injury from my back damage.

I was assigned to Barbara for my appointments and we became a good therapist-patient team.

Barbara was very instrumental in guiding me through my "up and downs" as I struggled with the notion of my injury.

As days and weeks went on, with her care, encouragement, and physical exercise regime provided to me, a great to total portion of my functionality returned.

As a last visit to the center, I had been given the opportunity to work with the center manager, Kelly Rider PhD, on a one-on-one and this meeting was also extremely challenging.

I highly recommend Fysical (Barbara and Kelly) as a physical rehabilitation center to anyone looking to improve or regain functionality of their bodies.

Luis S.

Barbara was my main therapist who provided the stretches / exercises that has given me the most relief since the onset of my knee and neck pain. Hopefully I won‚Äôt need to come back but if I do then I know that Barbara will take good care of me.

I also want to thank the rest of the staff (Kelly, Paul et al) for providing quality care.

I‚Äôve been to many barns in my riding career and I have to say that GGE has to be my top 1. I came to Golden Gate Equestrian as a beginner to hunter/jumper only knowing a few basics, I heard there was a summer riding club for teens and was so excited! I scheduled a meet up and lesson with Alexa via text. She was fast to respond, super kind, and attentive. In my first lesson Alexa wanted to see my riding abilities and matched me with her assistant trainer Madelyn. I first started taking once a week lessons and started advancing fast, I have to say Madelyn has an amazing teaching style giving me analogies, asking me questions, demonstrating things and even giving me examples. The summer riding club was an investment for sure, I soon moved to twice a week lessons and that‚Äôs when I really started advancing, I would start perfecting my posting trot, trotting over poles and getting ready to canter by practicing sitting trot. I worked with a variety of different horses which tested my patience, my abilities and dedication. Not only were the lessons the highlight of my week but the barn was a comfortable place to be in. The barn staff are super friendly as well as the other riders. The environment was freeing, accepting and it was easy to spark up conversations with the amazing riders in the barn. I cannot leave my review without saying how beautiful the facility is and how clean it is kept oh and the horses are from another world. Most of the horses are super tall and are kept in top notch conditions as well as the little ponies in the barn and out in the pasture. Overall, Madelyn and Alexa were understanding when I had to cancel, cared for me and my riding career and goals, the horses are beautiful as well as the facility and I will never forget all of the things I‚Äôve learned here! If you are interested in taking your riding to the next level and leasing your first horse or boarding this is the place for you. I won‚Äôt complain for pricing as every single penny you pay goes to the care of your horse and it shows. Thank you! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

I cannot say enough about my incredible experience buying a horse from Alexa at Golden Gate Equestrian. I live in Los Angeles and was purchasing a horse across the country, which could have been a stressful process, but Alexa made it absolutely seamless. Her honesty, integrity, and clear communication gave me complete confidence every step of the way.

Thanks to her, I‚Äôm now the proud owner of an amazing horse named Moose. She was supportive, responsive, and went above and beyond to ensure everything was handled smoothly. If I lived in Orlando, I would absolutely ride at her barn. Her professionalism, care, and genuine love for the horses are unmatched. I‚Äôm so grateful for the experience and would highly recommend Alexa and Golden Gate Equestrian to anyone looking for a trainer and barn they can truly trust.

Amazing care ‚ù§Ô∏è

Not many barns are run as a true business, and yes - that does mean the cost is higher - but it also means the care is too.

The staff here is impeccably detailed üëå Alexa has management and care on lockdown with the ability to add on every service imaginable (but never required), basically unlimited forage, and a pest and bug control strategy that's hard to find in orlando.

Their top notch care is only accentuated by the phenomenal training by Alexa, Madelyn (the HJ trainers) and my own trainer Katie Freeman.

Even in the insane summer heat this barn handles it well - hot air exchange, multiple overhead fans, automatic waterers and fly control systems. üëå we absolutely ‚ù§Ô∏è LOVE it üòÄ

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Golden Gate Equestrian. The facility is stunning with spacious pastures, well maintained arenas, and a beautiful barn. The grooms are amazing, always friendly and attentive to the horses needs. The trainers caring about the horses wellbeing and their riders progress. The entire team here is welcoming it really feels like a big family.

I highly recommend Golden Gate Equestrian! My horse gets top notch care tailored to his individual needs! The staff knows my horse and provides him with superb care. The facility is hurricane rated, safe, clean and organized. Additionally, the footing and jumps are well maintained. If an issue arises, Alexa addresses it immediately. Our trainers work together to provide the best training for my horse and my daughter.

Our first experience with Golden Heart was when we were having a medical emergency for our pup at the time. The Doctor and staff stayed late then to help provide assistance then. Since we‚Äôve been back for more treatments, an episode of happy tail, regular checkups, etc. they‚Äôve become our go too vet and are the only place we really consider when it comes to care for our pets. The most recent appointment was just continued confirmation of that. We saw Mia and Dr Joyce and they were as lovely to work with as every other staff member we‚Äôve interacted with since we‚Äôve started going here. We noticed rashes and balding spots on one of our dogs and they were very attentive and detailed in their examination and care. We really appreciate how every staff member here is always kind, thorough with their approach, and focused in listening. Take your pets here whenever the need for veterinary care arises, you won‚Äôt regret it.

If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. I had such a wonderful experience at this vet clinic. From the moment we walked in, everyone was incredibly friendly and welcoming. The facility was also very clean, which gave me immediate peace of mind.

Dr. Rogers and Miranda were both amazing with my dog. What really stood out to me was their gentle and patient approach. They didn‚Äôt try to force anything or manhandle my dog to get through the exam. Instead, they worked at his pace, doing only as much as he was comfortable with. It made the visit so much less stressful and helped ensure it wasn‚Äôt a traumatic experience for him.

I really appreciate a vet team that prioritizes the emotional well-being of animals while still getting the job done. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for compassionate, skilled care. Thank you Golden Heart!

I am so grateful Golden Heart was able to fit my cat in for a last minute appointment yesterday after my cat hadn‚Äôt been getting better for a few days. Dr. Rogers and all of the staff were incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and kind. I appreciated the vet tech so much too (either Mia or Miranda I think?) and in general had a great experience with all of their procedures. They‚Äôre also very easy to reach and always answer the phone which I appreciate. Will be switching this vet to be my primary!

I recently moved to Florida and was recommended by one of my coworkers to establish care for my two cats at Golden Heart. I called to schedule an appointment and they were able to get me scheduled for the next day, which was amazing! When I arrived they were a little backed up, but Mia the tech was kind and provided updates during the wait, which I greatly appreciated. She also broke down the costs and explained each service in detail which helped a lot. Dr. Joyce was amazing as well and was able to answer all of my questions. They were super patient and gentle while handling my cats and I am grateful for that.

Hello family, friends, and neighbors.  We took Marley, our eighty-pound furry family member, to establish him with a new doctor.  We had an 8 am Saturday appointment.  We were greeted by Danielle, who has a very welcoming demeanor.  She took us to a room, and, within a few minutes, we met Mia and Chris, the technicians.  Wow, I don't know which one to give more kudos to.  They were both exceptional.  Mia was very thorough, listened, and wrote down all our questions and concerns.  After a short period, we met Dr. Joyce.  From our previous experiences, we were not expecting such an engaging doctor.  Dr. Joyce is easy to communicate with.  She took the time to answer all our questions, and the best part is how informative and knowledgeable Dr. Joyce is.  She made Marley's care intuitive, which assured us that Marley would be very well taken care of.  I highly recommend Golden Heart Veterinary Care for your beloved pet.  We also found the cost to be cost-effective.

Mr. Jorge Del Sol
Winter Garden

provider_name: Golden Phoenix Mental Health | Cape Coral
review_text: My son has been coming to these therapies for about 3 months and he absolutely has made a complete change, the staff is very nice and friendly, very clean offices. Overall super good experience

provider_name: Golden Phoenix Mental Health | Cape Coral
review_text:
A beautiful place! My daughter loves it, has so much fun she doesn't want to leave!
The staff is wonderful. Always nice, with new activities, and clean. 100% recommended for our little ones to learn while having fun!

I had a wonderful experience at Goldson Spine Rehabilitation Center. The staff is professional, friendly, and genuinely caring. From the first visit, they took the time to listen, explain my treatment options, and create a plan that was personalized to my needs.

The facility is clean and welcoming, and every session felt well-organized and productive. I‚Äôve already noticed real improvement in my pain and mobility, and I feel confident knowing they are focused not just on short-term relief but on long-term recovery and overall wellness.

I highly recommend Goldson Spine Rehabilitation Center to anyone looking for quality care and a team that truly puts their patients first.

Goldson Spine is truly the place to be! From the moment you walk in, the staff makes you feel welcomed and cared for. Everyone is extremely professional, friendly, and intentional about making sure you‚Äôre comfortable throughout the entire process.

Dr. Errol Leys II (and the whole team) is very intentional and takes the time to truly listen and understand what you‚Äôre experiencing. You‚Äôre not just another patient‚Äîthey make you feel seen, heard, and prioritized. Every step of your care is explained clearly, and they make sure everything is done properly and with excellence.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place where healing is taken seriously, where the staff is knowledgeable, kind, and efficient‚Äîthis is it. I highly recommend Goldson Spine to anyone who values quality care and a compassionate atmosphere.

Absolutely amazing chiropractor!
The care here is top-notch. The chiropractor‚Äôs are incredible at what they do, and you can tell they genuinely care about their patients. The staff is incredibly kind, patient, and always welcoming  they treat everyone like family. I‚Äôve had such a positive experience every time I‚Äôve visited, and I would recommend this place to absolutely everyone!

Oh my gosh. I love everybody inside! Carolina is very communicative with making appointments. Dr. Leys and Eryn is amazing, they both make sure I‚Äôm comfortable during therapy and have great energy all the time. Definitely recommend.

Goldson and  spine has the best customer service and cleanliness in every room of treatment.  I highly recommend.  All staff and doctors are kind,  patient and they share the educational information in each process.
Thank you Goldson & Spine of Pembroke Pines
A.Hill

The owner, Robin, is very keen on bringing out the best in any and all dogs. She worked with my German Shepherd, Kaia. From doing leash training to vocal commands, she will not go out the door till she is told she can which has stuck with her to this very day. Very knowledgeable and intuitive, you just can't beat that! I would trust Good Behavior Dog Training with any and all of my dogs.

Ms Robin was referred by a friend, who did an absolute wonderful job with their dog. We met, and immediately I was impressed with her ability to take control and project to our dog Mabel who was in charge. It became apparent the classes were more for me on how to handle Mabel than for Mabel to be a puppet. Ms Robin has my utmost respect and I highly recommend her services to anyone.
Robin was so helpful with my young female shepard puppies. She helped me to learn strategies to continue to work my dogs even after I moved away. Would highly recommend her to anyone.

Robin is a true dog whisperer!  She has been teaching our 4 legged family members for years.  Robin has amazing techniques that are easy to learn and effective!  I highly recommend her for your dog training needs. She is awesome!

My Jack Russell was very difficult. He kept wanting to take off and terrorize the other dogs in my area. He was chewing stuff up all the time. He wouldn‚Äôt listen. Now, thanks to Good Behavior Dog Training, he sits when told. He stays when told. He‚Äôs not being so destructive. He‚Äôs actually showing self control! (This is huge!!!) I can‚Äôt believe the difference this has made! I felt like one of those people you see on tv with the dog that nobody can do anything with, and the results I‚Äôm seeing from his training are absolutely amazing! Thank you!

Wow, where do I even start with Good Care Animal Clinic? This place is a total gem for pet parents! Dr. Adalberto and his incredible team have made every visit for our Doberman, Joey, an absolute joy. From her puppy vaccinations to her ear cropping, they‚Äôve gone above and beyond. The shots were done so gently that Joey barely flinched, and her ear cropping? Pure perfection‚Äîthose ears are turning heads everywhere we go!

What sets this clinic apart is the heart behind it. Dr. Adalberto grew up tagging along with his dad, a vet himself, since he was just 12 years old. You can tell he‚Äôs living his childhood dream‚Äîhis passion for animals shines through in every careful stitch and kind word. The whole team, from the medical assistants to the front desk, knows Joey by name and greets her with wagging tails (okay, maybe that‚Äôs just Joey‚Äôs tail!). They‚Äôre so excited to see her, it‚Äôs like we‚Äôre bringing a celebrity to the clinic.

The vibe here is like a warm hug‚Äîprofessional but never stuffy, with a family-run feel that makes you feel right at home. The clinic is spotless, the staff is on top of everything, and their love for pets is contagious. I can‚Äôt recommend Good Care Animal Clinic enough‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs routine care or something special like ear cropping, they treat your fur baby like their own. Joey and I are customers for life! üê∂‚ò∫Ô∏è

I went to this place to get my Dobermans ears cropped. Wonderful Veterinarian and very knowledgeable. It will take the time and explain you the whole process in any question you may have.

If you're looking to get your pet ears done, this is the place.
I can't wait for the years to be here so I can post them.
Thank you again! Pet Name Niko

Great experience! They taught us how to post, explained the process very clearly, answered all of your questions and emails. The price was the best we could find as well. His ears are now perfect thanks to good care animal clinic! üôåüèæ

I‚Äôm so happy I found this vet coming from out of state. I‚Äôve heard of some unethical vets here in Miami but these people are amazing, truthful, and I believe it is family owned and they do seem like they truly care about animals. Everyone here is helpful and friendly and the vet is very knowledgeable. My 2 cats are admired here and they have been helping me with my male cats and their urinary issues which can be very stressful. I‚Äôm almost out of college and they are reasonably priced and affordable which really helps me get the care for my cats and not worry if I have any concern in needing to take them. They are also conveniently open from 7am-3pm so if I ever need to get the prescription food before work I‚Äôm able to make it. Even when I move out of the area, I will definitely keep bringing my cats here. THANK YOU GUYS FOR EVERYTHING I‚ÄôM SO HAPPY I FOUND THIS PLACE

I really loved this clinic! I went with my chronically ill cat and they took all the time necessary to check him and explain everything to me. They were super patient and made sure to clarify the prices early on, on top of letting me know that I have the right to decline any procedures/meds. The prices were great and accesible, including meds and a yearly checkup (they have an awesome package)! Definitely recommend if you want to want to bring your cat for checkups here; they care about your pet üêæ

Dorman Pantfoeder, the trainer at Good Dogs Training Camp was a blessing! Prior to dropping her off, he walked me through his training process and kept me update on her progress. He took my 5 month old GSP who barely knew basic commands and trained her not only with verbal commands but hand gestures as well! I asked to focus on leash training so that I can run with her and he made sure she was well trained. He also offered a follow up a few months after I picked her up to ensure her training stuck! Highly recommend if you are looking for a trainer in the Jacksonville Beach area!

Stassi loved going to camp! I sent my 7 year old dog to Good Dogs Training Camp in Jacksonville Beach to work on how she greets people at the door. She used to jump and bark and it would be unsettling for my guests. The second we arrived, Stassi immediately felt comfortable with Dorman (the trainer). When I picked her up, I was greeted with the happiest dog! Dorman taught me new techniques to work on at home with Stassi and she‚Äôs been awesome with guests ever since! I guess you can teach an old dog new tricks! I highly recommend  Good Dogs Training Camp for professional results in a family friendly environment :)

Dorman Pantfoeder and Good Dogs Training Camp far exceeded our expectations.  Good Dogs trained two of our dogs:  Skyler (12 years ago) and Doak (last year).  We opted for the six-week training plan and could not have been happier with the results. Dorman is the preeminent expert in his field!  He was able to get our dogs on the meal-sleep-play schedules we needed which boosted our dogs' happiness and greatly improved our overall quality of life.  Additionally, our dogs' obedience levels improved exponentially.  Thank you, Dorman and Good Dogs Training Camp for your expert care and training!

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

We cannot thank Dorman Pantfoeder and Good Dogs Training Camp enough for the incredible transformation in our 2.5-year-old English Bulldog, Pork Chop. Before training, Pork Chop was stubborn, anxious, and even aggressive at times‚Äîrefusing to walk on a leash, barking at everything, and spending more time in his crate than with us. Dorman‚Äôs board and train program gave Pork Chop the guidance he desperately needed.

Now, Pork Chop is a completely different dog‚Äîhe loves sleeping in his bed next to us, walks calmly on a leash, is potty trained, and is more relaxed around people and in new situations. It‚Äôs truly a night-and-day difference, and we‚Äôre amazed at the progress. No dog is unsaveable, and Dorman proved that with his expertise and dedication. If you‚Äôre looking for someone to help your dog turn a corner, look no further than Good Dogs Training Camp!

Thank you Dorman & Good Dogs Training Camp for helping make Pork Chop a certified obedient dog. Well worth the investment.

Our pup (a lab/hound mix under two years old) has stayed at Good Dogs Training Camp multiple times over the last two years. We could not be happier with the care and training she receives from Dorman.  He has such a great understanding of dogs' behavior and works with us (talking at length) to understand her needs and areas of opportunity.  Whether we are in town or far away, we know our pup is safe and well cared for.  We look forward to utilizing Good Dog's in the future and highly recommend to friends and family.

I started group classes with George with a 5 month old Belgian Malinois x Dutch Shepherd rescue who was completely unsocialized and living with a pack of aggressive dogs for the first 4 months of her life. She was extremely skittish, fear reactive, food aggressive, etc. The beginner obedience classes and now advanced obedience classes with Got Your Back K9 have completely changed her behavior and demeanor and given me the tools to know how to properly train and handle a challenging dog. We frequently get compliments on her good behavior while out on walks in our neighborhood. We really appreciate the expertise from George and his team and look forward to continuing training with them.

I couldn‚Äôt be happier with my experience at Got Your Back K9 Life! My dog, Ollie, just finished a two-week board and train with George, and the results are incredible. George was friendly, knowledgeable, and so helpful during our individual pick-up session. It was a huge comfort knowing Ollie was in good hands while being trained and cared for. I‚Äôm excited to keep up the progress in group classes. Highly recommend Got Your Back K9 Life to anyone looking for professional and trustworthy training!

We highly recommend Got Your Back K9 Life! Our German Shepherd puppy, Remy, recently completed a two-week board and train with Benjamin, and the results far exceeded our expectations. From the moment we met Benjamin, it was clear he‚Äôs not only incredibly knowledgeable, but truly passionate about what he does.

Benjamin took the time to thoroughly teach our entire family ‚Äî including our kids ‚Äî how to properly work with Remy using the commands he‚Äôd learned. Remy is now so well-trained and responsive that even my five year old niece can walk him confidently! The level of obedience and control he‚Äôs gained in such a short time is nothing short of amazing, and it‚Äôs clear Benjamin dedicated a great deal of time and care to his training.

The facility itself is very clean, well-maintained, and welcoming. Remy was actually sad to leave, which speaks volumes about the experience he had there. We‚Äôre beyond grateful to both Benjamin and George for the incredible work they‚Äôve done.

We‚Äôre excited to continue working with you and can‚Äôt wait to see Remy grow even further with training and scent work in the future. Thank you again Benjamin for everything!

I recently took my 4 year old dog, Honey to Got your Back K9Life to help her learn good manners and social skills. The owner, George was incredibly welcoming and balanced discipline with kindness perfectly. They got us in quickly and the communication was excellent throughout the entire process. The environment was so well set up that all the dogs adapted quickly and felt comfortable right away.

Before coming here I didn‚Äôt realize how much both Honey and I needed to learn proper dog etiquette and social behavior.
Now I have a much better understanding of how to handle social situation with my dog and I truly believe that every dog owner should take this class.
I appreciate everyone, George, Christie and Ben.

I‚Äôm sure you will be happy with your experience at Got Your Back K9 Life.

I highly recommend George and Staff at Got Your Back K9 Life!  Space was limited at the kennel and George offered a VIP service to get her in by allowing her to be a guest in his private residence! Wow! What a nice thing to offer to help us out! Akina our 6 month old,Belgian Malinois, just completed the 2 week board and train. I was completely in shock the difference in her behavior. She was on point with commands. George explained everything and trained us on pickup. We will be attending evening classes on Tuesday and or Thursdays at 7 pm! Thanks, George and staff!

Dr. Reyes is an amazing vet with remarkable staff. They don‚Äôt give up trying to help our pets and they take their time providing care. In addition, they are kind and personable. The pets love them too.

I can‚Äôt recommend Dr. Reyes enough. My 8 month old puppy had been dealing with health problems that I have been struggling to get answers on after going to urgent care vets and his primary. I was luckily able to get an appointment with Dr. Reyes and it was the first time I felt completely heard. Before me even going into detail, she did an extensive exam and told me her thoughts. She is extremely knowledgeable and wonderful with animals. Dr. Reyes spent time on the floor with Teddy and made the whole experience a positive one. It honestly brought tears to my eyes to finally feel like we‚Äôll be getting the answers we need. Thank you Dr. Reyes and TEAM!! You all are fantastic and Teddy and I look forward to your care in the future. ‚ù§Ô∏è üêæ Teddy has more slobbery kisses to give!

We have had amazing experiences with our anxious dog. Emily the vet tech has been incredible to work with, she‚Äôs patient, really listens and is willing to take her time to make sure our dog is comfortable. We have to sedate him for nail trims and we were able to do it without any drama. Dr Reyes is fantastic as well and so caring. It‚Äôs so appreciated that this entire clinic is fear free and works hard to make the animals and owners comfortable.

We love this place, everyone is so kind and professional. My cat Genaro suffered a hairball obstruction and Dr. Reyes was super gentle and professional, recommending the best for my little fur baby. They performed emergency surgery to remove the hairball from his intestine. After that, they were always very attentive to his recovery, even providing laser therapy to accelerate healing and reduce inflammation. Thank you, Dr. Reyes, Neal, and the entire staff at Graceful Paws.

P.S. They gave my cat a special recognition certificate signed by everyone after the operation for being so brave - it was a lovely touch.

I had a wonderful first experience with Graceful Paws. I called to get an appointment for a dental consult for our Chihuahua Bella and was seen the same day. Emily, Stephanie, and Neal were delightful and treated Bella like a queen. Dr. Sanchez who is clearly a seasoned professional, went above and beyond addressing all my questions and concerns at length. Lastly, Dr. Reyes called the next day with Bella's lab results and to confirm we can proceed with the dental procedure. I highly recommend this Vet!

I recently completed a sleep study at Grand Health Institute in Miami, and the experience was outstanding from start to finish. The staff was professional, caring, and patient ‚Äî they took time to explain each step of the process, put me at ease, and checked often to make sure I was comfortable. After my study, I scheduled my results appointment, and Dr. Shahzeidi is truly the best doctor I know ‚Äî knowledgeable, compassionate, and thorough. He took the time to explain everything clearly and answer all my questions. The staff is always so nice and welcoming, and I genuinely love this place.
If you‚Äôre looking for a professional, trustworthy, and patient-focused sleep lab in Miami, I highly recommend this one!

The staff was so kind and compassionate, the medical assistant was very gentle with my son when I recently brought him in to be seen by Dr.Shahzeidi and he was awesome highly recommend him!  He explained in detail what was going on with my son, he gave me a course of treatments that have been working for him. He has a follow up in a couple of weeks and I can‚Äôt wait to thank Dr. Shahzeidi for helping him!

Fantastic experience at Grand Health Institute Sleep Center!  The staff was knowledgeable and kind, and the whole process from scheduling to the sleep study was seamless. They genuinely care about your health, and their follow-up was excellent. I‚Äôm finally sleeping better thanks to their help!  Dr. Shahzeidi is Awsome!

Exceptional Experience!
I had my visit yesterday with Dr. Ricardo Saro-Oliva at Grand Health Institute, and I couldn‚Äôt be more impressed. Dr. Saro-Oliva was absolutely amazing, professional, attentive, and truly dedicated to patient care. He took the time to listen, explain everything clearly, and made me feel completely at ease. The entire staff was just as outstanding ‚Äî friendly, organized, and welcoming from start to finish. It‚Äôs rare to find such a well-rounded, caring team. I highly recommend Dr. Saro-Oliva and Grand Health Institute to anyone looking for top-quality care!

Dr. Castro Guevara is honestly one of the best doctors I‚Äôve ever had. He‚Äôs super easy to talk to and really listens, which makes me feel comfortable asking questions about anything. He really takes the time to explain things in a way Im able to comprehend and actually cares about how I‚Äôm feeling‚Äînot just physically, but overall. The staff at Grand Health Institute is also really kind and welcoming. I always leave feeling heard and cared for. I Would Totally recommend him to others in need!

provider_name: Granny Nannies Senior Home Care of St. Petersburg
review_text: We have been using Granny Nannies home care services for over a month.  Every aide that the office has scheduled has been wonderful.  Each aide has been on time, knowledgeable of healthcare needs of the elderly, kind, caring and dependable.  The following aides need special recognition:  Sophia, Happiness, Latricia (LoLo) Teresa and Yamani.  The office staff has been wonderful and very attentive to our needs.  Wanda, Peggy and Kyla deserve recognition and praise for their quick attention to last minute needs and changes.  I am truly impressed to encounter a company that is so efficient, professional and impeccable.

provider_name: Granny Nannies Senior Home Care of St. Petersburg
review_text: Granny Nannies is the third service I have tried for care for my mom and I can say that without a doubt, I won't be looking for a fourth service. The care givers are professional, experienced, and they actually 'take care' of my mom instead of just sitting with her watching television. I am very pleased and so is my mom

provider_name: Granny Nannies Senior Home Care of St. Petersburg
review_text: I needed assistance with various household, pet care and personal care duties after spending a month in a skilled nursing facility for intense physical therapy. After reading the great reviews for Granny Nannies, I knew I picked the right place. Getting started was easy, the administrative staff was so helpful and the caregivers, especially Latoya & Jelissa, were the very best.

provider_name: Granny Nannies Senior Home Care of St. Petersburg
review_text: Jayonna was wonderful with our mom.  She showed up on time and she did everything we asked and more.  We were very lucky to have her.  Thank you

provider_name: Granny Nannies Senior Home Care of St. Petersburg
review_text: We just recently started using Granny Nannies Senior Care and could not be more satisfied. From our case manage Wanda, to the in home care staff, Elaine, Sonia and Kenyo we have been impressed. I was worried about leaving my Dad under someone else care but I have some peace after getting to know these staff members.

provider_name: Great Strides Pediatric Rehabilitation- Bartram Park, FL
review_text:
The staff at Great Strides in New Smyrna Beach, FL are truly exceptional. They are a group of highly and caring individuals who go above and beyond to ensure the well and development of each child under their care. Our son has been receiving support from this amazing team for over a year now, and we couldn't be more grateful for the impact they have had on his growth progress.

What sets the staff at Great Strides apart is their personalized approach to each child. They take the time to get to know every child on an individual basis, understanding their unique needs and preferences. This level of care and attention is truly commendable and sets them apart from other organizations.

Moreover, the staff at Great Strides are excellent communicators. They keep us informed every step of the way, updating us on our son's progress and providing valuable insights on how we can better support him at home. Their dedication to not only helping the children but also empowering parents is truly remarkable.

We highly recommend Great Strides to any parent looking for a nurturing and supportive environment for their child. Under the exceptional leadership of Kassi and Sydney, this organization does incredible work that truly makes a difference in the lives of children and families. We are grateful for their dedication and commitment, and we feel blessed to have them as part of our son's journey.

God bless the staff at Great Strides for the amazing work they do each day!

provider_name: Great Strides Pediatric Rehabilitation- Bartram Park, FL
review_text: They can't keep our find speech therapist for our children of Volusia and NSB,and not a whole lot of service are available that are offered at other locations.The women u call to the main office here or that worked here when I needed there Help is so Rude and not appropriate üíî to us n way.We do have like most families with children with disabilities had some issues with attendance so the strike rule is harsh but fair enough. I just wish it could be so much better and more helpful to our youngsters here.

provider_name: Great Strides Pediatric Rehabilitation- Bartram Park, FL
review_text: This team of ABA therapists are the best in Volusia county! If your child has autism or needs applied behavior analysis therapy, they will receive the best care here.

provider_name: Great Strides Pediatric Rehabilitation- Bartram Park, FL
review_text: Very caring and knowledgeable staff that provide superior ABA services. Highly recommended.

provider_name: Great Strides Pediatric Rehabilitation- Bartram Park, FL
review_text: We love our GS family! Cant recommend y‚Äôall enough!

provider_name: Greater Daytona Physical Therapy (previously Physio Med Daytona)
review_text: I have had great success being treated here to strengthen my knees and my leg muscles. Ann and all of the staff is very friendly . I definitely recommend them for any physical therapy needs.

provider_name: Greater Daytona Physical Therapy (previously Physio Med Daytona)
review_text: Helped me get back up and and my feet through kind and concerned treatment.  Crisp clean facilities and wonderful staff.  Office helped me confirm my insurance was accepted.  Would highly recommend to family, friends,  and coworkers.

Wow - an AMAZING fundraiser for the Boys and Girls Club at the Green Glades Ranch in Weston this past weekend.

Stunning event venue! I think 1,300 attended the fundraiser!!! It included entertainment and rodeo activities for both adults and kids! The food and entertainment were fabulous - a magical, memorable evening that raised a lot of funds for the Boys and Girls Club.

The space was huge, the atmosphere was very cool, and the set up  was perfect !!!

Highly recommend the Green Glades Ranch Event venue !!!

fantastic facility on the edge of the Everglades. There are large venue open air have these amazing cooling fans for the last event it was so impressive.  Although they had big overhead fans the small evaporative fans they had did such an amazing job.

Bit by Bit charity at Bergeron Ranch. Love this place! Ron Bergeron is the BEST for hosting this annual charity and it was the biggest yet. 14 years of equestrian therapy for kids that benefit tremendously.

Mr. Bergeron generously donated the use of the Green Glades Ranch for a concert sponsored by a charity that I work with. It is a beautiful facility perfect for large events. It also has a Saloon that is great for smaller events, like weddings or corporate events. It is an unusual venue, so people attending events there will remember the event
Love this place.  Great place and space for events in the furthest West location in Broward

provider_name: Green, Mary DVM - Westside Animal Clinic
review_text: I brought our parakeet Charlie in for a visit after realizing something was not right with our male parakeet, his cere is normally bright blue. As you can see in one of the photos it was far from that, it was a dark brown like a female parakeet would be when broody, I was very concerned he had either testis cancer or he had way too much seed in his diet. I knew something was wrong, I scheduled an appointment with Westside, although it was 4 weeks out. I held my breath since Westside seems to be the only local vet that would take Charlie in. The doctor weighted Charlie and did an ultrasound on his belly and confirmed nothing was life threating yet, but we did need to change his diet asap! She recommended we get his weight down from 61 grams to 45 grams. She also recommended we switch his diet to Harrison's High Potency Fine temporarily, offer lots of Veggies and to closely monitor his weight loss. So I did half and half Harrison's and Fruit Pellets, added a separate dish for fresh veggies for the day. So far it's been exactly 4 weeks since Charlie had his checkup and he's looking so much better and his weight is down to 46.9 grams!!!

provider_name: Green, Mary DVM - Westside Animal Clinic
review_text: Dr Howe and entire staff are friendly, caring, thorough! I can‚Äôt thank them for the excellent care they gave our ‚ÄúDixie‚Äù Clayton. When she passed  they even sent flower arrangement and beautiful card! Gratefully, Forrest & Pam

provider_name: Green, Mary DVM - Westside Animal Clinic
review_text: Over the last year West Side has helped me care for my animals. 2 were elderly and sadly they helped us with our elderly dog 2 weeks ago cross the rainbow bridge. Their care has always been exceptional.  I do wish it was easier to get appointments sooner or they offered walk ins for certain times of the day. That would help so much when the unexpected illnesses come on but was thankful I could bring in specimens almost any time of day to have them checked by the lab. Always greatful for Dr. Greene and Dr. Howe. Thank you for helping me keep my aging animals comfortable and helping with my ferrets! So much appreciated the flower and card for sympathies for our Kiera ‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Green, Mary DVM - Westside Animal Clinic
review_text:
Westside Animal Clinic is always a great visit to see Dr. Howe (Dr. Green too) and staff. They are always in a good mood and ready to welcome you. Front staff even acknowledge you when busy on the phone. Never will you feel like a number but rather like family. I drive 35 minutes to take my fur babies there and it's well worth it for the care that they give you and your fur babies. My Morkie Mia has CKD and went for her 6 months checkup and was a bit dehydrated (due to her men-c) Dr. Howe recommended a hydration IV to help replenish Mia's electrolytes. Dr. Howe is a very caring and loving Vet. If you're looking for a caring vet and wanting to be treated like family.  ü•∞‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞      ü•∞‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞
THIS IS YOUR VET office!!!
KUDDOS to Dr. Howe + Dr. Green + their staff.
üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

provider_name: Green, Mary DVM - Westside Animal Clinic
review_text: I've been taking my dogs here for about two years. The entire staff is friendly and helpful to both humans and animals. Dr. Howe genuinely cares about every animal I've brought her, and Dylan and Allison are energetic and competent techs. The front staff is quick with answering questions and relaying messages to the medical staff.
He saw me on a Saturday and helped me a lot. I am really grateful. Thank you Dr Friedman for your kindness and understanding.

Dr. Friedman is a true professional. He has many years of experience working with mental health and addiction clients. HIs empathetic, genuine, and warm nature helps those seeking treatment feel comfortable and respected. Highly recommend!

Dr. Gregg Friedman has been taking care of my family for over two decades.  He is compassionate and has helped us navigate the best treatment for our daughter with Autism.  Because of his excellent care she no longer has any side effects and her emotional state has improved greatly.

Dr. Friedman is an exceptional psychiatrist who truly listens and cares about his patients. He creates a safe and comfortable space to discuss concerns and provides thoughtful, effective treatment plans. His compassionate approach and deep expertise have made a meaningful difference in my mental health journey. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a knowledgeable and understanding psychiatrist!
Dr. Friedman is amazing! He has helped me so much. He is kind, compassionate and caring. One of the best doctors I've seen. I'm truly thankful for his services.  He also got me in super quick!

I am deeply grateful for the exceptional establishment known as Gregory Ranch. The dedication to home education that intertwines agricultural practices with valuable life lessons has been nothing short of remarkable. Florida presents an admirable environment for raising our children alongside like-minded home educators, fostering a supportive community that advocates for home education both locally and at the state level. Moreover, we are fortunate to have outstanding programs led by individuals such as Aslin, Ashley, and Brittany.

This place has a fantastic summer camp set up! Our 8 year old came home each day so pumped and just beaming with happiness! They started their morning with chores, for example feeding the animals, then they rode horses, did crafts, swam in the pool and played games. It was fun filled and you can see it from the smiles in the pictures. This facility is clean, well organized, maintained, kind, friendly and structured. The owner is a teacher and it shows! She really knows how to handle the kiddos and have them have a blast! The counselors were all kind and very respectful. The animals were very well taken care of and loved. All around we think this place is a gem and truly recommend any parent to give it a try, you won‚Äôt be disappointed!

I was doing my senior photos. I called and they were very accommodating with their horses and other animals around. It was a great experience overall. I would love to come back. Aslin was so very nice.

Can‚Äôt say enough about this place. We did a homeschool event there today and it was so much fun. They have horses, a big pot belly pig, goats, chickens and even baby kittens. Our family throughly enjoyed the experience. Thank you for allowing us to spend the morning with you guys. Highly recommend you go check them out. It will definitely be worth your time.

This is the best place to board. But not just board. They have amazing camps and activities all the time for the public and for families.  Very comforting place to be. It's a very beautiful piece of heaven on earth.

Came here for a first responders event (twice now) and had an amazing experience reconnecting with nature and getting to know the selfless men/women in our community. It was a very intentional set up with the leaders educating us on rucking and the connection with goats while also tying in the deeper meaning of the weight we all carry in our lives.
The "ruck" we did around Jupiter Farms was such a great option for those of all abilities (we even did it with our kids strapped on as our "weight" the second time) and the goat portion afterwards was so much fun! Don't be intimidated, its very basic and more like stretching than yoga (plus optional). The leader, Kimmy, did a sound bath for us and helped encourage the goats onto the backs of those who wanted them up there!
After the ruck and goat, they opened the farm up to us to explore, cold plunge & snack which allowed us to connect with the group (20-30 people) even more. They also had a little area for kids to color or play with trucks which was so thoughtful!
Overall, the farm was beautiful, safe and full of uplifting, positive energy.

loved this place!! certainly not an authentic yoga experience if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre looking for but it was amazing and SO fun. the goats are very friendly and the instructor is as well. very beginner friendly yoga flow and they make sure everyone gets time with the goats. loved coming here

The yoga class at Grovy Goat Farm is a blast! The Goats are very cute and friendly and the yoga teacher and farm owner were very welcoming and passionate on what they do. They ensure that everybody has play time with the goats! It was like an adult petting zoo :)! I definetly recommend it!

Really really fun time. The yoga is of course good but the goats make the experience completely worth it. Variety of active and chill goats and they make sure everyone got the chance to spend time with them so we all got a full experience. The philosophy of specifically trying to provide therapy to military, first responders, and people with special needs is really admirable and makes it even easier to support them. It's easy to recommend, there wasn't a sad face around

Went for Goat Yoga on a Saturday morning and we really enjoyed ourselves.  Great hosts and a fun Yoga class.  They did a great job spreading out the goat love and it resulted in some funny and fun moments for everyone. As a little extra, they have two donkeys you get to feed and pet.

provider_name: Groundwork Counseling & Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Orlando
review_text: I have OCD, Marion has been amazing, I recommend her for OCD treatment for anyone who is looking for it.   She is kind and understanding of my disorder. She has really made me feel that I am not alone in this battle and I hope to keep improving and finally overcome! :)  I thank God for Marion and I appreciate all of the OCD therapists out there that help people like me to not feel like we are alone in this world.

provider_name: Groundwork Counseling & Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Orlando
review_text: my daughter started to have social anxiety after Covid and Marina did an excellent job counseling her. She actually made her go into businesses and ask questions!! I am proud to say she finished college at the top of her class, and she now knows how to handle social situations. Sometimes you need to put some tools in your toolbox and at Groundworks they loaded the toolbox!

provider_name: Groundwork Counseling & Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Orlando
review_text: Groundwork Counseling has provided me with the most positive and effective therapy in my multiple experiences with counseling. Barbara, my therapist, has helped me develop healthy coping strategies when I have experienced challenging life experiences. She has also coached me when I want to change a thinking pattern or behavior that is no longer serving me in my life. My work with her has been life-changing.

provider_name: Groundwork Counseling & Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Orlando
review_text: I can't say enough good things about my experience with Groundwork Counseling and specifically Courtney. Mental illness was a severe impediment to my life as a late teenager and I had no idea how to manage it. I was impatient, angry, and not an easy person to work with, but Courtney worked with me honestly and graciously and set me up for success at every turn. When things got bad again at the beginning of this year I was able to come back to that same supportive, empowering therapy six or so years later. There is no cure for what I deal with every day but counseling has helped me so much and will continue to do so likely for the rest of my life. Highly recommend this establishment and Courtney's services in particular for anyone struggling - there is never any shame in seeking help and life can get better when you do!

provider_name: Groundwork Counseling & Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Orlando
review_text: We have had nothing but positive experiences working with Groundwork Counseling. McKenna has been amazing with our son and we have seen awesome improvement when dealing with anxiety and ocd tendencies.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this rescue and the incredible woman behind it. Erika pours her heart and soul into giving every horse the second chance they deserve.  Her dedication is unmatched, rain or shine, she is out there making sure every animal is safe, fed, and truly cared for. The barn and stalls are kept super clean and well-organized. She doesn‚Äôt cut corners or take the easy route, she does what‚Äôs best for the horses, even when it‚Äôs hard. That kind of integrity and compassion is rare. This isn‚Äôt just a rescue, it‚Äôs a haven. Watching her work is inspiring, and anyone who brings a horse here or supports her cause should know they‚Äôre making a real difference.
As a volunteer I cannot express how much these horses are loved and cared for. Every day is a new lesson and a new wonderful memory. You won't find better cared for animals anywhere. üíú

Highly recommend this rescue especially if Arabians and Saddlebreds are your dream horse. I got my heart horse from Erika back in 2012 when she was 7. Next year she will be 20 and is healthy as a clam. We showed, did the Christmas parade, and now we‚Äôre just enjoying life. Thank you for this opportunity. Her horses are amazing. Look no further if you‚Äôre looking for your next horse.

Want to take a second and say thank you to Erika and everyone that helps at Grune Heidi Farm. Addy‚Äôs heart has been full ever since we met Titan. They were amazing to work with and very helpful in the whole process. I highly recommend Grune Heidi Farms and thank you again all that you do!

They take in animals and give them a second chance at life.

The horses are well cared for, you can tell they work hard to make sure each horse is safe, healthy, and happy.

I had no idea what was going to become of me when I was sent to Immersion‚Äôs PHP program from a different residential treatment center. I knew I was an alcoholic, but that‚Äôs pretty much it. It has been a month since I finished my program there, and looking back, I can say they saved my life. The entire staff legitimately cares. From the therapists, to the 12-step contacts, to the techs, they made me feel welcome and heard at all times. I have never been happier, healthier, and more determined to continue on this recovery journey. Immersion deserves a lot of credit for where I am in life.

I‚Äôve had the opportunity to closely observe the PHP and IOP programs at Immersion and can confidently say they provide exceptional care. The entire staff‚Äîfrom the techs and therapists to the doctors and administrative team‚Äîis knowledgeable, professional, and genuinely committed to helping clients succeed in recovery. The program is rooted in the 12-step approach, which may not appeal to everyone at first, but proves to be a powerful and transformative framework. Immersion is deeply connected to the local recovery community and actively supports clients in building that connection. The housing and accommodations are high quality and designed to support a stable, recovery-focused lifestyle. For individuals who come in with a positive mindset and a sincere desire to get well, this program provides the tools and support needed to achieve lasting sobriety.

I don‚Äôt think anyone can pick a better treatment center than Immersion Recovery Center. The operations side is ran very smoothly, all the therapists spend quality time with you and the 12 step coordinators truly care. The employees have been very respectful and patient with my needs. Immersion also spends time actively getting people to start to work the steps and sets everyone up with positive peer support. They also have an alumni meeting once a month and alumni coordinators that stay in touch. If you want to improve your chances in staying sober, I would come here.

Immersion Recovery is staffed with greatness and lead with purpose and passion. The 12 Step team will lay down all their experience at your disposal that you may find true recovery. The clinical staff is equally impressive. I continue to see lives positively impacted by Immersion Recovery. Personally, It is an honor to have those from immersion as a part of my life.

Immersion has been an absolute life changing experience for me. I have never in my life felt like the staff of a rehab has cared so much on such a personal level. Everyone from my best friends and chosen brothers, to Brian and Cassie the case managers, my therapist Mike and family therapist LaRae, the directors of operations Angel and Andrew, Dr. Quilter, Amanda, Leslie, Kenny, and Masud from medical. Lastly, the techs including but not limited to Shane, Ben, Ryan, Jesse, and Jen. Not only has the program helped me recover from a seemingly helpless state of mind and body but it has helped me to love myself on a level that I didn‚Äôt shrink was possible. From the bottom of my heart and every bone in my body, thank you to everyone from Guardian for showing me that it‚Äôs okay to be me. And thank you for not giving up on me and believing in me even when I didn‚Äôt believe in myself.

My child experienced trauma at age of 13. Depressed and broken, These amazing angels brought her out of her darkness. She is thriving. My husband and I cannot thank these beautiful people enough. Words cannot describe the compassion they have for the children and the drive and need to help them. We will be forever grateful for this amazing organization. They literally are responsible for saving my child‚Äôs life.

Debbie is an amazing women who has given her life to make the world a better place for every child she is able to reach! Thank you to everyone in your organization for giving back to the community, touching lives, and making a genuine impact!
This center is amazing. The work they do is SO impactful! We are so fortunate to have them in our community to advocate and support children who need them.
Guardians for New Futures and the CAC gives children on the Treasure Coast, a voice that is heard. ‚ù§Ô∏è
My girls love going here! The counselors are amazing.

What can I say?  I've had 2 cats and a dog fixed there. And today we adopted the sweetest girl I've ever seen!  Autumn! Poor girl was an outside breeder but no longer.  She's with us forever!  Within 15 minutes she was right at home!

Edit* shout out Lucky I think he's a tech he's very knowledgeable about dog behavior. And did a great job helping us. Every single person their loves their jobs and it shows!

They did an excellent job with my cat. Took her there to get fixed. Everything went great. It's been a couple of days since and she is doing wonderful. Very friendly, helpful staff. Clean. Easy to get in and out of the earlier you get there. The faster you get to leave but very simple and they take care of your pet

This was our first time adopting from this place. Our kitten is adjusting well and that is in part to the great care she received while waiting to be adopted.

The employees were very friendly, knowledgeable and made us feel very comfortable. The adoption process was very easy and affordable. We are so grateful to have been able to give this sweet girl a new home.

Last month, I took my fur baby to the clinic to get fixed. I was a little nervous because my baby surgery was a little more difficult (something that happens to male dogs)‚Ä¶.he has healed perfectly. I had to keep him calm for 10 days though which is tough for a husky. Not only was the whole experience was great. I got my baby the cone and the meds for pain and to keep him calm.
Today he is feeling like himself.
I also had him microchip.

They take such great care of the animals there. They have a great amount of knowledge in regards to the animals that they have there. Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable. I love that they do the buy one kitten or cat and get one free. I feel it's very important for them to have someone else to get along with in their new homes. And in my case I got two brothers which made it even better for their bonding.

provider_name: Gulf Coast Humane Society Veterinary Clinic
review_text:
Staff was very kind and portrayed great patience.  My 3 cats were taken care of with the voucher program (no fee) from lee county (spay, neutering, rabies, shots)

While at the center I also explained that i am looking for forever homes for these 8 week old cuties!  But there was a waiting list.  Message me for details. Thanks so much.

provider_name: Gulf Coast Humane Society Veterinary Clinic
review_text: It was a seamless and wonderful experience! All staff. Particularly Darcy! Bello is so happy and adjusting well. Thank you!

provider_name: Gulf Coast Humane Society Veterinary Clinic
review_text: This place is very disappointing. Their prices have increased astronomically. It is no longer affordable and should not be considered affordable. I waited over 30 minutes for two booster shots. The place was not even busy. The bill came to $76! Each shot is now $28 and there is a $20 vet technician fee. Outrageous.

provider_name: Gulf Coast Humane Society Veterinary Clinic
review_text: I personally love the Gulf Coast Humane society. I adopted one of my cats from here and had a wonderful experience however I believe the spay and neuter clinic was the opposite for me. I scheduled my appointment and paid my deposit for my cat Juno. The morning of the appointment I was having a very difficult time getting my cat in the carrier (a problem I would assume a lot of cat owners have. When I realized I might be a few minutes late I called the number listed in my conformation emails. No answer, left a voicemail. Eventually I finally was able to get my cat in the carrier so I call again to confirm I can still come and not lose my deposit. No answer. I call about 3 or 4 more times and someone finally picks up the phone (with an attitude) I explained my situation and all she said was "drop off ends at 9" nothing else. I drove to the clinic and arrived at 9:05. I walk in assuming a possible late fee may be applied but didn't mind paying. I get to the counter and explain to the girl at the desk what I'm there for. She then looks at me like I'm crazy in silence for a few seconds and turns to the worker next to her (who hasn't even looked at me or said anything to me) and says "what do you think" and he says "I don't know". She responds to me with "yea so the cut off is at nine" she then walks away presumably to ask if she can take  my cat. She says "there's going to be a $25 late fee" I say ok and she leaves for maybe a minute. When she comes back she says she can't take my cat because they "already started surgery" and hands me a card to reschedule... Even though I called multiple times before hand and explained the situation and have given them business in the past. I lost my deposit and now  have to wait till availability to get my cat in. My question is HOW did they ALREADY start surgery 5 MINUTES after cat drop off?? Also WHY SO RUDE! they were the rudest front desk people I have ever bet and I would name drop them if I could. I will be finding somewhere else to neuter my Juno

provider_name: Gulf Coast Humane Society Veterinary Clinic
review_text: Caring and passionate staff.  After the adoption we wanted to keep our pup with the Vet clinic so she would get care for the doctors and staff that spend their time doing the most good.  I haven‚Äôt been disappointed with the care, pricing or recommendations.  I highly recommend for a healthy animal

Jennifer Stowers is an exceptional therapist who is kind, caring and welcoming. Our daughter loved working with her and made tremendous progress under her direction. She made it fun and always communicated with us on her progress. I would highly recommended her and Gulfcoast Therapies to anyone looking for a speech language pathologist!

Gulfcoast Therapies helped us in more ways than one. Jenn Stowers is a very experienced, knowledgeable, and kind  therapist. She was able to provide services and give advice in the best interest in our child. I felt like we were in good hands. We could‚Äôve asked for anyone better!

Jen has been so patient with me and my family. She has helped us out so much and has been a HUGE help for our son who is now speaking in full sentences!!! I definitely recommend Jen and Gulfcoast Therapies!
Jenn is our life saver! She has helped out my son so much. We appreciate all her effort and patience and all the progress she‚Äôs helped with!
Gulf Coast Therapies eased my nerves and helped my son during his testing. I highly recommend this office for your Childs needs !

I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Hannah Strom and her incredible team. From the very first visit, I felt truly seen, heard, and supported. Dr. Strom has a rare gift a calming presence, deep insight, and a compassionate heart that shines through in every session. She doesn‚Äôt just listen; she understands. Her guidance has helped me grow in ways I never thought possible.

Her staff is just as remarkable. Every interaction, from scheduling appointments to the warm welcome at the front desk, reflects a level of professionalism and kindness that is hard to find these days. You can tell they genuinely care about each and every patient who walks through their doors.

If you're looking for a psychologist who brings both expertise and humanity to her practice, and a staff that makes you feel like family, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Hannah Strom.
My family has had a great experience with this practice. They are professional, kind, and knowledgeable.

I have known Dr. DenBoer since 2011 when I was her practicum supervisor during graduate school. Fast forward 10+ years, she now owns a thriving private practice that she is so deserving of! Personally, she is empathetic, responsible, and passionate about helping kids and families. Clinically, her skills, expertise, and professionalism are top notch. Dr. DenBoer and I continue to engage in professional consultation. I‚Äôve also had the pleasure of taking advantage of her expertise in assessment and autism spectrum disorders to provide me guidance from time to time.  I highly recommend her and her office, Gulfshore Behavioral Health, for any of your mental health needs!

Dr. DenBoer is an amazing psychologist. She is very kind, caring, and easy to talk to. She is very understanding and knowledgeable especially in regards to autism in adult females. She was able to help get me the correct diagnosis that other doctors missed or misdiagnosed. I would recommend her to anyone who is seeking an evaluation.

My daughter has been going here for almost 2 years. She absolutely loves Ms Leslie. The whole staff is very professional. Treat patients with respect. Easy to schedule appointments. Deidra is always very helpful when I call. The location is very convenient also. We really recommend this place to friends and family.

I can‚Äôt thank Gulfview Animal Hospital enough for the kindness and compassion they showed me during one of the hardest moments of my life when I had to say goodbye to my Piper. From the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel cared for and supported. They treated Piper with so much love and respect, and they took the time to walk me through every step so I never felt rushed or alone.

It‚Äôs not easy to go through something like this, but the team at Gulfview made an unbearable experience a little more peaceful. I‚Äôll always be grateful for the gentleness, empathy, and genuine care they gave to both Piper and me. It‚Äôs clear they truly love the animals they care for, and I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better team to be by our side.

We started going to Gulfview Animal Hospital earlier this year when our dog Biggie was having trouble walking and couldn‚Äôt put weight on his front paw. From day one, they were kind, helpful, and really cared. They guided us to a rehab center and did laser therapy with him three times a week.
Sadly, what he had wasn‚Äôt something that could be cured, but they truly helped make the last eight months of his life so much better. When the time came to say goodbye, Dr. Wishik, Lauren, and May were incredibly compassionate and understanding. They made the worst day of our lives a little more bearable, and we‚Äôll always be thankful for that.
Whenever we get a new puppy, we‚Äôll definitely be bringing them to Gulfview. They‚Äôre the absolute best.

Gulfview Animal Hospital is truly exceptional! Dr. Wishik and Maylin provide the kind of care every pet owner dreams of finding. Dr. Wishik is incredibly knowledgeable, thorough, and always takes the time to explain everything clearly, while Maylin goes above and beyond to make every visit stress-free and positive. We‚Äôve always had excellent experiences here, and the level of trust and comfort they provide is unmatched. If you‚Äôre looking for a veterinary team that combines expertise with heart, Gulfview Animal Hospital is the place to go. We couldn‚Äôt recommend them more highly!

Dr. Wishik is so incredibly caring and thoughtful. She takes such great care of our dog! The facility and the staff are also so welcoming and caring. Would highly recommend to anyone in need of a vet who actually wholeheartedly cares about your pet. You can, without a doubt, trust that she will always do what‚Äôs best for him or her!
