I am beyond grateful to this hospital. My dog unfortunately had to undergo an emergency surgery to remove a foreign object in his intestines and the doctor even stayed after hours to do so. Surgery went great and thankfully my pup is happy and healthy. Recommending to all ‚ù§Ô∏è

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Hunter and his team! They worked wonders with my 12 week old Rottweiler. They are patient, professional and truly understand how to communicate with dogs and owners! I‚Äôve seen such a positive change in my puppies, behavior and obedience. They also do on boarding and every single time it‚Äôs a smooth process. Highly recommend to anyone looking for top-notch training.üòä

We have a high energy male mini golden doodle 9 month old puppy.  He is not our first dog and have had little challenges with training the others.  But our doodle‚Äôs personality is quite different. House breaking was a breeze, but working with his independent personality was a challenge.  Hunter has totally changed that struggle and helped tremendously, both training our doodle and us. We learned how to channel his high energy positively and  our doodle learned commands that he responds to quickly.  I can now take him on walks without him pulling and take him on outings and his behavior is socially acceptable.

Hunter went above and beyond to help train my dog and actually myself as well. He is excellent with the animals. I totally support his theories. The most important trait is he listens to the owner. I would recommend him to anyone and give him a positive reference if asked! Too bad he could not train my husband!, too expensive. You will not regret the investment!!

H.K. Dog Training is absolutely top tier! Hunter is incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and truly passionate about what he does. The level of care and attention each dog receives is unmatched. You can tell he genuinely loves working with dogs and takes pride in their progress. The training is effective, personalized, and done with kindness. Highly recommend to anyone who wants the best for their dog!

Hunter and team did a fantastic job with our Labrador puppy! We really needed help kennel training, hadn‚Äôt been able to leave the house much in the first couple months but after her time with Hunter, now she willingly enters the kennel on command and is calm for multiple hours at a time. She walks respectfully on a leash with our 8 year old lab and her ‚Äúhere‚Äù has been flawless. Highly recommend HK Dog Training!

I‚Äôve been going to H2-Health for physical therapy for a little while now‚ÄîI‚Äôm currently on my fifth visit‚Äîand I genuinely love it there. The environment is always positive, and everyone seems to be in a good mood. The staff is super friendly, and my physical therapist, Matthew, is fantastic, he clearly loves what he does. I‚Äôve been seeing great results already, and I‚Äôve even recommended it to my mom. I can‚Äôt wait for her to start and experience the same great care. Highly recommend!

I would definitely go back here again for any future injuries. The team is very caring, knowledgeable, and kind. My physical therapist was Matthew Juber. He quickly gained my trust of him as a P.T. and is the reason I would definitely return back!

Matt, Maddie, Caroline, and the other gentlemen with the beard whose name I can‚Äôt remember- they were all spectacular! They all gave me a comprehensive understanding of what we were doing and why we were doing it, plus they always made me laugh and leave with a smile. Honestly this is the worst part of my injury, having to leave! I always looked forward to seeing everyone and always left feeling better.

5 Stars does not cover it. 10 stars! I am so happy to have done my PT at H2 Southside with Mat Juber and Carolyn. You just can not ask for a more welcoming way to go through physical therapy. With the great family atmosphere, the really! good! music! ( Thank you Carolyn) and Mat's excellent knowledge and support during those long weeks. I know that I will have to come back after/when I have to have surgery, but I also know because of the great support system at H2 Southside, when I do return, I will be welcomed and guided very smoothly through my next therapy sessions. The best part is knowing that I may enter the building in discomfort but I KNOW I will leave feeling better. Thank you SOoo much! Mat and Carolyn! 10 Stars!!

I came here for a few months to help with my rotator cuff. The team here was absolutely amazing and helped me alleviate a lot of pain and build strength where I needed it. Such a kind and knowledgeable team, I highly recommend!

H2 Health is doing a great job of helping me to recover from surgery.   While empathetic about my condition,  they are in sync with encouraging me to push to get the best outcome.  I've only just begun, but their work with me is showing steady progress. I am thankful for this team of therapists.

I had a pretty bad knee injury and surgery, and I‚Äôve been going to H2 Healthcare Rehab to get it back to full movement. When I first started, things looked rough‚ÄîI could barely bend or straighten my knee. But Amy Turner has been amazing. She pushes me when I need it, comforts me when it‚Äôs tough, and explains everything so I know what to do at home to keep my progress moving.

Today I did 10 minutes of full turns on the bike, and honestly, I never thought I‚Äôd be doing that this soon. Amy‚Äôs hands-on work is incredible‚Äîit‚Äôs like she can feel exactly what‚Äôs happening inside my knee. Plus, the A-stym therapy feels great and was a welcomed surprise. She‚Äôs very experienced, and if you‚Äôre willing to put in the work, she‚Äôll get you back on track.

The whole staff is friendly and supportive, and even though PT can be painful at times, the progress I‚Äôve made here keeps me feeling positive and motivated. I‚Äôm so grateful for Amy and the team at H2‚Äîhighly recommend!

This facility and all the therapists and the front end receptionists are EXCELLENT! I have been to several other physical therapy places that are above & beyond. H2 Health blows them all out of the park. Everyone (Hannah, Tracy, Amy, Lee, Paul, & Devon) is so friendly, and not just doing their job, friendly. They make you feel like family. They push you to go that one step further so you can get better, but not so much that you are hurting yourself. They are also asking consistently if you are ok, to let them know if you need to stop & rest. And they do it in a manner that doesn't make you feel bad if you are unable to complete what they ask. They want the best for you & show it. Every visit, I left feeling like I had accomplished something & I wanted to do my exercises at home to show them that I was as into my healing, as they were, if not moreso. I hope that I am able to continue my PT there, for all my issues, & look forward to my continued growth & new self through them.

After undergoing bilateral knee replacement surgery, I received exceptional physical therapy at this facility. The entire staff demonstrated remarkable professionalism, with each therapist displaying high-quality care. My assigned therapist, Ms. Melissa, was particularly outstanding. She provided targeted guidance that challenged me to achieve optimal rehabilitation outcomes. Her strategic approach consistently motivated me to progress and maximize my recovery potential. The weekly therapy sessions were both productive and engaging. I confidently recommend this location for comprehensive physical therapy services.

They got me in right away, handled all the insurance no problem, and have just been a breath of fresh air. They are so personable and friendly and really great to work with. At that other place, we would have been just a number. At H2, they treat you like family.

Had a total knee replacement in March and chose H2 again after working with them through two other injuries/surgeries. They are the absolute best. Personal attention and cutting edge techniques helped me get back to  being my active self. I can‚Äôt recommend them highly enough, especially Buffie!

I was referred to H2 Health Avenues to help with a bulging disc in my lower back and sciatica pain through my hip and leg.  I was working with Alex & Buffie and they were great! They‚Äôve given me exercises to help strengthen my weak spots. They were always fun to work with and Sheila was very friendly and easy to work with when scheduling the next appointment. My favorite part was when the therapists were putting the heat pads on and giving my lower back and hip a workout with massage, even though sometimes it was very tender and hurt, it always felt much better over the next few days from those massages. Thank you all for all your help!

I came here after getting injured at work and couldn‚Äôt be happier about the experience.  from Sheila with scheduling, to my therapists, Buffy and Alex, this place is amazing. They take such care and are so kind and professional. A real gem.
I really enjoy my visits to H2 Health. The therapists are very knowledgeable and friendly. The sessions last an hour and I find them very beneficial.
Everyone from receptionist to all the therapist that worked on me, my experience was exceptional. Thank you so much !

Robin is the perfect gate keeper. She is kind, considerate and always has a smile on her face. Once you start your treatment Lauren and Mike are amazing. They made physical therapy a fun place to be. I enjoyed learning things I can do at home to stay strong and even when I asked questions about why and what we were doing they always went above and beyond to explain the function and benefit. If I need physical therapy again I can tell you this is the only place I will go. I have been to 2 other physical therapy centers in Jacksonville and I am overly impressed and satisfied. Lauren is the absolute best! I originally went to her for pelvic floor physical therapy, and now I‚Äôm continuing treatment with her for back and neck issues. She‚Äôs not only incredibly knowledgeable, but also kind, patient, and truly invested in her clients‚Äô healing. I‚Äôm so grateful for everything she‚Äôs helped me with!

Lauren, Mike, and Robin are a great team. They worked so well together coordinating my care. They worked me hard and helped me make great progress toward greater range of motion. I could not ask for better care anywhere. I highly recommend H2 for physical therapy.

provider_name: H2 Health- New Smyrna Beach, FL
review_text: These are by far the best physical therapist in the area. They really care. Everyone helped and taught me so much. They have much more experience than others I've been to and use varied stretches, exercises and other modalities to truly target specific needs. Fabulous!

provider_name: H2 Health- New Smyrna Beach, FL
review_text: My husband found H2Health following a cervical spine surgery.  After his successful experience,  I recently used them prevent a frozen shoulder.  Everyone is so welcoming starting with Ms Donna!  My results were outstanding.  My primary therapist was Christine.  She is extraordinarily gifted in her field.  Many times she heard ‚Ä¶ what are you doing to me!? H2H also had agreements with area colleges bringing in their PT assistant program interns. Don‚Äôt underestimate their abilities! They also provide excellent therapy under Christine‚Äôs watchful eye.   There were times I had to share time with another patient.  While I was not a fall hazard or critical, I still preferred having their undivided attention to insure I was using proper form as I feared further injury. Given a choice, my preference would be 1:1.  If time must be shared, perhaps pair by injury so that the two patients can be side by side.  Some patients clearly had more critical needs, they should be 1:1 without question.  Please don‚Äôt let these comments take away from my stellar experience.

provider_name: H2 Health- New Smyrna Beach, FL
review_text: Great place for doing PT. Very professional, nice quiet facility, and super clean equipment. I will give them an A+ in their overall diagnosis of my injury, pace of introducing new exercises, and their method of explaining how and why each step was required to get better. Most importantly they eliminated 95% of my pain now the rest is up to me. Highly recommend them.

provider_name: H2 Health- New Smyrna Beach, FL
review_text: The physical therapists at H2Health have helped me immensely coming out of rehab. review_text: Christine and MaryBeth were great to work with. Both professional and very friendly. Thank you Mr.Jarred! Your professionalism and dedication to individuals who has had the pleasure and opportunity to receive your services in our time of need, as well as to other therapists who were able to step in. Thank you for your services.
Ms. Jeanette Flenoy

My therapist always ask me how I‚Äôm feeling and ask me if I‚Äôm in pain or not. Checking to see if the exercises are working good or not. I received the Best service and care at this facility ever in life! The staff are so helpful and outgoing. They extended my level of expectations of care and I will highly recommend this place to anyone!

I have nothing but high praises  !! This facility has done wonders for me  !! I couldn't walk for 10 years  !! In only 2 weeks I have been transformed  !! I'm walking again  !! The exercises are Great  !! They work with you and it's Just Awesome  !! I thought I would never walk again  !! Come join us  !!

I was afflicted with intense pain and immobility of  my right shoulder, arm and neck for more than a few months. I couldn‚Äôt move my affected arm, neck due to intense pain that made my life miserable.

Finally after seeing an orthopedist and being diagnosed, after imaging tests done, with right frozen shoulder with no need of surgery at this time, my orthopedic physician discussed with me his medical treatment plan to fix the problem. One of the mainly therapies he prescribed me was Physical Therapy (PT). I knew this was pivotal for my recuperation and I was very excited to start. H2Health was the services company I needed to attend for my PT  and I chose the one in Riverside Jacksonville, Florida.

I ended up my PT sessions last week and I feel so grateful to the PT Riverside team.  Started with the front lady, Stacy and therapists, Elizabeth, Jeff, and Walker. They did a good job! Due to their knowledge and experience I was able to keep motivated  and improve the range of motion of my affected areas without pain 80%. Specially I want to thank  and named therapist Walker my hero. He worked very hard with me, so I did it too to get my right shoulder and arm healthy again. We did it. They‚Äôre almost healthy.

Walker is an excellent therapist, approachable, professional and compassionate. He is great and very skilled. Demonstrated  and corrected me the given exercises. Detailed, motivated and with a positive attitude. He tailored  an array of exercises for my specific situation that allowed  me  to regain my right arm and neck movements without pain most of the time. Thank you Walker, again!

I appreciate the home exercises that Walker and Liz did for me. I still do them to keep strengthening my right shoulder, neck and arm and further improvement. I feel very pleased with the results.
The therapist was professional and friendly.  He stayed focused on his agenda and pushed me to excel in my therapy needs. I am grateful for the outcome.

I‚Äôve had the privilege of working with all of the therapists and I‚Äôm pleased to say everyone has been very pleasant, knowledgeable, punctual, and very helpful in assisting in my recovery. Everyone worked as a team beautifully. While I‚Äôm not too good at recalling names, one name I definitely recall is Cage. He‚Äôs driven to healing. üòÇ, wore me out in a great way however. I definitely want to give kudos to Mr Russel at front desk. After having a couple of undesirable experiences with another H2 location and one other facility, Russell assured me he would take care of my admission. Needless to say, HE DID! I was very pleased. I love this group of people. They all work together and they all knows what they are doing. I was having neck and knee pain. They have been working with me for weeks now and I'm feeling a lot better. Such a wonderful place to receive my therapy.All of the therapists  was so professional.I highly recommend this place of business

Thank you for the great care I received at H2T PT - West Palm Beach! The staff were professional, friendly, and helping me to achieve my goals. I'm grateful for their expertise and would recommend them to others."

Great place all the employees are nice the doctor is the best at what he does I highly recommend this place I promise you won‚Äôt regret it.

Thank you for your outstanding support from Dr. more and his staff.  I appreciate the love and compassion that I continue to receive during my Physical Therapy, and  during my recovery period.

provider_name: HANDS REHAB /. Florida Hand Team & Associates Miramar LLC

provider_name: HEAL Behavioral Health - Palm Beach Luxury Rehab
review_text:
When I entered the program, I was broken, lost, and overwhelmed by years of unresolved childhood and adult trauma. I didn‚Äôt know how to navigate life or even face myself. Heal gave me the tools and support I needed to rebuild my life. I found purpose, clarity, and direction that I had been desperately searching for.

What truly sets Heal apart is the incredible sense of community. The people I met at the ranch became more than just fellow participants‚Äîthey became my lifelong family. Their support and compassion were pivotal to my healing journey. I owe special thanks to Jim, Olga, Ana, Miranda, Christian, Cassandra, Courtney, Allison, Liz, Ed, Big Mike, Will, Celeste and Pastor C. Each of them played a unique role in making my experience impactful and unforgettable.

Heal Behavioral Health not only helped me heal from the inside out, but it also gave me a renewed sense of purpose and hope for the future. I will forever be grateful for the love, guidance, and family I found there. If you‚Äôre struggling and looking for a place that truly cares, Heal is the place to find yourself again.

provider_name: HEAL Behavioral Health - Palm Beach Luxury Rehab
review_text: Heal Behavioral Heath literally saved my life. Upon arriving at the ranch and entering the program, I was an individual consumed by hopelessness, brokenness, anxiety, and severe depression. Fortunately, Heal welcomed me with open arms, offering peace, calmness, and understanding. Every staff member deserves praise for their unwavering commitment, dedication, and compassionate nature. The ranch is, without a doubt, one of the most peaceful environments one could ever encounter. Authentic magic and healing are achievable at the ranch and through clinical services. I am eternally grateful to Heal for helping me become the person I am today, having regained my strength and faith in myself, as well as my ability to cope with the world. I formed lasting connections during my six-week stay at the ranch. Engaging with Heal was, undoubtedly, the best decision I ever made for myself.

provider_name: HEAL Behavioral Health - Palm Beach Luxury Rehab
review_text:
My time at The Heal Ranch changed my life in ways I never imagined. When I first came there, I was at one of my lowest points, struggling with addiction and heavy, unresolved trauma. Right from the start, the staff welcomed me warmly and made me feel safe and understood.

Ana was my therapist. At first, I didn't want to talk about my problems, but her kindness and patience helped me slowly open up about my pain. She guided me through my darkest memories and taught me ways to cope that really helped me.

Miranda, the wellness coordinator, showed me mindfulness practices that were very important for my recovery. The peaceful and open environment, along with the personal care I received, made me feel like I was in a safe and welcoming retreat.

In our group therapy sessions, I met others who had similar struggles. Hearing their stories and sharing mine made me feel like I was part of a caring community. We all supported each other and celebrated our small victories together.

Leaving The Heal Ranch was bittersweet. I felt like I was saying goodbye to a new family. But I also felt ready to face the world again with the tools I needed. I‚Äôm so thankful to the whole team at Heal Behavioral Health for their dedication and kindness. They didn‚Äôt just help with my trauma and addiction; they helped me rebuild my life. If you‚Äôre looking for help with mental health or addiction, I hope you consider my experience, which was truly life-changing.

provider_name: HEAL Behavioral Health - Palm Beach Luxury Rehab
review_text: If anyone is looking to transform your life, this is the right place for you. My experience at heal has been life changing. I‚Äôve suffered from alcoholism and kratom addiction for many years, along with many other troubles (relationship issues, personality traits, trauma, etc). Heal has given me the most all inclusive treatment of any treatment I have been to and I‚Äôve been to about 8-10 places in south Florida over the last 5 years. The staff at heal truly care about your wellbeing, your recovery, your growth, and they go above and beyond to help transform you from the inside out. My therapist Celeste was an absolute pleasure to have (even though she was hard on me) she took her time and energy to get me to a place of hope and belief in myself again, which I had lost long ago. Olga and Jim also helped me tremendously in this journey. Thank you everyone at Heal for the beginning of my new journey of life, thank you for loving me until I could love me!

provider_name: HEAL Behavioral Health - Palm Beach Luxury Rehab
review_text: Heal Behavioral Health was a fantastic place to start my recovery. The team of people who helped me along were patient, attentive, and caring. It was a great place to build the habits I need to live a life I now value.

I chose Haggerty and Babette for training based on reviews. WOW. I was at my wits end with our new puppy when we met Babette. Even after going to training at another place, I still was questioning my decision to get a second dog. Then I hired Babette.

Our puppy heels. Sits. Lays down. Stays. Goes to her bed and her crate. Comes. Understands out and heels and sits when we walk her. None of which would have happened without Babette. She is the best.

Absolutely recommend her. Can‚Äôt say enough as to her methods. She trained my daughter and I as much as she did our dog. Thank you!!!!!

Our dog Phil is a 4 year old Shihtzu that we had for 3 years. During this time, we noticed he was both dog and people aggressive. We neutered him, changed his food, got him evaluated by a vet and it only slightly helped. He was still a problem.

I ended up doing some research and found Haggerty Dog Training. They listened to my issues, reviewed Phil and recommended the 3 week (Monday through Thursday) on-site course. I was lucky with a Black Friday sale where I get an extra week.

Phil completed 2 weeks, has 2 more to go and we already notice a positive difference. I reinforced what they showed me on how to walk him, train him and have him behave with corrections around other dogs or people. He is actually behaving around other dogs and people normally. Every once in a while he misbehaves, but we quickly use the correction methods and it works.

From a value perspective, the dog camp was significantly cheaper than the quotes of having other trainers come to the home. As long as we use the training methods, it works. What was also very nice was that Haggerty took a Christmas photo of the dog and made it a tree ornament for us. They gave Phil a Christmas gift of treats as well. Plus they offered their customers cookies and cake before Christmas. A very nice touch.

In summary, I would recommend them for anyone looking for dog training. As a family, we were at our last option for Phil due to his aggressiveness and Haggerty Dog Training saved the day. Babette and the team really know what they are doing and actually care about the dogs.
Bab is patient, easy to work with and very knowledgeable. I highly recommend her. I‚Äôm currently training with my GSD and getting results.

We have had a wonderful experience with both of our dogs here. More recently out very scared and shy dog attended day school for three weeks and has done so well! He is more confident and has come such a long way with his obedience too. He always came home so happy and was happy to hop out of the car in the mornings! We also appreciate all the extra precautions taken during COVID, we can‚Äôt wait to bring him back for more lessons in the future.

My name is Elaine and I have been training with Babette and my dog Cody! I have to say I have been so pleased and very very  happy with all we have been doing thus far! Babette is amazing with me and my dog. She is always available and is very knowledgeable has the patience and is just simply amazing! I feel we have come so far in such a short time we work well and I‚Äôm blessed to have found such an amazing trainer and look forward to working long term. She is the best and lucky I have found a top notch trainer in fl.
It‚Äôs a shame there are not more positive and comprehensive reviews being left for this practice, as the therapists here are, quite simply, among the best in Gainesville.

I highly recommend Haile Plantation Animal Clinic. The veterinarians, techs and staff have all been wonderful and accommodating and they treat my two girls so well. Their prices are reasonable and they don't try to push unnecessary services on us. Look at the pictures from my girl from August 21, 2025 - just so excited to be there. She loved everyone there.

I read through some of the non-five star reviews for context and here are my thoughts --

Most of the negative reviews praise the clinic or the veterinarians, but point out that some of the staff could be more sensitive, especially during emotionally sensitive times for the pet owners.

While I've never had this experience with Haile Plantation Animal Clinic, I have had this experience at multiple other veterinarian offices in Gainesville and I can understand how upsetting and frustrating it can be when you're saying goodbye and the tech is cheerful.

I think it's good advice for all veterinarian offices to make sure their staff are mindful - especially if the owner is stressed, worried, sad or devastated. I'm sorry you went through that.

My family has been coming here for over 15 years, and after today we will be finding a new vet. It has always been expensive to come here, but we wanted nothing but the best for our four legged family members. Today we said good bye to our beloved Hercules. My family had an appointment for 5:00pm today. My fianc√© and I arrived a few minutes early to ask about parking close to an exit so we could carry our sweet boy out to the truck. Laura was very kind, sensitive, and incredibly understanding. Laura told us there was a side exit we could park near the private room we would be in. After waiting for almost 20 minutes past our appointment time Lori came in with paperwork for my mother to sign giving permission and consent for the euthanasia. Dr.Adams came back in with Lori to start Hercules‚Äô catheter and Lori said ‚Äúhe is so excited.‚Äù The look of absolute horror on my mother‚Äôs tear filled face was mortifying. Dr.Adams finished the procedure without Lori in the room. Moments after Hercules peacefully passed I went to speak to Lori with tears streaming down my face. I told her that she needs to be more careful with her choice of words when speaking to families. To come into a room that she knows a family is saying goodbye in and say that is appalling. I left without saying everything else that my family and I were thinking about her. Lori needs to not have any face to face contact with families until she learns how to communicate like Dr.Adams and Laura. To be so careless, inconsiderate, and oblivious is beyond disappointing it is disgusting.

Dr. Linda McCollough and her team of exceptional Vets, Techs and support staff, always do their upmost to care for our six cats, by taking the time to investigate their ills and pains and find the most effective solutions in returning them to good health. Thanks very much to you all! Cheers, Patrick Ludgate

The staff is always friendly, welcoming, and efficient. The office is clean, well-maintained, and staffed by professionals.  The veterinary staff is respectful, knowledgeable, and provides accurate diagnoses and treatment plans.  The office operates efficiently, with no long wait times.  The office staff is respectful of pet owners and their pets. The staff is compassionate and takes time to get to know each pet and treats the owners like family.

What a warm, welcoming and compassionate group of professionals! We felt like family during our 2nd visit. You can tell that everyone loves what they do and it‚Äôs not just a ‚Äújob‚Äù. We weren‚Äôt rushed and they answered and addressed all of our questions and concerns. It also helps that they‚Äôre less than 3 minutes from our home and open 7 days a week (and they can do house calls‚Ä¶What?). Plus, I love that the owner has a rescue as well. Just goes to show how much they truly care about our fur babies!!!

provider_name: Halifax Health Brooks Rehabilitation Outpatient - Ormond Beach
review_text: Excellent therapy at Brooks rehab Ormond Beach location. Jen Voltz has an amazing knowledge of vestibular and balance issues. She is professional, creative, caring and compassionate. review_text: The team is fabulous! What a great group of people. Very knowledgeable, encouraging, and firm. Just enough "whipping" to get a lazy bum like me to work hard! I cannot ever hope to show my gratitude.

provider_name: Halifax Health Brooks Rehabilitation Outpatient - Ormond Beach
review_text: This nurse knew where to go! The reputation of Brooks Rehab is well known in healthcare circles for their professionalism and ‚ÄúCan-do‚Äù attitude. review_text: I have had a lot of physical therapy in past 20 years and I can honestly say that Jennifer and Jill are by far the BEST therapists I have ever had! Nick provided me with all the tools I needed to rehab my neck and get back to doing the things I love to do without pain!

review_text: The Doctor spoke with compassion and concern. I understood everything clearly of what is ailing me. I felt very comfortable and at ease as he answered all my questions and concerns. provider_name: Hammer Orthopaedics & Sports Medicine - Palm Bay
review_text:
Dr. Brian Hamzavi ‚Äî and forgive me for forgetting his wife‚Äôs title, as she is also an outstanding doctor ‚Äî are among the best medical professionals I‚Äôve ever experienced. Dr. Hamzavi truly listened to me, took the time to understand my concerns, and guided me through managing my knee and wrist pain with genuine care. He is the only doctor I‚Äôve come across who made me feel truly heard and cared for.

I could go on about how amazing Dr. Hamzavi is ‚Äî Hammer Orthopedic and Surgery is truly top-tier. Highly recommended!

I had an amazing experience at the vet today with my dog, Sasha. From beginning to end, everyone was so kind and professional. The doctor was incredibly patient and took the time to explain everything clearly to me, which I really appreciated.

The receptionist was also outstanding. He kindly helped me get my very heavy dog out of the car, and when Sasha had an accident because she‚Äôs sick and couldn‚Äôt hold her pee, he reassured me not to worry and immediately cleaned everything up. Overall, I‚Äôm very grateful for the compassion and support we received today. I highly recommend this clinic!

If you‚Äôre looking for a good veterinarian Dr. Finley is the person. I just can‚Äôt say wow enough! From the moment I walked in I was like wow‚Ä¶..to the receptionist being very kind wow‚Ä¶‚Ä¶to the vet tech wow!!! Then Dr. Finley came in! WOW you want a dr to listen to you and comfort your pet she is it! My dog is 15 years old and is struggling with old age. Dr. Finley actually listened to me and did not push anything gave me options. Really informed me! Also helps me because I‚Äôm doing more of a holistic approach and she is all on board with me!! Will definitely go back there and sign the rest of my dogs up at her clinic!!!!

I cannot say enough great things for the care they‚Äôve given my dog, Rein. From the moment we walked through the door, we were met with warmth, compassion, and true professionalism.

The veterinarian Dr. Finley was incredibly kind. You can tell she truly loves what she does, and her gentle approach made Rein feel safe and comfortable. Her vet tech was just as wonderful, patient, attentive, and clearly passionate about animals.

They treated Rein like one of their own, always speaking to him with kindness and handling him with so much care. During his acupuncture sessions, they even gave him frozen baby food (which he loved), and after each visit, he got to enjoy a sweet little treat from their ice cream machine. Those small thoughtful touches meant the world to us.

I am beyond grateful for the love and support they‚Äôve shown Rein during his recovery. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a place that treats your pet with both top notch medical care and genuine heart. They‚Äôre truly a special place.

The best vet I have ever been to. I had quite the terrible night with my boy Rocky. He was in so much pain and I was a bit beside myself. They were able to get us in same day early in the morning and did a thorough exam. They listened to all my babble about my boy and what I was scared of it being. Turned out he had a torn ligament and is on rest and a few meds. We did X-rays and the whole bit and the price was very reasonable. I would definitely recommend this vet for all of your pets needs.

If there was an option to give More than five stars to a place, this would be it. From the moment I stepped foot in the clinic with my dog, Minnie, I was impressed. The place smelled great, was well decorated, super clean, excellent staff, etc. Alyssa & Dr Finley were awesome with Minnie, we‚Äôre super knowledgeable, honest, and really sweet.

Definitely felt comfortable there and will be back. Wish it was a little closer to where I live, but they are worth the extra drive.

Oh yeah, they even have an espresso and an ice cream machine for people to help themselves.
Totally worth the wait. The most incredible care for my child. She truly cares about his well being and growth.  We had been in therapy before and it seemed pointless until we moved here!
Anya is absolutely amazing working with children! Would certainly recommend having any child to speak with her; she will show them the tools they need to get a grip on this crazy thing we call life!
Horrible customer service. Despite leaving messages multiple times via multiple ways, no one ever responds

I really enjoy coming to therapy because the therapist are pleasant to be around and explain the benefits and path to rehabilitation and the time  goes so fast plus my injury I believe is getting better faster with their help.

Therapy is effective and the treatments carried out are catered specifically to my needs. The progress I‚Äôve experienced is amazing and has allowed me to regain crucial hand function I had lost. Sonia is an artist in her field and a true professional.

Some of the other centers I‚Äôve been to are too focused on quick patient turnover per appointment and neglect the quality of a therapy. At this location, every patient matters.

My OTR MILYN CARRAZA is the best. She's very professional,  easy to talk to and she takes great care of my hand.
Thank you so much  Mily Bee üêù üíñ
Mily and Cecelia have been wonderful to work with!  Friendly, professional and knowledgeable.   Highly recommend!
Great experience and helped 100% on getting my hand movements back to normal after my work injury. Highly recommended

Hands on Therapy provides remarkably effective occupational therapy. The team does so in a way that makes the therapy fun. That in turn makes a patient want to come back. I finished three and a half months of therapy for my neck four months ago. When I went in, pain in my neck prevented me from sleeping; I had very limited movement.
The first session was amazing because some of the therapeutic exercises I was given seemed totally disconnected from my neck issues. I was given pelvic tilts; core twists and several others. What the heck? I thought to myself. Evidently, I also was shown how to do other exercises that in my opinion were more relevant to repairing my neck. I‚Äôve got news for you. The different therapeutic treatments worked wonders. These days, I am sleeping well. My neck‚Äôs range of motion is vastly improved. I continue to do exercises - Happy to do so. I recommend Hands on Therapy without reservation. The team of professionals is world class. They listen; they explain; they are totally committed to your care and condition‚Äôs improvement. Believe me, I am living proof. No one does occupational therapy better!

I had an incredible experience at Hands on Therapy Services. The whole team was exceptionally kind, skillful, professional, and knowledgeable.

From the moment I started my sessions, Hoang and her team made me feel supported and confident in the recovery process. They took the time to explain everything clearly, answered all my questions with patience, and provided strategies that were both effective and easy to follow at home.

Their professionalism and compassion made a real difference in my healing journey. If you're looking for a place where you'll be treated with care and respect‚Äîand see real results‚Äîthis is it.

Highly recommend!

I was recommended to Hands on Therapy and was not disappointed.My ‚ÄúTrigger ‚Äú finger was corrected without the need of an operation. Since then, other parts of my body, particularly my shoulder and leg needed work. They were terrific in eliminating the cause of the problems.
The staff are extremely professional.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Hands On Therapy Services. I came to them after a tendon repair surgery, and from day one, they‚Äôve been incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and experienced. The team clearly knows what they‚Äôre doing, and it shows in how they approach every session‚Äîwith care, attention to detail, and a real understanding of the recovery process.

They made what could‚Äôve been a frustrating and painful journey feel manageable and even encouraging. I always felt like I was in good hands, and I‚Äôve made so much progress thanks to their guidance and support. I‚Äôm really grateful for everything they‚Äôve done to help me heal.

Highly recommend to anyone needing hand therapy‚Äîthey truly go above and beyond.

I had been suffering from plantar fasciitis for an extended period, and despite undergoing injections, including plasma injections, I experienced no relief. My wife, who had undergone Hands-on Therapy herself, continually encouraged me to seek treatment there. I finally did, and I am thrilled with the care provided by Carole and Hoang! I am now pain-free and able to start my day without discomfort. The staff is exceptional!!! Carole and Hoang are dedicated to ensuring that their patients are pain-free
Wally Santiago
LTC (RET)
Doral, FL

provider_name: Happiness Horse Farm and Will's Way Animal Sanctuary
review_text:
We went to Happiness Horse Farm today and had an absolute blast! It was such a wonderful experience from start to finish. Everything was completely hands-on, and we were able to meet and greet all of the animals at our own pace. Nothing felt rushed, and we were encouraged to spend as much time as we wanted with each animal.

We brought apples and carrots and had the chance to feed the horses and cows ‚Äî something my kids will never forget! They couldn‚Äôt stop talking about how much fun it was for the rest of the day.

The staff (Emily and her daughter) were so friendly and welcoming, answering all of our questions and sharing information about the animals. You can tell they truly care.

This was such a memorable day for our family, and we will definitely be back!

provider_name: Happiness Horse Farm and Will's Way Animal Sanctuary
review_text:
If you are a nature or horse lover I highly recommend the Happiness Horse Farm! üê¥

I had the pleasure of working with this beautiful farm and non profit and when I first met them, I could immediately feel the love and dedication‚Äînot just for the farm and its animals, but for what it represents to the fast-growing community of Palm Bay.
They have poured her heart and soul, family and volunteers, into creating this sanctuary for rescued animals and a space for community connection. Checkout their website for fun events for the whole family!

provider_name: Happiness Horse Farm and Will's Way Animal Sanctuary
review_text:
We had our daughters 10th birthday party here.  Everything was set up when we arrived. Emily was helpful in making our party exactly what we wanted. We were able to bring extra treats for the animals, we groomed, tacked & rode horses. We were lucky enough to feed the horses dinner, too. The farm also has two sweet cats that love to share in the attention as well.   Emily had a fleet of volunteers who were so friendly and helped everything run smoothly. My daughter wanted to spend the night & do it all over the next day.
The farm offers other things to do throughout the year & we are looking forward to participating in those events as well.  Thank you for a memorable experience.

provider_name: Happiness Horse Farm and Will's Way Animal Sanctuary
review_text:
Emily and her team were absolutely amazing! They went above and beyond, showing genuine care for the animals, which was truly refreshing to see. We scheduled a homeschool field trip for a group of about 20, and it exceeded all expectations!

The farm is breathtaking, the animals were wonderful, and we even had a surprise visit from a friendly raccoon looking for snacks‚Äîsomething both the kids and adults loved! Our activities included horseback rides, gem mining, a farm tour, and feeding the animals with a bucket of treats. We also made plaster of Paris animal footprint molds, and they offer even more fun activities like tie-dye shirts, Japanese fish print paintings, and owl pellet dissections.

We had such a fantastic time that we‚Äôre already planning to return. Everyone raved about the experience, and that‚Äôs no exaggeration‚Äî10 out of 10! Emily is an absolute gem. Thank you for creating a core memory these children will never forget. We appreciate you more than words can say!

In fact, we had such a great time that I‚Äôm planning to throw my daughter‚Äôs birthday party here in September. All the moms jokingly said they want to move to the farm!

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Highly recommended!

provider_name: Happiness Horse Farm and Will's Way Animal Sanctuary
review_text: I had the wonderful opportunity to volunteer at Happiness Horse Farm for the past 3 months.  During this time, my heart fell in love with all of the horses and farm animals. Now they are overall less anxious dogs and are so much more well behaved. We are so happy that we chose Carola to train our dogs. I recently adopted a beautiful Ragdoll named Hanna, now known as Luna, from Happy Paws, and I want to share my experience to help others who may be considering adding to their family.

Not long ago, I lost my beloved Ragdoll of 14 years to cancer. The grief was overwhelming. I knew I could never replace her, but I also knew how healing the love of a Ragdoll can be. Their gentle, affectionate nature makes them such special companions.

While searching online, I came across a kitten listed at Happy Paws. Unfortunately, after reaching out I learned she had already been adopted‚Äîbut they told me they had another Ragdoll available if I was interested in visiting. I was hesitant at first, Hanna was a little older than I had hoped for, but something told me to go take a look.

From the moment I stepped into Happy Paws, I was genuinely impressed. The facility was spotlessly clean, modern, and filled with a sense of warmth and care. They clearly prioritize the health and happiness of their kittens. I was asked to sanitize my hands and wear shoe coverings before entering‚Äîjust one of the many signs of their commitment to cleanliness and safety.

Even more impressive was the way the kittens were living. They were free-roaming, not kept in cages, and every single one of them was friendly, social, and clearly well-loved. You can tell so much about how animals are treated by how they behave‚Äîand these kittens were thriving.

When I first met Hanna, she was standoffish. She kept her distance, and it was clear she wasn‚Äôt interested in interacting. I was told she had been passed over by several families for that very reason. That broke my heart. I stayed for a while and spent time playing with the other kittens, quietly letting Hanna adjust to my presence.

By the end of my visit, something clicked. I saw a softness in her, a potential for connection‚Äîand I decided to take a chance.

That chance became one of the best decisions I‚Äôve ever made.

From the moment I brought her home, Hanna‚Äînow Luna‚Äîwas a completely different cat. She transformed into the most affectionate, loving companion. She follows me from room to room, constantly seeking kisses, cuddles, and closeness. She sleeps in bed with me every night and wakes me up with purrs and snuggles.

She has brought joy back into my life in a way I didn‚Äôt think was possible. I‚Äôm so grateful I saw the beauty in her when others didn‚Äôt. Knowing that I gave her the life she so clearly deserved‚Äîand that she returned that love tenfold‚Äîhas been incredibly healing for me.

Thank you, Happy Paws, for creating such a nurturing, loving environment for your kittens to grow and thrive. And thank you for introducing me to my sweet Luna. She‚Äôs made my heart whole again.

I don‚Äôt have pictures of the facility, but I hope you enjoy these photos of Luna enjoying her forever home.
