I was able to get a same-day appointment at Massage Choice Therapy, which was a huge plus. The place was spotless and very well maintained. I really appreciated the attention to detail‚Äîthey even had a brand-new mat at the entrance for the rainy weather, and I was the first to take the tags off it. The atmosphere was warm and friendly, making the whole experience even better. Overall, I highly recommend Massage Choice Therapy for both the professionalism and the welcoming environment.

I had the 90 minute massage with cupping and it was absolutely amazing! Jennifer had the best technique and deep tissue massage. I left their feeling 100% better. I am a dental hygienist full-time and it wrecks my back and neck, but she made all of my pain so much better.!! I highly recommend going here for your massage.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this massage ‚Äî it was exactly what my body needed. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was calm, welcoming, and relaxing. But what really blew me away was the level of care and attention during the massage itself.
The therapist took the time to really understand where my soreness was coming from, especially in my back, and worked with intention through every muscle. It wasn‚Äôt just a generic massage ‚Äî they focused on problem areas, released deep tension I didn‚Äôt even know I was holding, and still managed to keep it soothing and restorative.

By the end, I felt like a new person. My back pain has noticeably decreased, my posture feels better, and I left feeling incredibly refreshed. You can tell they truly care about their craft and your comfort.

I will 100% be coming back ‚Äî this place is a hidden gem and I‚Äôm so grateful I found it. Highly, highly recommend!

This place is PHENOMENAL!! It‚Äôs been several years since I‚Äôve had a back massage and decided to try Healing Aura Massage for the first time, and they definitely do not disappoint! Cocoa hit every point on my back with precision and broke up any tightness I had in my back. I felt like a brand new woman when I left there..I will most definitely be back for another massage and will make sure to bring my spouse to have them get a massage too!

This was my first time here and I was very impressed. I had gone to another place for several years but they closed.  I was nervous to try a new massage place but I am so glad I did. It was one of the best focused therapeutic massages I have had. It was with Jennifer. She focused on all the areas that had issues.  It was very deep tissue but she would check in to make sure the pressure was sufficient.  I walked away feeling 100% better. It was so good I ended up buying a membership.
- Debbie

No vet compares. They took the best care of my dogs, Bailee and Frank. The environment was stress free, from the Dutch doors that made communication easy in each room, to sitting on the floor instead of exam tables to help keep things as relaxed as much as possible. Calling and checking up after appointments. Speaking clearly and with compassion. Loving my pets like I do. I‚Äôve yet to find a vet that even comes close now that I‚Äôve moved to Indiana. Really miss the care and staff at Los Robles!

These folks definitely worked with me and my nervous dog to get a diagnosis for the cause of her pain.  The vet was persistent and has been able to prescribe medications so Pacchi feels better most days.

I don't love the online method for ordering medication.  I'm getting better using that site.  But it's a bit cumbersome and adds extra steps.

The only other piece that bothered me is this: when Pacchi was in for her diagnosis, the vet thought she might have cancer.  It was scary.  We arranged for me to come back after work at 3:30, but when I got there, the vet had left for the day.  She gave me a detailed note explaining Pacchi doesn't have cancer.  But she wasn't available for me to ask specific questions.  I had some trouble reconnecting with her.  When I did, she was very helpful and informative.  In the end, I got just what I needed.  I would like to have known ahead of time that she would be gone when I came back, just so I could prepare.  I was pretty worried about that speculative diagnosis and felt let down.

I still use Los Robles and do recommend it to others.  I also recommend they get clear on how they will make contact with the vet if the appointment is later in the afternoon  or if they have to leave their animal for awhile.

Still give the place four stars.
The outside sure is different since they lost the big tree,  but still the same caring folks on the inside. Dexter loves them!

Dr. Melanie and the team are amazing. The interior and exterior of the building look like your favorite aunt's house rather than a Vet's office. The staff are sweet, knowledgeable and loved my dog, so of course I love them too.

These people were great. We got an appointment within two days of calling. Dr. Linda was a good listener, and handled my cat with care. She even took time to write an analysis and report of my cat's condition, and advice for keeping her healthy, with some suggestions for better food than I feed her and where to get it. She prescribed medication and gave it to me at the appointment, and educated me on how to properly dose her. I was holding my breath when settling the bill, and was so relieved at how reasonably priced the services were. We have used another vet in Tallahassee who charged twice as much for the same service. We will stick with Los Robles. Great staff, caring service, no hassles.

I brought in my 2 Year Old Standard Poodles today.  I had a fantastic experience meeting Courtnee and Dr. Brauer.  I have wanted to go the Holistic route, and I found the perfect place.  Laid back type of atmosphere, but they are very good at what they do, and they clearly care for the animals under their care.  I look forward to building a long-term relationship, and I hope NOT to see you too often!  Thank You!!

Moving over from South Tampa to Saint Pete 4 years ago  I was  concerned with finding a vet that aligns with my values and allowing me a more holistic approach. Healing Hands for Pets; Dr. Brauer, Dani and staff have been more than I could have asked for. Truly magical from the moment walking into the office with such a calmness and caring approach with a private office with a sofa, yoga mats and balls. We‚Äôve had 5 in their care for the last 4 years ranging from our 15 year old brother‚Äôs Harry and Grayson who had skin, hip, eye and teeth issues eventually crossing the rainbow bridge last year with Dr. B coming to our home. We‚Äôve had many pets pass but my hubby always took care of them. Experiencing my 2 little guys ( Shitzu mix) cross together in our home was very sad but peaceful. Kristen was so compassionate and answered all my questions as we sat together listening to the soft music and holding our little guys. We have an 8 year old lab/hound Reese who absolutely screams getting her nails done; Kristen my hubby and I take a team approach to get it done without lifting her feet which seems to be key; she was traumatized by a mobile groomer. Then there is Harper out 3 year golden that ate a corn on the cob! We went to ER care as it was after hours and vet was able to get it up and X-rays showed clear so we were all cheering. A gut feeling had me take  Harper with me for a Friday afternoon appt with Reese.   Dr. B asked if I wanted to do an X-ray to double check to see if all the corn was gone and I agreed. To our surprise there was still corn showing up so we decided I needed to do surgery the following day at the ER as well as spay given it was late Friday and I needed to regroup. And now we have Cooper, a male golden foster I‚Äôve now had 4 months who started at 122lbs now down to 105! Cooper has an amazing story of rescue and the support I‚Äôve received from HHFP has been incredible along with emotional support for me. Cooper  had labs early on  and determined thyroid meds would be beneficial.  Cooper goes into the office for weekly weight checks and recently Dani did an amazing nail trim with no issues, she is such a calming force. Dr. B, Dani, Sarah and staff are outstanding! Personable, engaged, knowledgeable, passionate and extremely compassionate with every situation I have encountered with our 5. Each dog is unique in their needs and each one has been treated with love and individualized care. Visits usually start with Dr. B on the floor speaking to our fur babies engaging and earning their trust with lots of love. I can‚Äôt say enough about the amazing team Healing Hands for Pets is and our wonderful experiences over the last 4 years. The care, love and genuine approach Dr. B, Dani and Sarah provide is a gift and blessing each of our fur babies receives at our visits. Absolutely the best!

I cannot express enough how grateful I am for the incredible care my dog received at Healing Hands. I can honestly say that this veterinary office is unlike any other I‚Äôve ever been to. The level of care and attention they provide is unparalleled.

I genuinely believe that their compassionate approach extended my dog's life by at least six months. I have no doubt that if I had gone to any other vet, they would have suggested putting my dog down long before her time.

My dog benefited immensely from weekly acupuncture and laser therapy. The difference in her activity level after each session was noticeable. These sessions were not only beneficial for her but also for me, because I was in front of a vet every week. For anyone with a senior dog, you know how many questions you have day to day.  This kind of support is invaluable.

I don‚Äôt mean to be blunt, but if you‚Äôre not taking your pet to Healing Hands, you‚Äôre not doing what‚Äôs truly in the best interest of your dog or cat. The level of comfort and care they provided to both my dog and me is something I can never fully repay.

Thank you, Kristen and Courtney for being there everyday for Zara and I.

I am incredibly grateful for the wonderful care provided to my dog, Zelda, who had a large mass removed. Leading up to the surgery, Kristen, Courtney, and the entire team did an amazing job of answering my questions, getting to know Zelda, and thoroughly explaining the details of her condition. Kristen provided clear guidance and honest feedback regarding Zelda's healthcare options. I felt completely at ease knowing Zelda was in such capable hands. I truly appreciate this team's dedication and the thorough care they provided for my baby.

Dr. Kristen and her staff are Outstanding!!! They are the most caring, knowledgeable, and passionate veterinarian office I have been too. Dr. Kristen got down on the floor and held Harley during the exam, which calmed both our puppy and us! They are currently treating our Harley a soft hair Wheaton Terrier. I make the drive for South Tampa because of care Harley received. I would recommend this practice to any pet loving owner!!

Thank you Healing Hands For Pets!!!
CD

Sarah and Ruth are amazing at listening and helping find the best fit for help for individual needs. I was able to consult and gain so much from our meetings. Both therapists are genuine and provide a secure and professional safe space. They respect their patients and make sure that their privacy is highly protected.

I was so excited to learn they do both horse and traditional therapy. I can‚Äôt wait to refer more friends and family their way!

Cannot say enough positive things about Healing Hooves. Overall, it is quality therapeutic facility that provides exceptional help to the whole family, not just the immediate patient. The horses are the perfect balance to compliment the professional and supportive services of the amazing staff. Each therapist offers a diverse skill set to provide the exact level of individualized care. Highly recommend to people of all ages, regardless of comfort with animals. Our experience has made us true believers of the power of the herd.

I have been an educator all of my life. In my opinion, Healing Hooves is an innovative, responsible and fun approach to therapy! The staff is dedicated and professional. They make their clients feel comfortable in the natural environment! Their horses are amazing creatures which feel empathy and have an uncanny way of assessing situations and responding to them.

My daughter calls this place her zen place ‚Äúour‚Äù zen place ‚Ä¶ Healing Hooves has been a wonderful and peaceful experience for the past year . The team is very professional and you immediately feel at home and comfortable there is something that calms and relaxes you when you arrive in the premises and it‚Äôs healing ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π Ruth Ocampo, my child‚Äôs therapist  has helped navigate through some rough times and I have seen tremendous improvement in my daughter.
I am forever grateful for all the help guidance and patience üíï
Thank you üôèüèª
I will always talk highly about you and recommend your children here .

An amazing environment for therapy! Very calming and relaxing just being around the horses and the therapist there are great and making sure both the client and horse are comfortable and safe. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone who is thinking about any type or therapy, equine assisted or not.

The BEST place to take your pets for physical therapy. Everyone there is so incredibly kind, welcoming and educated. I took my Hovawart puppy there last summer to start physical therapy after breaking his toe and becoming very cow hocked in his hind legs and they completely transformed my boy. A year later and he is strong and happy/ A special thanks to the techs who worked closely with Reverie and thank you to the kind receptionist who always put a smile on our faces. I‚Äôm moving so I just had my last appointment, but I cannot recommend this team enough.

I highly recommend Healing Paws Center to anyone looking for top-quality rehab for their pets. From the very beginning, the entire team has been informative, kind, and truly caring, especially with my boy Max. I really appreciate how hands-on they are. They take the time to ensure you fully understand how to continue the exercises at home before you leave. Every member of their team that I‚Äôve interacted with has been absolutely amazing. You can tell they genuinely care about both pets and their owners. I‚Äôm so grateful for everything they‚Äôve done for Max!

What can I say about Healing Paws Center?
They are such an amazing group of professionals who not only perform their jobs with the highest ability but also treat all their patients with such compassion, empathy, care, and love. I am amazed to see the dedication and love with which they have treated Grace, a 2-month rescue cat who has not been able to use both of her hind legs. From the moment we walked in, they have been amazing in explaining to me what her situation is and the best treatment alternatives for Grace, but also in treating her as if she was their own pet. It is truly amazing to see their dedication and love during every minute of her therapy sessions.
I have also seen the same with other pets that come during the time we are there. Both owners and pets seem to be happy to be there and the staff treat all of them with care and respect.
I am so thankful to have met them and cannot recommend them enough.
Thank you for everything you are doing for Gracie!!!!!!

Grace has therapy 2 times a week. And we drive all the way from Miami for it. It is well worth it for such amazing because honestly it's more than worth it fur such amazing treatment.

Healing Paws Center is truly a blessing!
My pup and I are so incredibly lucky to have found Healing Paws. From the moment we started our journey here, we‚Äôve felt completely supported, cared for, and part of the family. Everyone here is phenomenal‚Äî Rob always makes sure we‚Äôre ready for each appointment, and acupuncture sessions with Aline and Brandy are not only effective but incredibly relaxing for my super energetic baby. Physical therapy with Nick, Ralph, and the rest of the amazing team has honestly been life-changing. Thanks to their care, my pup is already showing so much improvement, and I can‚Äôt wait to see how far we‚Äôll go in the coming weeks. Thank you, thank you, thank you for everything‚Äî we love you guys ‚ô•Ô∏è

Totally wonderful....the people are just amazing...friendly...knowledgeable...skilled...caring and genuine....not just with us but they treat my fur baby like he's their own.
From the moment you walk in you can feel the calm...Rob welcomes you and makes you feel like you've been friends forever....the techs, notably Rudy, Ralph and the numerous girls that have care for my boy Domino and of course the wo detail Doctor Danielle have all been tremendous. I can't recommend this place and there people enough. I thank you from the bottom of my heart for bringing my baby boy back to me... Thank You.

provider_name: Health & Wellness Center of Port St Lucie
review_text: Dr. Ziemba and his staff are the absolute best around. My back used to be in such bad shape but after going to him consistently it's like a night and day difference. They all are so friendly and kind and wouldn't go to any other chiropractor in town. He is the go to chiropractor in town!!

provider_name: Health & Wellness Center of Port St Lucie
review_text:
Dr. Ziemba is a terrific chiropractor. He never fails to help me. He and his entire staff, especially Michelle, are friendly, welcoming and so efficient.
I'm grateful to have them in my world.

provider_name: Health & Wellness Center of Port St Lucie
review_text: Highly recommend Dr. Ziemba and his staff. They are very knowledgeable and caring. From my very first visit I felt relief. Thank you!

provider_name: Health & Wellness Center of Port St Lucie
review_text:
We were really in a pinch to find a chiropractor for my boyfriend. So I called around to a few places and not go response. I finally got ahold of this location and they got him in asap. The doctor is super friendly and professional. He had a lot of great information that's helped.
The boyfriend has gone three times so far and it impressed me enough to try this as a new location. I went for my first visit yesterday and the relief I got from just one visit is magnificent.
Definitely give it a try.

provider_name: Health & Wellness Center of Port St Lucie
review_text: Everyone is always friendly and helpful. I get adjustments, massages, therapies, and my vitamins from the health and wellness center. As someone that is not a very social person and uncomfortable in most settings..  I've always felt comfortable and at ease when I come in for treatments. My migraines are getting better (which is my main concern right now) and I can't thank them enough. The entire staff is amazing.

My husband has been with them over 10 years! Dr. Mignon, Martin and Kasey are great! Caring Doctors .  who listen to their patients to meet their health concerns and conditions head on. My husband‚Äôs crohns has been pretty stable and I really appreciate them so much. Mrs. Regina and the other nurses are also so sweet ,caring and does a great job!! Just a team of good women if you ask me‚ù§Ô∏è

PA Eliza Casey is very thorough in her work and helpful in her patient care. The staff is always pleasant. The office manager Regina is very responsive. Dr Mignon when you see her, is attentive and informative in her care.

Dr. Mignon helped save my life, 10 yrs ago‚Ä¶She truly cares and listens to your concerns. Professional, knowledgeable, dedicated, trustworthy, she will work with you to create a plan for your whole health & wellness. She stays on the cutting edge of new technologies, treatments and procedures. She offers a variety of treatments & services, all under one roof,  to keep you looking and feeling your absolute best! Her staff has always been professional, kind and supportive as well. Highly recommended!!!
Dr. Mignon and the staff were amazing! They made me feel comfortable, answered all my questions, and truly cared about my health. Highly recommend this office!

I was needing a new primary as I‚Äôve had the same one for many years in my hometown, but was tired of traveling to GA to go for my yearly and med refills. I tried a different office in Tally but the doctor came in and didn‚Äôt even say hello- just asked me what I was in for & gave me some referrals. Recently a patient at my job recommended Dr Mignons practice to me! Firstly, Cassandra at the front desk was very welcoming and treated me like an old friend. Nurse Practitioner Casey came in and greeted me with kindness and got to know me as a person and a patient. I feel like I‚Äôm in great hands with this practice and I‚Äôm so happy I found them :)

Health Rehab is hands-down the best physical therapy experience I've ever had! The therapists are compassionate, helpful and friendly. They take the time to carefully plan individualized exercises and massage therapies to promote healing, strength, and mobility - I actually looked forward to my sessions!
Special thanks to Alvis and Josh for their incredible care and professionalism. The whole team, from the front desk to the therapy staff, creates such a positive, welcoming environment. I highly recommend!

I ride my bike in a group, five days a week and typically do a little over 200 miles a week.  In June, I  fell off my bike and fractured my hip. My doctor said I needed physical therapy and I of course, thought that I could get by without it. I was wrong.

My first session was with Joanne and Josh for the remainder of my therapy. Josh had me doing things I never thought was possible and today my hip discomfort is gone.  Moreover, for the first time in years, I can get off my bike without fear of losing my balance and falling.

While most of my sessions were with Josh, others helped me as well and everyone was absolutely wonderful. Between them, they got me back to health and I‚Äôm forever grateful.

I highly recommend Health Rehab and the entire team of professionals.

I am sad that my PT is over...the entire team at Health Rehab was just amazing. Shout out to Emily (who I saw the most) and Jessica (was back up) who provided excellent care, challenging me every week to keep me interested and coming back. The vibe at Health Rehab is motivating. The team always worked together, encouraging all patients. Everyone always pitched in and help if someone was busy with another patient.  I would speak to a lot of the other people and they were always expressing positives for there care.  Thank you for the experience and the opportunity to rehab at your facility.

My mother was referred to this practice by her orthopedic specialist but the process of scheduling needs improvement

I called and spoke with Amanda who stated that In order to book an appt I would have to provide the order/referral

She advised me she would reach out to me once she received the email. She never did till this day. I am waiting. It‚Äôs been a week.

The next day, regardless, I called because I wanted to get things going for my 82-year-old mother

I spoke to someone else who took my information and didn‚Äôt say I needed to send that information ahead of time so it threw me what was the purpose of me sending it if it wasn‚Äôt even gonna matter in the end when all I had to do was take it with me the day of the appointment

Make me feel like I was getting the run around.

I specified to the young lady taking the appointment that I needed someone who spoke Spanish because my mother would not understand otherwise since she is extremely hard of hearing in Spanish is her primary language. I was advised that yes, they speak Spanish there and the person she had an appointment with in fact spoke Spanish. I just called again today to see if I could move the appointment and they just clarified to me that they do not speak Spanish so just a lot of misinformation and then just seems so unprofessional

So unfortunately, I can‚Äôt even get past the making an appointment stage because the people that answer the phones really don‚Äôt seem to provide the correct information or even care that you are running through loops just to make the process easier on everyone

I canceled my appointment. They could‚Äôve cared less. They‚Äôre like OK bye. I will be advising my doctors office that they should probably think twice before referring people to an office that doesn‚Äôt seem to care I could be wrong but first impressions really make an impact.

Not sure if I got people in training if that was why I had this situation compared to everyone else‚Äôs experience, but it‚Äôs just very disappointing if it were in regards to my own personal situation, I would just shrug it off and move on but when it‚Äôs a loved one on the line and all you‚Äôre trying to do is make sure you‚Äôre helping them and their health journey. It‚Äôs a bit more frustrating to have to deal with situations like these

Revision: 7.11.2025 2:58pm

I had the pleasure of speaking g with the Owner and talk about feeling heard and understood.  It took my surprise because never have I had this experience and it seriously says a lot about how much empathy and willingness to listen with the intention of understanding the owner has.  To see his heart for helping others is very apparent in the way he expresses his desire to help people on their journey.  I am happy to report I will be approaching going forward with an open mind and believing for the best for my mother‚Äòs care.

It was a great reminder for me today in humility and kindness and understanding and always listening with intent to understand.

I want to recognize the staff and therapists at Health Rehab for the excellent care they delivered to me as I recovered from two hip replacement surgeries last year.

Carol and Sonia at the front desk always provided a pleasant checkin and out process, while Ian, Josh, Rob, Matt, Emily and Jessica all teamed up at different times during my rehab visits.

If you have a need to rehab after a surgery, I highly recommend that you make a visit to Health Rehab.
Maria is an excellent therapist!!! She has helped my daughter improve so much and we are very grateful for that. My daughter loves coming to see her and work with her!!

The speech pathologists (Mr. Eddy, Ms. Sharon, Ms. Sydney, Ms. Mary) are absolutely amazing! They have helped my daughter, who is 6 and autistic, and my son, who is 2 and a bit speech delayed, progress tremendously and have trained me to help them daily. The front desk is always accommodating when it comes to ensuring insurance approval and helping to obtain referrals and final approval for therapies. They try really hard to schedule around a student‚Äôs school hours and to schedule siblings‚Äô sessions simultaneously if possible. They are fabulous and would highly recommend them!
Amazing place for your child with autism, they have made such great progress with my girl. I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!!!
Great place to bring kids for therapy! The therapist are very friendly!

Lakeland, Harden Blvd. Clinic is great. Yosseline the receptionist is super friendly and professional. Derrion, our son's occupational therapist, has made incredible progress with him. We highly recommend this clinic. Thank you, Sastre.

If I could give them any more stars, I would! This place, specifically Eddy is amazing! My son has improved so much and it brings joy to see how happy he gets to be there and see his therapist. The amount of patience, love and care put into my son by Eddy is something I will always be grateful for. Also, the rest of their staff, especially Jocelyn is very helpful and goes above and beyond for my son and all the patients there. This is where you should take your child.

My daughter goes here for speech therapy and we absolutely love her speech therapist. She only comes here for once a week which is fine cuz we live about an hour away give or take traffic. But it's worth it. She's had had a few speech therapists there but she has since been with the same speech therapist for a while and we absolutely love her. There are moments that my daughter has some issues where she just wants to play with the kids in the lobby which is understandable but she knows that she needs to do her speech therapy as well. Other than that, I have no issues with our speech therapy here. They have become like a second family especially cuz my kids love the kids that come in.

These people have been gaslighting me for about a year and a half. If they truly understand what it‚Äôs like to raise special need children..and how difficult and challenging it is.. they would not mess with the parents.  My child insurance and PCP referred me to this place.. I completed the registration form‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going on 2 years not one person have seen my child or returned my call. But yet, they email and text me about billing updates, birthdays. Horrible customer service and lack of professionalism

I have been taking my grand-baby here for several months now and the experience overall has been horrible. The front desk are not welcoming at all. They have a sign in sheet that has no purpose whatsoever. Several times I have taken my grandson to be told that his therapy session was canceled and no call at all or they have called an absent father that we have told them several times to delete that contact. Our First speech therapist was Eddie which was always late and would not give my grandson his full 30 minutes. He would call him in 7 minutes late and taken out five minutes early. Had an encounter where he had his wife and children in his room and the front desk girl had to tell him to call us in. Changed therapist to Alondra started out great and then the same encounters of bringing him in 5 to 7 minutes late. Several times my daughter had to complain and it changed. Today was the worst because not only Joselyn the front desk girl is rude and very disrespectful as she speaks to you without looking at you. Grand baby was sleep and I asked if it can be rescheduled and her attitude and no eye contact to tell me it was the end of the month and cannot be rescheduled. I told her today she was very rude and disrespectful in speaking to her screen and yet she apologizes looking at her screen. I told her that I will let my daughter reach out to them and left. Daughter reached out to the Director named Sharon which she is also one of his therapist and have no complaint with her and his therapy but as a Director she was also a waste of our time she did not seem interested nor apologetic. No answer as to why she wasn‚Äôt able to give him therapy today and was being replaced with Alondra. There  are other parents there that feel the same way but don‚Äôt say anything because honestly the waiting list to get any therapy for our children is over a year long. Please be aware of this office. As I will no longer take him there.

The staff our not professional. We had Hurricane Helena and they were closed but needed the referral and told me that there‚Äôs no way they would get it by fax in time for my daughters appointment that following Monday on Monday I told them I would come in with the referral in hand which I did have in hand however they scheduled me weeks out because they did not have the availability and had the nerve to tell me that the referral was expired by one day. The referral was not expired when I booked the appointment and they expired after 60 days, when I say it‚Äôs a hassle to even find anyone who does occupational therapy and then to find a place that books you weeks out to only treat you like this is unacceptable and if I could give them zero stars, I would talk to the Director, who could only apologize and tell me that she could reschedule me when I‚Äôve already been waiting weeks  if that‚Äôs their policy and can‚Äôt accept one day outside when I had to accept being booked for weeks out, they are not professionals in any way shape or form

My daughter has been with health pro for years now. The experience has beyond exceptional. My daughter development has elevated. The therapist have connected me to resources to help my daughter, they are so patient and kind and willing. My daughter is so comfortable. MS. Annie, Frank and Francesca works so well with accommodating scheduling and providing World Class Service. I give health pro therapy services beyond 5 stars!!

We have had an amazing experience with Karis, Mr.Wayne, Dailys , Steven, Ms Andy, Front Desk Staff, and most of the therapists at Health Pro Pediatrics . My Children have made significant progress with their speech, and they genuinely enjoy their therapy sessions. The Therapists there are incredibly knowledgeable and have a wonderful way of making therapy fun and engaging. We appreciate how well they communicate with us as parents and explain everything in detail. They've not only helped our child, but they've also given us valuable tools to support their development at home. We feel so grateful to have found such a caring and supportive team!!
My son just loves Mr Wayne! We look forward to seeing him every week! And he gets mad when the appointment is over because he just enjoys Mr. Wayne so much!
Im really excited for my son to receive the help he needs. These people gave me such great vibes. They were super nice and understanding. Im so excited to see the progress. Thank you üôè
My daughter has been receiving therapy here since she was 3 years old. They are an awesome group. She is now going to be 16 in October

We are so grateful for Sra. Laura and all the kindness, patience, and dedication shown to my child. From the very beginning, she has made every session a positive and encouraging experience. My child always feels comfortable and supported, and it‚Äôs been wonderful to see how much confidence and progress has grown over time. She is excited for her sessions each time.

Thank you for always being so kind, understanding, and committed to helping my child succeed. It truly means the world to us.

Gracias Laura!

My son has been going here less than 2 years and was discharged today after excelling at his evaluation. Ms. Laura really did such an amazing job getting my son where he needs to be. Frank is awesome and super nice. My son is a wild one and Frank lets me son go in the OT room so he can calm down . Everyone is so friendly there. Ronnie loves it there and he is going to miss everyone

The Therapists we have had the pleasure of knowing through our Granddaughter (of whom we have adopted), have been the utmost in all aspects..
She was non verbal up to a year ago and now actually talking! Her balance has improved so much that she hasn't  become car sick in more than 6mos..She attends both Speech and Occupational Therapies. Although we have a large hurdle ahead of us.. I am truly confident  that she will be ok in life and her struggles will be a little easier now..
I highly recommend this facility and All of the Kind most caring courteous staff here!!

Sincerely grateful,
Grammie-mom üôÇ

The only feedback is the timing between when a therapy series ends and a new restarts can be improved. I understand some of it is the insurance delay.

I've been a member at Healthspan Recovery since March 2025, and the difference in my health and energy has been remarkable. Matt and the entire staff are incredibly friendly, knowledgeable, and genuinely invested in helping you feel your best. The non - invasive, science based therapies here - such as PEMF, cryotherapy, infrared sauna, red light therapy, compression therapy and hyperbaric oxygen chamber - have been a game changer for me. Combined with other lifestyle changes, I've lost over 20 lbs in just 5 months, improved my sleep, and feel more energized than I have in years. Booking treatments is effortless with their super easy app. I'm also excited about their new expanded location (coming soon) with even more cutting edge offerings-2 cold plunge tanks, a 6 person traditional sauna, a multi-person hyperbaric oxygen chamber and complimentary hydrogen water for members. If you're looking for a welcoming, supportive environment to improve your health, recover faster, and feel ama9, Healthspan recovery is the place. Highly recommended. Let's go get healthy!

Exceptional!
Healthspan Recovery is absolutely fantastic! The cutting-edge technologies they use to support and improve health and well-being are incredibly impressive. Spending time here is such a mood-booster, it truly feels like you're taking care of yourself in the best  way. What really stands out, though, is the wonderful staff ‚Äì they genuinely care and make the whole experience even better. Highly recommend!

Nice recovery place, I was very surprised when i walked in and I would definitely recommend to others. üëç Shawn is extremely nice and knowledgeable and very kind in showing me all
The machines and how they benefit you. Can‚Äôt wait to recommended to others.

Staff is nice and facilities are clean.

However, the hard chamber hyperbaric treatment they offer is not REAL hyperbaric. They don‚Äôt use pure oxygen, just compressed air. There is no research done on hyperbaric treatment without pure oxygen, and it is as good as snake oil. In fact the whole point the pressure environment is for you to be able to absorb pure oxygen into your bloodstream. So there no real point to go into pressure without it.

Please don‚Äôt waste your time or money here with this treatment unfortunately.

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Healthspan in Brickell! From the moment you walk in, the space feels modern, welcoming, and spotless. The team is incredibly knowledgeable, attentive, and truly committed to your wellness journey. They offer incredible services like the Cryo therapy, red light therapy, infrared sauna, compression therapy, Hyperbaric Soft Chamber, and so much more. Every visit leaves me feeling recharged, relaxed, and better than ever. So grateful to have a place like this in Miami‚Äîhighly recommend to anyone looking to prioritize their health and well-being!

Dr. Cathy is simply the best Dr for your pets healthy lifestyle. She is knowledgeable, professional and provides a high level of care.  My senior cat really benefited from her care and recommendations, I'm very grateful that Dr. Cathy was there to make his remaining time more comfortable and was there to answer all my questions.

I highly recommend Healthy Pawsibilities! I brought my 11 year old Cavalier. She was having 3-5 seizures a day. Vets had her on 7 medicines twice a day. Cathy has cured my angel! I was sure my pup was going to pass away in the next six months, but Cathy was able to help cleanse her whole body, and slowly get her off of all the medications she was taking that were making her sicker and sedated. Sadie is walking, jumping, healthy and happy! She‚Äôs no longer having multiple seizures a day or having loads of accidents from the side effects of the medications. Thank you Cathy!

Dr. Cathy is the absolute best. She‚Äôs very intuitive, patient, kind, intelligent, straight forward with what‚Äôs needed to help your pet the best, and she truly knows how to work with animals and communicate with them so they feel at ease. She is truly a gem!

Dr Cathy was so wonderful! My puppy had been having some intestinal issues, and she not only fixed it naturally but gave me a plan for life. My dog has been fine since, and I haven‚Äôt had to take her to any vet again. I would highly recommend her!

review_text: Dr.Gaines, Courtney and the rest of the staff here are all angels. I was recommended here by Chewys Paws groomer (great recommendation too!) and am forever grateful. review_text: I recently moved to Florida- Having an exceptional Vet is of the utmost importance to me. provider_name: Healthy Pets Veterinary Care - Boca North
review_text: Fabulous! I‚Äôm new to Florida- The excellence of my Veterinarian is of utmost importance to me. Dr. Nikki Mazzaschi was phenomenal! She was professional, intelligent, and remarkably gifted with cats! I could not possibly be more pleased! Recommend 100%!

review_text: Dr. Gaines is amazing -  knowledgeable, caring, and truly loves our pets. The whole team at Healthy Pets is kind and attentive. They always remember our dogs by name and check in after every visit. We‚Äôre so grateful for the care they provide!

Heart 4 kids has become like a second family for us. Both my kids love to go to therapy, and always have fun. They both have made amazing progress.   I can‚Äôt imagine going anywhere else!

Special thanks to Ms. Tiffany, for coordinating with our insurance company to ensure our classes were not interrupted. We love "Heart for Kids therapy" and wish them prosperity!
We absolutely love this office! Tiffany at the front is amazing and our speech therapist Cristina is incredible and works so well with my son! We are so grateful to have found Heart 4 Kids!

We love Heart 4 Kids. Ms. Sarah has been working with my son for the past six months, and it‚Äôs evident she truly cares about his well being and success. My son is slow to warm up to some people, but he‚Äôs been excited to see Ms. Sarah for therapy from day one. She is warm and loving toward him in a way that has made us feel like it‚Äôs more than just a job to her. She goes above and beyond to share suggestions with us to continue his improvement and has even emailed us at times to share additional valuable information and recommendations for my son. Ms. Tiffany at the front office is also wonderful. She has worked with us and our insurance company to try to make therapy as affordable as possible for us. The people who work here sincerely care about the kids and families they are helping. Finally try striking up a conversation with the other parents in the lobby. It has been really nice to have some social time with people who understand similar developmental challenges and are also their kids‚Äô greatest advocates.

My daughter briefly attended therapy here. Everyone was very friendly, which I appreciated. However, I have two issues (hence losing 2 stars):
(1) I asked her provider if she really found the visits to be beneficial because my daughter did not want to attend. She admitted it was not and said she supported us ceasing services. I wish that had been presented to me rather than me having to ask. If a provider doesn't believe the service is helping the child, it should be presented to the parent - especially when the parent is paying a considerable amount out of pocket!
(2) The billing situation is a mess. My daughter's insurance started kicking in after her deductible was met. They continued to charge the full amount for the last couple of visits because they hadn't actually received the money from the insurance company (even though I saw the benefit info and knew it would be paid). I didn't realize it was going to be so difficult to get my money back.  Her last visit - that I paid in full for, despite knowing the insurance would pay - was Oct 22nd. The insurance processed the claim on Oct 29th, and they typically pay very quickly. On Nov 6th, they sent me an invoice for a previous session, which the insurance had processed on Oct 23rd and paid. I replied Nov 8th with a detailed explanation of the credit that should be on the account and a request for refund. No response. I sent another email. I did not get a response until Nov 25th and was told I would receive a check in the mail in 60 days. Honestly, there is NO reason for that. By Nov 25th, the account had already been overpaid for a month, and now I have to wait 2 more months for a refund?

I also wanted to add one more thing - the way that the out of network insurance would work was explained was not how it actually worked. If it had been explained the way it really worked, I would have found an in-network provider.

Heart 4 kids has been apart of our family for the past 6 years!! The staff is absolutely wonderful. My son was not able to say words and he was 3yrs old so he was diagnosed with Autism level 2 so he is verbal just needed speech therapy. My wife took him to hearts 4 kids therapy and in a year he had been talking a lot so thank you so much for all the help

"Saying goodbye to our pet was one of the hardest things we've ever had to do. Dr. Kiva showed incredible compassion and empathy, and her professionalism and kindness made a world of difference. She gave our dog a peaceful and dignified passing. We'll always be grateful for her."

provider_name: Helping Hands Veterinary Surgery and Dentistry of Florida
review_text:
Saved my whole world today üò≠ he needed an emergency foreign body removal surgery cause he decided to eat a prong link, crazy right? They squeezed him in today, treated him amazingly, took great care of him, got him comfortable and took the link out of his stomach! Hes now home and under medication, the incision is nice and clean with so far no irritations or it opening, despite being droopy and on trazadone, hes still his sweet goofy self wasn't shut down or scared at all
Thank you for helping us, we truly appreciate yall saving my boys life, hes my whole world
Included a little picture of a few weeks before when we went to epcot with my best friend ü•πüíï its going to be a rough 2 weeks but we will get through it
Also they are not crazy expensive! We were quoted 2512 for the surgery, emergency visit fee, ecollar, 3 blood panel test and 2 weeks medication (tho they said was already included) Definitely will be back if anything ever happens again which i really hope doesn't üò≠

provider_name: Helping Hands Veterinary Surgery and Dentistry of Florida
review_text: Everyone at Helping Hands was amazing to us and our sweet girl, Lowen. She developed a life threatening infection and needed emergency surgery. Helping Hands was so kind and understanding and after calling many places, including her normal vet, we couldn‚Äôt find anyone who seemed to care enough to help save her life, but Helping Hands cared and was able to get her in the next day. After dropping her off for the surgery they kept in contact with us by sending text updates throughout the day to let us know what was going on and how she was doing, which I was so thankful for. They are all so nice and helpful and worth every second of the hour and a half drive we had to get to them. Thank you so much to everyone at Helping Hands for helping my baby girl!

provider_name: Helping Hands Veterinary Surgery and Dentistry of Florida
review_text: They were excellent in their care for our fur baby. She was spayed and came through with flying colors.  They sent her plenty of pain meds and sedatives home. Actually by the 3rd or 4th day, she did not need them anymore, but they sent her enough so if she needed them she‚Äôd have them. Her follow-up appt was great too and she is her old self at 4 weeks post-op.  Very happy with their care and their price point.

provider_name: Helping Hands Veterinary Surgery and Dentistry of Florida
review_text:

I will recommend 100%

review_text: just wanted to thank Helping Hands And all the wonderful people  who work there who helped save  my dog pebbles life with her surgery and made it affordable. Thank you for all your work for our beloved pets. Who are our family members thank you so much.

In Helping Little Giants we offer specialized and professional ABA, Music and Art Therapy. Our  Center is  filled with love and here our Little Giants can be themselves, learn and improve everyday. I highly recommended it.

I have had an outstanding experience with Helping Little Giants ABA Services. From day one, the team has shown genuine commitment to my child's well-being and development. The therapists are highly skilled, kind, and patient, creating a safe and trusting environment.

The personalized programs they designed for my child's needs have made a significant difference, focusing on communication, social skills, independence, and self-esteem. It‚Äôs remarkable to see the progress he has made in such a short time.

Communication with the team is excellent; they are always available to answer questions and provide regular updates on my child's progress.
I highly recommend Helping Little Giants to any family seeking ABA services. Their dedication and professionalism are truly exceptional, and I am very grateful for everything they have done for us.

Helping Little Giants offers exceptional ABA (Applied Behavior Analysis) therapy, focusing on helping children with developmental challenges, particularly autism. Their approach is tailored to each child, promoting behavioral improvement and skill development in a supportive, compassionate environment. The therapists are well-trained, patient, and dedicated to ensuring that each child reaches their full potential.

Parents praise their clear communication and collaborative efforts, making families feel involved in the therapy process. Whether it's helping with communication skills, daily routines, or social interactions, Helping Little Giants truly lives up to its name, empowering young children to overcome obstacles and grow into confident individuals.

If you're seeking a reliable, empathetic, and effective ABA therapy provider for your child, Helping Little Giants is a fantastic choice.

I work as a RBT in this company and for me it has been one of the best work experiences I have ever had. Absolutely incredible experience!

Beki, the owner, is one of the sweetest and most genuine people I‚Äôve ever met. we had the best time this morning on our private ride with Paige. we had Denver and Slim as our horses, they were very well behaved and the swamp sunflowers were incredible to ride through. we can‚Äôt wait to come back again next year! thank you!!

A friend recommended Highlands Animal Hospital when I was at a loss with our pug Brady. He had a heart murmur and allergies and needed a dental cleaning and a skin tag that was growing. This most recent experience was a follow up on one of our senior dogs and, although we had to wait due to an emergency situation related to another customer, it was worth the wait. Thank you for your kindness and expertise.

Extremely recommend for exotic pets. I took my guinea pig in, the vets were not only quick, and kind, but you can genuinely tell they love animals here. Plus, the prices are completely reasonable and appointment times are so flexible.

Hilltop Family Vet has always gone above and beyond to ensure that every animal we bring in is always treated with dignity, respect, and compassion as they receive the best veterinary care. It doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs one of our personal pets seen for routine care, to a new arrival at our sanctuary needing to have diagnostics, to an emergency and critical animal we‚Äôve been called to assist within the community that needs emergency surgery. Dr. Montgomery, Dr. Hill, and Dr. Floyd are not only exceptional veterinarians but also exceptionally compassionate individuals. Head tech, Alyssa, support staff, and the receptionists all complete one of the most amazing veterinary teams we‚Äôve had the pleasure of working with. This clinic sets the bar for excellence! Will always recommend Hilltop Family Vet and appreciate their dedication to always providing top notch care!

Upon arrival for my appointment I am checked in at the front desk with no waiting.  Within a few minutes someone will come to take my elderly cat Jenny and I to an examination room.
They always ask if there are any new problems and how she has been doing.
After the  examination the veterinarian will take the time to talk to me and answer all my questions.
I have had no complaints about the care she has received.  It has all been excellent.

They are very good at training and helping your dog to swim. When I first went my Rottweiler puppy was afraid to get in the water and swim but after 4 sessions he is not afraid anymore. He gets in the pool by himself and loves swimming. They were very patient with him. Thank you so much for helping Teddy swim

The water therapists were amazing with Meeka 4 year pomsky and Ali 1 year goberian. They were very hands on, knowledgeable and caring. Communication with our dogs were gentle, kind and effective. Each time our dogs accomplished a goal, the instructors celebrated with them. Positive reinforcement was used according to what motivates our dogs such as food or toys. Ali in the beginning was very timid. The instructors worked with her anxiety so it greatly decreased. The facilities are clean and the dog walk area is separated from the pool. They are always excited to see our dogs and are timely in getting back with you to answer your questions. I highly recommend them for water therapy,  swim lessons or to just have fun in the pool.

Tom & Kristina are knowledgeable, professional, friendly & caring. When I first brought ‚ÄúAthena‚Äù to them for therapy for her arthritis, she had never been swimming & she was 9yrs old. But the pool set-up w/a gently sloping ramp, a life jacket & some urging w/treats, soon had her in the salt water pool. At first she was tense & anxious. It showed. But Kristina sweet-talked her into relaxing & once up on the ledge, a massage & gentle stretches for those poor old joints. That part isn‚Äôt so bad. üòä After many returns, she still isn‚Äôt fond of the water, but she likes Tom, Kristina & their assistants. The treats & rub downs are always good. If they can get a non-water-loving, 80lb Mastiff mix to swim, they can help anyone. See pix on their Facebook page of dogs literally leaping into the pool. They are also amazing w/amputee dogs. My vet says swimming is great for Athena as it allows her to use her muscles w/o the strain of her body weight. The other best part is the totally, absolutely reasonable pricing. I definitely feel I get my money‚Äôs worth & Athena gets some awesome treatment for her stiff, old bones ü¶¥ ü¶¥ I cannot recommend them highly enough. ü•∞

My 8 month old Doberman,  Dream Katcher   had a great first swim yesterday.  The trainers were wonderful and handled Kattcher with such positive reinforcement!
He is no Labrador yet, but there is hope he will eventually swim like one !

My poodle LOVES to swim and play with other dogs. But because we live in Florida, I can't let him swim in just any pond or lake üêä I'm so glad I found this puppy pool for him! After a one on one session, he was able to join the open swim sessions on Sundays. He has such a great time and I can't wait for this to become a Sunday tradition for us!!

I enjoyed my stay at Hippocrates and can‚Äôt wait to return. The staff, guests and kitchen staff were all welcoming.  I surprised myself by enjoying raw vegan food daily.  The villa was nestled in a very cozy setting, and the walking trails were enjoyable.  I had several services at the salon; I love the way my hair looks now.  Hippocrates Wellness Institute is truly a very special place.

Beautiful grounds where you can leisurely walk or ride a provided bike along pathways that meander through the jungle . I love the multitude of iguanas, lizards , birds and raccoons that also call this place home .the rooms are spacious and comfortable with daily housekeeping .  You can bring your pet .  I have my small parrot with me .  Enjoy heated pools , IR saunas , a spa , salon , exercise classes , lectures and numerous spots to sit and relax.  The staff , from the front desk to the kitchen to the cleaning crew , are all friendly , caring and supportive .  They make a point of knowing your name and asking how you are .  The raw , vegan diet is central to the program here and was somewhat challenging for me the first two weeks . (I‚Äôve been here more than six weeks ).  It has gotten slightly easier , mostly due to the lack of a huge variety of options after some time .  That said , the kitchen displays the ifood beautifully and tries to accommodate you the best they can .  The food is always fresh and in ample supply .

I enjoyed my 1 week stay there and I do believe they help many people, especially those with cancer, but I don‚Äôt think this program is for everyone as it is extremely low calorie, 2 green drinks and a high quality salad for both lunch and dinner. They do not serve Breakfast. How many calories is that? The green drinks are about 50 calories each and the greens and sprouts salad is ‚Äî? The truth is many people weren‚Äôt really eating another full salad for dinner because they were so ‚Äúfull‚Äù (bloated) from lunch they couldn‚Äôt eat another whole salad for dinner. Some light foods are available on request if you choose to eat outside of their program, which a few people did.

I think if someone is in a weakened state, especially older people, trying to do the vitality program, this is not a good idea at all and can actually be very detrimental. And there were numerous examples of this that were not being properly addressed while I was there IMO. And trying to do a sustained lifestyle program like this long term is an absolute no!

I loved the grounds which were very natural. Also the staff was great and I felt very nurtured and taken care of from the moment I arrived. I also love the feeling of community that was present with all the guests and even the staff when they were interacting with guests. The other guests were the absolute highlight of my stay and I would go back just for an opportunity to spend time again with others in such a beautiful supportive setting.

My stay at Hippocrates was exceptional.  The organic salads were delicious. The staff welcoming & supportive. The services wonderful. The talks informative and the classes - healing. The room - comfortable and immaculate.  Wish I could live there forever. .

I want to share my terrible experience with the Hippocrates clinic, which I had from June 6 to June 13.

I have stage IV cancer, and perhaps by the time you read this, I may no longer be in this body.

I became interested in alternative cleansing methods when conventional medicine could no longer help. I reached out to the Hippocrates clinic. Mr. John called me several times and warmly invited me to come to the clinic.

At the same time, he spoke rather vaguely about some package, the ‚Äú1-week Vitality Program.‚Äù I asked if it was possible to add cancer treatment procedures. He replied that several cancer-related procedures would be included. He encouraged me to come, saying it would help.

Coming from Canada was a huge effort for me. When I arrived, I was shocked to find that they charged my caregiver. They charged her $170 for a basic room with a shared bathroom, plus an additional $350 per day just for the use of the facilities‚Äîeven though she didn‚Äôt use any of them.

On the first day, they took my blood for an additional $200. On the second day, I received a Swedish massage for $170, which, as I understood, was included in the program. On the third day, nothing was offered at all. I became upset, also because the room was uncomfortable.

Keep in mind, all of this costs a huge amount of money, but even the best rooms are very uncomfortable and noisy‚Äîyou can hear your neighbors. I simply couldn‚Äôt stay there. They promised to change my room, but never did.

I asked to see the program details to understand what was included, but they didn‚Äôt give it to me. So I offered to pay extra to receive IV Vitamin C. They agreed, I paid extra, and they gave me an IV Vitamin C treatment and oxygen therapy, along with a few other procedures and a paid consultation for $300.

To my surprise, although they sell a one-week program, it actually runs from Monday to Friday. You are expected to check out early Saturday morning.

It cost me about $10,000. I still don‚Äôt understand what exactly I paid for.

We agreed that the following week I would rent separate housing nearby and just come for the procedures. But I never got a response about the cancer programs. One of the big issues is that there is no information about these packages on the website. And even when you pay, they still don‚Äôt give you any package details.

Eventually, they sent me an offer for a $450-per-day "Vitality passport" program, which would give me access to all the facilities in the complex, even though I didn‚Äôt need the gym or pool. That wasn‚Äôt relevant to me. They told me I should arrange all procedures myself with the various departments.

And I kept telling them I felt very unwell. I asked them to simply understand my situation and help. I said I was willing to pay, but in the end, I wasted the second week staying nearby without getting any clear direction. Just vague suggestions that I should buy a new package. And that package included recommendations to take certain vitamins‚Äîeven though my blood test showed I didn‚Äôt need them. So then, why did I need to do the blood test in the first place?

I‚Äôm very disappointed. I lost a lot of money, nerves, and health at this clinic. As I understood it, the programs and packages are very profit-driven. But they will smile at you. And to be fair, most of the staff are very kind and helpful people.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Jenn is truly something special. She did a bodywork session on me that went so much deeper than I ever expected. With such gentle expertise, she was able to pinpoint exactly where my body was still carrying old trauma.

She didn‚Äôt stop there , Jenn walked me through exercises that helped me process and release it. When she left, I felt lighter, clearer, and more in control of my own wellbeing than I‚Äôve felt in years.

If you‚Äôre considering booking with her, please take this as your sign. Jenn‚Äôs work is more than just bodywork,  it‚Äôs soul work. And it‚Äôs worth every bit.

Jennifer is the best Occupational Therapist!! She has helped my son so much I will never be able to thank her enough. From her OT to emotional releases, she has helped my son be able to be more independent and to grow in areas in which he had weaknesses. A big thank you to Jennifer and her guidance over this last year, she has really put my mind at ease with the progress my son has made throughout this past year. If you‚Äôre in need of an Occupational Therapist reach out to Jennifer, you will be beyond happy you did!

I‚Äôve known Jenn for many years as a colleague and mentor. I recently experienced a traumatic death and have housed a traumatic death from years ago within my body. Jenn did an amazing release using MNRI and the Emotion Code. I‚Äôve always been a little skeptical but once you feel a shift in your body you BELIEVE. I can‚Äôt explain what I felt after Jenn‚Äôs session but a lift in my soul and a light in my heart turned on. It‚Äôs amazing work and I deeply value the gift Jenn has given to help me heal. As an occupational therapist myself,  I value Jenn‚Äôs holistic approach, kindness,  knowledge and transparency. She is highly specialized in a skill set that is an asset to any traditional therapy whether it is cognitive behavior or PT/OT/SLP. I would highly recommend this if you are looking for an alternative way to process emotions and intuitive work.

I know Jennifer for many years. She has helped my daughter enormously with her therapy, both physically and remotely!  Jennifer interventions have been very accurate and I have seen an incredible change on my daughter‚Äôs behavior and her daily social interactions with everyone! Thank you Jennifer ! You are amazing!

Jennifer is an excellent professional. She was able to assist my son with releasing negative feelings/fears that were causing physical anxiety and pain. She was able to provide the source of each of his negative energy which really was a surprise to me, since she had no prior knowledge. Jennifer is extremely effective and highly recommended.

I had my first massage with Ms. Menayra today and it was absolutely amazing! I‚Äôve had several massages at other places before but this was a truly unique experience. The time she takes in the beginning to get to know you and your problem areas makes for a customized massage. She is truly so caring and incredibly gifted. I did the 90min integrated session where she incorporated various techniques. I highly recommend and I will definitely be back.

I had one of the best massage experiences yesterday! I went in for a deep tissue session and it was absolutely amazing. Menayra was incredibly attentive, gentle when needed, but firm in just the right spots ‚Äî she focused exactly on the areas where I was holding the most tension.

You can tell she really knows what she‚Äôs doing ‚Äî very skilled, professional, and intuitive with her touch. I left feeling lighter, looser, and completely renewed.

If you‚Äôre dealing with muscle pain, built-up tension, or simply want to take better care of your body, I highly recommend this massage. It‚Äôs now a must in my self-care routine. üíÜ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüíÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

I did a 2 hour Reiki session with Menayra  and it was the most beautiful, emotional ,and best healing experience of my entire life . From the moment I walked into her studio I instantly felt safe to share my feelings with her, she has a beautiful ,understanding Soul , and will really bring out the best healing experience for your body , mind and soul . This was my first time trying out Reiki , and I üíØ would recommend her to anyone , I walked out feeling so peaceful and relieved .. I can‚Äôt even begin to thank you enough Menayra, you‚Äôre Amazing  and I‚Äôll definitely be back soon for more ‚ù§Ô∏è

This was my first visit and it was an amazing experience I absolutely recommend. Menayra was so inviting and friendly. Such a kind soul. Her work environment is very relaxing and everything smelled wonderful.

I booked a 2 hour session, and honestly it was last minute. The way Menayra begins your session with a meaningful conversation speaks volumes. She cares and wants to ensure you‚Äôre getting the most out of your session.
The cupping, integrative massage and reiki felt like a reset for my whole body. And she massaged my scalp! I have long thick curly hair and most therapists never touch my head and it was phenomenal!
Not only did she help me physically with pain, but also helped with emotions that I did not realize I was holding on to. I went in feeling tense and blocked, I left feeling rejuvenated and immense relief. A complete shift of energy.

This was my first time trying the cupping method and I am extremely satisfied with the relief I felt from my chronic back pain. The entire experience has made me extremely happy, I will return. Thank you, Menayra!
The best deep tissue I have EVER had. Menayra uses any modality to help her clients feel pain free. Worth every penny .

provider_name: Holistic Veterinary Care of Central Florida
review_text:
I had never heard of chiropractic and. acupuncture for dogs.
Arriving i took the wrong road but quickly found my way. My fur baby isn't usually this calm at the vet  it the atmosphere, aromatherapy and overall "good vibes" had him at ease. I love the holistic approach and natural medicine options for my senior baby and will be back for sure

provider_name: Holistic Veterinary Care of Central Florida
review_text: I took my Siberian kitty to get checked for some issues he was having and I was blown away by the quality of care we received. They treated him like their own, fully explained the treatment plan, as well as gave me different options for treatment. I highly recommend them for their compassion and care. I‚Äôm very picky about who I take my pets number but they have earned my trust and loyalty.

provider_name: Holistic Veterinary Care of Central Florida
review_text: I was pretty hesitant to come here at first. Really really wanted holistic care for my aging dog but knew that specialty prices were something I can't really afford. Nobody in my town offers acupuncture treatment (the main reason I wanted to see this Dr) and so I committed to driving an hour to have my girl seen here. The initial visit with exam, bloodwork, thermal imaging, acupuncture, and chiropractic adjustment was a steep cost for me to budget but it was the care I wanted & chose for my dog. We weren't able to afford the Chinese herbal route (everything is 4x the dose when you have a large breed & most supplements or medications are considerably more costly to keep ordering for big dogs) but I'm so happy this vet is here in Central FL to have that option accessible. We didn't keep up with the therapy treatments as often as I would like, due to both the drive & cost, but this vet remembered my dog & treated us with kindness each time we came. She discussed options with me & didnt get a cold attitude when we were "those people" that couldnt afford every thing we'd like to do. She saw that I did what I could for my baby. The staff are friendly people. But the vet earned my trust. A week after our last visit, which I didnt know would be our last visit, Ava took her final breath at home. I have so much peace knowing that we got to come in 1 last time. Ava was as pain-free as possible in her final days. The vet prescribed me 1 last medication that I wanted to try. I have no regrets in being able to provide everything that I could for her. She was actually scheduled for another therapy treatment in the upcoming weeks when her time came to leave this earth. I cannot thank this vet enough for sitting with me 1 last time & looking me in the eyes & asking me how Ava was doing, and actually listening.

provider_name: Holistic Veterinary Care of Central Florida
review_text: Always five star care when we come see Dr Chichra and her staff.  The energy is calming and safe for our beloved pets and ourselves!  Love it here.üêæüêæüêæ ( Wyatt getting his adjustment for good over all care.)

provider_name: Holistic Veterinary Care of Central Florida
review_text: Dr. Cichra is amazing! She helped my girl, Olivia, with her arthritis, and she has been so much better! She even went swimming, which she hadn‚Äôt done in years! I am so happy I found Dr. Cichra.

This is a high quality reputable massage studio for therapeutic sessions.  The highly skilled, experienced therapists have worked here for years.  They can help you heal.  Whether gentle but effective therapy to relieve the pain, stiffness and inflammation in my joints caused by my autoimmune, or my husbands need for deep pressure to release frozen muscles and restore flexibility after overdoing exercise on the beach - these therapists can help you heal better!  I should know...I'm a massage therapist, too!
Good massage but if you‚Äôre looking for a spa experience this little spot is not it.

Unfortunately i had a bad experience with one of the front desk ladies that almost made me not come back, but since i had a package that was given to me as a gift for my birthday,I've decided to call and give another try. I was lucky enough to have Vivian answering my phone call, she listens to the customer, makes sure that a solution first meets the customer needs and then figures out how to best make it happen and on
the customer's timetable.  I also LOVE Ana!!! She's amazing . Too bad that one lady made me feel so bad about the place that is hard for me to leave a 5 üåü  review.

Very nice massage place. Not the average frilly spa setting, however, upon going I knew from their website that it was more so a massage and wellness clinic. I actually found that I preferred it. There wasn't any gimmicks when I arrived and the place focused strictly on delivering an awesome massage. The receptionist at the front was helpful in taking my coupon and helped me understand some of the packages I could buy in the future. I booked an hour and a half treatment, and was given my full time. (Something I find that I don't get at some spa's in the area.)  My appointment was with Marlene, and I must say WOW she is awesome at her technique! Definitely recommend her. The therapist focused mainly on wellness, treatment, and relaxation when it came to getting my massage.If you are looking for a good massage, this place offers it! Won't be disappointed!

Great experience. I was suffering from a stiff neck and back for days when I finally did some looking and found this place with good reviews. I called and the receptionist was so nice, she got me an appointment within the hour. The environment is a bit bland, but I don't care about appearances when the price and service here can't be beat. My appointment was with Ji, she was really great and paid attention to the areas with the most stiffness. I will definitely be back here in the future.

We had a great experience with Hollywoof Pet Resort. We had been taking our beloved pets to another location but were very disappointed to find out they were not taking care of our pups like they said they were. I asked for a tour of the resort and was very pleased to see it was clean and safe. We asked them to accommodate our specific requests like receiving daily pictures and they were happy to do that. Our pups got sick during their stay (diarrhea from stress at a new place) and they bathed both of them and washed their bedding without complaining or charging us for the inconvenience. We were so worried about their care after finding out they were so mistreated at the last boarding facility and Hollywoof went above and beyond for them and we truly appreciate it! We have already booked our pups for another upcoming trip and feel very grateful to have found a place that truly cares for our pups as much as we do. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for accommodations for their pets. Thank you guys so much for taking such good care of Mollie and Kash!

We have been going here for years. This place is amazing! My doggo LOVES coming here to be groomed and boarded. She always comes home smelling clean and with a cute bow! This holiday season they even did a personalized ornament and gave her dog treats! I can‚Äôt ask for a better place to leave our beloved family member when we go away. I always know she is in good hands. Thank you!!!

Great place and friendly staff from day 1. They made my Chihuahua into a friend and she loves them almost as much as she loves me.  I feel so at ease when she's there .
Glenn was her first BFF, üòä
The folks here are great! My little Chihuahua doesn't like to get his nails clipped, but they are able to get it done, all the while soothing him. I'll go no other place!

Our pups Sol and Luna seem to love it here!!
They have been to daycare and boarding here multiple times and they send us pics upon request. These are some pics they sent us. They are very willing to comply with our requests and do not discriminate against dogs who are intact!

669 Len withan I was in
Room 669 I had the best care your nursimg  staff  and physical therapist were fantastic they not only show professionalism but offered great care for myself and roommate with kindness and caring. However, you need to get your scheduling up to the standards of your nursing and PT staff. Who schedules a 78 year old man for PT at  7:00 PM after he has  had three PT and OT sessions.. This is bad for the patient and the care giver who is working hard to get his or her back on their feet. I worked very hard and I am not going to have the workout I should when I‚Äôm tired and getting hit with pains I developed during the day. My room mate Joel
has dialysis and is scheduled for a. 1:00 PM session but isn‚Äôt picked up until 3:00PM which means that he finally has a microwaved dinner at anywhere  between
8 or 9 PM. Your  nursing station needs work as well. I hit the call button and maybe someone will show up right away or anywhere from 10 to 15 minutes later. I understand that the nursing staff is very busy and overworked but there has to be a way to fix this. I am experiencing severe hand tremors but the review won‚Äôt allow me verbally complete it. So I spent a hour making this text. That‚Äôs  how strongly I feel that you you had to get my honest opinion of my view of your operation. So give all
The nurses on the on the 6th flor a raise and the PT staff a raise in pay and Kleen up      The other stuff !

This rehab has been amazing  OT Mark, and Arielle are phenomenal,caring and very attentive to my needs. PT Meghan, Marilyn and Chad worked me hard but I got better fast. All of the nurses, Audrey, Alma, Deidri, Christel, Baky, Patricia and PCT Nesha and Dr. Bulkan Is absolutely amazing.  They saved my life. Thank you all!

Came in for lower back surgery from the moment I  came through the ER to the day I was discharged I felt I was in good hands receiving world class care. All the people from the Doctors to the nurses and support staff are very pleasant easy to talk to and mostly very helpful all of the time.
Special thanks to Dr Moncman for caring so much and thank you to the Intensive Rehab team on the 6th floor you guys are amazing.

We can only dad wonderful things about the staff at the rehab center. From the nurses to the aids the care my husband received was excellent. The entire PT staff is exceptionally well trained and understand the individual with whom they are working. We left feeling as though we had become members of a unit that fosters both physical and emotional well being. Thanks to so who helped us during this trying time.

I couldn‚Äôt have a better place for my therapies. This is an excellent place in every way for the care of a patient. The whole PT and OT personnel are the most caring, supportive, helpful, knowledgeable, amicable and caring group of individuals. Without their help it‚Äôs hard to do all the things they teach. Thanks Brittany, Chad, Ben, Patrick, Catherine and the rest of the team for your big efforts to bring back and help me to be able to move on my own.
Also, thanks to the professional and dedicated nurses, especially Marie Holt, she dedicates her time to checking that everything is done right and in timely manner. Her care for the patients is impressive. And also the help of the PCT‚Äôs making sure that the patients have everything they need and all the support at any time. Very grateful to Elaine, she was there any minute I needed her.
And finally the dining, such a nice group of people, very respectful and cordial when you call for your food and at delivery. Excellent meals
I would recommend this place highly to anyone that needs care.
Thanks a lot for everything.

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute - Pompano Beach
review_text:
I went to Holy Cross health physical therapy from January through the end of March.  I always saw Charlene from my visits. She was very attentive and knowledgeable of what I needed for PT. She advised me the best way to proceed with PT. When I started PT in January, I was very stiff and in pain in my neck and shoulders. When I left almost 3 months later, I felt some improvement. I highly recommend Holy Cross health physical therapy at the Pompano Beach office. And I highly recommend Charlene to be your therapist. The receptionist there was very pleasant to work with. She set up my appointments. Even though I had to change several of the dates, she was always very pleasant accommodating.
Again, I loved the staff there.

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute - Pompano Beach
review_text: Had my PT at Holy Cross Pompano Beach after my knee replacement surgery. Charlene was excellent. She provided me with a regiment of exercises that got me stronger and back to walking without much discomfort. I am extremely grateful for her care. I would also like to recognize Alex who was also in my sessions early on. He gave me the confidence to go forward without an assistave device. Would highly recommend this establishment

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute - Pompano Beach
