review_text: My experience in physical therapy post surgery of my ankle was excellent,  I was doubtful at first as to whether I would get the same level of therapy as at the Holy Cross  Hospital site?  The smaller office in Pompano Beach has  only3 therapists working at a time .  It feels very boutique like! Charlene is who I had for most of my post ankle surgery visits with ,  I thought she did an excellent job of pushing me  gently and guiding me through my therapy exercises.  I had Alex one day as Charlene was on vacation,  My therapy with Alex  went great and fit perfectly into the routine I established with Charlene,  he was excellent as well! The only problem I had was they are short staffed when a therapist takes aa break ,  I had 2 sessions cancelled, that disappointed me a lot bc I arranged my schedule to make all my appointments,  they really need an extra on call PT  person to bring in,  when staff is out sick. Tia the front desk secretary was also very kind and efficient in scheduling my appointments as best as she could with lots of patients and minimal therapists,  at one point I wanted to take a session down at the hospital to make up for a cancer,  but you can.  I learned once you start with one site, you can not switch between them unless your totally switch sites!  So there is a bit of room for improvements but not with the actual therapists who are great, just a little mire help!  Overall great experience,  thank you!  susan T

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute - Pompano Beach
review_text: David Orlando is a truly excellent physical therapist.  He intelligently and confidently evaluated my situation and with clarity and with an impressive display of knowledge was able to explain my condition and the appropriate and necessary treatment. I'm really satisfied with how he has helped me improve my condition and understand how to manage it. When he is evaluating and treating you start realizing you're in good hands, you just know he knows what he's talking about and that makes me feel at easy that he can actually help me improve. The environment of the clinic in general is professional and feels very intimate and personal.

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute - Pompano Beach
review_text: This location is very friendly,put you at ease.it is an easy location to get a convenient appointment.I had hardware removal and some work done on my ankle.All the therapists there are knowledgeable.I saw Charlene and Alex during my 8 weeks. My Range of motion has improved,I am very grateful.they also keep you entertained while doing the hard movements.Good conversation while learning as well is endless.

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute- Pelvic Floor Rehabilitation
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough great things about my experience with Kierra, my pelvic floor therapist. From my very first visit to my eighth, she has been consistently gentle, kind, and genuinely caring. Kierra helped me overcome my overactive bladder issues, something I never thought I‚Äôd find relief from. Thanks to her knowledge and guidance, I‚Äôve learned so much about my pelvic floor and how to take better care of my body. She has truly been a blessing in my healing journey, and I‚Äôm so grateful I met her and committed to therapy.

I also want to give a shoutout to Sharon at the front desk‚Äîshe always greets me with a warm smile and is incredibly sweet. She makes every visit feel welcoming and comfortable.

Thank you both for creating such a positive and supportive environment!

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute- Pelvic Floor Rehabilitation
review_text: Dr Regalado listens carefully and well.  Her diagnosis and recommendations have proved to be quite therapeutic.  I greatly appreciate and highly recommend her and her department.

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute- Pelvic Floor Rehabilitation
review_text: I had an incredible experience with Penelope (DPT). She was knowledgeable, compassionate and very positive. Within couple of visits I started noticing improvement! I highly suggest!

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute- Pelvic Floor Rehabilitation
review_text: Kierra, DPT has completely changed my quality of life. After 3 years of living with dyspareunia and painful cramps, my OBGYN recommended pelvic floor therapy. At first, I was nervous to try PFT because I didn‚Äôt know what to expect. However Kierra was extremely professional and always made me feel safe. After just two visits, I could already feel the difference. I feel so validated and seen. I truly could not recommend Kierra enough! If I could give her 6 stars, I would.

provider_name: Holy Cross Rehabilitation Institute- Pelvic Floor Rehabilitation
review_text: The front desk Representative Sharon Cameron is very professional and very knowledgeable, helpful and kind. The is best pelvic floor therapist and Theapy. Thank so much everyone kindness

very kind, friendly staff and doctor, but i didn't find this vet any more affordable than others. i brought my 13 year old cat in for sneezing blood. the office visit was 80$ and he prescribed an antihistamine and antibiotic. the antibiotic was nearly $40, which i think is high. also, the doctor did not examine my cat's nose to see if there was something inside causing the bleeding. i was also concerned about yowling, and he told me bloodwork would be about 180$. nothing affordable about that. i will return to this vet regardless, but i really don't see why so many people think they're more affordable than average.

Our dog was rapidly declining when we brought him here. We explained his condition multiple times to office staff over the phone and updated them on his decline when we had to change the appointment time. I called and told them when we were 5-10 minutes away to give the staff a heads up. Our appointment was at 3:30 and we waited over 45 minutes until our dog was finally assessed by a vet tech. We tried to be patient but had to ask how much longer because he wasn‚Äôt doing well. During our wait front desk staff loudly held personal conversations and had no sense of urgency to get our dog assessed. The vet tech that came out was amazing, she acted quickly and was very professional. She explained our options thoroughly. Our dog passed away while being transported to the table for X-rays. The vet tech and vet were phenomenal and we are thankful for the way they handled this situation. They were so kind. Unfortunately the experience with the front desk staff made an already difficult and emotional experience that more agonizing. They were so absorbed in their trivial conversations it appeared they had zero focus on the animal that came to their office for help. Given the amount of times we explained his condition to the front desk staff we believe they should have prioritized getting someone to assess him sooner. A little bit of communication goes a long way and they failed miserably. The outcome for our dog would have been the same no matter what but the experience could have been different.

They were really wonderful saw my little sweet Daisy the same day I called and everyone there was sooo nice. She is doing so much better. Thank you so much to everyone that took care of Daisy !!üêæüêæüíï

They were very caring and tried their best to help my dog. They gave him medicine, explained everything, including costs and what comes next. They called several times to check on him. He was 15 years old and had to be put down. They contacted me after that, too, to get me my dogs paw print to me. Best vet experience. The doctors were wonderful and had fair prices. I highly recommend them.  My friend takes her pets there also. I was told they were great, and I was not disappointed.

Was recommended here and although it's out of my area, found the care from staff and Dr. Klein excellent. Unfortunately my pet had to be put down. Having gone through this before, dreaded the event.

Thank God for Dr. Klein who was so compassionate and caring through this so very difficult moment. He felt like a true angel to me and I will be forever grateful for his support and kindness.

Owner is amazing as well as entire staff. Everyone there always has the best attitude and willing to go above and beyond for your child. My daughter has made such great progress and only continues to with their help. Personally believe from going to other facilities they are the best of the best!!

I highly recommend Homegrown Therapy of SWFL for therapy for your child!!!

Janielle is very skilled in her field and goes above and beyond to help her clients. My daughter has been working with Ms. Damaris for awhile and she is so patient and knowledgeable! My daughter has come a long way since she began OT. We are grateful for the opportunity this therapy has provided her. We did ADOS testing there also and they made the process simple. I recommend them for that service as well.

Janielle and her team are awesome. My son was initially evaluated by Janielle, the owner. She listed to any concerns I had and right away noticed more things than his pediatrician did before. She guided me into the right direction. My son has been seeing Amanda and Lissette for the last 7 months and they are both wonderful. It‚Äôs his highlight of the day to come to therapy. He made such a big progress and we finally figured out the underlying cause of his issues thanks to the amazing team of HomeGrown Therapy. Whenever I have a question they take the time to listen to me, and if they don‚Äôt have the answer right away they do some research and try their best help us.

My son EC has been having occupational therapy with this company for about 3 years now. The therapists are dedicated and strive for ways to help the children accomplish their goals. My son‚Äôs therapist Ms. Patty gives suggestions to continue to help my child accomplish his goals. He has bonded with Ms. Patty and she is one of the best therapists my son has had. She goes above and beyond and I have seen massive improvement. Lastly my son loves the new establishment Janelle has done a wonderful job in making the place beautiful, fun, and sensory friendly.

Amazing Occupational Therapy - Huge Improvement for My Daughter!
We've been bringing our daughter here for occupational therapy for about 9 months now, and we're so impressed with the results! The staff is absolutely wonderful - warm, welcoming, and incredibly patient with the our daughter. They create a positive and fun environment that makes therapy sessions enjoyable for my daughter.

Most importantly, we've seen a huge improvement in her fine motor skills, her ability to focus in school, and her sensory processing. The therapists are very knowledgeable and work closely with us to develop a personalized plan that addresses our daughter's specific needs.

The facility itself is also top-notch - clean, well-organized, and with plenty of space for the kids to work on their goals. We highly recommend this occupational therapy practice!

Honor helped me with my neck/shoulder my hip alignment as well as my foot after a bunion operation. She is top notch, quick, and has a plan, and really corrects the whole body. She does all of that in one hour!!  Amazing.  She likes to keep active people active, she is very good with mobs, manual therapy, as well as needles - she always finds the knots!!  Thanks Honor for all your help.

I saw Honor for plantar fasciitis on my right foot. Thankfully she is my friend and saw me walking my dogs with a boot. I had tried absolutely everything to treat the issue myself. It never occurred to me to see a PT until she asked why I was wearing a boot. She was very knowledgeable on a treatment plan she could implement to give me relief. She was very flexible with my schedule and we began treatment very quickly. As a Jazzercise instructor, it was very important to me to get the issue resolved. Without Honor, I know I‚Äôd still be struggling with pain. Now, I can teach and live without pain.

I had a severe Frozen Shoulder for several months, it was so bad that it effected my sleep, my daily activities and even my mood. I didn't want to have a surgery. Someone highly recommended a physical therapist, Honor Murphy. After her treatments, Now I feel great, I can do daily activies, I can sleep without pain. That's a big, big deal! She really cares her patients and tries her best to help patients. She is a successful PT. I would highly recommend her to family, friends and anyone who needs PT.

Honor Murphy has been hands down the best physical therapist I've ever used.  I'm a Journeyman Lineman by trade and run my own business on the side and I'm super active and always working.  I originally went through my normal channels of physical therapy through places I've used before.  I had a ACL repair on my knee for a second time (about 8-10 years in between surgeries).  I went to other physical therapy company and I always felt they weren't pushing me as they should.  Well insurance decided to not cover visits anymore and I couldn't pay out of pocket to continue my therapy at that facility.

Honor was recommended from my orthopedic surgeon and I wish I would have had her from the first surgery.  Not only was I able to cover my visits myself, but the entire time she is focused on your rehabilitation in a one on one setting, not 4 patients to one person.  She was also the only person to actually ask me what I do for work and the processes and physical procedures my body gets put through and tailored my exercises to strengthen those key areas.  Honor got me whipped back into shape so I could get back to work and providing for my family.  I am forever grateful we crossed paths and feel much better about this second knee repair.  You will not go wrong using Honor for physical therapy.

Honor helped rehabilitate my left ankle post surgery done to remove and repair parts of a torn ligament.  Surgery alone would have mechanically repaired the ligament, but Honor's therapy enabled the healing process of my foot, ankle, and leg to be complete.  During her treatment, she also worked to strengthening my foot and leg, due to the loss of muscle and flexibility, along with addressing the strain on other systems that comes with lengthy recovery times. My ability to use my left leg, or foot, and the ease of the strain on my right leg would not be complete without Honor's care during my recovery from surgery.  Honor demonstrates great skill and applied knowledge to any injury or rehabilitation.  She is widely experienced and highly competent in her understanding of how our bodies work as a whole.  She offers physical therapy along with instruction and understanding, facilitating not only recovery from injury, but also strengthening to alleviate the underlying causes.  She truly wants to see everyone 'Get Back Out There' and live life to the fullest. And I am truly grateful.

My son KJ has been attending Hope Haven since his early elementary years. He turns 18 next month so we‚Äôve been using their services for a very long time. Our son has attended summer camp, career camp, after school care, and has even utilized grief and behavioral therapy services from Hope Haven. Hope Haven has been such a sense of hope in our son‚Äôs life and they have truly felt like family. I can‚Äôt thank them enough for the resources and services that they offer and how much it has made our lives a lot easier. Mrs. Q and many of the staff there go above and beyond so we can‚Äôt express our gratitude enough. We thank this place for all that they do.

The instructor was phenomenal! He did a wonderful job teaching all the major points while keeping the class entertained and lighthearted. If you are reading this, I did fly to L.A. to go to a PopMart store to buy a Labubu for my daughter!

Spoke w ms. Joanna at the front desk. Absolutely THE BEST customer service experience. I've worked in customer service for 15yr and I'll tell u, it's not always easy. But Ms brown handled it with ease! She was patient, very helpful, walked me thru every step til we got it right. As I wanted to shut down and call back due to my frustration she continues with a professional yet caring demeanor and she most definitely deserves a 5 STAR!!! *****.

We had an outstanding experience with Dr. Allison Cato, Director of Clinical Services and Neuropsychologist at Hope Haven. My son has ADHD, diagnosed by his pediatrician, and already has an IEP in his private school. However, we were advised to pursue psychoeducational testing to rule out other areas needing support. While county-provided testing was an option, the process seemed lengthy and overwhelming, so we decided to pay out of pocket to expedite the evaluation, even though our insurance didn‚Äôt cover it.
After weeks of searching with no success, we discovered Hope Haven and were thrilled they had availability within a short timeframe. Taking a leap of faith without much prior knowledge of the facility, we scheduled an evaluation‚Äîand I‚Äôm so glad we did!
Dr. Cato was professional, thorough, and incredibly kind throughout the entire process. She quickly put us at ease, explaining every step clearly and ensuring we felt supported. The neurocognitive evaluation was comprehensive, and we received a confidential report that provided invaluable insights into my son‚Äôs needs.
A special mention goes to Lauren, who administered the testing. My son absolutely adored her! She made the process fun and engaging, creating a comfortable environment that allowed him to do his best. Her warmth and positivity made a lasting impression on both of us.
Thanks to Dr. Cato, Lauren, and the entire team at Hope Haven, we now have a clear understanding of how to best support our son‚Äôs academic and emotional growth. I highly recommend Dr. Cato and her team to anyone searching for expert guidance and compassionate care during what can feel like an overwhelming process. Hope Haven truly exceeded our expectations!
Staff are knowledgeable and caring. Hope Haven is such a great resource for families in Northeast Florida.

I've just had my 2nd appointment here and I absolutely love this place. The staff is incredible, Doctor Hope is awesome and you can tell he actually cares because he doesn't rush through the visit at all. The treatment modalities I have done so far leave me feeling better that day than when I arrived. I've never been taken such good care of by a doctor or medical staff before this. 5 stars all around! I know that when my treatment is completed I'm actually going to feel better.

Having only been there a few times I've always been greeted with open arms, calm demeanors and smiling faces. Massage therapy has been truly anointed. The facility is equipped with all kinds of equipment. Even the floors are padded for comfort. And Dr Andrew hope overseeing all this and his capabilities are astounding.

Dr. Ashley Solomon is outstanding! Hope Health made me and my parents feel very welcomed. Not only that but also genuinely care about helping all of us with our health. Ashley's knowledge and the way she explained everything helped us feel comfortable and confident about helping us. I highly recommend Hope Health to any one that is truly seeking healthcare the way it was meant to be not just another number but real care from people that truly care.

reviewer_name: Gail at the Pet Au Pair, LLC
review_text:
Going to start treatment with this very credentialed doctor.
Referred by a friend who has had excellent recovery.
The doctor listened carefully and understood my physical and diagnosed issues.
Looking forward to my appt. Next week

Dr Ashley has a unique treatment plan. Her attention to detail is remarkable! She takes time to explain and to teach. I received more relief from her care and treatment than I have ever received in 50 years of chiropractic treatment. Expect results. She is the best!

Marina has a wealth of knowledge and always listens to whatever problems are presented to her. She focuses your session solely on you to really understand your perspective and offers insightful suggestions. Marina is so easy to talk to and never judges what I say or where I am coming from. I am so very glad I started seeing Marina.

It is almost always hard to take the first step towards wellness, especially when one anticipates lots and lots of work required to get to place of happiness, however Marina has power of making one‚Äôs life easier with just one simple advice. I still follow same advice she told me once and it still helps me to have a better outlook on life and people in it.

She has years and years of experience helping people to get back onto their feet. She will improve your life, I can almost guarantee it.
Love Marina!! I‚Äôm always looking forward seeing her. She knows what she is doing! She is a great therapist, I‚Äôll be forever thankful for her help. Highly recommend!

If you are looking for Therapist, Marina Skane knows what she is doing. She is very phenomenal and very professional. Thank you for being the vessel that God use you to be and for that do appreciate it you.
Marina Skane is a very insightful and very helpful.

Dr. Gisel and her team are wonderful !! This felt unlike any other vet experience. It‚Äôs clean and the exam rooms are made to feel comfy and like home ! I love that you can be in the exam room with your pet and be involved in the care. I could tell our dog felt super comfortable and loved by all of the staff. The extra love and treats was a plus too

Additionally, the staff is super accommodating and sweet. My dad uses a walker to ambulate and they always held out the door for him and made us feel welcomed. There is disability accessible parking readily available.  The vet techs and Dr. Gisel are VERY knowledgeable and break down things and truly care about every pet that walks Into their facility.

My father and I are happy to have found this extraordinary vet office !!! We would recommend them to anyone in a heartbeat.

And additionally they even gave her the cutest little toy :)

Dr Gisel and her staff are incredibly nice and caring. The Veterinary Hospital is impressively neat and clean. I have owned dogs my entire life. After many recommendations for my new puppy, I chose Hope and Love. A perfect choice!

The staff is definitively kind, welcoming and professional ! After doing research we decided to give them a try, although the other end of the county it didn't matter after the first visit, we were most impressed.
Dr Gesil is kind compassionate, informative, a Dr we believe we can fully trust.
An immaculate facility as well.
Grateful to have found them.

The entire staff from the scheduling to the Dr are all so engaging and helpful. Everything is explained before any treatment is done. I think the most important part is being able to be in the room with my kitties when being examined.
You can tell they all have soft spots for our animals. I'm glad I found them. I definitely recommend Hope and Love

Our dog's ear was bothering him like crazy over the holiday and as we have recently moved here AND just paid rent and didn't have a vet in the area yet, we were praying to find one that wouldn't break the bank. Out of sheer luck we found the Hope and Love clinic and we are so glad we did. The rates are affordable and they go over the costs of everything with you as they go. AND, they are all awesome people, from the front desk to the care providers. Couldn't be any happier with the care provided there. We have already made an appointment to take both of our babies back for their shots. Finding a really good clinic to entrust our puppies to was a massive and stressful priority. What a comforting relief it is to check that off of our list. Thank you!

I truly love this company  for ASD kids especially the little ones. This was my family‚Äôs first introduction to ABA and our overall experience was very positive. From being diagnosed to receiving care for our son right at age 2 we felt heard, respected and our child was cared for with such love and gentleness. Minus a few minor hiccups our overall experience was great! My son‚Äôs former BCBA Kiley was a god send. She always supported us, kept me focus on my son‚Äôs needs while helping me to better understand how to implement things at home to help reinforce therapy. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better person to entrust my child with. If you‚Äôre looking for a ABA facility in the leon county area look no further. In general hopebridge is one of the few good places out there that actually cares about each child they encounter. We loved it so much that our son is going to hopebridge very soon in Brandon Fl. I truly have seen my son become a happier little boy right before my eyes with the help of receiving ABA at hopebridge. I always refer families there and will continue to do so. I truly appreciate all of the staff in Tallahassee hopebridge for loving my son and supporting our family while we learned to navigate our new normal as ASD parents. I cannot express enough how hopebridge truly is a wonderful place for ASD children.

The staff are very friendly and welcoming as well as professional. I was very apprehensive due to my son being non verbal but once we met with staff and completed the evaluation I was excited and eager for my son to get started. Today is his first day and they have already sent an update on my sons progress and activities

My son has been going here for a year now, they are miracle workers and the change you see in your child is almost magical. He went from hurting himself and others and having meltdowns daily, to him giving hugs, eating, picking up his toys when finished playing.

My son went to this therapy center for aba and the facility was not set up in any way. And I told them 3 times even the head of hopebridge saying I did not want my son in therapy threw hopebridge.  And they did not listen and billed my insurance a month later for services my son hasn't received and I didn't sign anything to start him or anything to begin the process of therapy threw them and denied insurance. I don't recommend this facility for anyone for aba therapy or anything.
Unorganized and unprofessional place to send your kid for ABA therapy. I would recommend going somewhere less concerned about making money off your kid.
Very caring and considerate of our child's needs.  We are appreciative of all that they do.

Hopebridge autism therapy Fort Myers is a  safe and great place for your kids. I had been in different autism centers in Fort Myers, Cape Coral, and Miami, and this was the best center for autism. Kiddos are treated with love and care, they are the priority for the staff. The center is huge with plenty of rooms for different activities, and the most important is that parents notice the improvement in their child.
Place has some awesome people here in ft Myers we go. And my child is growing so much already. Her assistant and bcba are amazing like family

The work that they do at hopebridge is amazing. My daughter interacted so well with her one on one time. She even interacted with another kiddo and she never usually does that. They are very understanding and actually try to help parents better understand what to do at home to keep the progress going.
Was so scared to send my child. Seems crazy now she absolutely loves Sasha and Morgan few others that she's grown with Mon to Fri so glad she got this opportunity

Wonderful, caring, patient, passionate staff. My daughter runs in with excitement everyday. The staff help us to understand basic human stress responses and how it interferes with safety as well as develop a greater awareness of boundaries and what it means for our children to be safe. They teach our children how to appropriately match emotional reactions to the realities of situations. Hopebridge teaches parents and kids to take advantage of what we know about human nature so we can heal from injury, empower our communities, and prepare for the chaotic nature of change.  WE LOVE YOU GUYS!

Amazing Place! My grand daughter  didn't talk and since she started with my Favorite Rbt Emila she's talking,playing and showing Love. I Love this center and home service too. A plus that they opening a center in Winter Haven! God bless the staff!!
Amazing place‚Ä¶love the therapists and the owners of the company..so thrilled to have found this for my children
The Lakeland center is very welcoming, spacious and very well prepared for our children. The staff is always very kind and attentive.
Spectacular and the treatment is speechless, they are very human people‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

Rating them five stars but really they deserve 10 I haven't been there yet but I do say the attention and professionalism caring the receptionist provided describes what amazing place this is am so happy looking forward to bring my child on Thursday. Finally came to this amazing place today there's no words I could describe how bless I feel that my son is going to attend here walking in I ran into an amazing staff from the nurse to the providers and the establishment owner they provided so much interest Loving Care they asked questions that amaze me they show their really care and they're very passionate in what they do but the main thing they focus Is helping your child develop that amaze me so much especially my son with autism and epilepsy I know he will be safe around the staff they're very knowledgeable and as a parent that give me so much comfort thank you so much you guys deserve 100 Stars

Horizons Pediatrics is a place where we care for your kids like family. I couldn't imagine working anywhere else. The staff here take a personal interest in your child's growth and progress. Nothing makes up happier to see these kids meet their therapy goals and leave this place smiling.

Amazing place!
Very clean and organized. The staff is wonderful.
Best wishes to them in the future.
The staff are so nice I really recommend this place

A special place to have children with nursing care. I have friends who have their children there, and the care and attention they receive is incredible. I recommend that anyone who needs these services for their children come and apply. It will be the best decision.

Excellente experience with Yelitza and Paola Speech Therapy. Try to do the best for my little one in order to achieve all the expectations or goals. A lot of patience and dedication with my child improvement. 100% recommended!

My daughter started with Yelitza in July of 2024 at the age of 4. We used her services while on vacation for only a month while in Florida. By the end of her therapy, my daughter had great improvements in sounding out her letters and pronouncing words she had difficulty with. Yelitza also has incredible patience during her sessions!!! Glad we chose her to help our daughter!

I‚Äôm so happy my daughters had Yelitza! My oldest daughter was diagnosed with apraxia of speech and received services with Yelitza. She felt like part of the family with how patient and caring she was. We didn‚Äôt hesitate to contact her for our youngest who after a couple of services was able to pronounce letters she was having difficulty with. We are very appreciative and strongly recommend her.
Yelitza Ruiz is an excellent speech therapist. From her first visit I could see improvement on my son. He really enjoys his sessions with her. She is very professional and always on time.

I‚Äôm so happy I found this company! My son has had plenty of speech therapist throughout the years, due to his Autism and attention deficit he has always struggled with speech therapy. Yelitza has been the best, so patient, caring and super professional. I can‚Äôt thank her enough :)

I love it here i been volunteering here for i dont remember how many years but a long time and i been riding. mrs.Jen is amazing very nice and caring. this is my farm family i love it. the horses are sweet and amazing.

My son has Down Syndrome.  I cannot even begin to express the good Horse Sense and Sensitivity has done for him.  It has helped him in every area of his life.  The volunteers are amazing and so full of love.  I 100% recommend Horse Sense and Sensitivity to anyone who has a child or adult with special needs.

The equine therapy is run by loving, caring folks who provide exceptional developmental exercises and encouragement for their clients.
Rescue horses are given jobs if capable and all enjoy grazing and living their best lives.
What a lovely setting! The horses are beautiful! Great manager too. Very nice place with such a peaceful feeling to it üòÅ
Beautiful horse farm set among the live oaks where they offer hippotherapy provided by very caring professionals.

provider_name: Horse Tales Ranch where "Every Horse has a Tale to be Told"
review_text:
A great experience all around!
The environment is warm and welcoming. I felt comfortable with all those we met, including the horses.

We reserved a 2 hour ride which did not disappoint, it was fun going around to different areas all the while chatting with our guide. Only thing I will say... if you're not used to riding, it's gonna be uncomfortable to sit down after. Well worth it though!

Thank you Horse Tales Ranch for a lovely experience.

provider_name: Horse Tales Ranch where "Every Horse has a Tale to be Told"
review_text: The horses on this ranch are beautiful,  well kept and get shown a lot of love. Norman was very helpful. We rode Daisy and Yolanda who happened to be mother and daughter. The trail ride was lengthy and peaceful. Will def go back. Totally worth it, a MUST GO!!

provider_name: Horse Tales Ranch where "Every Horse has a Tale to be Told"
review_text: This is the place to go horseback riding. All levels. I go there every other weekend with my friends and it is just such a loving place.

provider_name: Horse Tales Ranch where "Every Horse has a Tale to be Told"
review_text: We booked a trail ride last weekend, and couldn't have been happier with the experience provided! The horses were absolutely fantastic, clearly very well trained and very well loved. Our guide, Gaby, was wonderful, and we thoroughly enjoyed our time spent with her. Can't recommend this ranch enough and very much looking forward to coming back.

provider_name: Horse Tales Ranch where "Every Horse has a Tale to be Told"
review_text: Beautiful little farm with many healthy & pretty horses plus stables for boarding. The trail ride was outstanding, lush landscapes right in the middle of Davie. Loved my horse she was so sweet and the guides were very knowledgeable! Thank you for relaxing day.
Excellent
What a wonderful place to enjoy your day with the kids. They will meet different animals and have fun for sure. I recommend it a lot

We took our 14 month old here today and it was a truly magical experience for her!  This place is amazing. The volunteers were all very kind and helpful.  The animals all looked happy and healthy.  It is way bigger than we thought it would be which really helped accommodate a crowd.  The parking lot was pretty full but parking was a breeze and once inside you‚Äôd never guess there was so many people there.  We will be back and will most likely be purchasing year passes it is well worth it!

Hands down the best part of our trip to Florida. The enclosures are all very well maintained and the animals live a great life that they are unable to live outside because they are rescue animals that are not able to be released. I would recommend anybody to visit this place. If you have kids this is THE perfect place to bring them for a day.

Shoutout to HP4K. I‚Äôm a regular at this establishment, as I bring the kids I nanny every so often & every visitor from out of State, & it ends up being their favorite part about the itinerary. All age groups will enjoy the farm. I truly love how close-up the interactions with the animals are, especially as an animal lover) & love capturing their personalities on camera! This place is far better than any zoo. Don‚Äôt wait to experience the magic for yourself!

Next goal: Capybara experience! I have family coming into town after summer ends & hope to treat them to it. ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

This is our second time here and it has been a few years. The kids loved the play areas and slides, we rode the train and saw all the baby goats üòçü•∞. There were more things to see this time around like baby goats, guinea pigs, and peacocks üòç

provider_name: Horses for Handicapped Foundation of Pinellas County
review_text: I truly appreciate the mission of this place and the care provided to the animals‚Äîit‚Äôs a great organization overall. However, I‚Äôm disappointed by the behavior of one staff member, Jennifer, who consistently speaks to volunteers‚Äîespecially kids‚Äîin a very rude and unkind manner. Her communication style is discouraging and makes it uncomfortable for those who are genuinely there to help. I believe this role requires someone who can lead with patience and encouragement, particularly when working with young volunteers. I hope the organization takes this feedback seriously, as it could improve both the experience for volunteers and the support for the animals.

provider_name: Horses for Handicapped Foundation of Pinellas County
review_text: An amazing therapy program every Saturday during the school year using horses to connect with children with unique needs. The program is run by very skilled and dedicated volunteers. Children wanting to participate must register.

provider_name: Horses for Handicapped Foundation of Pinellas County
review_text: I volunteered to help with gardening.  It was terrific contributing for such a loving , helpful organization. Snakey has such genuine concern , you can sense  her passion for helping people and is truly devoted to her work!

provider_name: Horses for Handicapped Foundation of Pinellas County
review_text: This place has free compost a little horse stable tucked away in Seminole please respect their gate policy if you go there

provider_name: Horses for Handicapped Foundation of Pinellas County
review_text: We went to get "free" horse manure for our community garden.  It's peaceful, and the horses are magnificent animal.

Dr. Michelle Blair is incredibly compassionate and truly listens. She creates a safe space where it feels easy to open up, and her guidance has made a huge difference in my mental health journey. I‚Äôm so grateful for her support and highly recommend her to anyone seeking a caring psychiatrist.

I feel so fortunate to have found Michelle Blair!
She is very sweet & kind, compassionate & intelligent & GENUINELY CARES! She has a gentleness about her that is soothing & loving.
Michelle has made a HUGE impact on my recovery! I felt HOPELESS for YEARS!
EVERY SINGLE DAY was a struggle.
I was in pain. Or numb. Depression was my norm.
But with Michelle's help my depression has lifted & my world has become joyful! I‚Äôm HAPPY again & GLAD to be alive! What a wonderful feeling!
Thank you Michelle! You are such a GIFT!!!
Dr Blair is excellent! I highly recommend her, she has helped me turn my life around & I feel wonderful. It‚Äôs great to have a Dr who really listens & truly cares!

I have been seeing Michelle for over a year now and she is absolutely amazing! She makes you feel comfortable, doesn‚Äôt judge you and I feel like I can be completely open and honest with her! She truly cares for her patients, I would recommend her to everyone! She also has a great team working with her, and Neil is amazing as well and is always there to help you with any questions or concerns and is always pleasant to talk to. If I could give them 100 stars I would! üíñ‚ú®

Ms. Blair is Professional and truly cares for her Patients. Her staff ( especially Alfonso) doesn't miss a Beat. I highly recommend her.
Unfortunately we're moving but we wanted to say Thank you for helping me take care of me.
Best Wishes

provider_name: Howl Nation Boutique Dog Hotel & Grooming
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Howl Nation! From the moment I walked in, the staff made me and my pup feel welcome and cared for. The place is spotless, beautifully designed, and clearly run by people who genuinely love dogs.

They took amazing care of my dog during both boarding and grooming. He came back happy, clean, and smelling great! I also love the personal attention and constant updates they provide.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place where your dog will be treated like family, this is it. Highly recommend!

provider_name: Howl Nation Boutique Dog Hotel & Grooming
review_text: Just boarded my 5 year old 70 pound Pit mix, Benny, there for the holiday weekend. They did a great evaluation on him at admit seeing how he reacted to people and their place. They also carefully evaluated him for socialization with other dogs. These things meant so much to me because it shows they truly care about each animal and about creating a safe space tailored to the comfort of each dog and owner. They sent me frequent updates including pictures and videos of Benny out on walks and playing in the yard with other dogs as well as solo time with a handler/caretaker. My only complaint is that they aren‚Äôt in my home state of Tennessee! These guys truly care. Top notch! Thank you so very much for taking such great care of my baby!!

provider_name: Howl Nation Boutique Dog Hotel & Grooming
review_text:
They are great! I left my dog for 5 days and they took such good care of him. A lot of walks per day, and always keeping me updated.
Thank you

provider_name: Howl Nation Boutique Dog Hotel & Grooming
review_text:
Howl Nation Boutique Dog Hotel & Grooming has been absolutely amazing! Not only do they offer pet boarding, but they also provided outstanding care for our pets right at home. It gave us such peace of mind knowing that our pets were loved, walked, and cared for by a team we completely trust.

Their daily visits and walks were done with so much attention and affection ‚Äî our pets were happy, relaxed, and well looked after. The communication was fantastic, with regular updates and photos that really made us feel connected even when we were away. Highly, highly recommend them for both hotel stays and in-home care!

provider_name: Howl Nation Boutique Dog Hotel & Grooming
review_text: My dog ‚Äã‚Äãwas terrified of mobile grooming, so 2 years ago I took him to Adriana's and it was a real experience of fun and joy for him. I leave him knowing that he will be treated like at home and that is worth everything. An excellent service where your dogs are the ones who are pampered. Love her!

Very pet friendly! Safety for the animals has been well thought out in their design of the facility. Our dachshund is 2 years old and loves going the 3 days per week. We love it because we can also board her at the same facility with no anxiety for us or our beloved pet. The best pet care we have ever seen!

We absolutely love Hudson K9 Emporium. We have been leaving our puppy Remy with them for 8 months now anytime we go away. Whether it‚Äôs a long trip or just an overnight they take the most amazing care of our baby. The first time we left him was when he was only 4 months old and we were so nervous as first time dog parents to leave him. They were extremely patient with all our questions and ensured he would be under the best care. Remy now get very excited every time we pull in the parking lot and gets so excited to see all the staff( especially Sam and Spencer) . We could ask for a better kennel for our baby‚ù§Ô∏è The staff is so incredible and I could ask for anyone better to leave Remy with when we aren‚Äôt home.

Hudson K-9 Emporium is a Great place to take your dogs.  I have one dog in daycare - he can't wait to jump out of the car as soon as we arrive.  He clearly enjoys his play days.  I also use their boarding services for both dogs - they are well cared for, and I feel good about leaving them in their care.

I've wanted to try their facility since they opened.  Our other kennel closed down and we planned an unexpected trip out of town.  They do require for boarding that you pay for a night and leave animals there (overnight) to make sure they will not have any issues with your pet(s).  Being that I ran a kennel for 4 yrs in the past I thought this was a great idea.  Porter our oldest has a bad back leg that never healed properly from his first owner as a puppy. They made an exception for him to have his bed.  Because of this when I picked up he was not lame or sore.  I'm greatful for that.  As for our shepard/x Roxie and our youngest Nugget the Golden Retriever they could care less if laying on cement or outside in the dirt.  I'm really glad we are now able to bring them where we can trust the staff and the fact that Roxie whose shy over meeting men did excellent when a man employee came out to get her when we returned for our initial trip.  That not only impressed me but made me feel so much at ease.  Last thing I would want is any of our dogs biting anyone out of fear. They are reasonable priced and we felt very safe leaving them there.  Especially since they have triple fencing outside.  Thank you again to all the staff at K-9 Emporium
**PS they are all resting now after their vacation too.....

I have been bringing my dog Remi to K9 Emporium for about 2 years now,  to day care and boarding when we are away.  He loves going!  He starts jumping around and crying in the car to get out when he sees us pulling in,  so I know he has a lot of fun there while we are at work!   The owners and all the staff are always very nice and are always happy to see my buddy!   He is so loved by us,  so I wouldn‚Äôt bring him anywhere I felt he would not be loved and taken care of.  I definitely feel safe leaving him in the care of K9 Emporium.

I‚Äôve had Fiona for about 6 months now and she is the sweetest, kindest little best friend I could ask for. The adoption process was super smooth, and every single person who works there was so kind and helpful. I‚Äôm truly so thankful I was able to adopt her she a great girl :)

I adopted a cat yesterday. And she was a friendly but shy, amazing kitty. Before they will release cat to you, they spay them. , One day after I adopted her I received a call that she died from the anesthesia given during her spay.

Who thought that it was a good idea to spay a 10 week old cat who weighs 2.6 pounds, And  how Inexpensive and inexperienced are the veterinarians they use for the surgery?

They killed Irresponsible for killing can‚Äôt like completely fell in love with just the other day, already adopted, Due to their incompetence or cost-cutting on veterinary care.

Died from the anesthesia. That is not OK if you do adopt a pet a puppy or a kitten, just know you might never be able to take him or her home. That was her yesterday, and she was perfect. Just let her grow up a bit before spaying  her and giving her anesthesia.

These people have no experience. I hope they are closed. I will contact groups Who might possibly be able to shut this place down.

The Humane Society of Broward was a very clean and well run facility. The 2 older ladies helping in front and with the store are kind and helpful. They all make pet adoption a breeze.  Love my dog, was Naveen, now called TREASURE!
We adopted Justin this week. He‚Äôs been a great fit for us so far. The facility was clean, and the staff was helpful. They had a discount for military veterans so that was great too.

08/23/2025 These are the nicest most compassionate people there on Griffin Rd.  We had to put our beloved cat Hershey-Mocha down üò• and the staff was so supportive and loving.  They really respected my pet and what was happening.  They let me send her back with the blanket we shared at night. They understood it might comfort her during her last breaths. They don't allow you to go in with your pet but it only took a few minutes and the nurse was back at the front to let me know that our cat passed peacefully.  It was only $75 which made it possible for me to help my cat go painlessly. It really means a lot to me to have the Humane Society of Broward County and their end of life services.

Highly recommend! Great staff of veterinary medical professionals who welcomed us for our first visit. Kind, caring and patient as well as very efficient. The facilities were roomy, clean and comfortable. We are so happy we found Humberstone Animal Hospital!  Prices are reasonable for the area and there are always appointments available when we need them. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a vet in Estero. Thank you Dr. Hernandez and Dr. Erika.

I had such a wonderful experience at Humberstone! Dr. Erika was incredibly kind, patient, and understanding. She took the time to listen to all of my concerns and made sure my baby felt safe and cared for.  It‚Äôs rare to find someone so compassionate and gentle. I‚Äôm very grateful for the care we received and I look forward to seeing Dr. Erika again!!

Absolutely LOVE this place! Dr. Erika and Dr. Hernandez both are amazing and I wouldn‚Äôt want my fur babies to be seen anywhere else. I was extremely happy to see that there was a pricing difference from our last visit which worked in my bank accounts favor! The entire staff is always friendly and always makes us feel like we‚Äôre a part of the family.
Our visit today was a great experience. The staff were friendly and we did not have a long wait time. The Dr and staff attended to our puppy adequately.

Dr.Erika and Dr.Hernandez are two of the most knowledgeable and caring veterinarians I have ever met. They treat their patients like family and always provide the highest standard of care possible. The technicians are also extremely caring and compassionate, clearly a great team. Highly recommend this practice to anyone that wants their fur babies to be well taken care of!

I have recently arrived home after spending a fantastic week with Dr Yaron Seidman at his retreat in Boca Raton.  From beginning each day with Qiqong on the beach and a swim in the lovely and warm Atlantic Ocean to the great variety of different treatments I enjoyed at the Spa (The Intelligent Massage Bed, Salt Therapy, Red Light Therapy and the Hunyuan Vibroacoustic Therapy, to name but a few), it was a thoroughly enjoyable and recuperative experience.  Dr Seidman is the perfect host and I would thoroughly recommend the Total Recharge Retreat to anyone who is in need of improving their well-being.

Dear Yaron Seidman,

I hope this letter finds you in good health and high spirits. I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for the incredible wellness center you have created. Boca has truly been blessed with a remarkable establishment that promotes healing, well-being, and affordable wellness options.

From the moment I stepped into your wellness center, I was immediately captivated by the positive energy that permeated the space. The welcoming atmosphere and warm hospitality extended by your staff made me feel instantly at ease and eager to embark on my wellness journey. The genuine care and attention they provide to each visitor truly sets your center apart.

One aspect that impressed me greatly was the vast variety of wellness options available. From Chinese medicine and meditation rooms that include sound therapy to therapeutic massages and holistic treatments, your center offers a comprehensive range of services that cater to every individual's unique needs. The diversity of practices and practitioners ensures that there is something for everyone, making it a true haven for those seeking rejuvenation and healing.

What truly sets your wellness center apart is the affordability and accessibility you have managed to maintain without compromising on quality. It is rare to find a wellness center that offers such high-caliber services at such reasonable prices. Your commitment to making wellness accessible to all is truly commendable and appreciated by the community.

I am grateful to have discovered your wellness center, as it has become a sanctuary for me. The positive energy, the welcoming atmosphere, and the affordable options have made it a place I can return to time and time again to nourish my mind, body, and soul. Thanks to your center, I have found a haven where I can prioritize my well-being without breaking the bank.

Once again, I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to you, Yaron Seidman, for creating such an incredible wellness center in Boca. Your dedication to providing a space that promotes healing, offers a variety of wellness options, and remains affordable and welcoming is truly remarkable. You have positively impacted the lives of many in our community, and for that, we are eternally grateful.

With sincere appreciation,

Erez Hevroni

Dr. Seidman is a total professional and has the latest technology. The massage bed was better than half of the real in person massages I‚Äôve had and the best electronic massage ever. It got to places no one has ever been able to work on for my sciatic pain.
Will definitely be back.

I recently visit Hunyuan Life Spa and I enjoyed it so much.
I had the red light therapy with near-infrared and the oriental hot stone therapy.
The herbal tea at the waterfall room was so calm and relaxing. They also offer vibroacustic therapy, acupuncture, massage, salt bath, etc.. using the latest technology. I would definitely come back.

Yaron Seidman is a gifted healer and teacher. Not only has he helped me a great deal with herbal treatments and acupuncture, but he also taught me a lot about healing on an emotional level as well. He is always available with questions and concerns, and has a ton of experience. I can only recommend him 100 %. Whoever goes to him, is in good hands.

I am deeply disappointed with this company's lack of genuine care and commitment towards helping children, particularly kids with autism. From my experience, they show little to no effort in supporting or improving the lives of these children.
It feels like they do not prioritize the well-being or future development of kids who need help the most.
Furthermore, I have observed a reluctance to challenge or innovate to better serve children with special needs, which is disheartening. Every child deserves compassion, support, and opportunities to thrive, and it's very disappointing to see a company fall short in this vital area.
I sincerely hope that the management recognizes these issues and takes meaningful steps to improve their approach, focus on children's welfare, and genuinely contribute toward making a positive difference in their lives.

I've had the privilege of working in a variety of settings within the neurodivergent community, and I can genuinely say that I Rock Behavior is one of the most exceptional companies I've encountered. The entire team is incredibly supportive, creating an environment where both families and staff feel encouraged and empowered. Their programs ensure that early intervention is not only smooth but enriching, making each milestone feel both attainable and meaningful.

What truly set I Rock Behavior apart for me was the deep involvement of the supervisors, who always found fun, creative ways to guide me into my sessions, making the experience both engaging and fulfilling. But what really touches my heart is the founder's role. She is not only highly knowledgeable but also incredibly compassionate and dedicated to seeing clients achieve their goals. Watching families and clients grow and succeed under her care has been truly heartwarming.

I Rock Behavior operates with unwavering integrity and passion, and it has been an absolute honor to be a part of such a wonderful team. I highly recommend them to anyone seeking thoughtful, professional care.

I highly recommend I Rock Behavior for ABA therapy. Malena, the agency director, is extremely knowledgeable and experienced. She was able to create a behavior program for my daughter that was specifically tailored to her unique needs. Our RBT was exceptional. She was reliable, patient, and extremely flexible, even when my daughter‚Äôs programming required frequent community outings, for social skills instruction. My daughter has been with the I Rock Behavior for a year now, and she has made huge improvements. Not only is she gaining confidence and independence, but the way our entire family relates and interacts with one another has become much easier and more enjoyable.

What sets I Rock Behavior apart is their meticulous approach to individualized care. Each child's journey is treated with the utmost respect and attention, ensuring that their unique needs and potential are recognized and nurtured. The staff, with their unparalleled expertise and genuine compassion, create an environment where children feel not only supported but truly understood. Their toilet training program is phenomenal. Their practices have consistently yielded remarkable progress. I‚Äôve been with the company for 6 years and my son has made tremendous progress, and continues to thrive.

As a mom of a child inside the Autism Spectrum Disorder, who received behavior therapy service from I Rock Behavior back in 2017-2018, I can only say nothing but the best. At I-Rock Behavior you will find not only experience, professionalism and excellence, but a great human being who will compromise and support you and your little one all the way. THANKS Malena for all the plans, games, ideas and strategies you came out with, for all your support and advises when our life felt like crumbling down. I will always recommend you 200 % and I hope when I post this review, parents and families that are out there struggling with a child who has been diagnosed with any kind of developmental delay, know there is always HOPE for BETTER.

We are long overdue in writing this review, but that just goes to show how incredibly grateful we are for everything this amazing team has done for our son, Jack!
The owner, Mr. Eric, truly has a magic wand. It feels like there‚Äôs nothing he can‚Äôt help your child with. Our son absolutely adores him! As Jack‚Äôs OT, Mr. Eric brings such energy, creativity, and kindness to every session. His ability to connect with our son and help him grow is something we deeply appreciate.
Our son also works with the amazingly wonderful Ms. Cheyenne and the phenomenal Ms. Heather for speech therapy. Ms. Cheyenne has such a warm, positive energy that makes Jack light up every time he sees her. Her dedication and patience are unmatched, and her sessions are both engaging and effective. Ms. Heather is equally fantastic, kind, skilled, and so in tune with Jack‚Äôs needs. And we can't forget Ms. Cheryl, the clinic coordinator, she is truly the best! She‚Äôs so kind, organized, and always goes above and beyond to help with scheduling, communication, and making everything run smoothly. She makes the entire experience feel so welcoming and stress-free.
One of the things we appreciate most is how every therapist takes the time to go over session details with us and share helpful tips for home. They recognize that as parents, we spend the most time with our kids, and they empower us to be active partners in our kid's progress. Everyone at this clinic is not only talented but truly passionate about what they do.  We feel incredibly lucky to be part of such a caring and skilled team. Thank you, Mr. Eric, Ms. Cheyenne, Ms. Heather, and the whole crew because you‚Äôre all simply the best!

My daughter has been going here for therapy for over 2 years. She absolutely loves going there and has made so much progress! If your child is in need SLP or OT then I highly recommend going to It's for kids for therapy.
Great therapists, professional office staff. I have been very impressed how well they handled their business during Covid 19. So helpful for my son.
Great therapists, office manager is very accommodating. Love this place.
Magdiel esta tonto
An inclusive preschool providing responsive care to all children. The teachers focus on the individual needs of every child. Lower ratios are maintained to ensure health and safety for children.

They've gone up in price twice this year and still do not provide food or drink. Also, I check my childs diaper everyday before he goes in to class and almost everyday his teacher specifically puts a note that he came in poopy. They've called about him "running a fever" and I get there and have them check again just for him to be not running a fever. I'm convinced his teacher doesn't want to deal with him so she tries to get him sent home. Same thing with diarrhea. Like he won't have any at home but then have multiple at school?!? The only reason he still there is so that he can get speech and ot across the parking lot.

Mrs. Tammy is the BEST therapist around!!  She is most loving lady with my 4 year old boy.  Tammy has been seeing my son for over 2 years now.  My son LOVES her and is ready to see her every week.  She loves her kids like they are her own! She has more patience than anyone I have seen!  I will use Tammy until my son no longer needs Occupational Therapy.

My daughter has been going to Progressive Pediatric Child Care since she was an infant. She just turned 3 years old and still loves to go to school!!! She has had wonderful and caring teachers every year. There is very low turnover...actually I don't think there was ever a change while she was in a class! My daughter also receives therapy during the school day which is very convenient. I have been very pleased and even though I haven't had any complaints I know my concerns would be taken seriously if I did. Even if I ask a question the staff makes sure my questions are answered to my satisfaction and that I have no concerns. They truly care about their children and families. One of my sons attended VPK at Progressive and loved it and also attends therapy. My other son attends The Learning Center, receives therapy and participates in other school events. Progressive is like family!!

Mrs. Tammy Mckenzie is such a positive person. Every time I see her she is very welcoming and has a smile on her face. Whenever I ask her how to handle certain behavior with my two year old daughter she always has great advice on how I should handle the situation I ask her about. The kids love her and she treats them as if they were her own children. The parents at the Daycare where I work always talk about the great experience their child has while they are in her care.

I‚Äôve had an amazing experience every time I visit this chiropractic clinic. Ginet, who handles the therapy sessions, is incredibly sweet and attentive ‚Äî she truly makes you feel cared for. Dr. Paola is also very kind and has helped me a lot with my back pain. They both go above and beyond to make sure you feel comfortable and supported. Every visit is a positive experience, and I always leave feeling better. Highly recommend!

Everyone at the office is incredibly kind and welcoming, the front desk staff is absolutely phenomenal! Dr. Ruggiano is beyond amazing. He‚Äôs helped relieve pain I‚Äôve been dealing with for years. I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!

Icon Medical is a great first step towards your health!  The facility is clean, calm, and relaxing. The chiropractor was able to address all of my questions of concern, and when it was time to leave, I was both hungry and relaxed at the same time!  The team communicated well with each other, and with the client.  I would highly recommend this facility to others who want to make their health a first priority!

I really love my weekly experience at Icon in Hollywood. It is clean, timely & efficient. The women staff are incredibly kind & genuine. As a woman I feel safe & cared for. Living with chronic illness I haven‚Äôt found complete healing from my pain, but Dr Paola does her best to give me all support & tools to give me some relief! I‚Äôm also so grateful for the lovely massage‚ÄîI feel downright pampered being their client!

I got very good therapy sessions at icon medical center, the therapist here worked on every area i had pain felt good after every session their facility is clean and office staff is polite and very professional.

I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results from Cali‚Äôs three-week training program! When I first signed her up, I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect‚Äîshe‚Äôs only a year old, full of energy, and still very much a puppy. But the transformation has been incredible. It truly feels like I have a brand new dog!

Cali now listens, responds to commands, and has a level of focus and self-control that I didn‚Äôt think was possible at this stage. Ariana was absolutely wonderful with her‚Äîso patient, professional, and caring. I could tell right away that she genuinely wanted Cali to succeed. She also took the time to work with us, showing us how to keep up the training at home so that Cali‚Äôs progress continues. Along the way, Ariana even sent me pictures and videos of Cali, which made me feel included and reassured about her progress. That extra support made such a difference.

It‚Äôs amazing to see how much more enjoyable everyday life is with Cali now‚Äîwalks are smoother, playtime is calmer, and overall she‚Äôs just happier and more confident. I am extremely satisfied with the outcome and so grateful to Ariana for the incredible transformation. If you‚Äôre looking for real results and someone who truly cares about your dog, Ariana is the one to go to!

ideal dog training is the place you want to take your pups! Arianna did an amazing job training our crazy, hyper, hard headed, stubborn 1 year old pit Diesel. he went in for the 3 weeks of training and came out so much better. i thought there was no way he could be trained but she changed my mind. he is back home and doing so good. im very grateful for Arianna putting her hard work into training him. THANK YOU YOUR A LIFE SAVER!!!

Ariana with Ideal Dog Training has been amazing in helping me train my puppy, Goldie! Her patience, expertise, and personalized approach made the process enjoyable and effective. Goldie has made incredible progress, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier. Highly recommend!

We have an extremely reactive hound, left her with Ideal for a week as a stay & train.

She came back a completely different dog. She had the same affection for us but also listened, didn't react aggressively towards any stimulus on walks, and understood how to settle. Couldn't recommend them more!

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Life-Changing Experience with Ariana @ Ideal Dog Training

Where do I even begin? Ariana is an absolute miracle worker. When we brought our Frenchie puppy home, he had serious aggression issues around food and certain toys. With three small kids in the house, I didn‚Äôt feel safe leaving him alone with them, terrified he might get possessive and lash out. We were heartbroken, thinking our only option might be to rehome him, until Ariana stepped in.
We enrolled him in obedient school at Ideal Dog Training, and she transformed him completely. I‚Äôm not exaggerating when I say he came back a different dog. He‚Äôs calm, obedient, gentle and the biggest shock of all, you can now reach right into his food bowl without losing a finger. That still amazes me every single day. Ariana didn‚Äôt just train our dog, she trained us too. She kept us updated with videos, pictures, and constant communication. Anytime I had a question, day or night, she responded immediately. Her love, patience, and true dedication to these dogs is undeniable, and the results speak for themselves.
I cannot say enough amazing things about Ariana and Ideal Dog Training. She took what felt like an impossible situation and gave us back not just our dog, but peace in our home. If you‚Äôre looking for a legit badass dog trainer, she is your girl 1000%.

I love the head PT here, Joe Millen! There's no one I trust more with my body. I'm a yoga instructor and have a lot of overuse injuries. He's helped me with my ribs, my back, my neck, my wrists, and my ankles. He helped me get rid of chronic headaches, too. He's always respectful when doing hands-on work and I find it very helpful. He has even helped me over Zoom a couple times when I threw my back out while traveling. I think he's the best in the business!

Joe Millen is an exceptional physical therapist who is dedicated to his patients. He is knowledgeable, patient, and compassionate. Joe takes the time to listen and design personalized treatment plans. He is a great communicator, always remaining positive and encouraging, which helps keep patients motivated to achieve their goals. As a server I use my hands and wrists a lot and he managed to relieve my pain as they were really sore due to carrying trays and such.

Now a retired occupational therapist/certified hand therapist,  I had the pleasure of working with Joe for a number of years in a local therapy clinic before he started Impact Health.  I recognized immediately that Joe‚Äôs knowledge and skills with an approach to patient treatment were above and beyond other physical therapists.  When I had a challenging patient, I would often reach out to Joe to consult with me.  Because I had taken numerous advanced courses over my career that addressed the total body in finding the root cause of a patient‚Äôs issue, I aligned with Joe‚Äôs critical thinking and hands on approach.
Recently, I now find myself as the ‚Äòpatient‚Äô.  Ignoring several years of pain in both shoulders, X-rays revealed significant arthritis.  Plasma, stem cells were not an option.  Due to pain & loss of motion, and functional decline, I opted for a right total shoulder replacement 3 months ago.  Doing self therapy, I now felt some additional help from Joe could speed my recovery on the surgical side and perhaps delay or dismiss the need for surgery on the left.
After the initial evaluation, Joe‚Äôs insight and  ‚Äòhands on‚Äô have already enabled me to have better insight and awareness of how to do my own therapy and I see slight improvement in motion.  Since I can‚Äôt do my own ‚Äòhands on‚Äô, I am scheduling additional visits at IMPACT in hopes of resuming all my activities of working on our large property including using pole pruners, loppers, shovels, hand saws, painting and more;  and returning to volunteer at Caladesi Island State Park!

I can‚Äôt say enough about the abilities of Joe Millen and his staff. I start with Joe about eight years ago and I came in not being able to put any weight on my toes not being able to walk correctly. When I walked down the airport, they let me into the line because I was bald over so much. Now I can walk not 100% yet but to the point where people actually think people think I‚Äôm walking normally. I‚Äôm 81 years old and I feel that well. A lot of my friends are declining and health. I‚Äôm not just treading water. I‚Äôm improving.. I‚Äôd say most of this is due to my time with Joe Millen .

My team and I were at a competition and we found Impact Health and Performance in the vendor section and Loved all the great information they shared with my community! Most completed and I body scan and It helped everyone focus in on specific goals to improve overall health.

provider_name: Impact Physical Therapy and Sports Performance
review_text: I had a total knee replacement that went very sideway.  After being told there was nothing else left to be done, I was referred to Impact Physical Therapy and my DPT, Diego Rojas. In a very short time, Diego has made what I thought was a hopeless and helpless situation into a truly remarkable transformation. Diego is amazingly exceptional, extraordinarily knowledgeable and above all he‚Äôs compassionate and passionate about his work and patients. I am beyond grateful and thankful to Diego for encouraging me and returning my faith in my recovery.  I have to give a huge shoutout to the Dr. Janelle, always welcoming and makes you feel at home.  And, the amazing team, Susy, Jonathan, etc. whom I can‚Äôt say enough good things about them. They rock! Highly recommend to anyone needing physical therapy. This team is professional, caring and truly committed to their patients‚Äô success.

provider_name: Impact Physical Therapy and Sports Performance
review_text: Thank you very much to all the staff, especially to my therapist Jeanette for helping me after my total left knee replacement. Outstanding service from everyone. They are all very professional and caring. Special thanks to Janelle for making feel welcome and for her expertise.

provider_name: Impact Physical Therapy and Sports Performance
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough about the incredible care I received at IMPACT during my ankle rehabilitation. Janell and her team are truly exceptional, and their kindness, professionalism, and warmth made my recovery journey so much better. Suzie welcomed me with such cheer and was always so helpful with scheduling, making changes a breeze. Katrina and Marco brought humor and friendliness that made me feel right at home‚Äîour laughs were a highlight of every visit. The recovery team was attentive, ensuring I had ice, hydration, and everything I needed, always with care and precision.
A special shoutout to Diago, who was like a friend cheering me on. His thoughtful approach, tailoring exercises to strengthen my legs and ankle while checking in on how I felt, pushed me to do better and helped me succeed in ways I didn‚Äôt expect. Janell, you‚Äôre blessed with an amazing team, and the supportive environment you‚Äôve created is truly making a difference in this community. IMPACT lives up to its name, helping people through challenges with encouragement and care. I‚Äôm so grateful and highly recommend IMPACT to anyone needing rehabilitation or support. Thank you, and blessings to your team and family!
Abe De Jesus

provider_name: Impact Physical Therapy and Sports Performance
review_text:
My husband Albert goes to the facility and he loves the entire staff. He visits on a regular to help him with a issue he is having. I really appreciate the facility for their friendly and professional staff. Very pleasant place, great ambiance and customer service is 100 percent.
Darlene Casmere

provider_name: Impact Physical Therapy and Sports Performance
review_text:
This is my second round of prescribed therapy for the same ankle condition. Why did I go back for additional therapy? Well, the initial cycle revealed a 90% condition improvement, as the original pain had greatly subsided. Post tratment, I went back to my podiatrist and, following subsequent studies, it was determined that I would further benefit with additional therapy. I am so pleased with the professionalism at Impact, that I refuse to be seen at any other therapy center. They have given me back part of my wellbeing.
Thank you guys! Your commitment and care goes a long way. I do not have enough words to compliment you for it! Cheers!

review_text:
Every time I visit Improved Motions, I‚Äôm blown away by how personal the experience is!
