It truly feels like we‚Äôre a team working together to improve my motions!

I also love that they‚Äôre so focused on continuing education and staying on the cutting edge ‚Äî everyone there is knowledgeable, passionate, and on the same page. With all the different modalities they offer, I never have to go anywhere else for my care.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place that genuinely cares and delivers real results, Improved Motions is it. You can expect a thorough, personalized, and fast track to a better you!

provider_name: Improved Motions Advanced Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text:
Absolutely the best! After being told by other clinics that I wouldn‚Äôt fully recover, finding Improved Motions was a true blessing. Taylor Sloan, PT DPT, is everything you could hope for in a therapist‚Äîknowledgeable, compassionate, patient, and encouraging. He listened to my goals and pain points, and every step of my recovery plan showed careful thought, balancing where I was with where I wanted to be. Thanks to his expertise, my shoulder and neck feel so much better! I cannot emphasize enough his commitment to take me from where I was to where I wanted to be.

Moreover, Lindsey made scheduling effortless and was always a pleasure to interact with. It‚Äôs rare to find such an exceptional combination of professional medical expertise and outstanding front-desk/admin service. Improved Motions truly stands out in every way!

provider_name: Improved Motions Advanced Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: Dr Mike and his staff are super pleasant, accommodating, and caring. When I first got to them I was in so much pain I didn‚Äôt think I was ever going to get the slightest bit of relief but after just a few sessions I had regained my confidence in range of motion and pain relief. I highly recommend improved motions if you are looking to get back on track. There‚Äôs no one better in the industry!

provider_name: Improved Motions Advanced Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: I can‚Äôt say enough positive things about my experience at Improved Motions Physical Therapy. I had suffered with tennis elbow for years and had given up on it ever getting better. After 2 months I am now completely pain free, and my range of motion is back to normal. Dr. Sloan was so helpful, and everyone on staff made me feel welcome to be there. I would highly recommend them.

provider_name: Improved Motions Advanced Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: Everyone at Improved Motions is awesome. I'm extremely appreciative for everything. I came after a rough week of struggling and Taylor had me feeling significantly better the first visit. After a few sessions I felt the best I have in a while. Not only are theses guys good at the PT side but they're also great people. So during visits it felt like you came to see your boys. Come check these guys out.

As a psychotherapist, Anton and I have had the pleasure of collaborating with clients. I was looking for a holistic medication management option, as many of my clients want to rule out things like blood work, genetics, and lifestyle changes prior to medication intervention. Anton is this and so much more! Incredibly skilled and knowledgeable while adding kindness and compassion to his work. My clients feel valued and safe in his care, I would highly recommend him for your med management needs.

In Balance Mental Wellness has been good to me. My therapist and nurse practitioner are very good at communicating with me, identifying any issues that I am struggling with, helping me understand things in a new way that I previously didn't even consider, and providing solutions that work. I recommend In Balance Mental Wellness to anyone struggling with depression, anxiety, or situational struggles.

I've had an incredibly positive experience with In Balance Mental Wellness LLC. From the very first interaction, he demonstrated genuine care, professionalism, and a deep commitment to mental health and overall well-being. Mr. Georgiev is not only highly qualified but also deeply compassionate, creating a safe and welcoming environment for growth and healing.

I have been seeing Anton for several years.  Not only is he a lovely person to speak with, but he also is a very attentive & caring practitioner.  He always takes the time to answer my questions & completely explains the medication that is prescribed.

I am pleased to say that I have been a patient of Anton Georgiev‚Äôs for over one year now.

Anton has helped me to accomplish more with my mental health wellness in one year than so many others that came before him.

Finally, after 52 years of trying to deal with issues that were beyond my control, Anton showed me how to gain control and live a holistically well-balanced life.

I highly recommend Anton and the services of In Balance, Mental Wellness.

Ms. Renee is amazing. Her energy with me and my children has been so uplifting. I appreciate how Ms. Renee took a couple visits to truly evaluate how she was going to help my family individually and had many approaches for each of us separately to not only help us as individuals but as a family. She takes time to talk to you after hours and always wants to be a part of our lives so she can assist us at any given time. Let me add- She has different approaches wish us all. Helps with anxiety, depression, and grief.

Mrs.Renee is amazing! She‚Äôs great with my daughter! Stern when she needs to be and loving when she needs to be! My daughter is learning and changing her behavior and is understanding a lot! Thank you again Mrs.Renew

My 10-year-old daughter took an instant liking to Miss Renee. My daughter has mild autism and is very hesitant to meet new people. Renee won her over immediately with her abounding joy, sincerity, fun-spirit, and compassion. We have been with Renee for over a month, and my daughter looks forward to going to therapy. We are delighted to have found her!

In Community Counseling is a standout therapy practice, led by Renee, whose kindness, generosity, and passion for helping others are evident in everything she does. Having had the privilege of working with Renee professionally, I‚Äôve seen firsthand her unwavering dedication to improving the lives of those in her care and beyond.

Renee‚Äôs commitment to community engagement is truly inspiring. She goes above and beyond to ensure her practice not only supports individual clients but also contributes positively to the broader community. Her willingness to collaborate and her openness to helping others reflect her genuine care for those she serves.

In Community Counseling is more than a therapy practice‚Äîit‚Äôs a space where clients and the community alike benefit from Renee‚Äôs dedication, compassion, and drive to make a meaningful impact. I wholeheartedly recommend In Community Counseling for anyone seeking a practice led by someone with a true passion for making a difference.

Miss Renee is a Pleasure to work with.. She's very personable, My son trusts her and that will benefit him in the long run.. She is always available, puts her patients needs first. Very flexible with her scheduling..

If I could give 10 stars out of 5, I would. Jill, Shere√©, and the whole damn team at In Motion are incredible.
I went in with a bad back injury and thought my active lifestyle was done. Jill and her team helped breathe new life into my body, and held onto the hope for me every step of the way. They will work you, and it will suck at times, but I swear this is the best medical help I've gotten (and I had been to neurologists/spine doctors, had ejections, etc). Not only do I have my active lifestyle back now, but I'm even stronger, faster, and in better health than BEFORE the back injury. And this is all thanks to In Motion.
And special shoutout to the admin team. They are on top of it y'all!

Thank you Jill and everyone at In Motion. You all have changed my life, and I will be forever grateful for the gift you provided. Much love and appreciation for you all.

Jill is the most thoughtful and knowledgeable medical professional I‚Äôve come across in my life. She really takes the time to listen to you - I can tell she genuinely cares about helping others and piecing the healing puzzle together. I trust her and her direction completely. I‚Äôve found a lot of relief and answers since I started seeing her and Sharee (who is also wonderful) a few weeks ago. I would recommend In Motion to absolutely anyone.

Thank you to In Motion Physical Therapy and Jill Travers for literally breathing new life into my feet!! I can‚Äôt say enough about Jill and her hands-on therapeutic skills & touch. After several foot surgeries in the 90s (bunionectomy surgeries both feet/both sides & multiple neuroma surgeries on both feet) my feet were jacked up and neglected! This means I did nothing beyond my surgeries except to wear orthotics and never set out to strengthen already weakened and dysfunctional feet & ankles. I was able to be active but limited my potential for full strength and power gains from exercise efforts. I also put myself at an increased risk of injury. I‚Äôm so glad I finally decided to give some much needed attention & TLC to my feet.

What a difference from only a few months of therapy. I‚Äôm looking forward to greater mobility, strength gains and getting back to some good running with my new and improved feet and ankles!

I have to laugh as I hated anyone touching my feet and by discharge day with Jill, I was actually enjoying her hands on foot manipulations üòÜü¶∂Bring on the foot massages now!

If you need excellent PT treatment in Orlando, head to In-Motion PT!!
Thx Jill :)

Joy and Jill took the time to understand the specific surgery that I had, which is definitely not a common surgery. They are very hands on and provide an individualized approach to treatment. It is not some cookie cutter program. This was very important to my decision to see them. I still have a ways to go in my recovery and getting back to where I want to be, but I can highly recommend that staff at In Motion. As a former competitive contact sport athlete, I have had my share of physical therapy over the years. The In Motion staff is one of the best.

The team at In Motion is very friendly and helpful. They are very attentive when you first visit to understand your history and learn what your goals are. I spent so much time on the first time assessment but that‚Äôs because the In Motion team takes the time to gather as much base line information as possible to help you work towards your goals.

My biggest gripe, however, is because I‚Äôm a cyclist. There are bike racks in the parking lot, but don‚Äôt expect to be able to use them. The office prefers to place their garbage bins at the bike racks blocking them from use leaving only the rails at the entrance available to tie up a bike.

review_text: Best team in Florida with the most dedicated and loving specialists. I can't say enough good things about them. Definitely recommended

I had the absolute best time at this place. I am an experienced rider who likes to go out and canter, so I did the Giddy Up & Go Trail Ride. They got back to me quickly and it was so easy to schedule the ride with Sandy.

When I got there I was promptly greeted and we were out on the trail quickly. The trail has plenty of shade and beautiful views. Our group of three had Trent as our tour guide. He was experienced and engaging, providing us with clear directions and made sure everyone was comfortable. I appreciated his encouragement of us to speak up if we were uncomfortable with anything, ensuring that everyone was having a good time and fitting the ride to match our experience and comfortability level.

It was truly such an amazing experience that I cannot recommend enough.The horses are well-trained; I rode Winter and which was such a breeze. I will certainly be coming back to go on another ride.

They also take photos of you when you get back and allow for you to feed the horses. I brought carrots and cut them into four inch pieces for them and they loved them. If you're looking for a place to go for fun, a special event, or anniversary this place is it. Seriously the endorphins I got from this place will last all day.

We had so much fun at In The Breeze! Big facility with a ton of horses and super sweet people! Our instructor was Trent and he was awesome! Super sweet & experienced - he explained everything well and was funny too, kept the ride interesting! We will definitely be back!

Booked a trip for my daughter and I ‚Ä¶ me being the beginner and she was experienced ‚Ä¶.. we did the bareback swim ride‚Ä¶, Our tour guide Trent was amazing ‚Ä¶ gave me all the direction I needed and checked on me the entire way‚Ä¶. I was terrified but felt better knowing I was being checked on minute by minute‚Ä¶. Thank you so much for the amazing experience and the amazing people that joined us in the group‚Ä¶ we had lots of laughs ‚Ä¶ lots of first time experiences‚Ä¶ Favorite line was ‚Äúit‚Äôs organic‚Äù lol
Thanks again Trent you made me laugh during my many episodes of panic üòâ

Had a great trail ride today. The horses are well trained, and the folks who run it are great to talk to and a wealth of knowledge. My aunt even took a picture with them she was so excited lol. Will be returning for sure!

My horse kept trying to eat her favorite treats but the lead would stop to allow us to catch up. Due to the rains the creeks were filled higher than normal so I‚Äôd suggest you weatherproof your leather. The horses are gentle and not stubborn. The instructors were truly amazing and gave us tips on picking a perfect pair of cowboy boots.

My daughter is (3) and was diagnosed with Autism. After going through the grief, I began a mission to advocate and find my baby the best early intervention care possible. We tried preschool and other ABA therapy centers which was very difficult for her to adjust. Everywhere we went was never a good fit. They could never really understand her and we would see no progress which led us to keep stating over. Inbloom has been a breath of fresh air and hope. My daughter has improved so much in just a 3 month span. She is comprehending, answering to her name, following instructions, using her words and signing appropriately. We get parent training and review her plan and goals 1-2  times a month.  She is celebrated when she walks in and when she leaves! The first day I dropped her off and picked her up she was so happy and now gets excited every-time we pull up and she sees her RBT. My husband and I are sooo excited about her journey. I really do hate leaving reviews, but when you come across a staff full of people who absolutely love what they do you can‚Äôt help but give them their flowers.

The therapists at InBloom Autism-Davie are truly amazing! After waiting a year for services, I can confidently say it was well worth the wait. The team at InBloom is top-notch and has made a tremendous impact on my 5-year-old nonverbal autistic son. Since he started attending just two months ago, he has shown incredible improvement.

I genuinely believe that if I had enrolled him at 2 years old, he might already be speaking. He is now more alert, recognizes his name, and is trying to communicate‚Äîhe even knows how to say "bye" and "Hi" with clear intent!

I want to give special recognition to Alejandro and Jordan for their fantastic support, as well as a HUGE shoutout to IIaleah -10 stars for her! I truly appreciate her methods, and I often wish I could take her home with me to help guide me in making him a productive and successful young man.

Thank you, InBloom, for everything you do!

I cannot say enough good things about the InBloom Autism Services technicians
Kevin Kleinberg (BCBAs)
Janelly and Kiara (RBTs)
Scottlyn Goodman (Ctr. Dir.)
we‚Äôve worked with. From day one, they have shown genuine care, patience, and dedication to helping our child grow and thrive. Their ability to connect, redirect, and encourage progress‚Äîeven on tough days‚Äîis truly remarkable.

I was told about ABA therapy and InBloom two years ago from my Joe DiMaggio neurologist.  We started immediately and the progress my son has made is all because of this amazing place!  We started in home therapy, post pandemic moved to the center and now the therapist goes to school with my son to help his with the curriculum and gaining new skills. My son also does OT and ST there as well, that is incredible also.  If you have an autistic child I cannot recommend this amazing place enough!

My daughter has been with InBloom for about a year now and has made TREMENDOUS progress. My biggest regret is not starting ABA therapy with this company earlier. My daughter‚Äôs BCBA, Dani has been amazing. She is simply the best at what she does. My daughter absolutely loves her. I have the utmost respect for Dani in terms of her knowledge, ability to effectively communicate with my daughter, and ultimately the outstanding outcomes that she has had with my daughter.

This form of therapy is highly effective and has been life-changing for our family. My daughter started off barely speaking and was unable to communicate her needs. Fast forward to today, she just Aced her spelling test in her general education class. She is thriving and it‚Äôs because of Dani and our InBloom family. I highly recommend this company.

Their professionalism stands out in every interaction. They are organized, attentive, and committed to delivering excellent service. I truly appreciate the care and dedication they show, and I would recommend them without hesitation.

I‚Äôve had speech therapy in home & in office for my twins & this company is far by the worst. Nothing but excuses being made, for the therapist. Insurance being billed for services that‚Äôs not been provided.

When you start to see the progress at home, you can tell it‚Äôs making a difference. She always provides suggestions and tips we can try at home with my child. We love Infinite Abilities ABA therapy. They have helped our twins grow and develop so much. When our twins first started with them at age 3, they were not making eye contact, responding to their name, or talking. My son is a high school athlete, we made plans to return on a weekly basis for maintenance. Thank you to everyone who turned our experience into a great one!!

They took there time. Did not feel rushed. Very knowledgeable and had lots of tips for me to improve my back. I got a great deal. Receive X-ray, got adjusted, electrodes and massage. Need to set up another appointment. Very nice staff and happy to see you. All the girls were very nice and professional. The Dr. was very nice as well and was able to adjust.

Thank you again

The staff at the Injury Clinic took great care of me. All members were professional, kind, and easy to work with. Highly recommend these people if you‚Äôre injured and need gentle care to help you back on your feet.

Great place for chiropractic care!   Dr. Amanda is very caring and skilled.   She has fresh approaches to my issues which are helping alleviate the pain and discomfort.    Danielle, Alicia, and Emily are an excellent support team.   I have been a patient for over 6 years.

Great staff; friendly, helpful, caring.  Dr. Lawrence is great; she‚Äôs knowledgeable, friendly, caring, and a great chiropractor.  I have a lot of issues, and she helps me maintain so that I can avoid surgery. I definitely recommend her!

I signed up for 16 sessions and was only able to go once a week. However anytime I needed to schedule change they were always so helpful. Everytime I would walk in the staff was always happy and greeted me and made me feel so welcomed. I go for the laser lipo and 10 out of 10 recommend.

I purchased a special on their lipo laser treatment. It is not laser lipo but red light therapy, although approved by the FDA the results are not proven. This, of course was not explained in their advertisement. Shows I am not a smart consumer.....should have checked first.

I participated in one of the Laser Lipo programs. The staff at the IHC, from the receptionist Alicia, the office manager Danielle, to my nutritionist and consultant Emily, all made me feel welcome and comfortable.
The program does have fat loss and good toning results. I recommend it along with the associated nutrition and fitness training.

Dr. McCranels and team have been absolutely amazing in assisting with my recovery from an auto accident for the second time now. I was treated by them about 6 years ago for another injury. Everyone at ITS goes above and beyond to accommodate and customize treatment needs. They genuinely care about your needs. Each and every one of the team members are professional and caring. They have a full gym for physical therapy, a therapy room for traction... etc and also provide chiropractic adjustments. Highly recommend for any injuries!

My daughter and I were involved in an auto accident. Pain Management meds and surgery are not an option for me.

Dr. McCranels and the team at Injury Treatment Solutions treated me with chiropractic and rehab for my injuries.

The doctor even adjusted my foot that was bothering me! I was really impressed with his adjustment techniques! This was not even the injury that I was being seen for, but Dr. M is very thorough! He takes his time and addresses concerns very patiently. From head to toe, Injury Treatment Solutions helped me feel better after my accident.

They help you heal from your injuries and give you relief from the pain, not just use up your insurance. I had heard to be aware of some of the other places, and for that reason, I chose to try ITS.

Thank you, Dr. McCranels and everyone at ITS!

Dr McCranels, Stefani, Logan, Renee, Ian, and the rest of their staff are very friendly, helpful, knowledgeable, and professional. Great place to go for injury rehab and recovery. Best decision I‚Äôve made coming to Injury Treatment Solutions!

Doctor was very professional. Listened to everything I had to say and was not trying to sell me on programs or extra services. Just took care of what I needed and treated me with respect. Really nice practice.

Very friendly and professional staff, never had to wait to be seen and they worked around my schedule, even with my last minute changes.
UPDATE: 4/5/24
My treatment has ended and I was sent a bill for the portion my insurance didn't cover.  I called to set up a payment plan and Donna was absolutely AMAZING!! She was so helpful and understanding, went above and beyond for me and I could not be more thankful. I've never been anywhere with such a kind, wonderful and incredible staff. Everyone there is so welcoming and warm!  Thank you all for the amazing service provide!

provider_name: Inner Harmony ADHD/Autism Testing and Psychotherapy
review_text: Dr. Kelsea Visalli- Bettag. There‚Äôs no word that describes how satisfied I was by her services, expertise and kindness. No one wants to go for psychological testing, but Dr. Bettag made it engaging, fun and went above and beyond with asking the right questions, talking to therapists and people in my life to formulate the proper diagnosis. She spent over 12 hours with me and speaking to others to gather the data. She is very passionate about what she does, and you can tell it brings her joy to help her clients. Her report was immaculately descriptive with tons of resources and suggestions for further help and healing. She has strong ties and connections to the Gainesville mental health community, and her referrals do not disappoint.  Her strength based approach made me feel beyond hopeful and excited about the future vs. your generic testing practice that is based on deficits and lack. I am eternally grateful for Dr. Bettag, and she‚Äôs really set me up for a progressive healing direction. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è THANK YOU

provider_name: Inner Harmony ADHD/Autism Testing and Psychotherapy
review_text: Cannot recommend Kelsea enough! Ive known her professionally for many years now and she is so patient, warm, dedicated and empathetic. She loves what she does and it shows through her amazing work, diligent communication, and kind interactions with everyone.

provider_name: Inner Harmony ADHD/Autism Testing and Psychotherapy
review_text: Dr. Visalli-Bettag is a well trained psychologist who offers a safe space for individuals to process their emotions. Highly recommend!

Had my daughters 10th birthday party today and my daughters exact words were ‚ÄúI had the best birthday party ever!‚Äù The farm is very spacious and beautiful. The staff was very friendly, informative, patient and helpful. Each child at the party was able to interact with the horse they were going to ride prior to riding and learned about the care of a horse! I would highly recommend innovation Arabians for your child‚Äôs next birthday party

Thank you for your wonderful summer camps! This is the second summer that my kiddo gets to learn about farm life, interact with animals, pick beans and sweet potatoes and best of all, ride horses! She comes home sweaty, tired and smiling from ear to ear!
Great experience! Ava was very knowledgeable and kind. Thank you!

We absolutely adore this place! My 5-year-old daughter has had the pleasure of attending both the winter and summer camps offered here and has been nothing but delighted. Not only does she learn how to ride a horse, but she also gains valuable life skills such as listening, patience, responsibility, bravery, and much more. The variety of activities throughout the day, including horse preparation, riding, farm walks, and arts and crafts, keep her engaged and excited. The facility is clean and well-organized, and the horses are clearly well-cared for. We highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a fun and educational experience for their child.
Went to a VERY educational horse 101 class here, they were so educated and friendly, we are now signing up for summer camp and my daughter is so excited!

provider_name: Innovative Pediatric Learning Center of Miami (IPLC)
review_text: My 4-year-old twins are seen by Karina and Isa, and I truly can‚Äôt recommend them highly enough. When we first started at IPLC, my daughter had significant challenges with articulation and expressive language, while my son struggled with both expressive and receptive language. In the year and a half since they began therapy, we‚Äôve seen incredible progress. My wife and I are so grateful for the care, dedication, and strong work ethic of the IPLC team and most of all, for the remarkable results in our children. Thank you, IPLC, for your professionalism and passion. You are truly amazing!

provider_name: Innovative Pediatric Learning Center of Miami (IPLC)
review_text: The Absolute Best choice for speech in Miami!  Being a first time mom and new to everything, the support that all of these amazing girls provide to not only my son but to me as well, means the world to us! My son is 4 and has been going to IPLC for 2 years.  He wakes up and can not wait to go! He literally runs inside to see the girls!  Although he does not have sessions with each therapist, he knows all of them and they are always so ready to give support and answer any questions.  He has made tremendous progress. I really can‚Äôt recommend them enough! My son was completely nonverbal and is now learning to talk in sentences!

provider_name: Innovative Pediatric Learning Center of Miami (IPLC)
review_text: I highly recommend IPLC for Speach therapy and  to get your child properly prepared for school. I have been taking our daughter and just  in a couple of months I can see a great progress in her pronunciation, enunciation of words, talking in full sentences and singing which was challenging for her. Also, in answering questions and project herself as if in a school setting. We have been working with Amanda Morales, who I highly recommend. She is very knowledgeable, professional, patient and caring. With her guidance we feel our daughter is truly prepared to start school. At IPLC all the staff is very attentive to your needs, work as a team and Amanda always goes the extra mile. Our daughter loves to go to her learning center and is always happy to see her first teacher Amanda.

provider_name: Innovative Pediatric Learning Center of Miami (IPLC)
review_text: The IPLC staff are just wonderful! My son worked with a few members of the team for just under a year and we saw a substantial improvement in his speech. He very much enjoyed working with them - they made the sessions fun with new games and activities to keep him interested. I believe the team genuinely cares about the children and enjoy their jobs. Highly recommend IPLC!

provider_name: Innovative Pediatric Learning Center of Miami (IPLC)
review_text: The whole team is wonderful! Both our daughters are advancing so much in their speech and comprehension. We were new to Miami and IPLC helped us find navigate the school system here and find other helpful services for our daughters! We are so grateful for them! I recommend them to everyone seeking speech therapy for their kids.

I was quite pleased. I have a degenerative disk. Epidural wore off early and developed quite some pain. A friend recommended Zach. He said if he could do anything, we would know after 4 sessions. After 2 sessions my back was significantly better. After 4 it was 95%. Along the way I had some other issues with my shoulder and a pulled back muscle. His treatments lessened the pain immediately.
Overall, I highly recommend the practice. The service does not take medical insurance so it is cash or credit card, so you need to be prepared for high cost. However, when I think of the relief I got I felt it was worth it.

I have used many good physical therapist in the last 10 to 15 years, but Aaron Robles is honestly the most thorough and diligent and knowledgeable physical therapist I‚Äôve ever worked with. I‚Äôve had recurring shoulder injuries and pain for the last six months and deep tissue massage did not resolve the issues and he did an extremely thorough examination and rouled out rotator cuff tear and labral tears  and identified my mid Traps as being the issue ‚Ä¶and  my needing to strengthen those muscles.: . I cannot sing his praises enough. I had gone to Aaron 10 years ago and after having these issues again, searched him out and found him at innovative, physical therapy and he is without a doubt the best ‚Ä¶ in a
Aaron is a godsend and healthy immeasurably today. I cannot thank hum enough for how thoroughly he examined both my shoulders and my knee and Help develop a treatment plan to strengthen my mid traps
I‚Äôm actually looking forward to getting home and starting a rehab protocol that he prescribed and strengthening this muscle group again..

I can't say enough nice things about Zach and the rest of the staff. I was experiencing dizziness, possibly vertigo. I also had a very stiff neck and lower back. The net result of working with Zach is that my dizziness is gone. I have gained more flexibility in my next and back.  I still have a ways to go, but the improvements have been awesome. I highly recommend Zach. Besides being very knowledgeable, he is a great guy to work with!

My physical therapy recently started and I am moving more without so much pain and stiffness. Innovation hands on techniques have helped me loosen up and improved my mobility.
Sincerely,
Christine Gooding

IPT addressed multiple issues I been dealing with for years. I am no longer have continuous pain. I fractured my coccyx, 4 years ago, that pain is gone!
Josh is a caring and skilled practitioner. I felt safe in his hands.

provider_name: Inspire Health PT: Miami Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: In 12 weeks, Jillian got me back to jumping after I had spent over a year trying to get my knee back to normal on my own. She was very attentive, knowledgeable, encouraging, and I learned so many exercises, stretches, massage techniques (and their proper form) from her. She helped me get over the fear of doing certain moves, and I‚Äôm walking away equipped with a ton of new knowledge about my body and how to keep it healthy. Thank you, Jillian! Love your energy!

provider_name: Inspire Health PT: Miami Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text:
I came to Dr. Juan Guzman, PT, DPT, CSCS, at Inspire HealthPT  after dealing with a painful leg that had really limited my movement. From day one, Juan made a strong impression‚Äînot just with his deep knowledge and effective treatment plan, but with his good sense of humor and warm, welcoming smile.

Juan took the time to understand exactly what was going on with my leg and created a tailored recovery plan that adapted as I improved. He listened and asked a lot of questions. Every session was a perfect mix of focused, professional care and lighthearted encouragement. It made a my recovery process feel a lot more manageable‚Äîand even enjoyable at times.

Juan followed up the in-office sessions with homework exercises that changed each week. He encouraged me to contact him outside of our weekly meeting if I had questions about the exercises or experienced unexpected pain.

Thanks to Juan‚Äôs skill and support, I‚Äôve regained strength and mobility.  I can‚Äôt recommend Juan enough‚Äînot only is he an excellent physical therapist, but he makes healing a much more positive experience. His clinic motto says it all ‚Äì The Better Movement Club.

provider_name: Inspire Health PT: Miami Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text:
I‚Äôve worked with Juan for several years, off and on, to fine-tune my weight training, nutrition, and cycling goals. I can‚Äôt recommend him enough! He‚Äôs a gamechanger when it comes to a holistic approach to wellness, integrating multiple aspects of physical performance, health, and overall well-being. He's completely dialed in my weight training routine to prevent injury and keep me performing at my best on the bike. Whether it‚Äôs tweaking my form or suggesting new movements to target stabilizer muscles, he‚Äôs always focused on every aspect of my performance.

Thanks to his expertise, I've seen noticeable improvements in my cycling, especially FTP. And I‚Äôm feeling stronger than ever, even when keeping pace with the fast boys, despite carrying more weight than some. His nutritional guidance has been invaluable in helping me break through a growth plateau I‚Äôd been stuck at for a while.

If you‚Äôre serious about leveling up your fitness, preventing injury, and reaching your goals with a tailored, thoughtful approach, Juan‚Äôs the guy. Highly recommend his services!

provider_name: Inspire Health PT: Miami Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: I suffered a knee injury requiring surgical repair. I had complied with the prescribed physical therapy regimen per my orthopedic surgeon but 8 months following the surgery the muscles of my leg were still weak and significantly atrophied. I was unable to comfortably participate in my usual activities of playing tennis, padel or going to the park with my family. Dr. Juan changed everything for me. With Juan‚Äôs support and guided strength training, my leg was conditioned appropriately and I was able to make a meaningful recovery ‚Äî improving my strength and flexibility‚Äî and able to get back to my favorite activities.

provider_name: Inspire Health PT: Miami Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: I am nearing 70 years old and stay very active.  I have recurring issues with my neck, back and lower legs.  I also have a slowly progressing neurological issue.  I have received treatment from Jillian Chong for a long time and she can be credited with my ability to stay active including golfing, swimming, fishing, weight lifting and long walks.  She is quick at diagnosing the issue and resolving it.  She is an excellent PT plus she was a long time yoga instructor and is a very high end athlete. This is a difficult combination of skills to find in a single practitioner!  Steven Haase Miami Beach, Florida.

Dr Maggie has been amazing with our 13 year old daughter. She‚Äôs almost 100% after 12 weeks of vision therapy. She came in with nerve damage after an accident that gave her double vision. Maggie provided all the materials needed to work on in between sessions and has guided us through a difficult injury with fun and practical ways for my daughter to heal. We are very thankful for her knowledge and ability to work with our daughter, making her feel super supported the whole way.

Dr. Maggie was amazing! So kind, sweet, patient, and fun. My 3-year-old did surprisingly well with the eye exam, but I‚Äôm confident it was only because of her unique, slower approach. We chose to pay out of pocket with her instead of going to an eye doctor covered by insurance because we expected a more kid-friendly, tailored approach, and she definitely delivered! The office was also very cute, clean, and kid-friendly.

Dr. Maggie is absolutely wonderful! She took the time to listen to my concerns regarding my child‚Äôs Visual Snow Syndrome. She helped me to research which doctor in my local area would be the best fit for our family. I was so impressed that she went above and beyond to help us with this. If for whatever reason our local doctor doesn‚Äôt work out, we will be making the trip down to see Dr Maggie. I‚Äôm hoping more doctors like her continue to bring awareness to Visual Snow and help bring new therapies to families in need.

Dr.Maggie is an exceptional doctor. She has excellent bedside manner. She goes above and beyond to accomodate her patients to be seen as conveniently as possible.  She is patient, thorough, sweet, caring, and very informative.  She provides service for both my daughter and   I , and we always leave her office feeling content. It can be difficult to find a doctor that is kid friendly, but Dr.Maggie is definitely suitable for any age bracket. I love her so much that I am a self pay patient being that my insurance is not in network with her office. I rather pay for quality based service than to potentially not be content with a participating office. I am so grateful to have met Dr.Maggie. I will recommend her to as many people as I can.

Dr. Yamin is extraordinary at her work and her attentiveness to her patients is next level.  My 9 yr old daughter has responded well to Dr. Yamin's Vision Therapy exercises and connects with the doctor very well.  It is not often that you find a doctor that administers the therapy themself and you have direct communication and access to tbe doctor.  This was the reason why we chose Inspire Vision Therapy over all others.  I highly reccommend Dr. Yamin!

Great experience! The team at Instinct Health Care is professional, friendly, and really cares about your well-being. I came in with back and neck pain, and after a few adjustments, I started feeling so much better. The clinic is clean, modern, and has a relaxing atmosphere. Definitely recommend to anyone in Miami looking for quality chiropractic care!

Dr. Roberts is an expert in his craft. He‚Äôs absolutely amazing and attentive to my needs. He‚Äôs always there and he knows exactly how to treat my complaints. I came in with severe back and neck pain and he gave me the best treatment advice. I am very appreciative of him and his staff. 1000000/10
Dr Roberts and his staff are incredible. They made me comfortable during my difficult time and helped me with my pain and injuries. Thank You, I'm greatly appreciative of the services.

Thank you Dr. Roberts! I‚Äôm very grateful for the services. My son and I are following your advice on the workouts and the stretching. The results have been great and the staff is great. Thank you to Annie and Monica!
The best place, the best doctor! Been in pain for months and only here ingot the relief! Thabk you again! You guys are the best!!!!!

Professional, friendly, and efficient clinic! Scheduling staff was so accommodating in helping me to get scheduled with Craig for MFR while I was on vacation here. They both really care and work very hard each session, really wanting me to leave feeling better each time. I so appreciate it. Also, I have had dry needling during two of my sessions (with Brittany) and it was especially helpful in my case.

Top notch and well run practice.  The team is caring, competent and talented. You can tell they love what they do. Highly recommend this place to recover from injuries. I won‚Äôt be going to anyplace else in the North Miami area.

My daughter has been receiving ABA therapy for the past 3 years with Integrated rehabilitation center. We have had the best experience. My daughter has improved so much throughout the years. The staff and therapist in the office treat you like family. Definitely recommend.

Very satisfied with the center, I am a mom as I think all, who want their children to be in a safe place, a place where we feel confident that our children are well, I recommend 100% the place, all staff is very friendly and professional, starting with the director, my son could not be in a better place, thank you.

I had the pleasure of seeing Rob Sillevis . I couldn't be more impressed. I felt confident in his expertise. I went to Integrated Therapy at my Drs request, and I have to say it was a wonderful experience.   Everything was explained in great detail and the level of care was amazing.  I definitely recommend them to anyone and if there is another need for me to seek therapy, he will be my first choice.
Sam is amazing ü§© She really takes her time to help me and truly listens. I highly recommend them

I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. Blanchard for a few years now, and she‚Äôs hands down one of the best providers I‚Äôve worked with. She‚Äôs smart, passionate, and genuinely cares. Before finding her, I saw multiple specialists and therapists but never got any real relief. I honestly wasn‚Äôt sure I‚Äôd ever feel functional again. Thanks to her, I‚Äôve gotten my mobility and strength back. She takes the time to explain everything and tailors treatment to what I actually need. I highly recommend her! She‚Äôs truly a lifesaver!!

The dramatic change in my physical and mental health ever since I saw Dr. Blanchard is nothing short of amazing! Taking her time to be efficient, and provide care that is exceptional, Dr. Blanchard really sets herself apart. If you need a consistent , reliable , PT , look no further.

Erin is amazing!!! Super intelligent! She has helped me so much with my TMD/ Upper Cervical Pain. I Recommened everyone having any upper cerival/ body pain to see her for treatment ASAP. She will guide you through the whole process. I have had constant head pain, neck pain and ear symptoms/pain for years and have been put through the ringer with doctors and dentists. Tons of trauma mentally and physically with my process and Erin has helped me with all of that. She also has a whole team of like minded doctors and dentists to refer you to for other issues :) Please see her if you are in pain and have given up and need help :)

I cannot say enough amazing things about Erienne and her practice. I have tried EVERYTHING for my migraines over the past 15+ years and this is the first solution I have found! Through exercises and dry needling my migraines are managed and I‚Äôm feeling the best I have in years. Erienne is extremely knowledgeable and so kind. Check her out for all your head and neck needs :)

Dr. Blanchard is AMAZING!!
My physician referred me to her for vestibular problems.
Dr. Blanchard put me at ease from the first time we spoke. I have seen her for vestibular and balance issues, physical therapy, and dry needling.
My life has improved dramatically since I have been seeing her.
Dr. Blanchard is incredibly knowledgeable and she explains things thoroughly.
She is efficient, accommodating, considerate, very encouraging, genuinely caring and kind.
I HIGHLY recommend her.
It is obvious she loves what she does, helping improve other people‚Äôs lives, and is truly a joy to work with.

Dr. Scott was incredible! He was able to get me into the session quickly to help alleviate some strained muscles and nerves, and put me on the path to recovery. I will be continuing treatment with him and highly recommend his services!

My son suffered a football injury that impacted the growth plate of his jaw. He had surgery, but still experiences pain. His jaw muscles got in knots from one side not working properly and the other side overcompensating for it. We had tried different PT‚Äôs for over a year before we were recommending to IntegrativePT. Scott has been working with my son and the dry needling has made a huge difference. Scott has also been so flexible to work with our crazy schedule. He truly has a passion for what he does and you can tell that he really cares about his patients and their outcomes. I cannot recommend him enough.

Dr. Scott Dixon‚Äôs dry needling procedure is relieving me of my chronic neck pain!! I have gone to an orthopedist for years for one thing or another. My last issue was severe neck pain and my orthopedist recommended an ablation followed by a nerve block. I was not looking forward to this painful procedure especially when I was told 1 year was the average length of relief and then the pain would probably return.  I met Dr. Scott who was sure his practice of dry needling would work. After doing my own online research, I decided to give it a try. Am I glad I did! What a joy it is to be pain free!!  Thank you Dr. Scott!!

Scott has a calming, really pleasant, caring nature. My situation included a level 10 pain in my neck as a byproduct of major cervical spine surgery. Scott‚Äôs treatments with needling, electrical pulses, heat and cupping have made a tremendous difference in my mobility and pain relief. I am so happy to find Integrative Physical therapy and Scott Dixon. My MAYO Clinic neurological  surgeon and pain management team have encouraged me to keep getting these treatments as they are working. Highly recommend!

Dr. Scott Dixon is a master at dry needling.  I went to him after dealing with neck and shoulder pain for three years.  After only two sessions, my neck feels much better!

The dry needling session was not painful. I'm not comfortable with needles but he listened to my concerns and made the process feel easy.

I highly recommend his services.  Thank you Dr. Scott Dixon!

If you need help urgently with your mental health DO NOT come here. They pushed my appointment back multiple times and each time it was the day before the scheduled appointment. Find someplace else if you really want help. It felt very defeating every time they would reschedule me or not contact me when they said they would. Its been a few months since I've tried to begin my recovery journey but the delays have making my mental health decrease even more. The people I've spoken to on the phone are lovely but the place is highly unreliable. Can't stress enough, if you really need help DO NOT come here.
This place is great. Florete is amazing. She is very kind and helpful.
Great customer service. Everyone was supreme nice and friendly
Very great service, great customer service! They treat you like family!
Very great! If you're thinking about going to them, don't second guess just go!

If I could give this place no stars I would
very unprofessional not a decent place no one person in this facility has integrity and I sensed a bit of racism in this work place as well as when I showed up yesterday to ask for a document I was told I need an attorney a simple document to help my kid and they gave me the run around front desk smokes vapes while patients are in the lobby I will be sure to be posting this and tagging them in every social media platform as well as my entire family will be as well

After 7 weeks in hospital and rehab (including surgery), I was finally headed home but needed new brace.  Integrity first said I would have to make an appointment. .  My sister explained how far away we lived and Trevor said he would help us.  They were phenomenal!

Rene Rentz at Integrity has gone above and beyond helping me with my foot issues. She has been a huge blessing! If you need any prosthetics or orthotics be sure to give Integrity a visit! They are very helpful and professional.

Highly recommend Dr. Lunn and Integrity Spine & Wellness. Dr. Lunn has been taking care of my chiropractic care for about 5 years now, and I‚Äôm so happy to visit his new practice! I have chronic issues with my neck and lower back. Dr Lunn has been taking care of me for several years helping maintain my health and quality of life. He is very compassionate and wants to help find solutions to the cause. He is the best and would highly recommend to everyone!

I had a great experience with Dr. Lunn. He's professional, patient and thorough in his approach. You can tell he genuinely cares about his patients and wants them to understand what's going on with their body. Dr. Lunn has been my chiropractor for a few years and I am so pleased with his care.  He listens to my concerns and gives me great, tailored adjustments every time! I would highly recommend him.

Everyone in the office was always welcoming and you could feel the love and energy that they loved their job.

A huge shout-out to Ms. Jenny and Allison! My daughter LOVED her sessions with Ms. Jenny, always willingly ran to her, and had a smile. Allison always answered the phone/sent emails very professionally and efficiently.

Thank you ladies for making a difference!

My son has been going to speech and occupational therapy here for almost a year. I truly believe the therapists here enjoy what they do. It's amazing to see all of his continued progress and I'm so thankful to all the staff at Interactive Therapy Solutions .

My name is Marie Avril I have two kids receiving OT the lady I have for my kids she is an amazing woman my kids are not too friendly the little one is always hiding when I have a stranger coming to my house but the lady who gives them the OT i never see that how both of them love her  they play with her like she is their mom I really want to say thankyou to  Ms Sabrina for the way she treats my kids like she is their mom may Gob bless ur heart moreüôèüôèüôèüôè
All staff very professional and helpful.

With being a nurse and having a complex medical background myself, I wanted to make sure I found a physical therapist that was going to be clinically qualified, well-trained, but, most importantly - would truly listen to my concerns. Nicole exceeds all of my expectations. She not only listens but can validate, explain and offer support and guidance. I would shout Nicole's name from the rooftops if I could. I recommend her to anyone and everyone. She is extremely knowledgeable, continues to educate herself, and sets a great example of how to balance living with chronic conditions. If she doesn't know an answer - she will find it and or hold your hand along the way. SO thankful for her.

POP had made my everyday life difficult to deal with physically, mentally and emotionally.  But after working with Nicole I now have an increased awareness about my body and how to improve my symptoms. I first met Nicole at another clinic and when she left I was determined to find her!  I could not imagine working with anyone else.
Nicole has an impressive background as far as her level of experience and credentials. And she has a very easy going personality that makes her a joy to work with!
She has designed and incorporated internal therapy, breathing techniques, and exercises that she has specifically chosen for my needs.  She easily adapts each appointment to what my needs are at that time.  And she has also made countless suggestions for doctors, products, and websites that she feels would be helpful for me.
Nicole's support and expertise continue to make a positive impact on my outlook and my health.  Her care has made it possible for me to have fewer symptoms and to be so much more comfortable every day.
I am so very thankful for Intuitive Therapies and Nicole!

I had a great experience for support postpartum. Nicole was extremely knowledgeable, helpful, and genuine in her approach. She taught me helpful information, often went over time to be thorough, and shared new strategies every session. I would highly recommend her and will be back for future pregnancy needs!

I have had appointments with both Nicole and Abby and I was beyond impressed with the professionalism and knowledge of both of them! They do an amazing job of making the patient comfortable and assessing the whole body to come up with a therapy plan specialized for you. I would definitely recommend either Nicole or Abby for any pelvic floor therapy or birth prep needs!

I am less than trusting with new providers, so when my previous pelvic floor therapist moved away, she steered me straight to Dr. Nicole, with the assurance that I would be put at ease and receive quality care. She was absolutely correct.

I returned to pelvic floor therapy because the excruciating pain I was experiencing in my right thigh was suspected to be related to muscle tension originating from my pelvic floor.  Nicole listened carefully to my symptoms, confirmed it was a pelvic floor issue, and made sure that at no time was I unaware of or uncomfortable with the process of treating the problem.  I had immediate and significant pain relief after my first visit.  On my second visit I happened to have a severe shoulder injury that I was bearing out until an orthopedic specialist could see me. Nicole added that to the day‚Äôs treatment plan, resulting in my leaving with more range of motion in the shoulder and less pain than when I came in.

Since then, she has resolved my leg pain and continues to assist with my shoulder issue.  Nicole is empathetic, attentive, and creates a welcoming environment with both her personality and the clinic space.

I highly recommend Intuitive Therapies & Pelvic Health. Come for the pelvic floor therapy, stay for the extensive list of other conditions Dr. Nicole can treat for you.

My nieces have been going to Island Coast for years and we‚Äôve never had any issues! The girls love Dr. Bruno, and I recently met Dr. Quinn and both are absolutely amazing! The staff is super friendly and always has a smile on their face! Highly recommend.
Absolutely love the new provider, Dr. Quinn. She really took the time to listen and help my daughter. I would highly recommend Dr. Quinn if anyone is looking for a pediatrician.

If I could give a 0 I would, based on the fact that I have been taking my son here for the last four years. The nurses refuse to call you back, the manager is either never told you need a call back or refuses to call. The office messes up prescriptions left and right and resides to do their job by reaching out the pharmacy‚Äôs to confirm who has the medication or can have this before he runs out of medication. But then says they are going to call the pharmacy and at least make sure the pharmacy is aware of the script. But doesn‚Äôt do it. Dr. is great and I only stay for her.

Don't recommend  taking your children there are much better doctors and facilities out there. They refused to see my son over an $8 balance I owed which I ensured them I would pay them when I came to the doctor appointment. So apparently they're making so much money, they don't need  clients. Good for them.

I have been sending my family to Island Coast Pediatrics for YEARS and everyone I have interacted with at all 3 locations have been friendly, compassionate, understanding and knowledgeable whenever I needed my questions answered. I would HIGHLY recommend this practice to all of my family and friends or anyone that is looking for medical attention!

Rachael is amazing. She had worked with my son for over 2 years. She is caring and compassionate about her job. She treats the children like her own and she celebrates every milestone with you! Rachael is a genuine and loves what she does. My son adored her and you will too!

Provides the best ABA therapy services in the world. All employees have been consistent, reliable, and caring. My son has progressed dramatically within only 4 months of care. They are always updating goals, and improving. I highly recommend!

Rachael is a knowledgeable, patient, and compassionate BCBA! She quickly was able to assess and set up services for several of my students. I highly recommend her for both early intervention and working with children with varying disabilities!
This facility is great. I can‚Äôt pinpoint one certain person who stands out because all the people I‚Äôve met have been wonderful.

Having Racheal as a BCBA was life changing. Before she entered our child‚Äôs life we weren‚Äôt really seeing any real progress in her behavior. She put 110% into helping our child reach our goals. She really worked as a team with us on every occasion and validated our concerns as parents.  I really appreciated her drive to help our little girl grow. It is obvious she is very passionate about what she does and never gives up. If one technique wasn't working, she wouldn't dwell on it, instead just found any way to reach it in another way. She was completely dedicated to ensuring our child grew while being her biggest cheerleader.

Absolutely hands down the best PT practice I've ever been to in Fort Myers.  The dedicated techs are involved in you and your actions and not juggling 3 or 4 people at the same time, nor do they leave you alone to do exercise.  It almost feels like you have a personal trainer.

Was recommended by a friend after I had full knee replacement.  So glad she did. The entire staff is  professional,  gives you their complete attention and guides you through the exercises that best suits your recovery.  Very friendly, great attitude, and always smiling. Facility is very clean, bright and inviting. Highly recommend. Dora Gable
Excellent physio therapy....The staff is excellent, so friendly and professional. The place is brand new and spotless. I really enjoy going there. I am going to miss them all during my vacation...

The staff & PTs are wonderful. I always leave feeling better both mentally and physically. I have been involved in multiple rehabs for knees and now shoulder and have worked as a tech in PT. This experience matches or exceeds all others including where I worked. I highly recommend stopping in and talking with Dana if you think you need the services of physical therapy.

It was an excellent decision for me  to do my shoulder physical therapy at IslandFit. The bright, clean and friendly atmosphere made me feel very welcome. Blake did an outstanding job guiding me to getting the usage of my shoulder back.  A heartfelt Thank You to the entire staff; you‚Äôre the best!

I couldn't have been paired with a better therapist than Amanda. Not only does she have expertise with the initial issue I came for, but our spiritual beliefs were aligned as well, which is a crucial way in which I navigate life. She was very patient and compassionate, and gave me insights that I could take home and ponder over the coming weeks.

When I first started therapy with her, I was not in a pretty situation. She was able to calm me down fairly quickly and then we were able to dive deep into the roots and pull them out! What I love about Amanda's style is it always begins with a question and how does your body feel? Once  you tune into those, the answers start revealing themselves. I love this approach! I truly looked forward to our sessions - always welcoming me with a calm presence (after being on edge a lot coming in from a full day at the office) and feeling relaxed in her office with soothing colors, art and lake view.

The staff is also great to work with - very quick to respond and friendly.

We have absolutely loved working with Amanda. She has been everything that we were looking for and more. She is professional, a great listener, offers helpful feedback, has recommended books, flexible and easy to work with. We also love that she offers 60 and 90 minute sessions.  Highly recommend.

I feel incredibly blessed to have found ‚ÄúIt Begins Within Therapy‚Äù.  I‚Äôm a longtime trauma survivor and it takes courage to reach out for help. I made the call. I was honest about why I was calling and the help I was seeking. As a result I was matched with an amazing therapist. I‚Äôve been actively working with her since February. The work is worth it. I highly recommend Amanda.

Our family is going through a difficult time right now and Megan is my daughter‚Äôs therapist. I was looking for a fun, young, bubbly personality therapist. I was also looking for a play therapist who specializes in trauma which is Megan. Megan is friendly, warm, and professional. My daughter loves Megan! And she enjoys her sessions. Megan gives my other daughter a snack every time which is very kind of her.

Samantha is such an amazing therapist. I have never done therapy before and she made it really easy for me to comprehend. She has helped me through a lot and I am grateful that she was my first therapist and I hope she will continue to help me in the future.

I couldn‚Äôt be more thrilled with the Head Start program at Pepe Dogs. My dog recently completed the two-week obedience training, and the results have been nothing short of incredible. He came back not only better behaved, but genuinely more confident and calm. The transformation was amazing.

What truly sets Pepe Dogs apart, though, is the people. Julia and Sarah were both warm, knowledgeable, and consistently checked in with me before, during, and even after the program. Their ongoing care and concern made it clear they don‚Äôt just train dogs‚Äîthey care deeply about every one.

And then there‚Äôs Jose, who runs the program. I can't say enough about his expertise. He has a truly rare gift for understanding dogs on a deep, intuitive level. His ability to communicate with and guide them is beyond impressive. I had high expectations going in, and he exceeded every one.

If you‚Äôre looking for a training program that delivers real results and treats your dog like family, Pepe Dogs is the place. Jose and his team have earned my highest praise and lifelong trust. Thank you for giving my dog the best possible start!

I really enjoyed the session and feel much more confident going forward. We have already put his training techniques to the test and were able to have all three dogs sit and stay before they went outside. We will continue to train and reschedule for a follow up. Highly recommend Jose was very knowledgeable, confident and skilled. Thank you so much for your help!

Worked out several behavioral issues with my Sheppard-Husky.

Invaluable training for dog owners to enjoy a better time with their dogs and grow. When we train our dogs, we also become better.

Update 2 years later: We use J&K for boarding on the regular basis and our dog loves it

I have boarded my dog several times this year with Pepedogs. Each time I go away, I am more and more comfortable and stress-free knowing that they are in great hands. After the holiday weekend, when I picked them up, they all came out with the cutest holiday bandannas, that‚Äôs just an extra bonus! This is a great facility great staff, great trainers, make happy dogs and happy owners Keep up the amazing work. Thank you.

Professional and experienced trainers. Focused interviews before training and boarding are detailed and help provide a sense of your dog, it's personality, and training / care needs. Nice facility with lots of outside room and things to challenge, exercise, and train.

provider_name: J Sports Rehabilitation (SPECTRUM Performance and Physical Therapy)
review_text: Dr. Rachel has treated two different athletic injuries I‚Äôve had and in both cases the care and treatment have been outstanding. Each case required a few visits for therapy and every time I left feeling better, with greater mobility and more confident I was healing well. Her expertise is evident in everything she does for treatment and in the at home stretches and workout routines provided. To top it all off, she‚Äôs incredibly kind, funny and always punctual (a rarity for a doctors office). Thank you, Dr. Rachel!

provider_name: J Sports Rehabilitation (SPECTRUM Performance and Physical Therapy)
review_text: Rachel and Steven are both absolutely amazing. They take the time to really listen to you, you‚Äôre not just a number. I‚Äôve been in for a few different injuries. My most recent injury took some time to figure out what could be the source but they took that time to really figure it out so they could fix the root cause and not just merely treat the symptoms. I‚Äôll go back to Rachel and Steven time and time again because they truly care.

provider_name: J Sports Rehabilitation (SPECTRUM Performance and Physical Therapy)
review_text: I visited Rachel and Morgan approximately one week after having my ACL and meniscus repaired. They immediately took charge and set up a physical therapy plan to ensure quality long-term rehabilitation of my knee.  They set targets and objectives that allowed me to focus on working hard to get back to the athletic activities I enjoy so much. Their technical skill is unmatched and it‚Äôs perfectly complemented by their ability to push and motivate to make great progress. I am almost one year post-op and I continue to see Rachel and Morgan, primarily through their Return-to-Sport program. I cannot recommend a team more highly than Rachel and Morgan.

provider_name: J Sports Rehabilitation (SPECTRUM Performance and Physical Therapy)
review_text:
If I could give Rachel and Steven at Spectrum Performance 10 stars, I would! Two years post-surgery, I was still struggling with severe back pain that made it impossible to sit for more than 15 minutes. I was stiff as a rock, barely able to move, and felt like I‚Äôd lost my quality of life. After just a few months working with them, my pain completely disappeared, and I finally feel human again‚Äîlike I can actually live my life!
Their state-of-the-art equipment, combined with massage therapy and dry needling, worked wonders. They didn‚Äôt just treat me; they created a personalized plan tailored specifically to my body‚Äôs needs. It‚Äôs clear they‚Äôre not just in it for the money‚Äîthey genuinely care about my progress. With check-ins every six weeks to monitor how I‚Äôm doing, their approach is thoughtful, professional, and incredibly effective. I haven‚Äôt felt this comfortable in years. Highly recommend Spectrum Performance to anyone looking to reclaim their life from pain!

provider_name: J Sports Rehabilitation (SPECTRUM Performance and Physical Therapy)
review_text: I‚Äôve been treated by multiple physical therapists in several states. Nobody I‚Äôve worked with has been as excellent as Rachel! She‚Äôs thorough, knowledgeable and professional. She‚Äôs comfortable using a variety of approaches to tackle the problems I‚Äôve come to her with. Her follow up and the materials she provided for my ‚Äúhomework‚Äù were fantastic as well. Couldn‚Äôt recommend her highly enough!

I was in the hospital for a week every month from November to January. Because of my situation and health, I could hardly walk and was very weak. I am so glad that Sarah with JOY Physical Therapy was recommend to me! On the first visit, Sarah explained what being in a hospital bed can do to your body and the toll that it takes on your skeletal system, muscular system and your overall strength. She found that I had very tight hamstrings- so tight in fact, that was effecting my leg length. One leg was shorter than the other because of the tightness of my hamstrings. Sarah worked with me and designed a workout that I could do daily to loosen and lengthen the shorter leg. I followed her workout instructions and three weeks later, it was time to work on both legs, not just one. Each session, she would measure my progress and I was getting better! We also worked on my hip flexors which really needed help! I am so pleased with Sara and JOY PT that i always recommend them when people even mention thinking of a physical therapist! Before my first hospitalization, I was very active. Afterwards, I physically couldn‚Äôt do much for myself and was concerned about my balance and overall strength and health. I‚Äôm up to walking 2 miles a day and will continue to work with Sara. Most importantly, with any PT, you have to put in the effort to get better. Sarah encourages me to do that! I can wholeheartedly recommend her!

Sarah comes to provide PT sessions for my 82 year old mother when she is visiting from out of town. Having an in home therapist was a game changer for my mother who didn't think her mobility could improve. She was proven wrong and made significant progress. Sarah helped translate the sessions to daily tasks and helped her identify and set up where and how to do her exercises in between sessions. This helped my mom become compliant with the exercise and she got stronger as a result. Sarah is motivating, encouraging and helped her aim higher. We are seeing steady improvement with her mobility. Sarah's work helped my Mom's PT in her hometown step up their work. We are so grateful for Sarah. Highly recommend.

I‚Äôve been to many physical therapists because of my back, but Sara was one of the most knowledgeable. She pinpointed where the pain was and taught me exercises specific to my issue. Knowing I was limited on how often I could see her, she taught me exercises to progress towards as I got better. Sara gave me hope where I was losing it. I‚Äôm back to doing yoga and other exercises that I love. I‚Äôm grateful for Sara‚Äôs help. I don‚Äôt think I could have gotten back to yoga this quick without her!!

I worked with Sara for ongoing sporadic back pain and was very thankful for her high quality care and the virtual appointments! She was flexible with my schedule with small kiddos at home and I appreciated her assessment and knowledge with postpartum/breastfeeding.  Her exercise plans were doable, effective, and I feel equipped to manage any future pain. Would highly recommend!

I highly recommend JOY PT! I've worked with Sara for a long time shoulder issue. She was able to assess me quickly, gave me some exercises to work on, and I quickly noticed a change in how my shoulder felt in the bench press! I was able to put weight on the bar that I haven't in years after just a few weeks. I am a personal trainer, and one of my clients loves her as well. Seek her out if you need some PT services, but be sure to do the homework!

I recently had the pleasure of utilizing JAFCO‚Äôs facility for a three-day corporate event while facilitating trainings across the state‚Äîand I was genuinely blown away. From start to finish, the experience was seamless. Michael, our onsite contact, made communication effortless and ensured that every detail was handled with care. His attentiveness allowed me to focus fully on our event without having to worry about the logistics.

The space itself was spotless, well-equipped, and supported by an incredibly helpful staff. Michael went above and beyond‚Äînot only offering fire assistance but also sharing his heartfelt passion for JAFCO‚Äôs mission. Hearing about the impact their facility has on youth in the community was both inspiring and humbling.

Whether you‚Äôre planning a personal gathering or a professional event, I can say with full confidence that JAFCO is the place to go. They‚Äôve set a new standard for what event support should look like.

What a huge disappointment and waste of time. After going out of my way to go there and fill out endless paperwork, I did not get any help or communication. Their so called case manager finally sent me a useless email (almost 2 months later), bc another agency got involved who kept hounding them. If they can't help you, they should just say so instead of frustrating you and adding to your stress level. Terrible service!

I just want to say that I love this place! I love it because my son can be himself! My son loves coming here he puts on his clothes so fast when we tell him that we‚Äôre gonna drop him off at Jafco lol and He loves Miss Adriana! But everyone is truly so nice and provide a warm welcome! I truly trust them and I‚Äôm a very skeptical person! They have tremendously helped my partner and I with our son by relieving caregiver burnout I recommend JAFCO ABILITIES CENTER! ‚ù§Ô∏è

I give a 5 stars reviews to Ms Julie for the way she helped and assist me with different programs that could helped my Son who‚Äôs Autism.
She‚Äôs so good, vey professional ,helpful, knowledgeable, kind very patient.
Thank you!
This place is wonderful! our assigned social worker was Tamar.  She was very helpful and assisted us with housing for a special needs child.  She went above and beyond ..

JD is very knowledgeable, kind in explaining everything about lymphedema that each individual needs to know plus advises us on what we need to do and what is expected to happen to us, so we are not shocked or surprised in any way. The doctors in the hospital said that I have severe cellulitis and lymphedema and JD started with me and he was very honest about the entire experience. Btw, the book; The Complete Lymphedema Management and Nutrition Guide Second Edition by Jean Lamantia and Ann Dimenna helped as well a great deal.

JD IN TWO WEEKS REDUCED THE SWELLING IN MY LEGS THAT ELINATED 629 DAYS OF UNBELIEVABLE  PAIN  AFTER TWO KNEE REPLACENTS THAT DOCTORS COULD NOT FIGURE OUT. HE REALLY KNOWS HOW TO DEAL WITH LYMPHATIC  PROBLEMsS. This man has given me my life  back. Jarrett is my hero!

JD‚Äôs services were instrumental in my recovery from a wrist injury affecting my weightlifting and mobility as a fitness instructor. His tailored treatment plan helped me regain strength and flexibility.

Highly recommend! üôå
Highly recommend Jarrett - he is pleasant and knowledgeable, and I feel so much better after only one session! Thank you so much üôèüèº

JD is the lymphedema whisperer!! He is amazing! He has worked wonders with my mom‚Äôs swelling in her feet and legs. Her legs and feet have been the thinnest,  I‚Äôve ever seen under his care. He is professional, courteous, compassionate and knowledgeable. He cares about his patients and treats them like family! JD is an asset to the Occupational Therapy community!

provider_name: JESSICA M BOOTH MS CCC-SLP & ASSOCIATES, PA
review_text: Sadly not a match for my daughter. or our family.  After evaluating her for physical, occupational and speech therapy we were looking forward to attending the clinic.  On the first day of speech therapy, Jessica sent me a message stating that my daughter "did not do well at office- super defiant, non compliant and don't think it's a good fit for my facility." There was no transition period, no patience or empathy on her part. My daughter is nonverbal and does not have any behavioral issues. My daughter's HHA also reported that she was rude to her and my daughter. She was not welcoming or kind. Very unprofessional.  Obviously not a match and very disappointing.

review_text: The best thing that ever happened in my daughters life was finding Jessica Booth. review_text: My daughter has been going to speech therapy with Jessica for six months now and I‚Äôve noticed great improvements in her speech. She gets so excited to see her every week. Jessica is very warm, welcoming, and compassionate. We‚Äôve always had a pleasant experience. Definitely recommend if your child is needing some additional support.

provider_name: JESSICA M BOOTH MS CCC-SLP & ASSOCIATES, PA
review_text: My son Codyüíôüß©üíú received speech therapy from Jessica 16 years ago. We recently visited her establishment to find a beautiful facility filled with love and caring therapists. Jessica‚Äòs love and commitment to her work is from the heart. She is One of earth‚Äôs angels. I cannot say enough about this woman, and I am extremely proud of her accomplishments.

provider_name: JESSICA M BOOTH MS CCC-SLP & ASSOCIATES, PA
review_text: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê I can't speak highly enough about Jessica Booth & Associates! My children have been attending speech and occupational therapy sessions here for the past few months, and the progress has been nothing short of amazing. The therapists are incredibly skilled, compassionate, and genuinely dedicated to helping each child reach their full potential. The personalized approach and engaging activities have made a huge difference in my child's confidence and development. If you're looking for top-notch therapy services that truly care about your child's growth and well-being, Jessica Booth & Associates is the place to go!

Our daughter has been going to JMS for almost two years now, and it has been the most amazing experience! All the staff and therapists have been absolutely  phenomenal. Our daughter is Autistic, level 3, and when she was diagnosed at 4 years old she was borderline non-verbal. Her transformation at JMS has been amazing! My daughter Nicole has been going to JMS and Eastern Florida Autism Center / Great Leaps since around late 2021 or early 2022.

My daughter has grown so much going here.

The speech and ot services at JMS blossomed my daughter to the level she is at now. She loves going and always comes back with a smile and a new thing she has learned.

My wife and I both had bad experiences when we were kids, so we were so scared about leaving Nicole in the hands of strangers.

I can tell you that we see the Jms and eastern Florida autism center/ great leaps staff as family! Jamie and her staff take so much care of my daughter and teach her so much.

I want to give a huge shoutout to Derek, as he has been a key to my daughter‚Äôs success.

He understands my daughter and always makes sure my wife and I are updated with my daughter.

Derek goes beyond his call of duty to make sure my daughter is understood, and our concerns are listened to and understood as well

Everyone is gentle and patient with our little girl. I know she is so loved

The aba services and great leaps together is making my daughter thrive and achieve new heights.

Everyday Nicole surprises us with new things she learned.

I can tell you that Jamie and her staff are second to none and I always am encouraging parents to take their kids there.

We just got my daughters IEP and true matrix score that will save us money and help get her the education she deserves, and we couldn‚Äôt have done that with out Jamie, Derek, and everyone else there.

I can‚Äôt speak highly enough about JMS! My son has excelled in many aspects due to the amazing therapists at JMS. Communicating with Jamie has been a breeze, she always hears my concerns and has figured out a solution in a very timely manner. Jules and Alexia have been my son‚Äôs main providers and they are invaluable! He‚Äôs made so much progress. Everyone there treats my son like family and we are very lucky to have found this company! Highly recommend!

I cannot say enough positive things about this amazing place! When we began our journey of therapies for our son it was overwhelming and scary to think of having him in the hands of anyone else . The first time we toured JMS and saw the atmosphere I knew it would be the best fit for us. Every therapist and staff member genuinely cares about each child who walks through the door, offering personalized support and celebrating every milestone. It‚Äôs clear that their passion is helping children thrive, and we are so grateful to have found a place where our child feels safe, supported, and encouraged to grow. I can‚Äôt recommend JMS enough .

provider_name: JP's Dog Fulfillment & Training Services, LLC
review_text:
