I can‚Äôt recommend JP Dog Fitness enough! From the very first session, he was patient, knowledgeable, and truly cared about helping my dog succeed. My dog has made such incredible progress with leash pulling, basic obedience, better routines, etc and I feel so much more confident as an owner thanks to the tools and tips I‚Äôve learned.

What stood out the most was his calm approach, clear instructions, and his customized training. It‚Äôs obvious he loves what he does and wants the best for both dogs and owners.

If you‚Äôre looking for a reliable, professional, and caring dog trainer, this is the place to go!

provider_name: JP's Dog Fulfillment & Training Services, LLC
review_text:
We are so thankful we found JP! A few months ago, we adopted a dog (Olive) who did not come from the greatest home and was terrified of people. We also have a very happy go lucky golden retriever (Juniper) who loved new games but was terrified of getting into the swimming pool.

With JP, we were able to get Juniper more comfortable with the pool and we now know mentally stimulating games that are fun for her! JP also gave us helpful advice and guidance regarding how we interacted with Olive. Olive has come so far and will now let a few select people pet her and doesn‚Äôt bark at everything that scares her.

Thanks again JP for your patience and understanding, we appreciate you!

provider_name: JP's Dog Fulfillment & Training Services, LLC
review_text: JP is an excellent teacher and wise beyond his years. He is incredibly patient, encouraging, and knowledgeable. Freya, our GSP, took to him immediately. JP helped me fine tune my leash walking technique, and I walked Freya today with no pulling whatsoever. I highly recommend JP‚Äôs Dog Fulfillment, and I am looking forward to learning even more about how to be an excellent dog parent. Thank you, JP!

provider_name: JP's Dog Fulfillment & Training Services, LLC
review_text:
I cannot emphasize how life-changing having JP as a trainer was to both me and my first dog. He has a fantastic awareness of canine behaviorism and was always professional and patient.

I rescued a shepherd mix a little over a year ago and genuinely struggled with managing her intense anxiety + low stress threshold, leading me to shy away from tons of social environments. I poured over resources online for dogs with similar reactivity problems and tried my best at acclimatizing her on my own. There were so many issues I felt at a loss as for where to even start.

At this point, contacting JP felt like a shot in the dark for me, but after our initial consultation, I appreciated how great of a listener JP was and how he provided his perspective. We worked through multiple sessions and gradually tackled scenarios that were always designed for the long-run instead of temporary solutions. There are days where I feel exhausted from reinforcing her routines, but being able to see my dog's clear improvement and her being more comfortable in her own skin honestly makes the effort all worth it.

provider_name: JP's Dog Fulfillment & Training Services, LLC
review_text: JP has been incredibly helpful with our dog, Cheeseburger.  JP is passionate about dogs and helping dogs live their best lives with their families.  I‚Äôve never had a dog before, and JP was an invaluable resource.  I would wholeheartedly recommend JP to any family that loves their dog and wants to improve their dogs behavior.

I had such a great time horseback riding here! As a first-time rider, I was a little nervous going in, but the team made the entire experience incredibly comfortable and enjoyable. They were so welcoming, attentive, and checked in with us throughout the ride to make sure everyone felt safe and confident.
The horses were incredibly sweet and well-trained, which really helped put me at ease. The trail itself was absolutely beautiful ‚Äì peaceful, scenic, and we even stopped at a gorgeous spot by the water for photos. It was such a thoughtful touch and made the experience even more memorable.
The whole ride was relaxed, fun, and so well-guided. I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough ‚Äì whether you‚Äôre new to riding or have experience, you‚Äôll have a fantastic time. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

I had a great experience with JUST RIDE! I‚Äôm so happy that I found this ranch! I highly recommend this ranch to everyone, who‚Äôs looking for a Relaxing horseback Trailride? The horses are well taken care of. They seem happy and balanced, the riding gear is amazing and our guide was awesome. It‚Äôs right at Tree Tops Park in Davie, which is my favorite! So many different trails, you feel like you‚Äôre in the jungle!

I had an amazing experience horseback riding here! I actually found this place on Google and, to be honest, I wasn‚Äôt sure about it at first because I usually don‚Äôt trust Google reviews‚Äîbut every good review they have is absolutely true.

From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel so welcomed and treated us with so much kindness and love. You can tell they genuinely care about their guests and their horses. The horses were so well taken care of, calm, and healthy, which made the ride even more enjoyable.

The trail was absolutely beautiful, with great paths that led us to views by the water. Our guide was fantastic‚Äîsuper patient and even took the time to help us take great pictures along the way so we could fully enjoy the experience without feeling rushed.

Also, the facilities were very clean, including the bathrooms, which is always a big plus when you‚Äôre out on an outdoor adventure.

Highly recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for a peaceful, fun, and well-organized horseback riding experience!

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
I had the pleasure of taking part in a horseback riding experience at JUST RIDE, and I can't speak highly enough about it. The staff, especially our guide, were incredibly kind, professional, and patient. They made sure that everyone, including adults with developmental delays, felt comfortable, safe, and fully engaged throughout the entire session.
The environment was welcoming and calm, and the horses were well-trained and gentle. The attention to detail and dedication to providing a positive, supportive experience really stood out. It was a heartwarming and memorable time, and I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough for anyone looking for a unique and enriching experience. If you‚Äôre in Miami, this is a must-visit!
My family and I had an awesome time riding with John and his staff. Very kid friendly and they all had a blast. We will definitely recommend all of our friends.

This place rocks. They are super nice to all pets and take care of them as if they are one of their own. Clean blankets everyday! Wow! The crew was really nice when checking in and checking out. Eveything was convenient and our pet was happy. They gave him a bath and trimmed his nails. Thanks.

Jack‚Äôs B Quick is the BEST place for boarding in the state of FL! Our GSD has been coming here for years while we travel. We moved 5 hours away, and still make the drive to drop Bear off knowing he‚Äôll be well cared for. We‚Äôre grateful for your facility, the owner, and staff. Highly recommend!

I procrastinated booking a place to board my big 'ol golden doodle, Frankie for one night.
He jumped out of the car and went right to them at the gate like he was their best buddy.
My daughter picked him up and said he seemed to enjoy it there.
Thankyou all for accepting him at the last minute!

My dog loved staying there. H stayed fir 6 nights. He's a water dog, and they have a Doggie pool. He loved it! Staff said he kept jumping in, swimming across, then climbing out to do it all over again. The staff are great. They took their time showing us around the first time we went to check them out. Answered all our questions. We plan on taking him back for day visits.

First time using them as our usual boarding closed for retirement.  We were on an 8 day cruise and 1 of our dogs got sick. They were very helpful getting him to the vet and getting the treatment needed when they couldn't reach us. They went above and beyond for our fur babies and we will definitely board with them again!

I have been going here for almost 10 years but in January everything changed. This company went corporate and all of their doctors quit, the doctors we loved. I was forced to see a floater vet who covers over flow even though I made an appointment weeks ahead.  The doctor could not even speak English and worst of all he hurt my dogs. In all the years my mother and I have been going there we never saw this! Blood was on the wall, my dogs and I could hear my other dog crying. My friend said he had the same experience and we will never go back there. Shame on them!

I had an amazing experience. The vet tech gave me useful suggestions to deal with my concerns. The doctor was very helpful and nice plus he complemented my cat, Talia. The front desk was efficient and friendly as well. I helped my sister bring in her two puppies the next day and the experience was just as lovely.

Kristen. In any type of business, it is essential that the first person customers meet is professional, warm, and inviting.  Kristen performs this function at Jacksonville Community Pet Clinic. Dr. Brown, the veterinarian we saw, was outstanding, along with the rest of the staff. We definitely will be long-term clients.

I had to. Have my beloved Abbey put to sleep yesterday. The care we both received from the staff and vet was wonderful. We could not have had a better experience in  this difficult situation. I highly recommend their care for your pets.

Management- where are you? Clearly not in the building. After multiple customer service issues I‚Äôm over it. After being a customer for 5 years I will not be returning. Very poor customer service, very dismissive staff. They even gave me a prescription for my dog that was the wrong dosage and she had been taking it for a week and was vomitting and had diarrhea, it wasn‚Äôt until I started asking questions that they realized what happened. Their policies don‚Äôt make sense taking my baby to Forever Pets.
The atmosphere was amazing.  The restrooms were clean, the employees were friendly, and the arena was everything expected.  I would highly recommend this environment.
The Black Cowboys Rodeo today was  awesome. I went alone and enjoyed every minute of it. This was my first Rodeo. I wasn't disappointed at all.
The Southern Soul Black Rodeo. It was nice to see them ride from little girls and boys to adults.

Recently visited for the first time. We went as spectators for a barrel racing competition. Parking was superb for spectators. Seemed as though there were plenty of spaces for horse trailers as well. The barn looked well kept. Inside the arena the seating was setup nice. Staff were friendly also. We will be coming back regularly!

We were a part of an amazing program called Career Construction Days through FSCJ. The program brought middle and high school students from 9 surrounding school districts to come and learn about careers in construction. This wasn't just a talking workshop or seminar... companies brought in actual trucks and equipment but this place is sooo large they more than amply fit!!! This place is HUGE! There's plenty of parking and bathrooms and definitely enough room!

I just graduated from rehab today, and I feel great! I had total knee replacement surgery in January, and I now have full movement of my leg, and I can ride my bike again.
Enough about the results, I'm here to give kudos to JOI. Both the surgery and the rehab went off as smoothly as I could imagine. I had about a week of in-home rehab, which was good, but JOI really impressed me with their professionalism and great attitude.
My therapist's name was Caitlin and I could not have had a better therapist. She has a great sense of humor and knows her job very well. I almost didn't want to finish rehab, because I liked it so much. After all, this is where I regained my motion.
The staff is very friendly and the therapists work together well. I wish all the best to JOI, and especially Caitlin.
Update 7 years later:
My knees are still working perfectly and I forget that they are artificial. I feel like I have 18 year old knees. My best advice after knee surgery is to move move move. And if the therapist wants you to do something, it may cause discomfort, but it is not going to hurt you any more than is necessary to get the flexibility you want.
I saw several people at rehab who seemed to be making zero progress, but they refused to push themselves when the therapist asked them to.
I hope your experience is as good as mine.

My experience at JOI Rehab North has been AMAZING!! My therapist, Kim has worked wonders with my Frozen Shoulder. My range of motion is almost back to baseline after only about 6 weeks of rehabilitation. The staff is professional and friendly. Also the check in and scheduling process is seamless.

Thank you to the entire team at this location.  Everyone was professional, courteous and always showed care and concern during each rehab session.  Janie greets you with a smile and works very hard to schedule your appointments and if there is any conflicts she resolves them right away.  Genesis and Justin went over every exercise and would check on you during your session to make sure you were doing things correctly as well as encouraging you to make progress.  They also wanted to make sure you were not in any excessive pain during your workout.  Amelia did not work directly with me but was always there to help out when necessary with a cheerful attitude.  My rehab was wonderful and I feel so much better after my knee surgery and rehab.  The team made me realize how important it is to exercise and keep mobile to make my surgery a success.  I would recommend JOI Northside to anyone needing rehab.  It was a pleasure to leave there feeling healthier and the best I had felt in months.

I recently had surgery on my shoulder and had to go through rehab to get back to work.  JOI had many outlets to choose from for my rehab which made it very easy to meet / keep appointments without having to drive a long ways to get there.

The people here are very friendly, and professional and treat each person uniquely according to their needs and the services are very personalized and don't leave you feeling like you are in a mass production environment where they are just trying to push people through for the money and numbers.

There were a few occasions where I had to cancel an appointment at the last minute and reschedule and they were very friendly and worked with me all the way to help me get my therapy in on my schedule with no hassles.

I would highly recommend JOI Rehab at the Main Street outlet for anyone finding themselves in a position to need rehab due to injuries or surgeries.

I had a great experience in my JOI rehab at the North side clinic. They were on time and ready for me when I arrived. Genesis and Matt Paulus explained my injury in detail (in layman's terms) and helped me understand how to prevent a reoccurrence in the future.The treatment helped tremendously and they gave me very beneficial instructions and tips on how to continue my rehab at home.   I will definitely recommend using them for rehab, and I plan to when I need treatment in the future.

December of 2024 I had surgery for a Rotator Cuff tear.  Soon after surgery I was scheduled for physical therapy.  I feel so blessed that my therapist was very proficient in all the exercises required to enable me to use my left arm again.   I spent about 10 weeks in Rehab.  Blinda Kirkland was wonder.  Yes, I had some pain which was expected.  She was so patient and with her calming personality I have gained full function of my left arm.
Thanks for hiring well trained and proficient therapist.

I've have a insurance mandated 6 weeks of therapy before they will consider a cervical MRI. I've been seeing Miranda for all but 2 visits. She is very knowledgeable and can relieve pain quickly. This past Tuesday I was in a lot of neck pain with vertigo. She put me on a table and manipulated my neck muscles, finding where the worst pain was and made it go away. The relief I felt when she was finished was amazing. I was able to perform the rest of the exercises she had me do with more flexibility than before. She is a gifted therapist!

I was very fortunate to be teamed up with Dr. Belinda Kirkland on my first post surgery rehab. Since then I have needed rehab on four more surgeries and I have insisted on Belinda being my physical therapist. She is very professional, honest, and results oriented and strives to meet the goals of totally recovery at which she succeeds very well. For having to go to rehab, sounds funny, but Belinda makes it worth it knowing that following her plan I have been successful in total recovery on all my trips. Hopefully i will not need her knowledge in the future, but if i do, i will be coming back to see her. The front office staff of Diane and Pam have also been very helpful in scheduling appointments and the atmosphere at the center is very positive and friendly with all the therapists.

I had a massive rotator cuff repair 4 months ago.  I saw Johnny B for occupational therapy and I cannot say enough about the care I received.  Johnny is so compassionate about helping his patients return to a normal lifestyle. My experience was so positive, I didn't want it to end!

I was in rehab with Dr. Amanda Garland from early December through mid April for rehab following surgery for a broken heel.  My PT, Dr. Amanda Garland was terrific.  She was attentive, well organized, effective, and fun (imagine that!).  I was impressed with how well she was able to manage as many as 3 clients simultaneously.  ALL the staff at the Mandarin facility are terrific!

I had a total knee replacement and went to JOI Rehab Center South for physical therapy afterwards.  I was very apprehensive and fearful that it would be very painful, but Allan Fiesta was an excellent therapist and I appreciate all he did to help me recover so quickly.  It was a very pleasant experience and I appreciate the staff at the front desk being so kind also.

JOI Rehabilitation Center South is an amazing place to go for Rehab. The entire staff from the Admin Team to the Therapists are professional, courteous, and caring.  I cannot say enough praises and thanks to my Therapist, Allan for helping me regain my quality of life.

I recently had two total knee replacement surgeries at Baptist South, one in November 21‚Äô and one January 22‚Äô and am beyond thankful for the great rehabilitation care I received from Allan Fiesta at JOI South.  His professionalism is above and beyond many others. His attention to care and detail in helping me recover and gain full movement was exceptional.  He sincerely seemed to care about each and every patient he had.  Really appreciated all the extra time he put into giving me tips on continuing care at home. If you are looking for a great physical therapist I strongly recommend Allen Fiesta at JOI South location.
I am very pleased with my physical therapy results from JOI. Allan Fiesta is a fantastic physical therapist. Highly recommended.

Hailey at the reception desk is a wonderful employee.  She treated me with kindness and respect.  I am retired military and she worked with Tricare to get additional PT authorized with patience and compassion.  She is a fantastic representative of your organization and should be considered for a pay raise or promotion.

Anthonio is a fantastic therapist who knows his job.  After my extensive shoulder surgery he got to work on me.  His competence and knowledge is only surpassed by his thoughtfulness and compassion.  He is another example of a great employee that should be considered for a pay raise or promotion.

Your entire staff was professional and helpful.  I point out Hailey and Antonio because they deserve it for their inclusive attitude that certainly played a huge role in my recovery.  Thank you!

The people here, from the front desk to the physical therapists are nice. Only been coming for a couple of weeks and making progress with my back. No pain only stiffness. I had surgery in June on my back and I could not be more happy with how I feel. I would certainly have the surgery again if I had to do it all over again.

I have been to the Point Meadows location twice for physical therapy for my knee... the first time trying to avoid surgery and the last time after surgery.  Fadel was awesome! he was patient and explained each exercise and how to correctly do them. when he was not available i saw Justin and Alayna and they were both great! Lisa at the front desk is very kind and knowledgeable about benefits.  Its obvious to me that everyone at this location is doing what they are the very best at.... taking great care of their patients. i highly recommend this location, i will always choose these professionals if i need their care in the future! thank all of you!

Could not rate Lisa, Fidel, and Justin high enough at Point Meadows! Lisa is wonderful up front. I worked with Fidel for 4 months post surgery and it's amazing how far I've come in recovery. Full recovery. If you trust this team, they will deliver the results you're looking for.

10/10 for patient support/care and front desk customer service. Fadel was my PT for 5 months and he was great. Helped me gain confidence and strength. Lisa the front desk help was so amazing!! I looked forward to coming weekly because of the happy atmosphere and care they provided. Thank you for everything!!

Excellent experience with JOI Rehab Point Meadows! Very friendly and personable staff! Lisa at the front desk was always friendly and courteous, ready, willing and able to help. I had a lower lumbar spinal fusion and was not allowed to do anything for 12 weeks until I started my PT. My therapist, Justin was great! I always looked forward to coming in for my appointments knowing I would walk out better off after each visit. Justin knows what he is doing, listens to and addresses your concerns. He treats everyone as an individual and has the patience of a Saint!  Justin also has a great personality and attitude. I have been to other places for PT, and was never impressed, so I'm really happy with my experience at JOI Rehab Point Meadows.

Dr. Tandron was excellent. I came down from Savannah to get assessed by him and am so happy I did. Worth every minute of the drive. Cannot recommend him and his staff enough. Thorough, friendly and full of advice for how to manage my physical therapy, supplements and exercise routine. It sucks to say I have to periodically come back for treatment, but at least I know it's to see a doctor who has my back.

I will say the physical therapy people have been always amazing. And nice, Dr. Carl Freeman, nice so far. They won't see me again if I don't paint them $200 after they've taken thousands of dollars from me. And I have to pay that balance down, which I didn't really know. I had until they told me. I had it because my insurance didn't cover some stuff that they told me it did cover and then my insurance. I was told was not covered over there. Anymore and I was sent in multiple letters, saying that my insurance was not being taken anymore. This to be told that it is taken. So I go to try and set up an appointment. And they tell me, because I owed them $200 that they're not going to let me set up an appointment, even though I am on a payment plan with them. And I've paid a 150 into it originally. Honestly, I don't have anything nice to say. Besides, Carl Friedman was nice. Oh, also, they thought it was okay. Not to give me an m. RI on my knee when it was broken, but they were fine with just doing X. Ray, so if I have any further damage, which they had to do an X-ray again, when I already told him I had received an X-ray for it, prior 2 Just to waste my money and the whole reason to see them was to get an MRI. And I guess they haven't taken enough money from me yet

From the moment I walked in, the staff and specialists made me feel welcomed and genuinely cared for. They took the time to listen to my concerns and made sure I never felt like just a number or another patient on a list. I truly felt seen, heard, and valued. Their attentiveness, compassion, and professionalism stood out, and they made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire process. Not only did they listen, but they also provided thoughtful solutions tailored to my needs. It was a refreshing and reassuring experience, and I‚Äôm so grateful for the level of care I received.

Wow, I think this place is really full of itself and way over priced.  I told them I was a long distance runner and athlete and was dealing with chronic hip pain, so I came to the ‚Äúexperts‚Äù. I was ready to really put the time in and do whatever it takes. I saw someone for 15 minutes and she gave me 2 very small simple exercises that anyone could do, (there was an extra fee of $33 for the one page print out). When I asked her for a more comprehensive plan, she told me she would give me more exercises next week and quickly ushered me out so she could get to her next patient. I felt like I got very little value for my $250+. Never again.

Day of surgery my doctor ran behind schedule by 3.5 hours and I understand things like that can happen. This wasn‚Äôt made clear until after I checked in. I was left out in waiting room for the first 2 hours unable to elevate my leg properly. I was freezing cold and the wheelchairs are entirely uncomfortable. My family finally flagged down a medical personnel and asked for assistance. I was brought a blanket but still sat another 20 minutes before moved to a preparation room & bed. I would have been more comfortable in my car than in that waiting room.

My experience with Jacksonville Pet Crematory was incredible. It was such a sad situation for me, but I trusted them and it turned out better than I ever imagined! I got such compassionate assistance, and what I received was so beautiful I cried and held it the whole way home. It is so special to me. I would recommend this pet crematory to ANYONE in need of these services. They are local and have been in business a long time. Have your pet handled by the local professionals here. I appreciate what I received more than words can express. Thank you so much!!

Mr. Hughey was amazing! I didn't expect to receive such personal care for my beloved Bella. Her urn was beautiful and the documents and folder returned with her were amazing. He even was kind enough to let me bring in my other pup Max (who died in 2023 and was cremated by another place) and prepare a new urn, since the one I received from a local place was cheap and shoddy (Paid the same amount for 2 totally different experiences. Mr. Hughey at Jacksonville Pet and Funeral Home is obviously the best!). He Gave my Max a proper urn and explained all the legalities and how cremation should work. I fully heartedly would recommend him and Jacksonville Pet and Funeral Home to any one who is unfortunate enough to need the service, but you loved one will be treated with love and respect!

We have been using Jimmy's services for over 10 years and for numerous family pets.

We went this direction to be assured that the remains we received were actually our pet and only our pet.  While we trust our veterinarian, it wasn't clear who they contracted with or how that company actually handled the cremation.  We really like having the entire process handled locally and being able to trust the result.

We found that making arrangements at the front desk of the vet's office wasn‚Äôt right for us.  Jacksonville Pet Funeral Home has a large dedicated facility and we've been able to make these decisions in private without being rushed.  We have chosen from the the sample urns on display and we‚Äôve also special ordered items in the past.  Everything has been high quality and the wooden items have held up very well over the years.

For us, the most important aspect of the service has been dealing with unexpected timing.  Jimmy prioritizes being available for pickups or meeting you at his office if you are bringing your pet to him.

For example, I‚Äôve been to his office a number of times on a Saturday or Sunday morning.  In another case, he knew our veterinarian and worked out a pickup on a Saturday when the vet's office was normally closed.  Each time, this has kept an already stressful situation from being more stressful due to unfortunate timing.

I highly recommend this company and giving some thought to what you might do well in advance of needing the service.

I recently lost my dog and my vet used Jacksonville Pet Crematory.  As they took care of my cat in 2011, I felt confident that there would be no issues.  I was shocked when I picked up my dog's remains and found them to be in the wooden box and sealed shut with packaging tape and it was done so sloppy.  I have never seen an urn closed up with tape that would be used to seal a moving box.  I am hoping that his remains are in a bag as I was promised as I plan to change out his urn to something nicer.  They had nice urns on their website but nothing that I liked enough for what they were charging when you can find them elsewhere much cheaper.  I understand it is a business and you need to make a profit but screwing over people who are grieving is not ethical.

We brought our beloved ferret Broomhilda here after she crossed the rainbow bridge. Jimmy was very kind he went above and beyond. He even added an ink paw print for our 4 year old daughter. Thank you for guiding us smoothly through this and the beautiful memorials.

I had an appointment for a hearing test. The staff was professional and attentive. It was found I had moderate to severe hearing loss in both ears so they showed me a line of hearing aids that were covered by my insurance. I came back about a week later for a fitting. I returned two weeks later for a follow up. I was treated with the utmost concern and I can't recommend a better facility to go to. Kudos for the staff at Jacksonville Speech and Hearing Center! You're all top notch!

This wonderful place have been taking care of my daughter Ashley,  since she was 6 months old, now 36!
She was fitted today for beautiful new powerful hearing aids....Dr. Mattson did an Awesome job!!
This office always strives to help people that are uninsured and can't afford services or help any other way. Call them and let them help you and your loved ones!

Our twin boys have speech delays, and Maddie and Lia have been with them since the beginning of 2024! We‚Äôve been with these therapists over a year and we have seen so much progress and development in both of our boys and it just goes to show how much work and effort they put into their careers. Thank you for supporting us on our speech journey!

I had a hearing test here recently, I was able to be seen fast despite being a little late from traffic. The receptionist and audiologist were friendly and the test went well although my hearing wasn't great in one ear they were able to accommodate me with a small hearing aid to be made. Nice place, 5 stars.

I have done sessions with Lindsey Yeager, from the very first session, she brought a rare mix of professionalism, deep knowledge, and genuine care that immediately put me at ease. I came in with nagging foot issues that had been bothering me for months‚Äîwalking was painful and uncomfortable.  But Lindsey listened closely, asked smart questions, and took the time to explain what was going on in a way that made sense.

Each session felt purposeful. She tailored the therapy to my exact needs, adjusting as we went, and gave me very effective exercises I could actually stick with. Her encouragement made a big difference, too‚Äîshe never rushed anything, and always made sure I was progressing without overdoing it.

If you're looking for a physical therapist who truly knows her stuff and cares deeply about your recovery, Lindsey is the one. She's an absolute gem.

I‚Äôm not a patient, but my loved one is seen here. IF you can get anyone to answer the phone, there is an excuse for everything from scheduling to getting a prior authorization sent to your insurance! Apparently there is is only 1 person who sends prior authorization as we had to wait almost 2 weeks for it to even be sent off because the girl was in vacation. This is not our problem (cross train your employees, auths are NOT hard nor are they time consuming and it‚Äôs part of your job) but this halted medical treatment potentially being done earlier. We‚Äôre facing the same thing now. Who tells their patient that you will have to pay out of pocket if you don't wait until the prior with is approved, and it takes a while to get the approval back, but we‚Äôre not gonna send it until right before your appointment, for what ever reason, Of which makes no sense. Insurance has 30 days to respond to Prior auths and are good for typically 30 days, and typically if the member calls after its been submitted they can push it a little faster‚Ä¶ they telling the people who work at the office that (at least the Cape coral office). It‚Äôs like pulling teeth to find people who do their jobs and don‚Äôt fight you every step of the way.. advocate for your patients please or find a job outside of patient care! Looking for pain management with better customer service‚Ä¶ simple ü´†

Jaffe Sports Medicine has truly transformed my health journey, and it‚Äôs time to give credit where it‚Äôs due. I am incredibly grateful for the outstanding care provided by Dr. Hattab, Kiki, Jada, and Amber. They invest genuine time in understanding your individual needs and effectively address pain with tailored medical solutions. The process is refreshingly straightforward; they seamlessly coordinate with my Blue Cross Blue Shield Medical coverage to handle all necessary authorizations, and the billing is completely transparent. I wholeheartedly recommend Jaffe Sports Medicine to anyone struggling with back and sciatica pain ‚Äì you‚Äôll be in great hands!
So far feeling good about treatments here. Austin is very helpful and seems to be most interested in a great result.

I can't say enough great things about Jaffe Sports Medicine! From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming, professional, and truly caring. Physical therapist Lindsey is absolutely incredible‚Äîher expertise, dedication, and personalized approach made all the difference in my recovery. She took the time to understand my needs, tailored my therapy plan, and motivated me every step of the way.

The entire team is outstanding, always creating a positive and encouraging environment. They go above and beyond to ensure their patients receive top-notch care. If you're looking for a knowledgeable and compassionate team to help you recover, look no further. Highly recommend!

I began visiting Jaguar Therapeutics because of severe shoulder pain that was waking me up at night. I'm pleased to say that my shoulder pain has improved and no longer disturbs my sleep. The entire staff of physical therapists is exceptional. I highly recommend this clinic.

Don't even know where to begin with my Jaguar experiences.

2+ years ago was dealing with some hip issues. Doc sent me for PT. A friend recommended Jaguar. After several weeks and not seeing results, it was one of the interns (under the direction of Nick) who figured out I was misdiagnosed. After surgery (and a new orthopedist) I returned to Jaguar and they got me back on my bicycle 4ish weeks out of surgery to do a 100 mile ride!

Fast forward to current day. Neck and shoulder issues brought me back to Jaguar. Scoliosis, some arthritis, and 30 years of cycling.......Chris and Justin are working hard with me. In a few short weeks my mobility and comfort on the bike is beyond anything I would have expected when I walked in the doors. The pain that was causing inability to sleep is a memory.

The team at Jaguar listens to you. They want to know your goals. What's important to you. The care plan is set accordingly. And the setting is awesome. I wouldn't think of going anywhere else. But you gotta do the work!

After surgery I started seeing Cam at Jaguar Therapeutics and I have been getting stronger each time I have my therapy.   Cam is professional and extremely supportive of my health and well being.  I highly recommend the Ft Lauderdale location for your therapy.

Jaguar therapeutics was the best rehab facility I have ever attended. The staff was incredible. From the moment you walk in and are greeted to the level of care, it is consistent and caring. They are very informative and listen not only to you and how you feel but your body and how it is responding to treatment. I would recommend this facility to any person who need physical therapy and strengthening. Whether you‚Äôre an athlete or not you are designed a program that will ensure you results.

Jaguar helped me a lot with my back pain. I go there as much as possible. The staff is awesome, Nikita is very nice and always helpful on the scheduling of appointments when my wife and I need it. Matt is great, we always have great conversations and I don't even feel the time going by while having physical therapy. I recommend it 100%.

Jaguar Therapeutics is one of the best physical therapy wellness centers in South Florida. I travel 30 minutes from Doral to Coconut Grove when I need my recovery or rehab sessions. Every Session is an hour long and is customized to fit your needs. Every therapist listens to you and tailors the session to eliminate your pain and make you stronger. Chris, Justin, Pat, Jorge, and Will are excellent. They are all very knowledgeable and kind. Patty always tries to accommodate my appointments to fit my schedule. I can‚Äôt recommend them enough. If you are on the fence and need to get back to feeling your best, I highly recommend Jaguar and their exceptional staff.

This place has a great vibe and their staff is friendly, professional, and educated. I had some mobility issues and pain in my lower back, and now I feel more confident to get back to a routine and am more educated on how to maintain my progress. They also helped me find another physical therapist for follow up appointments after I moved out of Miami. If you get the chance to work with Jaguar, then know you are in good hands! Thanks again!!!

I‚Äôve recovered from four knee surgeries over the past three years at Jaguar. And as a professional dancer, being able to achieve a full recovery was seemingly impossible at one point, but they helped me through one of the toughest years of my life. The service, the knowledge, patience‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve been to almost all their facilities and have worked with most of the therapists and I‚Äôve never doubted I was in the best hands. I could have never done it without Jaguar. And I tell every professional dancer and athlete I know to head their way whenever they are in need. No one does is better!

I had a stroke 16 years ago and Jaguar therapeutics has helped me so much in moving my body and getting back the strength that I once had. Justin and his team are amazing. My shoulder was popping out of its socket and they help me regain muscle so it stopped. Now they‚Äôre helping me regain my pelvic stability. I‚Äôve been to many therapists, and this one is one of the best.

I am in town visiting Miami and had some back issues. Was staying local to this spot and came in to meet Dr. Matt for his chiropractic help. He was super gentle and kind, and I could really feel that he cared about my overall health, not just trying to make a quick book off of a tourist :) Came in for two sessions, which included cupping and adjustments plus some physical therapy exercises to help during the rest of my vacation. Highly recommend.

provider_name: Jax Vets Affordable Animal Hospital at Baymeadows
review_text: Absolutely love them!!!!  The vet techs and Dr. Mechineni are the best with our babies.  They have supported us with all our pet needs that have, at times been, difficult. They have shown us compassion and care which says a lot about how much they understand the love of a pet.

provider_name: Jax Vets Affordable Animal Hospital at Baymeadows
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this veterinary office! They‚Äôve taken such wonderful care of my mini dachshund‚Äîfrom routine checkups to more urgent visits, their team is consistently professional, compassionate, and incredibly knowledgeable.

It‚Äôs clear they genuinely care about the animals they see. Highly recommend to any pet parent looking for a trustworthy and kind-hearted vet!

provider_name: Jax Vets Affordable Animal Hospital at Baymeadows
review_text:
I recently brought my dog in to be neutered, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the entire experience. From the moment we walked in, the staff made both of us feel completely at ease. They were warm, patient, and took the time to explain every step of the procedure and the aftercare instructions in detail.

My dog can be a little nervous at the vet, but everyone treated him so gently and kindly. The surgery itself went smoothly, and the follow-up care was excellent. I really appreciated the check-in call the next day to see how he was recovering.

Thanks to the wonderful staff, what could have been a stressful experience turned into something reassuring and positive. I highly recommend them to anyone needing veterinary care  they truly care about both pets and their people!

provider_name: Jax Vets Affordable Animal Hospital at Baymeadows
review_text: Jax Vets Affordable Animal Hospital is the only Vet we will take our Marmalade!  The staff-especially Brianna- are so pleasant and helpful and prices are reasonable. Go Jax Vets!!

provider_name: Jax Vets Affordable Animal Hospital at Baymeadows
review_text: best vet in town. been coming for 7 years. friendly and professional staff, amazing doctor with the kindest personality. I can‚Äôt see enough about this place. Five stars for seven years now

I‚Äôve taken my doggo to Sara for grooming since his very first puppy groom! She‚Äôs the absolute best! She‚Äôs so friendly, great with communicating, easy to schedule with & over all the years, not once have I been disappointed with her work! I appreciate Sara & all she does, she gives great advice when it comes to what will help with future appointments & does everything she can to make the service enjoyable for your pup! I could not say enough great things about her & what she does. I am so beyond thankful I found her so early on.

Great place for doggie daycare. Staff professional, friendly and very helpful. My goldendoodle will be using their grooming services with Ms Ashley. Ms Ashley groomed Hershey today and he looks fanominal!  The most important thing was how excited he was to see Ashley and how comfortable he is around her. She has a way with him that makes the grooming experience a joy for both him and me. My roommate witnessed rapport between Hershey and Ashley and decided to have her doodle groomed that this facility!!! Can't say enough positive things about Ashley.

I brought my golden Maverick to be groomed at Jazz‚Äôs. They were super easy to schedule with through their website. They quickly responded to my questions and were so kind!  Drop off and pick up procedure were calm and safe and easy to do. The space looks beautiful and all the dogs looked so happy!  Mav looks amazing!  They listened to a couple
Of concerns I had. He is trimmed up perfectly and his fur feels so soft!  We will definitely be back and for daycare too!  Thank you!!!

My dog Ari loves going to Jazz‚Äôs Wonderland and she hates leaving every time! It makes us look bad since she never wants to leave. She is always well taken care of and we get great pictures and reports especially when she is there for boarding! Thank you Jazz‚Äôs for taking care of Ari when we‚Äôre out of town!

Update: after the company reply I looked on the website and it confirmed that the complimentary photos should‚Äôve been expected every other day. Obviously it was spring break which I‚Äôm sure was busy which is why we didn‚Äôt want to pester the staff asking for updates but in hindsight it would‚Äôve been nice.

Very nice facility with nice staff. We boarded our 8 month old here for 3 nights (our first time leaving her) and had her stay for a half day to see how it was beforehand. We really liked their hours, the fact that they go inside for their meals and sleep separately .She came back very tired and had a great time playing with the other dogs since we don‚Äôt have doggie friends and she loves to play. We also got a few pictures of her while she was there for her half day. Unfortunately we did not have as good of an experience with boarding. We only got photos of her the first afternoon of her stay after texting to see how she was doing . For the rest of her stay, we received no other communication except for automated messages seeing if we wanted to buy St. Patty‚Äôs day cookies. When my partner went to pick her up she noticed several puncture wounds on her head that had scabbed and stilll had blood present. My partner asked the staff who brought her up if she knew what had happened, she walked away and walkie-talkied others, returned and said she wasn‚Äôt present for the weekend and would have to ask someone else. We followed up, they sent us a short video of her playing when I asked if I could call to discuss the matter. Sasha was kind on our call and communicated that they do body checks every morning so it must‚Äôve happened shortly before she was picked up. Unfortunately, since we only have photos of her from the first day, we had no way of confirming this. The wounds were small and we were able to clean them and with dogs playing this is a risk you take boarding anywhere but not knowing about it was very upsetting. She apologized for the lack of communication and said she would send the pictures they had taken to me (they did, not but I didn‚Äôt feel the need to see pictures). She said that they are supposed to send picture updates every other day during their stay and apologized (at our first meeting I was told we would get them daily). Our girl definitely had lots of fun and I had a good call with Sasha however, but because of the lack of communication, we will be considering other options going forward.

Nanette did a wonderful job at helping us train our new 8 week old pitbull puppy. We completed training on a weekly basis for a few months and our 5 month old puppy knows so much!! She has a very detailed curriculum and whenever we ask for help, even with things outside of the curriculum, she always goes above and beyond to guide us and teach us. She‚Äôs a wealth of knowledge, super friendly, super sweet and we couldn‚Äôt recommend her more.

Nanette was so special and kind. Our puppy Bailey loved her. Learned much more than we ever anticipated. I would recommend her to every new mom and dad. She had lot of patience with the parents üòÇ. Thank you so much.

The Raymond family cannot express enough gratitude for Nanette assisting us to work with our eight year old rescue Lilah, Jack Russell/Pit mix. We were so stressed with not being able to control Lilah when guests or delivery people arrived at our home.
Her barking was nonstop and sometimes I was concerned she could hurt someone. The first visit with Nanette clearly showed we definitely needed guidance in training.

Nanette was so patient, kind and very understanding with Lilah and me!  after the second session Lilah was so excited to have Nanette come into our home she did not want her to leave! With patience and clear directions we have a better working relationship with Lilah and her continued training sessions.  Lilah is calmer and is gaining confidence everyday to do something new when the opportunity arrives.
Nanette provided easy to follow training guides for each session and suggested training books and videos related to the precise behavior issues we were experiencing with Lilah

We sincerely cannot thank Nanette enough for all her fantastic training tips that has changed our lives and provided us with better ways to cope with our crazy pup!

Our family would rate this training provided superior and we highly recommend this type of training with Nanette for that timid dog that needs a little bit of extra love and .

We will miss you very much!
Sincerely,
Christine Raymond

Our Puppies LOVE Nanette and love the experience of the training.  Our puppies were about 4 months old when we started training with Jazzy Pawz-n-Wagz Dog Training, and we graduated just this last week.  Nanette was very patient with teaching both Mom and Pups, and making sure that I had the documentation to refer to when training.  How helpful!  Many other helpful suggestions for my pups, in addition to a great training program.  Thank you so much Nanette!

The BEST trainer we‚Äôve ever worked with, truly a dog whisperer.
We had four dogs with very different personalities and challenges, and somehow she managed to connect with every single one of them using only positive reinforcement and clicker training. No yelling, no fear-based methods, just patience, clarity, and consistency.

What I love most is that she truly respects dogs as emotional beings. She taught us how to communicate with our dogs in a way that actually builds trust instead of fear. We‚Äôve seen HUGE improvements in behavior, and honestly, in our bond with them too.

If you‚Äôre looking for someone who understands how to train without being harsh, who gets real results without breaking your dog‚Äôs spirit, this is the trainer you want. I recommend her to everyone I know!

Exceptional Experience from Start to Finish!
From the moment I walked in, I was warmly greeted and immediately felt welcomed. The environment was calming, clean, and inviting‚Äîsetting the tone for an excellent appointment. Throughout the entire visit, the care and attention I received made me feel completely at ease. A special shout out to Peta-Gaye for her phenomenal service‚Äîshe was professional, kind, and truly went above and beyond to ensure I was comfortable and well taken care of. I left feeling refreshed, valued, and already looking forward to my next visit. Highly recommend!

Welcoming space, clean & inviting .
Consistent quality service by Expert professionals.

I highly recommended the Services & Products at JenCare Skin Farm- They work!

Kudos  to Petagay & the Team üåü

So I enjoyed the service I got even tho it was not the service I requested. I wish there was online booking available to ensure that you're able to request the exact service that is listed on the website. I called to book for the eczema facial listed on the website but the staff member did not know about the service and said she added in the notes which the service includes the LED light therapy. I was told it was included in the notes when I booked, but was not offered or done during the service. I did enjoy the signature facial and felt the esthetician was very good at what she was doing. Can't wait to see the results of the facial.

I have been going to this spa on and off for years. Staff has changed. The recent visit was disappointing. Front desk staff interrupted my service to cross-sell products.  Not the way to do business. You wait until the customer's service is completed and then make your recommendations. When I expressed my thoughts on the intrusion, she simply tried to book my next appointment with no apology. Need customer service training.

Jencare should be ashamed of themselves. My aunt was a returned client and she forgot how to get to the facility. On the way there she called them THREE SEPERATE TIMES and they hung up on her two of those times. She was over 30 mins late for her appointment and they charged her for the service AND an extra $100 for being late. She‚Äôs older and the treatment she received was reprehensible. I hope the people she spoke to get everything they deserve.

I absolutely love this office! The staff is amazing. The front desk, vet techs and veternarian were so quick, kind and knowlegable. They did not make you feel like you were pressured into any vaccines or procedures that you were not comfortable with and explained everything in detail. I have a 120lb rottie that doesnt like going to the vet but when he came here he was kissing everyone. Also had a 5 lb chihuahua that i have brought here and she loves them as well. I highly recommend this clinic for dogs/cats of any sizes.

my mom and I have been coming here since I was a kid, and they have always been extremely kind and helpful from the front desk to the Drs. Today my dog was acting extremely strange and I was so worried. They got me in within an hour to help her, and everyone was so kind and helpful while I was so stressed. I wanted to especially highlight my experience with the nurse/vet tech Michelle N. Michelle was INCREDIBLE, kind, and went above and beyond. She literally is an angel. After my experience today I had to make this review because I just can‚Äôt say enough nice things about the entire company and staff. ü©µ Thank you, Michelle!

My dog ate a Diet Coke Can and I called them on an emergency they were able to see him as soon as I could bring him in, not only were the staff just the sweetest but my dog he is very nervous and doesn‚Äôt like to be away from me, but they let me stay and be there through the whole process, they also gave me the choice to drop him off, which was very nice of them. My parents I‚Äôve been going here since 2006 When I was a kid,  And I continued going here whenever I got my own dog in 2020, Every emergency, every little thing, they have answered urgently, They took him back to get sedation done before they brought him to me, and I could hear them back there saying that he is the best dog and a sweet potato, That made me so happy to know that they were happy to take care of him, Turns out he had no aluminum left in his system! I love this place. I highly recommend it To any new dog owner! They will treat your animal with love and respect, but mostly love ‚ù§Ô∏è

We had a wonderful experience, we're currently in the process of relocating to Ireland which is a complex process with animals. Dr Fusco is USDA approved and experienced in the necessary steps. She and her Vet Tech were both extremely kind with our cats and dogs, and spoke to them all so so sweetly. Happy to have found them!
The veterinarian,  Dr. Craney, has been sensitive and open minded to mine and my pets needs. The office workers are also friendly and very helpful. They have hours on Saturdays too.

After moving to Florida, finding ways to safely exercise our geriatric giant breed dog was daunting. Her vet had recommended swimming, but at 12 1/2 years old and never having done more than splash around in a kiddie pool, I didn't trust that I would be able to teach her myself.

Given her age, lack of exposure, and the fact that snow dogs aren't exactly known for their love of water, my expectations were pretty low, but I decided it was at least worth a shot. Not only were the staff able to get her to swim, they did so much more quickly than even the most optimistic version of my timeline.

I had originally thought that I would take her here long enough until she learned to swim and then shift to swimming her at home, but the pool setup here is so much better for an old dog than our home pool (shallower pool, wide and shallow steps) that we've continued to make the trek for further swim sessions.

The staff here is amazing! Took my senior german shepherd for a therapeutic swim and was very pleased with the level of professionalism and attention to his needs. They provided warm water hosing after his swim, ear solution to prevent infections, as well as a restroom for me to change into dry clothes. Will definitely be back! Highly recommend.

Jessie‚Äôs pool is incredible. From the first interaction with Karen and the swim assistants, I knew this was a special place.

There are not enough words for the happiness this experience brings to my dog, Bo, and me.
The swim assistants are so caring and make sure that Bo has a happy and safe time in the pool. Andrea is a special person and such a joy to work with. She is always positive, kind, and smiling. Her laughter brings even more joy to the session. We love her to pieces.

I am beyond grateful to have found Jessie‚Äôs pool, and that I am able to give my dog this incredibly fulfilling experience.

We cannot say enough about Dr. Keller and her wonderful staff. She has helped heal our dogs and cats for over 30 years with her incredible knowledge and gift of healing. She has helped our German shepherds, over the years stay healthy for their entire life and near the end of their lives, she made the quality of their lives so much better.Jesse‚Äòs pool has been a miracle and given them the quality of life that they deserve. We love each and every visit with their loving and patient staff. The improvement we see from the swimming is truly amazing. Thank you all for giving us extra years with our babies. ‚ù§Ô∏è

My 13 year old jack russel, Missy, has osteoporosis and it was definitely impacting her quality of life. Finding Jessie‚Äôs aqua therapy has helped her tremendously! Nicole is amazing!!! She has taught me in a few sessions exactly what to do at home to continue improving her overall wellbeing. I am so thankful that I found them and that Missy is like a pup again!‚ù§Ô∏è

5 stars isn‚Äôt enough to express how happy we are with Jet Set University! We dropped our puppy off at 6 months for the 1 month board and train. Our goal was to have him walk well on leash and eventually have good off-leash recall. What we did not expect was the phenomenal behavior at home. He no longer begs for food, sniffs around the garbage, jumps on visitors, etc. We have taken him to restaurants, hotels, stores and even an assisted living facility to visit family and he is the perfect gentlemen. He is always over-joyed to go back to Jet Set U for boarding which is how I know he was treated so well. We worked predominantly with Lilli and Chanin but have a positive opinion of all the staff (as does our pup!). I would never have another dog that wasn‚Äôt trained here. He will live the best life now that we can take him everywhere with us.

We had such an amazing experience with Jet Set University! Our pup had severe anxiety and was extremely reactive to the point where we had talked about having to maybe rehome him. It was devastating, we had tried months of private trainers and nothing was working for the severe reactivity. Luckily we found Jet Set just in time. He did the training there for 6 weeks and came home a brand new dog! They are so committed to their training and positive outcomes, and we could really see that with their training structure. The usual training was 3 or 4 weeks but they kept our pup for 6 weeks to make sure he was well trained and that when he came home he was 100% ready. The change was incredible to see, he seemed so much less anxious and less scared of things. He was way less reactive, and learned ways to cope with his anxiety calmly. Chanin and Shantel did such an amazing job with him. They were so good with our pup, they were patient and kind and every time we went back for the training sessions with them he was so happy to see them which also made me see that he was treated very well while he was there and that he loved being there. Their training really made the difference between having to rehome our pup and getting to keep him knowing we could keep him safe and happy. Our sweet Indy is thriving at home now and living his best life!! They do such wonderful work at Jet Set University. I would 1000% recommend them to anyone thinking of training their pup! Thank you so much to Jet Set University and to Chanin and Shantel (and the other lovely trainers who are there)!

A fantastic experience. We cannot say enough great things about Chantel and Chanin. The entire experience was fantastic and Elvis is a much better behaved dog. I never believe we could have such great results with a two year old Springer, but we did. I wholeheartedly recommend Jet Set University.

5/6 of our dogs have attended the board and train program over the last 3 years and we couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results of the training. We have a shiba, a terrier mix & 3 Shiba/aussie pups who are all very high energy, stubborn, my way or the highway dogs and the result of the training we received from the staff has been nothing short of amazing and has made our life at home and in public so much better. It‚Äôs not easy giving up your pups for 4 weeks or potentially longer but the care that they receive individually makes me so comfortable to trust them with our dogs. They take the time to get to know the dogs and let them feel comfortable in the unfamiliar space before even beginning the actual training. I would recommend JetSet University to anyone, it‚Äôs worth the money & the peace of mind.

Special shout out to Chanin & Shantel for all they did/do for us & the cute daily photos & videos ü•∫

We could not be more pleased with our trainers, the facility, and most importantly the results.  The trainers are compassionate, fun and effective. The lifetime brush up training makes this worth every single penny. Immediately following her off leash training, she left our family cat alone. That is only one example. When we take pirate out in public, no one can believe she is just a puppy. The trainers have a logical solution to every challenge. THIS PLACE IS THE BEST.

provider_name: Jill's Next Door Dog Walking & Pet Services, LLC
review_text:
Abbreviation: 1,000,000/ 10.

Long version: It was my idea to get a puppy-and  we found the perfect one, a little Pomeranian teddy bear Rambo! All was going well, except I would feel bad that we would leave and Rambo and would anxiously cry and shake-  my heart would break‚Ä¶ We‚Äôre all he knows, and his comfort. This went on for about a month, when I had my second bright idea- Rambo needs a buddy! Enter Gigi. A confident , cute ( at the time:) 1 lb maltepom!
And while I could celebrate that Rambo stopped using me as his chew toy, he found a new love of chewing on his little sister- mostly by her tail. This all sounds sweet and adorable, which it all still is‚Ä¶. But my fiance and I were struggling to get anything done for ourselves, or enjoyably so - it was hard to communicate when we were both feeling the pressure of having new pups to care for . We feed them 4x a day ( they wouldn‚Äôt eat by themselves) , pick up all their tiny potties, weekly vet visits, Gigi getting pneumonia, , not being allowed outside, parasites, not being able to do vaccines ‚Ä¶. It was one thing after the next‚Ä¶ and we were new to this. Having any social plans together or separate was out of the question.
We called so many puppysitters- nothing seemed like a fit‚Ä¶ we also didn‚Äôt even know exactly what we needed- we needed SO much help.
Finally, enter Jill‚Äôs next door pet sitters, and the amazing Melissa and Lori. The moment I spoke to Jill on the phone- in my frantic state- I knew everything was going to be ok. She listened, asked questions, took time to understand what we needed, and explained what their services could help with ( everything!) .
Rambo and Gigi get to see Lori and Melissa weekly, and love them so much- I‚Äôm able to pick time slots , and what we need that day‚Ä¶ such as a walk, lunch etc. Lori and Melissa send a full breakdown of what happens in their time together along with the cutest photos and leaves us so worry free. Rambo chewed up his squeaky toy? Gigi pottied outside. Gigi chewed on Rambo‚Äôs leg like KFC chicken wing. The updates are adorable and make us feel so happy and guilt free when we go about our personal things. The peace of mind that Jill, Mellissa and Lori bring is nothing short of life changing. I truly don‚Äôt know how we would have been able to do it without them..

My only request would be that this could be offered in Los Angeles and Chicago :)

So if you‚Äôre on the fence about pet sitters, look no further- the best is right here.

provider_name: Jill's Next Door Dog Walking & Pet Services, LLC
review_text: I have used Jill's Next Door Dog Walking & Pet Services several times now over the past year and they have become my go to for dog walking when I am out of town. Every sitter we have had has been extremely attentive to our dog‚Äôs needs, including walking preferences and medication schedules. The app makes it easy to schedule visits and I love the daily updates with pictures. Melissa has most often been aligned with our scheduling needs and she is amazing. My pup adores her and loves their visits together. The peace of mind I have from knowing that my dog is not only well cared for when we are out of town but also happy and loved is invaluable. I cannot recommend them highly enough.

provider_name: Jill's Next Door Dog Walking & Pet Services, LLC
review_text: Lori was our dog walker and I can't say nice enough things! We needed someone last minute and they worked with our schedule to meet our dog mooncake and get to know her routine before we left. I received photos and updates throughout each of the visits. It made us feel good to know that mooncake was in such good hands. Here's a photo I got of mooncake getting treats after one of the walks. We also got a nice checklist assuring us that the things we asked for were taken care of. I would recommend them to anyone and have!

provider_name: Jill's Next Door Dog Walking & Pet Services, LLC
review_text: I can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about Jill‚Äôs Pet Service!  From the very first visit, I felt completely at ease knowing my dogs were in loving, capable hands. Every day they came by, I received photos and thoughtful updates that showed just how happy and well-cared-for my dogs were. They were not only efficient and professional, but also incredibly kind and attentive to each dog‚Äôs personality and needs. It‚Äôs clear they genuinely love what they do, and that makes all the difference. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a reliable, compassionate, and top-tier pet care service!.

provider_name: Jill's Next Door Dog Walking & Pet Services, LLC
review_text: I can‚Äôt recommend Jill‚Äôs Next Door Dog Walking and Pet Services enough. We were new to the area and I was very nervous about leaving our pets. One of our dogs is anxious and not good with new people and situations. Jill and her team (our sitters were Melissa and Raquel) were patient, kind, and accommodating. They won over our shy dogs and made us feel completely comfortable. They sent updates and photos with every visit and were communicative, easy to reach, and attentive to detail. The dogs clearly loved being pampered and I loved being able to have them cared for in our home and knowing  that they and our home were safe while we were away.

Samantha at the front desk had been exceptional at helping us and making sure our referrals have come through and helping us stay on top of our appointments.
Our Physical Therapist Emma is beyond incredible and is helping my son Mason get stronger and healthier so he can return to his sports ü•∞

I can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about Joe DiMaggio Children‚Äôs Hospital. From the moment we walked in, the staff treated my son with such kindness, patience, and genuine care. Every doctor, nurse, and team member we encountered went above and beyond to make sure he was comfortable, informed, and cared for every step of the way. Their professionalism is matched only by their compassion. We are so grateful for the excellent treatment and support it truly made a difficult time so much easier. Thank you for taking such great care of my son and for treating us like family.

My experience at this pediatric hospital was absolutely impeccable. From the very beginning, the medical and administrative staff demonstrated exceptional professionalism, kindness, and care. They took the time to explain every procedure and treated my child with great compassion and respect.

The facilities were clean, well-organized, and thoughtfully designed to make children feel safe and comfortable. It‚Äôs clear that everyone working there is truly dedicated and passionate about pediatric care.

I am extremely grateful for the outstanding service we received and would highly recommend this hospital to any family in need of quality pediatric care.
My child was so thankful for service and support. She loves Freedom and Golden, dogs. They made her day. Also all staff were amazing very kind and patient. Valerie did not want to leave. )))

Excellent Care and Compassionate Staff.

We had an outstanding experience at this hospital. Our daughter needed surgery, and from the moment we arrived, the entire team‚Äîdoctors, nurses, and support staff‚Äîtreated us with warmth, professionalism, and genuine care.
Their attention to detail and compassion made a difficult time much easier for our family. We are deeply grateful for the care our daughter received and highly recommend this hospital to anyone seeking excellent medical treatment.

Our girl Maggie completed her day train program at John K9 last month and we've been so impressed with the obedience skills she learned and her overall improved level of confidence! Maggie was (literally) rescued from the streets and had some reactivity and anxiety that was difficult for us to work through, and John K9 felt like the right place for her training foundations. Her trainer, Carlos, and the rest of the staff were so patient with her. We could really trust the team to take good care of her, and it didn't feel like she was just another number at the facility. She has been so much more responsive to commands, especially in situations that may have triggered her previously. We're so proud of how far she has come, all thanks to John k9!

If I could possibly give these people 10 out of 10 stars, I would do it! I‚Äôve worked with trainers before, and these people are head and shoulders above anyone I‚Äôve seen or worked with. Not only are they amazingly dedicated to their craft, but they are equally as committed to you and your dog. My dog had developed some reactivity when we would go out on walks around my apartment complex after training had been completed. Not uncommon for rescues when you have no idea of their background.  He wasn‚Äôt duplicating this behavior at their facility. 4 trainers (owners too)and 4 dogs came to my apartment complex and worked with my dog and me for an hour! They commit to your dog for his lifetime. I‚Äôve never seen that done before! My dog is so much better for this training and seems to love all the trainers when he sees them! 10 out of 10 stars !!!!

I have waited about a month to make this review just to see if what we paid for was worth it. In full transparency once we got home, we thought we wasted a ton of money and the training didn‚Äôt work, but you only feel like that if YOU as the parent don‚Äôt put in the work.

All of that to say, we are extremely satisfied with JohnK9. Our Rocky was adopted back in April and we noticed some tendencies that we wanted to correct and this training did exactly that. We got constant updates on her and they didn‚Äôt make us feel like we were being a bother if we asked for extra updates, or called with questions and concerns regarding her stay there.

When we called for a tour, they were technically closed, we asked Savannah if there was anyway we could come in due to our schedules and she allowed it with no problem. We then met John, at first my husband and I didn‚Äôt even realize he was the owner, he jumped right in with what we where going to expect out of this training and everything out of his mouth was 100% true, he was real from the beginning. He stands behind what he says because he knows it works. Lily was Rocky‚Äôs main trainer (all of the trainers are phenomenal who work HARD day in and day out loving on our pup.) but Lily was just as phenomenal and knowledgeable on Rocky and her quirks during our exit session. Lily took the time to explain and correct us so Rocky could be successful when we went home. My husband dropped her off today and she had a bit of trouble but he said when Lily came out, she was super excited and didn‚Äôt even care about her being left there!

Please ignore all of the negative reviews on here, this was NOT the experience we have had. I wish i could give more stars.

I‚Äôd give TEN stars if I could. AMAZING transformation with my 7 y/o dog!! John and his partner was very informative and answered all my questions. They sent photos and videos weekly and his trainer was also AMAZING!!! Very happy with the outcome!! If you‚Äôre considering having your fur baby trained this this is hands down the place!!
Can‚Äôt wait for my puppy to start puppy camp in a couple of weeks!

I wanted to share my positive experience with this facility. My dog had had some prior training, but he wasn‚Äôt quite where I wanted him to be in a few areas.

My first visit was with John himself. He was very thorough, and took his time to explain things. Even though there was a lot going on at the facility during my visit, not once did he rushed anything.

Alexis was my dog‚Äôs actual trainer. She is a compassionate yet so capable trainer and I couldn‚Äôt be happier. My dog Diego looked just as happy the day that he finished his 3 week course as the day he went in.

My biggest concern was that being a doodle owner their coats require quite a bit of maintenance to prevent matting. I was fully expecting to have to deal with knots and matting after 3 weeks. This was absolutely not the case. This on its own tells me everything I need to know about how well they take care of the animals while in their facility.

It‚Äôs a big investment, but I highly recommend this facility.

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, East Lake
review_text: I brought my daughter for speech evaluation here and had the best experience. Staff was so kind. Ms Kay was amazing! my daughter is usually shy when meeting new people , but she made her and myself feel so comfortable and welcomed. I would highly recommend.

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, East Lake
review_text:
My sons have attended various therapies (PT, OT, Speech, Feeding, and Oral-Motor therapy) at this location. The boys and I are have spent a lot of time at the facility. We are so fortunate to have such great therapists accessible in northern Pinellas County. The entire staff truly cares about their patients and has always answered all of my questions and are very patient with my boys. They are encouraging and uplifting and have helped my son‚Äôs overcome so much and continue to help them overcome hurdles and gain more skills.

I also love that we can have labs drawn, some imaging performed, and see a number of the Johns Hopkins All Children‚Äôs Hospitals specialist at the East Lake location. This location is very convenient for our family. There is plenty of parking but it is worth noting there are two different entrances- one for therapies and GI and the other is for the other specialty clinic, imaging, and labs. The clinic/lab nurses are great too!

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, East Lake
review_text:
We‚Äôve had the privilege of working with Miss Marijcke twice, first when my daughter was just a year old and again at age two, and both experiences have left a lasting impression. From the moment we met her, I was blown away by her skill, deep knowledge, and the incredible care and understanding she brings to every session.

Miss Marijcke has a special way of connecting not only with her patients but also with their parents. My daughter absolutely adored her, and so did I. When we were recently discharged, it was honestly bittersweet. While we were excited for our daughter‚Äôs progress, we were genuinely sad to say goodbye.

She knows exactly what she‚Äôs doing, speaks with clarity and confidence, and continues to learn and grow in her field. Beyond her professional excellence, she is a remarkable woman, a dedicated mother, and a gifted teacher. We are so grateful for her impact on our daughter‚Äôs development and for the compassion and reassurance she gave us along the way.

Miss Marijcke is truly one of a kind!

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, East Lake
review_text: Johns Hopkins Hospital gave me the best care during my visit. The doctors and nurses were professional, compassionate. The facility was clean, well-organized, and focused on patient comfort. I highly recommend

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, East Lake
review_text: We love Dr. Amanda Spicochi, she's awesome. The staff is quite awesome as well. They are so friendly and they always explain what they are doing, with each procedure they do, from checking his BS to his vitals etc. You never feel out of place, so to speak! We won't go anywhere else, nor see any other physician, unless we absolutely have to.

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, Fort Myers
review_text: To begin with I feel like the opening paperwork should‚Äôve been able to be filled out online. Secondly, the staff told my daughter she might need a hearing device and they weren‚Äôt even qualified to tell her that. She was 11 years old and this freaked her out. I really think the techs should keep to their line of work and leave the interpretation of test to the providers. I expected way more from JH. I will not be returning here

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, Fort Myers
review_text: My daughter sees Michelle for feeding therapy, which is a continuing journey. Michelle is very kind and patient especially since we see her so early in the morning and my daughter is grumpy, lol. My daughter also just completed the 8 week intensive occupational therapy 3x per week with Stephanie, and she was disappointed to graduate, she loved it so much. All of the OT staff that we had experience with were awesome and I can't say enough nice things. Stephanie is very knowledgable, informative, patient, and a pleasure all around. We had several sessions with Delaney before beginning the 8 week program, and she was so sweet and informative. Tara was the OT that evaluated my daughter, and we also had one session with her and she was fantastic. Sometimes during the 8-week program, we shared a room with another child, so I got to "experience" Rachelle's OT as well, and she was great with the kids. After completing this 8-week program, I have noticed some improvement in my daughter's sensory issues. This past week we have had several events that would have resulted in a meltdown before OT, and we actually handled very well since completing OT. Office staff has been a pleasure to deal with over the last year. The person I spoke to the most was Rachel with scheduling, who was always very nice and did her best to work with us on scheduling appointments. Cynthia deals with insurance and she was also very nice and helpful. The security guards were great as well, and one of them gave my daughter a worry worm at her first visit. All around, this location has been a wonderful experience!

provider_name: Johns Hopkins All Children's Outpatient Care, Fort Myers
review_text:
We are very thankful for all the staff and therapists here at John‚Äôs Hopkins!
