My dog LOVES him and feels safe with him which is so important to me and he came home with so much more confidence. Guy is so genuine and knowledgeable and has been there for me and all my questions through the process of training my dog and I am so so grateful for him and all his help! Truly an above and beyond type of guy and rock star of a trainer. 10/10 highly recommend!

We couldn't be happier with the professionalism and results!  Ava is a high-energy 1-year-old working-line German Shepherd with a strong prey drive.  Even though she lives with several other big dogs, she was too reactive and anti-social for the group AKC obedience classes that have worked well for my GSDs and Retrievers in the past.  Fortunately, a colleague recommended KPro K9.  I've never had a "personal dog trainer" and wasn't sure how she would do, but Ava absolutely loves the one-on-one training sessions with Guy Smith.  We've trained at our home, in the neighborhood, and out in the community.  In just eight sessions Guy has helped us minimize Ava's unruly reactions to other dogs and turned outings with her into a joy instead of a chore.  I highly recommend Guy and KPro K9 - the experience has been nothing but positive.

We tried the Board and Train for Behavior Modification and it was LIFE CHANGING! Gino, thanks for improving Leche's quality of life and mine! This is a long review but I wanted to give you more context on why we LOVE and highly recommend KPro K9 and Lead Trainer Gino!

We had always considered training and would say things like "one day we will do it", "it's too expensive" or "I don't have time" and unfortunately something happened that "forced" us to do it. My advice is DON'T WAIT! I can't fully express into words how amazing and mind opening the initial in-home evaluation was with Gino. He assessed her and told me things about her that I never picked up on. I had "Dog Goggles" for sure, I was blinded by a lot the things because she's my dog and such a cuteee! We started with at home training once a week however, our home dynamic changed when 2 dogs came to live with us. At first she was not the aggressor and during their last interaction she was the aggressor and we realized that she needed more specialized training for specific behaviors. The Behavior Modification training program was amazing because it was customized for my dog and not a standard package. Included was also a few more 1 on 1 training sessions after to assess how she and I were doing. Gino also took the time to explain the reason behind it the correction.

This is an investment for your dog and yourself, if you are ready to train your dog you HAVE to make the commitment and put in the effort to stay on top of training. It is unfair to put the expectation on your trainer, in our case Gino, to return Leche to us as a perfect dog and expect her to thrive in a different space. I realized Gino taught her all the skills at an accelerated pace and it was my responsibility to keep up with the training whether it's longer ones or smaller training increments like putting on her leash, going to potty, greeting guests, etc.

Gino has been absolutely incredible throughout this entire process, even till this day! We truly feel lucky to have worked with him and recommend him to anyone that has dogs. Hearing my family, neighbors and strangers make comments of how well behaved my dog is or how much she has improved is not only a testament to the amount of work and effort we have put in, but also to Gino as a trainer. He has worked with Leche on a 1 on 1 for weeks and with me after training  that we have been able to succeed thanks to his training.

1. LEASH WALKING/ REACTIVITY. Prior to training, she would pull, hop and yank, go side to side and bark at everyone. I had to wake up early and stay up late to ensure there was no other dog out. Even before leaving the house, putting on her leash was a whole other mission. These are all things we truly no longer have to worry about! He has worked a lot with me to change my mindset and keep her accountable prior to us stepping out of the house. I actually enjoy taking her on long walks and no longer avoid humans or dogs. REACTIVITY. She was reactive to everything and now can move pass those stressors. We still work a lot on exposure to different scenarios and sounds. As well as off-leash training and recall. We even had another dog stay over for a few days recently and no altercation, Gino helped us a lot with prepping prior. THANK YOU!

2. MENTAL STIMULATION/ ANXIETY. Prior, Leche did not get enough mental stimulation even though we have a backyard. Thanks to everything we learned with leash walking and reactivity I am able to give her more mental stimulation which has improved her appetite, bowel movements, sleep and anxiety. Her separation anxiety was terrible. She would follow me everywhere. Now I can freely move all around the house and she does not follow me. When we leave the house or come home there is no crying, whining or howling.

3. KENNEL/ CRATE TRAINING. Leche would free roam prior however working with Gino we quickly realized that by not putting her in one it was increasing her separation anxiety. This one took a little longer but it was worth it! Now she does not bark, cry, whine or pant.

I needed a  Place for rehab after my shoulder surgery. my doctor recommended different option but I needed the BEST, did my own research and Thank God I found KRU Lab. They are located in my area, and they made me feel at home since day one. My shoulder is stronger than before surgery. They took the time to guide me and get me Results, they very knowledgeable and trust worthy. I Definitely recommend, and trust them with my rehab and exercise needs. Carlos and Kyle are Simply the Best.

My son just finished 10 sessions of physical therapy for a knee injury, and we are so grateful for the care he received. When he first started, he was in pain and unable to play baseball. Thanks to the therapist‚Äôs patience, encouragement, and expertise, he has made amazing progress and is now back to playing the sport he loves. The staff was always professional, supportive, and welcoming. Highly recommend this clinic for anyone needing physical therapy!

Kyle McNeil has been a huge support while I‚Äôve been working through some post-surgical knee pain. He is friendly, knowledgeable, and genuinely invested in my recovery. I‚Äôm seeing serious results!

The entire staff is welcoming and positive - highly recommend checking out KRU.

The superior quality of care you will find at KRU PT is truly unmatched. The team's expertise and knowledge allows them to provide a fully customized approach, not a one-size fits all solution. KRU PT has a boutique feel, where the entire staff is warm and welcoming.  For almost 10 years, KRU has been my go-to for effective, lasting results.  I worked with Carlos for the past few months and his talent, skill and dedication were instrumental in helping me heal my shoulder. Highly recommended!

Had myself convinced I needed a 2nd rotor cuff surgery. Kyle and Carlos were fabulous!! I was skeptical at first, but after 5 visits I could see improvement.  Really took the time to explain the laser technique, dry needling and all the necessary exercises to relieve my pain. So grateful I found them!!

After a couple of years of traditional talk therapy, my therapist suggested I try alternative types of strategies to dive deeper into myself.
*Enter Tina with Kai Total Wellness*

I shared with Tina my goals and intentions and we started routine Restorative Sole Sessions to ‚Äúput in the work‚Äù in connecting with my intentions and higher self.  Each session provided a space for me to unapologetically take a beat, pause and rest.

As a mom of three, business owner, woman and wife, I feel the pressure of the world on my shoulders. There are many things to do and 24 hours a day doesn‚Äôt seem like enough time. Each session I give myself permission to look inside the things that are wearing stressing that week, calming my thoughts, and come out of each section with a clear mind.

Totally recommend and wishing this kind of reconnection and calmness to anyone reading this looking for it.

An update:

I had an amazing sole session w/ Kai Total Wellness, Tina last night that I had to brag about.  I‚Äôve had a couple of these treatments in the past but last night was a extra special as she hand picked edible flowers and herbs from the  15th Street Farm for a fun sensory exploration first followed by a delicious flourless cake for my birthday celebration.  Her space is calming, dimly lit w/ twinkling lights, crystal bowls, rain makers and soothing smells of lavender.  To get started, I chose an oracle card and set my intention being open to whatever would pop up, lying on heated table under comforting blankets she works her magic while massaging my head and sends me into a relaxing yoga nidra.  She continues to massage arms, legs(knees down) and the best foot massage while continuing to play sound bowls clearing my chakras.  Ahhh.  What a blissful experience, I cannot wait to work w/ her for small group sound healing, meeting her at the farm for tastings, and more healing treatments.  I highly recommend reaching out to her for all of your healing needs.‚ú®‚ú®

As soon as I walked into this salon, I felt at ease.  The relaxing sounds of the ocean in background, lovely scents and Tina was extremely welcoming.  She did wear a mask, if you‚Äôre still unsure about safety, I personally felt bad she was wearing the whole time, but I digress.  I had the Transcending sole session and I absolutely loved the experience.  I highly recommend for total relaxation.  Tina placed a weighted blanket on me and also set up the salt air therapy machine which is perfect for congestion and overall good health.  She did sound therapy w/ crystal bowls and a short meditation to get in the chill mindset then an amazing leg and foot scrub and massage.  Wow!!  I have plantar fasciitis, and this treatment felt beyond incredible.  God, writing this review is making me want to book another treatment stat.

Kai Total Wellness is always a wonderful experience. The way the world is, the best thing you can do is take care of yourself. Kai is definitely one of the best ways to do that.
The environment is calm, soothing and just perfect to relax and forget everything. Tina goes out of her way to make the environment as peaceful as possible. The minute you walk in the space it is calming and lovely. I go in for my manicure and pedicure.
Usually, the salons I have been too were busy and loud. Not Kai, it is soft and quiet.  I get a salt treatment during my pedicure. It is just that added something. I feel fantastic by the time I leave.
I very much look forward to my appointments. It is just too long between visits.
Do everything you can to treat yourself to an appointment. You will be so glad you did.

I can say this is the best service and pampering here; Tina is great and it is very safe.  Being a small enough space and just me and her, there is no one else coming in and out.   She is well protected with her mask and I wore mine as well.   There is plenty of time between clients so she has time to sanitize the whole space.  It‚Äôs perfect, I love it!
I am very cautious yet I felt  totally comfortable and worry free at Kai and my nails look amazing, my eyebrows are looking great too!

You leave your stress behind the moment you walk into the door. I know it sounds like a commercial but literally when I walked in I could feel the stress leave my body. The environment is very relaxing and peaceful.

I understand its meant to be relaxing. But whoever decorated that place did a fantastic job with the decor. The moment I walked in I was greeted by Tina. She had a warm personality with a friendly smile.

I ended up getting the full package I think. I got a facial (first one ever) , massage and a salt therapy treatment. And they all were very very relaxing. Tina did a great job balancing communicating with me during the full experience about what she was doing and when since it was my first time. I was a little nervous. But the atmosphere and her friendly personality put me at ease and I was able to enjoy my experience.

One of the best things I enjoyed was after my treatment. Some people are pushy trying to sell you their products when you visit their business. Not tina.. she asked me how I enjoyed it then told me it was available for purchase. Not pushy not aggressive.. I kept me completely in my relaxed state of mind.

My next visit will be soon. And I can see myself calling for appointments after rough weeks at work. I was completely relaxed and my mind was at peace the entire time I  was in her shop. And that's the goal right?

35 minute ‚Äúassessment‚Äù for $650 with my 5yo autistic son with Apraxia of speech. I was told would be about an hour. Lied to by assessor and principal saying my son did well and would receive follow up next day. 4 days later I‚Äôm told my son couldn‚Äôt be assessed, scored to low, couldn‚Äôt recognize 2 letters of the alphabet but couldn‚Äôt be advised what letters, and became aggressive. I requested to review the video of which the school has only produced 11:44 minutes of. During the video I witnessed Valerie Forte flailing speaking loudly with a high pitch while repeating the same thing over and over. This was hard to watch and as someone with an M.S., BCBA I expected more. My son has been evaluated by BCPS at grade level K and has therapy 5x a week. No one has been able to wrap their head around these results. To add insult to injury I was later offered a pre-K spot. I couldn‚Äôt trust these people with my son 35 minutes let alone a school day. Reviews posted also consist of equal past and present employees to boost their rating. Don‚Äôt be fooled.

We started taking Jax, our rescue pupper to Kamp K9 a month ago and he absolutely loves it and so do we! We‚Äôve never boarded a pet before so wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect.

After providing vaccine records and passing his kamper evaluation to make sure he was a good fit, we dropped him off for day kamp to get him more used to the process. He‚Äôd always come back super tired like he had the best day with his friends. We boarded him for a week and had to drop him off again for another stay and he was so excited to play with his friends again. Tail wagging as soon as we pulled up to the facility!

Kamp K9 is clean and the dogs are happy. The best part is getting ‚Äúletter home from kamp‚Äù and photos from Jax. We really appreciate the staff for all they do!

Hi there, my name‚Äôs Suzie Q and I‚Äôm a very good girl (if I do say so myself). I just wanted to bark out a HUGE thank you to Kamp K9 for being my absolute favorite place in the whole wide world.

From the moment I trot through the door, my tail doesn‚Äôt stop wagging. The staff always greets me like I‚Äôm a celebrity, and let me tell you‚ÄîI am in their eyes! I get to chase my ball, play tag with my best friends, and sunbathe like the queen I am. It‚Äôs basically paradise.

Speaking of friends, I love my crew‚ÄîTeddy, Chi, Nelli, Presley, and Otter. We play all day and it makes me so happy! My dad says he loves how safe and clean everything is, and he can tell I come home tired, joyful, and very well cared for.

Honestly, I wish I could go every day. Big woofs and tail wags to everyone at Kamp K9‚Äîyou‚Äôre the best!

Love,
Suzie Q

I can‚Äôt rave enough about Kamp K9. Whether I‚Äôm traveling for work and boarding my dog, or just dropping him off for daycare, I‚Äôm confident he‚Äôs in the absolute best hands. They have dog trainers who have a strong understanding of dog behaviors, ensuring the dogs are safe and grouped appropriately. The staff loves your dog like their own, and they communicate so well. I get a ‚ÄúLetter Home From Kamp‚Äù every time my dog is there, which comes with the funniest pictures (see attached). The letters home make my day.  Kamp K9 does require an initial evaluation visit and the owner will give you a tour of the facility. I‚Äôve heard of some facilities not providing this type of transparency, so this is something I really appreciate. The dogs are crated for nap time and bedtime. There are both indoor and outdoor play areas, and medical needs/med administration can be accommodated to. I‚Äôve gotten several of my friends taking their dogs here as well, and I know they share the same sentiment as me. I love this team so much. It truly is a home away from home for my pup. Sometimes I think he even loves being here more than his own home haha. Hands down, best daycare in town!

Best dog playcamp in town! also, the best place for boarding your dog! The care that Brian and his team give to our dog always makes us feel comfortable when we‚Äôre traveling. The pictures and letters from home that they send daily are absolutely precious and so fun to read. I wouldn‚Äôt take my dog anywhere else!!

Great people, pups and packages. Moved my mini doodle here and she loves it. They make accommodations for the heat during the summer including covered outdoor spaces, water for those who like it, and indoor play areas once it heats up. Locally owned with owner on site often. Pick Kamp K9. They are great and plenty of variety for the dogs.

provider_name: Kari Mann Dental Studio: Advanced Dental Implants, Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
review_text: If you need a dentist this is the place! I recently moved here and didn‚Äôt know what dentist to go to. Am I ever glad I picked this place. From the moment I walked in the door I was kindly greeted and didn‚Äôt have to wait more than a couple minutes to be attended to. Dr. J and Kat took care of me throughout this procedure. They took the time to explain everything and each step along the way. What a great job they did keeping me comfortable. Providing a blanket and even a warm eye mask.! On a previous visit, Tay and Michelle attended to me and they were wonderful as well.! I can‚Äôt thank you all enough for the excellent care I received. It is quite obvious you genuinely care about your patients. I have complete trust in Kari Mann Dental Studio. They truly are the best!!

provider_name: Kari Mann Dental Studio: Advanced Dental Implants, Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
review_text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about my recent visit! From the moment I walked in, I felt completely at ease. Faith, the dental assistant, was incredibly kind, professional, and attentive. She made sure I was comfortable every step of the way and explained everything clearly.
Danielle, my hygienist (and friend!), was exceptional. Her attention to detail, gentle touch, and friendly personality made the cleaning experience surprisingly enjoyable. She's not only amazing at what she does but also brings such a positive energy to the room. My teeth have never felt cleaner!
The entire team went above and beyond to ensure I had a smooth, stress-free visit. If you're looking for a dental office where you're treated with warmth, expertise, and genuine care, this is the place. Huge thanks to Faith and Danielle - you both are rockstars!
~ Christine Castillo

provider_name: Kari Mann Dental Studio: Advanced Dental Implants, Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
review_text:
Dr. Jenna N. Johnson, DDS
I had the pleasure of seeing Dr. Jenna Johnson for a dental exam on April 2025, and I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the experience. Dr. Johnson was warm, attentive, and incredibly knowledgeable. She explained everything with clarity and care, making sure I felt comfortable and informed throughout the visit. It‚Äôs clear she brings both skill and compassion to her work. I‚Äôm grateful to be in such capable hands and would gladly recommend her to anyone seeking excellent dental care.

Jenny (R.D.H Dental Hygienist)
Jenny was absolutely exceptional during my dental cleaning on April 2025. She was gentle, thorough, and incredibly attentive to detail. Not only did she do a fantastic job clinically, but she also took the time to make sure I was comfortable and relaxed throughout the process. Her professionalism and kindness really stood out. It‚Äôs rare to find someone who combines skill and care so seamlessly‚ÄîJenny is truly a gem.

Alyssa (patient care coordinator)
From the moment I walked in, Alyssa greeted me with a friendly smile and a welcoming attitude that immediately put me at ease. She handled the check-in process smoothly, answered my questions with patience, and made the whole experience feel organized and stress-free. Alyssa‚Äôs kindness and professionalism were much appreciated‚Äîshe‚Äôs a wonderful first point of contact for the office.

provider_name: Kari Mann Dental Studio: Advanced Dental Implants, Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
review_text:
I thought everyone was friendly, the building was clean, the amenities were nice, and the actual dental experience was fine. However, all that was overshadowed by lack of transparency in pricing. I had called prior to booking to get a quote for an initial appointment and the receptionist told me the price for the cleaning and the price for the xrays. During the appointment, the hygienist explained that we would need to do a panoramic xray and some quicker xrays in the room with the bite guard. I found out after the fact when checking out that these X-rays have separate costs and the price the receptionist quoted me was for the cheaper quick in-room X-rays not both, so I was left paying an additional $100+ for the panoramic X-ray that I hadn‚Äôt planned on paying. My appointment cost $389 and that was just for the assessment and X-rays, not including the cleaning since that whole process took over an hour and I hadn‚Äôt planned on being gone from children for longer than that. So now I have to pay an additional cost (who knows how much) to actually get the cleaning. I feel scammed because I would have gone somewhere else had I known the true cost of the appointment. Dentists are usually self pay so they should be held accountable for transparent pricing.

*Update* After reading the response by the office, now I‚Äôm offended since they‚Äôre basically calling me a liar. During the phone call, we discussed the pricing of one xray and the cost of a basic cleaning. We didn‚Äôt discuss the cost of the panoramic xray or the cost of an initial patient assessment. I‚Äôll give the benefit of the doubt and this may have been miscommunication with what I was asking for, but at the appointment, there still wasn‚Äôt a discussion of the costs associated with the X-rays or the assessment by the doctor. I probably would have agreed to them after discussing the benefits, but it‚Äôs about informed consent, and my dispute is that I wasn‚Äôt given this. In my review I state that they should have transparent pricing for all services that are offered to the patient before the patient agrees to them. I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs an attack on the company or unreasonable, and definitely not a reason to attack my character.

provider_name: Kari Mann Dental Studio: Advanced Dental Implants, Family & Cosmetic Dentistry
review_text: Kari Mann is an amazing dentist and her new office in Cape Coral is state of the art gorgeous. Her staff are so friendly and knowledgeable and hygienist Danielle is absolutely the best!!  Faith, Doc and Pearl are pretty good too!

Exceptional General Obedience Board & Train at KARMA K9
We recently sent our dogs to Karma K9 Obedience Training for their board and train program focused on general obedience, and we couldn't be more thrilled with the results ‚Äì it was truly a fabulous experience from start to finish!
Before the program, our dogs struggled significantly with consistent loose-leash walking and staying reliably in place. We knew they had potential, but we needed professional guidance to unlock it.
From the moment our dogs joined the program, we felt completely confident in the care and expertise of the KarmaK9 team. Their communication was consistent and reassuring, with regular updates and photos that truly put our minds at ease while our dogs were away. Upon their return, the transformation was remarkable. Our dogs now demonstrates beautiful loose-leash walking ‚Äì walks are finally enjoyable! ‚Äì and can hold a solid "place" command even with distractions. It's clear they received not only expert training but also genuine care and attention.
The go-home session was incredibly thorough and helpful, equipping us with the knowledge and techniques to seamlessly integrate our "new and improved" dogs back into our home life and maintain their fantastic new skills.
If you're looking for a professional, effective, and truly caring solution for general obedience training, we wholeheartedly recommend Karmak9 Obedience Training's board and train program. They exceeded all our expectations and have made a significant, positive difference in our dog's behavior and our daily lives together. Thank you, Karmak9, for such a fabulous job!

We did a lot of research, and talked to a lot of friends, acquaintances and coworkers. K-9 Karma kept coming up. We went and took a tour, talk to the owners and then did more research. We felt comfortable and chose to use K-9 Karma for a four week full training program of our 18 month Pup named Maui. K-9 Karma was everything we expected and more. The owner and the trainers are 100% dedicated to each and every animal in their charge. When we brought our Maui home, the difference was night day. K-9 Karna did an absolutely outstanding job. K-9 Karma trained Maui for not only on leash but also off leash, trained him to not jump up, to be calm around other animals and people and to show no aggression. K-9 Karma exceeded every expectation. If you are  looking for a place to train your animal, K-9 Karma is that place

Our goofy golden boy Odin needed a little tweaking on his manners. He went for the off-leash program back in June.

It was a long 4/5 weeks, but worth the wait. He is able to be a more active part of our family now. He went from having limited access in our home without direct supervision, to being out and about with us all day other then when he is in his crate at night. He used to bark all night no matter what we did, but the team at KarmaK9 was able to re-crate train him, helped his leash manners (they were rough), exposed him to other dogs (something we were nervous to do), and helped with his constant counter surfing and jumping. He is still very excitable, but they gave us all the tools to succeed, now it's our turn to continue to help him grow and increase our shared confidence.

I look forward continued interactions and advice from our new friends.

We absolutely love Karma K9 and will be referring their training sessions - specially the Off Leash Training. Every single staff I‚Äôve encountered were phenomenally kind and truly caring for my fur baby. Their knowledge in training is superb as how they answered all of my questions I could think of. I looked forward, every Friday, to receiving a report card full of photos, videos, my pup‚Äôs possible feelings throughout that week and a very detailed lesson report of what occurred and how well things went. Once we took our pup home, we noticed a difference, for the better, in her quick obedience and discipline - especially around bustling/distracting/fun locations. Our pup still has her same silly, playful, confident character we left her in before training ‚Ä¶ she simply is much more obedient when required!

Thank you Karma K9,
- Yara and Christina

I can‚Äôt speak highly enough about Karma K9. Both my dogs went here for off leash training and all future ones will also. My oldest dog was trained by Melissa in 2019 and now she‚Äôs the new owner! That right there should tell you how dedicated and passionate she and her staff are about making sure your dog and you have the best experience and memories afterwards. Another bonus is for kenneling: they will only kennel dogs they have worked with.

I‚Äôm having a hard time coming up with the words to describe the impact Dr. Merricks had on my daughter and our family. My daughter went from a kid that didn‚Äôt think she could ever be ‚Äúnormal‚Äù to a star athlete with a ton of confidence. She accepts that she has this thing and just lives her life to the fullest.  She‚Äôs a teenager now and she‚Äôs expressed interest in doing what Dr. Merricks does when she gets older. I just can‚Äôt say enough good things.

Dr. Amanda has truly changed our family.  We have tried several difference counselors/therapists over the years to help my pre-teen on the spectrum with his emotion regulation.  It was a daily struggle that resulted in countless hours of screaming meltdowns no matter what we tried and we felt like we were barely holding it together.  With his autism, we never knew what to allow (because it was beyond his control) and what to push back on.  Dr. Amanda was the first person who wasn't afraid to challenge him a little bit and helped us know where it WAS okay to push the limits.  While it was challenging at first, he is now a COMPLETELY different person.  He is happier, more patient, and better able to handle frustration and change.  Our entire family dynamic is better, calmer and we just feel like we stop holding our breath all the time, waiting for the other shoe to drop.  She will challenge you to put in the hard work, but it's worth it and we will forever be so very grateful.

Dr. Merricks and her staff are highly trained, take the time to get to know their patients, and provide quality treatment and evaluations. They are one of the top practices in the Tampa Bay Area. I strongly recommend this practice!

Dr. Merricks is an incredibly compassionate therapist who worked with me during the year my physical and mental health deteriorated at an accelerated pace.  I was unsure how to recover as I needed more than therapy and she was always there for encouragement to keep trying the next thing until I found relief.  She is also very prompt at communication via her patient portal whenever I needed help (which was very often during this year).

I highly recommend her expertise in CBT and working with you to improve your situation.  One of the best!

Dr. Merricks and her team of providers are compassionate, professional, and highly knowledgeable regarding evidence-based mental health practices. I refer to their team often and highly recommend their services.

This is a very caring, organized, professional and welcoming office. When asked for referrals for psychological assessments or therapy services in the Fort Myers area, I always highly recommend this practice. The psychologists at Katz Psychology make it easy to coordinate care and  provide thorough clinical assessments.

I refer family, friends and clients who need real experts to this practice. The staff is like no other! Trained in REAL evidence based treatment and SUPER professional. Leading cutting edge research to BEST practices. A number of clients have shared their success stories because of these psychologists!!

Sheba Katz is the worst so called professional in SWFL. She is a highly unethical psychologist and brought harm to my son. My 4-year-old son was suffering from tremendous trauma right under her idiotic nose, and developed an eating disorder as well as other mental health disorders, but she testified there was NOTHING wrong with him in court. Her opinion was later contested by my son's pediatrician and other COMPETENT mental health professionals and appropriately diagnosed. After terminating services with my son 2 years ago, this devious woman came back on the scene by giving A FRAUDULENT REPORT to DCF that she was currently treating my son, that included all kinds of recommendations, when she hasn't seen him in 2 years (which I have in writing). Her report served to thwart the DCF investigation, and left my son without services. Before DCF received Sheba Katz's report, they were going to recommend the father get the services that were needed per CPT. Because of Sheba Katz, that didn't happen. This is a true warning to those considering this woman to provide services to your child...keep on looking for your child's sake! She is currently under investigation for fraud and malpractice. I am also in the human services field and therefore, it is my ethical duty to let the community know that this woman is incompetent and not safe for your child! If you have a court case DO NOT bring this woman into your family's life, because she will only leave them ruined and broken the same way she did mine.  When she was confronted with her negligence, lies, and the interventions it took to treat my son's issues that she tried to "cover up," she deflected and blamed it off on others. She can not be trusted, but she is also not very smart because she was found out. I now pass it on.
I've had nothing but positive experiences with Dr. Katz and staff in evaluating my son.
I know both psychologists at this practice to be highly ethical, experienced, skilled, and dedicated. You will not go wrong to seek services from this practice.

I started meeting with Sharon Keefe about six weeks after I had tendon transfer surgery on my left thumb. I saw her twice a week for eight weeks. Sharon is a great hand therapist. She‚Äôs very professional and knowledgeable. She is also patient and friendly. Over the time she was treating me, I made good progress, and now, my hand and thumb are able to do nearly everything I could do before the injury that resulted in the surgery. I am still working on building up my hand strength, but because of the clear instructions that Sharon gave me, I am able to continue on my own at home. My experience with Sharon was outstanding.

I loved going to Sharon for therapy. She made my arm feel a lot better, not only did she do a great job but she makes you feel real comfortable.  I felt like I was talking to an old friend rather than  a therapist for my arm pain.  She takes the CDC's guidelines very seriously, she's always wiping down things her clients come in contact with and makes sure you are wearing your mask and sanitized. I would definitely recommend her to anyone. Thanks Sharon for being such a caring therapist.

If you are looking for a knowledgable, thorough, and caring hand therapist, be sure to make an appointment with Sharon Keefe.  Besides being very competent, Sharon also is a pleasure to be with. Each hour I spent working through the exercises she gave me passed by much more quickly than I had expected.

This was my first experience with physical therapy. I had a broken wrist.  Sharon is very friendly, professional She took measurements, explained every procedure and suggestions on how to continue to strengthen my wrist.  Highly recommended

There is nobody I would trust more with hand/ finger rehabilitation than Sharon Keefe.  After a traumatic accident and surgery to repair damages to my index finger and thumb (partial amputation and severed tendons) my recovery required rehab with a OT specifically a CHT (Certified Hand Therapist).  Sharon was professional and understanding of the degree of the injury and her positivity for progress was reassuring from the beginning.  I always felt during my appointments that my rehab was 100% the focus as she walked me through the importance of doing each exercise correctly.   I am fortunate that I was able to keep my fingers but the luck that I will always be grateful for is being placed in the rehabilitating care of Sharon Keefe.  I walked in scared introducing myself to a therapist and I walked out confident with my rehab progress and having a new friend in Sharon.  Without a doubt the #1 hand therapist in my book.  Thank you for all you have done and helped with me during my road to recovery.  Forever grateful ~ Matt

Kelcie's Treats is the best possible treat you can give to not only your horse, but your dogs as well!  They are all natural and healthy. I love the pumpkin scent.  "Brady "always knows when I carry a few in my pocket!  As soon as  walk in with the orange bag, it's easy to see I am the most popular person on the aisle!  All our 4 legged friends at the barn love them!

The 5 lb. bag goes a long way and the new 1lb. is very convenient to bring on the road to shows.  These treats are the best and I highly recommend always having a bag in your trunk!  They also make a nice gifts for all my friends who ride!
Kelcies Horse Treats are wonderful. Our horses love the flavor, and because they soften easily, the older equines can enjoy them too!
I absolutely love the treats not just because of the amazing benefits but also my horse also loves them! I definitely recommend these treats!

I highly recommend Kelcie‚Äôs Treats! They are a healthy treat that my horses always look forward to after their ride. It‚Äôs a treat I enjoy giving to my horses because of its outstanding and natural ingredients. Plus, the horses love them!!! After seeing the result with Kelcie‚Äôs Treats, it has quickly become my favorite treat for my horses!

Kelcie‚Äôs treats are truly one of a kind! I will never feed another treat. My horses and my dog are obsessed and so am I. I can carry Kelcie‚Äôs treats around in my pocket and not worry about them breaking or leaving crumbs like other treats. If you haven‚Äôt tried them you‚Äôre missing out! 10/10 recommend
Dr. Rain is a wonderful practitioner with a very calm, kind disposition. She is skilled in assessment and has an abundance of knowledge in many areas of child psychology.

I can definitively say that without Dr Rain I wouldn't be here today. I've seen her for over 10 years now. I was diagnosed with some issues when I was 14 and was having a very hard time in high school. She helped me develop a better, more positive outlook on life even when it looked very grim to me for many years. Recent problems in my life have nudged me to see her again, and I wouldn't see anyone else.

Bottom line: she is compassionate, knowledgeable, and worth the wait for an appointment.
I can't thank Dr. Rain enough for helping diagnose my son a few years back. She was recommended to me by the pediatrician my children see. I recommend her to you as well!
Kind, compassionate, actually cares and is very helpful. Joyce up front is lovely as well

This barn is very beautiful and family oriented! Kelly has beautiful horses that she takes very good care of! My daughter has been riding hunter in GA for 2 years now and Kelly was the most gentle yet stern instructor we've had interaction with over these years. Kelly was able to help me as a non-equestrian by giving me advice and things to practice with my youngin' in order to make her stronger in the areas where she is weak.

I recommend this barn to anybody interested in lessons , whether it be a beginner or advanced rider! Kelly trains her barn assistants very particularly in order to maintain consistency, which is very imperative at a barn!

Have been riding here over 3 years and have gotten my groove back after a 30 year break from riding. Kelly has a super barn of horses and ponies for all levels. Great place for kids or adults starting out or equestrians honing their skills. Quiet drama free, very clean barn and environment.

Has been a great experience at the barn! All the girls are great and you can really tell that Kelly cares about her students! The barn is always clean and well kept and the horses are all so sweet! Definitely recommend lessons here!

Absolutely the best barn family anyone could ask for. Lessons for riding and groundwork are equally important here, and you‚Äôre being taught the proper way, no short cuts! All of the horses are well cared for and beautiful!  The barn is clean! Everyone is extremely kind hearted and patient. My daughter loves it!

Kelly Morris is a great trainer. My girls have been riding with her for a year now and they love it! The barn is clean the horses are in great shape and she treats everyone like family. She pushes my girls to be the best they can be. She starts the kids from the ground up with learning how to groom, put on the saddle/bridle, untack and wash and put away. She teaches them safety and how to behave around horses. Kelly is definitely passionate about what she does and the kiddos. Hearts4horses is such a fun atmosphere, too.

provider_name: Kendall Speech and Language Center, Inc.
review_text:
The Kendall Speech and Language Center has been essential and excellent in helping my son with his Language development.  Mrs. Nottoli is compassionate and superb in her abilities and I do not think my son would have progressed so well without her guidance.  The SLP, PT there are top notch as well and Carol has been supremely helpful and wonderful to our family.  I would highly recommend KSLC to anyone who needs their services.

Dr. Adam Nader

provider_name: Kendall Speech and Language Center, Inc.
review_text: Kendall Speech And Language Center was absolutely critical in helping my son speak, and prepare him to succeed in a regular school.  I absolutely believe that Wendy Nottoli  and her team are the reason my son is doing as well as he is. They always recommended what is best for my son, rather than focusing on bringing in more income for the business.  You would be in great hands at Kendall Speech and Language Center.

provider_name: Kendall Speech and Language Center, Inc.
review_text: Great team of people! Excellent therapists

My daughter had her first appt last week I was amazed how friendly and patient they are with the kids especially those with special needs. They come get the kids on time and have them out on time, they redirect behavior instead of drawing attention to it. I would recommend to anyone looking for a great speech therapist. They tell the parents after every session what was focused on so we know what to work on as well.

Both of my children have been receiving speech therapy here for quite some time and the progress they are making is amazing! My older son (5) is speaking in sentences, answering questions, and having conversations now after about a year of therapy so far. When he started he was only using one-three word phrases and had echolalia when answering questions. My younger son (2) has been going here for a little over six months and his vocabulary has increased. He seems to want to talk more and the vocabulary is functional as well. His tantrums have decreased due to an increase in his ability to communicate to get his needs met. My older sons latest re-evaluation concluded that he no longer needs to work on speech as his speech is now on track, and so he only needs to work on the language aspect (how to understand and use language appropriately). The therapists are all so nice. Highly recommended. AND my kids LOVES going to speech!

Our daughter has been going here for a little over a month and a half. We have noticed a drastic change in her speech patterns and she has been speaking more. We are extremely blessed that we found this office & Ms. Kiersten is just amazing with our daughter. We are truly grateful. Thank you for all your help !!!

We have been coming here and working with Ms. Shanna for close to a year now she has helped my son so much and he enjoys coming every Thursday. This place is great. We love it here. My son has  Improved a lot since starting here.
My son started speech therapy when he was one year old with Ms. Laura. We absolutely loved her and the entire office was great. Our year there was always a pleasure. Would highly recommend.

Dr. Krieger and Marian conducted a very THOROUGH and PROFESSIONAL evaluation during my first appointment. It was obvious that they had reviewed all of my medical information before I arrived. The TREATMENT plan developed WORKED WONDERS! I've gone from excruciating BACK PAIN to hours of PICKLEBALL several days a week! The HOUR of HANDS-ON THERAPY provided has been like none I'd ever received before! My status is re-evaluated at the start of each session, and the treatment provided VARIES according to how I am doing. I GREATLY APPRECIATE the PERSONAL CARE that I am given, the availability of appointments when I feel the need for a "tune-up", and the development of an easy-to-follow and effecive AT-HOME EXERCISE PROGRAM.  ...So VERY MEDICALLY KNOWLEDGEABLE, so very DEDICATED to bringing relief to patients...(and so very PERSONABLE!). OUTSTANDING!

I cant express how amazing these two PTs are. Its like nothing youve ever experienced in this area. In 2 sessions they have taught me so much about my body! The improvement in the gym has been insane! For example, I was struggling on my squats. They connected it to my glut. Ive been training that lazy butt muscle every day like they showed me along with other strategic strengthening and stretching of the weak links in my posterior chain... I put on 3 to 5 reps on ever leg movement 2 weeks later with NO PAIN and NO DISCOMFORT! These two humans care and are worth their weight in gold. Please give them a call.

A true Miracle worker. I had a major pelvis injury 15 years ago. I spent thousands and many years on chiropractors, but relief never lasted more than a week. Every step was pain unending. She fixed my pain and gave me my life back. Within a couple months of therapy my nerve pain was completely gone. She even taught me stretches and techniques to maintain the drastic improvement she made happen.

I am more grateful than words can describe. As long as I do the stretches and routine I am pain free.

If you have given up on hope, go to her business and you will find it again.

Hands down the BEST PT office you will ever visit. I spent over 3 years visiting different PTs, chiros, neuro and ortho surgeons, and spine specialists in the Atlanta area searching for answers to my neck issues. When I moved to Florida, I once again went searching for medical help and through another PT referral, met Kerri and Marian. I can truly say after years visiting other medical professionals and wanting to heal, Kerri is the ONLY doctor who put in the time and effort into helping me. Her techniques are incredible, nothing I had ever experienced in any other PT office before. Expect hands on PT work for the entire 1:1 60 minutes. She is here to help you get better and she actually cares! She is extremely professional and her facility is very clean. Kerri is very friendly and will make you feel comfortable. Marian has also been in on some of my appointments and has enhanced my healing journey. I never thought I would see the light at the end of the tunnel with my neck issues until I met Kerri.

I must say hands down the best in there field. If your looking for good honest one-on-one physical therapy or physical rehab from an old injury or new injury, trust me this is your go to. I speak from my own experience im constantly getting hurt and these girls keep me moving and active so that I can keep working and helping others in my field. They‚Äôll work with your insurance company or create a plan that works best for you. Marian, thank you for going above and beyond!

My LO is an ex 23 weeker weighing at 14 ounces. Many dismissed his early entry into the world his reasons for being delayed and not giving him a fair chance of resources he needed. Thankful the BCBA saw through that and was able to have my little guy start right away. NOT only was she a pleasure to discuss plan of treatment, his RBT was one for the books. The most humble, patient individual I've met so far. Our LO was thrived in the last 3 months and if it wasn't for moving back to Tampa,  we'd still be with them. Highly recommend for early intervention and or any and all ABA therapies.

My family has had a wonderful experience with Kid Centered Therapy. The ABA therapy my niece has been receiving has made a noticeable difference in their development. The team is compassionate, professional, and truly understands the needs of children. They‚Äôve been incredibly supportive, providing regular updates on progress and always being available to address our questions or concerns. We‚Äôve seen real improvement, and feel confident she is in great hands. I would highly recommend Kid Centered Therapy to any family seeking a caring ABA provider that actually works!

After months of trying to get in. We did switch insurance so that added a month to the process. Britany who we were dealing left  and everything was circus. No one called with follows ups any more. No one could give us straight answers. Spoke to a female staff and they lied and said it was insurance and we have a high deductible, which is not true.it sounded like bs and she just didn‚Äôt know what to say. then got another call from Austin letting us know that they have no staff to accommodate my son and we should look for another company. I would not recommend

My son was receiving ABA therapy from this agency. Every a month or two they were unable to receive licensing and would stop his ABA therapy. Eventually they just transferred us to a different agency because they just stopped accepting our insurance. Very disappointing I would not recommend this agency to anyone. We had more negative experience than positive. Shanice and Shunda are amazing.

Kid Centered Therapy is a great organization. Not only is the owner a BCBA, she is a licensed clinical social worker. I am Kid Centered Therapy's compliance officer and I can attest how well organized and structure KCT is. It has grown significantly this past year due to the great service they provide.

‚ÄúLittle piece of Heaven on Earth‚ú®üíïüêêü¶Üüê•ü´èüêÆü§†üê¥üåé ‚Äú.

We bought fresh farm eggs, maple syrup, Amish butter and Pancakes in their little store. Afterwards we were greeted by Mr. Doug who was so friendly and  went out of his way to give us a tour of the property. If you  love the peaceful country feeling surrounded by Horses , Cows and all the little farm animals  this the place to go‚ù§Ô∏è. Can‚Äôt wait to go back with our kids!

Discover the magic of Kiddy Up Ranch! üê¥‚ú®

Experience the joy of connecting with incredible horses and an amazing team that truly feels like family. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Explore the delightful petting zoo, home to friendly goats, pigs, ducks, chickens, and bunnies. üêêüêñü¶Üüêìüêá

Whether you need therapy sessions covered by insurance or prefer to pay in cash, Kiddy Up Ranch is here to accommodate you with utmost care and compassion.
Highly recommended for a heartwarming and unforgettable experience!

I can not say enough amazing this about Kiddy up ranch! My daughter has been taking lessons there for over a year. We love all of the trainers and staff. Her riding has improved dramatically as well as her confidence in riding. They really go above and beyond to meet the needs of ALL their students with so many different programs. It truly is like a home away from where everyone is accepted, no one gets left behind at this ranch. Highly recommend!!

Kiddy Up Ranch is an incredible organization making a real difference in the community! Their dedication to therapeutic riding and equine-assisted programs is truly inspiring. The team is compassionate, knowledgeable, and goes above and beyond to support children and adults with special needs, veterans, and anyone who can benefit from their amazing horses.

We recently had the pleasure of working with them at our car show fundraiser, and they were an absolute hit! Their ponies brought so much joy to everyone, and it was clear how well they care for their animals and the people they serve.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place that changes lives through the healing power of horses, Kiddy Up Ranch is it! Highly recommend supporting their mission in any way you can. Keep up the fantastic work!

This place is really cool. We followed some signs in our area for local honey and fresh milk and found this place. It is a huge rural area with lots of animals and a little country store with samples of things like fresh cheese and honey. We wandered up on a Sunday which we didn't realize they're not technically open but we were still kindly welcomed to walk around by a couple different people that were working. We didn't stay long that day but we are definitely going to go back during regular business hours. There's opportunities for volunteering there too. The staff was very friendly and the property is beautiful and peaceful.

My daughter and I simply love Kidnection. This is where we took our very first Baby and Me class with Miss Carly, a memory that will last a lifetime.

Miss Carly and the instructors do such a terrific job at providing not only developmental benefits for our babies but also opportunities for us parents to bond with our little ones while building connections with other families. Whether you‚Äôre looking for sensory activities, a music class, or physical movement, there‚Äôs a baby class that fits your child‚Äôs needs.

What a blessing it was to find kidnection. I was recommended speech therapy for my son and I found Miss Carly. I can‚Äôt even begin to describe the progress he has made. He has become engaged and focus when interacting with people and has learned to start communicating functionally. Also , he explores new toys and play with his sibling vs when he would only play with specific toys only independently. It has been night and day and I have Miss Carly to thank. She had such a connection with my son and he would look forward to their therapy/play every week. She gave me the tools/advice I needed to practice with my son at home and I am forever thankful. We love Ms Carly!
Thank you for everything.

Kidnection holds a special place in our hearts and always will. It's the very first place I took our daughter to for a mommy and me class, and I can't imagine a better place to create unforgettable memories with our little ones and connect with incredible families. Each class is a unique experience, bursting with learning, creativity, and fun!

The instructors are not only highly trained but also infuse every interaction with immense love and kindness, making our daughter Victoria feel truly cherished. Carly, the visionary founder of Kidnection, has crafted a wonderful environment that promotes community and togetherness. You can feel the love and dedication the moment we step through the doors.

We eagerly look forward to every class, and we feel so blessed to have this beautiful gem right here in Parkland!
Miss Carly is a gem. This is such a special place for both parents and their kiddos. A little piece of magic tucked away in Parkland.

Our 4 y/o son who used to eat anything became an incredibly picky eater around the age of 2.5. He basically would only eat fruit, chicken and French fries. He slowly has started expanding his menu in the last year but it has been incredibly difficult to get him to try new things. Both my wife and I are doctors and we tried it all. We explored all options out there, involved him in the process of shopping, making food, giving him autonomy. We read all the pediatric psychology and nutritionist's tips/tricks, recommendations/books, but nothing seemed to work. When this class opened the idea of it alone seemed perfect. But once it started it was a Joy to work with Julie and see how our Boy became involved in the process. He loved learning about the food, prepping it, making art with it, and most importantly EATING IT!!!

He tried during FUN WITH FOOD all of the following things for the first time, and now enjoys eating them regularly: Grilled Cheese, Vanilla Ice Cream, Bagels, Cream Cheese, PIZZA!!!

He also tried and did not like many other things, but at least he tried them. It was a win-win every time. We will definitely be back for the next Winter Session. He looks forward to every class and is actually sad we are in a break for the next coming months.

We thank Julie, Carly and Everyone involved with bringing this educational joy to the community.

Melissa is so polite, patient, and sweet . My son is excited for each and every OPT session. The office is so professional, clean and the staff is polite as well. Highly recommend Kids Aboard Therapy 10/10ü§©ü©∑

Chaya is an incredible OT. She‚Äôs warm, patient, and has a special ability to connect with children in a meaningful way. My daughter looks forward to every session, and I‚Äôve seen real progress! Chaya brings heart, dedication, and professionalism to everything she does. I‚Äôm so grateful for her support and highly recommend her to any parent looking for an OT who truly makes a different.

My daughter loved working with Chaya! She helped my daughter develop fine motor skills and overcome her sensory challenges using fun activities. She was honest and kept us updated on her progress regularly.

Chaya is the best OT therapist for kids in my opinion. She made a real difference in my toddler's ability to focus and his ability to greatly improve his fine motor skills. She also helped alot with his sensory issues. She is very kind, caring and professional.

Used to use another agency and since I've changed I've been so much happier.

They have wonderful therapists and sweet and efficient office staff.

My daughter sees her therapist in school and I love that the therapist updates me consistently.

Only been to their center  on Griffin a few times but my kids loved it and are always asking to go back :)

Always a pleasure to deal with!

Taking my child to this speech therapy clinic has been one of the best decisions I‚Äôve ever made. From the very first session, the team showed genuine care, expertise, and dedication that went far beyond my expectations. My daughter made incredible progress‚Äîmore than I ever imagined possible‚Äîand it‚Äôs all thanks to the therapists‚Äô patience, creativity, and deep understanding of how to support children in a way that‚Äôs both effective and encouraging.

Every visit felt warm and welcoming, and they truly made us feel like part of a family. I‚Äôm forever grateful for the confidence, clarity, and joy they‚Äôve helped unlock in my child. I wholeheartedly recommend this clinic to any parent searching for real results and compassionate care. Thank you for changing our lives!

Kids Chat Therapy was my very first practicum site, and I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place to have my first clinical experience. From day one, I felt welcomed, supported, and inspired, especially by my mentor, Yesenia (Didi), who guided me with so much patience and encouragement. I had the opportunity to work with a wide variety of clients, which helped me build confidence and grow both professionally and personally. The entire team was kind, collaborative, and genuinely passionate about their work. Choosing to stay after my practicum felt natural, as Kids Chat quickly became more than just a placement; it became a place where I truly felt I belonged.

Kids Chat Therapy is everything you‚Äôd hope for in a pediatric therapy center‚Äîprofessional, compassionate, and truly focused on the well-being of kids and families. The staff is kind, responsive, and incredibly knowledgeable. The environment is welcoming, and their thoughtful approach makes you feel completely supported from the very first interaction. Highly recommend!

The folks at Kids Chat Therapy are some of the kindest and most hard working people I know. Their dedication to their patients is top tier, and Yesenia the owner, goes above and beyond to make sure your child is properly taken care of. Best in Miami.

Hands down, Kids Chat and Didi are my first recommendation to anyone that asks. She treated my son for a little over a year and it was the absolute best experience. Didi is an expert in her field. She is passionate, knowledgeable, disarming, compassionate and has a heart of gold. I know big things are in store for Kids Chat‚Äôs future and no one is more deserving.

provider_name: Kids First Therapy Center inc Orlando
review_text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about Laymi. She has an incredible gift when it comes to providing physical therapy for children, and her patience is truly unmatched. My nephew, who was recovering from a gymnastics injury, sincerely looks forward to seeing her, which says a lot when therapy can often be challenging for kids.

What makes Laymi stand out is not just her professional skill in pediatric physical therapy but the genuine care and attention she gives to every child. She is extremely careful in her approach, always making sure the exercises are safe, effective, and tailored to the child‚Äôs needs. You can tell she truly understands the emotional side of recovery as much as the physical side.

Laymi does not just identify problems. She offers a plethora of solutions. No matter what challenge comes up, she always has an answer, a plan, and a positive way forward. She keeps the focus on progress and possibility rather than just the setback itself.

Anyone who gets the chance to work with Laymi for their child‚Äôs physical therapy will be in the best possible hands. She is professional, compassionate, and deeply committed to the well-being of the kids she helps. We feel so fortunate to have her in my nephew‚Äôs recovery journey, and I would recommend her without hesitation.

provider_name: Kids First Therapy Center inc Orlando
review_text: Being part of the Kids First Therapy Center family fills my heart with joy. This place is so much more than just a therapy center ‚Äî it‚Äôs a space where every child is genuinely cared for, loved, and celebrated. You can trust that your little ones will be in the best hands, surrounded by people who truly value them.

provider_name: Kids First Therapy Center inc Orlando
review_text: It‚Äôs impossible for any child to concentrate in the same tiny room with another child, both receiving therapies from two different therapists. MARIA, the manager has never addressed any of the concerns that parents have.

provider_name: Kids First Therapy Center inc Orlando
review_text: They are amazing, my son has had so much progress with occupational and speech therapy. The staff is great and very attentive with my son, Ms Gaby and Ms Courtney are the best. They create such a great environment for children.

provider_name: Kids First Therapy Center inc Orlando
review_text: My son has been in theraphy for a couple of years, however I never saw improvement. That‚Äôs until I moved centers and started coming here. Gaby and Kourtney are my son‚Äôs therapist and we loved them. We‚Äôve seen such an improvement in his speech and learning abilities. We love this place, definitely recommended.

Kids Hope PPEC is an amazing place for kids. I loved the entire staff that worked with my child. I absolutely felt as if they really cared for my child and gave them the best service!!!!! I HIGHLY recommend this place... Thank you to all the staff who work hard and do what they do.
Beautiful and nice place, very professional team

provider_name: Kids In Care PPEC - Prescribed Pediatric Extended Care
review_text: Having a child with multiple disabilities is very overwhelming & a full time job my good friend recommended me to this specific PPEC & it was the best decision I‚Äôve made for my child my daughter has came a long way from when she started she has severe autism she wouldn‚Äôt speak now she says words she counts & try‚Äôs saying her ABC‚Äôs the staff are amazing when it comes to expressing how good they do theirs absolutely no words they are that amazing they are really hands on they take care of my child as if she were their own they are always on top of all the paperwork & so much more I‚Äôve never felt so much at ease while at work knowing my daughter is in great hands & striving more & more everyday‚Ä¶.. THANK YOU ALL KIDS IN CARE üíúüíöü©∑üíõüß°‚ù§Ô∏èüíô

provider_name: Kids In Care PPEC - Prescribed Pediatric Extended Care
review_text: They are great and helpful with my son. I see them as family.

provider_name: Kids In Care PPEC - Prescribed Pediatric Extended Care
review_text: I was looking for place to take my son while I am at work.  this place came across  ,so I called best decision ever, staff so friendly  , place is organized and clean , I am really happy , my son is too. I highly recommend this center!

provider_name: Kids In Care PPEC - Prescribed Pediatric Extended Care
review_text: Don't come here. This place doesn't honor the appointments they give. I had an appointment with my son at 11:30 a.m., and the staff told me they hadn't registered him. My baby is 17 months old, and according to this place, it's for children. The lady just said there's no one to see him, and that's it. I dropped everything to get here quickly for the appointment, and look at how these people treat me, knowing that he's a baby. Don't come to this place, people. Find a place where there's professionalism.

provider_name: Kids In Care PPEC - Prescribed Pediatric Extended Care
review_text: A very good center. My daughter loves going there. The therapies are also very good. We've seen great results. They work with a lot of love, respect, and efficiency. There's great communication with parents. I recommend it for any child with special needs. I thank them so much for achieving so many things with my daughter.

I have a background in pediatrics and am a family nurse practitioner. Kids L.A.B. Is exceptional in providing evidence based treatment to their patients, and they are creative, fun, and always are ahead of the curve in addressing current and potential future concerns. If you want someone that is caring, empathetic, highly skilled and intelligent, Kids L.A.B. Is the place to go.

My son has been attending this PPEC since he was two years old, and he‚Äôs turning 4 this July. I truly feel safe and secure with him in their care. The staff is incredibly loving, caring, and attentive to the children. From the director, Samantha (Sam), to the nurses and other staff, it‚Äôs clear they genuinely care about the kids and work with each child at their own pace.

They also do an excellent job of communicating with parents. Whether it‚Äôs through their app or in-person updates, I always feel informed and supported. They accommodate outside therapies for the children and even offer transportation, which is so helpful.

If you‚Äôre looking for a PPEC that prioritizes the well-being of your child and provides a nurturing and supportive environment, I highly recommend this one. The team here is exceptional, and I‚Äôve never had any issues during the years my son has been attending

I cannot say enough great things about this daycare! The experience I had with Mary was absolutely phenomenal. She went above and beyond in every aspect, providing exceptional care and attention to the child and mother. The staff here truly cares about the well-being and development of each child, ensuring they receive the best possible care. I would recommend this
place to anyone looking for a daycare that offers unbelievable services for medically needy children. Thank you, Mary, and the entire team at Kids Miracle Steps PPEC for your incredible dedication and support!

My little brother attends this PPEC and they are the best, they are very caring , friendly and supportive. They provide great care to the children and they are always there for help. It‚Äôs always very easy to comment and connect with the members of the staff.I definitely love the great jobs the  therapists are doing because I have noticed some improvement in my Brother

My family had to make a decision a few months ago. We were recommended Miracle Steps. I can tell you what it‚Äôs been great for us as a family but most importantly for our child.

The facility is always clean and well kept.
Amazing staff ! Everyone is always so helpful. There is activities during the week to help the kids feel more included. I don't know where I would be with out the help of Kids Miracle Steps.

I am so happy with the care my son receives at Kids Place. The nurses are very attentive, and always go above and beyond to make sure of my son's well-being.I feel really good knowing he‚Äôs in such good hands. Highly recommend this ppec to anyone looking for great care and an amazing environment for their little ones!

I really love Kids place ppec! The nurses are amazing with communication and they always keep me in the loop and make sure I know how my daughter is doing. The center is super safe, so clean and  the staff genuinely cares about these kids. It gives me so much peace of mind!! Would never take her any where else!!!

I had high hopes for this place but they could never keep staff. There was no real organization, kids were running around little babies, some kids were left in little rooms or cribs for up to 12 hours a day against the parents wishes/knowledge. Transport was awful because kids weren‚Äôt allowed to eat on the bus even though they could be stuck there for up to 4 hours; a few of those kids depended on the PPEC for breakfast. The food they did get wasn‚Äôt the best and the kitchen wasn‚Äôt very clean. The drivers for transport would also be on their phones. There were too many close calls with kids in the van. A few parents were under the impression that there were teachers present but there weren‚Äôt any, so the kids would be fighting over the tv and tablets the whole day. There was no real discipline for any of the kids either.

There were way too many safety concerns that were reported but never addressed as far I know and it was scary. A baby with a trach should not have kids playing around her oxygen/cords and a preteen with violent tendencies should not be placed in a room with 3-6 year olds. I have seen some questionable behavior get brushed off by supervisors.

There are so many stories to tell about this place but I just hope they do better. Even with this bad experience, I miss the kids every day and wish I could have stayed but leaving was the best thing for me.

This PPEC has been absolutely amazing for my daughter. We transferred from a different center not far from this one and it has been an absolute night and day difference. She comes home happy and is learning so much, the nurses are all very loving and caring! thank you!!

My daughter suffers from severe anxiety and some sensory disorder issues as well. We have done OT before, but with little outcome. Charity was very knowledgeable about not just her specialty , but mental and physical health as well. She offered us to come in and do an eval. Charity really is one of those amazing people who truly enjoys helping others. She has been nothing but kind and honest with us. Charity has paired us with Janet, who is equally amazing. My daughter is not just working on her handwriting, but also getting a good sense of behavioral therapy , and calming techniques as well. If your looking for an OT therapist the professionals at Kidz Therapy Zone are the real deal.
