I felt supported in my decisions to take a more holistic approach to Gus' wellness, and it was so very wonderful to finally feel heard. More than that, I didn't feel rushed in and out. I felt like a priority! What a breath of fresh air.

Dr. Smith is truly the best! After struggling with pelvic issues and neck pain, I finally found real relief. I‚Äôve worked with other therapists before, but Dr. Smith stands out‚Äîhe‚Äôs the real deal. Even better, I healed in half the time I expected. Highly recommend!

July 2025
I had the pleasure of working with Dr. Jamar Smith at Kinofit Physical Therapy, and I can‚Äôt say enough good things about my experience. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcome and comfortable. Dr. Jamar Smith took the time to listen to my concerns and assess my needs, which made a difference in my treatment. Throughout my sessions, Dr. Jamar demonstrated exceptional expertise and professionalism. I appreciated the personalized approach, which made me feel supported every step of the way. Thank you, Dr. Jamar, for your wisdom, courage, and knowledge. Not only have you made an impact on my life in your office, but you have also made an impact on my health.

June 2025
Dr. Jamar consistently delivers exceptional customer service. My family and I appreciate all you do for us and the community. What a Blessing!!

May 2025
Dr. Jamar was knowledgeable and took the time to explain every step of my treatment process. He truly listened to my concerns and designed a plan that addressed my specific needs. I appreciate the hands-on approach, and the variety of techniques used during my sessions. Dr. Jamar, I appreciate you taking the time to show me the importance of quality of life.

Dr Smith explains the concepts of what he is doing and his treatments give me great relief. Am grateful for his help and his positive attitude keeps me going. My coach also has the gift of kindness and that means a lot to me.

Dr Jamar smith is a master of his craft.  he inspires new hope w/his prescribed physical therapy techniques.
He has my complete confidence and recommendation.

Dr. Smith is the truth! I've seen many physical therapists and chiropractors over the years and none of them were as thorough as he was when it came to diagnostic testing and truly working to understand the cause of my pain. I not only feel better after my dry needling procedure, but I have a series of techniques to help me heal and eliminate the pain all together. Dr. Smith is communicative and explains what he's doing and why in a very simplified and professional manner. 10 out of 10 recommend!

Knights PT is amazing!! I have never gone to physical therapy before and felt it helped. But at Knights I actually improved! Learned a lot of exercises that I do at home now to continue to strengthen my neck, back and hips. Julia at the front desk is a gem, so friendly and sweet. Nicole and Wesley were my therapists and they are really great and amazing therapists, that really know what you need and how to help you improve. Adam wasn‚Äôt one of my therapist‚Äôs but is a super nice and friendly  too. Honestly they are the most amazing team at Knights, they make you feel like you are part of their team. I cannot recommend them enough!!

I had an amazing experience at Knight Therapy with Nicole. She was incredibly knowledgeable and helped me with my hip problem in ways I didn‚Äôt even realize I needed. She provided effective exercises tailored to my issue and worked on releasing the muscle, which made a huge difference. What really stood out was how she followed up with me afterward to check on my pain levels and progress. It showed that she genuinely cares about her clients and their recovery. I highly recommend Knights physical therapy for anyone looking for expert therapy and real relief! I love you OK

Such a great facility and even better staff! - I had the pleasure of working with Nicole as a first time patient. She was so attentive to my concerns and came up with a treatment plan customizable to me. She was super knowledgeable and professional when discussing my key issues, how to handle flare ups and how to utilize exercises for preventive measures as well. As a mom of two, I was nervous to bring my kiddos to the appt, but the staff made us feel so comfortable and welcomed which meant so much to me. All around, wonderful experience!

I have had the pleasure of experiencing the professional services of the great therapist at Knight‚Äôs Physical Therapy and Wellness. Their knowledge and dedication was evident immediately and I was sure I had made the right decision in choosing them for my pt after my neck surgery.  I was rotated between Adam and Wes.  I found they complimented each other with slight differences which kept me engaged.  The entire staff was friendly, flexible, and willing to do what was necessary for my benefit. I would highly recommend them for any physical therapy needs.  And most importantly I want to thank them all for a job well done!

I had had back surgery, and my surgeon restricted my physical activity for four months so I could heal. I went to Knights to regain muscle and flexibility. The office staff was great in working around my work schedule and always accommodating if I needed to make any changes. The therapists were excellent! They assessed my needs and devised a plan to help me reach my goals. I have to say, they exceeded all my expectations. I was extremely satisfied with my experience, and I highly recommend Knights to anyone who needs physical therapy.

For those parents that are looking for a therapy center look no further, this is it! Confetti has been a major blessing and yes I've noticed the improvement in my child's behavior. The staff is wonderful, Dani the receptionist goes above and beyond to help and answer all your questions. Natalie the PT is amazing she has done wonders for my kid, has worked on her behavior for a while now and I'm able to notice the changes. Angelie the OT has worked with my kid and we are pleased and impressed with the results. Confetti hires nothing but the best therapists, they are all hard working and make you feel right at home. My child is always excited to visit the center and so are we. Thank you so much Confetti!!!

Extremely satisfied with the treatment my child has received for a little over a year now. Super friendly staff and environment. Ms. Angie makes my child‚Äôs morning each time they attend therapy. At this point, she feels like family. My child doesn‚Äôt cry as they go into therapy, rather looks forward to their session. As a a parent, this is everything. What feels like a play date for my child, has slowly but surely ensured they follow their plan of care and reach their ST goals. Highly recommend Konfetti Kidz Therapy and Ms. Angie for Speech Therapy.

I rarely give reviews, but since we bring our kids here I think I should share my experience. I give this place 2 starts because the staff was lovely and the place looked clean and organized. Now, if you're fine with facilities to use your credit card without a warning or your knowledge this is the place for you, otherwise walk away. They tried to charge my card with a 200 co-pay, and my normal co-pay for about five year with any doctor or clinic is only 25. Thankfully my card didn't go through and they had to notified me, otherwise I wouldn't had find out until afterwards. I contacted my insurance and they confirmed the 200 was wrong. I contacted the billing department ( which is the owner) and asked why they tried to charge my card without my knowledge or a notification and her answered was that I agreed to it when I signed the consent, RED FLAG. I asked to start paying in person at the clinic and she said they don't have a physical system and I needed to provide them with my card information so they could charge any debts from it moving forward, SECOND RED FLAG. I have worked in health care for 6 year, visit many clinics and doctors, and this is extremely weird and wrong. Still, I gave her the options to make my own payments online and she again refused, THIRD RED FLAG. After this she offered me a discharge from the clinic, which I was planning to do since the first red flag, but I wanted to see how far they would push. From my experience when something starts to trigger your inner warning system, you trust your instincts and walk away, especially if they will be taking care of my child.

We love it here at Konfetti Kidz, my son has made such a great improvement in his speech and eating. The place is kids friendly and very clean. The staff is amazing. Mrs. Ericca (Speech and feeding therapist) is amazing, she did my son‚Äôs first evaluation for speech and we started recently with feeding therapy and she is awesome. My son is now eating things he didn‚Äôt before and more willing to try new things as well. Mrs. Prima (speech therapist) is also amazing, my son didn‚Äôt put sentences together when we started and he is now putting sentences together, everyone that knows him has noticed the change. We are extremely happy and blessed to have such a great experience and looking forward to many more. My son loves it there.

I am so happy to have this facility near home. So far, I have met Stephany during Evaluation day, and she was sweet and charming. My kids loved her. After one visit, they felt comfortable and they wanted to go back.
On the other side of the phone, I met Frank, who made possible the schedule. I appreciate his help immensely. I am happy and deeply grateful for everyone‚Äôs help.
Thank you!

I am truly blessed to have found Kris. After a horrible break up, among other trauma, I knew I needed a therapist. I thought it would take a while to find a good therapist, but God blessed me with Kris. I am beyond grateful for her excellent counseling, encouragement, knowledge, and compassion. After almost 2 years of therapy with her (and counting‚Ä¶) I can easily say it was one of the best decisions of my life. She listens unconditionally, I have never felt judged by her (and trust me, I‚Äôve done some stuff I‚Äôm not very proud of), she is always encouraging & positive, and gives genuinely good advice based on her deep knowledge of the psyche. Thank you Kris, for being here!!!

Kris has been such a blessing to my family. She has helped me personally tremendously. I am forever grateful to her. She has & continues to help me with tough life situations. She has also helped 2 of my 3 children more than I can articulate into words. Without Kris my children would have remained undiagnosed & would have continued to suffer. For clarity Kris did not diagnose my children herself as she is not a doctor but her unwavering knowledge & help for me to seek the right doctors for my children‚Äôs issues has been life saving. Thank you a million times!

Kris has been an absolute lifeline for me. With her expertise in treating Complex PTSD and domestic violence, she has guided me through some of the darkest moments of my life with  support and compassion. Her approach goes beyond traditional therapy; she has empowered me to build confidence and reclaim my life in ways I never thought possible. She is not just a therapist but a true advocate for healing and personal growth. I am immensely grateful for her expertise and dedication. I highly recommend her and will continue to use her through my healing journey.

Kris has helped me cope and manage the various stressors in my life and aid me in curating effective coping mechanisms. Her empathetic approach creates a space where I feel safe to explore and work through topics that would be otherwise difficult for me to approach. I highly recommend  Kris Parker to anyone looking for a compassionate and knowledgeable therapist.

I've been working with Kris for some time now, and the progress I've made with her support has been life-changing. I've seen several other therapists over the years, and none have come close to helping me as much as Kris has. She's kind, understanding, and consistently reassuring and validating. If you're struggling with depression or any mental health challenges, I highly recommend seeing her‚Äîshe creates a safe and supportive space.

This therapy center is amazing. Been here 2 years. All of the staff is very helpful and accommodating. My kids LOVE Jason! Always fun and makes OT a blast. He‚Äôs like the big brother you love to see.
Danielle is just awesome with wanting to help everyone there and is honestly a great listener, definitely a great leader I believe she definitely gets things done.
Maddy at the front is always cheerful and always helps me out with my never ending scheduling changes.
Kacie is so great with my eldest with speech and emotions and keeping a calm voice and very patient and understanding.
Lindsey somehow gets my child to work out very hard with PT and is just so bubbly every time I see her.
My kids have worked with multiple therapist at this center and they just enjoy every second of it and even get upset sometimes when they miss a day or even asking on the weekend to go. I really don‚Äôt know what they do that makes my kids love it so much but honestly they are best therapy group my kids have gone to.

This office is Amazing, my son is 9 , we haven't had any therapy experience until here. We've been coming a few times a week for speech and occupational for the last 6+ months. He's been quicker to engage with peers, becoming increasingly verbal at home and listening to basic direction, which has been heaven sent. The commitment to these children I have witnessed, not just mine, is so fantastic to see. üëèüëèüëè

Lampert‚Äôs is the best ! We love our therapists here. They are kind and patient and work very well with my children. Brittney (OT), Joanna (OT), Danielle (Speech), and Ashley(PT) are our therapists. They make it fun- my kids love to come see them and work with them which makes everything so much easier! They always work with me to find good times to come. The entire Lampert‚Äôs team really looks out for the best interests of your kids.

Update 9/2025 it‚Äôs been awhile so I wanted to check in! We continued with Danielle for speech & food therapy for my son. my son never felt like it was ‚Äòwork‚Äô to work with her. She helped him immensely with both speech and foods. We couldn‚Äôt be more grateful. Due to scheduling conflicts, we moved over to Kacie & Ashton. He sees Kacie for a whole hour 1x a week working on speech & food therapy and has continued to improve so much that we are finally in a good place now with his nutrition as well as speech- and just in time for pre-k. Both Kacie & Danielle are genuine good human beings who are very good with my kiddos. We got very lucky with them. He sees Ashton for speech 1x a week too and with both therapists working With him back to back, he has gone from the quiet kid in class, to the jabber mouth! lol we love it! He is right where he needs to be. Ashton is super sweet and you can tell how genuinely happy she is to see my son. I can‚Äôt tell you how happy that makes us. We love you guys!

Ashley (PT) is exactly what my Sour patch, sweet & stubborn girl needed to get a routine down for PT. She is tough(still super kind), and we love that. A no nonsense PT who will really look out for your kiddo. She has done a great job with my daughter and has shown extreme patience(I see you Ashley!) - we are so grateful for you.

Jason (OT) is a go-with-the-flow OT who will make it work. Make what work? Anything! My daughter needed help with her handwriting, among other things. We kill 2 birds with 1 stone by getting HW done with Jason while she practices her handwriting at the same time. I am one happy momma to not have to worry about that too when we get home! Jason has looked out for girlie while making sure her goals are accomplished. Thank you!!

You guys are da best! Thanks for all you do!

Lamperts therapy group has helped both of my children blossom into talkative outgoing little boys! They are very accommodating and go the extra mile to make you feel welcomed. We‚Äôve been with lamperts for about 2 years now and have seen multiple therapists. Danielle and Ashton especially have had my boys excited to go in to therapy every week. I couldn‚Äôt be more thankful and grateful for all the work these amazing humans have put into my children it truly has changed our lives!

Lamperts has been a blessing for my toddler with down syndrome. I wish we would have started with them sooner. I can see the change in his everyday walking and commuting. The staff is the best starting with the front desk to all therapist.

provider_name:

LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER
review_text: Staff love the kids as their own.  My son loves going here every day.  They include every person in activities even when we can't pay sometimes.  They do a wonderful fashion show fund raiser to help our kids.  I feel blessed to have found such a place.  They truly love our young adults unconditionally.   God bless them and their program.   Please donate to this organization.  Your money will be put to good.

provider_name:
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER, LLC
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER
review_text: This school is amazing for my son, he is very Happy and excited to go every day.  He look forward to seeing his classmates and teachers.   The Administration is wonderful and they have a very good curriculum for all of their students.

provider_name:
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER, LLC
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER
review_text: Life Developmental Center is a bright and cheery center. Located on the David Posnack JCC campus. The center offers many activities such as Zumba, Yoga, Life Skills and community outings. The staff is knowledgeable, professional, and friendly. If you have an adult family member or friend with special needs looking for an active day program LIFE is the program for them.

provider_name:
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER, LLC
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER
review_text: I DO NOT RECOMMEND LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER.  BECAUSE THEY DID NOT CARE FOR MY ADULT SON PROPERLY THEY IGNORED HIM AND FORGOT TO GIVE HIM HIS LUNCH MORE THAN ONCE.  THEY ONLY WANT ADULTS THAT HAVE MINOR DISABILITIES.  NOEL HALL WAS A VERY MOODY PERSON AND DID NOT WORK WELL WITH ME.  AFTER COVID THEY DID NOT WANT MY SON BACK BECAUSE SHE FELT MY SON HAD TO HAVE A COVID SHOT.  I THOUGHT WE LIVED IN A SOCIETY WHERE WE HAVE FREEDOM OF CHOICE.  SHE THREW MY SON OUT LIKE A DIRTY RAG.  PEOPLE NEED TO KNOW THE TRUTH.

provider_name:
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER, LLC
LIFE DEVELOPMENTAL CENTER
review_text: Excellent program for special needs. So many activities.  Please visit. Tell Lisa that Gina sent you.

This hidden gem offers a relaxed barn atmosphere, affordability, and exceptional training with Kim. As a long-time rider here since high school, I can confirm the excellent behavior and condition of the horses and ponies. It's an ideal choice for riders of all ages and skill levels.
Great experience.  Lesson for our 5 year old grandson and pony ride for his younger brother.  Ms Kim is excellent instructor.  Highly recommend.
Fantastic ! Kim was just wonderful with our 2 year old grandson. First time on a pony and he truly enjoyed every moment. We will be back !
I have been going here for almost two years now. The owner, Kim, is always very pleasant and she is a great instructor. I learn every time I go. I'd highly recommend La Petit Cheval to anyone.

I did a lesson at this barn and felt as though Kim was very knowledgeable as a rider and trainer, but I felt that the horses were underweight and many of the horses were still being worked even though they were older/ in no condition to be worked. Kim was nice.

This vet is one of the best I‚Äôve ever had. They truly look at your pets actual needs and you purchase services accordingly. Not all dogs need the same standard care so a ‚Äúpackage‚Äù that cost a set amount could cost you $$ you didn‚Äôt even need to spend. Thank you Lake Alfred AH for such honest, compassionate and efficient services!  My old man ‚ù§Ô∏è

We have brought our fur babies to Lake Alfred Animal Hospital for nearly 20 years. They have cared for our family during and after business hours and have been incredibly trustworthy. Over the years, some of the faces may have changed but the care, compassion, and quality clinical judgment have remained top notch. We are grateful for this team of veterinary professionals and the care they have provided our family! We highly recommend!!

We recently visited Lake Alfred Animal Hospital with our beloved pets, Mila and Luna, and we couldn‚Äôt be more impressed with the level of care and compassion we received.

From the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel welcomed and at ease. But what truly made the experience outstanding was veterinarian technician Anisa. She was not only incredibly knowledgeable and professional, but also genuinely comforting and kind. Anisa took the time to explain every step of the process, answered all of our questions thoroughly, and treated Mila and Luna with such gentleness and respect‚Äîit really put our minds at ease.

It‚Äôs clear that everyone at Lake Alfred Animal Hospital is passionate about animals and dedicated to their well-being. Our pets were calm and relaxed thanks to the caring environment, and we left feeling confident that they were in the best possible hands.

We highly recommend this clinic to any pet owner looking for compassionate, high-quality veterinary care. Thank you to Anisa and the entire team for treating our fur babies like family!

I have been bringing my furbaby Elvis to Lake Alfred Animal Hospital for 13 years I highly recommend bringing your pets  there it is the best place I've ever brought any  of my pets.  They are very Professional, friendly, clean ,loving and very Reasonable.  I will not bring Elvis anywhere else He just loves the staff and that alone is saying alot ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Absolutely Amazing! Not only are the staff very caring, but they are patient with my concerns. Each individual takes the time to listen and care for our animals like they are their own! I highly recommend Lake Alfred Clinic to anyone looking for the absolute best care for your pets! Thank you for everything you do for our animals and also the passion and love you provide them.

I am so happy to have found a new Vet for my cat Penny. She got really sick and they took good care of her. She ended up having to get surgery on her belly. They were wonderful. They took such good care of my fur baby. The Dr and staff are amazing. Thank you, thank you. üòä

We‚Äôve been taking our cat Boo to this place for over a year and a half and we (including Boo) loves them! The rooms are clean and sanitized, the vet techs are incredibly caring and compassionate, and the vets are knowledgeable and reasonable.

He goes in every few months for a mani/pedi and it‚Äôs the quickest and easiest vet trip. I couldn‚Äôt be more thrilled to have a full service place to take Boo! Thank you all for always taking care of him üíïüêæ

We love Lake Emma Animal Hospital. If you have a cat in the area, we couldn't recommend it more. They have staff and spaces that are catered to cats and it's awesome. Plus, everyone is very friendly, kind and the pricing is very reasonable.

Today's annual visit for our Indy went extremely well my wife says "Indy was exceptionally well behaved at his vet appointment this morning!  Dr. Hecker and her staff were incredible, as always."

Dr Hecker and Nurse Gabby are excellent and took wonderful care of our Maia while she was being spayed

Just had our first puppy visit to Lake Emma Animal Hospital with Dr Hecker. The nurse and assistants Mallory, Matt and Loni were wonderful and professional. Dr Hecker was someone who you are instantly comfortable with. The front desk staff was friendly and very quick to take care of us.

Our first vet visit with our little toy golden doodle Maia was perfect!!

I am a returning customer who previously took my pets to Dr. Dee. I had not been back for about 5 years and it was so impressive that the new Dr.'s definitely carry on Dr. Dee's commitment to quality, compassionate care. It was also refreshing to see that there are still some long term employees going back almost 20 years. Not something you see very often these days. Very comforting.

provider_name: Lake Gibson Village Health and Rehabilitation Center
review_text:
Unfortunately, my mother in law has been in several rehabilitation facilities due to her declining health. We have been satisfied with a couple, but most have been less than satisfactory. The Club at at Lake Gibson has exceeded all of our expectations so far. It is absolutely beautiful, and my mother in law's room is spacious and very clean.
What impressed us the most is CeCe , who works in the front. She is the 1st person you meet and she is the sweetest, most personable person I have ever met at one of these establishments.  She loves what she does, and it shows! She will make you feel so welcomed when visiting your loved one!

provider_name: Lake Gibson Village Health and Rehabilitation Center
review_text: Everyone is very very, very kind. CC is a godsend and so is the other little girl that takes her place. They‚Äôre both wonderful. The nurses have been wonderful and all the helpers. I‚Äôm not sure what you call them but that help with the food and help with my mother‚Äòs changing her bed and helping her to her bathroom and and doing for bathing or it‚Äôs just a wonderful Wonderful place and thank you for taking care of her because I know she‚Äôs not doing well in her mind at times, but I thank you always for the phone calls to keep me updated and everything. You are a blessing there this Julie Mcnair.

provider_name: Lake Gibson Village Health and Rehabilitation Center
review_text: My sister Jacqueline is now a resident. The CNA's are very attentive to the needs of their residents. They are gentle & very caring. The place is always clean & tidy. I've seen plenty of nursing homes as my wife's mother was in a few over the years. Nothing compares to The Club. If I ever need heath and rehabilitation I can only hope I'm assigned to the club.

provider_name: Lake Gibson Village Health and Rehabilitation Center
review_text: My mother was admitted late in the evening from the hospital and everyone was very attentive to her and the family. They worked very quickly to get her settled and comfortable. The admission process was very professional and all of our questions were answered. We felt confident that they would be very attentive to her. Two days later and I  am pleased with her care. Staff is cheerful and it's very clean. I'm impressed with our experience.

provider_name: Lake Gibson Village Health and Rehabilitation Center
review_text: Beautiful place inside and out, nice outside area to sit if you want to get some sun. Great staff, everyone makes you feel at home. My mom will only go here for her rehab/physical therapy. Great therapy. Good food great people. I know my mom is safe and happy here. 10/10 recommend!

Dr. Griffith and the entire staff are great! We had 4 dogs in his care (one had to be put down recently) and he has been nothing but caring and wonderful! Our one puppy, was mistreated at another vet  and Dr. Griffith figured it out, put forth treatment and saved our puppy. The other vet wanted the records to use as a teaching opportunity. He has also performed spays and  gastropexy on two of our girls. They both recovered quickly. I am so thankful to have a private vet that is not mandated by corporate guidelines and prices. I hope he never retires!

I love Lake Jesup Animal Hospital. We signed up with this vet bc they were closest to us. This is an old-time vet office and they are awesome. Dr Griffith and his team are great with our pets. Price are extremely reasonable.

I am taking care of a friend's cats while their away, and one of them has been feeling under the weather. The Dr. and staff are superb! They are patient, gentle, knowledgeable, and kind. I felt like I knew them forever. GREAT VET!!!

Money grabbers - seems like they can‚Äôt ever figure out what‚Äôs going on with my dog. Every visit adds up to over $500 with these guys with their add ons.
It seems that they manipulate and guilt trip you into doing a ton of add ons to your pet that aren‚Äôt necessary. Stay away and try another place out, there are so many other better options nearby. The vets here seem as if they‚Äôre ‚Äúwinging it‚Äù.

Great service, very compassionate, kind, knowledgeable and patient. Dr. Griffith and his awesome staff (especially Emily) took amazing care of my fur baby. I can‚Äôt thank everyone enough for everything they‚Äôve done to help my cat.

Going on 6 months of steady weekly appts with Adrianna. The results have been great, went in with lower back, shoulder, and neck issues, and the improvement has been night and day. She is very professional, informative, knowledgeable, and passionate about her job. The staff is always welcoming and the facilities are well kept. Thank you!!!

I cannot speak highly enough about Gabbi at Lakeland Medical Massage.

I had a discectomy and laminectomy 4 years ago, and I‚Äôve worked incredibly hard to maintain my ability to keep lifting and stay active‚Äîtwo things I‚Äôm deeply passionate about. Even so, I still get flare-ups that can knock me out for days, sometimes weeks.

Before and after my surgery, I tried it all‚Äîstandard massages, deep tissue, ‚Äúsports‚Äù massages‚Äîyou name it. Not once did I walk away truly feeling understood, let alone better. No one had ever been able to get me back on track during a flare-up‚Ä¶ until Gabbi.

She gets it. She listens. When I give her a rundown of what‚Äôs bothering me, she knows exactly where to start. She understands how one issue can cause compensations in other areas, and she works to bring my body back into balance. She knows her craft‚Äîsimple as that.

I‚Äôve been seeing her every 4 weeks for almost a year now, and every single time, I leave feeling like I have my body back.

I‚Äôve been dealing with lower back pain on my left side for quite some time, and recently I had my first session of Thai Medical Massage with Ray Kesara. The experience was incredible ‚Äî not only was it something completely new for me, but the results were immediate and truly amazing. I felt such relief right away. Thank you so much, Ray, for your wonderful care!

Man, I just had the best massage of my life at Lakeland Medical Massage. Jacqueline was my massage therapist and I can‚Äôt recommend her enough. She is very thorough and takes her time with the spots that needed attention. She obviously has an intimate knowledge of the human anatomy and uses a combination of different techniques to help bring relief. She is calm, assuring and very attentive. I had a very tender spot on my hips and she was able to be sensitive to that and use some hot stones to help bring blood flow to the area. I could go on and on about how great of a massage therapist Jacqueline is. Her hands are truly healing hands. I appreciate your energy Jackie, God bless you

I highly recommend a visit to Lakeland Medical Massage if you are dealing with pain that physical therapy or doctors can‚Äôt seem to help. I specifically went in for some pretty extreme nerve pain from my neck through my shoulder, elbow, and wrist. I was told only surgery could help me, but, Adrianna has been amazing and so knowledgeable about how to help my issues.

Again, highly recommend, the staff are all very welcoming and pleasant, a great experience and actual results!

Our son has been at Lama for about two years now, along with additional ABA therapy, and I can honestly say nothing in the greater Tampa Bay area compares to this place. We‚Äôve tried many therapists, but the team here stands out in every way. From the therapists to the front desk and billing staff, everyone is professional, kind, and truly committed to helping families.

What makes them exceptional is how they go the extra mile‚Äînot only in caring for the kids but also in handling insurance. They take the stress off parents by working directly with insurance providers, which is rare and such a relief. The therapists are wonderful, and my kids genuinely love coming here.

Highly recommend Lama! Thank you to the entire team for the amazing work you do.

Our daughter has been with Lama for years now, and we have always had nothing but a great experience. We have had various ABA providers, and they have all been wonderful to work with. They offer in home and school assistance, which has been so important for us. The staff is also easy to communicate and schedule with. I highly recommend Lama!

Lama Pediatric Therapy has been an amazing resource of learning and development for our child. I am grateful for Shaquana, Morgan and the entire staff. They are caring, communicative and always supportive. Strongly recommend!

Lama Pediatric Therapy was amazing for our then 5 year old son. He say Bri, an Occupational Therapist, and we cannot say enough great things about her. All of the staff there are kind and patient with every kid that walks through the door.

The moment my son had an evaluation all the therapists have been so nice. His therapist Payton is sweet, understanding and clear with directions for at home directions to help with his speech. He loves going to see her.

Elise and her staff are extremely professional and knowledgeable. I‚Äôve had the wonderful experience of having a child go through their program and also attended training by Elise that has allowed me to have a better understanding of sensory needs for the children in my preschool class. Her dedication to each and every child is a blessing. We went to Elise at a time that was extremely difficult and confusing for my family. My initial experience with this company was frustrating from the very start. All I needed was reliable medication upkeep and straightforward refills. Instead, it felt like I was dragging them along just to accomplish the most basic tasks.

When I first started with this company, they  tried to tell me I owed $420 for a hospital stay at Springbrook ‚Äî a completely separate facility that had nothing to do with them. I had already been granted financial coverage through Springbrook, so I did not owe a dime. Had I not known better, I could have been scammed out of hundreds of dollars for a bill that wasn‚Äôt mine. That alone should make anyone cautious about trusting this company.

With my first doctor, every appointment felt like pulling teeth. She was consistently confused about which medications were supposed to be refilled, and I had to double-check and essentially babysit the process every single month to prevent mistakes. I wasn‚Äôt a patient ‚Äî I was doing their job for them.

Then, when I was transferred to a second doctor, the problems only escalated. I am now being required (not merely advised) to undergo an EKG, despite having no insurance and despite having been stable on this medication for a significant amount of time. I have never experienced side effects or heart rhythm changes from it, and I know what to watch out for. Forcing a costly and unnecessary test under these circumstances feels completely out of touch with the realities of patient care

On top of the medical confusion, the billing department was another headache. I had to jump through endless hoops just to get financial assistance approved, and within only a few months of finally receiving it, I was told I had to reapply all over again. Not to mention, every single time I called the billing department they gave me a different answer on how much was owed and none of them understood what was actually going on.

In short: if you value clarity, consistency, and professionalism, this is not the place for you. Expect confusion, frustration, and to constantly babysit the process yourself.
