Mrs.Jenie has been the best speech therapist we could have ever found. Our experience has been nothing short of exceptional! From the very first session, I knew we had found someone truly dedicated to helping our son reach his full potential in speech and communication.

Mrs.Jenie, brings not only expertise but also warmth and genuine care to every session. Her approach is tailored to our son's individual needs, making each session engaging and effective.

We've seen incredible progress in our son's speech . Thank you for making such a meaningful difference in our lives Mrs.Jenie.

Jenie has helped my daughter begin to say her first words and use sign language to communicate her needs. We also did a session of mommy+me classes with a focus on speech. I cannot recommend Jenie enough! She is great with children- my daughter has separation anxiety and but Jenie‚Äôs gentle manner made my daughter feel comfortable.

Mrs. Jenie was very patient with my son. She did a great job with him and even offer to come to my home to give him his speech therapy lesson. Her rate is the best in the area and would definitely recommend her .

"Working with Jenie has been a transformative experience for our family. Our twin boys struggled with speech delays, and we were concerned about their ability to communicate and connect with others. From day one, Jenie showed exceptional patience, skill, and genuine care for their progress. Her creative and engaging methods helped them find their voices, and the improvement in their communication skills has been nothing short of amazing. We are incredibly grateful for her expertise and dedication ‚Äì she truly gave our boys the gift of language. Highly recommended to anyone seeking a compassionate and effective speech therapist!"

This clinic has been life-changing for our family. The therapists genuinely care about my son and celebrate every small win with us. He's made amazing progress, and I feel supported as a parent too. I can't thank the staff enough for the patience, compassion, and consistency they show every single day.

I would recommend Little Tesla Pediatric to everyone and anyone‚Äîtimes ten!
My experience with them has been truly wholesome. My son has been going here since he was 2 years old, and he is now 5. From speech therapy to occupational therapy, and now ABA therapy, I have no words for how amazing they are with him.
He has grown so much in all aspects, and a huge part of that growth is thanks to the dedicated team at Little Tesla. I'm beyond grateful that I stumbled upon them.
The staff is wonderful and provides great customer service.  The therapists are knowledgeable and conduct themselves professionally.  Most importantly, they make my daughter feel very welcomed!

I absolutely recommend Little Tesla Pediatric therapy to all families seeking therapy services for their children. My son has been a part of LT for a full year now and truthfully this review is overdue because Little Tesla has exceeded my expectations from my first contact with the clinic when I first had general inquiries as I had to search for local therapies as soon as my son received his Autism diagnosis. I remember my sons psychiatrist gave me 3 pages full (front and back) of local clinics, and Little Tesla was the ONLY clinic that was thorough, and detailed as well as providing additional peace of mind as this was going to be my son‚Äôs first exposure to an open social setting outside of home. All that to say my son now attends ABA 4x a week with included Speech & Occupational Therapy.

At first we started with only Speech Occupational Therapy as there was just a small wait list to be established in their ABA program. We waited roughly under 3M as we joined in the summer time, and by August my son was already enrolled. I‚Äôd like to specifically highlight the care of the RBTs, my son and our family has had the pleasure of working with such as Nate, Dina, Naire, Anna, Marie, Jaz, Angelique, Amanda, and Kirstie. Gosh, I forgot the names of the few others we‚Äôve worked with in passing, but they are all truly amazing individuals who have reassured me that they take great care of my son while supporting him fully during each session. I‚Äôd even go as far as saying that they have felt like an extension of family, as they‚Äôve grown to really love my son too (it‚Äôs hard not to since he‚Äôs so bubbly) but for all of the RBTs you can tell they love what they do.

In the full year my son has made AMAZING progress. I can confidently say my son‚Äôs speech has improved, as well as both his social and behavioral development. Ms. Joyce I‚Äôd also like to give credit to as Emory‚Äôs speech therapist, she has the most kindred spirit, and because of her my son can speak in fuller sentences now, identify himself, state his address etc.

I could sit here singing their high praises for hours, but aside from the RBTs that work with my son everyday. The administrative staff, management, BCBAs and owners are all incredibly kind, and personable! Just to drop some names Aleema, Jasmine, Ashley, Andjela, Victoria, and Vesna. These ladies have now a special place in my heart because they all are so compassionate in their approach, never mind the clinic itself, with the recent expansion I was blown away to see how the new clinic goes above and beyond to provide even further support for daily living skills, behavioral, social needs and more!

LT has become our home away from home and I leave my son here 4 days a week with full faith and trust in the entire staff here because they are truly amazing. Thank you thank you thank you.
My son has been in this facility for over 4 years! Staff is friendly, professional, and go above and beyond for your child. Love love love them!

My son has been going to speech therapy for a year now with Julia and we love her. She is great at explaining what she working on and what tools she‚Äôs using to achieve goals.  We also started OT in December of last year and have had a great experience with both Alana and Elizabeth.

The office staff is incredible too, they are always willing to work with our schedule and are very proactive with paperwork and insurance claims questions.

Ms. Jeanette is an excellent Occupational Therapist! She made every sessions interesting for my son and he mastered his goals very quickly and graduated from the services! She collaborated well with the parents, provided resources and valuable suggestions and ensured that my child‚Äôs progress was steady across all settings! Strongly recommend her!

Sam is an incredible speech therapist! She is dynamic and engaging and makes practicing speech sounds fun for our daughter. We love her playful yet professional approach to speech therapy. She has done an excellent job of assessing where our daughter is at in her speech journey and coming up with innovative ways to move her forward in her goals. She has an extensive knowledge of her field and we have seen great success with our daughter.

Jeanette is an outstanding OT! We could not be happier with her and all that she has done for our daughter. She really takes time to come up with creative and age appropriate solutions to work on our daughter‚Äôs goals. I am continually impressed by the way her exercises translate to practical life skills and we have seen such growth in our daughter's abilities. She also goes above and beyond to provide ways for us to practice what we worked on at home, and as a parent that has taken a lot of prep work off my plate. She is patient and kind and extremely knowledgeable about her field.

We cannot thank Mrs. Julia enough for the incredible progress our daughter has made with her speech. In such a short period, she is speaking in full sentences and expressing herself so beautifully!

Mrs. Julia‚Äôs dedication, expertise, and patience have been life-changing for our family. She has truly gone above and beyond to help Layla find her voice. Sarah and Mrs. Julia have been an amazing team, and we are beyond grateful for their unwavering support and hard work.

Thank you both for making such a meaningful difference in our daughters life and in ours!

As a professional, I am very selective when making referrals, as I want to ensure the best care for patients. Lively Speech Therapy exceeds my expectations, providing exceptional care and support through dedicated collaboration. Sarah and her team are amazing, and I am grateful to be able to refer and work with them!

We recently had the pleasure of capturing Mariana and Brian‚Äôs beautiful wedding day at Living Sculpture Sanctuary, and it was an unforgettable experience. As photographers and videographers, we are always looking for venues that offer natural beauty, great lighting, and a serene atmosphere‚Äîand Living Sculpture delivers on all fronts.

The venue was spotless, and the lush greenery surrounding every corner created the perfect backdrop for both photo and video. It‚Äôs truly a dream location to work in, and it always inspires our creativity. From the tranquil pathways to the unique ceremony spaces, every detail is thoughtfully maintained.

Living Sculpture Sanctuary continues to be one of our all-time favorite venues, and we‚Äôre already looking forward to the next time we get to work there!

Our wedding was a whimsical dream. This was our 1st venue that we looked at and knew instantly that nothing else could compare. Luz and her amazing team were supportive, and they were the most loving group that we have ever worked with. They made the process smooth and stress free.  I can't express enough how beautiful our day was. Every detail was executed flawlessly. Rain or shine, this is the place to get married. Expect lots of happy tears and words of affirmation. We are all one big white tiger family. We love you guys so much.

The Living Sculpture Sanctuary was actually the first venue on the list for my husband and I to visit. From the moment we walked in there was such a beautiful warm welcoming feeling. I highly recommend the living sculpture sanctuary to every couple and have friends who were at our wedding doing the same! They have left such a positive impact on me that I cannot wait to visit the venue/staff in the future just to say hello. I am endlessly grateful that I had my wedding day there and wouldn‚Äôt have it any other way.

Had a great experience with the bride and broom! Would recommend! 10/10

Flower girls and ring bearers were on point, very professional. üíØ

- Just as important, everyone working in the venue was AMAZING, they even had a baby sitter (who really should have been called "youth activities coordinator!").

She actually knew how to keep the kids busy and happy which aloud us to enjoy the wedding even more.
We were invited to a Beautiful wedding here and the Venue was stunning! The staff was friendly and accommodating. I look forward to coming back!

Living Soul LLC have many ways of helping children with autism improve their quality of life. Teaching them new skills, that will help them be more independent. improve their communication skills. They care about your love ones. They will always put their needs first

provider_name: Living Waters Wellness Port St. Lucie
review_text:
I am quite impressed with the treatment plan at this amazing chiropractic office I‚Äôve been with for about 4 weeks. I feel my absolute best ever with the laser treatments and everything they do for me here.

The staff and doctor Gagney are all so kind and welcoming and supportive. I tell everyone that it feels more like a spa than a chiropractor because of all of the pre-adjustment modalities they use to support the adjustment itself.

Before coming here, I would come out of alignment quite easily, but I stay in alignment very nicely here at Living Waters. I can‚Äôt say enough about the positive atmosphere. They even have worship music playing softly which promotes healing in many ways while undergoing treatment. The spiritual aspect of this place is very sweet. It almost feels as though the whole staff meet together and pray before the patients arrive.

I hear other patients talking about how they are experiencing healing of their ailments here. This really is important to listen and hear what other patients are saying when they come into the chiropractic office. One time I heard someone talking about how they are only coming about once a month for maintenance now and he mentioned how it was because they ‚Äúfixed‚Äù him. I thought this was amazing. They truly do everything and beyond to help fix the problem vs. creating problems.

I also LOVE my customized balancing shoe inserts!! Wow! I am amazed at the state of the art, high-tech equipment they use to treat their patients. They have you stand on a device that shows the exact areas that your foot needs to be supported in order to re-align your posture. Who does this?!! Amazing!

You might be surprised that you won‚Äôt ‚Äúneed‚Äù them for too long, but you might come back just because you WANT to experience your chiropractic spa day every now and then as a treat to self!! üòä

provider_name: Living Waters Wellness Port St. Lucie
review_text:
I can't say enough great things about this chiropractic office. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and cared for. Actually, Mindy had my name on a little board, which really personalized the experience. The front desk is friendly & kind. Making appointments is so easy, and the follow ups are perfect. The text reminders are so efficient for someone like me who has a busy calendar. The chiropractors are extremely knowledgeable, listen to my concerns, and explain everything clearly.

Personally, I appreciate how clean & organized the space is. The setting is relaxing, & each visit leaves me feeling a bit more better, more mobile, and confident that my back pain will one day be gone. I think this place prioritize our well being and progress.

I highly recommend this place if you are looking for a place where your well being is prioritized. Or anyone looking for compassionate & effective chiropractic care. I selected the place because of the name & the great reviews, and I can confirmed that you will leave each visit feeling a little more alive each time you set foot in the door.

provider_name: Living Waters Wellness Port St. Lucie
review_text: I love this practice. The staff is so friendly and helpful. The office is clean and smells great with the oils diffusing. The therapies are so relaxing and the doctors are second to none. Highly recommend!

provider_name: Living Waters Wellness Port St. Lucie
review_text: I have been here for almost a month from an auto incident. They have all been great from Mandy at the desk to Dr.D, Dr.Norm, and Ava. So thankful to receive such great care!

provider_name: Living Waters Wellness Port St. Lucie
review_text: Moved over to this location from Fort Pierce office as it was more convenient to other activities.  The services provided by Living Waters Wellness at this office are just as wonderful as the the Fort Pierce office. The staff, Dr Gagne, and Dr. Norm have provided great chiropractic care and my own health issues have been addressed. I am very satisfied with the results.

if you‚Äôre looking for lessons or boarding lone palm has you covered! i could say so many positive things about this barn. absolutely NO DRAMA, the trainers are excellent and deeply care for each client and horse. I went from a timid rider scared to canter, to being able to confidently ride my green horse. I have boarded with lone palm for over a year and i never have once worried about my horses care and im a helicopter horse mom. the staff, boarders, trainers here are the kindest people you will meet at a barn. they make showing a fun and easy experience too! all around the best barn and for a great price with the BEST care. I look forward to many more years at lone palm

My daughter Adelaide has been taking lessons at Lone Palm Stables for a little over 4 years. The trainers at the stable are amazing young ladies. They are so knowledgeable and caring. It is an amazing barn family and I‚Äôm so happy to be a part of it

This barn is absolutely amazing! In the short amount of time that I have been with LPS, my riding and confidence in my riding has improved so much. From affordable lesson, leasing, boarding, and show prices I would highly recommend lone palm stables to anyone interested in wanting to take lessons. Both the owner Emma and beginner trainer Claudia are outstanding at what they do and very patient with every rider no matter the experience. 10/10 recommendation!!!!

As a 39-year-old who just embarked on this exhilarating journey of English horse riding four months ago, I can wholeheartedly say that Lone Palm Stables is a gem. From the moment I stepped onto the property, I felt a sense of warmth and community that is truly unique. The trainers at Lone Palm Stables are not only skilled but also incredibly passionate about sharing their knowledge. Each lesson I‚Äôve taken has been tailored to my needs, allowing me to progress at my own pace while continually building my confidence. The trainers create a supportive environment that encourages questions and exploration, which has made my learning experience all the more enjoyable. One of the standout features of this stable is the horses. I can‚Äôt express enough how safe and wonderful they are to ride. Each horse has its own personality, and it‚Äôs evident that they‚Äôre well-cared for and loved. Being matched with such reliable companions has made my learning process exciting and, above all, secure. I genuinely feel that God brought me to Lone Palm Stables, as my journey here has not only been about learning to ride but also about connecting with like-minded individuals who share a love for these magnificent animals. The sense of camaraderie among the riders and trainers creates an atmosphere that makes every visit feel like coming home. If you‚Äôre looking to start or continue your equestrian journey, I cannot recommend Lone Palm Stables enough. The combination of knowledgeable trainers, safe and wonderful horses, and a nurturing community makes it the perfect place to learn and grow. I can't wait for what is to come in my riding journey!

Lone Palm Stables is amazing place to develop a love for horses, and foster independence in the equestrian sport. 8 years ago, I vowed I would never ride again. However, watching my 6 year old daughter ride and develop a passion for horses in a very short time, has made me want to share the memories together. Claudia is our riding instructor she has an amazing gift working with riders and horses. I have taken lessons off and on my entire life and have never felt more at home then I do now. She is amazing with children and is able to teach riding to small children with finesse. She explains things simply, and if your still unsure you breaks the skill into smaller steps. My daughter in such a short time has made tremendous growth in her riding abilities. I also am building my confidence to jump again. Claudia is able to adjust to your tabilities and confidence. She builds you up and pushes her rider forward to be the best they can. Even more because of this love we purchased a pony and will be sharing our memories with our wonderful barn family. If you want to learn to ride both children and adults this is the place. Claudia and Emma can help you and your family as they with mine reach your equestrian goals and dreams. They become a part of your family and celebrate all of your riders growth and accomplishments. They are patient and love there wonderful team of lesson ponies and horses. These horses and ponies are well trained and love there home.  We found our home. We hope you the reader, choose to visit Lone Palm and see the magical wonderful place it is.

All the therapists that worked with me were patient and encouraging. If an exercise caused me pain that I couldn't bear, they would immediately adjust the exercise. The receptionist Lorie always greeted me with a smile. Teri and Megan are from rival Florida schools, so kept my visits  lively with their banter. But my two biggest cheerleaders were Leondro and Greg, who kept me going whenever I got frustrated.

If I had more choices I would have given them a 4.9 not because they weren't excellent but because nothing is perfect there's always growth room for growth and Improvement.
I am very grateful to The Physician who sent me here and I feel fortunate to have come to a place where they knew exactly what to do for what I thought was a very exotic problem

On the first day Megan who has a doctorate in physical therapy did a very thorough evaluation and recognize things that no one else had noticed that was a good start

Let me start by saying, I was so upset when my surgeon told me I HAVE to go to Physical therapy. I chose Longevity because it is close to home.  I knew the minute I received the phone call to schedule my appointment,  that I made the right decision.  The office manager, Lori, was so professional and friendly.  I learned at my initial visit with Megan that this was the practice throughout.  The way the therapists work as a team is impressive.  Patients are never left unattended. There is always laughter.   I need to personally thank Greg. His dedication to my neck rehabilitation can't go unnoticed.  So I close by saying up to my last visit today,  I called going to PT at Longevity MY HAPPY PLACE. Thank you all. (I'm terrible with names) If any readers need Physical therapy,  this is the place
Diane Moore ‚ù§Ô∏è

Longevity Rehabilitation Therapy in Sebastian the therapists treat patients like family that they truly love. And being in a friendly and caring environment and atmosphere like this makes it very therapeutic for the patient. In addition the staff keep you laughing even during the pain and discomfort that you are having during your healing process, at these sessions, you actually forget about it also this helps you feels relaxed and with a confident feeling to know that Longevity Therapy is here to help you to perform your exercises safely and they focus on your condition by making sure you‚Äôre not hurting yourself, teaching you on each exercise to be careful and to take your time. Thank you guys for your patience and support. I‚Äôm grateful for you. My situation has not been easy for me but I do be looking forward to my next visit which is always amazing as your team helps me with hope during these challenging time for me . Thank you so much and I give you a 10 out of 10. Keep up the good work üëçüèΩüòä

There is no other rehab that I would go to.  From Lori at the front desk to Terry, and all the wonderful therapists, you are the best.  So many facilities could take lessons from you.  Your thoughtfulness, kind attention to my issues, keeping me on track,  professional and knowledgeable manner in which I was treated cannot be expressed enough.  You are all wonderful.

Look Up Therapy is one of the best if not the best providers for ABA, OT, ST and TCM in Northern Palm Beach County. My twins who are both nonverbal autistics have been receiving ABA, OT and ST. They have been receiving services in center for almost two years now and they have progressed. What we love about Look Up is that every child‚Äôs plan is individualized to each child, they genuinely care about your children‚Äôs progression, their needs and what your expectations are when it comes to your child‚Äôs therapy needs. From our family‚Äôs experience with Look Up Therapy they are a team, the center have more of a family feeling. They have a great group of therapists and everyone always look as if they enjoy their sessions with the children they serve. Thank you Christian and Tiffany for making Look Up Therapy a safe space for children like our twins.

I have known Christian and Tiffany for about 3 years, and they have always been exceptional individuals. Their dedication to their mission is truly inspiring, and they go above and beyond to support families in need. Look Up Therapy has been a lifeline for many families I worked with who had nowhere else to turn for the care their children desperately needed.

Now, I am fortunate enough to be a part of the Look Up Therapy team. When I first started, I needed health insurance, and typically there is a grace period before coverage begins. However, Christian and Tiffany waived that three-month period so I wouldn't go without insurance, demonstrating their genuine care and support for their staff.

In my experience, I have never worked for more supportive bosses. Having worked for many schools and agencies in this field, I can confidently say that none compare to Look Up Therapy. The staff here genuinely enjoy their work and each other's company. This organization is the most positive and goal-oriented one I have ever been a part of.

Look Up Therapy's commitment to their clients and their team is unmatched, making it a truly exceptional place to work.

Look Up Therapy is truly the BEST ABA company I've had the privilege of serving within my 5-years in this field (God-willing, with plenty more to come). This company is more than just a job; it‚Äôs a God-ordained ministry! Every action, whether serving our wonderful clients or supporting our team, is rooted in love and purpose. Going above and beyond is literally an understatement for what the leaders of this company will do. Christian and Tiffany's dedication to creating more opportunities for both clients and employees are unmatched!

Since being with Look Up Therapy, they have not only trained me to be the awesome BCBA that I am today- but they have also took the time to invest in my growth personal support and development! This company provides extensive growth opportunities and unwavering support at every step. What company do you know will partner with a well-known university after hearing of their employees' desire to further their education!??? Definitely top tier!

During my first week at Look Up, Christian approached me in session and simply said, ‚ÄúGive people God!‚Äù‚Äîwithout even knowing my faith background. Only God could orchestrate such a moment. Since joining, I've been blessed, honored, and humbled to lead the BEST Student Analyst Program, facilitate a bi-weekly ‚ÄúNight of Prayer‚Äù for our employees, and even launch an organization within the field called "Believers in ABA." All of this has been possible through God's grace, the support of the amazing team, and the incredible leadership of Christian and Tiffany Sanon‚Äîtrue leaders after God‚Äôs heart!

The difference with Look Up Therapy and other ABA companies??? WE CARE‚Äîgenuinely, wholeheartedly, and in every way!

My son, Lee, has demonstrated significant improvement in his behavior and communication skills. This is due in no small part to the efforts of the therapists, Ashli and Janice, since he began attending  Look Up Therapy.  I am so thankful for all the efforts and attention extended to my son by Ashli and Janice. As a mother, I know it is difficult to entrust your child‚Äôs well being to someone that you do not know. The staff at Look Up Therapy has exceeded my most hopeful expectations for my child. Having a child on the Autism Spectrum that also is delayed in his speech creates a unique circumstance. I have come to realize that both Ashli and Janice are compassionate, loving, caring, and patient individuals which are providing a safe and nurturing environment for my son.  I thank Christian for providing solutions for children with unique needs. The entire staff is amazing.

Look Up Therapy has incredibly caring and knowledgeable staff who know how to provide supports and services for the children and family they serve. They are a true gift to all those who work with them.

Lotus has been such a blessing for my little brother and our family. I love the staff, theyre so caring and they treat him like one of their own. Ever since he‚Äôs been in their care, he‚Äôs always came home with a smile on his face
Excellent service. Warm and professional staff. Congratulations.

Love Serving Autism demonstrates a remarkable ability to identify and address the unique leaning needs of each participant to learn how to play and participate in tennis. It‚Äôs always such a supportive environment for the players,  their parents and caregivers. The coaches are extremely patient and adapt their teaching methods to meet the kids at their pace. The coaches and speech therapists are patient and have such a positive dedication to our children. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to put their child in a sport. :)

Love Serving Autism is an incredible organization that‚Äôs truly making a difference in the community. The level of care, dedication, and passion they bring to every program is inspiring. They go beyond tennis‚Äîcreating a supportive, inclusive environment where children on the autism spectrum can thrive, build confidence, and have fun. You can feel the heart behind everything they do. It‚Äôs more than a program; it‚Äôs a community of compassion and empowerment. So grateful for the positive impact they continue to make in so many lives!

LSA is an amazing organization!!! My son has been a participant since the fall of 2020. We have been welcomed and accepted into the community and have met so many amazing, wonderful people. My son could never participate in team sports, but in tennis he learns as an individual but makes connections with other players and adults who are there to support him.  I am so happy and grateful we found LSA!!
My son loves playing tennis and making friends! He feels welcome and can learn at his speed. Awesome organization providing so much support to families.

My son participates in the Adaptive tennis classes for over 7 years with the exception of a relocation gap and both experiences were amazing he benefitted learning all the skills necessary to play Tennis and at the same time socialize. I am grateful ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè

Upon entering this place I get the feeling of being welcomed , in which has never been an easy thing with the requirements to best treats children with special needs. All of the staff treats you with much respect and show the love they have for their job, especially the owner of the place Deirys Arias .
I don‚Äôt have words to describe how amazing this place is. I defenetly and highly recommend this place for the care of your special need child. Amazing care, Amazing staff, no words to describe it.
Amazing location with amazing people to care for our little ones. Constantly doing activities to keep the kids happy, entertained and learning. I truly recommend.
They take very good care of children with special needs. Everyone is always very welcoming and very reliant!
Loving place. The team is very worried about their patients and they take care of the children with a lot of love.

We recently completed a 6-week training program with LucEz K9 for our golden retriever, Miles, and we couldn't be more thrilled with the results. At just over a year old, Miles was full of energy and had a hard time focusing on even the simplest commands. Walking him was a challenge, especially around distractions like other dogs.

Thanks to Joe‚Äôs expert training and guidance, Miles now walks calmly beside us on a leash without pulling, listens attentively to commands, and confidently holds his "place" position‚Äîeven choosing to go there on his own to relax. It‚Äôs amazing to see how much calmer and more focused he is.

What really stood out about working with Joe was the communication. After each session, we received detailed updates outlining what Miles had worked on, what progress was made, and what we needed to practice at home. The videos and photos of their training sessions were an added bonus and really helped us stay engaged in the process.

Miles is now a well-behaved, confident dog who responds reliably to commands‚Äîeven when guests come to the door. We feel much more confident as owners, and we‚Äôre incredibly grateful for everything Joe and LucEz K9 have done. Highly recommended!

Nothing short of amazing! I can‚Äôt recommend LucEz K9 Services and Joe the trainer highly enough. If you‚Äôre looking for help with a stubborn or challenging pup, Joe is truly the best in the business. My little Frenchie made incredible progress in such a short amount of time‚Äîit genuinely blew me away. Joe‚Äôs expertise, patience, and passion for what he does are unmatched. If I ever need help again, LucEz K9 Services will be the only call I make.

German shepherd "puppy" owner. He is my first GSD, and boy does he test my patience at times. I was having issues with him chewing, digging, and leash walking. This was also my first experience hiring a dog trainer. I was nervous at first with how the results would be, but man was i satisfied with the results. Joe the owner was very knowledgeable and from the moment he arrived, I could tell this was a passion of his.

Overall, I highly recommend this Joe and his company to anyone looking to improve their dog's behavior or strengthen their bond. The skills and confidence I gained through their program have transformed our daily life, and I can't thank them enough for their dedication and support. If you're considering training for your furry friend, look no further!

Joe at LucEz K9 Services is absolutely fantastic! He helped train my German Shepherd, and the results have been incredible. His knowledge, patience, and dedication to both the dog and owner made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. My dog is now more obedient, confident, and well-behaved thanks to his expert guidance. If you‚Äôre looking for a skilled and passionate trainer, Joe is the one to call. Highly recommend!

We found Joe after a Horrible experience with another trainer. Joe was just a pleasure all the way around to deal with. We have a GSD and needed her to work towards becoming my service dog. Joe worked so well with our girl and went above and beyond. He is a dedicated, professional, down to earth guy who loves what he does and I HIGHLY recommend if you need training for your dog , he‚Äôs definitely your guy!! Thanks Joe !

My pup, Charlie, has gained SO much confidence, obedience, and impulse control since her first day of training at Lucky Dog. I can happily recommend this facility to anyone seeking obedience, manners, and proper socialization skills for their pup. The Director, Toni, is so knowledgeable, and wonderful to work with in managing  our sweet Charlie‚Äôs training journey. A special shout out to Julia, THE trainer to finally get our stubborn girl into the Down cue position after months of us ourselves trying, and failing, at home. Julia has connected with Charlie in a very special way, and Charlie LOVES working and learning from her:). It‚Äôs so wonderful and entertaining to watch all the daily training videos they send of our sweet girl in action, as all the trainers are super knowledgeable and really care about the dog‚Äôs learning process and growth. We truly appreciate every single person that works at this facility. They are WONDERFUL! Thank you!!!!

Brisket is a young field bred Labrador Retriever. He attended day training from about 6 months old until he was a little over 2 years old. We typically did 1-2 days of day training a week. We also took a loose leash walking class together in the evening with Toni, and a CGC and Rally class with Alexa.

Lucky Dog was a huge help in ensuring our young rambunctious Labrador had enough mental stimulation when I was at work all day. They also ensured he was matched appropriately for play time with like-minded dogs. Lucky Dog helped ensure Brisket had good obedience foundations that made him a very good boy, and also created the ground framework for advanced training in Agility, Rally, and Dock Diving. I owe a lot of Brisket‚Äôs success in Agility to the great basic foundations he learned for how to think, how to learn, willing to work for other handlers, and having a great attitude for sit/stay/come.

Our pup, Cooper, has learned so much from going to Lucky dog training club. They work on everything from sit and stay to how to behave at at the vet's office. He's also worked on on tricks. They have been wonderful and keep us well informed via videos. How each day goes. Would definitely recommend.

From moment one: awesome! We met Jamie Diaz, the owner, through a Peggy Adams group training class which was extremely helpful! She was informative, patient, and kind. From her, we were introduced to Lucky Dog where we met with Toni, the Director. The best part was the initial evaluation: it cut through my assumptions to how my dogs are and exactly what they need: day training! On to the personalized training and socialization! Each and every person, from reception to every trainer, was informative and kind. The website stores all of their personalized training videos for me to revisit (I am the one being trained) to continuing education at home! They answer any questions at any time: only the very best for my boys!

We have had our Lab there for going on 6 months now and she has grown substantially from when we first brought her home.  To get videos each day of the day training sessions is absolutely fantastic as owners, so we can practice the same commands.  From Alexis, Declan, Alesha Eric and Michelle, they have all been great with Lexi.  Very clean and helpful in communications as well.

Ryann truly impressed us with her skill as a dog trainer! She has been a lifesaver with our two new puppies. We left both pups with Ryann for 3 weeks and came home from our trip to two trained dogs! They will ‚Äúplace‚Äù for hours (if needed!), come on command, sit, and walk alongside us beautifully. No more dog sledding!  Ryann came to our home for some follow up lessons and she is a wealth of knowledge and experience. She knows exactly what we all need. Highly recommend! We are so glad we found her.

Ryann is amazing! I was blown away by what she did with our dog Teddy! I have the sweetest mini golden doodle that I wanted trained as a service dog for my 16 yr old autistic son. It‚Äôs amazing what you can teach animals. When he is working as a service dog, he is by my son‚Äôs side and does everything that we ask him to do. He stays in place and he is by his side. We also want him to be a normal dog where he can be playful with our other animals, but when he is working, he is doing just that, and he is doing what he is trained to do, to be there for my son, and give him the comfort that he needs at home and out in public. Ryann Is dependable, kept all her appointments and showed up on time. She spent extra time with us even over the phone. She is there to answer any questions, and assure us that everything is going to be OK even when we felt like we were struggling. Now we did do our part, Ryann came weekly,  and gave us homework, and we did just that, we had to do our part to get our dog where he needed to be for my son. I am so glad that we met Ryann. She will be available to us at any time we need her. It‚Äôs only been a couple weeks since Teddy graduated and we miss her already, and my son misses her as well. Our dog knew that when Ryann was here that she meant business and he did exactly what he was being asked to do. If you didn‚Äôt think a dog couldn‚Äôt be trained, Ryann showed us differently! Any dog can be trained, and her prices are very reasonable! Ryann comes highly recommended. Thank you so much!

Ryann is an exceptional dog trainer who not only works wonders with the dogs but also ensures that the owners are just as well-trained! Her expertise, patience, and dedication have been invaluable as we navigate life with four dogs. She provides top-notch guidance, ongoing support, and encouragement every step of the way. Her training methods are both effective and engaging, making a real difference in our household. We couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for her help and highly recommend Lucky Seven K9 to anyone looking for professional, compassionate, and results-driven training!

Ryann was absolutely amazing.  We had 7 month old puppy and with Ryann‚Äôs help she transformed our crazy puppy almost immediately.  I would highly recommend her.  I had experience training dogs but I learned so much more than i thought.  She is amazing.  Totally worth it!.

Can‚Äôt say enough great things about our experience! Ryann is a top notch dog trainer. We feel like we have a new dog after working with her. Our dog went from wild and destructive to calm and obedient. We now constantly get compliments on our dog‚Äôs behavior and it‚Äôs all thanks to this training. People who knew our dog before can‚Äôt believe the change. I‚Äôd give more than 5 stars if I could.

I cannot thank the therapists at Luminescence enough! We see a therapist for marital counseling and each of our daughters see a different therapist. They are all such kind and caring people, with powerful and life-changing input and guidance. They have helped our family tremendously and we are forever grateful. We‚Äôve tried therapy multiple times in the past and nothing compares to the help we are getting. Thank you so so much to these fabulous therapists!

I can't say enough wonderful things about the Luminescence! From the moment I walk into their beautiful office, I feel a sense of calm and comfort.  The progress I've made with their help is beyond what I could have hoped for. They have genuinely transformed my life. I'm so grateful for the support and guidance I've received. If you're looking for a place that cares deeply and can make a real difference in your mental health journey.

I‚Äôve been going to Luminescence Counceling for a couple months and they have really changed my life, I‚Äôm in a much better place! The office is located in a beautiful building with stunning views of the river. The moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and at ease.

The therapist who I see is extremely knowledgeable and professional, and helped me work through some personal issues I was experiencing. She was kind, empathetic, and truly listened to everything I had to say. I felt like she really cared about my well-being and was dedicated to helping me find solutions to my problems.

Overall, I had a wonderful experience and I would highly recommend them to anyone in need of counseling services. The amazing view and great vibe make it a truly unique and special place, and the caring and knowledgeable therapists make it an invaluable resource for anyone looking to improve their mental health.

Thank you so much to all the staff at Luminescence counseling, this is truly the best place to go if you need to talk to someone. Jessica was very professional and did her job well. She helped me and my fiance tremendously and we will be forever grateful. The place feels at home when you walk in but the rooms are private and nicely decorated. You couldn't ask for a better place and I am sad we have complete therapy but if i ever need someone to help me again, I know I will be coming here. I appreciate the staff at Luminescence counseling, thank you very much!

It‚Äôs not an exaggeration to say Luminesence counseling literally saved my life. I saw Kimberlee over the course of a year to help me deal with grief and some other life issues. They were the third office I visited and when I walked in, I knew right away this was the place for me. The office was warm and felt like home. They have a cute coffee/tea bar and the entire staff was always friendly, professional and welcoming.

I have done a complete 360 in life mentally, physically and spiritually after my sessions with Kimberlee and Andrea. Andrea is amazing also!  My life feels much more balanced and I feel a deep sense of inner peace. I‚Äôm just sad I‚Äôm feeling better and don‚Äôt have an excuse to come in anymore because the sessions were always a highlight to my week!

So we have three dogs. Minnie Pearl is a 9+ year old European Basset Rescue. I have been rescuing Basset Hounds for 31 years. Coolest dogs on the planet. I am recently married at 65, my lovely wife has two ridiculous English Labrador Retrievers, Daisy & Duke. Duke is 100 lb Black male, Daisy a 85 lb yellow female. Both English. Minnie is European. They are quite the pack. Minnie Pearl hurt her back 3 weeks ago. If you are familiar with Basset Hound's a back injury is normally not manageable on a 9-10 year old dog. We saw Dr Hobson. She is the the lead Vet there and her accreditations are extremely impressive. It's like WOW that's some education for a young woman. She is very intuitive and gains a lot by "laying hands" on the dog. It's an art that's hard to find any longer. When you realize that the person in front of you is much more educated than you and you love your dog....you follow the lead and take direction. Dr Hobson is NOT a "take this pill and call me in the morning" doctor. She entertains many holistic options. As a two time cancer survivor everything I do is holistic at this point. Dr Hobson suggested Acupuncture. I've never done it. She had me agree to 3 treatments before I made any additional decisions. I agreed. I took Minnie Pearl to the first treatment. She could barely walk. I has some confidence because I realized that I was dealing with a very well educated, extremely talented doctor. Doctor Hobson gave Minnie Pearl a little electro stimulation as well. The whole staff loves Minnie Pearl. Taking her home from the first treatment she was 80% better. We have had treatments every week since.. Minnie Pearl is completely off medication of any kind. We are. now moving to every other week. The treatments are packaged and discounted. Today was already paid for as part of a package. She is walking, running and playing with the pack again. She is sleeping in the bed , eating and loving life. We are very grateful to Dr Hobson and the entire staff for saving my girl. The Acupuncture really works. Of course we had the right Doctor and Team. If you have a dog you love who is suffering call Luv n Care and ask for Dr Hobson.  Many Thanks to All at Luv n Care! Special thanks to Dr Hobson from;

Minnie Pearl
Daisy
Duke
Monica
Lenny

All of our dogs have been in the care of Luv-N-Care Animal Hospital for nearly 20 years. Not only do they offer quality veterinary care, but their kennel and grooming services are their home away from home. We would not entrust our dogs in the care of any other clinic, boarding facility, or medical care!

The entire staff here is amazing!! Our normal vet wanted almost 3x the cost to have our fur baby put to sleep . The entire staff never treated us like it was our first time meeting. They were amazing! Caroline, you made a very sad day a bit brighter with the way you care not only for Alex but also me and my son. We will be moving our younger dog here for all her vet care even though it‚Äôs a bit of a drive. I can not thank you enough!

It‚Äôs unfortunate that when you take your dog to the vet to get help all they do is the opposite. Instead an employee working at the vet decides to make false accusations of your animal being abused and will take them from you without any evidence. Absolutely so unacceptable and unprofessional. As if someone has the right to make an out of pocket judgement on the quality of your pets life when the owner spends thousands of dollars to make sure they have all they need. Imagine your fur baby being taken away from you and you have no voice no power and no chance to stop it. Bring your dog here if you like poor judgement.

My sister, Alexa, was falsely accused by this clinic of harming her own dog, Kirby. A dog she has spent thousands taking care of over the years and seeking medical attention whenever necessary. Without any video evidence or legitimate case, Kirby was seized and taken to animal control. He is now alone, confused, and deprived of the love and medical attention only his family can give.

Kirby has ongoing health issues. He is not just a pet ‚Äî he is family. The fact that this clinic could jump to such a serious accusation with zero proof is beyond negligent. It‚Äôs cruel.

The name ‚ÄúLuv n Care‚Äù couldn‚Äôt be more ironic. There was no love. No care. Just reckless actions and a devastating lack of compassion. If this is how they treat long-time, devoted pet owners, then no animal is safe here.

We want justice. We want Kirby home.
We urge anyone who truly loves their pets to think twice before trusting this clinic.

"I'm absolutely thrilled with the care my dog receives at this location.The staff is incredibly dedicated, friendly, and always goes above and beyond. i Their recommendations have been spot on, and my  (chihuahua)Cody‚Äôs health has noticeably improved. I'm so grateful for the exceptional service and expertise. Highly recommend!" üêæüíïthanks to the doctors, Destiny. Alesa , Lucyüíï and everyone who helped us all these years, üíïMilly

I recently brought my puppy Stack in for his laser ear cropping surgery, and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for the care he received. From start to finish, the staff was amazing.

Stack was extremely nervous, but the vet techs were incredibly patient, kind, and sweet with him. Their gentle approach made a big difference and helped ease his anxiety. I could tell they genuinely cared about his comfort and well-being.

A special thank you to Luci who was so helpful and understanding when we ran into an issue while checking out. She remained kind the entire time ‚Äî never once making me feel uncomfortable or rushed. Her professionalism and warm attitude made a stressful situation so much easier to handle.

Thank you all for taking such good care of Stack. I truly appreciate the compassion and professionalism from everyone involved ‚ù§Ô∏è

I have a Doberman pinscher and I really wanted to get her ears done. I had done a lot of research of different vets in terms of treatment, before & after care, the procedure itself, and comfortability for my fur baby making sure it would be a great place for both her and I. Based off my experience here I would continue to recommend this vet. When I called the first time just to get information and a breakdown about the procedure, what it entails, and pricing, the lady at the front desk and the vet tech were so helpful and friendly. They were very patient with me, didn‚Äôt push anything on me and answered all and any questions I had. When I brought my puppy in they immediately welcomed her and made her so excited and happy she peed (multiple times lol). Before the procedure itself the vet tech went over everything and still answered all of my questions even though I was running late in traffic they weren‚Äôt annoyed at all. My puppy Nala got the best care both before and after!! She doesn‚Äôt even seem to be having any pain and I‚Äôm on day 3 after the procedure! She is still her feisty, playful, talkative self like nothing even happened!! I would 100% recommend this place if you want the best quality care for your pet!!

Really nice team! Brought my cat in for a walk-in sick visit on a Thursday evening around 1600. They immediately put us in a room. Both the tech and DVM examined her and explained the orders they anticipate and their associated prices clearly. They were able to examine, XR, draw labs, attempted to obtain a UA x2, administer medication, give subcut fluids, and dispense prescriptions within 45min. Lilly is so much better today and I will be using them in the future as this appeared to be a far less traumatic experience for her, despite all the pokes and prods, than I think it was for me üòâ

Thank you for the great care!
Post-visit photos attached. ‚ù§Ô∏è

The staff is very easy to work with‚Äîkind and accommodating. The doctor was able to address the immediate needs of our senior dog. Alexa, the technician, is awesome‚Äîvery patient and gentle with our fur baby.

provider_name: MD Now Urgent Care - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: Everyone was very professional, kind, and wonderful. The Dr. and Medical assistant. Were excellent. The receptionist was very nice also. If I ever need to go to urgent care again. That's where I'm going.

provider_name: MD Now Urgent Care - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: The doctors are awesome here. But the front receptionist‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt even get me started. She looked disinterested and annoyed as soon as we walked in. You‚Äôre the front desk‚Ä¶ aren‚Äôt you supposed to be professional and give us a good first impression? I have seen a lot of reviews saying that she is unprofessional aswell. My dad noticed and he decided to say something to her and she was being very ironic and sarcastic. Her vibe is wayyy off. She even brought my sister into it, saying her face is also ‚Äúmean‚Äù looking. The only reason my sister was annoyed is because the receptionist wasn‚Äôt friendly at ALL in the first place. She literally works a customer service job, she needs to do better because it‚Äôs aggravating. We don‚Äôt want to deal with that again ‚ò†Ô∏è‚ò†Ô∏è‚ò†Ô∏è

provider_name: MD Now Urgent Care - West Pembroke Pines
review_text:
The staff at MD Now Urgent Care were kind, helpful and courteous. From arrival to treatment from Dr. Carlos Pena & Estella-NCMA/RT.
I highly recommend this location.
Speedy and efficient.

provider_name: MD Now Urgent Care - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: Great facility! My wait time was less than 5 minutes. The staff was friendly and polite and the practitioner S Gilles was amazing. Explained my diagnosis in detail and gave me ample time for follow up questions. Definitely recommend!!!

provider_name: MD Now Urgent Care - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: FIRST TIME WALKING INTO  MD  with flu.Symptoms  GREETED AT the front desk by a lovely girl SWEET PROFESSIONAL SIGN IN WOS EASY?VERY LITTLE WAIT, TIME WAS SEEN BY A LOVELY NURSE, CATERINA, SO PROFESSIONAL AND CARING, THEN WAS GREETED BY THE DR.
