provider_name:
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY, LLC
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY
review_text: Our son Michael has been attending programming at this wonderful establishment for several years. ME&U is a gift to our community! Everyone involved in the classes and therapies is loving, wonderful,  and super enthusiastic!! Thank you for affording this unique and wonderful opportunity to our community!!

provider_name:
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY, LLC
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY
review_text: Very excited for this addition to our community! We toured the facility before signing up and were pleasantly surprised.  It is spacious, clean and very welcoming.  Temperatures are checked at the door and masks are mandatory.  Clients are encouraged to wash their hands frequently and sanitizer is provided throughout the facility.  Class sizes are limited and there is plenty of actual space to move around and stay at least six feet apart. I noticed that equipment was 'fogged' and sanitized after each class.  Weather permitting, there is a large exterior door which allows for a fresh air exchange.  Ms. Tina is super welcoming and takes the time to get to know each of her clients on a personal level.  There is are a ton of different activities and lots of different equipment to address each client's special needs.  The atmosphere is very inviting and not is it only a great place to get active, but a great place to safely socialize with peers.  Prices are very competitive with regular gyms.  This is a very HAPPY place and provides a service to the special needs community like no other.  Fitness is Fun!!!

provider_name:
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY, LLC
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY
review_text: My family was so fortunate to ‚Äòfind‚Äô Tina Tallman and ME&U. We live in a suburb of Philadelphia yet during this pandemic Tina took our daughter, Beth into this awesome group - meeting via Zoom. Making new friends, social chats, educational activities, exercising, games, etc. - all of this has helped Beth both mentally and physically through this extremely difficult time. Our only regret is obviously since we live so far away Beth will not be able to attend in person. But we are planning a vacation for next year to meet all of the ‚Äògang‚Äô! My family strongly recommends that anyone living in the area of ME&U who needs these services to check it out - amazing! Thank you ME&U!

provider_name:
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY, LLC
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY
review_text: My daughter, Heidi, has been attending classes with Tina for 2 yrs now. During this summer we were in CT for 4 mths. & Tina's Zoom program was a lifeline for Heidi. This lifeline continues here in FL with the opening of her new Gym, Me & U Abilities Academy.  The on line Zoom classes & in house gym classes have been an unbelievable experience & a blessing in our lives. It helps Heidi connect with all her friends & she looks forward to seeing everyone each day.  This program has enhanced all of our lives & helps to keep our special kids connected during these troubled times.  Thank you Tina & Ann for all that you do.  We love you.

provider_name:
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY, LLC
ME & U ABILITIES ACADEMY
review_text: Me & U, Tina and Anne, deliver a beautiful experience of growth and exercise for our family members that have to overcome so many limits at other gyms/clinics and life in general. The training and therapy uniquely personal even while in a group of so many differing abilities. The gentle push to overcome and expand is huge for their growth both mentally and physically. The celebration of successes invaluable. Do your loved one or your self a favor, and check out the experience of growth at Me & U

When we began searching for a facility for our mom in the Melbourne/Palm Bay area, we toured several places, including Melbourne Terrace.  It is a beautiful facility and very very clean.  Initially, we were concerned and hesitant after seeing an abuse symbol associated with this facility. However, after speaking with the case When we began searching for a facility for our mom in the Melbourne/Palm Bay area, we toured several places, including Melbourne Terrace. Initially, we were concerned after seeing an abuse symbol associated with the facility. However, after speaking with the Case Manager at Holmes Regional, we learned it was related to an elopement incident‚Äîwhere a patient had exited the building with a family member‚Äînot a case of physical abuse.

Since choosing Melbourne Terrace three months ago, we‚Äôve been very pleased with the care our mom has received. The staff has been attentive, and the therapy equipment and department is truly one of the best in the area. After touring four different facilities, we‚Äôre confident we made the right choice and feel reassured knowing she‚Äôs in such capable hands.

Our family is very thankful and happy for Gma to be at Melbourne Terrace. The facility is very clean. The staff is wonderful and caring and attentive to her needs. Special shout out to the Physical Therapy Department for their professional care and attention to the residents. The best therapists in town especially to Winnie Reynoso who gives the patients the great care above and beyond her call of duty. We also appreciate the nursing staff and aides for the care they give especially to Kitty who loves Gma.
Everyone is very friendly from the office people to the front desk receptionists to all the staff.
MTRC Thank you for the services you do for the community!

I want to thank Melbourne Terrace for the wonderful care they gave to my father. After his first stay in the hospital they got him back to where he was physically before he had the pneumonia. He came home and it was so great. And I can never thank them enough for that time with him at home. But three weeks later he got sick again and bounced back and forth between the hospital and Melbourne Terrace three more times in the next 2-1/2 months. The nurses are so sweet and compassionate. Knowledgeable. Dad enjoyed them so much. And I want to send a special shout out to Robert in physical therapy. He was absolutely wonderful to my father. Dad loved him. The office worked with me several times over some insurance issues. Couldn't have done it without them. The facility is always so clean. They have many many interesting and fun activities for the patients. Friends and family can come and go anytime day or night. Pets are welcome. Beautiful courtyards. The food was delicious. I cannot recommend it enough. You would not have to worry about your loved one there. My Dad did pass in the hospital on July 4th. But I want to say... No matter how many times he returned to Melbourne Terrace they worked their hearts out for him. Never gave up on him. And I will be forever grateful. ‚ô•Ô∏è

This place is amazing.
The front office works with family of loved one.
The nurses are very caring and work hard for the comfort of patient.
PT and OT work hard at getting loved one ready to go home. Couldn't ask for a more reliable staff. If your loved one needs a place to recoup.  This is the place.

After a bad fall with multiple fractures, and after careful research,
we chose Melbourne Terrace for my rehabilitation.It was the perfect choice. It is a very clean facility. I had a spacious, private room and bathroom. Good nutritious food.
Excellent attentive nursing staff. Thank you Loretta, Madison and CNA Natavia who would always go above and beyond.
The physical and occupational therapy department is absolutely the best. A special thank you to Cliff who was absolutely amazing, very intuitive, professional, very caring and fun. He restored my mobility from not being able to walk, to walking unassisted , no cane. I always felt challenged but safe. Not to take away from everyone else in this great department.They became my family.
I now continue with their excellent outpatient rehab.
This has been a very positive experience, and I highly recommend
Melbourne terrace
Marina Tuthill

I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for Dr. Carolyn and the care I received during my therapy for Bell‚Äôs Palsy due to RHS. From the very beginning, she was kind, patient, and extremely knowledgeable. She provided helpful advice, clear explanations, and personalized support that made a real difference in my recovery.

Within just one week of starting therapy, I began to see visible improvements in my facial movement. Thanks to her guidance and the consistency of both in-office sessions and at-home exercises, I fully regained facial symmetry and movement. I can confidently say I‚Äôm 100% recovered!

Dr. Carolyn and her staff are not only professional but also genuinely caring. I highly recommend her!

I‚Äôve gone to other rehabs but MNRS has been great from all therapist to staff. Melissa has been very attentive as well as helpful and I am very grateful. Carolyn is great hands of angels. I am so thankful to all of them. I still have more therapy to do but it‚Äôs helped me to feel better! Thank you.

MNRS therapists are absolutely the BEST!  Carolyn and Nick are extremely knowledgeable and caring.  They go above and beyond to help you succeed!  Melissa is very helpful and sweet!  The entire staff cares for you as if you were family!  Excellent Care! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND MNRS!!

Roxie is a superb therapist!  She created a very personalized therapy for my husband‚Äôs needs. She  developed individual exercises  that targeted his neurological and physical abilities. It was . .great to see her work one on one with him. She paid attention to what was happening  in both body and mind ‚Ä¶and this made a huge difference.

Welcome to MNRS Physical Therapy  where PT  can ease your pain ! BEST Staff like  PTA Edel and Melisa are amazing human beings. The PT Carolyn is a sweet Angel!  Office coordinator's Jenny and Vicky are amazing ! The students are in good hands. I recommend MNRS!!

Recommend by friends, and during my marathon training i went to Motion RX for preventative and strength training consultation. Dr Peter was fantastic, understanding my goals.and together crafted a plan.

After several weeks I continued working the plan with Dr Kayleigh who is incredibly patient focused (they both are), she helped me understand the why behind each activity and helped me get comfortable with the training as it changed over the course of the plan.

10/10 If you are seeking physical therapy team -look no further!

Motion RX is an amazing establishment!!! I walk in the facility and immediately felt good vibes. I was welcomed with warm smiles and completely taken by how passionate they are in helping people get better. They not only push you to get better, they go further and help regain your confidence in what you can do. If you want a good environment to get back on your feet with no judgement this is the place!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Motion Rx. From the moment I walked in, I felt supported, encouraged, and truly cared for. Dr. Rafael took the time to understand my specific goals and challenges, then created a program that was both personalized and effective.

The sessions were challenging in the best way‚Äîpushing me to improve while never feeling overwhelming. Every exercise was explained clearly, and I always knew the purpose behind what I was doing. What really stood out was Dr. Rafael‚Äôs positivity and motivation; he celebrated even the small milestones with me, which made the journey feel empowering.

Not only have I seen huge improvements in my mobility and strength, but I am also pain free. This program has been life-changing, and I‚Äôd recommend it to anyone looking for a thoughtful, professional, and results-driven approach to improved performance.

I've worked with Dr. Melanie and Dr. Rafael for 2 months, and it's been one of the best training/rehab experiences I've ever had. I came to them with a long-term knee issue, and they have helped get me from barely bending it to moving pain-free! The environment is friendly, clean, and welcoming, with great equipment.
If you're a person like me who was debating scheduling a first visit... DO IT!! It's worth it because you only have one body‚Äîso help take care of it. I'm excited to continue progressing and strengthening myself with their help.

Motion RX is the place to go for really great physical therapy. Dr Mel is a wonderful asset & she understands very well how the pelvic floor interacts with other parts of the body. She has some really great exercises that target my muscles that have difficulty activating. She is a great listener and is creative in adapting exercises to fit your needs. It‚Äôs a special place that has the equipment to rehabilitate any injury at whatever skill level you‚Äôre at & I highly recommend them.

provider_name: MOTION RX Physical Therapy - St Pete
review_text: Dr. Blaine at Motion RX is incredible! I came in after an ACL injury, and thanks to his expertise and individualized approach, I was able to not only recover but return to training stronger than before. He took the time to tailor my care specifically to my needs, which made all the difference for both my physical progress and my confidence throughout the process. His knowledge, support, and dedication to his patients are unmatched. I can‚Äôt recommend Motion RX and Dr. Blaine enough!

provider_name: MOTION RX Physical Therapy - St Pete
review_text: I had a great experience with Dr. Blaine after dealing with a hip injury from running. He was incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and really took the time to understand what was going on. The exercises he gave me were spot-on and made a huge difference‚ÄîI‚Äôm back to running again thanks to his help! The facility is also super clean and welcoming, which made each visit even better. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a skilled and caring physiotherapist!

provider_name: MOTION RX Physical Therapy - St Pete
review_text: I can‚Äôt thank Dr. Blaine enough for the incredible care and expertise he‚Äôs provided. I came in with persistent shoulder pain that had been limiting my daily activities, and after just a few sessions, I noticed a significant improvement. Dr. Blaine took the time to understand the root of the problem and tailored a treatment plan that really worked for me. His guidance, encouragement, and hands-on approach have helped me regain strength, mobility, and confidence. I‚Äôm finally feeling like myself again‚Äîhighly recommend!

provider_name: MOTION RX Physical Therapy - St Pete
review_text: Dr Blaine was awesome!  I went from not running (and sometimes not even walking) due to hip pain, to being able to run again several times a week pain free.  I am much stronger and more confident in my ability to run.  I had been through classic physical therapy before but never made progress.  But his treatment was different, active, and adaptable to my circumstances and goals.  I highly recommend Dr Blaine and Motion RX.

provider_name: MOTION RX Physical Therapy - St Pete
review_text: I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. Blaine for a pinched nerve that was causing me intense pain while sitting, driving, running, and even walking for long periods. Since starting treatment, I‚Äôve noticed a huge improvement in both my pain levels and mobility. Dr. Blaine has been incredibly knowledgeable, attentive, and supportive throughout my recovery. I‚Äôm very grateful for the progress I‚Äôve made and highly recommend him to anyone dealing with similar issues.

Macy is excellent at what she does. She is very knowledgeable about the development of children and the way play therapy can empower them. Macy works with parents to share with them ways to help support their children with whatever struggle they may be facing. Her true empathy helps children feel safe and understood.

Macy is one of the most skilled, compassionate, and knowledgable therapists I've been lucky enough to work with. Her unique specialties make her my go to referral for children and adolescents. Macy brings so much energy and enthusiasm to her work, and I can't recommend her or her team more highly.
Macy is an amazing human! She is kind, smart, understanding, helpful, funny and personal! She has helped so many people including me! 10/10!!!

10 out of 10 recommend this place for occupational therapy. Shout out to AMANDA, the best OT we have ever had. She is extremely on her game and makes me feel like she sees my child as a whole versus just focusing on one thing at a time. She involves the parents as needed and also provides a lot of education and insight for home activities to make your therapy session worth it. We are very impressed. If you are weighing out different places, please come here and ask for Amanda! She changed our life.

Amanda (OT) and Andrea (ST) are the best therapists we have ever had for our son! He has been in therapy for three years and we‚Äôve been in three different clinics. The leap my son has made during his time with Madden is incredible.

I have been working with Madden Therapy Solutions for over three years now and have had an amazing experience. My son has a rare genetic disorder, which caused poor feeding/failure to thrive as well as various developmental delays. We first worked with founder Kristina Madden to support our son's feeding. At age 3, he was still only eating purees, and Kristina had him eating solids in no time, which has been an absolute game changer for our family. When our son was preparing for Kindergarten, we also noticed he needed support with handwriting and addressing other sensory issues. We have been working with Amanda for over a year now, and she has been amazing. Amanda always takes time to explain the science behind her sessions and offers ways we can continue to improve on what he's learning by implementing it in the home setting. Our son adores Amanda and looks forward to each session, which, if you've ever done pediatric therapy, know isn't the case with all therapists. Thanks Madden Therapy Solutions ... You have been an amazing resource for our family!

My 7 year old daughter has been doing Myofunctional therapy with Andrea for a couple months now and I cannot say enough about how amazing she has been! My daughter looks forward to going every week and loves practicing because of Andrea's encouragement. She works with her on every aspect of her speech all while making her comfortable. I leave every week feeling positive and more knowledgeable then the previous week! Thank you Andrea!

Madden Therapy Solutions has been absolutely wonderful for our son! From the first time I contacted them, I have had nothing but positive interactions. They took the time to understand my sons needs for Occupational therapy and we were paired with Ms. Amanda to be evaluated and start OT. We have been with Ms. Amanda now for about 5 months and she has been amazing. She is so patient with our son. She makes sessions fun and engaging. She is very knowledgeable and offers great techniques and advice for us to use outside of his sessions. We have seen such great improvement in him and even others have noticed!! I highly recommend Madden Therapy Solutions and especially Ms. Amanda!!!

‚ÄúI had an amazing experience at Magnolia Medical Center! The staff is professional, friendly, and truly cares about helping patients recover. Their personalized treatment plans and expertise made a huge difference in my mobility and pain relief. The facility is clean, well-equipped, and welcoming. I highly recommend Magnolia Medical Center for anyone in need of top-quality physical therapy!‚Äù
Really friendly staff, the physical therapist does an amazing job with her work. This is my goto medical center I always recommend my friends go here.
Patient and competent staff. 10/10 recommend I loved it!!ü•∞
Great Staff and great treatments ü§©ü§© DEFINATELY RECOMMEND
Helped with everything, service was amazing !!!!

Since I was diagnosed with juvenile Rheumatoid Arthritis at seven years old, one might say my judgement is fairly sound, having had well more than my share of physical therapists over the many years, it is a pleasure today to say that the current therapists are the best I‚Äôve worked with so far.
Two accidents that broke ribs and my hip could have rendered me with no hopes of walking. That is not the case, I with the help of therapist, Ed R. am getting closer to goal every visit. He has been far and above exceptional in his kindness and treatment.
For Pool therapy, Alejandro has been challenging in a most kind way. The therapy pool is quite an experience! I love it. Hard work and all.
As an outpatient, I am provided with transportation which is seldom a feature of Physical Therapy facilities. The man who drives is also kind, helpful and considerate. The overall atmosphere at Magnolia Ridge Rehabilitation is warm and friendly.
Spearheading the welcome desk is Maria, who aways has an eye out for anyone reaching a goal of any kind so that she can acknowledge their success. She is so warm friendly and I will be eternally grateful to being fortunate to going to Magnolia Ridge. For several weeks I have gone to Magnolia Ridge for therapy and it is a constant amazement to me how many people remark about my progress.

My physical therapist is Ed Reyes. After being treated by many other therapists, Ed is absolutely the best!  Ed demonstrates his knowledge, answers my questions clearly, and explains and provides effective treatment. He has an excellent bedside manner; he truly cares and displays much empathy with his patients. I feel very comfortable with him. I love his great sense of humor. Ed  motives me to work hard and achieve my goals. I am extremely pleased with Ed. I enjoy a better life-quality thanks to Ed Reyes.

Magnolia Ridge is the most beautiful facility in the North Central Florida and Gainesville area. We have the best Therapy Dept with State of the Art gym equipment to help assist our Seniors get back their baseline with Outpatient Services provided too. We also provided Great Hospitality, Customer service and Nursing care per residents stated satisfaction. Our Maintenance dept is always available and ready to assist with any repairs. Medical Records, Social Services and the kitchen will do you right daily and especially upon specific requests. The community, staff and residents have many praises for our Activity‚Äôs dept for their many themed family/friends gatherings and multiple daily events. Come join us and see what Great Senior living is really all about while assisting your love ones to healthier living and atmosphere. üíöüçç

Magnolia Ridge
My husband was at Magnolia Ridge for two weeks and the experience was very disappointing. The rehab was professional but that is the only good thing about his stay. Of course it is a beautiful building but the care for the residents was absolutely terrible. I was constantly there because my husband needed care and he wasn‚Äôt getting it. There were times when all the hall room lights were flashing because the residents were asking for help and no one came. My husband had dinner at 7:30 pm. The food was often served in styrofoam containers and was cold. I found a better place and he left Magnolia Ridge.

My mom loves going to rehab at Magnolia Ridge!! Loves all the therapists there and has improved so much on her walking. Gets ice cream on Fridays at the ice cream parlor. She has a lot of fun there and the facility is so beautiful like a resort!
Easy to miss if you aren't paying attention

Great pharmacy! Stewarts? My dog refuses to take meds for his heart and the pharmacist mixed it with a chicken solution.  He LOVES it!
If I could get his liver pills mixed the same way...he would be one happy puppy!
Exceptional food but some menu items and beverages are a bit pricey. Interior seating area is  dated and worn. Parking is tight and can be challenging.
Multiple businesses on site. Out of the way and full of awesome. Little difficult to get out of during rush hour. If you can schedule your appointments off peak hours, I recommend that.

Most of the staff are friendly and courteous all except one Elizabeth Lamothe pressures people into doing things that make them uncomfortable, she doesn't listen to you then writes incorrect information on your file. She is very rude and unprofessional.

If I could give ZERO STARS, I would!!!! I just left the Pediatric Neurologist department. I am furious at the fact that they did not help me or make an exception.

They dropped the ball. I arrived for my daughter's 1:30 appointment and arrived at 1. They let me know at the moment I need authorization, WHICH THEY FAILED TO TELL ME THAT YESTERDAY WHEN THEY CALLED TO CONFIRM THE APPOINTMENT, I called the pcp for the authorization and they were doing their best to send it. Because they received it one minute after the 30-minute grace period, they had me reschedule. I wouldn't mind if I still lived in Miami. But, I live in Orlando. I drove almost 4 hours to come and not have my child seen today.

Dr. Carson and Dr. Farghani were very informative. My son has a rare chromosome anomaly and we needed some information. I really loved how calm and patient Carson was with our son. She listened to everything we said and took tons of notes. Dr. Farghani made me laugh a lot and I could tell she really cared about our son. Thank you UM.. we love you!

It is painful to come to be treated here, there is no human being more cruel, insensitive, despicable than the one who claims to be called Dr. Fernanda Bellodi, this woman is not worthy of working with the health of children, she does not care, there is no commitment to her doctor's diploma. Do not waste your time, there are doctors with more humanity than. And what hurts the most is that this woman has the coldness of closing the doors to a child, I don't know how she can sleep in peace knowing that I let a child return home with injuries to the face, how she is a doctor knowing that in her hands is the diagnosis and treatment for this 5-year-old child and still does not make the slightest effort to see it

this place discriminates against people. even with proper documentation provided (it is actually illegal to ask for verification, I was just kind enough to do so) I was turned down due to my existing medical condition. It doesn't add up at all considering they are funded via a Children's Trust grant that can be taken away from them at any second and the fact that they are there to help and serve the children and adolescents, but would rather discriminate others and treat people poorly, rude, and without any respect. I understand now why there are always new people being hired and fired, this place is a mess and poor representation for the Children's Trust whose name is being associated with this place and horrible form of care. The fact that they haven't gone back to work in person even though every other job location has also speaks volumes. They are incredibly lazy and do the bare minimum.
I LOVE MCCD!! From the Security to the care from the Staff of several Departments. I have always had pleasant experiences with the care provided here.

Very professional! Lisa and her coaches (Laura and Adele) are simply the best. The pour their hearts into their student and the horses. Not only do they teach an amazing foundation for riding and competing, they also teach their students proper horsemanship and care. My daughters and I love this place!!
Mainstone academy is a great place to learn how to ride. The trainers are all amazing, approachable so dedicated. I would recommend Mainstone academy always!

This place is literally WONDERFUL! My daughter has been going here since mid-November and she loves it here. She recently got out of a very bad place, and she's very very happy to be here, her trainer Miss Adel is super sweet, and my daughter absolutely loves her. Great place, Great people. We're proud to be a part of the family

My daughter started training here recently. She is making amazing strides just after two lessons! The trainers, Lisa and Laura are professional in every way and my daughter is blossoming into a better rider!

Horses are very well mannered and Lisa is a great instructor! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who, is wanting to learn how to ride and or expand a bit more on their own knowledge of riding. Also an excellent place to board your Horse!

Exceptional service! Came across this animal hospital and decided I wanted to try it out. Turns out my little boy Mocha loves it very much, the staff was very caring and friendly made it a 10/10 experience. Thanks to Dr.Thomas, Shelby and Claudia.
Very happy with the services provided today. I just found this kitten and they helped me out a lot! Gave me insurance options, kitten care and came up with a great treatment  plan

Always comforting for our Lucinda‚Ä¶patient, easy‚Ä¶not just ground level but actually floor level as sitting with her and us when we come in. Only veterinarian that is allowed to take care of my babies from now on.üòÇ But in all seriousness you were such a big help in more ways than one, thank you so much.

They gave our boy Cyrus the training he needed to be the BEST dog he could be. He now is very eager to listen, to show us his new skills and what makes me happy is he is less anxious. He no longer lives with all his fears and anxiety that caused us so much trouble in the past. They kept me well informed with fun pics, updates and videos. I was very hesitant to leave him for a 3 week board and train but I put my trust in the process and could not be happier with the results. I am so thankful and would highly recommend them to anyone.

Best decision I made was to invest in Board and Train! It made such a difference for my 6 month old puppy. Christina, Joey and the entire team are fantastic. After his 3 week training he‚Äôs so much better with focus and walking on a leash!! I highly recommend them.

No, Ava isn‚Äôt learning how to drive yet but if anyone could train her to do so it would certainly be Christina!
You don‚Äôt need to wait for your puppy or dog to have issues that need to be corrected. Call Maligators and get started now.

review_text: We love Dr. Tiffany at Mama‚Äôs Chiropractic Care! She is knowledgeable, caring, and friendly.  You can tell she cares about her patients and takes time to answer questions. provider_name: Mama's Chiropractic Cape Coral a PalmerCare Clinic
review_text:

Every experience I‚Äôve had here has been absolutely wonderful. Dr. Campbell speaks with you, not at you, and listens to your questions. I had dropped off a fecal sample for a bearded dragon on Saturday and had results by Monday.  We will continue to bring our exotic critters to Dr. Campbell and his colleagues. Thank you for all you do!

Dr. Martin saved our dog‚Äôs life!

In January 2025, our dog was diagnosed with severe anemia and pancreatitis. Traditional medicine was not helping her at all (and may have actually been making her worse). After doing a lot of research we found Dr. Martin.

Dr. Martin immediately started treatments including a new diet, supplements, herbs and vitamins while testing for the root cause of the severe anemia (and actually confirming the root cause quickly).

Within one month of seeing Dr. Martin and implementing her treatments, the pancreatitis was gone. Within two months, the severe anemia was cured and all of the bloodwork was close to normal after being in the ‚Äúcritical‚Äù range for many weeks. Every day our dog is getting her energy back and improving. It‚Äôs absolutely miraculous.

Our dog was in such bad shape- she lost almost 20 pounds. If we would have stayed the course with traditional medicine, she absolutely would have died. The regular vet and the emergency vet couldn‚Äôt figure out the root cause of the anemia despite so much testing (bloodwork/ X-rays/ ultrasounds). They proceeded to treat her with a lot of unnecessary medication and never addressed diet, nutrition or environmental factors.

We can‚Äôt say enough great things about Dr. Martin. She is not only incredibly knowledgeable, she is so kind and so compassionate‚Ä¶ just absolutely amazing. She has an obvious love for animals. We trust her completely and now we won‚Äôt take our dogs anywhere else.

Also, she is super honest and cost-conscious. She never pushes unnecessary treatments or products and she always explains prices very clearly.

Her clinic is clean and lovely. Her family and her staff are always warm and welcoming. This is truly one of the best animal clinics in all of Miami, if not the very best.

Highest recommendation for Dr. Martin! We are thrilled that we found her. We are forever grateful! üíñüêæ

I had a wonderful experience meeting with Nina Mas at 35 weeks pregnant. Nina provided me with guidance on how to correctly strengthen my pelvic floor and techniques to reduce risk of tearing during labor. She also provided me with advice on how to care for my body and promote healing after labor. Nina took the time to answer all my questions and even followed up to share some recommendations and educational materials after my appointment. I'll definitely be returning for post-poartum physical therapy.

I cannot recommend Nina enough! I‚Äôve been working with her since I was just one month pregnant, and now two months postpartum, I can confidently say she has been one of the most important parts of my healing journey. Her deep knowledge of the pelvic floor and how it connects to the whole body is incredible. What really sets her apart is her compassionate and communicative approach‚Äîshe not only teaches the movements but takes the time to explain the purpose behind them, which has helped me feel more in tune with my body during such a transformative time. She‚Äôs kind, patient, and truly an expert in her field. I feel so supported and understood every time I see her, and I‚Äôm endlessly grateful for her guidance through pregnancy and beyond!

Dr. Nina Mas has been absolutely incredible in helping me reduce extreme lower back pain and strengthen my pelvic floor during my second pregnancy. I went from not being able to sit at work as well as pain when walking to being able to again with no pain. She is the absolute best!

I was given a pelvic floor prescription from Mayo Clinic and the University of Miami. A lot of practices say they do this but it is very specialized and requires certification. Nina is excellent and designs a personalized therapy plan. She is brilliant, kind and knows just how much of each exercise your body needs. I would highly recommend her practice. The building is convenient to Coral Gables and has free valet parking.

This physical therapy center is exceptional, particularly for pelvic floor therapy. Nina Mas, the lead therapist, is incredibly knowledgeable and compassionate, providing specialized care that significantly helped me during and after my pregnancy. The bilingual team ensures clear communication for all patients. If you‚Äôre seeking top-quality pelvic floor therapy, especially related to pregnancy, this center is the best choice.

Absolutely incredible 100% recommend it!!! I see Lori has a massage therapist and I swear she‚Äôs the reason why I have my headaches anymore. For facials, I see Beth and she is the sweetest person. Even the front staff are incredibly friendly and skilled.

Valeria is hands-down one of the best massage therapists I‚Äôve ever had. Her technique is incredible‚Äîshe‚Äôs not only thorough but also very intentional with her work. From the moment you walk in, she takes the time to ask the right questions and truly listens to your needs, customizing each session to what your body is telling her. I always leave feeling refreshed, relaxed, and rebalanced. If you‚Äôre looking for someone who genuinely cares and knows her craft, Valeria is it!

reviewer_name: Lash A Queen Beauty Bar LLC
review_text: Beth gave me one of the best facials I‚Äôve ever had! Her years of experience show in her soft touch, knowledge, and gentle care. She truly cares about her clients‚Äô experience and always goes above and beyond. I left glowing, refreshed, and feeling so cared for ‚Äî beyond 5 stars!

Full disclosure: I am a massage therapist, but not in the same market as this establishment.

Tara S. provided one of the best massages that I've ever experienced. Tara was able to expertly use very strong pressure when appropriate, and addressed my primary concern as well as it could be.

I live over an hour away and will definitely be back.

I‚Äôve received facials in Paris, Amsterdam, Colombia, Mexico, The Venetian Resort in Orlando for the past 20 years and THE BEST facial I‚Äôve EVER HAD, was here. By far THE BEST!!!  Before I left I scheduled my next facial because I can‚Äôt wait for the next one. Beth did my 90-minute facial and it was AMAZING!!!! I also liked that there‚Äôs no pressure to tip, even though I tipped because she did such an incredible job. Facials are new to this place and they are crushing it. Keep up the AMAZING job. Looking forward to my next facial.

Charis is amazing to work with! The environment is very relaxed and comfortable with a non-judgmental attitude. She answers and explains any questions you may have very well along with showing good demonstrations for exercises needed. Her warm and caring nature makes it feel like you‚Äôre spending time with a long time friend while catering to your physical therapy needs. 10/10 would recommend!

I cannot recommend Dr. Hamilton enough! I began seeing her during my pregnancy and continued postpartum. I am a firefighter/EMT so maintaining my strength during pregnancy and postpartum was vital to me. Her care has been an absolute game changer for both my physical and emotional recovery.

Throughout pregnancy, she helped me prepare my pelvic floor and core for labor, always taking the time to explain what was happening in my body and how to support it. She explained what to expect better than my OB-GYN. After my C-section, I was feeling overwhelmed and unsure about how to heal properly to get back to work‚Äîbut Dr. Hamilton provided expert, compassionate care that made all the difference.

One of the most impactful treatments was the shockwave therapy she used on my C-section scar. I had tightness, sensitivity, and limited mobility around the incision site, and after just a few sessions, I noticed a huge improvement. The scar softened, the discomfort lessened, and I finally felt like my body was truly healing.

She creates a safe, welcoming space where you can ask anything and feel completely supported. Whether it‚Äôs pelvic floor dysfunction, core rehab, or scar treatment, her approach is caring, evidence-based, and incredibly empowering.

If you‚Äôre pregnant, postpartum, or recovering from a C-section, do yourself a favor and book with Dr. Hamilton. She‚Äôs truly the best.

Absolutely love it here I‚Äôve been coming since I was 12 weeks pregnant and now I‚Äôm almost 12 weeks postpartum and everything has been wonderful! Because of what she taught me to prepare for labor and manage my pregnancy symptoms I had zero tearing in labor and minimal discomfort throughout everything. Highly recommend!!

Chairs has been so, so helpful throughout my process of pregnancy and postpartum with my first baby. She is such a wonderful educator and listens to her patients! I cannot recommend her enough to anyone either going through their pregnancy or postpartum period. If I could give her more than five stars, I would!

Dr. Hamilton is very thorough and personable. She‚Äôs so kind and I feel like she really cares about me as a person and  my pelvic Health. I feel very comfortable with her and the methods she taught me to fix specific issues helped within two weeks of our first visit. Definitely recommend!

Yami is an exceptional speech language pathologist. She is really great with children and I would recommend her to any family that is experiencing a child with speech challenges. We started seeing her when my school son could barely get his words out. We saw immediate improvement and Less than a year later my son was speaking at age level. My son also looked forward to going to therapy every week. We also were provided with many strategies and homework to use at home, some of which I still use today. Thank you, Yami, for making such an impact in our lives.

Yami is a great speech therapist! I highly recommend her services. She is very understanding and caring and knows how to get your child‚Äôs attention even when they‚Äôre not in the mood. My son is always excited for their next ‚Äúplay date‚Äù and to see what fun activity she pulls out of her bag of tricks. She definitely knows how to get your child to engage and meet the goals she sets for them while having lots of fun through interactive play. Yami always makes sure to keep you informed regarding your child‚Äôs progress, which goal she is working on with them, and provides you with helpful tips and tasks to continue practicing with your child.

Yamiris and Matter of Speech is the best. She was so patient and connected immediately with my son.
She asked us the right questions in order to do her assessment and evaluate him.
Yamiris is full of energy and has so much knowledge in her field area. She has toys and books galore which are all so helpful in helping the little ones learn as they play. Her tips have been so helpful in getting my son to start making animal noises and learning body parts. So happy to have met you and ty for your service to our family.

Yamiris is the BEST speech therapist we‚Äôve ever had. We first met when she gave my little brother speech therapy and when my son was showing signs of being delayed, I immediately contacted her because I knew she would help us. She got my son from 2-3 words to speaking full sentences. Her enthusiasm and creativity helped us keep afloat during his autism diagnosis. She gave us so many resources and I love working with her. I cannot recommend her enough! You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Yamiris did a full evaluation of our 2 1/2 year old son and she was absolutely delightful! She got our son to feel comfortable from the start and through games and fun she was able to assess his interaction and level of communication. Yamiris was absolutely wonderful carrying herself with a professional and kind demeanor. I‚Äôm very happy with the services provided and highly recommended Yamiris!

This place is hands-down the best place for anyone who truly cares about their pets. From the moment you walk in you‚Äôre greeted by friendly knowledgeable staff who clearly love what they do. The store is clean well organized and filled with top quality food, toys, treats, and essentials you won‚Äôt find at big-box pet stores.

The grooming salon is next-level my dog came out looking like he belonged on the cover of a magazine! The groomers are gentle, professional, and take their time to make sure every pet feels safe and pampered. They even remembered my pup‚Äôs name and preferences on our second visit.

What sets Max‚Äôs apart is the personal touch. Whether it‚Äôs a recommendation for a new healthy treat or a quick nail trim they treat every animal like family.

If you want your pet to be spoiled this is the place to go. Highly, highly recommended!

Definitely recommend it! The price is reasonable and they groom to specific breeds which is great for your dog. Wesley, my Golden Retriever was overdue for a pampering, especially with hot heat. I attached a before and after so people can see the difference! Not all that, but his coat smells so clean and fresh and doesn‚Äôt have that wet dog smell! Finding a good groomer in the Tampa area with excellent reviews and customer service felt like searching for a needle in a haystack. Fortunately, we discovered Max's Pet Market & Salon!

I even opted for the TheraClean add-on for my little one to proactively address a potential skin irritation. Melissa and Janis were exceptional‚Äînot only are they wonderful people, but their grooming skills and customer service are unparalleled. They treated me like a VIP and took even better care of our furkids!

When we picked them up, they looked fantastic. All our requests‚Äîkeeping them short but not skin short, maintaining long tails and ears, and rounding off their feet and faces‚Äîwere followed to the letter. I couldn't have asked for a better experience, and I'm thrilled to have found a place we can call home for their ongoing grooming needs!

Wonderful little spot with lots of natural options for pet food and treats! I am a big fan of having names of actual food items in the ingredients label and most of the items I picked up here fit that bill!

Free range place, no crates, no muzzles, no pups with bad attitudes! I love the vibe and their selection of treats and toys is abundant! Absolutely fantastic service. They groom all 3 of my dogs and I‚Äôll never go anywhere else:) *Cured my dog‚Äôs dermatitis with CBD shampoo*. I leave there with a smiling pup and I‚Äôm so happy I found them:)

provider_name: Mease Countryside Hospital Palm Harbor Outpatient Rehabilitation
review_text:
Recovering from an injury or surgery is never easy, and no one seeks physical therapy because they are already feeling their best. That said, I found my experience at this rehabilitation center to be both encouraging and highly effective from the very beginning. From my initial evaluation with Brad, I was met with respect, focus, and compassion. His knowledge and demeanor set a strong foundation for the journey ahead, immediately giving me confidence in the process.

One aspect I especially appreciated was the clarity and structure of the treatment plan. It was written in such a way that any therapist on staff could seamlessly provide guidance, which ensured continuity and consistency of care. In my case, Judy took over much of my treatment, and she carried forward the same professionalism and attentiveness I experienced at the start. The plan was straightforward, easy to follow both in the clinic and at home, and allowed for steady progress that reflected the effort invested in each setting.

The overall atmosphere of the facility also deserves mention. It is professional yet welcoming, with every staff member contributing to an environment that fosters both comfort and motivation. Even the front desk and scheduling team demonstrated the same level of professionalism and courtesy, making every visit smooth and stress-free.

Based on my experience, I would confidently recommend this facility to friends, colleagues, and anyone in need of physical therapy or rehabilitation. Their knowledgeable team, organized approach, and genuine care make the recovery process far more manageable and rewarding.

provider_name: Mease Countryside Hospital Palm Harbor Outpatient Rehabilitation
review_text: The physical therapists at BayCare Outpatient Rehabilitation on US Hwy 19 are outstanding. They maintain professionalism while being caring and friendly. I learned a great deal, and my time there was well spent.

provider_name: Mease Countryside Hospital Palm Harbor Outpatient Rehabilitation

review_text: Everything was exceptional. What‚Äôs there to improve the lady at the front desk is one of the nicest sweetest people I‚Äôve ever met in my life. provider_name: Mease Countryside Physical Therapy & Sports Rehabilitation
review_text: What a wonderful group of caring individuals. Each physical therapist works with you individually to develop your own needed program. review_text: I was assigned to a different PT for each of my first 3 sessions. On my 4th appointment I was assigned the PT I had on my second session. It was practically starting over every time. I was told that there would be a second PT assigned to me only if the PT assigned from my first session could not make the appointment for any reason. A surprisingly very disappointing experience.

provider_name: Mease Countryside Physical Therapy & Sports Rehabilitation
review_text: Julia is outstanding!  She is very friendly, very experienced, and very knowledgeable.  She makes you work hard, but also explains why.  She takes very good care of her patients.

provider_name: Mease Countryside Physical Therapy & Sports Rehabilitation
review_text: Adam is great as is Angela at the front desk. Every person I came in contact with was professional and helpful. Great staff and they got me walking normal again!  Excellent care by the entire staff!

The assessment itself was comprehensive, covering cognitive abilities, academic skills, and emotional and behavioral functioning. The final report was detailed, easy to understand, and included clear recommendations tailored to our child‚Äôs needs. We now have a better understanding of our child‚Äôs learning profile and how best to support them both at school and at home.

I would highly recommend Measuring Minds to
any family seeking clarity and direction regarding their child‚Äôs learning or development. This evaluation has given us the confidence and tools to advocate for the right support . Sally is the best !

Also, she was available by phone for follow-up questions and assisting to make sure school board meetings were on the right track for setting up an IEP. We‚Äôre so glad we ended up choosing Measuring Minds and Sally to assess our son. It was a great experience. Sally was great making our son comfortable, and also answered a lot of my questions and concerns. If we ever need to go through an assessment again, we‚Äôll definitely be back.

We have nothing but praise for the doctors and staff at MEDVET. Through the years we have had to take several of our dogs to their specialist. Recently, we needed to see Dr. Carmen Colitz ( Opthamlogy Dept)It was our second time working with her for one of our pets. Our Zeke had an acute glaucoma attack and was in horrible pain. Dr. Colitz spent so much time with us explaining everything that had to happen the importance of his medicine and treatments and he is doing great now. Her and her staff have been there for us 24/7 and it‚Äôs a wonderful feeling to be able to have that knowledge that if you need anything or have any questions they‚Äôll be there for you. Dr. Colitz is very knowledgeable about the Eye and she treats our babies as her babies. Special shout out to her and her staff.

We saw Dr. Padron at MedVet three weeks ago at the recommendation of our vet, and we appreciated his conservative opinion that Ellie‚Äôs ear mass did not need removal. We went back to our vet who admitted we should have been referred to a dermatologist first.  We then made the dermatology appointment and thank God we did, because Ellie subsequently developed mast cell tumors (MCT‚Äôs) that were discovered by the dermatologist so we ended up being referred right back to Dr. Padron at MedVet for the tumor removal.  The dermatologist felt that Ellie‚Äôs ear mass might be an MCT as well, but Dr. Padron is of the opinion that it is probably not, so we will find out next week when Ellie undergoes removal of the confirmed MCT‚Äôs and a biopsy of her ear mass. We so appreciate Dr. Padron‚Äôs opinions and look forward to removal of Ellie‚Äôs MCT‚Äôs.  He and his office are very professional and they take the time to listen to our concerns and understand how important Ellie is to us.  We look forward to continued care with MedVet and are hoping and praying for Ellie that she makes a full recovery.  We feel confident that Dr. Padron and the MedVet staff are Ellie‚Äôs best chance for that.

Dr. Colitz is by far the best animal Opthamologist, but even more than that, she‚Äôs just a nice person. She‚Äôs so personable and makes you feel very comfortable. She‚Äôs taken such great care of my dog with her knowledge and expertise. Both of us love our appointments with her!

I didn‚Äôt feel comfortable leaving my son there and staff refused to show any camera footage. Kids with disabilities deserve safe and transparent care. I filed a complaint with DCF and insurance ‚Äî please make sure you can always see your child during therapy.

I stayed with my son in this place for 2 years, until last Tuesday, April 8, 2025, when the occupational therapist dared to physically and verbally attack my son. Unfortunately, due to lack of evidence, the police could not do anything. The only evidence is me, who stood behind the door listening to everything that was happening inside. When I confronted him, he only limited himself to saying, "He provoked me," "Excuse me," I just ask you not to trust your children with anyone. And of course, this place, apart from being dirty, is not trustworthy.
Definitely won‚Äôt recommend! Horrible communication! They do not answer the phone! They schedule appointments and the therapist doesn‚Äôt even show up! No explanation!

I actually never got to even have our first appointment. After I drop off my paperwork I get a call a few days later telling me they never received my paperwork After politely telling them that I had dropped off the paperwork a few days ago they immediately hung up on me.  When they called back to schedule her first assessment of course I had a few questions being a first time mom with the first time therapy The first lady I spoke with kept just sitting the phone down walking away I could hear her talking in the background I‚Äôm assuming she didn‚Äôt know the answers to my questions so eventually after sitting down in silence multiple times a new lady got on the phone was very rude to me about my questions of course I just wanted to know how this was going to work since I have never gone through therapy before after being rude very many times to me she eventually I guess just got to the end of her phone call because she said have a great day and hung up while I was still speaking. Needless to say I called back immediately asked when I could pick my paperwork up they rudely answered with tomorrow after two hung up immediately. I have just picked up my paperwork and I just want to say I would not recommend this office to anybody!

Great therapy and services! This is people that truly care for your children. I have seen the progress throughout almost a year with them and the results are amazing! If you want results and progress this is the place to go ü´∂

I recommend Milieu Children‚Äôs Center without any reservation! Our daughter (who has Epilepsy and who is developmentally delayed) attended their Therapeutic Educational Program for two years, and has also received both speech and occupational therapy at Milieu for quite some time. I feel strongly that thanks to all the care, attention, love, and support she received at Milieu, our daughter is able to communicate and interact with the world around her in ways I never thought possible. They are loving, extremely professional, and will take the time to truly understand your child.

Joining Milieu Children‚Äôs center has been the best decision we made for our child. The therapists are all skilled and caring and use DIR play based and child led therapy.  My daughter loves going there. She is loved and cared for and she‚Äôs learned so much academically and improved in all areas. I will forever be thankful to all the staff at Milieu Children‚Äôs Center for their care, guidance and hard work . They truly have made a difference in our lives.

I‚Äôm so happy and grateful I found Milieu for my special needs son! We truly love them! They have amazing programs and therapists. The owners Danielle and Dariana are the best. They are not only amazing professionals, but they provide superb service, they are so kind, dedicated, they help you and your loved one with anything needed and they are there with the kids and on top of everything. The customer service is amazing, their service coordinator Desiree always responds fast either via phone or email and is very resourceful. And last but not least,  my son therapists Kristen (OT) and Jackie (ST), are the cherry on top, they are the very best, they are so caring and loving, always with great attitude, my son loves them!!! He is so happy to go there and has made great progress in very little time. I would 100% recommend them!!!

Milieu Children‚Äôs Center has been the absolute best decision we could have made for our son. The staff is truly committed and knowledgeable in all areas of service they provide. The dedication and care the teacher‚Äôs and therapist‚Äôs give to every child is special. Their passion for the growth and development of children radiates through the walls and can be seen/felt when conversing with any of the staff members. The improvement our son had within just a few weeks of attending Milieu Children‚Äôs Center was remarkable. Words cannot express how grateful we are for all they have done for our son in helping him excel. It is very difficult to find a place where staff members are honest and so caring, and Milieu offers just that. For these and so many other reasons we feel very fortunate and blessed to have learned of this facility. We wholeheartedly recommend Milieu Children‚Äôs Center.

The best decision you can make for your child is Milieu Children‚Äôs Center. We can‚Äôt express how thankful we are to the staff, teachers, and therapists for their love, dedication, and support. We will forever be grateful to them for the growth we have seen in our son. They are truly talented and skilled at what they do. More importantly, they truly love the children.

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Cape Coral Physical Therapy
review_text:
I am several weeks in to seeing Dr. Tom Neidenbach at Millenium Physicians Group for physical therapy. His experience and expertise has already begun helping me restore my strength and range with an increase of 10+ degrees in cervical and rotary cuff range of motion and rotation.

The staff is always helpful and friendly. Dr. Neidenbach‚Äôs professional knowledge, friendliness, kindness, and care has made what is not necessarily a pleasant experience as pleasant as it could possibly be. As a patient, I feel truly heard and cared for.

Under his care, I have seen chronic pain level decrease from a constant 9 to what I would now describe as a 7 on a bad day and as low as a 4 on a good day, which is a very significant improvement for me.

He even gave me a folder to keep track of my exercises and some resistance bands.

If anyone in the area has to have physical therapy, I hope they get to see Dr. Neidenbach.

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Cape Coral Physical Therapy
review_text: Christiane is upbeat and vibrant. She loves what she does. She cares about you, listens to your needs, challenges you and gives you hope that you WILL improve. I am lucky to have her expertise in my recovery!!

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Cape Coral Physical Therapy
review_text: Kailey explains exercises carefully and watches closely as I complete them. She corrects me in a professional manner. I believe my knee pain, leg strength and balance will improve through my work with Kailey.

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Cape Coral Physical Therapy
review_text: Tom N. Is a phenomenal physical therapist. He explains the "why" behind the treatments and has a genuine joy and passion for his work. Highly recommend!

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Cape Coral Physical Therapy
review_text:
Tom helped me a great deal. The appointments were always on time no sitting and waiting. His efforts have been very beneficial and have given me a big boost going forward.
Thank you Tom!

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Fort Myers Physical Therapy
review_text: Dr Schurman was really nice and relaxed. She took the time to go over my health history. She is very smart and thinks about what you are telling her and not just jotting it into your chart. She listened to my heart, lungs, blood flow in my neck, palpated my thyroid and abdomen. She was really thorough and had ordered my labs and mammogram right after I left there. A lot of doctors take days to send  out orders. She was wonderful. Highly recommend her.

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Fort Myers Physical Therapy
review_text: Cannot say enough positive things about Dr. Kim Schurman and the entire staff at this office. They listen, they care, and they're responsive & helpful. Dr. Schurman can absorb and distill a tremendous  amount of complex information into a clear path of action. The entire team has made navigating a complicated situation so much easier for us.

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Fort Myers Physical Therapy
review_text:
Dr. Kim Schurman is the best primary care doctor I‚Äôve had in my adult life. She goes over medication history and chronic conditions every single visit. I can tell she listens and hears me, because she actually remembers what we discussed and follows up with a series of questions regarding the issue at each appointment. She has never once been dismissive, which is a rare trait for a doctor from my own experience. She is diligent in assessing, advising, and prescribing. She demonstrates professional compassion and provides a level of quality in care that is beyond the scope of what I‚Äôve seen. Dr. Schurman treats her patients with compassion, dignity, and kindness. I am blessed to have found her.

Her office with Millennium Physicians accepts TRICARE.

If you are in need of a primary care doctor, Dr. Schurman is excellent!

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Fort Myers Physical Therapy
review_text: Dr. Schurman is an excellent doctor. She is very smart and detailed oriented, very responsive to the patient‚Äôs needs and provides outstanding care. She has helped me with my many health issues really well.

provider_name: Millennium Physician Group - Fort Myers Physical Therapy
review_text: All the doctors I have taking care of me at Millennium have been excellent.  Today I went to see my cardiologist, Dr. Lee.  He is an excellent doctor who is compassionate and understanding.  He is very knowledgeable and I know my health is in the right hands.
They are an amazing team, great attention. They helped my pet with love and patience. I am very glad and I recommended 100%. Bella has been with them for life. She is 12 year's old ..

Terrible service. I‚Äôve finally come around to make a review over my dog Lady. She was diagnosed with cancer. And I was called by the doctor apparently and I never knew. Months later I come back for a regular check up and was told personally that she had cancer. Those months lost of not having chemotherapy done - could‚Äôve saved her life. One missed phone call is not enough to tell your customer that their pet has cancer.

One of my dogs had a wound that became seriously infected, and he nearly lost his leg. Thanks to Dr. Infante‚Äôs expert care, he made a full recovery. To this day, it still feels like a miracle. Dr. Infante is a truly great veterinarian‚ÄîI couldn‚Äôt recommend him more highly.

After seeing multiple vets for my English bulldog allergist and spending lots of money and not seeing results, I was refer to Dr. Yuni Gallardo from a coworker .
In two office visit and changing my dogs food , my dog allergist were gone in few weeks , now my dog is free from allergist and happy and always wanna to play like a little kid.
Dr. Gallardo is a very knowledge and professional , thank you Dr.Gallardo for taking care of Benny..

Miller Road Animal Clinic, I come to this particular office because the staff is so good, efficient, effective and I appreciate that they consider my time is as valuable as theirs(I have never had a long wait)just love them. Dr Andy Infante has mad some serious situations for my dog so much better and so effectively. I‚Äôve been taking
My poodle to him for 4 years now, he‚Äôs had some difficult situations and Dr.Infante just seems to guide me in the right direction. And Paola is the very Best a true asset to this office. Thank you to all the staff here!!

Our experience has been excellent. Over the years have had various home physical therapists for my aging mother.  Mind and Mobility surpassed our expectations.  Adel is the very best  physical therapist my 86 year old mother ever had. Smart, genuine, caring, patient, tenacious, unique / effective approach.  Truly cares about making a positive difference for the patient. Thank you so very much!!

Clarissa S. from Mind & Mobility is amazing. She has brought new life to my 86 year old bedridden father. She is so patient and just all around amazing. Always professional and smiling. She is the epitome of going above and beyond.

My husband has Multiple Systems Atrophy and has been going to Mind & Mobility for 2 years.  I am so thankful that I found them.  Everyone is so caring and really does their best to help him maintain his strength.  He has done PT, OT and speech at the clinic and now we are doing home visits.  Brian his physical therapist is the absolute best as he goes beyond his job to make my husband smile and have fun exercising.  I truly believe my husband is still walking today due to the great care he is given.  I would highly recommend Mind & Mobility, as they have so much to offer.

My husband has been receiving services from Mind & Mobility for several years.  He has Parkinson's Disease and it has been progressing steadily.  Since COVID services have been at home. Providers are professional and display both knowledge in their field, PT, OT, Speech and MSW, as well as a caring attitude which has also been a support to me as the main caregiver.
I recommend them without hesitation to anyone in need of services.
Thank you for your years of dedication and service.  Don't know what I would have done without all of you.  That goes for the office staff as well.

My mother has been going to Mind and Mobility for several years.  They specialize in Parkinson's Disease movement and associated social issues.  All the therapists, both occupational and physical, are very attentive to her needs.  She is handicapped and requires extra care.  They have managed to get her out of a wheelchair and back walking part time.  Sadly, she can no longer go to the Oakland Park location.  However,  Eric comes to our house twice weekly to keep her strong.  I can only say that I think he is the best therapist my mother has ever had.  He stretches her out, plays physical games and mentally stimulates her as well as works all of her muscle groups.  He treats her like his own grandmother.  We love him!

provider_name: Mind Your Manners Canine Training- Dog Training and Boarding-Family Owned
review_text: We are so grateful for Shelly and Mancini, all of their support and help with our two pups has changed our lives. Our pups were pretty scared of everything and had a hard time listening. Mind your manners has completely changed that for us. Shelley and Mancini have become such an important part of our family. And we appreciate everything you do. Thank you for being such amazing trainers. ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè

provider_name: Mind Your Manners Canine Training- Dog Training and Boarding-Family Owned
review_text:
So Mind your manners has now trained 4 labs for me over the past 7 years. I have an extremely busy schedule with 2 jobs so spending the time for training just wasn't in the cards.
All of the dogs constantly get compliments on how well behaved they are. We take them from FL to PA several times a year and they do great.
The latest training was of my two litter mates that just hit a year old. They are both males and of course can be the stubborn ones vs females.
I can't say enough of how well Mancini trained them. Reinforcement is of course needed but he goes over that as well and it is easy.

These dogs live off leash on 35 acres and will come when I call, stay when commanded and are gentle to all, especially kids. What more can you ask for?

provider_name: Mind Your Manners Canine Training- Dog Training and Boarding-Family Owned
review_text: I have been using Mancini's dog training services since 2020. My Staffordshire is reactionary and very stubborn, much more so in her senior years, with his ongoing training and guidance, we are staying on track. Highly recommend, he genuinely loves what he does and it shows.

provider_name: Mind Your Manners Canine Training- Dog Training and Boarding-Family Owned
review_text: My dog Sadie went through several trainings with Mancini at Mind Your Manners Canine Training. She started with the puppy class, as she had begun barking at other dogs and her own reflection. Mancini was able to quickly break her of that habit and was able to give her good foundational skills such as socializing with other dogs, on the leash walking, sitting, learning the word ‚Äúno‚Äù, etc. We went on to get her service dog trained, and Mancini provided the official certificates, card, and service vest. We can now take her anywhere with us, which has been great. I also use Mind Your Manners for overnight boarding when we go on trips, and it‚Äôs so nice to know that she has fun playing with other dogs, brushes up on her manners and training, and gets to be treated as one of the family! Thank you, I‚Äôm so glad we found Mind Your Manners Canine Training!

provider_name: Mind Your Manners Canine Training- Dog Training and Boarding-Family Owned
review_text: I took my dog to Mind Your Manners when my bully pit was a puppy and I can't say enough about them. My boy is almost 11 years old and still knows his training. Mancini took the time to break down the whole process and explain step by step how the training would be done. Needless to say after 2 weeks we had a well behaved wonderfully trained puppy. Over the 11 years we have booked boarding with MYM and can't describe the relief of knowing our boy is comfortable and taken care of when he's away from us. The booking was quick and easy online. There are several add-on options like grooming etc which is great.

Nick is a true professional who is kind, caring and extremely knowledgeable about the human body. I started with Nick after seeking medical and chiropractic care that did not relieve my back and hip pain. Nick identified what was causing me to have pain at the first session. After two sessions of deep tissue therapy and detailed exercises, my posture is straighter and I am not dealing with constant pain. He video tapes the exercises with step by step instructions so I know I‚Äôm doing them correctly. I was referred to Nick by another satisfied client of his and I will definitely recommend him as well.

As a triathlon runner, I was struggling with persistent hip and leg pain that completely derailed my training. After working with Nick at MindBody Alignment for just 10 sessions, my body has never felt stronger, more resilient, and‚Äîmost importantly‚Äîpain free.

I‚Äôm now activating muscles I didn‚Äôt even know I had and moving in ways that have completely transformed how I train and recover. Nick‚Äôs expertise in identifying the root cause of my issues and tailoring each session specifically to my body made all the difference.

I can‚Äôt thank him enough for helping me get back to doing what I love. Thanks to Nick, I‚Äôm confident and ready to crush future triathlons!

Nick is amazing!!!  He really has helped my neck and posture so much.  My job requires me to bend over constantly so I end up getting a lot of back and neck pain. Nick has made it to where I do not have pain anymore and have a much better posture.  He is wonderful at making a plan just for me and if you are willing to listen to him and put in the work you will be 100% better!!!

I‚Äôve been working with Nick for about 7-8 months now, and I can‚Äôt say enough good things. He has taken so much time to truly understand my complicated medical history - especially my ongoing struggle with nerve compression in my right arm. When I started seeing Nick, I was avoiding using my arm in so many aspects of life out of fear of flareups, but his patience and careful, personalized approach made me brave again. I am conquering my days in ways I used to pray for and my flareups are minimal. As a mom of three, this is huge for me and my family!

Nick puts genuine thought and care into every session - tailoring movements to what my body can handle and slowly helping me build strength and confidence. He doesn‚Äôt get tired of talking about my struggles with my arm - and anyone with chronic issues knows how nice that is. I am SO MUCH more functional in my daily life and rarely have to consider my arm in my day-to-day routine. I am so grateful! If you‚Äôre looking for someone to wade into a complicated physical struggle that doesn‚Äôt want to go away, this is your guy. Highly recommend!

No better thing but to invest in yourself and your healing! Nick has been the perfect partner, designing routines that help fix my hip alignment issues and getting me back on track to an active lifestyle.

Truly Grateful for Dr. Montero and Her Team!
Dr. Montero and her amazing team have been amazing. They provided the guidance, patience, and encouragement he needed to improve his speech, and always made therapy a positive experience. Dr. Montero goes above and beyond ‚Äî she checks in, follows up, and truly cares about her patients‚Äô progress. We‚Äôve seen such a difference thanks to her dedication and support. Highly recommend Mindful Occupational Therapy to any parent looking for genuine care and results!

I also love that they offer bilingual services in English and Spanish. It made communication so easy and made our family feel completely understood and included.

Highly recommend Mindful Occupational Therapy to any parent looking for genuine care, compassion, and real results!

Mindful Occupational Therapy offers professional occupational therapy for children in Spanish and English. Services include sensory interventions, fine motor skills, gross motor skills, and activities of daily living for all pediatric conditions.
Owner LISBET MONTERO has an incredible staff that offers Monday thru Friday services til 6pm with Sayurdays by appointment. In addition to OT, the program offers a parent support group group and various events focused on kids with family engagement.  The program recently expanded to provide more center based OT and school services
The facilty has van accessible free parking in a private lot with curb cuts. Venue is accessible

Caring, loving environment. We highly recommend Dr. Montero for your OT needs, she was great with my son, his school was not providing OT services due to lack of resources so we ended up searching for private theraphy and found Dr. Montero, my son was 5yo at the time and had recently been diagnosed with ASD, she helped him thrive with gross/motor and communication skills, he showed a lot of improvement in a short period of time and we're so grateful we found her, she takes her time educating parents, it's easy to see she loves what she does.

This is, without a doubt, if not the best therapy; it's pretty close. Their therapists are highly professional and treat the children very well and with great patience. We've been here for about six months, and my daughter is very happy and the changes have already been noticeable. I recommend it 100%.

This center is the best my daughter could have had. Quality, discipline, and professionalism are key. The love and respect they show the children make them want to return. Since my daughter started attending therapy, her progress has been impressive.
The director is very kind and makes your stay very pleasant.
They are an excellent team.
The center is very welcoming and centrally located.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
I cannot say enough about how grateful I am for Miracles Recovery Center and the staff who have supported me through this journey. From the moment I started, I felt welcomed and cared for. Eric, the housing director, has been so kind and attentive, always making sure I feel safe and comfortable in my living environment. Derek has been wonderful as well, helping me navigate the program with patience and encouragement.

My case manager, Stephanie, has truly gone above and beyond ‚Äî she takes the time to really listen and guide me, and I always feel supported when talking with her. And Rod, my therapist, has been such an important part of my growth and healing. His compassion and insight have helped me work through things I never thought I could face.

Miracles has given me not just tools for recovery, but a sense of hope and community. I am so thankful for everyone here who has been a part of my progress.

My family and I are so grateful for Miracles Recovery Center. From the very beginning, the staff has gone above and beyond to make sure my mom feels supported and cared for. Eric, the housing director, has been incredibly helpful and compassionate, making sure she feels safe and comfortable in her living situation. Derek, on the business development team, took the time to walk us through everything and made the whole process so much easier. And Stephanie, her case manager, has been such a blessing ‚Äî always checking in, truly listening, and guiding her every step of the way.

It‚Äôs clear that everyone here genuinely cares about their clients‚Äô success. My mom has gained confidence, structure, and hope since starting at Miracles, and I couldn‚Äôt be more thankful. I highly recommend this program to anyone looking for real, compassionate recovery support.

I just graduated from Miracles‚Äô Intensive Outpatient Program last Friday and I have nothing but praise for the treatment center and staff. I began my journey at Miracles on May 9 after two weeks in a detox. I began in their PHP program, completed the recommended four weeks, and expected to maybe stay a month or two in IOP. Once I arrived at Miracles; however, I felt like it was where I was meant to be. I have completed a few other PHPs, but none before Miracles did I even start, let alone complete, IOP. I wanted to stay in Miracles IOP and sober living longer than the average stay, and was able to work with my therapist to have my time in the program extended more than one time. In all, I was at Miracles for five months. I was able to learn from the treatment program, attend outside meetings, find a sponsor and work the steps all while living in Freedom Housing with affordable weekly rent. I am also currently reliant on crutches to walk or get around at all, and they were accommodating to my physical disability. I was able to stay on my medications for mental health and substance abuse with regular visits with a medical provider. I finally felt ‚Äúat home‚Äù living and attending treatment with Miracles. I am forever grateful for my time in the program and everyone who helped me during my extended time there. I would highly recommend Miracles for someone who has completed detox/residential treatment and is ready to get serious about their sobriety and recovery. Along with clinical staff, I would also like to mention how amazing Eric and Shanell are at their jobs and going above and beyond the call of duty helping those of us in recovery.

this recovery center has helped my moms sobriety so much! All staff members have been nothing but a helpful resource for my mom. i feel so comfortable knowing she‚Äôs there and has everything she needs. eric has been amazing! as well as therapist provided through miracles!

Hi my name is Brenda and I'm a 56 year old mother of 3 beautiful children and several grandchildren. I have been an addict for many years and have been to a couple of treatment programs over the years and it was one of the hardest things I have ever done to make that phone call. Getting to the point... I went to detox at the Haven detox facility and I would recommend the Haven to anyone. Upon leaving the Haven I was transferred to Miracle's Treatment Facility in Port St Lucie Florida. This has turned into one of the worst experiences I have ever experienced in my life.
