Let me be clear on a part of this review... Not everything about this facility is bad. There are a couple of amazing people that work there and by no means am I taking anything from those people. My counselor Miss Jodi is amazing and she helped me more than she will ever know.. thank you Miss Jodi I will never forget you. The only person that contributed to my bad/awful experience was the Housing director named Eric. This man is evil and has a major attitude problem. He's on a massive power trip and is just hateful and mean to people. He's best friends with my roommates son in law and put me out of the program because my roommate said she was missing a bra. He never one time gave me a reason and is yet to address the issue of a missing bra with me I was made to move out of my room or I could leave the program! I begged them to search my stuff to prove I didn't have anything that belonged to her but she had a complete meltdown slamming doors cussing him and screaming to the top of her lungs at him and he did absolutely nothing about it! I was put out of my room and told I could either move it or he would move it for me and would put my stuff on the side of the road. I had most of my belongings stolen by my prior roommate there and nothing was done about it at all but I'm being treated this way over a bra that I never took! When you tell this man about any of the problems concerning the house his response is always you can tell me your complaints about the house but the answer is always going to be no! I am left speechless as far as this man and his behavior. My heart is completely broken and my recovery has been hindered. I was supposed to coin out on the 5th of October and because of all this mess I find myself walking around a place that I have absolutely no idea where I am or anybody in this state waiting for a bus that won't come until 1:40 am this is the worst situation I have been in in a very long time. This man don't deserve the position he has been entrusted with. The girl who accused me of taking her bra is three times my size and she's only at the house maybe one night a week yet she's allowed to have the biggest three man room in the house and there is absolutely no consequences for her actions because the housing director and her son in law are best friends! I just pray nothing happens to me as I wonder around waiting on a bus that won't be here until almost two o'clock in the morning! God be with me...

I don‚Äôt recommend the one in SilverShores but I can‚Äôt write a review although is the same Director. The school does not treats kids as kids when there is a behavior issue. My son had an accident with a child, where both boys where playing rough.The school instead of redirecting my child or issuing a warning they expelled him from the program and issue a police investigation! The Director of the program had no empathy calling, and didn‚Äôt even bother to provide a discipline report. Just deferred me to the police. The other child was not injured, there was no medical intervention, no violence or guns, or prior history of my son‚Äôs misconduct. This is just how the school manages situation when a child has misbehaved.
My kids go to this school since they are 2. And i can get enough how nice teachers are, they have different programs, the parents are so good too, we became a school friends with them.
5 stars only because I can't give 6. My therapist, Izzy, is the best. He's attentive, has helped me work through my injury, and genuinely a great guy. Highly recommend.

Amazing and welcoming place! From personal experience, Mr. Ismael is not only very knowledgeable and passionate about his job, but is also kind and willing to help you reach your Physical Therapeutic goals, no matter what they may be. Whether you‚Äôre an athlete, or just experiencing some muscle aches, this is the place to go to help your body feel and perform like new!

NO COOKIE-CUTTER REHAB HERE!  I‚Äôve been through physical therapy for the same condition on three separate occasions and have never received the personalized care and treatment I receive at Mission PT.  Therapist Ismael really listens and tailors treatment to his client‚Äôs needs. He is patient, funny and takes the time to educate to ensure long-term improvement. It has been life-changing for me. I am very grateful my doctor recommended this practice. I highly recommend, as well.

My experience is top notch! Izzy & Danny are both excellent- very knowledgeable & informative. The physical therapy is one on one.  Initially, I had thought about the drive from my home - an extra 15 minutes or so.  It is Well Worth It!  Those extra minutes even a half hour are nothing compared to the care I am receiving, which enables me to get back to where I need to be.  Very thankful to have treatment here & highly recommend!
Great service, the place is super clean. Rehabbing my knee with owner Ismael and he's been great to work with.

My hand therapist was Maria. She was a true professional. She explained everything she was doing. She was encouraging. She was firm and provided structure when that was necessary. I felt she truly cared about my health and my recovery. I would strongly recommend her to anybody.

Nicole is a wonderful therapist.  She is kind, patient, and extremely knowledgeable.  She is always on time, and when she arrives she‚Äôs cheerful and ready to work.  Nicole  gives me the attention and exercises I need to improve my ability to make as best use of my hands as possible. She works me hard in a good way. I would highly recommend Nicole to anyone in search of a top notch therapist.

I am delighted to share my experience with Mobile Therapy hand therapist, Valerie Trent.
Valerie was extremely thorough in explaining the therapy process and patient during the sessions.
Her priority was to ensure a consistent and positive healing journey.  She clearly explained the current status and necessary therapy to ensure continued positive progress.  I am certain that her knowledge, experience and dedicated focus were responsible for my current hand health.  Thank you, Valerie!

I was referred to Mobile Therapy Group after having carpal tunnel surgery.  This is my second shot at therapy.  The first therapy group was in another state and I did not feel the caring and knowledge that I am seeing Maria from Mobile Therapy Group.  It was such an easy transition into this therapy because of Cynthia and Maria.  All I can say is thank you, thank you, thank you!  They offer many different services and mine is specialized hand therapy.  I would recommend this company to all who need it!
Deb Hoffman
My mother was treated by Maria. As a nurse with more than two decades in health care, I have no words to express how impressed I was with her professionalism and caring attitude. ‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Mobility Docs LLC Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text:
I did have a Shoulder problem in a long run as a Bodybuilder athlete I was in need to fix it asap So I reached out to Doc. Christopher because I had so much pain in that exactly moment at my shoulder that it had consumed me and I wasn‚Äôt able to lift a 8 pound dumbbell in a lateral position‚Ä¶
So he explained to me a different methodology working with bands and using different angles and we did get it, and discovered how bad it was and work on it! With all being said, I am about to go back to compete in less than 2 weeks ! So thank you Doc Chris for your expertise and knowledge!

provider_name: Mobility Docs LLC Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text:
I came to Chris with shoulder and neck pain from a sports injury due to  competing In CrossFit. He was amazing ! His ability to hear what my issues were & be able to dial in what the cause was and fix it over the course of the next few weeks was next level! He got me feeling great again , back to training fully and ready for my next comp in 2 weeks!

I highly recommend Chris for any injuries you may be dealing with.

provider_name: Mobility Docs LLC Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: I was having shoulder pain for a few months during and after workouts to a point that I thought I might have to consider surgical intervention. I found Chris through IG and am very glad I did. After working with him for just a few weeks I noticed that I was having incremental improvements and now am able to workout nearly at 100% capacity. Highly recommend at least getting an evaluation with Chris before seeking out an orthopedic surgeon.

provider_name: Mobility Docs LLC Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: Dr.Chris has gotten me through a very rough patch. I reached out to him because I had so much pain in my shoulder that it had consumed me. I had a partially torn rotator cuff. I hadn‚Äôt slept properly in over a month. I was in constant pain. I couldn‚Äôt work out with my upper body any longer. His process has gotten me back on track with my sleeping. I‚Äôm back in the gym using the tools that Doc taught me. I‚Äôm getting stronger every week. My energy is back. I feel like a new man! I totally recommend Chris the shoulder doctor. His methods work!!!!!

provider_name: Mobility Docs LLC Physical Therapy and Performance
review_text: Chris was fantastic. I injured my shoulder, and he was able to effectively diagnose the issue, effectively treat the issue, and put me back on the path to resuming lifting, which was a real concern of mine.  Bonus points too for the dry needling treatment, which I want expecting. If I‚Äôm injured again, I won‚Äôt hesitate to go back. And if you have an injury you need some help recovering from, I would highly recommend Chris.

A Year of Exceptional Care: Highly Recommend This Therapy Team!
I am writing this review to express my absolute admiration and gratitude for the incredible physical, occupational, and speech therapy team that has been working with my patient for the past year. From day one, their dedication, expertise, and compassionate approach have been nothing short of exemplary.

Over the last 12 months, I've had the privilege of witnessing firsthand the remarkable progress my patient has made, and it's largely due to the consistent, tailored, and thoughtful care provided by every therapist involved. They don't just treat symptoms; they genuinely invest in the well-being and long-term success of their patients.

What truly stands out is their holistic approach and the seamless way they integrate all three disciplines. Lindsey, the speech therapist, consistently keeps my patient on track, while Megan, the occupational therapist, skillfully motivates my stubborn patient to do his exercises. We can't forget Shawna, who tolerates his antics with remarkable patience, and Beverly, who gently encourages my patient, with her soft demeanor, to do what needs to be done during the session! Each therapist communicates effectively, ensuring a cohesive and comprehensive treatment plan that addresses all aspects of recovery and development. Their professionalism is always evident, but it's their kindness and genuine care that truly set them apart. They foster an environment where patients feel supported, encouraged, and motivated, even on challenging days.

If you are looking for a therapy company that delivers outstanding results with genuine compassion and expertise, I wholeheartedly recommend them. Their commitment to their patients is evident in every session, and they deserve all the praise for the incredible work they do.

For years Ted has been consistently consistent.
The physical therapy he has implemented
has shown great improvement in my mothers ability to be more independent than she was without his program.
Ted takes " working out" to a new level.
Mom has fun, laughs, is physically stronger and has better balance.
Most of all she sees results!
Thank you Ted for treating the elderly with love, respect and dignity.
You're the best and our family appreciates all you do.
Cathy

Hilary, Shannon and the therapists have been a delight to work with. They bend over backwards to find the right therapists for our daughter. She receives PT, OT and Speech therapy through Mobility Rehab and they have always had her best interests in mind. Any problems or concerns are addressed asap and we can Always get someone on the phone every time we call. I would be happy to recommend Mobility Rehab to anyone I know needing these services.

My husband is having PT with John for some 2 yrs now, on and off as needed for his condition.
We could not have asked for a more professional, knowledgeable, caring and supportive therapist. Not only the physical improvement was outstanding, but also John‚Äôs communication skills in dealing with some bad days is of great value to keep my husband focus, happy and much more engaged.
John makes the family also engage, keeping us all aware of any changes needed to act on, and educate us on how to keep my husband rehabilitation smooth and interesting!
Mobility Rehab has a great team of professionals, and we are very lucky to have found them in the right time of our lives!

Travis is hands down one of the best physical therapists I‚Äôve worked with. He‚Äôs super knowledgeable, patient, and always takes extra time to make sure everything is done thoroughly. He went above and beyond to help me recover from a herniated disc‚Äîeven creating a custom at-home plan outside of our sessions that really helped me feel better. Highly recommend!
We get orientation on our 4 months baby about tummy time and stimulation. Highly recommended.

Miss Ana is the best speech therapist. We spent 6 months with my toddler since 15 months & he‚Äôs learn to be so vocal now. Not only did she help him, she helped me as a first time mom. My almost 2 year old toddler is very vocal now & controls his tantrums because he now knows how to express his emotions.

The absolute best.

Even more so because I accidentally double booked myself with her and my lactation consultant, then they coordinated to see me at the same time to make sure my daughter and I were getting the care we needed!

We had to say goodbye to our beloved German Shepherd Indy girl yesterday, and it was one of the hardest days I‚Äôve ever experienced. Through it all, I‚Äôm deeply grateful for the support we received from her vet tech, Jennifer Taylor. From the moment we walked in to the moment we left, JT treated us with such compassion and respect. She made sure we felt supported every step of the way, embraced me as I broke down in tears, and most importantly, created a peaceful, dignified space for Indy to pass.

Additionally, Indy had been under Dr. Maldonado‚Äôs care for many years, and I truly believe her long, happy life was a reflection of the exceptional care she received. Dr. Maldonado is a true blessing, and I‚Äôm so thankful for her and the entire Monterey Animal Clinic team. Their kindness and professionalism meant the world to us in such a painful moment.

If I lived closer, this would be my primary Vet! I was only in this area to take my baby for follow up bloodwork at the Animal Caner Care clinic just across the parking lot. My poor baby ended up having a medical emergency just as we were leaving our appointment. The oncology Vet contacted Monterey and we were able to get him set up and taken care of in a matter of seconds! The entire staff was such a delight, so caring and thoughtful. I couldn‚Äôt have asked to be in a better place when this happened. They saved my baby! Thank you all!

I brought my friend‚Äôs dog to Monterrey Animal Clinic at the morning because he was unable to walk and had trouble holding his pee. The staff was outstanding from the start. The doctor and the care team took the time to explain everything and showed genuine compassion toward pet. By the afternoon, I received a call to update me, and I was thrilled to hear that dog was already able to walk again. His condition improved so much that he was feeling better every hour. I'm truly grateful for the exceptional care and dedication of everyone at Monterrey Animal Clinic. Thank you for making such a positive difference!!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

It's always a pleasure taking my girl to a place where everyone is kind and professional.
When we moved to Florida four years ago, we tried several vets. It is a testament to Dr. Wood and staff at Monterey Animal Clinic that we are willing to drive forty minutes for our appointments.

Doctor Maldonado is THE BEST vet I‚Äôve ever experienced. Truly compassionate, great bedside manner for both pup and mama. And has a good sense of humor. Always helps put my mind at ease. Thank you thank you thank you. Layla loves visiting the vet (maybe a little too often)
Amazing and cozy therapy office right off of Federal. The staff is amazing and makes you feel at home from the moment you walk in. Turned my day right around. Would highly recommend!

Andrew Kaplan is an excellent therapist who is able to see through the cloudy images and create a solid path forward. He is an excellent listener and then summarizes issues very well and puts them into an easy to understand interpretation. I highly recommend Andrew for people who think they don‚Äôt have major issues but in a relatively short period of time his analysis is spot on and easy to follow. Thank you Andrew

My wife and I have been seeing Andrew Kaplan for over two years now. Words can‚Äôt express how thankful I am to have met him. He has helped me become a better person in all aspects of my life. Would recommend to any couple or individual looking for a true professional therapist.

I have been a patient at MorMindful for 5 years and Dr Caro has helped me so much. She is very understanding and empathetic. The office is extremely professional and kind. They are a pleasure to work with.

From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with warmth and professionalism‚Äîthanks to Sarah, the front office administrator,, who goes above and beyond to make every visit smooth and welcoming. Dr. Caro, M.D. is incredibly knowledgeable, compassionate, and attentive, providing thoughtful care that truly makes a difference. This practice sets the gold standard for mental health care!

provider_name: More Than A Voice Speech Therapy
review_text: We came here with her nephew to try and get some of our fears about him being autistic addressed. Monica was amazing she was really knowledgeable and helpful and compassionate. It turns out that he just has a speech delay right now and we're gonna be working together but I just wanted to leave this with you because she was so great.

provider_name: More Than A Voice Speech Therapy
review_text: I‚Äôm leaving a review because I had a consultation with Monica and she was so nice and knowledgeable and actually helped me learn about exactly what I needed. She actually helped be realize I didn‚Äôt need any speech therapy. I could tell she wasn‚Äôt just trying to treat me like a number and bill my insurance. She really wants me to feel better. She helped me find the right resources and I‚Äôm so thankful that someone like her is actually looking after patients.

provider_name: More Than A Voice Speech Therapy
review_text: Monica is the best. Her years of experience shows and makes the session very comfortable and assuring. The booking process is very easy and fits you in quickly. I trust her and she goes above and beyond to explain everything! Highly recommend!!

provider_name: More Than A Voice Speech Therapy
review_text: One of the only speech therapist I‚Äôve been able to find for weekend speech therapy so that‚Äôs a plus. And Monica hasn‚Äôt cancelled on me once yet which I more that I can say for all these other clinics that will cancel with like 30 minutes notice.

provider_name: More Than A Voice Speech Therapy
review_text: My son loves Monica. We've been through a few clinics with no results but his speech and sentence forming has already gotten better in just a few months with her. I knew communication therapy would be difficult for him cause he hates paying attention. But she really makes it easy for him to learn.

We are beyond grateful for the incredible care and support we received at More Than Speech. From the very beginning, we felt welcomed, understood, and supported every step of the way.

A special thank you to Anna and Isabel, who worked so patiently and lovingly with our son, Matias. Their dedication, creativity, and compassion made a lasting impact on his development‚Äîand on us as a family. They always made therapy feel like a fun and safe space, and we saw such amazing progress thanks to their guidance and expertise.

More Than Speech truly lives up to its name‚Äîit‚Äôs more than just therapy, it‚Äôs a place of growth, encouragement, and genuine care. We highly recommend them to any family looking for a team that will go above and beyond for your child. Thank you again for everything! üíô

More Than Speech was a wonderful experience! - From the front office staff, Desiree, to my child‚Äôs therapist, Trina. The attention and care was amazing. My child is on the shy side, but he quickly warmed up and enjoyed every minute spent. His language improved, as well as his communication. I highly recommend More Than Speech.

More than speech is highly recommended by me and my family. Our 4 year old son was seen here by Trina 2x a week for 6 months. In that time his speech and communication skills have improved significantly. Trina was so skilled she made speech therapy fun for our son who loved going every time. His teachers and other family members can now better understand and communicate with him, which is the greatest gift.
Thank you to Trina and More than speech for improving the life of our sweet boy.
The Speech Therapists and Staff at More Than Speech are exceptional in their approach and truly care for the children they work with. Our family is so grateful for their support!

I absolutely love my son's care team!! Especially Yasmine!! Thank you guys for everything you do for my son! You guys have made my son so comfortable to the point he walks in the door by himself (I used to have to drag him). I am here for it and love it!!

The most knowledgeable and caring team for Occupational, Speech and Physical therapy. After searching for therapists for my kids for over a year, and having a few negative experiences, I am beyond grateful to have found them. We have been working with them for a yr and a half now and I have only great things to say about them. They are truly incredible!
True professionals here in every discipline I am so grateful everything they do for our children. We have been coming here for years and I have seen so much progress in my son.  ‚ù§Ô∏è

It's a real shame that professionals dedicated to the care and development of our children resort to legal battles with families. As parents, we trust them to provide support in difficult times, but these types of actions have deeply disappointed us. Our experience with Silvia Azc√°rate, although initially positive in terms of therapy, ended with a bitter feeling of mistrust.

We hope that other parents don't find themselves in similar situations and can find professionals who prioritize the relationship with families over legal or economic interests.

Dr. Aly is the best of the best. He is highly trained, a true professional in his field, and more importantly, personable and caring. He takes his time to understand your needs and partners alongside you to help with your mental health. If you‚Äôre scared or worried to take the step to seek mental health care like I was, I can assure you that this is the most human doctor you‚Äôll ever meet. You won‚Äôt regret going to Mosaic. Dr. Aly is truly a gift to our community.

Dr. Aly has been nothing but the most down to earth individual and an individual who is also very well educated in his field. I went from going in and out of hospitals and once Dy.Aly and I got the correct medication regimen going with lifestyle changes my life has changed tremendously. Thank you for everything Dr.Aly ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs gonna get worse before it gets‚Äù and thats the truth. Thank you Dr.Aly!

And may I add that twice he responded during the weekend.  You don't get the usual "If this is a medical emergency (in which it most definitely was both times) he with All Due Respect prefers matters to be handled during the week.  Simply above and beyond "The Art of Being Human".  The Humanism philosophy.  Calling now to book an appointment and now can't wait to meet his dog.

Dr. Aly is amazing! He knows his stuff! Doesn‚Äôt sugarcoat the issue‚Ä¶ gets down to the nitty gritty. Good with all ages! Very well read and knowledgeable. He goes the extra mile to help his patients. he tells his patients to just text him if they need him or have any issues or questions, who does that?! He puts the care back in healthcare. Added bonus is a lot of times his service dog is in the office. If there was higher than five stars I would give it to him!

Dr. Aly is an amazing doctor who truly cares about finding solutions. Our 9 year old son with ASD went to Dr. Aly as we were having major issues with him at school and home and our next step was medication of some sort to try as a next step. Dr. Aly met with us, discussed the issues and made a suggestion of a more natural course of action that has been extremely effective and in a short time both at school and home there has been a remarkable improvement . It cannot be put into words the difference we have seen last year versus this year and that is a credit to Dr. Aly and anyone with a special needs child who has struggled navigating other doctors or the medication route I highly recommend visiting Dr. Aly!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about my experience with MotionPro Physical Therapy. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed, supported, and confident that I was in the right place. They are not only professional and highly knowledgeable but also incredibly compassionate and attentive.
Chris took the time to understand my goals truly and customized a plan that helped me recover faster than I ever expected. Every session was focused, challenging, and encouraging ‚Äî and they made sure I was performing each movement correctly to avoid setbacks and maximize progress.
The facility is clean, well-equipped, and has positive energy that motivates you to work hard and improve.

I highly recommend MotionPro Physical Therapy.  I couldn't be happier with my experience! The care I received exceeded my expectations. Dr. Chris was friendly, responsive, and professional.  I highly recommend this facility to anyone looking for a reliable and top-notch physical therapy experience. It‚Äôs important to your recovery to work with one person throughout your physical therapy sessions. You get that here.

We are so grateful for the care our daughter received from Chris at MotionPro Physical Therapy & Wellness. From the first visit, it was clear how knowledgeable and compassionate Chris is. He took the time to really understand what she needed and created a treatment plan that helped her ankle heal quickly and confidently. The exercises he gave us to do at home were simple and effective‚Äîand we could see the progress week by week. Chris made a significant difference in helping our daughter stay motivated during recovery and feel comfortable competing again. We recommend Chris and MotionPro to anyone looking for thoughtful, effective physical therapy.

Chris and Hector were a fantastic help in my recovery process.  Their one-client-per-appointment model was eye opening to me coming from PT offices where the therapist managed multiple clients in overlapping appointment times.   The personal attention allowed much more detailed work and I thoroughly recommend MotionPro!   In 2024 I had two total knee replacements and they were key in identifying issues I was struggling with.

I was recommended MotionPRO physical therapy by my pain doctor. As a 33-year-old with over eight years of chronic low back pain I have had my share of PT. Having had prior experiences in which I was one of many patients being serviced at one time or being provided with the same five stretches week after week with little to no progress, I certainly came in with my own skepticism. However I can honestly say Chris with MotionPRO gave me a NEW and improved PT experience. He is a very skilled PT with a lot of care and kindness for his patients. At MotionPRO I received the one on one attention I really needed. Chris provided me with a great program I can continue to use and improve upon tailored to my specific strengthening and mobility needs. While my pain is still there, I believe the program I was given will aid in healing and prevent further injury and degeneration down the road.  Chris is down to earth, approachable and very easy to talk to! He made himself available to questions even outside of session. Overall I can truly say MotionPRO is the BEST physical therapy experience I have ever had and I would recommend them to everyone and anyone regardless of age and needs!

I highly recommend Ms. Kathryn and her entire team! They are extremely knowledgeable and kind therapists. It is clear that they are passionate about what they do, and provide a lot of personal attention and guidance. The sessions are always fun and engaging and my son always looked forward to going.I am so appreciative of the improvement in my son‚Äôs overall development during his time with her and her team!

Move and bloom and their therapists went above and beyond what I expected as soon as I walked in, and throughout the entire evaluation. As a speech therapist myself, I‚Äôve been to many therapy facilities- both in my personal work and for my children. I was blown away by how comprehensive, thorough and how well knowledgeable they all are. They worked so well together and so collaboratively- such a well oiled machine. My son immediately felt comfortable and had the best time, all while targeting so many different areas without him ever knowing. I cannot recommend move and bloom enough!

I cannot recommend Ms. Kathryn enough. Our child has been working with her for several months, and we've already seen a remarkable difference in his physical and emotional development.
Our child had some challenges with eye coordination and was struggling with tasks like reading, tracking moving objects and handwriting. Thanks to the motor exercises and activities Ms. Kathryn has introduced, we‚Äôve seen huge improvements. Our child‚Äôs ability to focus, follow along with instructions, and complete tasks without frustration has grown significantly.
In addition to ocular motor therapy, Ms. Kathryn specializes in integrating reflexes, which I didn‚Äôt even realize were a factor before starting therapy. These reflexes were causing issues with balance, coordination, and fine motor skills. She has significantly helped our child in integrating these reflexes and building more stability and control over his body.
The environment Ms. Kathryn creates is warm, welcoming, and child-centered. She has a natural way of connecting with children, which makes therapy feel like a fun and positive experience rather than a chore. We also appreciate how she has kept us informed and involved in the process, providing us with helpful strategies and activities to support our child‚Äôs progress at home.
Ms. Kathryn has made such a positive impact on our child‚Äôs development, and we‚Äôre incredibly grateful for the progress we‚Äôve seen. If you‚Äôre looking for a dedicated, knowledgeable, and caring occupational therapist for your child, I highly recommend you consult with Ms Kathryn.

As a mother of six children, my schedule is challenging. Move and bloom went above and beyond to accommodate my busy schedule. They have been transformative for my entire family.  I do not know where I would be today without them. It is challenging to find therapists that fully understand sensory processing challenges. They are experts on sensory integration. Thank you for the amazing work that you do!

I am beyond thankful for this team. The progress my son has made thanks to them has been life changing. We have been attending for almost a year and he‚Äôs made great progress with all his sensory systems, core muscle strengthening, motor planning, etc. My son also LOVES going to the sessions!! Cannot recommend Katheryn and her team enough!!!!

I Highly Recommend. All the Stars !!!

I sit crunched over at a work bench, with my poor posture, for 8-10hrs a day. I desperately needed relief for my neck, shoulders, middle and lower back. Generic Chiropractors were not helping my issues.

Google found me Dr Olivia and I was able to get all 4 treatments that work for me at the same place; Chiropractic, Myofascial release, Targeted stretching, and Cupping. I started out with a few 30 minute sessions to get things moving and ended up with a few hour long sessions to really get the parts moving well again. I feel great and will now do a monthly adjustment moving forward.

Dr Olivia is now my forever therapist.

Dr Olivia is the sweetest person ever. Ever since I started going to her my quality of life has been alot better. What I love about her the most is the passion in what she does. It's never about money for her she truly cares about each person improving and getting better. Even when I got better I just kept going just because he it feels good getting adjusted and Dr Olivia is a vibe to talk to. She is family at this point.

Dr. Olivia is GREAT!! I have been moving better than I have for a while and you can clearly see that she is genuinely concerned about your recovery and progress. I would recommend anyone seeking a chiropractor to start here.

Dr. Olivia is personable and always makes an effort to listen to your concerns and current ailments. She provides an array of stretches, cupping, and adjustments to help get you back to center.

Just be open and tell her what you need help with and she will work with you.
I had a wonderful time working with Dr. Olivia. She offers compassionate and comfortable care, she listens and pays attention to my needs and helped me to get my diagnosis for EDS.

I had been struggling with peroneal tendonitis for over 8 months before I first started working with Taylor, and after our first session of dry needling in addition to the complementary movements she recommended as well as other therapeutic practices, I started to notice improvements immediately.  I really appreciate that Taylor and Garrett are true experts in their craft and provide tangible and personalized recommendations based on lifestyle and needs.  I'm feeling MUCH better, almost entirely pain-free, and I really am so grateful!

Of all the physical therapy locations in Ormond Beach MovMed Rehab Therapy Clinic was by far the best.  Garret and Taylor give one on one personal attention and are very knowledgeable of how to treat different maladies.  The facility was always neat and clean, and with all the latest equipment.  I highly recommend MovMed Rehab.
Arlene Bonner

My shoulder has been in pain since September of last year.  Thanks to Taylor at Move Med it is pain free.   She gave me great exercises to do at home, and I highly recommend Move Med for any of your Physical Therapy needs.

Could not be happier with the results that Taylor has given me. She knows what she is doing!!!  I actually enjoy going to therapy.
Thank you Taylor for being patient with me!!

Top shelf. They know what they are doing and are thorough. Very clean establishment. Much fun when it comes to therapy. Never knew it could be so much fun. Awesome couple own and completely run the operation no outsiders. Would recommend to anyone.

I cannot say enough good things about my experience with Greg at Movement Driven Performance Physiotherapy. The personalized care and treatment plan was top-notch. I came in with persistent knee pain.  Greg took the time to understand my specific situation and created a customized plan which he adjusted week over week.  He was always available for questions or concerns in between visits too.

Greg is incredibly professional and knowledgeable.  Each session was productive, and he took the time to explain the underlying issues and why the exercises would be beneficial.  I'm no longer in daily pain, and I have significantly increased my strength and mobility.

I wholeheartedly recommend Movement Driven Performance Physiotherapy!

After struggling with knee pain and weakness from a past ACL and meniscus tear and needing a more specialized and tailored PT approach, I found Movement Driven! Dr. Greg gave me an exercise plan that helped me rebuild strength and improve mobility. He is knowledgeable with the training and experience he has, and always took the time to explain why each exercise mattered. The dry needling sessions also made a huge difference in reducing pain and tightness. Thanks to Movement Driven I made it through race day feeling strong and confident!

I was lead to Movement Driven Performance Physiotherapy in an effort to avoid knee replacement.  I've been active in competitive athletics my whole life, 69 years, and my knees are just wearing out.  To avoid knee replacement I believe there are options available. And finding Greg Goldberger, Owner of Movement Driven has been a great step in delaying knee replacement.   With Mr. Goldberger direction by example and his  videos with stretching, strength enhancement of the effected area has helped immensely.  Following his program has reduced aches and pains to the point that I can enjoy my golf game! I recommend Movement Driven to anyone   struggling with pain as well pre and post surgery physical support.

Dr. Greg is a trusted partner of our fitness community. He takes what most PTs understand and takes it to the next level. He has an incredible depth of knowledge and understanding of pain. He has helped several of our clients improve or eliminate their knee, hip, low back, or shoulder pain and discomfort when they thought they might live with these conditions forever. Dr. Greg is genuine and thoughtful. I encourage you to take action now and book a consultation. Don‚Äôt waste another day living in pain. Dr. Greg can help you raise the quality of your life.

So happy I found Dr Greg and Movement Driven! A nagging back injury had completely taken me out of the gym. I had tried three other different physical therapy avenues and just thought I wasn‚Äôt putting in enough work. Well during my first session with Dr Greg we were able to figure the key issues that had never been addressed. Most days I have forgotten that I have ever had an injury and it has been life changing. Could not recommend enough. Thanks so much!

Miss Vanessa is truly Amazing!! She is very professional and a great Occupational Therapist. We are very happy with how much progress our little one has come along and she is trained in Therapeutic listening. Our son has been seeing her for about 2 years. He has come along with his sensory issues and was not able to touch sand or be at the beach with sand on his feet. He can now blow candles,
touch sand, play with play-dough etc. Overall I highly recommend her. She is overall awesome and the best around!!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about the team at Multi-Care Medical in Cape Coral. From the moment I walked through the door, I was met with kindness, professionalism, and a genuine sense of care from the entire office staff. They make scheduling easy, greet you with a smile every visit, and are always willing to go the extra mile to make sure you‚Äôre comfortable and well-informed.

The physical therapist I worked with was exceptional‚Äîknowledgeable, attentive, and truly dedicated to helping me recover. They took the time to listen to my concerns, explain every step of the treatment plan, and adjust exercises as needed to make sure I was progressing safely. Thanks to their expertise and encouragement, I‚Äôve seen major improvements in both my mobility and pain levels.

If you‚Äôre looking for a team that combines skill, compassion, and professionalism, I highly recommend Multi-Care Medical. They‚Äôve made a real difference in my health and well-being, and I‚Äôm incredibly grateful!

I cannot recommend Multi-Care Cape Coral enough! From the moment I walked in, the staff greeted me with smiles and friendliness, making me feel welcome and comfortable. Their genuine care and dedication to each patient are evident, as they really take the time to listen to my concerns and tailor my treatment plan accordingly. The level of professionalism and expertise is outstanding. I truly appreciate their support throughout my recovery journey. If you're looking for a top-notch physical therapy experience, Multi-Care Cape Coral is the way to go!

I recently had a therapy session for my neck and was looked after by Brooke, Stephanie, and Arianna. All three were incredibly polite, professional, and made me feel completely comfortable throughout the entire process. They took the time to understand my concerns, explained everything clearly, and provided excellent care with a very personal touch. Their friendly and professional approach truly stood out, and I left feeling so much better and confident in the treatment I received. Highly recommend their services!

Best Spot for Therapy in the Cape!
I have been going about two months now. No complaints!
A1 customer service, Overall positive atmosphere, Treatment with actual results! I would definitely recommend!

Mari and Rosie will happily help you book and reschedule appoints with ease.

Massages are great! The staff is very knowledgable and experienced!

I have been going to multi care for pt for  a few weeks now, the therapists are knowledgeable, personable, well trained and educated. Rose and Mari who work upfront always greet you with a friendly smile and are extremely helpful when making future appointments. The place is great.

I‚Äôve been coming to this clinic for almost two months for physical therapy, and my experience has been nothing short of excellent. From the moment I walk in, I‚Äôm always greeted with kindness and professionalism by the front office staff, who make scheduling and check-ins simple and stress-free. The doctors here are knowledgeable, attentive, and truly take the time to listen, making me feel confident and cared for throughout my recovery.

The physical therapy team‚Äîincluding Erica, Jess, Samantha, Victoria, Luis, Lourdes, and Natalia‚Äîare absolutely amazing. They not only guide me through each exercise with patience and encouragement, but they also make every session something I look forward to. Their friendliness, positivity, and dedication have helped me see real results, both in my recovery and in my confidence.

What really sets this clinic apart is the way the entire staff works together to create such a welcoming environment. From the office team to the doctors to the therapists, everyone goes above and beyond to make patients feel comfortable and supported. The clinic is always clean, organized, and well-run, but it‚Äôs the people here who make it truly exceptional.

I can‚Äôt recommend this clinic enough‚Äîif you‚Äôre looking for a place where you‚Äôll not only receive excellent care but also feel genuinely valued as a patient, this is the place to go.

Multi-Care Medical is the Best. If you want to talk about Care. They have a Staff that is Professional and Very Respsectful to your Situations. The Desk Staff / Natalie , Nathalia ,Gianni will get you Scheduled Super fast. They have great Therapist Like Erica that‚Äôs very Knowledgeable in the field of Therapy . Lou is another Good therapist . M.C.M is the Best . Very friendly & Organized. 10 Stars Easy üëç

That staff, environment itself were great. I not only was recovering my physical injury but also mentally. It was a first experience for me going to therapy with this great groups of people. I can solemnly say that anyone who needs any of the following services provided by this organization/company should reach out and obtain the services. Great experience overall

I‚Äôve been doing physical therapy here for a few weeks now and every single person on staff here is so incredibly kind and caring. The environment is so comforting because of how sweet everyone is, and it is so clear that they all really care about their patients. Absolutely the best possible introduction to doing physical therapy.

By and far the best physical therapy center I‚Äôve been to. The people at the front desk are super helpful and nice, especially G. I‚Äôve been coming here on and off for a year and I would not be where I am today without this amazing group. The other physical therapy clinics i‚Äôve been to previously have not been nearly as helpful, attentive, and knowledgeable as this group. Highly recommend.

As much as I tried to stay optimistic, since I use to come here as a young teen, Ms.Oliveria the intake person was less then professional with me while doing my intake, you can visibly tell she didn‚Äôt want to be there, told me how I looked familiar which she said to me ‚Äúthis isn‚Äôt allowed if I know you‚Äù, then proceeded with the intake to explain how she has three different job positions and how her schedule is very busy but still took it upon herself to make me HER Patient for therapy, I‚Äôve been waiting for a call  since my last appt (5/20/2025) for a referral to be able to start my therapy sessions and I still haven‚Äôt received one after 3 weeks.
I was told by the front office it takes at least a week for the referral to come in, still no ref on file.
Recommended me a legal aid that does not give the services she deemed I needed,
Left 2 messages, one with the front office and one with her receptionist from her department and still No call back.
It‚Äôs the incompetence of people I don‚Äôt understand, why take a new patient if that wasn‚Äôt your intentions in the first place? Why lie to people faces then avoid them entirely?
Had the nerve to tell me if I don‚Äôt answer my phone when she calls, she will cancel the case and yet I don‚Äôt get the decency to get a call back? Some people just hate their jobs and love the money. I never liked this company, and I never will. Just atrocious behavior.

Update: the director called me stating that she read my review and she apologizes for such a long wait and offered my referral to get my therapy sessions, After 3 weeks of waiting for a call, all of a sudden after reading my review, the referral is ready and available? I declined cause I‚Äôm already receiving services else where. But this is what I‚Äôm saying? No accountability, no responsibility being taken just a quick cover up for inconsiderate behavior.

I am not pleased at all. We had our assessment in April. Got called to do diagnosis evaluation today. The lady that we did see and I say lady because I never got her title or name. She spoke with my 9 year old for 10 minutes has her copy shapes on a paper and when I walked in she had written on a paper the word autism and pointed to it and says she does not have this even before she asked my concerns or explaining anything.she did not even look at my answers on the parents evaluation .I felt not heard and belittled. My daughter is high level on academics but not socially or daily task and emotions. After she says ADHD her next question is would be be willing to do medication..... Totally ridiculous you have meet her for the first time and you jump to medication.... We have been waiting 3 months on therapy with no update....I will not be using your service and I will not be recommending this place to no one.
Know my daughter before you wanna shove pharmaceuticals down her throat because it's a easy fix for y'all. Not for me or my daughter.

I‚Äôve been receiving psychiatric, psychotherapy, and case management services from Multilingual psychotherapy for 8 yrs but recently since January 2025, I‚Äôve been fortunate to have what I call ‚ÄúMy Dream Team‚Äù My psychiatrist is Dr. GOZAL.  My trauma specialist is Dr. Sabrina Harris and my case manager is Melissa Spinaze.
.  These professional women go above and beyond to ensure I‚Äôm receiving optimum services.  They all are kind, compassionate, dedicated and hardworking.  They genuinely care for you.

*******As for the administration and the management at Multilingual well that‚Äôs a disappointment.  Recently there has been a significant change in personnel.  Some employees were there for many years and contributed in a positive manner and were let go.  It sad to see good people treated poorly.*******

Today I was made aware that I needed to pay an out of pocket cost of $20.00 for medication management.  I‚Äôve had the same insurance since the beginning of January 1, 2025. I have been disabled since August 2022 and I have not worked since August 2022 my psychiatric, psychotherapy and case management was being covered by the brighter family foundation, which I am eternally grateful for. I‚Äôve been in and out of the hospitals as recent as last Wednesday, August 20, 2025 in which I had surgery to cut my tendons & remove my nerves.  I suffer from degenerative spinal stenosis, which there is no no cure for each day. My mobility gets worse so much so that on June 12, I was getting out of my car and I fell over my left leg cause I couldn‚Äôt lift it out of the car and I fell flat face flat on the pavement and broke my nose. I almost passed away from sepsis infection end of 2024.  My hospital bills were over $700,000.  The majority was covered from my insurance company and the out-of-pocket cost. I was able to get billed and later request financial assistance. I do not have the financial means to be paying out-of-pocket whether it‚Äôs $1 dollar $20.00 dollars or $0.5 cents) I just don‚Äôt have it and it‚Äôs very scary as a person that has had suicidal tendencies would be cut from the much needed mental health services.  I was informed if I don‚Äôt pay the co-Payment they will not schedule my mental health medication management appointment. This is absolutely irresponsible and I pray nothing negative happens to me! ******
Wonderful Service. We love the care and compassion by the entire staff and how they follow through with everything.

I didn't like the psychiatrist's service, in my opinion she doesn't know much, I asked for a medication for my son that could calm him, but that wouldn't put him to sleep, she said she didn't have any, that she didn't know of any! How can a psychiatrist who works with special needs not know of medication that can help?

For people on the Autism Spectrum; forming relationships and maintaining them is a challenge.
When my daughter, was originally diagnosed with Autism at age 3; one of my biggest concerns was finding groups and organizations where she could receive guidance navigating social settings. When individuals with Autism become  adults; the safe enriching environments of school or college are no longer there to serve as guides, yet life‚Äôs complex interactions remain.
When our family moved to Southwest Florida from the Midwest over 10 years ago we found My Autism Connection. To say this organization has been an integral part of my daughter‚Äôs adult life is an understatement.  The group led by Sandra Worth and her capable, caring and compassionate team help adults on the spectrum with all facets of everyday. From social activities, to in-depth discussions on Life Skills to advocating at your employment; My Autism Connection is there to assist these young adults paths. Class topics include ‚Äòappropriate dining manners‚Äô, ‚Äòhow to behave and dress for a job interview‚Äô and ‚Äòthings to expect and be aware of when going through security at an airport‚Äô.
The Lee County Driver‚Äôs Challenge was pivotal when my daughter was learning to drive. A mock pull over complete with sirens and how to handle a stressful situation with law enforcement was part of the day‚Äôs learning curriculum.
This group enjoys all the things we ALL look for in life; friendship, support, encouragement and most importantly stresses ongoing personal growth.
My Autism Connection is a group  that inspires their members to be hopeful but best of all PREPARED for a bright future.

As this organization may be good for individuals in the middle to low range of the spectrum, They are not good for individuals on the higher end of the spectrum. First of all, The activities that are planned are designed purposely for that middle to low range demographic. Activities such as life skills workshops, Chaperoned Field Trips and classes on adult resonsibilies may good for someone in the lower spectrum they are little to no help to higher end individuals who already have those adult responsibilities daily. Secondly the owner of this organization Sandra Worth get too involved with your personal life. When I would miss a meeting due to work or college I would get a call the next day from her where she would interigate me to explain everything I did during that meeting time and lecture to me on how if I miss her meetings I would be ruining my future. During one of the meetings I had to leave early due to a family emergency and since everyone was buzy I just walked out. Sandra then took the initive to follow me out to me car and started scolding me in my vehicle with statements like "What your leaving for better be important" and "I am so mad that your leaving like this as its looks bad for the organization". Thirdly, For a non-profit organization their fees are atrocious. Before I left this place I was being charged 80 dollars a month for "member-dues" and any activities other then the 2 per month group meeting was charged extra anywhere between 40 and 120 dollars. I understand that someone needs to pay the bills but with the amount of donations this place gets these prices should be way more subsidized than this. In conclusion, I am not saying My Autism Connection is a bad organization for the people that are getting a benifit from it but what I am saying is that they should be more open to High-Functioning individuals in saying that this place might not be the best fit for them. Also everyone else that worked here other than Sandra where very nice and friendly.

MAC's environment is so kind and welcoming, and seeing all of the members gain useful financial skills (and social) to build confidence is heartwarming. I've witnessed significant growth of members since my time as an intern at MAC (a couple months)
Great people. Very helpful to people living within the Autism range.

My daughter has  been at My Big World Inc.  almost two years now.  She does speech  therapy with Mila and occupational therapy with Susy. ( she started with Jessica ‚ù§Ô∏è who‚Äôs also an amazing therapist)  My daughter went from not talking or using words at all to using 4 word sentences. It‚Äôs extraordinary to see your child go from no eye contact or responding to their names to speaking. The therapists took time to speak to me and explain the sessions . They helped me understand my daughter‚Äôs condition and comforted me when I felt discouraged. They helped with negative behaviors and transitions . I will forever be grateful for the dedication and time they have given my daughter . The whole staff is wonderful . It‚Äôs nice to see other therapists who don‚Äôt have my child as their patient say her name and acknowledge her. Jorge who is at the front desk is always so gracious with us parents and kind to all the children . I want to give a special thanks to Mila who has spent the most time with my daughter. She has cried with me and been there for us when things were really hard. She was there for us when my daughter got the autism diagnosis and she continues to be a light that shines bright.
Thank you My Big World !!!
Diana H.

This place is awesome, my child has been coming here for a year and the therapists are all very sweet. The office staff and supervisors are always available to answer any questions or concerns and are willing to work with you and your schedule. His current therapist, Meylis, has helped him improve alot in his speech and with his overall development. I highly recommend them

I highly recommend My Big World their team of speech and occupational therapists is highly professional, compassionate, and truly dedicated to helping children improve their communication and motor skills. We truly  recommend this agency to any family looking for exceptional care and expertise in speech and occupational therapy development.‚Äù

My experience with My Big World has been extremely disappointing. Despite initially showing promise, the lack of professionalism and communication from the center has been unacceptable.

After my son's evaluation, I never received any follow-up from the center to discuss the findings or establish a care plan. Consequently, I had to take matters into my own hands, reviewing the report and scheduling sessions myself to avoid unnecessary delays.

To my dismay, I later discovered that my son had been assigned a therapist who doesn't speak English, without any prior consultation or notification. This disregard for my preferences and failure to communicate such a significant change in my son's therapy plan is inexcusable.

Despite raising my concerns weeks ago, there has been no satisfactory resolution. The fact that the center has been unable to find an alternative therapist within this time-frame speaks volumes about their inefficiency and lack of commitment to their clients' well-being.

As a result of this experience, I feel like I've been wasting both my time and money. I cannot recommend My Big World to anyone seeking professional and reliable speech therapy services. I will be taking my business elsewhere, where my concerns are taken seriously and addressed promptly.

Overall, my experience with My Big World has been disappointing, and I urge others to consider alternative options for their speech therapy needs.

My daughter has been going for four months and she absolutely loves going there! She is always so happy to see her ‚Äúteachers‚Äù and has made HUGE progress since starting speech therapy. She went from saying very few singular words to now expanding her vocabulary, combining words, and saying small phrases. Not only does she use the words that she has learned in speech but I also notice that it easier for her to imitate and use new words outside of therapy too. Staff are always so friendly and communicate everything that happened in the session. The clinic is always clean and is packed with many toys and even a playroom. I also love how the doors of the offices have little windows that let parents see their child during sessions. This helped me feel comfortable and safe in dropping her off. Overall, it is a fantastic place and I will 100% recommend this speech clinic!

My son is in the My Favorite Therapists since an year when he was 3 years old. During this year, he has transformed from non verbal to verbal and has been making amazing progress.. everyone Kimmy, Jen, Myra (my BCBA), his therapists Mia, Chrissy, Amily, Flo, Calley(OT) and others are all amazing. He's been working at home now during lockdown with Mia and  I couldn't ask for more. I am no more worried about my son's progress now, thank you all for your continuous love, affection, support and dedication throughout, you never made any difference even in the lockdown and have been providing uninterrupted and quality services in appropriate locations. I would strongly recommend to all the needful kids, it's my best find . Keep up the good work guys.

My daughter is the world to us and finding My Favorite Therapists has given our family a sense of hope that we will forever be grateful for.  We have had two other companies in the past fail us, and MFT welcomed our family with open arms.  We have seen amazing changes in our daughter and the openness and communication we receive from Jay, Kim and all her therapists is something I have never experienced. My daughter wakes up every day excited to see her therapists and friends, and we have not seen her this happy in a very long time. We have found our forever home with the most amazing and experienced therapists.  Thank you MFT for giving our daughter a very successful start to an amazing future!

To make a long story short, my son was expected to start with MFT. I choose this center because the website stated that the company offers ABA, Speech, and OT all the needs for my Autistic 4 year old. I met with the owner Jay in October 22‚Äô who gave me information on Oscar insurance and how to enroll my son and start the onboarding process. He gave me Lisa Knightly‚Äôs contact and said my son will be able to start once all documents are received, and insurance authorizes treatment. I‚Äôve continually contacted this company for updates and have been given the runaround. All documents received, insurance gave approval, no updates from Mallory nor Lisa. Last contact from them said they had to hire RBTs to assign clients to and that my son is on a waiting list. We pay Oscar $300 monthly to receive services from MFT.  From October to Now Mid- March no Initial Assessment, treatment plan, nor start date.

As a parent our main concern is the health, well-being and education of our child. From the very first day I called Jay for his guidance he was beyond gracious. I think we stayed on the phone for 30 minutes that day talking about our kids being ‚ÄúNeurodivergent.‚Äù He guided me through the proper channels, and we were able to begin the program at My favorite therapists. My husband and I toured the facility and it was like a breath of fresh air. I literally thought to myself ‚ÄúI want to go to school here!‚Äù The staff was very kind, the facility was very clean, and we felt like we had finally found the support we had been looking for. Having a child that is labeled ‚Äúunique‚Äù is not easy. However, I am thankful that the team at MFT understands that we don‚Äôt want to change our kid. We simply want our son to have the tools in order to be independent and as ‚ÄúAtypical‚Äù as he wants to be. Forgive all of the air quotes but there are so many labels for our little people that shouldn‚Äôt be labeled at all, in my humble opinion Thank you to the owners Jay & Kimmy. And thank you to the team Aldo, Mallory, and the rest of the staff at my favorite therapists. You‚Äôre changing peoples lives and you‚Äôre doing an incredible job! -Parent to an anti social astronaut chef break dancer singer mermaid math wiz

We are so happy we found MFT for our daughter! It is a very safe and loving environment! BCBA Bevannie is beyond AMAZING! Techs- Michelle and Crystal work one on one with our daughter toward her goals everyday. We just started speech with Juliana and OT with Calley are already see progress! We receive daily reports and there is thorough communication daily. We truly feel that everyone here loves our daughter and have her best interest at heart and are doing everything they can to achieve her goals. I highly highly recommend MFT!

I absolutely loved this center in the beginning and then I started to see red flags and then my son started coming home injured (bite mark bruises to the arm, rug burn scratches twice on his shoulder blades and then finally scratches across his throat from a negligent therapist) and I was not being notified the first 3 times. After meeting with someone I found out by the power of social media that the negligent RBT was still employed there after I was assured he would be fired. I wouldn't trust a fly in that center. The office manager is dismissive and rude, the BCBAs speak to parents with condescension. It is sad that special needs children depend on their care providers to protect them when we as parents are not around and instead this place was too busy charging my insurance while not ensuring my sons safety. Miami is a cesspool for aba centers basically being overpriced daycares.

I am very happy with the center and the people who work there.
My daughter is learning a lot and is comfortable with the staff.
I appreciate all the hard work that is being put in towards teaching and collaborating with the children.

Both of my children receive ABA services through My Kid Therapy. They were diagnosed with autism at the age of two. As mentioned in a previous post, I am pleased to report that both of my children are thriving. I have noticed a significant difference in my five-year-old child. Six months ago, he was completely nonverbal. Now, he can say a few words, point, and push me to take him to places he previously avoided. This demonstrates the effectiveness of ABA, which is an early key to success in your children‚Äôs future, particularly for those with autism.

if you‚Äôre looking for a behavioral therapy center for your baby, look no more. My kid therapy is the absolute most caring center in homestead. They truly care about, not only the children but the families also. Through 2+ years of being with our therapist Gladys, my daughter has improved so much. I am so thankful for her patience, love, guidance and care she‚Äôs given my child. Also, Ms. Noelia and the front desk girls are always willing to answer any question or concerns you have. When entering the therapists all make you feel welcomed and will greet you with smiles. It‚Äôs a positive environment that enables children to thrive! 100% recommend

I‚Äôll start off by saying, I have two children with autism. A 14 year old daughter and 9 year old son. My daughter started therapy at around 3 years old, so needless to say I have tons of experience with different types of therapy, therapy centers and schools. I find the need to preface this as to add a bit more credibility to how amazing I find My Kid Therapy Center. Through all the bad experiences I have had in the past, I am happy to say, we finally found a place where my children feel like they belong. From the minute you walk through the front door, to the therapist and analyst, you feel like part of the family. On the weekends, when we drive by the school, my non verbal son points and gestures at the school to be dropped off. When I pick him up from school, he turns to his therapist as to tell me to leave because he wants to stay with her. Keep in mind my kids would otherwise cry to go to school or therapy anywhere else. It‚Äôs complicated to say the least to keep my composure when I see how happy he is with this place. I find my only way to express my gratitude is to Finally write this review in hopes that it helps others make a life changing decision in bringing their children here. We have been wanting to move from Homestead for about 3 years now and I promise you this therapy center has single handedly kept us here.

Thank you all again for all that you do. We are truly grateful to have found you.

An extremely satisfied parent,
Cris

provider_name: My Kid Therapy Center - ABA Therapy in Orlando
review_text: My kids therapy center, it's like home away from home. Jovany  has grown to listen to focus to be more loving. Then he is already is. And the ability to pay attention more comes a long, wsy the hard eork and the committed the staff has to reach Jovany goal, it's amazing. If look forAbA services  that feel like home to love one üíï  this is place cause patient  they have Is mind blowing ..I appreciate  all work  come along with mi Jovany with responde to thing he capable..truely a blessing üôå

provider_name: My Kid Therapy Center - ABA Therapy in Orlando
review_text: Camen is a wonderful place for ABA !

provider_name: My Kid Therapy Center - ABA Therapy in Orlando
review_text: Recommended, all the staff very attentive and professional.

The team is professional and they treat Finn like he is 'family.' The facility is clean and well organized. Our silver lab has been a patient since he was nine weeks old. We wouldn't trust any other doctor or team with his care. He loves attending daycare there! The team makes it fun and safe for him and it is a great resource for us at a reasonable price.

I can not say enough about the kind and caring staff at My Pet Animal Hospital. Dr. Dixon has the magic touch with duck friends. My duck crawled right into help lap and stayed for gentle pets. Highly recommend this team for your pet‚Äôs medical care.

Dr. Donna and her staff are wonderful. My dog had a dental procedure and they did an excellent job. They made sure to keep me updated on how she was doing throughout the day. I can not say enough about them. 20 out of 10. Definitely recommend for anything!

Brought our pet rabbit to MyPets Animal Vet for just a simple nail trimming and overall check up for the low fee of only $165.USD.
The following week, our rabbit spontaneously dies. Coincidence?
-Thanks MyPets Animal Vet.

A vet that actually cares about your animals and isn‚Äôt trying to charge you a ton of money just because they can. This place is amazing. They will talk over your options, sometimes right over text. It‚Äôs just easy and a pleasure. Thank you guys for being so amazing. üòª

5 Stars ‚Äì Highly Recommend!
We‚Äôve had a wonderful experience at My Therapy Spot with our son. From the very first session, the therapists have been incredibly supportive, patient, and skilled at connecting with him in ways that made learning fun and effective. We've seen real progress‚Äînot just in his speech, but in his confidence and willingness to communicate.

His therapist truly tailors her approach to his needs and always takes the time to keep us updated and involved. It‚Äôs clear they genuinely care about their patients by going above and beyond for at home recommendations to continue the progress and involve us as a family as well. The office environment is warm, welcoming, and so fun! Our son always looks forward to going when he isn't completing his sessions at school.

We‚Äôre so grateful for the difference they‚Äôve made in our lives. Highly recommend to any parent looking for exceptional speech therapy services and more! Thank you, Ms. Jenny!

I am so grateful to the entire team at My Therapy Spot. From the very beginning, they made my family feel welcome and supported. Both of my children receive services here, and I‚Äôve seen incredible progress in each of them. The therapists are not only professional and knowledgeable, but also kind, patient, and truly passionate about helping kids succeed. My children have shown great improvement in their speech and motor skills thanks to the individualized care and fun, engaging therapy sessions. The environment is clean, cheerful, and thoughtfully designed to make every visit enjoyable for little ones. I highly recommend My Therapy Spot to any parent looking for quality therapy with heart. We are so thankful for everything they‚Äôve done for our family!

We‚Äôve had a wonderful experience at My Therapy Spot! Jennifer, my daughter‚Äôs therapist, is absolutely amazing. She‚Äôs patient, knowledgeable, and has a truly special way of connecting with children. My daughter‚Äôs speech has improved so much since starting therapy with Jennifer, and we‚Äôre incredibly grateful for the progress she‚Äôs made. I highly recommend this clinic to any parent looking for compassionate and effective speech therapy support!

I am so grateful to have found My Therapy Spot! My son has improved significantly in just a few short months. Our therapist, Amanda, is kind, patient, and resourceful. She has established excellent rapport with him and has gained his trust. If you are looking for a speech therapist that will give your child the special attention they will need, then look no further.

We‚Äôve been bringing our 2-year-old son to My Therapy Spot for just a month, and we‚Äôre already seeing great progress. He‚Äôs using more words, paying better attention, and starting to express his needs more clearly. The therapists are patient, supportive, and really know how to engage young children. We‚Äôre so thankful for the positive changes we‚Äôve seen so quickly!

My 3 year old has loved his time at the My Tots daycare. The whole staff here is wonderful, and they take care of the kids with so much affection. Additionally, my son needed some speech therapy, which they were able to provide at the same place and has made it so convenient.
We love the people here!

I am so grateful for the outstanding team at My Time Inc! The occupational therapists here have been nothing short of amazing in supporting my son's growth and development. From the very first session, we‚Äôve seen incredible progress in his skills and confidence. His occupational and speech therapists are not only highly skilled and knowledgeable, but they are also kind, patient, and truly dedicated to helping my son reach his full potential. It truly feels like family. Marcela the owner is wonderful and an expert in her field. You can truly tell the love she has for children and it shows in everything she does.

This place has created such a positive and supportive environment for my son that he feels comfortable and encouraged to work through challenges. The personalized approach they take to his therapy has made all the difference, and I can see how much they genuinely care about his progress. Half the time he thinks they are just playing but they implement so many techniques in his sessions to meet his goals.

I can't recommend recommend My Time Inc. enough to any parent looking for professional, compassionate, and effective occupational therapy. Thank you for everything you do and for loving our kids!

Out of all the pediatric therapy centers and professionals I've been through in our area (which is over a dozen), this is without a doubt the best place to bring your child. They truly care, offer personalized and hands on attention, excellent therapy and a holistic approach. Their entire team works together with other professionals (pediatrician, shadow, teacher, parents, etc) to make sure everyone has a complete overview of child's development. I've seen significant improvements in my child since we started working with My Time.

The team at My Time Therapy are focused at providing the very best pediatric language, physician and occupational therapy care.   I have been impressed by the way they support the patient‚Äôs and the families navigating their children‚Äôs disabilities.  I highly recommend this clinic for any family in need.
I can't think of a better place to take my little one while I work.

This is my daughter‚Äôs speech therapy place and it‚Äôs amazing!!! She is progressing for the first time in years. They have therapist that are very knowledgeable , most of them with a college ,masters degree back in their birth country. Lissy , the pathologist who runs the place was my daughters first speech therapist 5 ya and I‚Äôm glad to be back with her and the whole team. Who even gave me always a reason to appreciate what I have and to break the ‚Äúwhat if‚Äù. Always willing to help your kid and work together with parents . I love the place and Julia loves it more. She is always happy and even greeting them when her language is very limited. Thank you so much guys and keep in the good work. My family truly appreciate you!!!

My daughter has been attending My Word Speech Therapy, and the experience has been wonderful. Lucia, our speech therapist, has been amazing! After every session, she takes the time to share with me or my mom what they worked on and provides practical tips we can use at home to help my daughter. Lisandra has also been fantastic, assisting us with information about the plan and supporting my daughter‚Äôs progress. The entire staff is incredibly kind and professional. We are so grateful for their dedication and support!

I am going to translate into three words the magnificence of this therapy center (professionalism, attention and passion for what they do). The therapists are incredible, the appointment time is correct, and they take the time to give the help and attention that our children need! Happy to have found this center and my baby is progressing more every day, thank you.

Excellent team, Lucia is a wonderful therapist. Thank you for everything you do and the effort you put into it. Lizandra I thank you for everything you do for the future of these children. You guys are the best .

I recommend them 100 percent. Excellent and wonderful work is what they do every day.
Excellent work by Rachel, Lizandra and other therapists who work at the agency.

I have been with Myrland Stables for 7 months now and i love it! I have a huge Percheron he is the biggest hose in the stables and he gets the best care. I couldn't be any happier the communication between the owner and the staff with the borders. A very professional place.

I love this place. My husband and I work there and love it. But due to his horrible scooter accident we had to say goodbye. But above all we will never forget how you become family. My husband is now much better and I can't wait to go visit them. We left on Feb 1st 2019 his scooter accident was Dec 14th 2019. Alicia and Karen and all the people there we were family. Alicia and Karen love us and love my husband. What they did for me When my husband had the accident I will never forget. This farm is not just a farm you are welcome and become family. Allison is a super sweet nice instructor. I will never forget when I got the awful phone call from Hollywood drama hospital. When I had no one and Alicia was there to take me and guise me.

I have been at Myrland for almost a year now. I am boarding my horse there and also taking riding lessons. I could not recommend the place the more.  The facilities are extremely well kept and the owner always on top of my horse's needs. This has been particularly important during the quarantine and also more recently, when I could  not visit my horse because of the intense rain and subsequent flooding in the area. In addition, Allison is a wonderful instructor. Very patient with me and my horse's learning curves (we are both green). In particular,  I really appreciated the fact that she offered to pick me up from a dry location and drive me to the stables, since I don't have an SUV to navigate through the flooded street.  Incredible client service.

Never ever try to schedule the lesson with them. Sad and bad experience. Cancelled several times, Allison was extremely rude, no respect and responsibilities to the customers. We needed to beg her to schedule tge lesson and she just decided she is not in a good mood to schedule us. Awful service. I would not recommend them. Think twice. There are more stables and nicer people to go to .
This place is awesome. My daughter loved the horse Gracie and the instructor Arielle. I recommend this place to anyone a beginner or an advanced rider. This place is a 5-star place.

Love this PT Practice! They really care and want to get you better. It is beyond traditional. Many therapies are used. Suki, the PT, is amazing. I have gone to many PT‚Äôs and he is by far the most compassionate, peaceful and tuned in to your condition that I have used. The people who do your additional exercise therapies are kind, and helpful. They tell you what muscles that each exercise is working and if you aren‚Äôt doing it correctly, they help to correct the position. I had Amari help me through these exercises. All of the staff are friendly and kind. Suki, Amari and Michelle (the receptionist) have finally given me hope and Suki has really listened to me and what I feel has happened to my body. Everyone else I‚Äôve seen Just blew me off. He is a PT who truly wants to help you. I have to drive 30 minutes to get to NAU and it‚Äôs totally worth it.

I don't even know where to start. This place is full of angels. During my time coming here, it was the ONLY place I felt loved, cared for, listened.
