review_text: The staff from the front reception to the nurses and doctors are very efficient and friendly. This has always been my go to urgent care center. Wait times have always been pretty short and while inside the nurses get to you and your needed quickly.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Nirvair Chowdhury Midtown Urgent Care Center
review_text: This was an enjoyable visit. The receptionist was very efficient, and we only had to wait a few minutes before the doctor saw us. The doctor and medical staff were very professional and pleasant. The doctor took his time to explain everything and make us feel comfortable. Someone from the staff called me the next day to follow up on our visit. I would definitely use this facility again if my kids needed to, even though it's 20 minutes further than my closest urgent care.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Nirvair Chowdhury Midtown Urgent Care Center
review_text: This place is so bad it isnt even describable. Either these aren't real doctors or they are completely careless, lack detail, or I dont even know what? They are 0-2 with my 3 year old. That said, they get paid, they bill my insurance for getting it wrong twice. First time we bring him in his mouth hurts and he had a very high fever out of nowwhere. The diagnoses after a covid/flu negative test is unknown virus. Give him OTC. The next day he sees his doctor and he has hand foot mouth with visible sores all over. How do you miss that? Strike 2. He comes in with a rash all over his body. They ask questions about allergies, what he ate, did we change his soap etc etc. The diagnoses is he has an allergic reaction give him benadryl or Zyrek. The next two days the rash gets far worse and inside his ears. We take him to his reg doctor and its clear he has impetigo and needs antibiotiocs. They were shiocked they didnt see it, test anything for it or do anything. This place shouldnt be allowed to bill my insuarnce company. Its very sad. This place sucks

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Nirvair Chowdhury Midtown Urgent Care Center
review_text: Very poor . Wait time was too long just for there to be 3 people before me . I asked would my child be prescribed anything for this ‚Äú virus ‚Äú hands and feet or just to help with discomfort Thee ‚Äú nurse ‚Äú said no ! . I didn‚Äôt wait for discharge papers I just left and took him SOMEWHERE ELSE where they prescribed him something to help . Yesterday was my first and last time going there . Absolutely wouldn‚Äôt recommend.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Nirvair Chowdhury Midtown Urgent Care Center
review_text: I stayed there from 3:30pm until 7pm. It was a very slow process. The Xray guy and the woman from ultrasound they were amazing. Very sweet and very careful, otherwise the doctor she was cold and she asked me in front of my son if he was autistic, she had zero tolerance and definitely she doesn‚Äôt know how to deal with kids with special needs.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Nirvair Chowdhury Midtown Urgent Care Center
review_text: My son received today a very profesional and kind attention. The front desk, nurse, nurse practitioner and nurse at the x-rays work nicely and diligently. He is already with the adequate treatment, I am glad that we have gone to this center.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Palm Beach Gardens Outpatient Center
review_text:
One star is actually to generous.

I brought my young daughter to Palm Beach Gardens outpatient center for treatment of a facial laceration. Before arriving, I specifically called the facility to confirm that a plastic surgeon would be available to perform the procedure, and I was assured that they were properly staffed. However, when we arrived, the clinic did not have anyone on site qualified to treat her. Instead, we were told to go to a neighboring hospital for care. Total waste of time.

To make matters worse, the clinic still billed me for the visit, even though they provided no actual treatment or service. I find this unacceptable ‚Äî not only was my daughter‚Äôs care delayed, but I was also misled about the capabilities of the clinic and then charged for essentially a referral.  I requested detailed invoice on three occasions and was told it would take 14 days to process the request.  Of course a detailed invoice was never provided.

Families seeking timely, competent care should be aware of this experience. At the very least, the facility should be transparent about the services they are (and are not) able to provide, and they should not bill patients for treatment that never occurred.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Palm Beach Gardens Outpatient Center
review_text:
We took our child in for a severely sprained ankle. After some delay, some x-rays and a set of crutches I received a bill that was so ridiculous that you could‚Äôve purchased an expensive Swiss watch.

It is preposterous, with competent health insurance, that this  place would still charge many thousands of dollars for this nominal amount of service. It‚Äôs absolute price gouging at its worst! I would go out of my way never to bring my child here ever again. No parents should get ripped off like this.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Palm Beach Gardens Outpatient Center
review_text: My child recently received care at Nicklaus childrens PBG on a Saturday and I can‚Äôt say enough good things about our experience. From the moment we walked in, the receptionist Jennifer T. was very welcoming, compassionate, and attentive. The nurses took time to explain everything clearly and made sure I felt informed and supported throughout the process.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Palm Beach Gardens Outpatient Center
review_text: Very unprofessional, rude and relacist place. We had an appointment which we got after 5 months of waiting. We drive 60 miles to get there and it was a rainy day. We were 10 minutes late. They registered our kid's name and 30 minutes later the front desk girl told us they can't see our our kid coz we are late. Only option is given- to reschedule which was 6 months later. I asked her if I could talk to a manager. She replied no manager is available ( I think it was around 1 pm). I asked if I could talk to anyone about it, coz 10 minutes late should be this big deal. She managed someone ( I think another worker who was her friend) who spoke with the similar tone. Question is: is 10 minutes late too late for doctor office? Why we weren't informed when we first got there? Why they registered our kid's name if we can't see a doctor? Why we been setting for 30 mins? Why no manager was available at 1 pm?

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's Palm Beach Gardens Outpatient Center
review_text:
Nicklaus Children's Palm Beach Gardens Outpatient Center is a top-tier facility providing specialized pediatric care in a welcoming environment.  This center offers a range of outpatient services designed to meet the unique healthcare needs of children.

The staff is highly skilled and compassionate, ensuring that young patients receive expert care while feeling comfortable and supported. The facility is modern and well-equipped, making visits efficient and stress-free for families.

With its dedication to pediatric excellence, Nicklaus Children's Palm Beach Gardens Outpatient Center is a trusted choice for families seeking specialized medical care in a convenient location. Whether for routine check-ups or specialized treatments, this center delivers outstanding service.

It can be finicky with insurance, make sure they accept yours before going.  There is seldom a wait in the ER and a great space to see specialists without the long haul commute to the main campus in Miami.

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's West Pines Pediatric Care Center
review_text: Great care and attention. My child saw Dr. Mangels for a sick visit and received wonderful care. The MA in the intake area was wonderful with my daughter! Loved the availability of appts and efficiency of signing in. Kudos to all the staff- this is great to have in West Pines!

provider_name: Nicklaus Children's West Pines Pediatric Care Center
review_text: Front desk staff is helpful and very friendly! The Docs are patient and explain everything in detail. A+ all around.

I wish i could give a ranking of 10/10 as the staff here and care are truly phenomenal. If you have ever been to another hospital in a foreign world or even others in the US. Nicklaus children‚Äôs hospital ranks in the top two of the entire US. We traveled here from Puerto Rico and the level of service and care far exceeds anything you would receive there.

Dr Burke and Dr Duarte along with Dr Martinez and the entire cardiology staff and personnel were incredible. We felt like they were part of our family and took care of our son as if he were theirs. Impressed that he was able to have open heart surgery and was finished 48hours later to go home.

Thank you to the entire staff at the hospital!

I honestly expected to have to wait hours as most ERs go. I was so impressed by the staff's friendliness and efficiency. I'm sure it's hit or miss if they get busy but I was very thankful we weren't stuck there for hours with 3 kids. The PA and the doctor were both great (I do wish the discharge papers listed who the providers were as I don't recall their names; I just know the doctor was Irish). I thought our concerns might get dismissed because hours had passed from the incident and our son was looking much better (we first went to urgent care that wasn't a Nicklaus Children‚Äôs location because unfortunately, their urgent cares don't open till 11 am which that I did find very odd and extremely disappointing) and the urgent care sent us to the children's ER for further evaluation as they were geared for adults. While we did not end up needing scans, and Neurology did not come see us I felt confident the doctor had covered all the basis and we left with a clear plan in place. We recently moved from St. Pete and all our doctors for our children were with Johns Hopkins All Children‚Äôs Hospital. I can say I'm thankful there's a children's hospital and network here. We will be taking our children to all NC facilities from here on out.

Doctor George is a remarkable physician! He and his nursing staff were amazing , very attentive and resasurring !From the very beginning in the initial consultation all the way to the follow up was such a great experience for such a hard time in my child's life .

They made me and my son feel very assured in regards to the surgery. They were all very professional and friendly. Every detail of the surgery was handled with care I can't recommend them enough!  I never experienced such a smooth and comforting hospital stay. I can't express  enough how content I am with my son's recovery process and how straight my son's back is !

Doctor George did such an incredible job ! He also took the time to explain and  answer every question. Also the hospital was spotless and smelled good.I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional care my son received by Doctor George and his staff not only is he a brilliant doctor but also someone who genuinely cares! Thank you all so much !! Stay Blessed and Stay Encouraged !

Nicklaus Children‚Äôs Hospital provides outstanding pediatric care with expert doctors and a compassionate team. The facility is bright, welcoming, and fully equipped for children's specialized needs.

The doctor's treatment was not the best, especially with such serious negligence and something so simple. I wonder what she studied and where her knowledge is.
I don't think she is capable of treating children.
Dra Sandra M Gonzalez

This is the best training program in town. You are given all the same tools as some of the more expensive programs. Phyliss is amazing. She knows her dogs and humans. My dog went through all the classes. We learned about each other and bonded even more.Don‚Äôt wait! Start them young it will pay off.
Phyllis is a great trainer and classes are a lot of fun.

Phyllis is AMAZING! She definitely knows what she‚Äôs doing. I‚Äôve been working with her on my 2-year-old lab mix for fear aggression. Just within a few sessions, I could see a change in him by using what she taught us. Would highly recommend!

I have taken 2 of my dogs through 3 different classes and I am so grateful that I was able to find someone that does it at local rec centers in St Pete and also is very affordable! Stick with the training and you will see results! I definitely recommend Phyllis to all new dog owners!

The instructor Phyllis is amazing with her knowledge. She is a great listener and will spend the extra time giving you tips on how to improve your dogs behavior. I highly recommend the dog obedience class!

This was my first experience with North Bay Animal Hospital, and while I wish it had been under different circumstances, I am incredibly grateful for the care and compassion they showed us during one of the most difficult moments of our lives.
We had to make the heartbreaking decision to put our beloved dog to sleep. From the very first phone call, the entire team was exceptional. When we arrived, they immediately provided us with a private room to say our goodbyes no rush, no pressure just a quiet, respectful space to be with our dog for as long as we needed.
Every single person we encountered was kind, gentle, and empathetic. The two front office ladies were outstanding, and the veterinarian was just as compassionate and professional. It‚Äôs clear that everyone there truly cares about the animals and the families who love them.
Though I wish this wasn‚Äôt the way I came to know this wonderful place, they made a lasting impression on my heart. I will recommend North Bay Animal Hospital to everyone I know.
Thank you also for offering me a keepsake of Lilu‚Äôs fur and for the cremation services those small gestures mean more than words can express.

I have 2 Cane Corsos, one who loves the vet and one that is very skeptical, I want to take the time to express how absolutely AMAZING the ladies here were! They took the time to allow my dogs to get comfortable with them, showed them love, and worked with me to get all their needs taken care of while keeping them both comfortable! By the end of the visit my typical anxious skeptical girl was laying down calmly and I‚Äôm so appreciative for everything they did to allow her to not be scared of the vet, as well as not being scared of her and requiring a muzzle!! It means so much to have a vet that truly cares and will take the time while they are so busy to make sure they were both comfortable and happy!

They always take great care of all of my cats and even the skiddish one doesn't mind her vet visits once I can get her into the crate anyways. I wouldn't even think of using another vet in the area. They're among the best vets office that I've ever encountered in all my years as a pet owner.

I have been taking my dogs to NorthBay Animal Hospital for years. The vet techs are all amazing and so welcoming on each and every visit. I have always tried to keep my dogs with their primary Dr which used to be Dr Smart and is now Dr Medil (spelling is probably wrong). Dr Medil is awesome! She truly cares about your fur babies and I‚Äôm always bummed if she is off when my pups need to be seen. I wish I remembered the name of the vet tech who has been at NorthBay for years and saw my two pups for vaccinations (Ava had Vaccinations Wednesday June 18th, 2025) and Alex got his Labrela injection same day. She is the Best! You can‚Äôt go wrong with North Bay Animal Hospital if you need a vet! The best part is they‚Äôre open Saturdays and Sundays, which most of events are not that‚Äôs the added bonus that makes it great that you know if there‚Äôs an emergency more often than not you‚Äôll be able to get them in on a weekend even if it‚Äôs for an emergency visit, Which doesn‚Äôt cost near as much as an emergency hospital does.

Rafael was great with Jessica Rabbit, who was in for a nail trim. He was gentle and patient with her, although she can be difficult to handle. He was able to calm her down and get it done. Usually it takes two Vet Techs AND me to get the job done!. We will definitely be back regularly and will always request Rafael.

Great service, I was not able to afford original medication, they provided a substitute which is the same but lower cost.

Oh, I a gentleman came in with a kitten that was roaming Harley David parking lot.   I Fostered him "Dixon" to give food and shelter for this baby kitten.

We are beyond grateful to the incredible team at North Florida Animal Hospital for saving our dog Lucky‚Äôs life. From the moment we walked in, everyone was kind, compassionate, and incredibly helpful. They took the time to explain everything Lucky was going through in a clear and honest way.

We especially appreciated that they respected our budget and always communicated with us before moving forward with any treatment that would increase the cost. It made us feel included, supported, and truly cared for during such a stressful time.

A very special thank you to Dr. Alejandro and Dr. Harley for their dedication and care. You were both amazing and we couldn‚Äôt be more thankful for how you handled Lucky‚Äôs case. He‚Äôs doing great now, getting stronger and better every single day! üêæüíñ

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!

Today was a day of Many adventures Andre  my service animal cat met his new cardiologist And we're impressed even a power outage did not stop them from doing his test From the moment you walk in the door the compassion and the caring of the staff is incredible I sang this song to him while he got his 2 test Waiting for blood work to come back Thank you all you wonderful People who run this hospital from the receptionist to the veterinarian to the x-ray and exam people. If you care about your animal you want, people like them to be working on you kiddos . I'm disabled and had anxiety n fear walking in n left with tears of joy

The staff were friendly on the phone and in person. They saw me the day after I called for an appointment. I was told the costs prior to anything being done for my cat. I thought the prices were reasonable. The test results came back in just a few minutes and the doctor went over the results thoroughly and answered all my questions. I cannot say enough good things about North Florida Animal Hospital. I hold heartedly recommend the clinic.

I brought my cat in for an annual check up and all of the employees were super kind and helpful. They made my cat feel more comfortable and offered her lots of treats. This was my second visit and I plan to return in the future! Great place!

Love N FL Pediatric! There entire team is always so welcoming and goes above and beyond to address and navigate the medical needs of our kids! Dr. Koeppel & Dr. Nelson are both phenomenal pediatricians and they are supported by the best nurse practitioners‚Ä¶.we have always been given the most amazing care and attention for all our kids health questions, concerns and needs. Thank you for taking such great care of our kids!

Love this place everything is always so clean and the staff are super nice . My kids enjoy coming here . The only downfall is the wait time to see the doctor can range from 25-60 minutes of appointment time .

My children have been patients here since birth for 9 years. I can absolutely say we have a wonderful relationship with all the providers. Especially Dr Koeppel and Naomi. Top notch. They listen to your concerns and do their absolute best to provide resources. They advocate so well on the behalf of the child and I am forever grateful for the care They have given me and my family.
If I could give them zero I would....my baby niece was misdiagnosed by them and past away from leukemia. when we came to them for help they kept sending us back home saying everything was fine.....

This office can‚Äôt input data to save their lives. I keep getting calls about random peoples appointments and text messages threatening to bill for missed appointments when they‚Äôre not adding them into their system correctly. I‚Äôve tried calling multiple times to help them fix it and no one answers the phone. Imagine how treatments must go..

If I could give more stars, I would!! Danielle is the best, MOST AMAZING person for what we truly needed in a desperate situation.
I stumbled of crossed her searching for a speech therapist for my son,(2) after losing our insurance. When I called her, she eased my anxiety and we got started right away!!
She was kind and understanding of my situation.
She has worked with my son for a year and did everything she could to make things work even when I couldn't. My son has made so much progress with Danielle. They formed a bond and truly so thankful for her and all she has done.
He was saying mama, dada, bubba and maybe a few others sounds. He is now saying at least 25/30 words and knows his  colors and trying hard to say numbers.
She always kept me updated and offer many tools to help at home. Always kept in contact so if I had questions, she was always there for us!!
You are the best! I will always be grateful for you!!!

Highly recommend the quality speech therapists here! Very experienced and knowledgeable in helping struggling readers achieve success. They provide accurate diagnostic evaluations and specialized 1:1 reading interventions (in person or virtually). Love the fun, engaging and confidence-building therapy sessions! So pleased with the positive progress that we have seen over time!

At first when Ms. Kim was there North Florida was running smoothly. Now, I kept calling for 3 weeks straight and left messages. One day some one finally picked up and told me that the scheduler would return my phone call. She never did, so I had to get another referral for my daughter to see another therapist because North Florida never returns phone call. I even asked a family friend from church was her son still going to North Florida,( because she lives in Quincy, I live in Tallahassee) Well she said, the therapist had stopped coming to her child's daycare. So still to this day I don't know what happened.  And my daughter LOVES Delmy. The only thing I didn't like was that they either knew a few ASL or none at all.

Let me start off by saying North Florida Therapy has had and continues to have a HUGE impact in my son‚Äôs life. My son has been receiving therapy at this office since he was about 2 years-old. He is now soon to be 7 and thriving. He loves all his therapist and they all love him. They truly make you feel like family!

As a concerned parent who has a child who struggles with speech I am so thankful for Fl therapy services. They literally take time with my son to help him with his pronunciation. It‚Äôs like the have a special connection with him. I also love how I can reach out to the office and always get answer or response. Appointments are always kept and they even worked with me when I needed to adjust times at the last minute. I think the service is awesome and most importantly my son loves them.

Just want to offset a review that was posted here by Mr. Shivers. This place is amazing. The therapist and staff here are like family. Everything stated in his review is false. He is not even enrolled in the child's therapy that he is referring to nor the insurance the child is covered by. When you call staff at any facility speaking about things you know nothing about and demanding things and belittling the staff of course no one wants to help you because no one deserves to be treated the way he treats people. And you sir will not continue to fight with hospital staff or any physician or therapist your son sees. I will not let who you are negatively affect the care your son receives. Treat people with respect and you might get some in return. I highly recommend this facility to everyone. They treat your children as they are their own. They treat everyone with dignity and respect. They work with you beyond any facility I have ever seen.
The therapist refuses to call me back and all they want to do is telemed and charge you/insurance. I would recommend you taking your kids somewhere else that dose hands on.

provider_name: North Port St Lucie Animal Hospital
review_text:
I am so glad I chose this Vet.  Every staff member was friendly and had smiles.  I felt extremely welcome coming and going.
Dr. Morton and her Vet Tech (I apologize for not remembering her name) were not only kind to my new little puppy but very thorough about the questions they had about my pup.  The Dr. wanted to know about the current life style of my pup as well as the background of the parents.  Type of food, potty habits, etc.
Dr. Morton even took the time to show me how to properly trim my puppies nails, while she was trimming them.
Dr. Morton gave me recommendations then asked me a couple of times, if I had questions.  She would not leave the exam room until I asked everything I needed. üíïüòä  Her complete focus was on me and my pup, not her next appointment.  What more could you ask for?
Like you, we care so much about our little fur friends.  THIS IS THE PLACE to go for that kind of care.
I will be a loyal client for years to come.
Thank you so much to the outstanding staff and Dr. for the A+ service.
Saba

provider_name: North Port St Lucie Animal Hospital
review_text: My cats have seen all the vets here and they are all wonderful. Our favorite is Dr Morton and Dr Macnamara (sorry if the spelling is wrong!).. We have also gotten very helpful and compassionate care from Dr Carrel (again spelling).. I am so grateful Dr Morton found that my cat had bladder stones when the emergency clinic did not find them and the problem continued! She prescribed a special food and my cat has been perfect ever since! The office staff is great too! Amy is wonderful!

provider_name: North Port St Lucie Animal Hospital
review_text: My wife and I absolutely love North Port St. Lucie Animal Hospital. We've been taking our five cats to them for many years. The staff has always been friendly, and encouraging, and the level of care for our babies has always been top notch. We've recently been dealing with our oldest cat, that is 18 years old, suffering from the affects of her advanced age, and the results of her treatments are easily noticeable. They have given us hope, when we thought we only had hours. Thank you all from the bottom of our hearts.

provider_name: North Port St Lucie Animal Hospital
review_text:
üåü **5-Star Review for Our Amazing Vet! üåü**

We can‚Äôt rave enough about the exceptional care our two boxers receive from our veterinarian. From the moment we walk through the door, we‚Äôre always greeted with kindness and consideration. Their punctuality and professionalism are unmatched, making every visit smooth and stress-free.

What truly sets them apart is the way they treat our dogs as if they were part of their own family. It's heartwarming to see the genuine affection and dedication they have for our furry companions. We feel incredibly lucky to have found such a compassionate and skilled veterinarian.

Thank you Dr. Erin Morton and staff for all that you do for our beloved boxers. We‚Äôre so grateful to have you in our world! üêæ‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: North Port St Lucie Animal Hospital
review_text: The front desk staff was super friendly. Dr. Carrell & the vet tech (I want to say her name is Angela but I‚Äôm so sorry if I am wrong) we‚Äôre very caring and gentle with my Persian Daisie. She was very scared to be there for an ear infection and i knew right away she was in good hands! Thank you North Port for the loving care! Daisie is now sleeping at home comfy back in her happy place!

My first visit to North Stuart Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation I was not in a great place, after multiple surgeries to fix my shoulder and a 4+ month rehabilitation process in my future, this was not a great time for me personally.
At the end of my first visit, I honestly felt 100% more optimistic that I would not only get through the Physical therapy process, but it was going to be both fun and effective.

North Stuart Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation is the most well-run, professional and high-quality Physical therapy facility I have ever experienced,
The operation is run with military style efficiency, yet each of the therapists is warm, friendly, professional, competent and extremely knowledgeable, I was treated like a person not a patient. Every therapist is hard-working, and they all operate as a well-coordinated team, regardless of who your therapist is that day, every one of them takes responsibility to make sure you‚Äôre following your exercise cadence correctly.
You get the feeling that each one of the team genuinely wants you to heal and quickly get back to your life after surgery
The team have a great sense of humor, obviously love what they do, and create and environment that you want to come back to
It is rare to find companies / organizations that are so well run and effective

Paul

Pat and his great staff got me through a difficult recovery from TKR   Surgery. Pat stayed in touch with my surgeon during my recovery.
I am back to playing tennis, pickleball and golf and my knee feels great!

Caring, competent and personable owners and staff. Only a few weeks of therapy and my sciatica is much improved and is healing nicely and I can continue it at home.  The expert staff provided lots of laughing and positivity while I was healing. I always looked forward to going to my appointments! !

Pre-surgery you have worries and anxiety not only about the procedure but recovery as well.  I was Blessed to have Dr Simovitch as my surgeon, who also recommended NSPT&R, again so Blessed.   After my shoulder replacement I walked into NSPT&R and right away Pat (the owner) took away all my anxieties. Pat is SO knowledgeable, so reassuring , he was truly there to answer my question and concerns. Then I met his therapist, Kim, Carla, Keri and Beth.  I just loved how they all took such interest and concerns in my recovery.  They all took such interest not only in my recovery but me personally.   I wasn‚Äôt just a number!  A big shout out to Tina for scheduling appointment and for her big smile everytime I waked in!! And a special thank you to Kim!

I truly believe that Pat and his team have kept me from needing back surgery. I have been to a couple of physical therapist in the past but have never received the results that North Stuart physical therapy gave me. I just assumed all clinics were the same but I was wrong. Pat took the time to explain what his plan was, not just what but why, and the results I could expect if I followed his plan. I followed his plan and actually did obtain the results he said I would. His entire team are exceptional, knowledgeable and friendly but specially empathetic to working with people who are in pain like I was. While I hope I never need their services again, if I do or if anyone I know does this is the place and professionals I will recommend. I thank each one of you for the help and compassion you showed me

Very impressed with the staff.  Everyone was attentive and helpful.  The office is clean and tidy.   Best of all, Dr. Randall is exceptional.  He's very kind and understanding while attending to every detail.  He explained everything and was patient while I asked questions.
Extremely professional and they take their time with you. Transparent with pricing. They do not try to "upsell" you on unnecessary items. I highly recommend this office.

I adopted my dog when he was three years old while living in another city, and he came with his fair share of pre-existing conditions that I had to learn to navigate. After a few difficult experiences with other vets (who very clearly didn‚Äôt see my dog as anything more than a dollar sign) we were panicked trying to find the right care for him when we moved to Tallahassee. Now, we are beyond thankful to have found Northampton.

I truly can‚Äôt say enough good things about this place. Every team member knows my dog by name and is thoroughly familiar with his extensive medical history. He‚Äôs had two very necessary surgeries with them, so they know we‚Äôll do whatever it takes for his health, yet they‚Äôve never once taken advantage of our love for him. They‚Äôre incredibly transparent when it comes to cost, always presenting every available option and never pushing anything unnecessary. They actually recommend more affordable approaches to try first whenever they can rather than defaulting to the most expensive route.

Cost aside, they truly make the entire experience personal and welcoming. When we ask our dog if he wants to go to the vet, he runs to the door in pure excitement ‚Äî they‚Äôve made the experience so positive for him that he genuinely thinks it‚Äôs a fun trip! The staff at Northampton are the warmest, most knowledgeable, and genuinely kind group I‚Äôve ever encountered at a veterinary clinic. I‚Äôm so grateful to have found a place that cares for and loves him the way we do.

I am speechless. Dr. Eric and his staff have such a welcoming atmosphere that makes you WANT to call Northampton your vet. I took one of my 5 cats to see Dr. Eric for the first time. I called that morning, and they got me in the same  day. They discovered that my little one ‚Äú Swimmy‚Äù has severe ear mites, worms, and fleas. They cleaned his ears (which took 20 minutes in itself) , cut his nails, gave him worm medicine, ear mite medicine, flea medicine, AND gave me flea medicine for my other 4 cats. Keep in mind this is also a first time visit. All of this for only $265.00. Do the right thing and switch your vet immediately. I was a former client at Paws and claws for years, and never felt a familial and welcoming atmosphere like I did with Dr. Eric!

I love north hampton, the staff and Dr Randle are amazing!  Our 4 year old blue pit has had a skin condition since he became our fur baby.  But Dr Randle and the staff at North Hampton took the time to actually figure out what the underlying issues were and 1 month of two different antibiotics and our Shadow is a happy healthy no longer Frito smelling boy!  North Hampton Animal Clinic will be our vet for as long as we have fur babies!  Thanks so much for fixing our boy North Hampton & Dr Randle!  We love you!
Everyone here is very caring, friendly and knowledgeable. Dr. Allison takes time to listen and answers all of my questions.  Our Molly loves everyone there too.
Corona Extra Draft

North Star PPEC is truly a place filled with love, compassion, and faith. I‚Äôve witnessed how well the staff care for their clients‚Ä¶with patience, kindness, and genuine respect. It‚Äôs clear that everything is thoughtfully planned and equipped to meet each child‚Äôs unique needs, giving families comfort and peace of mind.
What stands out most is that their care is rooted in Christian values. You can feel the difference in the way they love and serve, making North Star not just a PPEC, but a place where faith and excellence come together beautifully.

North Stars PPEC is an exceptional place. The team shows great dedication, professionalism, and genuine care for each child. The environment is positive, safe, and filled with people who truly care about the well-being and progress of their patients. Highly recommended.

I am so thankful my son attends this ppec. It has been life changing for him. He has made so much progress because of their dedication to push him everyday. My son wakes up every morning so excited to wait for his bus to go and spend his day with them. All his therapists, nurses and staff treat him as if he was family, with such love and kindness. I‚Äôm glad he gets to experience the daily activities, crafts and field trips they do. This place and all the staff are really heaven sent !!!
After spending almost a full day at the Pecs Center, the best part of the day was seeing all the children‚Äôs happy faces as they did activities together and enjoyed the best the center has to offer.
The best PPEC! The staff is amazing, caring, and always dedicated to the children. You can truly see how much love and effort they put into every activity. Highly recommended!
Well, looking at their website. Its very old! Pets from years ago. Only 4 dogs. Zero cats. Update your website, or why have one?
Poor baby racoon stuck in a dumpster, someone came out quickly and got it out.
Love there mission
No follow up communication
Price affordable

provider_name: Nova‚Äôs Royal Pets Corp.Frenchies & Maine Coons
review_text: We are so pleased with our frenchie from Nova's Royal Pets. She is healthy, happy, smart, and used to kids and other animals. We appreciated that we were able to bring our older frenchie to meet the puppies and choose the perfect fit for our family. We highly recommend this breeder.

provider_name: Nova‚Äôs Royal Pets Corp.Frenchies & Maine Coons
review_text:
PLEASE BE AWARE ..BREEDER HAS BEEN REPORTED WITH ON GOING CASE :  she used to live in Saint Augustine, Florida. We purchased a French bulldog puppy from her . She  legally does not have permission to breed puppies anymore . The certificate for our puppy was not legal she lied about the puppies health condition and her own vet confirmed it . There is so much more to this story but I will be reporting this site to our attorney . She changed the site name and is now living elsewhere doing the same thing. All buyers beware.

Again all lies. We too have documents and you were investigated. You provided a false certificate and false chip. When our  vet upon her fist visit scanned for chip .. there was never a chip placed .  Also our sweet girl we chose not to give back to this lady was  already fully loved by our family .. she was ver sick for months before she got well again. Then we had a specialist in st Augustine  confirm with x-rays that the breeder was over beefing due to his findings .  Our sweet puppy has a spinal concern and she has no hip sockets. ..  she has special medication and she has to have shots in her hip .  THERE IS ZERO TRUTH FROM THIS LADY. IF YOU CHOOSE TO PURCHASE FROM HER OR ALREADY HAVE, I WOULD RECOMMEND TAKING YOUR LOVED ONE IN FOR A FULL THOROUGH EVALUATION WITH BLOOD WORK AND X-RAYS.   BEST OF LUCK

provider_name: Nova‚Äôs Royal Pets Corp.Frenchies & Maine Coons
review_text: We got two French Bulldogs from Nova‚Äôs Royal Pets. The dogs were well cared for and presented with a friendly disposition.  Each dog has a lovable and unique personality thanks to the great start in life as a puppy raised by a wonderful person (Nataliya). If you want a best friend with lots of personality, get a French Bulldog at Nova‚Äôs Royal Pets. Our dogs surf too!  5 Stars Plus Earned and Deserved!

provider_name: Nova‚Äôs Royal Pets Corp.Frenchies & Maine Coons
review_text:
Best Kitten ever! You won't regret you're decision. Our beautiful baby girl was adjusted in a few hours. We love her soooo much!!!!üòçüòç
I get a lot of compliments on her. She's very sweet and playful.
UPDATE!!
She's just Purrrrfect!! Beautiful. Thank you again for our furrreverrr girl.
