provider_name: Nova‚Äôs Royal Pets Corp.Frenchies & Maine Coons
review_text: We LOVE our Frenchie from Safronova Royal French Bulldogs! He is a beautiful, happy and energetic puppy! Nataliya went above and beyond to assists us with any questions we had during the buying process and after we brought our puppy home. While waiting for him to come home she sent us lots of pics of our puppies progress. HIGHLY recommend using SafroNova Kennels!

I wanted to write a reflection review...
My daughter will be graduating next week from high school!!! At times (especially early on) we never knew if this was a possibility or what her future would look like. Miss Rosie never doubted it, she knew my daughter's potential from day one and throughout the last   17 YEARS  has been a Godsend! Helping her navigate language, communication, comprehension and all the millions of details that goes into each part of her speech journey.
All of the ladies are wonderful at the office. We were especially blessed to have our daughter in Rosie's hands.
Miss Rosie is the heart of this office. She CARES about your child.
I was sad to see a mom missed the opportunity to meet with Miss Rosie because she was unhappy she had to wait longer than expected. All I can say is if you knew how hard she was working for your child you would wait as long as necessary.
Miss Rosie is worth the wait. Take it from a mom who knows, I promise.
Thank you Miss Rosie for all you have done and continue to do for our girl. We love you!

My daughter has been seeing Ms Rosie for feeding therapy and Ms Marisa for OT for a little over a year now and has made tremendous progress at November and Associates! My daughter came to them with severe feeding aversion and was only eating stage one pur√©es. With their help and expertise she is now eating real food. Me and my daughter spend 3 days a week at the clinic and I see the time and effort the therapists put into each child is top notch. They love and care for them as their own. I am forever grateful to November and associates for what they have done to help my daughter work through her feeding aversion.

Rosie saved my autistic son's  life by helping him overcome severe food aversions due to sensory issues. When we arrived he would only eat purees  and would gag and vomit with any other textures.He was not growing well. Thanks to her dedicated  work with feeding therapy he now eats most everything and has come so far developmentally with his speech and cognitive abilities. He adores her because she is alot of fun while making sure he is doing his best. His Occupational Therapists are wonderful too and the practice is a real family. I can't say enough about how much love our household has for November and Associates.

Love love love every staff member at this center! My kiddo looks forward to going here daily. Have made huge progress in the staff are super patient and very communicative about my son‚Äôs progress. They give great suggestions on things I can Mimic at home. Highly recommend this is the place your kiddo needs to be for therapy!

At first they were nice explained everything throughly and then everything went downhill.
I had an appointment scheduled for 1:30 for my sons evaluation for speech just to sit there 20 minutes passed his appointment time and to later be told sorry I was in a meeting. So why schedule an appointment time if you can‚Äôt even attend the child. I texted Rosemarie about no longer scheduling my child for any further appointments just to get a message back 1HOUR passed his appointment time saying she was in a meeting and sorry about the delay. Was I suppose to wait a FULL hour pass our appointment time for us to meet your schedule you can‚Äôt keep up with. Very unprofessional.

We have an amazing experience with Dr Hill performing surgery to our cat. The staff was really communicative all day.
Looking forward bringing our pets here in the future.

Dr. Hall is one of the kindest and most gracious people I have ever met. She facilitated our dog‚Äôs journey over the rainbow bridge with us. She took time on her day off to make it memorable and peaceful for us at home. It was the hardest thing I‚Äôve ever had to do and she guided us through it with grace. I can‚Äôt thank her enough for her kindness and time she gave to both us and our sweet girl Lily. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Incredible staff, busy workers and staff at all times, but when they do get you in.. the care is incredible and thorough. Very trauma-informed as well.
I take both my cat and my German shepherd here

I have been a client/customer of Novey for over 20 years.  The care, compassion, and love they have had for my 2 dogs have been top-notch.  I only trust them to look after my dog when I travel because I know she is in good hands with a team that will love on her are care for her.  Dr. Hall and the rest of the team are wonderful.

I want to express my immense gratitude to the entire team at this amazing veterinary clinic! You have saved our dog more than once. The doctors here are not only attentive and highly competent, but they also truly love animals. They always conduct thorough examinations, provide accurate diagnoses, and choose the most effective treatments. After visiting this clinic, our dog and cat always feel much better, and we have peace of mind about their health.

Thank you for your professionalism, care, and warm attitude toward our pets! We trust only you! ‚ù§Ô∏èüêæ

First impressions are everything! As you exit the elevator, you walk into a beautiful, modern medical space that's so clean and fresh.  I was immediately greeted with a big smile from the staff and taken back for my procedure.  Right on time with no waiting. Janine did my procedure which was PRP injections to my face.  Not gonna lie it did hurt a bit but she was as gentle as she could be and she kept adding numbing cream to areas that were sensitive. Janine must be a mom because she was very soothing in her voice as she talked to me while doing the injections.  I could already see some improvement in my under eye area as this is a problem for me. I highly recommend them for any of your cosmetic medical needs. I'll be going back for other treatments so I will keep giving you all updates on how much I love this place.
Elizabeth and Janine are so very knowledgeable.  NuLife Institute is continually guiding me, towards great health and vitality.  They‚Äôre the best in Miami.

I went in today for PRF treatment for my jaw line and cheeks. The staff was all so great! Julianna was very professional and was so welcoming as soon as I got there. Jannie was the NP who did my treatment. She was extremely knowledgeable and made me feel very comfortable throughout the process. I‚Äôm so happy with the results already!

The NuLife staff I have dealt with are top shelf!  Professional, highly qualified and a true delight to interact with‚Ä¶ Elizabeth ‚ÄúLiz‚Äù is my guardian angel.  Liz has been in constant contact and guided me through each step from the inception!  Customer for life.

From the first time I called and spoke to Jovana, The experience has been phenomenal. Everything from bloodwork, consultation with Dr. Welch and handing over my care to Liz has been seamless. Liz continues to follow up on a weekly basis. The service has been top-notch. I highly recommend.

What a great experience getting to work with Jessica at the PSL location! She was professional, knowledgeable and just an all around wonderful human being! She was extremely flexible, kind and caring! ü´∂ü§ó Wish we could take her home with us!

Amazing physical therapy! Amazing staff! They take care of you and there best interest is in you and your health! Would recommend to anyone! They are my go to for all physical therapy and massage needs! Constantly hurting my body in my field of work and they help me get better and continue on with my life and line of heavy duty work! Thank you Advanced Motion Therapeutic!

My doctor sent them a referral... when they finally called me it was to verify my insurance which I already checked that they were in network..the woman said once she varifys it she will call me back.... and then I never heard back from them. I am taking it as a blessing that I didn't go here .

I know this post will be taken down because it is negative but here is the truth to this place. They do no follow the treatment plain given to parents that we sign off on. The big problem we had was the "therapist" that introduced a object to our child for them to insert into his mouth for chewing on. When asked about if object was new and how it is cleaned after used because they keep them in a cabinet we were told they could not prove it was new and how they clean them. He was there for speech that's it. We have a dentist treating our child for the tongue and chewing issues. This was not for a therapist to try to treat and she would known that if followed treatment plain and asked parents about this issue. When asked therapist why she did this with out consent she admitted she messed up and should of got consent from child care giver. When brought to owner he dismissed this issue when asked to speak to the board never got a return call or email. Watch this place and ask what's going on with your child when here.

First visit went wonderful. Loved the therapist that worked with my son. She was so knowledgeable and caring. She answered all my questions and made us feel so comfortable. Waiting room was a bit small. But we only had like a 5 min wait so it was OK.

The therapists take good care of my son. They definitely care for him and they do anything to help him. They are very professional, knowledgable and super friendly. I definitely recommend this place. Office is very nice and clean. Check them out!

Our experience with OT Wellness Therapy Solutions has been nothing short of amazing. From day one, the entire team has shown genuine care, professionalism, and dedication to helping our child thrive. The therapists are not only incredibly knowledgeable in pediatric occupational therapy, but they also know how to make every session engaging, fun, and tailored to our child‚Äôs unique needs.

We‚Äôve seen tremendous growth in our child‚Äôs fine motor coordination, sensory integration, and overall confidence. What truly sets OT Wellness apart is the individualized attention and thoughtful approach they bring to every session. It‚Äôs clear that they truly care about each child‚Äôs progress and well-being.

The facility is clean, inviting, and filled with child-friendly equipment that supports a wide range of therapy goals. The staff communicates clearly and consistently, providing helpful feedback after sessions and suggestions for home activities that really make a difference.

If you're looking for a warm, supportive, and effective therapy center, we highly recommend OT Wellness Therapy Solutions. They‚Äôve made a lasting positive impact on our child‚Äîand our family.

Our child has been receiving Occupation therapy at this center for over a year now, and the progress we‚Äôve seen has been incredible. From the beginning, the entire team has been supportive, professional, and truly committed to our child's growth and development.

The therapist assigned to us is absolutely amazing! skilled, compassionate, and always attentive to our child‚Äôs individual needs. Her approach has not only helped our child gain independence in daily activities, but it has also given us the confidence and tools we need as parents to support her at home.

The owner of the center (Alicia) has been especially helpful, consistently going above and beyond to offer guidance and recommendations we can use outside of therapy sessions. She's always available and genuinely cares about the families she works with, which makes a world of difference.

The center itself is clean, welcoming, and very well organized. It‚Äôs a space where both children and parents feel comfortable and supported.
We are so grateful for everything this center has done for our child and our family.

My daughter has been receiving her occupational and speech therapy at this center, and we are very happy with the results. She made great progress, and we‚Äôve seen big improvements in how she talks and handles daily activities.

The therapists were very kind, skilled, and supportive throughout her whole treatment. They really cared about her growth and made her feel comfortable during every session.

We are very thankful for everything they are doing. I highly recommend this center to any parent looking for quality therapy for their child.

We've been attending OT Wellness Therapy Solutions for a year now, and the progress our child has made through occupational therapy has been incredible. The therapists are knowledgeable, caring, and truly invested in each child's success. The clinic is warm, welcoming, and always well-organized. We're so thankful for everything they‚Äôve done to support our child's growth!

Our child has been with OT Wellness for over 3 years, and the growth has been amazing. The therapists are caring, skilled, and make every session fun and personalized. We've seen major progress in fine motor, gross motor, and social skills. OT Wellness has been a true gift to our family‚Äîsupportive, encouraging, and deeply committed to helping kids thrive!

We were so lucky to receive therapy at oTogether! We truly felt we were in the best hands. The therapy was professional, supportive, and truly helped us progress. A huge thank you for everything ‚Äì we deeply appreciate it and love you!
Had fun building a sense of community with local moms and babies! Great class
I had such a great experience at OTogether. The team is professional, kind, and really made me feel comfortable from the start. You can tell they care about the people they work with!
Great experience with otogether by far very hands on and kids friendly environment.. it was an awesome experience my child anticipates going there...
Great staff, very professional and caring. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a trustworthy place!
Best experience ever! They have goats of all ages and it‚Äôs so much fun to interact with them! The staff was so friendly!

Loved it üíñüíñüíñüíñ. Got to experience feeding a baby goat and learned a few facts from the wonderful 2 ladies, and the pregnant goats are really pushy when they know you have treats üòÇ got to know firsthand what goat yoga was about. Definitely will do it again.

They had me at Goat Yoga! Oak Aged Farm is a great way to escape the stresses of life and spend some time in nature. The yoga class was for beginners, but the instructor suggested modifications for those that have done yoga before. However, it was really all about the goats. They are adorable and very friendly... if you have food. Which they provided! A great way to stretch out your "sitting at a computer all day" muscles and also get some belly laughs from interacting with the unpredictable goats. Highly recommended! Karli and Laura run a great little farm and are super friendly. Can't wait to go back!

If you're in need of a mood boost, visit Oat Aged Farm to feed and cuddle with adorable baby goats. I had a surprisingly enjoyable time. The farm's goat-feeding bottles sell out fast (cash only), so be quick if you're interested. Unfortunately, you can't bring your own, as the goats are accustomed to the farm's bottles and follow a strict formula. Alternatively, you can spend $5 for a container of treats, and the entire flock will eagerly approach you. We had a blast and plan to return!

Booked a baby goat feeding and cuddle session at Oak Aged Farm as a belated father's day gift for my husband.  My only recommendation is to bring cash in case you want to purchase extra goat food or a snack or drink for yourself, they only accept cash or Zelle and cell service can be a bit spotty.  The staff were fantastic and knowledgeable, and made sure everyone had a good time.  We had a blast!

Oak Therapy has been absolutely life-changing for my son. From the very first visit, he felt welcomed and cared for by their incredible staff. The team is not only professional and highly skilled, but also genuinely compassionate, making every session a truly positive experience.

My son has been attending Oak Therapy for several months. All of the speech therapists are incredibly understanding and passionate about helping children reach their fullest potential. We have worked with Valerie and most recently, with Vale. They are very knowledgeable, always adjusting to keep him engaged, and are constantly brainstorming ways to help facilitate communication. They also incorporate parent education in the sessions, so there is carryover at home. The new facility is clean and welcoming with a sensory gym to meet my son‚Äôs sensory seeking needs. I highly recommend Oak Therapy for those looking for quality speech therapy services in a neurodivergent affirming environment.

I can‚Äôt speak highly enough about the team at Oak Therapy! My family lives abroad, and the team agreed to work with my son online and even coordinate with his school. My son‚Äôs therapist made each session fun with activities that kept my child excited about improving his speech. The therapist also gave me constant feedback about my child‚Äôs progress and provided tips on how to support him at home. I highly recommend Oak Therapy for anyone looking for compassionate and effective speech therapy!

My family and I have had to temporarily relocate to Miami and our 5 year old daughter had to leave her routine-including her weekly speech therapy session. We came across Oak Therapy in a google search and were extremely impressed with their quick response and eagerness to get started on working with our daughter. She loves the activities they engage in which makes the experience feel like fun instead of work. The office is very clean and well thought out and the team is incredibly kind. We‚Äôre happy to have found Oak Therapy and will miss it once we are able to move back home.
The therapist at Oak are strength based, passionate and driven to help little ones progress.  I highly recommend anyone seeking therapy for their little  one to book an appointment with Oak

provider_name: Oakland Park Rehab Center Plus DOT Exams
review_text:
Wow that's all I can say after moving to Broward and not having a chiropractor I needed full adjustment even more than that my lower back was killing me . Dr Samuel was recommended to me and I can only praise his services : the adjustment was remarkable and I now have a trusted chiropractor to visit every month if not more...!!!!
My sincere thank you to Dr George Samuel and his team.

provider_name: Oakland Park Rehab Center Plus DOT Exams
review_text:
For the past month, I had been experiencing neck pain that radiated to my shoulders and upper back. Nothing seemed to work, no neck exercises, muscle relaxers, anti-inflammatory medicines, new pillows or sleeping positions. I tried Everything.
Today, I visited Oakland Park Rehab Center. This place is a 10 out 10! First of all the customer when I called to schedule the appointment was great.

Upon my arrival, Sherry was wonderful. I saw Dr. Samuel, he is Phenomenal! After only 1 visit, I feel better than I have felt in a very long time. Everyone took such great care of me. The treatments were like a spa experience. If you are experiencing any pain or discomfort, I highly recommend you visit Oakland Park Rehab Center.

provider_name: Oakland Park Rehab Center Plus DOT Exams
review_text: Very satisfied Dr Samuel did a great job. Even clean my ear , üòÅ. Staff was amazing

provider_name: Oakland Park Rehab Center Plus DOT Exams
review_text: Everyone at this office is friendly and professional. They were very efficient and were able to get me in for my exam early since I had arrived quite a bit before my scheduled time. They also called, and text me to make sure I knew where I was going since I had not been there before.

provider_name: Oakland Park Rehab Center Plus DOT Exams
review_text: Dr. Samuel was amazing, did some work on me and now I feel just great. Also gave me some pointers on what I need to do to reassure that the pain does not come back. Trust me they will see me again thats for sure!

We truly appreciate Dr Gaby and the staff of Oakview hospital in Palm Bay Florida. They helped us navigate and survive a terrible day when we needed to euthanize our 17 year old dog that we had since he was 8 weeks old. Before that they helped keep him alive longer for us to share more time with him. We loved our dog dearly and are grateful for their good care of him during his final years. I would recommend Dr Gaby and the staff to anyone looking for premium care for a beloved pet.

The staff is awesome and I love Bailey's Dr.  (Dr. Shurtliff) She is so nice!!! Melissa is the most caring person. She calls to check on your pets (I have 3 with my parents' dogs) Bailey had to have surgery and I was so scared with her anesthesia. But Melissa ate her lunch with Bailey, just so she would not be alone. Bailey is a 7 year old spoiled Golden Retriever & very needy. I can't say enough about this office! And if you are lucky enough to become a patient, the Dr.'s and staff will treat you like family. Rosie & Bailey pictured.

Would not recommend the vet we saw for big dogs- 130 lbs or more- vet came in to do all shots she recommended muzzle okay.. we struggled for about 30 plus minutes between 5 of us at one point and then finally got on the cone, perfect time to do shots, right! 123 done!! Nope, instead she decides to start listening to his heart and lungs üòµ‚Äçüí´ gurrrllll do the damn shots!  Needless to say the cone didn‚Äôt last long and no shots were done but hey they recommended sedation for another $188 üò≥Wouldn‚Äôt recommend the vet at all , extremely disappointed - last time I did shots here was with an outstanding vet who obviously was much better at getting the job done. Staff was good -

Had a great experience at Oakview today with my fur baby.  He is a very anxious boy and Dr Gabby needed to shave his leg to look at an injury.  He is very scared of clippers. She and her tech were very patient with him.

Easily accessible from the Main Road, Minton and not far from Palm Bay Rd.

Adequate Free Parking including for Handicap accessible Vehicles. The facility was clean and well staffed by friendly employees.

We had an appointment and it went well. Mickey who took us in was a pleasure to deal with as well as the Doctor. They both answered all of our questions and made suggestions for the care of our Kitten.

An all around Great visit and I would recommend them for you pet care and needs! A+

Made another well visit and for shots as before a pleasure to deal with Mike and the Doctor took great care of us

I can't say enough good things about Oasis PT. The physical therapists are knowledgeable and attentive, the staff are friendly and helpful. Everyone gets along. Patients are treated with respect. There is great music. They offer you coffee. This not a typical place. Oasis is, by far, the best physical therapy place I have been to. Eduardo, Leo, Angie, Brenda, and Fabiola - you rock!

What a great experience! I had therapy for my hand. My therapist Dominique and Deidra were excellent.  They were very knowledgeable and patient.  Sofia, the tech, was very nice and helpful. The girls in the front were always very friendly and attentive. Thank you so much! Great place to go!

I‚Äôm very happy with the results of my therapy session.  Staff are very professional the center have all the equipment to assist all patients needs including music to relax us where we do the therapy.
I will recommend it to everyone who needs therapy to get full recovery.
Thank you to all staff including the secretary in the front desk.

I‚Äôve had a positive experience at Oasis Specialized therapy care. From the beginning, the environment was professional and welcoming. Throughout the sessions, I noticed steady progress and significant pain relief, which greatly contributed to my overall well-being. The team showed expertise and care at every stage of the process. I would definitely recommend this center to anyone looking for a reliable place to receive therapy.

The staff is super kind and professional, and the environment is really peaceful and welcoming. You can tell they genuinely care about helping people feel better and supported. Fabiana was especially helpful and made the whole experience even better! I totally recommend it to anyone looking for a great therapy space.

This place is simply the best! The staff is amazing! They are caring and beyond attentive. From scheduling, cleanliness to the actual therapy session, everything flows so well. And best of all, you see the results and you feel better! OUTSTANDING SERVICE! Thanks a billion to the great people at Oasis. You make me a better person every single time!

Great place. The office is very clean, welcoming and nicely decorated. The personnel in the office as well as the therapists are very professional, caring, friendly, and accommodating. William and Martha are great as well as everyone else there at their Sheridan office. Thank you!

I have had 4 sessions so far and enjoyed each moment I was there. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and helpful, very helpful. Thank you Holly! They give good tips on exercises to do at home (without spending $ on equipment) to help the healing process. They have lots of equipment in house to accommodate their patients' therapy goals. I like that they ask you to wash your hands before getting started. Also, no paper towel waste. They use cotton hand towels. Thank you Anna, Dominique and William. I love this place!! I highly recommend Oasis.

I had therapy in Oasis last year and it was awesome. Everyone there makes you feel like your home. All the therapist are the best. When you walk in, they great you with a smile and very friendly. So this year, I am back . I recommend them, if you're looking for a great therapist and a good and friendly staff.

All the benefits of a smaller more personalised practice. Walking in the door you're greeted by name and a conversation. I'm not a patient with a co-pay at the front desk here I'm a person. A therapist that is extremely attentive and thorough, asking about your concerns at every appointment. Detailed explanations of how and why exercises are done. Honestly the way I wish most places were.

Completed the Obedience class for my rescue. The connection that you have with your pet improves as well as having others in the class. We both learned alot. Our instructor Susan was patient and did an excellent job!

Your puppy NEEDS the Obedience Training Club of Palm Beach County! After 6 weeks is my puppy fully trained? Hahahaha. NO. But is she reliable with sit and down? Is she getting better at loose lead walking and stay? Is she pretty good at leave it, come, and drop? YES! Angel is the absolute best. Tons of knowledge and she's great about accommodating the needs of each puppy and working with each personality. We learned so much! I can't wait to get my girl into another class!

Me and my Golden Retriever Negan have had such a great time training at OTCPBC. We are taking the Therapy training class. Susan Minix has been our trainer. Susan is the best and we have learned so much. I highly recommend this Susan and this establishment for any of your training needs. The bonding I have done with Negan during these classes is priceless. You will not be disappointed. We are so grateful!
Great classes and our instructor Angel is very knowledgeable and makes the puppy STAR class fun.
We love training and showing at OTCPBC!

My wife Joan and I highly recommend Dr. Amanda and her technician Maureen at Ocean Breeze Animal Hospital. When faced with needing a veterinarian to help our darling dog Coco, as soon as possible, we found the perfect place! Upon our arrival, Maureen was the first friendly, welcoming face we needed to calm our fears. It wasn‚Äôt long after that we met  Dr. Amanda who we found to be personable, caring, understanding, and thorough. With a warm smile and gentleness, she examined Coco. Without hesitating, she diagnosed Coco‚Äôs illness and gave us the necessary medications, which were so reasonably priced. How fortunate we were to find Dr. Amanda, Maureen, and staff! When in need, we will always turn to Ocean Breeze!

We have recently moved to the area and are very happy to have found OBAH. We have 3 dogs and their care and support for each health issue we have had for each dog has been amazing. Dental surgery, minor injuries, and major issues and each Dr. and all the staff go above and beyond. I am grateful they are so close when I need them.
Our family has in trusted Ocean Breeze Veterinary Clinic with the care of our animals for years and will continue to do so.  They are kind, caring and efficient with their care and treatment.
Excellent assessment on my dachshund needs, least is best first plan and great follow up. Great doctor and assistant who cares and not outrageously priced.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

This place is GREAT! Taking my Doberman here for past 1.5 years. Easy to make appointments, great font desk and back staff, EVERYONE has been friendly!  Doctor is down to earth, many options for your budget, you can tell she loves the animals. Definitely would recommend !

I have been going to therapy on and off for about 6 years, through my university and other private practices. This group has been the most supportive, communicative, and accessible practice I've worked with in all these years, and it's not even close.

In particular, I'd like to say the receptionists, Ana and her colleague, are very communicative and always confirm appointments weekly by email, and are super flexible with scheduling, and answering any questions for payment, even pointing me to community resources to continue funding my therapy when I experienced changes in my insurance and income.

As for counselling, Matthew is hands-down the best that I've had the pleasure of not only working with, but getting to know as a human being. It's tangible he actually loves his job, and goes the extra mile for making sure he provides multiple avenues of support, from individual sessions, to hosting LGBT+ group circles to discuss various topics. He even assisted in trying to help me find a family therapist, so I can work on other relationships beyond our individual sessions.

I feel like I've transformed so much, and it wouldn't have happened without having the strong support of the office. Highly recommend if you're looking, and hopefully you don't look back after coming.

I‚Äôve been having therapy with Matthew since February, and the experience has been absolutely incredible. I struggled to find a therapist I felt truly comfortable with. But from the moment I started working with Matthew, I felt genuinely at ease. He is incredibly open, kind, and caring, and because of his support, I‚Äôve truly grown mentally over these past months.

Most importantly, Matthew has been there for me through my grief journey after losing my mom. His compassion and guidance have helped me navigate some of the hardest moments of my life, and I honestly don‚Äôt know how I would‚Äôve gotten through them without his support.

Thank you Matthew, and the entire team at Ocean Psychology Group, for making this journey so much easier üíï

I have been with Ocean Psychology for two years now. I have worked with Matthew and have recommended several seek Ocean and Matthew for care. Not only did they work with my budget but they are very flexible with scheduling. It has been a very pleasant experience and I am not sure where I would be if I was not under their care.  I very much recommend Ocean Psychology to anyone who is seeking therapy.

I had a great experience being a patient at ocean psychology group. I worked with Matthew as virtual therapist for many months, and a he did a great job of addressing my needs and getting to know me and really learning about the ways I think and feel. He was able to facilitate communication between us, as well as helping me find ways to express myself. He was always adaptable and patient, and made me feel safe to speak candidly. Anna always took care of all administrative matters quickly and clearly, and made it very easy to schedule appointments. I feel that I've made great strides in my mental health, personal growth, emotional awareness, and independence during this time. Thank you!

I have been helped by Matthew for the last 10 months, and feel truly grateful for the environment he has created in our sessions and for the meaningful work we have done together.

Matthew is a warm and attentive listener. His approach to therapy is adaptable, and while firmly grounded on evidence-based techniques, he is also open to explore more humane dimensions.

I have found in Matthew both a confidant, who acknowledges my experiences and thoughts without judgement, and a sparring partner, who challenges ideas I have developed about myself and others, and highly recommend him to anyone interested in healing.

I recently worked with them providing a painting service and I can say how amazing it‚Äôs to work with them, they provide an unforgettable experience, their professionalism and kindness definitely stands out.

I've known Dr. Story now for many years and she is the most wonderful and caring therapist. She helped us with our daughter's mental illness issues and I have referred quite a few people to this practice and they equally have been very happy with the level of service and care they receive. You can tell they in this line of work for the right reasons and really want to help their patients.

Not worth your time... Called in to see if this would fit our needs. My Call was answered with a "hello" and after asking to make sure I had the correct number was hung up on.

update reply for office response:
I redialed the number on your website thinking I had made a mistake .... it rang and rang and no answer... hence this review. This has been the only contact I have had with your office and I can't reply to your questions other than to update my review.....
Please update numbers related to your practice on google and your website.  We have found an office that has availability. thanks
A wonderful practice, and LGBTQ+-friendly! Would highly recommend.
Awesome!

I think just 5 stars is not enough. I can‚Äôt say enough amazing things about Oceanside Physical Therapy and especially my therapist : Dr. Minacshee. She is truly the best therapist I could ever ask for ‚Äì so caring, patient, and understanding. She genuinely cares about her patients well-being and recovery, and thanks to her,  I‚Äôve not only found relief from my pains and physical issues, but I feel like I‚Äôve gotten my quality of life back. I honestly don‚Äôt think I could have found anyone better, or any other place that compares ‚Äì not just in this area, but anywhere.

On top of that, the entire staff here is wonderful. From the front desk receptionist Bella,  to the other physical therapists, everyone makes me feel so welcome and comfortable. It truly feels like a little family every time I walk in. Oceanside Physical Therapy has been such a blessing, and I‚Äôm so grateful for Dr. Minacshee and what she‚Äôs done for me!

I have had an amazing experience at Oceanside PT after undergoing a PAO and labrum repair and definitely recommend coming here for all PT needs. Bryan, Gabbie, Kaitlyn, Minacshee, CJ, and Bella made my recovery much more tolerable and I couldn‚Äôt imagine going through this without them. They supported me both physically and emotionally and I looked forward to my visits every week. I felt well taken care of and Bryan is super knowledgeable about the PT for the PAO as he wrote the protocol himself so I knew I was in good hands! Not many places have the Alter G or shockwave therapy and these have helped my recovery tremendously. Thank you to the team at Oceanside, you‚Äôve truly made a difference in my life during this difficult time post-op :)

Brian and his staff at Ocanside Physical Therapy are very kind and easy to work with. Brian's knowledge and  shockwave therapy equipment is unprecedented. It helped me reduce scar tissue and get more range of motion. Thank you Brian!

wonderful center, I started treatment at the facility after a traumatic leg break. Minacshee is amazing, she helped me with my recovery and is extremely sweet. She took great care of me and walked me through helpful exercises leading to a return in full range of motion. When I first started, I was in a wheelchair and now I am walking normally again, I am so thankful for Minachee I couldn't have done it without her. Brian is also very helpful; I would recommend the center entirely.

Oceanside PT was recommended to me by my surgeon.  This practice is organized, well-provisioned and efficiently run.  Staff communicate well among each other.  Brian is very knowledgeable and develops comprehensive plans for rehabilitation.  You will be pushed to the point of discomfort but not pain.  Do your home exercises regularly and make and keep your appointments for the best results.  Highly recommend.

provider_name: Off Leash K9 Training Central Florida
review_text: We have a very driven 1-year-old German shepherd male named Ripp that we were able to do some training with. However, we are so busy with our two young children and working full-time. After much consideration, we finally decided to do the two week board and train. Kendra was Ripp‚Äôs trainer and she is just amazing! Ripp stayed with her in Vero Beach for the two weeks at her house. Kendra worked him daily out and about and sent us daily videos. We had many concerns including reactivity to other dogs and being able to have Ripp better under control. Kendra is so patient and so lovely to communicate with. She really listened to us about our concerns and focused on steering Ripp in the right direction. We were able to take him on our week-long vacation to a mountain lake and have him out and about with us. It was unbelievable to see the progress she made with each day! Ripp is extremely intelligent and Kendra challenged him and gave him a job to do so he gets the stimulation he needs! She gave us the tools and tips we need to continue working with Ripp and also training ourselves!  Thank you for EVERYTHING, Kendra!!

provider_name: Off Leash K9 Training Central Florida
review_text:
I can't say enough great things about Kendra and the incredible work she did with my puppy during his two-week board and train program. She built a strong foundation for basic commands and manners, setting him up for a happy and well-adjusted life.

What truly set this experience apart was the constant communication. I received daily updates and videos showing my puppy's progress, which gave me so much peace of mind. The transparency and dedication to keeping me involved in his training were exceptional. Anytime I had a question, Kendra was always available, offering thoughtful guidance and extensive reach-back support.

Thanks to her expertise and commitment, my puppy is not only obedient but also more confident and eager to learn. It‚Äôs amazing to see the positive transformation, and I know that this foundation will continue to shape him into a well-mannered companion for years to come.

I am beyond grateful for the care, patience, and skill Kendra put into his training. If you're looking for a knowledgeable and compassionate trainer who truly understands dogs, I highly recommend her. She has given my puppy the best possible start, and I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased!

provider_name: Off Leash K9 Training Central Florida
review_text:
The girl (Asia) we had was nice and informative. That wasn‚Äôt the problem. We contacted a few days after our second lesson asking when we would train so our dog would stop chasing the cats when bored (something we told them was the biggest thing we wanted trained prior to signing up). She mentioned all of these tied together for mental stimulus but that‚Äôs not what we wanted. We just needed a way to get her to listen when bored and everything we were going to be taught fell into similar categories. Because of this we asked for a partial refund. This wasn‚Äôt the problem.

Asia was nice, informative, and good with our dog. Our problem was when I called because over text she wanted to see if there was a way to communicate this better, we were getting to the same situation: she was talking over me/cutting me off, saying our dog was unstable (literally both lessons we went she said she‚Äôs an easy dog to train until the call happened), and was rudely clapping on the other side when trying to get her point across. I insisted we just wanted a refund multiple times before she finally listened to me.  The call was super unprofessional where prior to that we were fine with the trainer.

Additionally, she said our refund would take a couple days to go into our account. I contacted a couple days recently asking where it was and two days later it then went in. This was a week over compared to what she told us. I wish we had a better parting experience. I can tell she is passionate about her work but to be rude because someone isn‚Äôt happy with service is disheartening hence why we gave two stars.

provider_name: Off Leash K9 Training Central Florida
review_text:
I cannot recommend Off Leash K9 Training enough! From our very first consultation, it was clear that the team was dedicated, knowledgeable, and truly passionate about what they do. My experience was made even more special by Kendra, who was my dog trainer. She professionally transformed my dog's behavior and expertly trained him to become a service dog.

Kendra‚Äôs personalized approach addressed my dog's unique needs, ensuring that every session was both productive and engaging. Her exceptional expertise, patience, and care throughout the entire process gave me confidence that my dog was in the best hands. Thanks to her guidance, my dog now exhibits the discipline, focus, and skills necessary to serve as a reliable service dog.

If you're looking for a professional, compassionate, and results-driven training program, Off Leash K9 Training in Florida is the perfect choice. I am deeply grateful for Kendra‚Äôs hard work and dedication, which has truly made a positive impact on both my dog's life and mine.

provider_name: Off Leash K9 Training Central Florida
review_text:
We highly recommend Loren from Off Leash K9 Training. Its been 6 months now since Loren worked with our Rottweiler Puppy she had him for (2) weeks at her house for training! When we picked up our boy he was happy, healthy and well mannered.  We now take him for walks (off leash) around the neighborhood , go to stores, beaches etc. Anywhere we go he is welcomed because he is so well behaved. We continue to get complements by people who drive by us as we walk together. They are amazed to how well he listens and behaves.   Everyone loves our boy and he loves everyone. Thanks Loren for the wonderful job. We would definitely use Off Leash K9 Training again
.

We had an amazing experience with Estivin of OffLeash K9 training!! From the very start there was constant communication between Estivin and myself letting us know how Ranger was doing and and sending daily pictures or videos showing us what they were doing and the progress our dog was making! Sending him away for 2 weeks was a very hard decision to make but I‚Äôm so happy we did! We didn‚Äôt expect a completely different dog but the progress Estivin made with Ranger in those 2 weeks is incredible! Now it‚Äôs up to us to continue putting the work in each and every day and with the tools and resources we‚Äôve been given I‚Äôm confident in the success of Ranger and that he‚Äôll have a much better quality of life! 10/10 would recommend Estivin to anyone who‚Äôs looking to get more control over there dog and to build a better relationship between you and your dog! Thank you

We had our Doberman trained by Ernie for two weeks!  What an amazing difference. Cosmo is 8 months now and he really does creat at obeying our commands, not getting distracted by other dogs or people and staying within the bound which we place on him. Example: when we have dinner he goes to his place and stays on command while we eat. After dinner, we allow him up on the couch with us to watch TV‚Ä¶he thinks he is a lap dog at 60lbs lol.  He also loves ridding in our open jeep and is always well behaved and confident around other animals  and people.  Ernie did a fantastic job with training Cosmo and us in all his commands.  Cosmo is still a puppy, and not perfect at everything, but the training made a world of difference for our family of 2 dogs and 2 cats.  Thank you Ernie!  Lena and I are very happy with your services and give you our highest recommendation to our friends and family.

Eli and Lena Smith

My husband and I just recently had a baby boy and our 5 yr old lab was very apprehensive and high energy when we brought him from the hospital. He is also pulls really bad when taking him on walks. We looked into extensive training and that‚Äôs when we found Estivin with off leash k9. We did the 2 week board and train program and we have only amazing things to say about Estivin. He gave us all the tools we need and he sent daily updates of our dogs along with pictures. Just after 2 short weeks our dog is a lot calmer and we are able to take him places with us again, as well as enjoy walks around the neighborhood. The money was very well spent.

Absolutely Life-Changing Experience ‚Äì Thank You, Estivin!

We can‚Äôt believe how lucky we are to have found Estivin! Leaving our 4-month-old puppies, Remi and Kali, for the first time was nerve-wracking. However, from the moment we met Estivin and his family, we knew they were in the best possible hands. He took the time to walk us through everything, answered all our questions, and immediately put us at ease.

During their week of boarding and training, Estivin consistently updated us with photos and videos showing the puppies‚Äô progress. Within just two days, we were completely blown away by how much they had already learned! The foundation he laid was nothing short of incredible. We now have confident puppies who respond to basic commands like come, sit, stay, bed, and crate and we practice them daily thanks to the strong start Estivin gave us.

Perhaps the biggest change? Walks! Before training, Remi and Kali couldn‚Äôt stand wearing collars or harnesses and hated being on leash. Now, they love their walks and have amazing leash manners. It‚Äôs such a dramatic turnaround we honestly didn‚Äôt think was possible in a weeks time.

We‚Äôve had dogs before and have done our own training successfully, but raising littermates has been a completely different and more challenging experience than we expected. Estivin‚Äôs compassion, expertise, and dedication have made all the difference.

We truly don‚Äôt know where we‚Äôd be without him. We‚Äôre so grateful for everything he‚Äôs done for our puppies, and we‚Äôre already planning to continue training around the 6-month mark.

Thank you, Estivin! You deserve all the recognition in the world! We‚Äôre excited for the next phase of training and deeply appreciate your hard work and love for what you do.

Forever grateful,

Vanessa and Josh

Trainer Ernie is Tampa's Dog Whisperer!  The transformation in our 4 year-old Lagotto after his two week board-and-train with Ernie was remarkable.  Our sweet family dog was struggling with anxiety-based reactivity, and Ernie immediately identified this as a confidence issue.  He focused on getting our dog to relax, be curious, and develop impulse control skills. After two weeks with Ernie, he's now calm and carefree at home and while out and about! Ernie provided updates multiple times each day and was immediately responsive any time I reached out with questions.  Well worth the investment--I only wish we had done it sooner!

provider_name: Off Leash K9 of Port St Lucie
review_text: Sarah did an incredible job with our chihuahua mix, Turbo. I couldn‚Äôt believe the change in her behavior and skills after 2 weeks. I loved receiving the daily videos of her progress and training guides to help us continue her progress at home. Highly recommend.

provider_name: Off Leash K9 of Port St Lucie
review_text: Sarah from K9 off leash spent 2 weeks with our 10 month old Buster in the board and train program. What a difference it made!  He no longer jumps on us or other people, he has good door manners when people come over as he stays in ‚Äúplace‚Äù, he heels very well on walks, and we have the ability to correct other unwanted behaviors that pop up.  He is so well behaved and we can enjoy him more especially in public areas.  Thank you Sarah!! You did a great job with him and we loved the daily videos and texts. I highly recommend K9 off leash!

provider_name: Off Leash K9 of Port St Lucie
review_text: Sarah boarded and trained our stubborn beagle baby over a two week period, and we couldn‚Äôt be more pleased! Before our dog was trained, she was very reactive towards other dogs. We now have a way to handle that issue! Thank you Sarah!

provider_name: Off Leash K9 of Port St Lucie
review_text:
Off Leash K9
I can't say enough wonderful things about Sarah! My golden retriever, Winnie, is a completely different dog after her training sessions. Sarah's expertise and dedication have transformed Winnie into a much more well-behaved dog who walks beautifully on a leash. I never thought I‚Äôd be able to see progress like this, especially in such limited time! From the start, Sarah was professional and communicative, providing clear instructions and regular updates on Winnie's progress. It's amazing to see the difference in Winnie's behavior, and I am so grateful to Sarah for her incredible work. Highly recommend her services!
Mary Z.

provider_name: Off Leash K9 of Port St Lucie
review_text: We signed up our 2 corgis, Lexi & Levi, for training with Sarah K. She was incredible to work with as well as quick to respond, reliable, flexible, and knowledgeable. It was amazing how quickly they learned and became better walkers and calming down when guests came to visit. 10/10 and would definitely recommend working with Sarah.

I got recommended by my long time friend, she mentioned how the Doctor was so attentive and efficient. I was able to talk to Dr.Gaby about my emotional support animals, when she called me all I could hear was how sweet and compassionate she was towards my situation. She made the process so easy and her validation was everything. Thank you guys again so much for reaching out so quick and making it and ease for me

I am absolutely blown away by the professionalism of Dr. Leon and the therapist. They were in touch with me before and after the appointment. They even refunded my money because I accidentally chose the PSD option instead of the ESA option and I told them they could keep it and he insisted and put my money back on my card.  I‚Äôm 100% satisfied and truly grateful Because now I can keep my fur babies with me and not pay these insanely high prices just to live. if you‚Äôre hesitant, please trust this site they will take care of you I promise!Thank you so much!!!

I had a great experience with this service! They handled everything professionally and made the process of getting my cat registered as an emotional support animal super smooth. Everyone I spoke with was kind, supportive, and truly cared. I‚Äôm really grateful for how they treated me ‚Äî highly recommend!

Omg this is the best company I have ever used. Leon Melnitsky owner of Official Pets was beyond helpful to me with my fur babies. I must say I‚Äôm only a second year client but I can see Leon won‚Äôt be seeing me go for a very very long time if even then. Thank you for keeping my loving cat and dog who are best to keeping me well with me when the landlord wouldn‚Äôt allow them to be with me. Thank you. I support you Leon and Official Pets.

I want to express my sincere gratitude to Dr. Leon. He is incredibly kind, respectful, and attentive. He helped me quickly and smoothly complete all the necessary paperwork for my dog. The whole process was easy and stress-free. I‚Äôm very happy with the service! I highly recommend this company and Dr. Leon to anyone looking for a professional and compassionate approach.

Whether your interests are food forest plants, medicinal herbs, farm animals, or simply being enveloped in peaceful nature, Ohjus is the place for you. More than just a farm‚Äî this is a place to learn, connect, and be inspired! Priya and her husband graciously welcome you into their oasis and eagerly share their passion for natural and sustainable living. I promise you won‚Äôt leave without feeling a deeper connection to nature, new knowledge, and possibly a new plant (or 20! üòÖ). Thank you, Priya and Vardheesh, for your dedication to creating such a special place in Fort Pierce and sharing it with all of us. üôè

Thank you for the wonderful experience during our visit to Ojhus Priya and Vardeesh. The warm welcome and clear explanations about your organic farming practices, Seeing how you care for the soil, plants, and animals with sustainable methods are inspiring.The opportunity to taste fresh produce directly from the farm, which was delicious especially the sugar cane juice.Your passion for educating about the importance of organic, chemical-free agriculture is amazing. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

My husband and I had the good fortune of visiting Ojhus- The healing Forest twice last year. We were awestruck the entire duration of our visit, from the immense collection of plants, shrubs, trees that were so exotic and rare, all in one place. The passion with which Priya and Vardeesh have created such a vibrant farm teeming with life, is quite contagious. Their farming skills and hard work is legendary, making the possibilities endless as they grow their farm. We look forward to many more visits to this wonderful place.

Awesome place. I loved the collection of all rare varieties of plants, trees and herbs. Enjoyed the delicious vegetables,fruits and berries and of course the company of Priya and Vardheesh. It's a place to go to rejuvenate, unwind and recharge. Priya always inspires me and brings me closer to nature. For me, a trip to Florida is incomplete without a trip to Ojhus.

Ojhus ‚Äì The Healing Forest üåø
I had a truly delightful and refreshing experience visiting Ojhus, a beautiful farm that feels like a step into nature‚Äôs lap. The place is thriving with a stunning variety of fruits and herbs ‚Äî many of them naturally grown, with minimal intervention.

What makes the visit even more inspiring is meeting Priya Vardheesh, a passionate and dedicated woman whose love for the land is evident in every corner of the farm. She‚Äôs wholeheartedly supported by her husband, making it a powerful team effort.

Their vision for the property is to transform it into a fully grown forest in the next three years ‚Äî and given the pace and purpose I saw, it‚Äôs absolutely achievable.

Ojhus isn‚Äôt just a farm ‚Äî it‚Äôs a living, healing forest in the making. üå±‚ú®

Nani Duggirala
