review_text: Great guy!

I was skeptical going in but out of any treatment center Ive ever been to, this place ACTUALLY cares about their clients. The staff is so so down to earth and understanding and they are all willing to help in any way possible with your recovery. I was avid hater of treatment facilities but Olympic truly won me over. It was truly like family. Even the higher ups were accessible and personable and truly a pleasure to be around. Steph and Meg truly helped me through my darkest times and helped me through some of my personal issues even in instances when they weren‚Äôt obligated to.  I could tell they really care and that this isn‚Äôt just a ‚Äújob‚Äù for them. They are highly interactive with the clients and go absolutely above and beyond to make our recovery and transition easy. I was never a big fan of therapy but I had the BEST therapist. Rebecca is another person who really cares, I was so comfortable from day one talking to her and she helped me realize ALOT about myself. Easily the best therapist Ive ever had and Ive had MANY. I highly recommend her and I wish she would be my therapist for life. The housing manager Chuck and the Techs are also unsung heroes there. EVERY one of them were helpful, kind, welcoming, and accommodating. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Brohnson. He‚Äôs really the glue that holds everybody together. Not only was he someone I consider a mentor and like an older brother to me but also a friend. He‚Äôs driven and hilarious and no matter who you are or what you‚Äôre going through he makes time to see about you. He never takes anything personally and handles every situation with a grace and poise I hope to achieve one day. Chuck does soo much behind the scenes to make our lives comfortable. He takes care of all of our housing needs and is always around if there‚Äôs an issue. He‚Äôs extremely personable and easy to talk to. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about him. I could go on and on about the amazing experiences Ive had with the techs there. KT, Tre, Amor, Jack, Carlos, Steven, I love them all. I don‚Äôt have a single bad thing to say. They all helped me immensely and never failed to drop what they were doing to come and see about me and my needs. Even my wants! Jackie my case manager helped me soooo much. She works so hard to resolve any issue we have and I never could‚Äôve gotten to the next stage if my recovery without her! She‚Äôs so nice and all of the clients love her, me included! Erin and Sabina the nurse and the doctor respectively saw about ALL of my medical needs including needs I didn‚Äôt even know I had! They truly care and have given me advice more than once about things not even medical related. I truly feel like I can go to them about anything and they‚Äôd sit and listen. I love them to death! Finally Ryan is the man who initially got me to come to OBH and I didn‚Äôt expect for him to be such an integral part of the community. He and Crystal not only get clients to come here and get help hut check in on them and see about them every step of the way. They are always around and available to talk and even now that I‚Äôve left the program they still check in with me and make sure I‚Äôm doing ok. I truly feel seen and cared for by clinical and the staff here and I know anybody who chooses Olympic to help them with their journey will feel the same way. It wasn‚Äôt just helpful it was fun and I will always cherish my time and family at Olympic. Thank you everybody! But especially thank you Steph, Meg, Brohnson, Rebecca, and Ryan for seeing me through. Yall are the absolute best! We do recover!

What a beautiful, family style program this place is! From the staff that clients deal with everyday, the facilitators and therapists, all the way to the top, I received nothing but love! They also never once gave up on me and my journey. What‚Äôs more impressive is that I definitely did not make it easy to stick by my side and yet they did anyway. Very comfortable housing and accommodations, fun outings multiple times a week and in depth, meaningful groups make this program thrive but I have to say my favorite part of the whole experience is the camaraderie within the community. There is very little divide between management, alumni and current clients and it creates a great space for continued care. Once you join this family you‚Äôre always a part of this family! I highly recommend Olympic to anyone in need of help, whether that be with substances or mental health.

Olympic saved and changed my life. The tools I‚Äôve learned I  not only can use for my sobriety but in my life. My level of awareness and open mindedness has opened a whole new perspective on life. Being my first time in treatment it‚Äôs been amazing the staff is great really care plus the living space is amazing everything you can even need very comfortable and I‚Äôm grateful for the experience .

I would like to take a few minutes to share my gratitude for a program that is beyond belief. I know you hear about facilities that have this and that one has that, but in my life I‚Äôve never seen an organization (treatment or not) that cares so much about the wellbeing of their clients.

All of the staff come to work each and every day with your best interests at heart! The Director of Operations has an open door policy, and unlike some places she welcomes you in and makes you feel heard!

The therapists, facilitators, case managers, alumni coordinators, technicians, nurses, and all other support staff are wonderful! They go out of their way to see you succeed and recover.

I can‚Äôt say enough about the experience I‚Äôve had at Olympic! I owe so much to them! Thank you so much for everything you guys did for me.

- Jesse

I can‚Äôt say enough amazing things about Olympic. Perhaps every Florida treatment center should adopt their treatment plan and care for clients like they do. Family is what comes to mind. No matter the day or time I could reach out with concerns and or questions. Special shout out to Meg for ALWAYS being there for my family member and myself. Rebecca is also amazing and kind as well as all therapists , techs and just all the staff. Clients do matter here. Kudos to having a clean facility and housing. It‚Äôs a rarity and everyone on Olympic staffing should be proud of that. Good job! If anyone reading has any concerns about the program‚Ä¶.dont. This is the place to send your family member or yourself.

On the Hop is amazing.  The first phone call with Geri to the six weeks working with Melissa and Joette were a pleasure. Their knowledge and skills were outstanding. They understood my fears and encouraged me to do more than I thought possible. I credit my speedy recovery from knee replacement surgery to their guidance and care.

I have been to other physical therapy places and this January I had a total hip replacement and I went to ‚Äúon the hop‚Äù physical therapy and let me tell you those ladies are amazing!  Melisa and Joette really care about their patients. They work with you to make sure your improving and getting better with each visit. . They give great advice to help you on your path.  Within six weeks I was back up and walking, no cane or anything and back to my old self without the pain. It is a very well organized and clean place. No waiting like in other places they know who you are when you come in and are there to greet you. I was so happy to be sent here, and will tell everyone that needs physical therapy to go here.
Thanks again,
Melisa and Joette
Your the best

I have been to several different places for therapy over the years but after my bilateral knee replacement I chose On The Hop Therapy and it was the best decision I could have made.  Joette and Melissa are the best.  In a few days I was walking without help.   The water therapy was great! They recognize your potential and push you enough to get you going.  Thank you for all you do.

On August 17th, I had bilateral knee surgery. I started physical therapy here a week later and I couldn‚Äôt be any happier. From the moment I walked in the door, the whole staff has been extremely polite to me. Melissa is as excellent as a therapist as she is a person! She is always in a good mood, has helped me tremendously, and keeps me motivated towards my goal of improving no matter how difficult it is for me. Jerry works in the front office and is always ready to accommodate my appointments according to my schedule. Joette is another PT and she has also made this process as painless and enjoyable as possible! Overall, they are all so experienced, professional, and easy to work with. I would give this place more than 5 stars if it was an option! A very friendly and clean environment. Highly recommend!

Allow me to begin by saying, On the Hop Therapy is the most organized, efficient, clean and client-friendly, physical therapy center I have ever had the pleasure of receiving service. Once you enter the doors you can readily see that all the equipment and aids are properly stored in identifiable areas for quick access. The three therapist, Melissa, Joette and Tracy and the receptionist, Geri, work efficiently and in concert with each other assuring each client is receiving the necessary attention, observation and continuity of service. Equipment is constantly being sanitized and linens changed after each use. This facility also has a pool from which aquatic therapy is offered. What a great bonus! Staff is not only extremely knowledgeable, but warm and friendly as well. They listen carefully to your concerns, and make suggestions and/or adjustments to accommodate those concerns. They maintain a friendly, jovial environment which helps you move more easily through your exercise routine. They will challenge you along the way but always within your capabilities. I am extremely thrilled and fortunate to have found this center. Thank you ladies for all that you do and the manner in which you do it. You are indeed a blessing to our community.

Tejas and the staff at A. C. Lewis YMCA really helped me get back to working condition. Thanks to all the staff at OnSite Physio as well, keeping me up to date on appointments and checking in on me during my roughest times. Wishing all of you the very best and thank you for everything!

My experience was a home visit and it was an excellent experience!!! I was a little nervous before starting but the Physcian made it easy for me to remain relax.  Acupunture treatment is a great way to naturally release any type of pain that you‚Äôre experiencing.

After hurting myself at work and in need of Onsite therapy. I appreciate the individual care and attention to my therapy. I highly recommend OnSite Physio with Dr. Matthew. I couldn't have done it without him. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

This place is the best. Not only did they get me back up and running, it was a pleasure working with the doctor. The front desk staff are awesome and very nurturing. The doctor works with your issues and coaches you. This place is the best.
They really care. And encourage you to get well but don't demand you work outside your comfort zone

Hi,

I have worked at one on one for 1 and 1/2  years and my experience has been nothing but exceptional.  I have had the chance of working among amazing therapist who are dedicated, professional and incredibly compassionate. The Owner is amazing, very present, always making sure we feel supported and heard.  Lastly, this company holds amazing qualities, a very   important one is that we provide services with integrity, honesty, dedication and compassion.

Working for One on One Behavioral Services has been a great experience. Our team is taught to work with¬†compassion and professionalism as exemplified by our amazing supervisor. Nothing less of excellence is what our clients receive during their services. The company is ever evolving as continuous¬†¬†training and education is provided for the staff. Looking forward to many more years of growing along with One on One Behavioral services!

Our experience at One on One was exceptional. From the welcoming atmosphere to the outstanding professionalism, everything exceeded my expectations. The therapist provided personalized care. The staff were always kind and accommodating, making the entire process smooth and stress-free. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone seeking effective and compassionate behavioral therapy.

I have had the privilege of being part of this company for more than two years. I deeply appreciate the company's commitment to the well-being of the families we serve and its dedication to creating a supportive environment for its employees. The company's strong ethical values and focus on doing things the right way have truly made a positive impact.

I've evidenced the work of One on One Behavioral Services on one of my students and it is magnificent! They also instruct very helpful hands-on and practical strategies for teachers to use.
Highly recommended.

I recently had my very first physical therapy appointment at onward, physical therapy and I can honestly say that it was amazing. I have never done PT before so I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect but from the moment I walked in I felt completely out of ease.

My therapist, Dakota, was incredibly attentive and kind. She didn‚Äôt just go through the motions. She really listened to me. Every stretch she had me do was tailored to my specific issues and I could tell she genuinely cared about helping me feel better. It wasn‚Äôt just about the exercises it was about understanding me and what I needed. That level of care is rare.

What stood out the most was how she made me feel like a friend and not just another appointment on her schedule. Her warmth and professionalism created a space where I felt safe, supported, and hopeful. I left feeling better physically, and emotionally and I‚Äôm already looking forward to my next appointment!

If you‚Äôre looking for a PT, who truly listens and treat you like a whole person and not just a case file onward, physical therapy as the place to go!!!

I‚Äôve dealing with a back injury/pain since June, and started seeing Dakota in September. The results I have had in just a few sessions has been amazing. I started to feel that I would never see an end to my pain and suffering, but Dakota immediately gave me assurance that we could fix this. She is always altering my home exercise program to fit my needs and challenge me in the best way possible, which I LOVE! Dakota has given me hope and more knowledge, which has led me to being pain-free. If you‚Äôre wanting that one-on-one time with a therapist that will listen to you and give you functional exercises then this is the place for you!

I am so grateful for Onward!! I look forward to my appointments with Dr. Dakota‚Äî she is so welcoming and really cares about her patients.  She has been incredibly knowledgeable and helpful with helping me determine root causes of issues I‚Äôve had for years. I feel I understand my body better and realized it‚Äôs not always hormones. I‚Äôve seen and felt improvements which in turn has made me better with my workouts and my day to day activities!  I highly recommend checking them out!

I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. Cheyenne for a couple of months now. I originally went after having prolapse surgery last year and experiencing lower back pain when getting back into weightlifting. I wanted to learn how to lift properly, and I‚Äôve learned so much more than that from her. She truly knows her stuff and takes the time to explain everything in a way that makes sense. The at home and gym exercises have been great after just a few sessions the pain was gone, my squats felt strong, and I was so happy! I‚Äôm now seeing her for a nagging shoulder pain I‚Äôve had for years, and after only two sessions I‚Äôve already noticed a big difference. I highly recommend Onward!

I cannot recommend Dr. Dakota Porter enough! I needed a physical therapist postpartum for help with rebuilding my pelvic floor strength. Not only has she been able to help me with that, she is also helping me rehab my back, which has had issues since before pregnancy, and it is going great! She is knowledgeable, personable, and genuinely cares about her clients. 10/10 would recommend!

Today I had my first session with Dr.OC, we did some warm up and then started leg workouts. I did one ab workout. After I left, I definitely felt the soreness in my body. Dr. OC did his thing. He‚Äôs definitely a good personal trainer.

I've been receiving treatment at Onyx Fitness Therapy & Sports Medicine for the past two weeks for right knee and back recovery, and I'm already so impressed with the care I've received from Dr. OC! From the moment I started, Dr. OC has been incredibly attentive and knowledgeable, developing a recovery plan that feels tailored specifically to my needs.  Dr. OC explanations are clear and easy to understand. / He is very encouraging and supportive during the sessions. / I can tell they genuinely care about my progress. I've noticed significant improvement in both my knee and back in this short amount of time, and I feel like I'm finally on the right track to recovery. The entire atmosphere at Onyx Fitness Therapy & Sports Medicine is welcoming and professional. I highly recommend Dr. OC and Onyx Fitness Therapy & Sports Medicine to anyone seeking excellent rehabilitation care!

Dr.OC is a BEAST, he is very kind and motivational. I can‚Äôt recommend him enough! From day one, he‚Äôs been incredibly knowledgeable, motivating, and genuinely invested in helping me reach my goals. His workouts are always challenging but tailored perfectly to my fitness level, and he constantly pushes me just the right amount to keep improving.

What sets him apart is his attention to detail‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs correcting my form, adjusting routines for progress, or simply checking in on how I‚Äôm feeling, he always makes sure I‚Äôm supported every step of the way. Beyond the physical results, I‚Äôve gained a lot of confidence and consistency thanks to his guidance.

If you're looking for a trainer who really knows what he's doing and truly cares about your success, Dr.OC is the one. 10/10!

Found this facility on google. Called right away and got Dr. OC on the phone. Made my first appointment and got a tour and free trail. It was great! Very informative, and welcoming. He asked my goals and what I was looking to achieve. He was confident that we can get there with coaching & training. It‚Äôs been about two weeks and so far I feel great, love the facilities, it has everything we need for a good workout. The environment is clean and safe. Dr. OC works with my schedule and I‚Äôm very grateful he‚Äôs working with me. Can‚Äôt wait for my results.

Dr. OC has lit a fire under me!  I decided to sign up with this trainer not only because of his reviews but because he had his own gym and was affordable.  HE IS WELL WORTH IT!  I have appreciated my training sessions with him so much.

When I say I HATE WORKING OUT, it is the truth!  But with him, it actually feels like I am leveling up like a video game character, lol.  In just a matter of 3 weeks, my endurance has exceeded my expectations.   Also as a female, I feel that he is highly respectful as a male trainer.  I have had trainers in the past that were male and it never felt quite right, with him, there are never any concerns and he is always appropiate when he helps you with weights or gives you a hand to get back up after a killer workout.

I didn't expect to find him but I am glad I did.  He has an extensive background in physical therapy, so not only are you training but he informs you with fact driven knowledge in the industry.  He creates blogs that keep you up to date with current health trends as well.  He is passionate about what he does and it shows!  I've attached a snippet from one of our workouts!  I can't wait for this physical and mental transformation with Dr. OC.

Onyx has been an integral part of my healing journey. The staff is wonderful and knowledgeable. Chefs were very accommodating and the food was great and fresh every day. The chiropractor was a huge bonus for my comfort during my stay.

Onyx Behavioral Health has been an incredible place for healing and growth. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcomed, respected, and truly cared for. They take the time to listen and create a personalized plan that addresses both the immediate challenges and the bigger picture of recovery.

The therapists are compassionate and knowledgeable, and the entire team goes above and beyond to provide support in a safe, encouraging environment. The facility itself is clean, comfortable, and designed to promote peace of mind, which makes focusing on recovery so much easier.

I‚Äôm grateful for the tools, guidance, and confidence I‚Äôve gained here. Onyx Behavioral Health doesn‚Äôt just treat symptoms‚Äîthey help build a stronger foundation for lasting change. I would highly recommend them to anyone seeking genuine support and a fresh start.

I had such a beautiful remarkable experience here. Meet so many unique individuals that had some of the same health issues as me so you never feel alone here. A month is exactly what I needed in order to regain confidence respect dignity and freedom. The 35+ staff I meet were awesome and caring always checking up on me to make sure you're straight. I would come back and recommend to anyone who's struggling with mental health. I view life so much differently now.

Onyx truly is an amazing place and I‚Äôll forever refer people to go there. Every single person that works there, is amazing. They truly care. Tiffany and Johnny are some of the best people I‚Äôve ever met and they run the facility. If you have a problem, they will fix it or try their hardest to accommodate you. The staff there are very kind, caring and supportive. They are very professional but also have big personalities, every single one of them. They are hilarious. I will say, the staff made my stay absolutely amazing. Autumn, Jean, Reese, Tim, Jay and Monica were some of my favorites. It felt like a big family that I was welcomed into with open arms. You will get the help you need here, you can choose which group facilitator you go to everyday so I chose to go to Ms. Debora‚Äôs groups everyday because she‚Äôs just an outstanding therapist. I got the most help I needed from groups, staff, and the other residents. They also do activities almost everyday there, game trucks/karaoke nights twice a week/petting zoo‚Äôs/painting/tie-dye nights/magic shows, bouncy houses. The list goes on and on. 11/10 I definitely recommend giving this place a shot! ü§ç

My experience at Onyx Behavioral Health has been absolutely life-changing. When I arrived, I was in a place of struggle and instability, but the incredible team here guided me step by step toward healing and growth. Their compassion, professionalism, and genuine care created an environment where I felt safe, supported, and understood.

The staff at Onyx didn‚Äôt just provide treatment ‚Äî they gave me the tools, structure, and encouragement I needed to rebuild my life. Thanks to their dedication, I‚Äôve reached a level of stability and peace that I didn‚Äôt think was possible.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this program. If you or your loved one are looking for a place that truly changes lives, Onyx Behavioral Health is it. They helped me find hope again, and I‚Äôll always be grateful

provider_name: Operation: SNIP Spay Neuter Clinic and Operation: SNIP Wellness Center
review_text: Great experience. Got my dog spay neutered and up to date with all of her vaccines. They took very good care of her. Everything healed fantastically, going back for her secondary after surgery checkup and inoculation. But everything has gone great

provider_name: Operation: SNIP Spay Neuter Clinic and Operation: SNIP Wellness Center
review_text: A great, affordable option for your pet to be neutered/spayed. Paid a $20 deposit, booked about 2 weeks out, got 10 days worth of pain medicine for my little guy and total was $100 (minus $20 deposit at checkout). They were efficient, kind and you can tell when a place takes care of the animals that come to them, I got a very caring vibe from all of the staff and watched them answer every question someone had. My cats incision site also looks clean and well done.

provider_name: Operation: SNIP Spay Neuter Clinic and Operation: SNIP Wellness Center
review_text:
I recently had my dog neutered at Operation Snip, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the experience. From start to finish, the staff were incredibly kind and made sure my dog felt comfortable and cared for. They clearly adore animals, and it was evident in how they interacted with him. They even kept him company while we waited, which made me feel more at ease leaving him in their care.

The prices at Operation Snip are really affordable, which was a huge relief. I‚Äôve looked around at other places, and I can confidently say that they offer excellent value for the quality of service they provide. The whole process was straightforward, and they made it an easy in-and-out experience. I didn‚Äôt have to worry about any complicated procedures or hidden fees, and they kept me updated on my dog‚Äôs status.

Overall, I highly recommend Operation Snip for anyone looking for professional, affordable, and friendly care for their pets. The staff genuinely care about your animal‚Äôs well-being, and it‚Äôs clear they want to provide the best service possible. I‚Äôll definitely be going back for any future pet needs!

provider_name: Operation: SNIP Spay Neuter Clinic and Operation: SNIP Wellness Center
review_text: This place is wonderful, I have been taking my 2 fur babies to Banfield, since acquiring, 8,9 years ago. I Just transferred to Operation Snip, they are so thorough and Reasonable costs to keep my dogs safe and healthy! Thank you for your service and wonderful, friendly and caring staff!

provider_name: Operation: SNIP Spay Neuter Clinic and Operation: SNIP Wellness Center
review_text: Excellent experience, a very friendly staff and affordable care!  Granted, I‚Äôve only had two experiences there. They were both good and I couldn‚Äôt recommend them enough.  By the way, does it help to know that I was married to a veterinarian for 12 years who practice with five other veterinarians in the same building so it was a decent sized Operation that was very successful and they had all the same qualities except they were way more expensive Than this place. And I‚Äôm sure everyone that works. There deserves more money than they‚Äôre getting paid because that‚Äôs typical of the nature of this business but at the same time I‚Äôm grateful you‚Äôre around to help people such as myself who can‚Äôt afford the services the most veterinarians offer.  Just wanted to say good job with communication and continuing to benefit the community with affordable animal healthcare.

I would love to give 5 stars.  The staff is wonderful. Angela was a godsend. Unfortunately due to the policy of charging   if you miss an appointment I decided to never come back. I had a silent stroke. It did some damage, especially to my memory and emotional regulation. (not to mention balance, .etc) So when I got ready for my appointment and realized I forgot to schedule a ride.  I freaked.  I knew I would be punished for forgetting.  I would be charged. The overwhelming shame I felt for forgetting was horrible.. I felt like such an idiot. I don't like to give money away for being stupid.  So I decided after my last scheduled appointment  to never return to a facility that would do that to a stroke victim... That policy, not the people is the reason I will never return... It's not even about the money,  it's about the way it made me feel...

The team and OPPT are professional experienced encouraging and personable. From my first session until the last you are greeted and made to feel welcome. Success is celebrated. Dr Matthew Shapiro is thoughtful and skilled in his therapeutic approach. I hope I don‚Äôt need to go back soon but if I do I know I‚Äôll be welcomed and challenged. Thank you to your team for literally getting me moving safer and more confident.

Angela Scamardella changed my physical well-being far more than I expected. I came to therapy to get ready for a hiking trip in Utah. When I began therapy, my gait was horrible and my balance even worse. She apparently chose all the correct exercises, because I  have improved 1000%. Thank you Angela, I am grateful and unafraid to go to Utah. Best wishes on a brilliant career.

I selected this Clinic (Hyde Park) because of its Google reviews. From my initial visit, greeted at the front desk by Carrie (you're going to love her effervescent personality), to my physical consultation with Jenna (exceptional PT acumen), I knew I had made the right choice. I had frustrating issues with my Medicare/Advantage Plan/Tricare programs regarding payments,üôÑ but Carrie went above and beyond to insure my resolve. Kudos üëèüèº
I highly recommended OPPTsüôåüèº!

From day one, the staff at OPPT was welcoming, efficient and respectful.

review_text: Everyone at OPPT works hard & has fun! They really make physical therapy enjoyable, while using considerable knowledge & talent to help us heal! review_text: Optimal Physical Therapy was by far the best place I could have gone to for my treatment. I suffer from functional Scoliosis, and the staff was extremely supportive of building not just strength for my back, but for my whole body. After starting my treatment here, I noticeably started having less pain to the point where I hardly have any pain at all with my condition. Not only that, but I could noticeably see myself looking better, both through my physique and posture. My entire quality of life has improved due to the incredible work that the Optimal Performance staff provided me throughout my time there and truly acted as the best support system I could‚Äôve had in my journey. The environment so welcoming and uplifting from the moment I stepped foot inside, and from that moment I knew I was at a place that truly cared for their patients and wanted to see them succeed. If you live in the Tampa area and are looking for Physical Therapy places, Optimal Physical Therapy is by far the best place to go, I simply can‚Äôt recommend it enough. Thank you!!!!

provider_name: Optimal Performance & Physical Therapy - OPPT University
review_text: Oppt has helped me gain understanding and practical steps of how to better strengthen and care for my physical health. The care in this place is at their core. It‚Äôs a hidden gem.

provider_name: Optimal Performance & Physical Therapy - OPPT University
review_text: I‚Äôve been to many physical therapy clinics, and this one is truly special. Everyone here, from the receptionist to each therapist, is both kind and skilled. provider_name: Optimal Performance & Physical Therapy - OPPT University
review_text:
In the past 8 months I‚Äôve had 2 total knee replacements at age 70! Any movement was extremely difficult and sometimes painful during this healing process.
I was introduced to OPPT on BB Downs in Tampa for physical therapy 2x/wk. PT was intense and I was blessed to have a Physical Therapist, Emily that constantly encouraged me during my healing process. Emily is extremely knowledgeable and informative and I was able to share my humor to get me through the tough times.
The entire staff is warm, friendly and so caring, and now my PT family.
I would highly recommend OPPT on BB Downs for your therapy needs, they are the best!

provider_name: Optimal Performance and Physical Therapies Bayside
review_text:
As a fellow Doctor of Physical Therapy and, more importantly, the mom of a teenage soccer player recovering from an avulsion hip fracture, I truly can not say enough good things about Hannah. Her care, professionalism, and sports-specific expertise were exceptional from start to finish.
Even with my own clinical background, I knew my son needed someone who could connect with him as an athlete‚Äî not just manage the injury. Hannah did exactly that. She built a thoughtful, challenging, and individualized rehab plan that kept him motivated, focused, and progressing safely. Her ability to push him while keeping the process positive and fun was such a gift.
Watching my son, regain his strength, confidence, and passion for the game ( after being out for 9 months) was incredibly meaningful- and I have Hannah to thank for guiding him through it. I wholeheartedly recommend  her to any family with an athlete in recovery. She‚Äôs a standout clinician and a true professional in every sense of the word.
OPPT is a wonderful clinic all around with an amazing staff and Director!

provider_name: Optimal Performance and Physical Therapies Bayside
review_text: This was my first ever experience with physical therapy and I couldn‚Äôt be more happier with my results. From the front desk to the physical therapists, everyone was so nice! My sessions were with Ray and I couldn‚Äôt recommend him enough! He‚Äôs so knowledgeable and you can tell he genuinely loves what he does! I‚Äôm happy to say that I am pain free thanks to him. If you‚Äôre looking for physical therapy, please come to OPPT. They‚Äôre an incredible team!

provider_name: Optimal Performance and Physical Therapies Bayside
review_text: I had a great experience here. The staff are friendly and helpful. Hannah my physical therapist was brilliant and helped me immensely. Pushed me just the right amount. She welcomed questions and offered lots of helpful advice.  I am very happy with how much progress I have made in a short space of time.

provider_name: Optimal Performance and Physical Therapies Bayside
review_text: Best PT team in Pinellas! I have gone to several other providers, and Ray was the only one that made my back pain go away. He is very professional and I never felt like a "number" here. Hannah is also excellent and Gerry is always so efficient. I highly recommend them!!

provider_name: Optimal Performance and Physical Therapies Bayside
review_text: The Best PT in Clearwater Ray Moore! I am a highly Level Athlete and was brought here for my recovery!! The People that work here are VERY transparent and wants you to exit out better and stronger than you came in.

I've had an excellent experience with Optimize PT! I came in with a swollen ankle with tendonitis and arthritis, and Jacob has been outstanding in helping me recover. He is knowledgeable, friendly, and very detail-oriented. Every session included strengthening workouts, explaining and testing to make sure my ankle was truly getting stronger. He also created a personalized at-home PT exercise plan so I can continue building strength and preventing future issues. Thanks to his guidance, I feel more confident and supported in my recovery. I highly recommend Jacob, Lissan, and Optimize PT to anyone looking for professional, effective, and personalized care!

I went to optimize for several months after labrum shoulder surgery and could not have been more pleased with my experience. I played 5 years of D1 college softball (University of Illinois and Jacksonville University), so I have had my fair share of physical therapists. It is hard to come by someone who truly cares to understand your specific needs and Jacob took the time to listen and push me to be at my best. He is constantly trying to grow and learn more in his field, which is also something that is hard to find in PT nowadays. Jacob was able to find the balance of pushing me while also listening to my body. I would HIGHLY recommend coming here for any of your needs because both Lissan and Jacob helped my recovery go smoother and better than I could have ever imagined.

Jacob was the absolute best PT I could have asked for!  He was patient and kind with my daughter who was so nervous about injuring her ankle again- He really is great with young athletes!  Very knowledgeable, warm, and open and upfront about recovery time, pricing, etc.  No complaints!  If you have a teenager who needs physical therapy- use Optimize!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Optimize Physical Therapy & Sports Performance. Dr. Jacob listened, explained the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind everything, and combined dry needling with a personalized exercise plan that gave me the confidence and tools to get back to running. The level of attention and customization was outstanding. Highly recommend Optimize‚Äîfive stars.

To put it simply I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience. From the first day I walked in and got all set up with Lissan I knew I was dealing with professionals. Then after meeting Jacob I was assured I came to the right place. Jacob helped me overcome tightness and pain in ways I never thought imaginable. He is very knowledgeable when it comes to our human body and how it reacts to all sorts of stimulus and exercise. He takes a very responsive approach to physical therapy and doesn‚Äôt beat around the bush, he is results driven. Not only did he fix me but I also learned a ton! Couldn‚Äôt recommend Optimize enough, thanks again!

I cannot say enough good things about Optimum ABA therapy Margate and their staff!! My son is autistic and 4 Years old . He has been in OT and speech most of his life. my son has only been going to Optimum ABA for less than a year and has Excelled more at Optimum Therapy,  then he did at his one year of school and 2.5 years of OT and speech!

Optimum ABA and their staff is amazing. they are very attentive to my child and my reasonable requests. They have put so much into my son & I can‚Äôt imagine him leaving the school One day but I know he will graduate and reach a level where he can. I‚Äôm so thankful of everybody in the staff.

Your child is in good hands!!!

You guys are AWESOME!üôå

Dr Elizabeth Oreo is knowledgeable, and very thorough. She put me at ease and answered all my questions. I‚Äôm happy I was referred to her for physical therapy. The staff was friendly, efficient and helpful.

"Dr. Oreo provided a fantastic experience! She is incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to explain everything in detail, ensuring complete understanding of my situation. The care provided was thorough and helpful.
