provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text:
This was my first chiropractic adjustment, and I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better introduction than with Dr. Michael Gampolo. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was welcoming and professional. Dr. Gampolo took the time to listen to my concerns, explain the process clearly, and made me feel completely at ease throughout the entire appointment.

The adjustment itself was smooth and effective. I felt immediate relief and a noticeable improvement in my range of motion. What stood out most was his attention to detail and genuine care for my comfort and overall health.

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text: This review is long overdue.  I found Dr. G in 2019 after a car accident I was in. From the moment I walked into his office and met him and his staff I knew I had found a doctor that cared more about the patient than anything. I had went to another doc after a previous car accident and it felt like all he cared about was getting the insurance money.  But Dr. G was different. He wanted to help me and was more focused on me feeling better.  6 years later and I still see Dr. G and look forward to my visits.  I have a life long back injury from my accident in 2019 but with his help it does not limit my everyday life and he has taught me what to do when it acts up so that I can manage it till I can get into him.  The office staff  is always amazing at helping me get in quickly if I have something come up and need an additional adjustment because of something I did that upset it. I‚Äôm beyond grateful for Dr. G and can honestly say he saved my life because that kind of pain can make people think some dark thoughts and he helped me get out of that pain and get my life back!

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text: We had an excellent experience with Orlando City Health and Wellness. My son was experiencing back discomfort after playing basketball, and the team was incredibly thorough, professional, and caring. From the very first visit, we felt welcomed and well supported. Dr. Michael Gampolo took the time to listen carefully, explained everything clearly, and created a personalized treatment plan that helped my son feel better quickly. We‚Äôre truly grateful for their expertise and highly recommend them to anyone dealing with sports-related injuries or back pain.

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text: Everyone was very nice but unfortunately, I felt like an afterthought at this office. There were days when I was brought to the back, and given one exercise while the staff went to help other patients in different rooms. When I finished my exercise, I'd be left sitting there waiting for what came next. After waiting for a while, someone would come out of a room, say,  "Hey Brittany, all good? That's it for today." and I'd be sent to the front to schedule the next appt. I'd get less than 10 minutes of treatment. They seemed more concerned with car accident patients with attourneys while I was using insurance. There were 2 visits where the PT working with me was on the phone with someone discussing his car the whole time not paying me any attention for the first 10 minutes, then would say he had to go and that someone would be with me soon. He'd grab his bag and run out the door and I'd just be sitting there for the next 20 minutes until the Dr came out of the room and said "Hey Brittany, that's it for today." and send me to the desk. Of the maybe 7 visits I attended, only 2 of them were actually productive. I really wanted this to work out but unfortunately, in my time of need for relief and treatment, I was left feeling like I wasn't as important as their other patients. It left a bad taste in my mouth and I haven't been back to PT in nearly a year because of it. I am now ready to move forward with my PT journey but unfortunately, it will be elsewhere.

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text: I saw Dr. Gampolo for the first time two weeks ago in excruciating back pain. I was very emotional and desperate for some relief - especially being postpartum. Dr. G made me feel like I‚Äôve came to the right place and truly wanted to help me. Within the first two weeks I already had an x-ray, MRI, countless adjustments, shockwave therapy, and much more. It‚Äôs rare to find providers that care so much about every patient - Dr. G treats everyone like they‚Äôre his family. Highly, highly recommend Orlando City Health!!! Oh, and the other providers/staff are phenomenal!!

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text:
Dr. Nicole has been absolutely awesome throughout my physical therapy journey after a car accident I had back in December 2024. From the start, she made me feel comfortable and cared for, which made a tough situation so much easier to handle.

She really knows her stuff and is patient with me when I forget the names of my exercises. Each session she makes sure my session is structured to where I am that day, and she always pushes me just enough to keep improving without ever making me feel overwhelmed.

Thanks to her, I‚Äôve made a ton of progress and feel stronger and more confident than I did when I started. Not only is she super knowledgeable but she is also kind, supportive, and down-to-earth, I can‚Äôt recommend Dr. Nicole enough!

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text:
Came in to see Dr. Cruz with shoulder pain . He did an assessment and quick adjustment.  Signed me up for treatment explaining everything I need to know. Very nice office and excited to be getting treatment with them.
Update: been with them a few weeks now and my shoulder is starting to feel much better. They've been super flexible with my schedule. I'm super happy with the improvement I've made so far üòå üôå

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text: I have seen Dr.G for Chiro care years ago and he was amazing.  I recently needed additional Chiro care and immediately sought out Dr.G.  His newer location in Baldwin Park is bright, beautiful and convenient. He has fully appointed the office both with staff and equipment. He offers so many health options in addition to standard chiropractic care. It's really a one stop shop for wellness.  And the people working with Dr.G reflect the level of compassion and expertise that he holds himself.  I can't recommend this office highly enough.

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text: Dr Cruz is a very Professional and caring doctor. Im impressed with the thoroughness, gentleness, and the focus on wellness. He is also knowledgeable about discussing my xray results, treatment plans, my insurance, and showed/sent exercises to do at home. I hope this doesn‚Äôt sound creepy, but his hands were soft, helps very much with healing my neck problems. I felt the difference right away on my second visit. This is a busy clinic but I never felt that they are rushing to get to the next patient or the other patient in the next room. I had a doctor like that who is also very good, but was very busy moving from one room to another to see multiple patients. I got tired just watching him. Lol.  Orlando City Health and Wellness is i a great and safe location in Baldwin Park! The staff are very nice and personable too. I highly recommend this place for chiropractic treatment.  Thank you!

provider_name: Orlando City Health and Wellness - Chiropractor, Physical Therapy & Massage
review_text: I came in with concerns of pain and movement in my neck. The staff were very knowledgeable, understanding and extremely efficient. Due to my new insurance policy they updated it swiftly. They informed me of the new changes and benefits on my policy. Dr.Cruz wasted no time seating me, then understanding my concerns and what was bothering me. I got a thorough adjustment while he explained what he was doing before doing it. At the end of my adjustment I told him I felt better but he wasn‚Äôt satisfied. He tried a less common adjustment and wow did it work! Talk about almost instant relief. What a great experience!

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children
review_text: Great hospital the staff on the 3rd floor was very attentive to my daughter after she had her spinal fusion . my daughter Skyler loved the nurse Taylor she was her favorite ..They also did well for my son on the Neuro side as well a few months back highly impressed . I did have to come back the following week due to my daughter having issues unrelated to her surgery but we ended up on the 5th floor which the team was equally attentive to her needs the only thing i would take away is i can tell  the nurses were very new . all in all our stay was great on both floors ‚Ä¶the hospital is very dated but I did hear they are making some renovations . I still left grateful we got the answers we needed regarding my kids health and their treatment moving forward ‚Ä¶The doctors were amazing here as well Dr Cardin  and Dr Battar thank you üòä

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children
review_text: My first time at the hospital and it was an amazing experience. Omg! The doctors were clear and always checking for my son before and after his surgery. During recovery we spend 5 days at the hospital and every single person coming to the room from the housekeeping to the leader of the nurses were so professional and always asking if we need more. The room service for the food was an great benefit. The food was delicious and it was delivered to the room on time and hot. Love it! I will recommend Arnold Palmer Hospital to anyway.

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children
review_text: We always have a positive experience at APH and this instance was not an exception.  Excellent: caring and loving staff with plenty of knowledge to make patients feel heard and safe while undergoing scary procedures.  Thank you for making Emma feel special.

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children
review_text: This place and every single caring soul that works at Arnold Palmer was so amazing at such a traumatic time in our life! Our sweet baby Ella is doing sooo much better! Their fast response to my baby is really not ok, took my breath away! With all of our hearts we thank every single one of you!!!

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children
review_text:
Son was sent for possible seizure activity. The team at Arnold Palmer was quick and friendly through the whole experience. We were admitted as soon as possible. They treated my son so sweetly and gave him everything we needed. Big props to Nurses Taylor and Coco!!

Did want to mention an older doctor in the ER before being admitted (glasses, male, caucasian) who wasn't very friendly and seemed very dismissive. He entered with a younger doctor who was informing us that they needed more information from the neurologist. After that information he made a comment about how "we better hope it's not a tick, because those are untreatable." We didn't need that kind of negativity right off the bat with our son not even being admitted yet, while he was having the episodes right there in front of us. My concern is you have someone like that working in a CHILDREN'S hospital.

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children Feeding Difficulties Center
review_text: I can not even express my gratitude tp Arnold Palmer. It was a life changing experience for us. Everybody was so kind. It was a positive experience from the smiling faces at the front door to the doctors, nurses and therapists. My son was In the feeding difficulties centers. They helped us to overcome so many things and put on on a healthier path. I am forever grateful. Such a wonderful place.

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children Feeding Difficulties Center
review_text:
The Arnold Palmer Feeding Difficulties Center is AMAZING! My son has been to two previous therapists to address his feeding but neither compares. We‚Äôve learned more in one day than any length of time with the other programs. My son is well on his way to developmentally eating properly and he‚Äôs only been in the program for one week.

If you‚Äôre on the fence, go for it! Make that phone call. There is a highly professional and competent team capable of working with your child.

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children Feeding Difficulties Center
review_text: The doctor and staff were warm and welcoming. He took the time to answer all of our questions. We are excited to start this journey.

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children Feeding Difficulties Center
review_text:
The feed clinic my son attend is awesome. They are so professional and friendly.
My son started making progress the first week.keep up the good work APH difficult feeding Clinic.

provider_name: Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children Feeding Difficulties Center
review_text:
I am compelled to give this establishment a one-star rating due to the distressing experience my daughter endured during her evaluation. It is deeply unsettling when you place your trust in professionals who are supposed to understand and cater to your child's special needs, only to have her mistreated and her disability overlooked.

Since that experience, my daughter has developed a refusal to eat her favorite foods, relying solely on liquids for sustenance. She has experienced nightmares, expressed fear of leaving the house, and now suffers from separation anxiety, struggling to interact with new people.

I sincerely hope that this organization prioritizes better training for their staff in caring for children with special needs, as no other child should have to go through what my daughter did.

provider_name: Orlando Health Cancer Institute Oncology Speech Pathology
review_text: Brittnee was my NP and was proficient and professional in detailing the results of a recent heart valve CT w/contrast. She showed knowledge about the node in my lung and all follow up procedures options. She listened to my queries with patience and was able to appease any fears/concerns I had. I was assured of the plan I agreed to and given a prompt follow up schedule. I haven‚Äôt received my results yet, but I was able to get an expedited diagnosis once they (the results of a full lung CT)came in by the technician doing the CT today. The Orlando Health Cancer Institute is a ‚Äòpolished‚Äô organization and it‚Äôs care providers beyond reproach. Thank you: Brittnee/NP-Orlando Health Cancer Institute and Amy-Orlando Health Imaging in Oviedo for your kindness and support. Prayerfully awaiting my results.

provider_name: Orlando Health Cancer Institute Oncology Speech Pathology
review_text: Dr Herrera has such an amazing bedside manner. He is so soft spoken and truly cares. He makes sure he answers all your questions. Brooke,NP, is also amazing. She also has a great bedside manner. She is great at explaining everything to you. She makes sure you understand everything before she leaves the room. She takes her time with you. I can‚Äôt ask for a better team to take care of me especially during such a difficult time.

provider_name: Orlando Health Cancer Institute Oncology Speech Pathology
review_text: I'm still in the beginning stages of my cancer treatment but so far I'm very impressed and happy with the care, concern, and overall kindness shown to me at Orlando Health. Everyone on the whole staff has been terrific.

provider_name: Orlando Health Cancer Institute Oncology Speech Pathology
review_text: I was there to get my first harmone shot getting ready for radiation treatment. It stars at the reception desk. You are greeted with smiling faces. Very professional. The nurse who gave me the shot was very friendly and again greeted with a smiling face. Everyone makes you feel at ease while you are there.

provider_name: Orlando Health Cancer Institute Oncology Speech Pathology
review_text: Dr. Hernandez and his team work so good together. They are caring and compassionate.  Dr. Hernandez takes his time to explain in detail  the treatment and what to expect. When I have a concern or a question, I feel comfortable with the answer that he provides based on his academic background and experience.

As a 38 year old mother of two littles, my life is hectic and my body has taken a beating over the last six years. I have consulted and been treated by Dr. Brandon for two separate issues and was blown away by his expertise and ability to ‚Äúfix‚Äù me.  My first issue was mobility and pain in my shoulder (the arm I carry my kids with). After ignoring a small pain and decreased range of motion, until it was excruciating and debilitating, Dr. Brandon not only treated me but gave me a plan of movements to do at home. After about 3 weeks my shoulder was completely pain free and my range of motion improved tremendously to allow me the ability to perform movements I had never been able to achieve. Fast forward to a year later when I injured my knee. The level of pain in my knee was so severe that I was not able to sleep at night or bend at a 90 degree angle. After seeing an acupuncturist and  massage therapist with no improvements, I was about to see an orthopedic surgeon but I wanted to try Brandon before potentially having surgery. After about 6 months of PT with Dr. Brandon,  my knee is fully healed! I am able to walk, run and lift weights again. Dr. Brandon is incredible and full of knowledge. Aside from healing, Dr. Brandon will get to the root of your injury and give you the tools to keep your body in optimal health. Instead of ignoring that small pain, ache or stiffness, go see Dr. Brandon!!

Brandon has saved my professional waterskiing career! I was basically debilitated when I started seeing him regularly in May. I had virtually zero abdominal function, my back hurt so badly I could barely put on my shoes, he has taught me how to ‚Äúturn on‚Äù my core and SO MUCH MORE and I am back to skiing at about 90-95% quality & 75% volume. I‚Äôm confident that working with him in my off season is going to take me to the next level in my skiing in 2019!!

I highly recommend Dr Brandon Keilman to anyone who is looking to train in strength and conditioning and achieve your personal best. Dr Brandon is both a Dr of physical therapy and a licensed strength and conditioning instructor. At our first appointment he performed an FMS (Functional Movement Screen) with our son to get a full assessment of his current strengthens and weaknesses. This is so incredibly important to building a personal strength and conditioning plan. All of Dr Brandon's programming is customized based my son's individual needs, it's not a "one size fits all" program and that's been the key to his dramatic gains. Dr Brandon trains holistically. Your son or daughter won't just get stronger, but faster, gain balance, increase mobility and correct asymmetric issues that need to be addressed so that you can reach your potential. This is the value of working with someone that has the unique knowledge of physical therapy and strength training.  Lastly, my son and Dr Brandon have an incredible relationship. Dr Brandon is highly professional as well as someone who truly cares about his clients.

Guys. If you are having any issues, come and see Brandon. I've had shoulder issues for several years and after multiple attempts via the VA, physical therapy, cortisone shots and other ideas that didn't work out right, I reached out to Brandon.

I've been seeing him for 4 weeks and during that time I've had major improvements in not only my shoulder, but in my overall mobility. I've made some large gains the last several weeks working out and some great results while golfing as well. I went from not being able to use my shoulder to much greater improved mobility.

He does a great job of explaining in great detail what I need to do and makes sure I have it down prior to me leaving our sessions. He's easily reachable with questions and even provided me a detailed plan for making sure I get everything in when I need to.

Go see him. He'll take great care of you.

Joe Schrimsher

When I met with Brandon I'd been experiencing shoulder pain for a couple of years. I tried several things but nothing helped. After a month of following Brandon's protocol I was 100% pain free and back playing tennis. I call him every time I have an Orthopedic problem. He's a superb Physical Therapist.

Dr. Tara has been an AMAZING therapist for my dad. He suffered from a very severe stroke at the end of August, and for almost a month afterward he was unable to move his right side. After being discharged from acute rehab he regained some mobility, but had a long road ahead. Not being satisfied with outpatient therapy only 2x per week, I looked for ways to supplement his therapy, which is how I found Dr. Tara.
I'm so grateful that she offers a way to receive high quality physical therapy for patients who have suffered from strokes.
Dr. Tara is extremely knowledgable, professional, and dedicated to her patients. You can tell that she really cares about her patients, and has the expertise to help them get better.
In the few weeks since my dad has started therapy with Dr. Tara, I have noticed a big difference in his strength and mobility. His ability to stand up on his own has gotten stronger, he is able to walk (assisted) for longer distances, and his range of motion has improved. I"m excited about his future progress in the weeks ahead! I plan on having my dad work with Dr. Tara for as long as we live in this area because I know that his progress will jump by leaps and bounds with her help.

Our sessions with Dr. Tara Tobias were beyond incredible.  We had discovered her online and found her videos so exceptionally helpful that we had to see her in person.  It is one of the best decisions we have made regarding therapy and recovery.
My husband, Sheldon, had a massive stroke almost 4 years ago, was able to walk short distances with a hemi walker but had virtually no movement with his left arm.  After just a couple sessions, Tara, was able to encourage Sheldon to walk without an assistive device‚Äîmerely with her guided touch and coaching.  Seriously!!  It turns out he was replacing his affected leg with the hemi-walker and not really progressing his walking.  With a smaller footprint, he now walks daily at home without any assistive device (my guidance) and is transitioning to a hiking stick with the goal to actually walk on his own.  We could not believe this was even possible before working with Tara and learning his underlying issues.
Working with his affected arm, Dr. Tobias was able to get Sheldon to mentally connect to his arm and manage some movement.  Sheldon has spasticity and the stretching component and working with her to get extension has been amazing.  Again, Tara provides a clarity of understanding and solid tangible solutions.  She has even left us with a tailored home program.
Tara‚Äôs talent as a diagnostician is superior to all prior therapists and neurologists we have worked with.  She provides insightful observations and exercises that progress your goals.  You will amaze yourself as to what you can accomplish.  Tara has a positivity that is enhanced by her skills, knowledge and experience engendering trust and confidence.  To say our experience was thrilling is an understatement.  Sheldon‚Äôs achievements and growth are inspirational and will bring him to a new level.  Dr. Tobias has made a significant difference in our rehab and recovery as well as opened our eyes to the possibilities.

I found myself one day having lost the ability to move my legs. After a week in the hospital, I was diagnosed with idiopathic transverse myelitis.

Upon discharge my doctor stressed the importance of starting my physical therapy as soon as possible. When I called to set up my initial assessment. I was given a date of 1 month out. I was scared and felt like I needed to start my rehabilitation sooner than that. My wife went on line and found Tara who specializes in neuro-physical therapy. She agreed to see us immediatly for evaluation.

Her office is clean and very welcoming. One of the main advantages of Tara over other physical therapists is that she talks in the same language that my doctors were speaking in. This helped me feel like everyone was on the same page for my treatment plan.

Not only did Tara help me with the problem I came in with, it was her that told me that I didn‚Äôt need her anymore. She instructed me on how I could continue my rehab at home.

The last thing you need to know about Tara is, she‚Äôs a happy person. Someone with a genuine smile. She will be the highlight of your day as you walk an uncertain future if you‚Äôre dealing with nerve damage.

I highly recommend her.

Our son had a tenotomy surgery in both legs.
We found Tara doing a big search in internet and for the first visit to the last, we are always stoked to see the difference. Thank you so much Tara for pushing our son every session to get back to full range of motion and no restrictions.

We have been to another therapy office, when we lived in another area, and we can say that we never found a person so dedicated to her patients. Tara has helped our son to recover physically, and she has helped to improve our son‚Äôs spirit as well.
My husband is an Orthopaedic Surgeon and he has been around long enough to recognize superior performance in the medical profession.
She is always studying the best way to help our son and improve how he walks.
Our son has improved greatly in a very short time and we are happy to continue counting on Tara every week!.

Tara Tobias is a very skilled practitioner in Neurologic Physical Therapy.
In addition to being very talented, she is very creative, kind and inspire hope that hard work will be rewarded. We will highly recommend Tara to others. Thank you so much!

Tara has made a tremendous difference in my life! When I first started doing PT  with Tara I was using a walker & a wheelchair. Tara has patiently worked with me to retrain my brain and nervous system to walk again. Less than 2 years later I am now using just a cane outside & can walk confidently inside. She worked with me to walk down the aisle at my son's wedding. Now my goal is to go on a trip to Paris & London & be able to navigate the cobblestones!

Orlando Pet Crematory is a great place to cremate your furry friends. We had to cremate our Yorkie after she passed, and the vet where we took her wanted to charge us $400 for the cremation plus the urn, which was insane. This place only charged $95, which was very reasonable. They gave us a beautiful urn, her paw print, a piece of her hair, and a certificate of cremation. I really recommend this place if you‚Äôre planning to cremate your furry friends.

Many thanks to Janene and Kevin. The previous crematory I've used in the past closed due to the owner retiring and their lengthy renovations. I've conducted my research for my current needs.  I found Orlando Pet Crematory and read the reviews based on their high score.  I didn't know what to expect as far as appearance since they are located within an industrial area.  I was truly surprised!  They have a cozy waiting room, offices and a conference room where I sat with Kevin to discuss my 14 year old cat, Kiki's remains. He took his time and explained the process: fur clippings, paw print and certificate, and showed me the urn Kiki will be coming home in, a lovely white with grey marbling with a large cat paw on the cover.  Classy touch comparing the generic plastic white container that I gotten from other facilities.  He took my specific fur clipping request:  Kiki had a raccoon-like tail. Kevin drew up the contract. The price is very reasonable and competitive compared to my past experiences; I have cremated several cats at several different places. I asked if I could pick her up the next day, perhaps, the same time.  He said, yes.  I talked about her as a loving furbaby parent would.  He said, they are like family to us.  Kiki was ready to come home the next day.  When I came in, I was greeted by the owner, Janene.  Such a warm and caring person! She presented me with a small brown shopping bag and went over Kiki's contents and how to open urn if I wanted to transfer ashes. If I had a problem, to come back and they will open it for me. I received the certificate, paw print and Kiki's clippings.  I felt a great sense of comfort as we discussed our pets and what they mean to us.  It was a pleasant experience.  They have a nice selection of urns and the prices are reasonable.  Kiki was treated with respect and dignity.  I am very satisfied with how she was handled and the professionalism and friendship both demonstrated to me.  I truly recommend Orlando Pet Crematory.  Janene and Kevin, thank you, again!!

We used their services when our beloved dog passed away. The gentelman who came to pick up our boy was very respectful and kind. That happened on Friday. We were explained what would happen afterwards and we were given a timeline. On Monday we received a call that our boy is ready to go home to us. We picked up the ashes the same day. Again, everything went smooth.
We also received a paper cerificate that our pet's body had been handled with respect and dignity. That meant everything to us!
The price was very fair and we paid exactly as quoted.
Thank you for all you did for us!
There's exquisite sensitivity and exceptional attention from the staff, and the prices are much lower than at other places. Thank you for helping us bring Max home.

Orlando Pet Crematory was very professional and caring when my beloved Vizsla mix Roberto died. They cared for him with dignity, I highly recommend them. Their prices are also very competitive, their response time is instant. I called them at 2am and Eddie was available to take down my information. A few hours later he picked up Roberto, very professionally and his ashes were returned to me the next day.
Thank you üôè

I have been seeing Dr Byrd for 8 months. She has been caring and supportive during my treatment. Dr Byrd has been patient with my slow progress. With adjustments and a new medication she has giving me a better quality of life.
Thank you so much.

I came to Grbac as ordered by the court, seeking assistance with a reunification process for my daughter and her estranged mother. After explaining the several red flags to Grbac for which I feared having my daughter visit her mother without supervision. Grbac not only two-sided my worries, but also provided her mother‚Äôs attorney with a letter which made me seem like an angry, jealous, non-Cooperative parent. The letter stated that I didn‚Äôt ‚Äúwant‚Äù my daughter to visit with her mom. Grbac always found a way to explain how a person who jailed another with false accusations was misunderstood, how a person who consistently and maliciously lied may have done it simply and innocently seeking ‚Äúmore time‚Äù with her daughter. Well this past Jan 28th I received frantic messages and calls from my daughter requesting to be ‚Äúrescued‚Äù, that she no longer wanted to endure the constant attacks, interrogations, verbal abuses and more from her mother. The mother who drove her from Miami at over 90mph for having requested to be rescued, the mother who yelled at her week in and week out for no reason, the mother who constantly told her that I was an abuser, the same that had a continuous pressure campaign for my daughter to request for more time with her mother. I would advise that anyone seeking a professional look for a place where one exists. If you‚Äôre looking for someone who will want you to come by his office 4x a week for $200+ per visit when you have explained your financial situation well then Grbac is your hole in the pocket. Dr Garbage is a more fitting name.

I've known Dr. Grbac for over almost 20 year. He is a highly skilled, competent and caring person and provider. Regarded and respected in the community and skilled in working with legal cases regarding parenting evaluations, parental reunification and divorce as well as couples counseling, individuals, teens and children. I've had many clients who've worked with him over the years who've spoken his praises and have disclosed that their work was extremely helpful. I highly recommend Dr. Grbac and his team to clients and colleagues.

What a let down. Madison/Sherry confirmed a schedule 2 weeks ago only to find out that it wasn‚Äôt added into their system. I had to excuse myself from work and pull my son out from school to make this work. If this is a preview of how their establishment operates than it was best we left it at that.

Also note that I‚Äôve been put on hold for 30 minutes in multiple occasions to be added into their schedule because the other line was ringing. What happened to common courtesy/phone etiquette?  Looks like they are understaffed, inept or just not trained well.

My first impression of Dr. Pedemonte was that she was a knowledgeable and well-purposed professional; however, OPA and Dr. Pedemonte charge outrageous hourly rates for not only BEYOND sub-par editing standards (My last name was misspelled the incorrect way 4 times in two different  ways), but evidently also a huge lack of professional standard with apparent pretentious and misrepresentative statements. I would recommend you find someone that puts more care and time charging $200 an hour. This is an abhorrent example of what a mental-health provider should be to their patient and should not be tolerated.

Johnny and Kately are amazing. I‚Äôm so glad i chose this location. They both really listen and assured me that my feelings and pain are normal. I had a posterior labrum repair. I could see massive improvements after just the first week. I would recommend them to Al of my family and friends. They have what seems as the latest technology which was important to me too.

I cannot begin to describe how kind and knowledgeable Sarah has been throughout my recovery. She answers any question I have with clear and understandable explanations and provides the empathy needed to navigate this challenging time.

I've also had the pleasure of regularly working with Shane who consistently challenges me in ways that lead to progress while understanding and listening to my needs. I am incredibly grateful for Sarah and Shane and the hope they have given me through this journey.

The team at the Altamonte Springs location is outstanding, I actually look forward to my PT sessions. The entire team offers constant encouragement, and I receive valuable feedback on my progress. At Orlando Sports Medicine, you‚Äôre not just working with your physical therapist, you‚Äôre working with an entire team. This makes the mentally tough days of recovery feel a little easier.
Dr. Johnny is the ultimate professional who cares about giving the best treatment.  He does it with kindness while helping the client make good progress.
The staff at OSM are very friendly and work as a team to ensure your comfortable and use proper form as you complete the variety of movements to help your injury heal. Johnny is a great therapist!

I truly have loved this place and everyone who I have worked with. They not only helped me get back to where I needed to be but it‚Äôs clearly evident that they love what they do and that it‚Äôs more than a job to them.

I‚Äôve been working with Brittany Kilduff at Orlando Sports Medicine following my knee surgery, and it has been an excellent experience. Brittany is knowledgeable, positive, and incredibly friendly‚Äîshe truly makes the recovery process more manageable and even enjoyable. The facility is always clean, and the equipment is modern and well-maintained. I feel confident and supported in my rehab journey. I absolutely love working with Orlando Sports Medicine and highly recommend them!

I started PT here after having a very intense knee surgery. My DPT Gabriella has been amazing! She‚Äôs extremely knowledgeable and helps put my mind at ease by answering any questions I have. She is also very attentive to detail and is always making sure I‚Äôm doing okay and not hurting too much. Everyone in the office helps each other out and it‚Äôs a great positive environment to recover in. I 100% recommend this office to anyone!

My experience with Orlando Sports Medicine College Park has been amazing. The entire staff is top notch,kind,considerate, and caring. I have had multiple knee surgeries with many complications and I am glad I found help from people that really care. Dr. Brittany Kilduff has been my physical therapist and is extremely knowledgeable but more importantly listens to her patients. I have no complaints. I know I will be leaving therapy in better shape than I arrived. I actually look forward to going to therapy because I know its a positive environment.

The Scheduling Staff,Physical Therapy Assistants, and all the Physical Therapists on staff are the best you can find. If anyone is looking for a place to recover from injury I would look no further than Orlando Sports Medicine!

I can't say enough great things about this sports medicine practice. Brittany was my physical therapist, and from day one, I was so impressed by her breadth of knowledge and expertise. When she initially tested my range of motion, she could even accurately predict what would hurt and where. Under her guidance and care over the last two months, my hip has stabilized (whew!) and I have a go-forward plan on how to strengthen it to avoid future problems.

Brittany definitely takes the time to listen, to answer questions, and to guide and make sure I'm doing my stretches and exercises properly. And when I came in with a freak back issue, she helped me with that as well, and even emailed me over the weekend to make sure I was okay, in case I needed her assistance on the fly.

I would 100% recommend this practice to anyone who is looking for top-quality physical therapy in Orlando.

Darshan is great.  He works closely with his clients and doesn't push you to do more than you can
Great facility.
Working with him has been a pleasure
and I can see the difference already.
He's 5 star.         - Merrill S.

Orlando Sports Medicine was highly recommended my Ortho Surgeon and the in patient PT at Advent Hospital. Their exact words ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt go anywhere else!‚Äù So here I am a current patient and my experience has been absolutely phenomenal. After my TKR Matt Cooksey and Miguel Castro have been instrumental in helping me regain my strength and range of motion. They have been emotionally encouraging and supportive. I‚Äôll finish by stating the same words I was given‚Ä¶Don‚Äôt go anywhere else!

I recently completed a 3-month, x2-week rehabilitation program at Orlando Sports Medicine in Waterford Lakes. I underwent ankle surgery with screws and plates, and my physical therapist was Matt.

If I had the opportunity, I would highly recommend this establishment and give it a perfect score of 10 stars. From the moment I arrived, Matt demonstrated exceptional knowledge and compassion. He was attentive to my injury, ensuring that every aspect of my recovery was prioritized. Matt was punctual, always pleasant, and professional throughout my treatment.

My orthopedic surgeon had projected a 4-month recovery time, but Matt managed to get me back on my feet in just 2 months! My surgeon  also believes this practice is the best in Orlando, that's why she recommended Orlando Sports Medicine in Waterford Lakes.

The entire staff at Orlando Sports Medicine is incredibly friendly and accommodating. Their work ethic is evident in their ability to provide effective physical therapy regardless of the severity of the injury or the age of the patient.

If you or your loved one is in need of physical therapy, I highly recommend Orlando Sports Medicine. Matt and his wonderful associates will make your recovery journey easier and more enjoyable. Thank you, Matt, for making my recovery so much smoother.

My surgeon suggested I was a laminectomy candidate based on my MRI. I was avoiding surgery, and working with the PT team at this location has been very impressive. The reviews are accurate, very talented team. Working with Danny and Brooke I can feel the improvement in my lower back, and my symptoms have become a lot manageable. Good stuff at this location.

I recently had a shoulder issue where I could not move my arm and was in a great deal of pain.  I went to Orlando Sports Medicine and Bill worked on my shoulder.  After the first session my mobility was greatly improved and the pain was gone.  After running the course of my sessions with Bill my range of motion returned to normal and i am on my way to a full recovery.  Thank you Bill and Orlando Sports Medicine.

Orlando Sports Medicine,  Waterford Lakes, is a wonderful place to get physical therapy.  It's a very friendly environment and makes physical therapy fun. My Therapist, Mathew Cooksey, is the best. He's patient and very good at what he does.  I highly recommend this facility for your rehabilitation.

I've been seeing Mallory for about a year no,  and it has been one of the best decisions I have ever made for myself. Mallory is affirming, easy to talk to, professional, knowledgeable, and has amazing therapeutic insight. The environment is very calming and welcoming. I definitely recommend Mallory and Orlando Thrive Therapy for anyone needing help!
I had a great experience with Cindynela! She was supportive, professional, and easy to talk to. In just a short time, I felt real progress and would definitely recommend her.

I love coming here! The environment is very welcoming as soon as you walk in. Grace is amazing, and I look forward to getting to talk with her each session. She is so easy to open to and knows her stuff. She has truly helped me. Coming here was my first time going to therapy, so I was nervous going in. Grace has made me feel very comfortable, and I have seen so much progress. Definitely worth it, and I couldn't recommend her more!

Debra at Thrive has expertly guided me through major life changes, helping me stay grounded in an understanding of who I am, while I establish health boundaries and interactions with others. I highly recommend her.

I‚Äôve been seeing Grace since May and I‚Äôve really noticed the change in myself since then. She has helped me navigate the next major chapter in my life and all the hiccups along the way. I‚Äôve been putting off therapy for a long time but I‚Äôm glad I finally made the choice to go. She is easy to talk and super friendly. She is always easy to get a hold of if I need to switch an appointment or anything. The office vibes are relaxed and welcoming. I would definitely recommend see Grace or coming to Thrive.

Absolutely WONDERFUL staff! I had to say goodbye to my best girl this morning and they went over and beyond for myself and my girl. Could not have asked for more compassion from someone. I love this place and the people that work there. They care and it shows! Thank you, to everyone there thank you for making a difficult time a little easier‚ù§Ô∏è

The assistant was accurate and knew my dogs nail had to come out before the Doctor walked in and the Dr confirmed it .
I was able to get the procedure for my pup in a timely, considerate and successful manner with follow up meds and have gone to the OB vet for 25 years

It was wonderful and so relieving to take my dog Jack to Dr Pagan yesterday after a long gap . She is so very kind , compassionate and knowledgeable .I have been taking Jack to Dr Pagan since 2018. Jack needs special care with his super sensitive stomach and Dr Pagan makes sure he is getting the best care he could get .Thank you Dr Pagan for the services you have provided to jack all these years. Also I must thank Kasey for her valuable time to call  me in person to set up the first appointment. She has been very kind and considerate  ever since I knew her . Thank you so much Kasey for dealing with Jack's wrath and temperament. I've known them for more than 6 years and they are the best as a team. Jill, at the front desk is super nice and kind . My family wish you all good luck with the new beginning.

This place should be shut down. Period. They are blatantly taking advantage of pet owners and have zero accountability. My dog has chronic gum disease and has been on and off antibiotics and steroids for years. About five months ago, they convinced me‚Äîagain‚Äîthat she needed more teeth pulled (this would‚Äôve been the seventh time), and charged me over $700 for the procedure. Then, after taking her in, they suddenly decided they couldn‚Äôt go through with it because her X-ray showed "too much bone loss." Did I get a refund? Not a single penny.

But it gets worse. Now they refuse to refill her chronic meds because they fired the last vet (who was incompetent anyway), and the new vet apparently can‚Äôt review her medical files. Their solution? Charge me again for another visit. How is that my fault? Maybe they‚Äôd have some continuity if they could actually keep a vet on staff for more than a few months.

And remember that $700 "X-ray"? Yeah‚Äîthey conveniently lost it. So now I have no proof that it was ever even taken. This place is a joke and a scam rolled into one. Avoid at all costs unless you‚Äôre fine with being drained financially while your pet suffers. Total disgrace.
We have used OBFV for over 20 years. Though our beloved Dr. Burke is no longer at the facility, those who have inherited his  patients have also inherited his heart for them.

Danielle and her staff could not be kinder and love dogs more than they do. They were all passionate about really assisting our Jade. Jade is 13yrs old and had torn her CCL about a month ago, not a candidate for surgery due to age and other issues. She was in pain and could not use her back left leg, that‚Äôs when I found Ortho Paws on google and the amazing work they do.
The initial consultation was incredible, they took over an hour to chat to us and really talk about what they thought would work. That‚Äôs also when the cast was taken of the damaged leg.
Then a week later we went back for the fitting, again no rushing and all the time in the world to show me how the brace works and how it should be put on.
It‚Äôs been 2 weeks now and Jade is doing so well with her brace, she lies down when I want to put it in and she knows the brace means a walk. A walk with no pain! For the most part Jade has adjusted to her brace and really seems to know she can make use of that leg now.
The process takes effort and consistency from us as doggie parents, but really has made a difference to Jades quality of life. Danielle‚Äôs team reach‚Äôs out for feedback, videos and are also available for adjustments if needed.
I would highly recommend Ortho Paws.

From all of us at Big Dog Ranch Rescue ‚Äì and especially from our sweet girl Nola ‚Äì we can‚Äôt say enough about the incredible team at OrthoPaws.

Nola‚Äôs journey has been heartbreaking and inspiring. She was rescued in early 2024 after spending her entire life chained to a tree, bearing scars around her neck and missing all her teeth from years of gnawing for freedom. Even worse, she was missing her hind ankle from what a vet confirmed was an act of cruelty. Malnourished and heartworm positive, she was finally set free by a homeless man living in an abandoned house before we were able to bring her to safety.

After months of care and healing at Big Dog Ranch Rescue, Nola was finally ready for the next chapter ‚Äì learning to walk again and live the full, active life she deserves. OrthoPaws was the only prosthetic company willing to take on her complicated case. From the start, their team has been a godsend. They created a custom prosthetic ‚Äì now lovingly called ‚ÄúThe Nola‚Äù ‚Äì and have gone above and beyond, visiting the ranch personally to cast, fit, and adjust her device, checking in constantly, and truly becoming part of Nola‚Äôs journey.

Thanks to OrthoPaws, Nola is taking confident steps into her new life. Their dedication, compassion, and expertise have meant the world to us. We are forever grateful for their partnership and recommend them wholeheartedly to anyone looking to give an animal the gift of mobility and freedom.

‚Äî The Big Dog Ranch Rescue Family

AMAZING!! I rescued a 8 yr old tripod Great Dane named Bleu and when I found Orthopaws I knew they would be able to help him. Within a week they had me in for an appointment custom measuring my pup and making him feel so loved and special from the second he walked in. We had his prosthetic within weeks. Came in for another appointment where they had a party hat and balloons for our boy Bleu. They custom tailored it to him right then and there. When we got home Bleu took off on his new leg and I couldn‚Äôt believe it. If you are considering orthopedic help for your pup you have found the right people and place at Orthopaws.Danielle, Camille, Taylor we love you. Thank you for all that you do for our pups!! üôåüèªüôèüèª

Following two incidents over an 18 month timeframe, our 10 year old, normally active Husky went from being walking and running around to being assisted with a sling to walk and get around the yard.  We found OrthoPaws while researching various Orthopedic solutions, since surgery was not an option in our case, we decided to contact them to see if they could help in anyway.

Less than two weeks after receiving the custom leg brace he gets up on own, is walking about with absolutely no assistance.  He is starting on short leash walks to help rebuild the lost muscle tone he previously had.

If it weren't for Danielle and Camille we really thought our beautiful Husky's days were numbered.  Now we know there's still many wonderful years ahead.

The ongoing follow-up with OrthoPaws is absolutely great as well!!  You can send email or make a phone call with ongoing treatment questions, send photos and videos, etc... you will always receive an informative response, usually within hours, versus days, from my experience with other locations.

As a dog owner of 40 years, and primarily Huskies, who has seen a fair share of dog health issues, I can strongly recommend OrthoPaws for their services, knowledge, skills and professionalism!!

Thank you Danielle and Camille!!

I recently took my dog, Chance, to Ortho Paws for a brace, and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. After calling several places, Danielle stood out with her exceptional responsiveness. She quickly arranged for us to come in, even accommodating us from West Palm Beach.

During our visit, Danielle expertly molded Chance's arm and crafted a perfect brace for his leg. Her professionalism and care made the entire process smooth and reassuring. I highly recommend Ortho Paws for anyone in need of orthopedic solutions for their pets. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

First appointment was so efficient (completed paperwork online) and had zero wait time.

Staff/Dr was friendly from reception to seeing Dr Cheong.

He was professional and very easy to speak with (listening) and spoke in "Layman's terms" about results of my x-rays and provided candid feedback and options that were non-invasive.

Took his time to understand my situation - although it was truly one of the quickest visits that was thorough and most helpful for next steps.

Saw Dr. Cheong for my right knee.  Dr. Cheong reviewed my x-rays, answered my questions so I could understand my options and make an educated decision.  He was very professional and personable.  Spent quality time and I did not feel rushed.
Dr. Cheong, was very easy to talk to and quickly diagnosed my hip pain. He implemented a non surgical plan for a full recovery. I would definitely recommend him!

This is the second surgery Dr. Koslin is going to do in 2023, he did my left hip he done such an amazing job I have no problem with that hip at all so that's why I chose him to do the right hip he's such an amazing orthopedic very professional very understanding and he explains everything in detail so you can' understand it the staff there is wonderful they're so polite and generous words can't I express how greatful I am that I chose him for my orthopedic surgeon he is the best in my book and always will be my surgeon

I actually heard a nurse in the waiting room here say that everyone comes in and gets an injection before they leave... the doc came in with a pre-filled injection form even before he examined me and despite the fact that I told the nurse I didn't want to be pushed towards masking the issue instead of finding ways to actually make it better/ manage it better. The doc basically told me he couldn't do anything for me because I didn't want an injection, even conceding that I didn't really need one anyway but if I change my mind to come back and see him... I definitely got the vibe that they go through volume vs quality and try to sell as many injections as possible. Just be careful... those injections might reduce pain (temporarily) but they also degrade healthy tissues, which means your condition gets worse faster and you'll have to go back for injections increasingly often.. what a brilliant business model!

To start the staff here is super friendly. They greet you by name when you walk in. Johnathan my PT was a great guy and very knowledgeable. I came in with a spine injury and little hope for relief. After a couple months I left my last appointment feeling great and laughing with Johnathan. Highly recommend for anyone seeking help with any pain/injury.
I just wanted to personally thank Johnathan White and the staff at OPTA for delivering great rehabilitative care involving my recent knee revision surgery. Great job!

Everyone here goes above and beyond
You get greeted with a smiling face upon arrival. They really know their stuff and how to get you to recovery. I have enjoyed working with everyone but especially Paul and Clarke who help me so much.
I highly recommend you go here for your rehab.
The best place for physical therapy.  Saw Clark today and he did an amazing job, felt so much better  after.

Paul is a very well experienced physical therapist. He is very polite, professional, and attentive. The office was always very clean and the staff was always very friendly. I never waited more than a minute or two past my appointment time to be seen. The time spent with Paul was always very productive and he always addressed all of my concerns. I never left feeling like I didn't have all the information needed to heal quickly. The exercises he customized for me to do at home were very helpful and well explained. My recovery was always his top priority. I highly recommend Paul or anyone else in the office for your physical therapy needs.

While Dr. Savarese is talented, his staff is totally lacking. They will not call you back and totally ignore your needs. I have called there no less than (10) times in the last week. I am in need of an epidural because of a pinched nerve. I have conveyed the extreme pain associated with this dilemma. My arm is 100% numb. On two occasions, I have even called them with my with my insurance company on the line and this was ignored as well. My recommendation is to steer clear of this group.
Great first experience with Dr. Snyder. The front end staff, and the tech that brought me to the exam room were all great. I highly recommend over Southeast Orthopedic Specialists.

Very clean, kind, efficient. Staff and Dr. Bell are very knowledgeable and for my first visit put me at ease. From ill fitting brace from ER to high tech very expensive knee brace that sure works better. Fracture of knee cap. Can‚Äôt bend for 4 weeks. New brace has side tha t will be adjusted when I start rehab. Homebound for awhile. Poor hubby.lol

Immediate family member has had more procedures than I care to count.  Avoid this place like the plague. Two doctors have done multiple procedures and he's walking worse now than he was when he started with this outfit and is one surgery away from a wheelchair. You can call all you want this time and request that I remove this review-good luck!

I‚Äôm a patient for life now as Dr Picerno is a fine Christian man who has always been a doctor who will pray for and with his patients and family. I have never felt so seen and heard by any other doctor in my lifetime. I truly believe that he loves his patients.

Dr. Jeffery W.Martin, M.D.
was the most smart, professional, informative and engaging Medical Doctor I have visited in my 64 years.
His demeanor exceeded confidence, making me feel totally confident in  his knowledge and opinions.
He gave me two very good options and explained both with what the expected results would be.

I am delighted that I chose him.
An amazing very proffesionsl experience.

The staff was extremely efficient and pleasant. They introduced themselves to me and told me every thing was going to be done. Jeff, PA showed me my X-ray and described what the issues are and gave me several options for treatments. I felt he listened and responded appropriately to my concerns. I am very pleased with my care and would certainly refer friends and family to them.

Very positive experience. Professional and respectful of my needs. Dr. Marino was great at explaining my condition and answering my concerns. A good listener and very supportive. He and his staff have my respect and recommendation.

This Group of Orthopedic Doctors is the absolute best around! From when you walk in till when you walk you are taken care of kindness, compassion, expertise, knowledge and caring concern. Dr. Gaines is a great Physician and is willing to listen, share his knowledge & feedback, have a conversation about your concerns  or questions. Very soft spoken & calm. Interested in your well being & care. Been going to them about 10 yrs now and couldn't be more pleased with care I've been given.

I have to say that Dr. Martin is awesome. He did my total reverse surgery on my shoulder. I have a tattoo where he cut. He lined it all up nice. His bedside manners are awesome. The staff in his office are very nice. I have nothing but good to say about him.

Melanie is an amazing speech therapist. We trusted her with our daughter and saw great improvement in a very short period of time. Her level of communication and professionalism is unparallel. Melanie maintained clear expectations and used her skills to bring our daughter out of her shell. A child with speech delay has a limited voice. Thanks to Melanie, our daughter found hers, improving not only her ability to articulate words but also her level of confidence. In a few words, Melanie is an untouched diamond in the rough. I strongly recommend her for speech therapy services.

provider_name: Outback Animal Clinic: Proutsos Regina DVM, Bouton Rachel DVM
review_text:
Great place take your animal family members.
Nice and clean. Large waiting area. Everyone is caring and friendly. Couldn't ask for better service.

provider_name: Outback Animal Clinic: Proutsos Regina DVM, Bouton Rachel DVM
review_text: We have been coming here for years. We have laughed and cried together. You are treated like family. Can't thank you all enough for taking care of all my babies.

provider_name: Outback Animal Clinic: Proutsos Regina DVM, Bouton Rachel DVM
review_text: Dr and staff very friendly and paid a lot of attention to my corgi baby. Clean and well run.

provider_name: Outback Animal Clinic: Proutsos Regina DVM, Bouton Rachel DVM
review_text: Dr. Proutsos has been our vet through 2 cats and 4 dogs. She is overly generous of her time and care. She will not suggest unnecessary care for your pet. This is her calling, not just her business. It's unique to have a doctor of any sort tell you when they're over the head but she will- and she'll point you in the direction of someone who can help. She has helped 3 of our loved ones pass with dignity and is in the trenches with us to currenrly save our 5 year old. I would trust no one else with the care of our 4-legged family. We adore her and the rest of the Outback crew.

provider_name: Outback Animal Clinic: Proutsos Regina DVM, Bouton Rachel DVM
review_text: I have taken my cat as well as my mother brings her Yorkie here! Always pleasant. Great dr‚Äôs.. cleanliness.. assertive.... well educated on what is best for your animal. Would definitely recommend!

review_text: Impressive facility with top notch staff from the front desk to the hands-on therapists. Professionalism, cleanliness and knowledgeable which is a rarity now a days. He not only treated my back, but also  set me up for success for when I no longer had PT. He took into account my lifestyle and  routine and found ways to incorporate the exercises so I continue to be consistent. I recommend Garrett and this facility without any hesitation!

review_text: The PT Rehab team worked with me on my shoulder and neck issues for about 6 weeks.  Along with PT exercises to do at home, I am feeling significantly better.  Thanks Garrett, Gina, and Kelsie for their patience and encouragement to aid my recovery.

provider_name: Outpatient Rehabilitation at TGH Medical Village
review_text: They were amazing I had the pleasure of working with a few of them they are all nice give you great workouts even from the comfort of your own home and if you don‚Äôt understand something they explain it in other ways. The results speak for themselves improvement across the board.

provider_name: PETS Pet Enrichment and Training Solutions, LLC
review_text: Brandi was amazing. She came to our house in St Pete and met with our pup Callie who's been dealing with some separation anxiety when we leave her at the house. She was so good with her and gave us such great advice and encouragement. After she gave us a full report to remind us of all the training we received in great detail. Would highly recommend her to anyone who needs a dog trainer!

provider_name: PETS Pet Enrichment and Training Solutions, LLC
review_text: Brandy was wonderful with our  6 month old golden doodle puppy.  We learned so much from her and how to properly train Birdie. She also had such a calming  influence on our puppy and Birdie adored her. Brandi also has experience training many different types of animals. Would highly recommend having  Brandy help you to train your pet.

provider_name: PETS Pet Enrichment and Training Solutions, LLC
review_text: We are very grateful for Brandi‚Äôs knowledge, guidance and support in helping  us with our now year and a half chihuahua, dachshund rescue pup. Our pup had never had a good vet visit and after the worst visit at her yearly check-up we knew it was time to seek help. With Brandi‚Äôs simple lessons, patience with us as we were learning just as much as our pup, we have a happy, calm pup who has good vet visits, great daily walks and outings with us everywhere pups can go. Call Brandi today!

provider_name: PETS Pet Enrichment and Training Solutions, LLC
review_text: Brandi is a true Gem, both my dogs and myself adores her. Brandi helped us through puppy stage to now an obedient teenager in a gentle and fun loving manner. Thank you Brandi!

provider_name: PETS Pet Enrichment and Training Solutions, LLC
review_text: Brandi has worked with our new puppy and our 9 year old dog with wonderful results. Her puppy training program was in-home and truly helped our latest rescue fit quickly into our family. Her methods are clear, consistent and kind. At 5 months old, our puppy is walking loosely on a leash and has excellent puppy manners. Any time a new puppy challenge popped up, Brandi was there to gently show everyone what to do. She also helped our older dog with some behaviors we just though weren't fixable such as going bonkers every time someone walked by our house.  If you have a new addition to the family or a dog you've loved a long time but could use some help with, Brandi is definitely the person to call!
Affordable and impressive customer care. They help me and answered all my questions!
Mandy is very helpful and s√∫per friendly!
Daniela is the best!!! The Garoffalo family appreciates a lot her amazing service and kindness. We‚Äôve been customer for years. She understands our needs and she‚Äôs always very helpful.
The best customer service! Amazing people that make you feel like family. Gilda is pretty kindness and they explain everything to you. Their professionalism is to be commended.
Very friendly helpful and knowledgeable staff. I sincerely appreciate your help. Keep up the good work . Excellent customer service.

From the moment I walked into Physical Therapy Specialists I felt at ease and welcomed.. professional courteous staff greeted me..
I was then evaluated by Mikey, my physical therapist.. he was knowledgeable, courteous and thorough explaining my plan of care.
At each therapy appointment Mikey guides and encourages every step of the way..
I‚Äôve also observed the other therapists and they are also engaging in the same manner.
I highly recommend this therapy group.

Everyone here is amazing! Each therapist really takes the time to note the changes your body goes through as you are progressing through the treatment of your injury. They have pushed me very hard in each therapy session. I highly recommend them.I have been fortunate enough to work with Mike and Dylan. Each of them is great and has made me feel more confident with getting my body back to feeling like new.

The congenial and professional atmosphere is evident as soon as you walk in the clinic door. The front desk staff are consistently friendly and professional. The clinic operates efficiently; I have never waited more than a few minutes to be escorted into the back area. The rehabilitation area is well-equipped and impeccably clean and organized. Cleaning and sanitizing the tables and equipment is done before and after each patient. All of the staff members appear knowledgeable and totally focused on their clients. I have been working with Mike D‚ÄôAmelio for the last month and couldn‚Äôt be any more pleased with the results. My headaches are completely gone and my range of motion has increased considerably. I have been especially impressed with Mike‚Äôs hands-on skills and his ability to quickly identify and target my trigger points and source of pain. After driving to the facility, my neck is usually stiff and achy. After the forty-five minute session, I am virtually pain free and much more flexible. I highly recommend Physical  Therapy Specialists.

Life changing, truly! I've had issues for many years with my neck and back. I'd pretty much written it off to just get progressively worse and do what I can to slow it down. I didn't want medicine, so my doc suggested therapy. I figured I'd try, maybe it might help? Wow! Little did I know just how much it would! I feel immensely better and am inspired to keep it up at home. I feel stronger in my core and extremities than I have in years. From the front desk (thanks, Michelle!), to the 1st visit, to each session, you'll get the absolute best care. I saw each employee consistently perform professionally and kindly while getting the best out of their patients. Special thanks to my therapist Dylan - I truly am now not afraid of being able to walk in 20 years, all because of your caring torture! If I ever need PT again, you'll see me back!

I appreciate the work this clinic does. My main therapist was Natalie and she knows what she is doing and she tried the best to help me improve with my injury and my daily routine. And she was honest about possibilities and reality. I recommend her. The front desk staff is really nice too, people person and always tried to work with the scheduling in a constructive way.

Second time visiting and have amazing things to say. Greeted by a sweet staff member. Place is so clean which is nice to see. The nurses and doctor we have see are very professional and thorough. We get in and out in less than an hour with no appointment. I am so glad this place opened up. Keep up the good work!

Had a very great experience here when my child got sick and also had an allergic reaction. The staff was extremely knowledgeable and well mannered. Very polite, friendly, and easy to understand when explaining what to do with medications and treatments. Will absolutely go back if something ever happens again. I recommend to anyone with children in need of care.

Today was the best doctor experience I‚Äôve ever had with my kids (and I love their regular pediatrician so that‚Äôs saying a lot). Both my toddlers were sick and at 9am I was able to make last minute appointments for 10:30/10:45 the same day when their regular doc office wasn‚Äôt answering the phones. The wait wasn‚Äôt too long at all and the receptionist was so wonderful. She gave my kids organic juice while they waited and even offered them snacks! They took such good care of my babies today and were so patient with them. My son was able to give them urine and they didn‚Äôt force a catheter for him. The PA even went to ask for a second opinion. I love how kind everyone was and my kids left with prices for being good. So grateful!

Went in at 1057am and left by 1114am. The nurse and doctor were wonderful with my daughter. She felt safe the entire time and that made my mommy heart happy. She tends to be a bit weary with doctors, but they really created an environment in which she was comfortable in. The visit was quick, effective, and efficient. Very thankful to have found this pediatric urgent care. I drove from North Miami to this location because of the reviews and was not disappointed. A+ to the team!!!

We were able to get on the schedule ahead of time (really just right before leaving the house) so didn‚Äôt have to wait. Check in was super easy and fast and they called us right back. The nurse was so kind to all of my babies and did a great job soothing my infants to be able to get their vitals. After the nurse came in I didn‚Äôt wait more than maybe 5 min for the PA who quickly diagnosed my infants and treated them. She also saw we had my toddler with us and brought him stickers and bubbles. Everyone was so kind and the whole process was quick and easy. We had a wonderful experience.

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: My daughter was seen tonight by the RN with the blonde hair and the MD‚ÄîI wish I had caught their names. They were both incredibly sweet, knowledgeable, and professional. The care we received was brief but thorough and very well explained. Every time we come here, we always receive excellent care. Thank you! Also love the check in very simple an easy no paper work

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: Staff was amazing. They took their time and made sure I understood what was going on with my daughter. The also took the time to go over treatment and things I can do at home to help with comfort and care. The doctor was very informative. He answered all my questions and concerns. We didn‚Äôt feel like we were just patients being looked after, they showed that they cared and our concerns were important. Thank you all for not only providing wonderful service but making up feel welcomed and important.

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: PM Pediatric Urgent Care was the only urgent care open after 8pm! I am so thankful they were open!! Everyone was so kind, even when we arrived close to closing time (almost 10pm) The new procedure they have for checking in is new and only a little user friendly. Received excellent care and a follow up call the next morning. Very pleased. Very clean location as well!

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text:
Hello ,

I wanted to personally say my experience when I went to this p.m. pediatric urgent care for my first time. I wanted to say how, number one the receptionist who was working at this time when I came to this location, I have to say very unpleasant. if you are working front desk anywhere in any company  you are the FIRST face that people see  when coming inside any buildings.

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: Amazing!!! The doctor was great, punctual, informative, and gentle. First time I took my daughter to a provider that was not their primary and I felt so relieved with the way he treated my daughter. I would 100% go back if necessary. Keep up the good work ü´∂üèæ

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. I arrived at 11 AM for my 11 AM appointment and wasn‚Äôt seen until 12:10 PM. I was the only patient there until someone else walked in, yet I was told all the other rooms were full‚Äîokay? Why even call it urgent care when there‚Äôs nothing urgent about it? They‚Äôre clearly too cheap and money-hungry to hire more staff, so instead, they just waste your time. The best part? The provider spent maybe five minutes in the room. If it was that quick and simple, they could have seen me much earlier instead of making me wait over an hour. Absolutely ridiculous.

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: I brought my daughter in and Shania at the front desk was so sweet to my girl. provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: Staff were very friendly, attentive and caring.  Once we were checked in, they called us in within minutes. I felt comfortable having my daughter seen there. Would definitely recommend. Thank you!

provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: We brought our son to PM Pediatrics when everything else was closed for the day and were incredibly impressed. provider_name: PM Pediatric Urgent Care (Formerly Night Lite Pediatrics)
review_text: This is the best PM Pediatrics I've been to. We're from out of state and they made the visit run as smoothly as if we were at home. Staff was very friendly and helpful, especially the front desk.

Our son has been part of PPEC of Palm Beach for three years, and the experience has been outstanding.  The nurses, therapists, and staff go above and beyond to provide excellent care and a warm, inclusive atmosphere.  He‚Äôs made friends, grown through his therapies, and genuinely enjoys being there.  We can‚Äôt say enough positive things.  We highly recommend PPEC of Palm Beach to other families.

As both a parent and an educator, I‚Äôve seen firsthand how vital specialized care is for a child‚Äôs development. PPEC of Palm Beach has been a true blessing for our 6-month-old daughter, Madison. From day one, the staff made it clear they are fully dedicated to each child's growth and well-being.
The caregivers go above and beyond to understand each child‚Äôs unique medical needs, offering personalized attention and forming real connections. They don‚Äôt just see patients, they see individuals with potential. The facility is clean, safe and welcoming. There‚Äôs a strong sense of care the moment you walk in.

One highlight has been the Peach Pit Therapy team. Their personalized, developmental support has helped Madison hit key milestones. Their thoughtful approach shows a deep understanding of child development.
I truly feel like the staff has become an extended family. Their teamwork, compassion, and dedication have made all the difference. We‚Äôre incredibly grateful for the love and care they've shown Madison and our entire family.
If you‚Äôre looking for a place that delivers exceptional, compassionate care for medically complex children, I highly recommend PPEC of Palm Beach

My son has been with the PPEC of Palm Beach now for six months. All I have to say is great things. I love the staff there and everyone has shown so much love towards my son. I trust all the staff with his care. There's always great communication between us. I'm so grateful for them all.

Thank you for all you do PPEC of Palm Beach!

PPEC of the Palm Beaches is a fantastic community who cares deeply about our children. My daughter is so proud when she brings home pieces of art that she‚Äôs been working on throughout the month. Nursing staff is kind, compassionate and caring, always putting the children‚Äôs needs first. With in house, speech, occupational and physical therapy my daughter is able to receive all the necessary hours of therapy to reach her goals and surpass expectations. PPEC of the Palm Beaches will allow tutoring through step up for students and insurance paid ABA therapist on site as well. I would recommend PPEC of Palm beach‚Äôs 100%

My son, who is six years old, absolutely loved his speech sessions with Melissa! She made learning fun, encouraging, and comfortable. He made so much progress! We‚Äôre grateful for her professionalism and kindness, and I would highly recommend her!

I would highly recommend PS Speech therapy and Ms. Krista. She has been working with my daughter for 7 months and we have seen so much improvement. Ms. Krista is attentive, patient and very kind every session. My daughter loves working with her. She makes every session fun! She is also very professional and communicates my daughter‚Äôs progress with me weekly, responsive, flexible and the at home option is very convenient.

Melissa is fantastic. Our daughter looks forward for her sessions with her were they worked building confidence and with development of social/conversational skills. Melissa gave us weekly updates and feedback. We are very thankful for all the improvement we have seen and highly recommend her and her team.

My wife and I are so thankful for Melissa! For the past year, our daughter has been thriving under her tutelage. We are so impressed with the speech work that comes home. We see how our daughter is learning through play and having fun. She loves going to speech each week and teaches us what she‚Äôs learned at home.
