I have had the pleasure of having Rachel as my primary PT and she has gone above and beyond 100% to meet several of my needs. I appreciate her willingness to do anything to accommodate me and help me any way she can. I have had other PT‚Äôs as well and they have been just as pleasant to be with. I have been coming here for at least 6 weeks now and opted to continue to come here for other problematic areas. Can‚Äôt say enough positive things about coming here and what a pleasant experience I‚Äôve had at EVERY visit! This staff deserves top recognition and dedication as a whole! Keep rocking it Hudson PT Solutions!

There are many aspects of this location that I like. it is a small and comfortable. Doesn‚Äôt have a factory feel with tables lined up close together.  The staff is friendly and professional. The therapist , Rachel I worked with was concerned for my comfort and any pain I may have been experiencing. Not all PT therapists have demonstrated that level of concern. The exercises were easy enough to apply at home and I am optimistic that Rachel will get my issues corrected.This was an excellent experience and believe me I am not a PT lover by any means.

I am thankful for the referral to PT Solutions. I entered the visit in pain. Tyler asked many questions to help identify why my body had such pain. He truly has a brilliant ability to target what is needed for treatment. Thank you Tyler!

I was so happy with the professionalism and friendly welcome, entering the front door. The young lady, I'm sorry,  I don't remember her name was very helpful. Daniel Perez was my PT technician and I was so happy with him. He was a very knowledgeable and thorough. Thank you

I am so impressed by the care and dedication shown by each and every team member here. This is my second go around with PT and I specifically chose to go to PT Solutions again because I completely trust their work. And, they're fun while we work. My case is complicated and they are eager to take me on and help in any way. It's refreshing. I highly, highly recommend PT Solutions if you need any kind of physical therapy.

My experience in PT solution was exceptional, the team from the reception to the  therapists are super professionals , they create for you an effective treatment and a much faster recovery since the therapy strengthens the affected areas, I congratulate them and recommend them 100%.

From Rosalinda Mom ‚Ä¶..Pt Solutions always have make my family feel welcome. They‚Äôre very professional on every aspect. We love the environment and caring. We recommend PT Solutions to anyone. Thank you!

It's been great!  All of the therapists are fantastic and very knowledgeable..  Always thorough in every session.  They always ask how you're feeling before they begin so they know the best course to take that day.  Will recommend them highly!

Great people there very friendly. Would highly recommend PT SOLUTIONS on HWY 98 NORTH LAKELAND FLORIDA for your physical therapy needs. I had a evaluation the other day the experience  went 10 out of 10üëçüòÉüëçüòÉüòª  Recommend to everyone go try for yourself üòÑüòú Have a great safe day.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Lakeland - Christina Lake
review_text: My daughter Arabella receives treatment here for knee/hip dysplasia, and the instructors are outstanding! They adapt to her limits while encouraging progress, never pushing too hard. On tough days, they help her push through with kindness. The whole team genuinely cares, and we‚Äôve seen great results. Highly recommend!

provider_name: PT Solutions of Lakeland - Christina Lake
review_text: Very nice and accommodating staff. We didn't feel rushed at all like most places. They really took the time to get to know us and were very thorough. Highly recommend! Thank you!

provider_name: PT Solutions of Lakeland - Christina Lake
review_text:
The place is spectacular. They make you feel welcome. The receptionists are friendly and consistent with patient appointments. They demonstrate care and discipline. Little by little, I've been noticing progress. I give it a 10/10. So happy.
Celia

provider_name: PT Solutions of Lakeland - Christina Lake
review_text:
I began physical therapy here in August of last year. Initially, I contacted several locations to ensure they had experience with hEDS and could provide appropriate treatment, given that it is a less common condition. I was fortunate to speak with Andrew, who kindly agreed to oversee my care and support my recovery from surgery, with attention to gentle treatment and listening to my needs for breaks.

In November, I needed to pause my therapy temporarily due to some healing challenges. Once I received clearance to resume, I was met with a warm and welcoming team. They consistently listened to my concerns and gently reminded me to take breaks when I needed them, helping me avoid further stress or injury while still encouraging me to regain my strength.

Every day at PT is a positive experience; the physical therapists genuinely make you feel welcomed and appreciated, always attentive and caring. The front desk staff is also outstanding, going out of their way to assist. I truly appreciate everyone‚Äôs kindness and dedication. It will be bittersweet once my treatment concludes, as I‚Äôve had such a wonderful experience with everyone there. Special thanks to Tatyana, Carter, and Claudia!

provider_name: PT Solutions of Lakeland - Christina Lake
review_text: This place is AMAZING! The front desk associates helped me for a WHOLE day switch my daughter from where she was previously going! The PT Carter was AWESOME at working with my daughter and explaining things and great at listening to our concerns and expectations! We are so unbelievably blessed to have found this place!

I'm very impressed with everyone--from the front desk to my personal Physical Therapist, Taylor. She's top-notch in her expertise & ability to know exactly what I need to progress on my journey of healing. The whole place is upbeat and a joy to visit.

Dr.Melanie Ziaiaris is one amazing therapist. Her personal concern for my condition was exceptional. I owe my speedy recovery to her expertise . The support staff were very professional and friendly. Appointments were always on time. Check-in and payment options were was done with ease. I highly recommend Melanie & Pt solutions.

Today was my second visit and I am very happy in Taylor's care. She listens and is sensitive to my needs. I am actually looking forward to the healing process at PT Solutions. The staff has been very friendly as well. Thank you all!

I went to PT Solutions 3-4 years ago. I loved them so much I requested my ear Dr to put an order in to go back to them. They are trained in maneuvers to help with displaced crystals in the ear. They are also excellent in handling normal PT for knees, which is what brought me to them initially. Thank you, thank you, thank you.ü•∞

All the woman here are literally so nice. I feel super supported in my recovery from my ankle surgery. I‚Äôm also a single mom and they have no issue with me bringing my baby to hangout while I have sessions. I definitely recommend them to everyone I hear that needs physical therapy

This company use to be good and work with patients one on one. Now the management is pushing for the staff to double,triple and even quadruple treat their patients in an hour session. How are they supposed to ensure that patients are not getting injured or doing the movements correctly?!. Very unhappy with this new policy. I will be looking for a new therapy place

Really enjoyed my first visit compared to other places. Best thing is that a Physical Therapist works with you each visit, no assistants.
Andrew was great. Good instructions and good communicator.

This facility is amazing, the staff and my Physical Therapist William are so helpful and caring. My therapy has went so well as I'm  recovering from a full knee replacement. I would definitely recommend coming here for any kind of therapy.

The staff and therapists at PT solutions are outstanding. They take the time to put together an in-depth training program specifically design to improve your quality of life. I am so thankful for all that they do for me and for others, giving us the tools to get and feel better in life.

A very positive and helpful experience! Professional & personable front desk staff and PT Andrew clearly explained everything throughout my entire appointment! The facility is so clean and inviting. I highly recommend PT Solutions of Mariner Square!

I love going to my weekly PT appointments. Andrea's plan for my recovery has far exceeded my expectations. Cassidy in the front makes sure I remember all my appointments and is a pleasure to be around. Ms. Kim  pushes me to my limits, but I always feel great after my sessions. I love going to my sessions as they make me feel confident about my recovery both physically and mentally

I started going to PT Solutions after my doctor suggested physical therapy. I chose them because they were on my doctor‚Äôs list of recommended providers and conveniently located near my home.

I‚Äôve been working with Andrea for the past few weeks, and she‚Äôs been great ‚Äîboth personable and knowledgeable. She‚Äôs provided effective exercises that I can easily do on my own which helps a lot with a busy travel schedule.

Well, where do I start. Five stars is nowhere near enough. I have never had a more pleasant experience with any other Medical / Therapy facility than I do at PT Solutions westchase. The staff here are knowledgeable, professional and genuinely care about each patient. Liberty and Cassidy make you feel so welcome from the time you arrive to each visit (like family.) This entire team work together amazingly. The staff are dedicated to your recovery and their beside manner is the best I have every experienced. I can‚Äôt give enough kudos to My therapist Andrea.  Andrea is the best and 100% committed to my therapy every visit. I struggle with chronic acute pain in my back, hip, neck . Andrea customizes my therapy to me. I have been seeing her several months and her encouragement and support and knowledge are beyond expectation. Thank you Andrea and entire staff at PT solutions Westchase.

My PCP recommended trying physical therapy for a hip issue.  He had a personal experience with PT Solutions of Westchase, so that‚Äôs where I went.  The whole experience has been positive from the beginning.  I initially spoke with Cassidy to schedule my first session and was greeted by Liberty.  They were both very friendly and informative.  My initial consultation was with Kim.  We developed a program, and got started right away.  After almost two months, the results have exceeded my expectations.  I highly recommend visiting this location.  Kim and Andrea are true professionals who care about their patients!

I can't say enough great things about  the team at PT Solutions! From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and cared for by Cassidy and Liberty.  Andrea took the time to understand my concerns and created a personalized treatment plan that truly worked. After just a few sessions, I noticed a huge improvement in my mobility and strength. Kim and Gabby are also very knowledgeable, compassionate, and effective physical therapists, they have made a real difference in my recovery and quality of life!

provider_name: PT Solutions of Oldsmar (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text:
I highly recommend Westchase Physical Therapy at the Oldsmar location for anyone in need of physical therapy. From the moment I stepped into the clinic, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere. Hailey greets you at  the front desk and helps with scheduling and anything administrative,  Dr. Benjamin Hardin is the therapist who  has led the majority of my sessions and he took the time to listen to my concerns and create a personalized treatment plan that addressed my specific needs. Dr Matthew Matisko is the Oldsmar clinic director and always  impressed with his insights and recommendations.

Throughout my sessions, Dr. Ben demonstrated exceptional knowledge and expertise in physical therapy. He provided clear explanations of the exercises and techniques he was using, ensuring that I fully understood the purpose and benefits of each treatment. There is an online portal where videos were uploaded so I could adjunct with  sessions at home. With Dr. Ben's guidance and encouragement, my pain is subsiding and I have seen significant progress in regaining mobility, strength and function.

I am grateful for the exceptional care I received at both the Oldmar and Westchase locations with the Oldsmar location being smaller and more intimate.  Dr. Ben and the entire team are dedicated professionals who truly care about their patients' well-being and adept at assessing and updating your care plan. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone seeking expert physical therapy services due to the genuine care, attention and support through your rehabilitation journey.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Oldsmar (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text: I have been a client of Westchase Physical Therapy for the past 7 years.  They are the BEST in my book.  Got me walking after major back surgery, prehabbed and rehabbed both hip replacements and a knee replacement.  I worked with a lot of different therapists and appreciated each of them.  They are caring and compassionate for your situation but will work you to get the results needed to reclaim your life.  Great equipment, cutting edge techniques and exceptional staff.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Oldsmar (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text: I am currently being treated by Dr. Madison Brown. Right from the very beginning, she has been wonderful. She listened to me as I explained my issue and setup a schedule for me that accomodated my needs and the right type of physical therapy. She tweaked it as we went along with great results. In a short period of time, my pain level has gone from 10 to 3 and I am convinced it will go down to 0 in the next few days. She is very pleasant to work with but is also tough. If the need arises, I would have no hesitation in working with her again and recomending her to anyone who needs physical therapy.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Oldsmar (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text: This place is wonderful! I've been through two very successful 12-week treatments in the past year. They really have their stuff together when treating patients. I typically see a different therapist each week and they keep copious notes to where the treatment is consistent and progressive. Everyone has a great attitude and is super friendly and caring. I highly recommend this place! Grant is the best!

provider_name: PT Solutions of Oldsmar (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text:
What a great experience with PT. üòÄ
Grant is kind and very thorough, he explains exercises in a way that make them easy to understand. Doing them correctly at home will help me with my recovery.

When I arrived I was pleasantly greeted by the receptionist.

Today was my first time at the Oldsmar location.  I‚Äôve always been very happy with Westchase physical therapy Palm Harbor, this location keeps the same high
standards.

I just started with PT Solutions 5 days ago. I have Heather as my therapist. I had went to another provider for 9 weeks after a partial knee replacement, without getting the results my doctor required and the recovery needed. I was in a bad place both physically and mentally, feeling hopeless after almost 4 months since my knee surgery. Heather at PT solutions has already proven to be the Angel I was praying for! In my very first full session with her, she had me doing a full rotation on the bike, something I had been trying to do for months. She is the most knowledgeable and caring therapist I've ever had. She doesn't leave you on your own either when completing exercises. She also has assistants who monitor you as well. She even has me come in early prior to my appointment time, just so she can put moist warm heat on my knee and other things so to get me to move at my greatest potential.  I appreciate everything Heather and the staff are doing for me! She has given me back my confidence so much that I know I can do this now, along with her help and support! I would recommend PT solutions to anyone looking for a provider who truly cares and pays attention to details!! The right provider really DOES make a difference!!

Walked in for the first time, completed my paperwork and was promptly and professionally greeted by my PT (Heather, at the Palm Coast Office).  The conversation of background and the plan for treatment and goals was very pleasant.  I am a 66 year old athlete and the therapy was taxing and beneficial. Following the first session I was given my schedule for the remaining sessions and introduced to the other PTs that would be there early in the morning for me. My experience with everything at PT Solutions was very good and I believe they are excellent at their trade. Mike

Yesterday was my first day at PT Solutions.  Brittany at the front desk gave me paperwork and checked me in.  Michael, my physical therapist, evaluated the issues with my left hip and went through some exercises and answered questions. He walked me back to the front counter where Brittany already had set up a schedule of future PT appointments.  Both were friendly, professional, and efficient!

Chris my intake therapist was very professional.Talked me thru what his plan was for me.We got started on my exercises.
From the start it was difficult.By end of session I could already see slight improvement.
Chris allowed me to take short break.
Chris has set me up with my next appointments.I look forward to receiving P.T Solutions excellent patient care

Great Team, But Ultimately Not My Fit

I want to start by saying that the physical therapy staff at PT Solutions has been phenomenal. Every interaction with the clinicians was kind, professional, and genuinely supportive‚Äîeven when my condition was unfamiliar or complex, they showed patience and a willingness to learn and adapt. As someone managing a layered medical disorder, that kind of empathy means the world.

Unfortunately, what ultimately led me to seek care elsewhere was my experience with the front office. I came in as a self-driven patient with my documentation already prepared and simply asked for a printed copy of my medical records for personal tracking. The refusal to accommodate that small but meaningful request made me question whether my broader access needs would be respected long-term.

For those of us with complex health journeys, small administrative choices can have big emotional and practical consequences. Feeling supported shouldn‚Äôt stop at the treatment table‚Äîit needs to be reflected at every level of care.

That being said: Michael, you‚Äôre an incredible physical therapist, and it‚Äôs a real shame I wasn‚Äôt able to continue working with you due to shifting needs. Thank you for the kindness and care you showed during our time together.

We actually haven't started, but we did our assessment. We have had physical therapy in other places. I believe this is going to open doors to New beginnings. Everyone seem very professional and kind. Chris and Casey at the front desk was very patient with scheduling. Chris was very compassionate with what we've already overcome. We are excited.

We can't say enough wonderful things about PT Solutions of Plant City!!  The moment you walk in you are greeted with smiles and assistance from the amazing desk staff. The therapists are outstanding!  They are experts in their field.  They take the time to evaluate your situation and execute the steps to make you feel better.   They provide you with exercises to do at home for a quicker recovery.   Everyone was very polite and courteous.  Thank you PT Solutions very much for the professional care you provided us.   Jen & Gary Shepp

The staff of PT Solutions are the BEST!! Chris is so welcoming at the front desk. Love working with Cody, Niki, Sydney and Greg with my recovery needs. Highly recommended them for all of your physical therapy needs!!
All are wonderful therapist. The staff is kind, caring and helpful. Always pleasant and have smiles on their face. Chris was helpful in getting my authorization done.
Cris, at the front desk is professional, extremely helpful and has a great sense of humor! The physical therapists are professional as well.   They are kind, patient and motivating.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Race Track Road (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text:
Worked with this office for several months getting back to normal. I was happy with their service. My main PT was Chaz and he did and excellent job. I also worked with multiple other PTs and felt like they were are skilled and excellent at their profession.

The home work outs greatly helped and they guided me how I could work on the exercises at home on the days I didn't go in.

I was happy they were open at 7am which allowed me to get in before work. In the event anyone needs to have physical therapy I would highly recommend their team.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Race Track Road (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text:
Prior to today, I couldn‚Äôt give enough stars!   I‚Äôve been a loyal patient of  Westchase Physical Therapy for over ten years.  After recent rotator cuff surgery, I decided to drive three times the distance to support them because of their genuine care for the patient.  The owner hand-picked therapists (Alex, Cynthia, Chaz, Makayla, among many others) that are friendly and genuinely care, making the time spent there enjoyable, like hanging out with friends.  And each therapist handled only two patients per hour.  Then they got bought out.  Today I call to ask a question only to find that the self pay fee literally doubled.  I'm so incredibly disappointed, as I just can't afford to pay that much, but still need therapy.  I hope they can get it worked out.
NOTE - I have updated this review and rating as it was probably a bit harsh.   Hopefully PT Solutions can keep most of the things that made Westchase Physical Therapy great, including their therapist.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Race Track Road (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text:
I shared a great rapport with my therapist.  I truly appreciated her efforts and her awesome attitude.  I just wish this company was more like other clinics I had visited.  By that, I wish they didn't have such a 'hardcore' policy of collecting payment PRIOR to treatment, rather than waiting for the insurance company to process the claim.  This resulted in me overpaying ~$50 on my first evaluation visit, and then waiting 8 weeks for a refund.  Also, it was a bit sad they could not provide therapy one time due to a slight delay with my insurance extension - unless I prepaid the FULL out-of-pocket cost without hopes of a refund when the situation resolved the following day.  This experience cause me to feel like they are distrustful and very inflexible, especially considering they owed me a refund at the time. I also knock a star off because they failed to contact me when an appointment was cancelled.  Apparently the main office had an incorrect phone number listed for me in their database.  I believe the local clinic had my correct number?  Seems like I could have been reached, if effort was applied? Regardless, I ended up taking time out from work to show up for a cancelled appointment.

If this company was a little more customer friendly, with similar policies to other clinics I've visited, I wouldn't hesitate to grade them 5 stars.

provider_name: PT Solutions of Race Track Road (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text: I have been working with Dr. Chaz and Cynthia (and a couple of times with Kristin!) for the last couple of months following surgery for a torn meniscus.  They have been amazing!  They have gotten me from limping along with limited mobility in my knee to being able to jog for short spurts during this time.  They have been so great to work with, always reevaluating my situation and adding new ways to challenge me in order to make me stronger.  Because of their expertise and efforts I know I will be back to running soon!  They (and the staff at Westchase) are truly the best!

provider_name: PT Solutions of Race Track Road (formerly Westchase Physical Therapy)
review_text: Dr.Duran has been incredibly helpful as my physical therapist. He takes the time to really listen, understand the issues, and tailor a treatment plan that works. His knowledge and supportive attitude make a huge difference in my recovery. I always leave our sessions feeling better and more confident in my progress. Highly recommend thank you!

My ENT physician recommended PT for my vertigo that actually got better by the time of my PT appointment. I went to the appointment anyways as I thought I may learn some information that can help me if it happens again. I met with Jeremey Perales DPT, Clinic manager who was very knowledgeable about vertigo and very helpful. He spent a good 35 minutes with me, explaining and answering any questions I might have. After asking me many questions about my circumstances, he determined I was not in need of physical therapy at that time but encouraged me to call him if I have future episodes.  I respect him for not taking advantage of my excellent health insurance that I have & will definitely use PT Solutions for any future physical therapy needs.

PT Solutions provided expert care & clear directions throughout my physical therapy sessions that effectively enabled recovery from an overuse injury that had begun to hinder my activities & limit use of right leg.
.
Jeremy and his entire team demonstrated professional levels of expert knowledge, attentive focus, and careful monitoring to help me achieve a successful recovery from previous limitations and pain that had brought me there.
.
It was very good, even inspiring, just to be around such a positive & capable team supporting my physical therapy / recovery - best of all was marveling at how my pain subsided, then ceased, as my condition was improving !!!!!!
..
Very happy with results from therapeutic exercises & directions provided, apparently based on the latest therapeutic strategies, with numerous aids & equipment there that enabled a relatively prompt & successful recovery from my prior pain & limitations.
.
Can definitely recommend treatment from Jeremy with the Staff & equipment at this facility.
Very professional staff. The front desk is friendly and accommodating. My physical therapist is knowledgeable and I am happy with how she is handling my issue.

It was a good place to be at PT Solutions of South Tampa. This My second place I Visit from the front desk to everyone and the place was so peaceful it let you feel at Home /Family they do you like they for ever know you....
I will recommend everyone that I know need physical therapy to visit them ...üíôüíôüíô

We took our daughter for her first visit after surgery and Jeremy was fantastic! Not only was he patient with her, he explained things thoroughly to my husband and I. We were very pleased with how educational and thorough he was.

Having never needed physical therapy before I was a little apprehensive as to how much assistance they could provide.  After my initial assessment with Sarah my concerns have diminished. She was quite knowledgeable about what I needed to do to meet my goals. Mostly I was impressed that she wanted to know me and my lifestyle to determine the best way to meet my goals that were important to me and not someone else‚Äôs definition. It‚Äôs not too often that I have dealt with someone in the medical field that inquired about what I wanted to achieve as opposed to what they thought was best for me.  Overall it was a pleasant experience.

I want to commend Sarah and her entire team at this location. After years of wear and tear from military service, their care and expertise have helped me progressively regain strength and confidence. They strike the perfect balance‚Äîknowing when to challenge you and when to ease up. I highly recommend this team to anyone, whether young or senior, who is recovering from an injury and looking to get back on track.

Have always had a positive experience in the past. Sarah, along with other therapists have helped me over the years to fulfill my goal to continue to stay mobile as I age. Sarah who has been with me since the beginning  is very thorough and as long as I follow through in staying with exercises to do at home as well, l have had much success. Can never thank her and your company enough.

Very nice staff , clean safe place and Sara the
physical therapist was very informative thank you for my first visit. It was very pleasant.
Staff were wonderful. Everyone cared so much. Meeting with a physical therapist with so much knowledge and experience was exactly what I needed, to get the help to start my recovery.

PT Solutions in Tampa Palms is outstanding!The staff is professional, dedicated, innovative and caring. I tore my meniscus, and I went to them in an attempt to avoid surgery. They did it! Through encouragement, planning and knowledge about the best program to pursue, they turned the ship around. Had my last session today, and am going for a 30-mile bike ride to celebrate  Complete success and a great experience. Thanks to all of you!

I highly recommend PT Solutions @
16037 Tampa Palms Blvd. Tampa, FL 33647.
The customer service there is outstanding! Via phone or in person you always get a cheerful greeting. From the moment you go in the door until you walk out that door, everyone treats you with kindness, courtesy and respect! The front staff is very knowledgeable, helpful and quickly sins you in and out. Jonathan always called me by name with a smile as soon as I walked in. He‚Äôs always makes me feel very special (he does that with everyoneüòâ). My therapist Manali, I have nothing but appreciation for her who sees and treats me as a person and not as an (ugh) just a patient, let me get her in and out! As I get at the doctors offices! Manali has worked wonders for me at the PT and at home with all the different home pt instructions.
I see Manali AND ALL the other PT Therapists treating everyone else like that with too.üòâ) I‚Äôm very happy that I ended up in that facility!
Ps. Be prepared to work hard and achieve your health goal!

I‚Äôve been going to PT solutions for an injury in my right rotator cuff and then later on a fall I took on my left side. Tiffany and Miranda are miracle workers - I was skeptical at first not because of anything they did, but rather because of me - but I‚Äôm a changed person - I‚Äôm grateful for the amazing team at PT solutions - I‚Äôm back to normal and even stronger after 5 month recovery and I‚Äôm forever grateful !!

My daughter is attending PT for a hip injury and she has worked with 3 different therapists at this facility. Each therapist has provided valuable guidance and they know how to push her without going too hard. Front staff is also friendly and accommodating. We love PT solutions!

My daughter has been a client of theirs since September, 2024 for a knee surgery she had.  From the first phone call I made to them til now, every one we've encountered has been friendly, helpful and supportive.  I feel so comfortable with them and it's a relief knowing my daughter is in such good hands.  She has to have another surgery on the other knee within the next few months and I will not hesitate to have them help her heal afterwards.

I am so happy to have a physical therapy facility so near my home.  It is clean and well run. The receptionist is efficient and friendly. Over the years I‚Äôve been to many facilities and this is the first time I am satisfied with my progress! Right now I am doing OT for my hand and each therapist I have shows great concern and caring.  They take time to listen to me.  I will be starting PT shortly for my balance problem.  I have complete faith in the therapists at the Palm Harbor facility that I will be walking without my walker or cane shortly.  I am so blessed to have found Westchase Physical Therapy in Palm Harbor.

I am so grateful to have completed my meniscus and ACL graft surgery with Dr Katie Kelly and her highly experienced team at the Palm Harbor location.  Every appointment was tailored to my progress- they always challenged and encouraged me.  What I appreciated the most unlike other PTs, Westchase changed up my exercises every time I visited so it was NEVER boring.  Their staff is knowledgeable and so caring and made my PT fun.  I am even stronger today than I was before my injury- and I have resumed all of my former activities thanks to their support!

Before PT Solutions bought them, this place WAS great. Just a  week ago 07/14/25, they transitioned to PT Solutions' system. Now they don't answer the phone. The voicemail is not set up. On Friday, I arrived on time at my appointment. There was only 1 person there. I had to wait a good 15 minutes until a therapist finally showed up. Not his fault; he's a good therapist. It's management. My favorite therapists were not there. No one called to tell me they were canceling. They said my favorite therapists had put in too many hours for the week. Again, no one called to reschedule my appointment. The place is a ghost town now. I have no idea what the status of my next scheduled visits are: this week tomorrow and Friday. I only get a certain number of visits on my insurance policy. They had a strict cancellation fee. Now there is not a single person to communicate with over there. I'll have to contact my insurance to make sure PT Solutions is not billing when they aren't even on site to meet their commitment. Such a shame.

After my 4th back surgery, I was referred to Westchase Physical Therapy.  The first day I hobbled in, barely able to put weight on one leg.  Now 2 months later I can stand only on that leg, walk 2+ miles per day and swim as long as I want.  Thanks to the great Therapists there, I saw meaningful growth each week.  They designed a plan for me which brought my progress farther & faster than I ever expected. Having been to PT in many places over the years, this was by far the best experience I have had.  The Therapists were very professional but also very personable.  They made the environment welcoming and friendly.  All the clients I saw were treated with respect and kindness, and given plans that appropriately challenged their abilities.

I highly recommend Westchase Physical Therapy in Palm Harbor.  Thank you for giving me back the ability to resume my normal activities so quickly.  Thank you also for making me feel so comfortable during my visits.  If I ever need PT again, I will happily return here!

I had the pleasure to work with Katie at West Coast physical therapy.  Absolutely amazing to work with and really helped me a lot.  I came in one day and they had changed to AdventHealth and when I walked in, they told me I needed a referral. I got the referral finally got back into my next appointment (mind you this is weeks later) they just go to hand me a bill for $158 for evaluation and consult even though I already have had an evaluation and consult and already started PT. I used to do billing so I understand it‚Äôs a different facility so things need to be updated. I have Blue Cross Blue Shield. No one had the courtesy to let me know that they were going to charge me $158 this morning along with $97 per appointment after that. I denied services and left. I find it absolutely ridiculous that no one could reach out to me before I made arrangements to be at my appointment this morning. I am extremely frustrated. The patient care that I received there was excellent. Everything else needs help. This place really needs to make their current/previous patient‚Äôs aware of what they‚Äôre walking into.  It‚Äôs a shame because I really was enjoying doing my therapy here when it was West Coast.

Wow! This was my first PT experience and it was amazing! My therapist, Dr. Adrianna, is top notch. She is a great listener and very thorough with different tests that she performed. She explained everything that she was doing and provided me with a great action plan. I‚Äôm able to use the app to follow through with my treatment plan and this helped me stay on track. Everyone was professional and welcoming at this location. I look forward to my next visit.

Nice and welcoming is my first impression of PT Solutions of Temple Terrace staff and its atmosphere.  My clinician, Adrianna Chramega reviewed my medical issues and concerns, reviewed my exercises, each one individually by allowing me to perform them while ensuring correct techniques were being utilized. When my session was completed, I was given info to access my own individual at home exercise video program, accessible through their app.  Looking forward to my next session.

I'm been going to this center for over two months and the service have been excellent. Personal are greats and my therapist is very knowledgeable and communicative. It's have been a blessing for me. I strongly recommend this place. To the management, please,  keep and motivate your staff to be with you for the long run because they are excellents professionals.

This is a great facility and staff. However, the staff member Nadine needs to be more attentive to clients with disability.

My first encounter she introduced herself ,
As I stood up to come to her she was gone.

I searched for her replying I didn‚Äôt see you leave. Also I have limited eyesight. Otherwise she is great staff member.

My evaluation with Emily & Adrianna was very pleasant and thorough and more than expected. They patiently created a plan that Iam comfortable with to reach my goals. Looking forward to this journey with PT Solutiions Temple Terrace.

I knew instantly I was in great hands with Emily. She strikes the perfect balance of pushing me to make progress while also making sure I‚Äôm returning to normal activity safely. Her care and attention go beyond just our sessions‚Äîshe‚Äôs incredibly responsive via the office text line whenever I have a quick question or need reassurance. Thanks to Emily, my tendinitis is healing, my ankle is getting stronger, and‚Äîmost importantly‚ÄîI‚Äôm feeling hopeful about getting back into running and triathlons. I couldn‚Äôt recommend her more highly!

Thank you, Emily! You‚Äôve been a true blessing.

Cody and Emily are very attentive and professional. I've made a lot of strides and I continue to make progress towards my goal of fully healing the nerve damage in my right leg from 3 bulging spinal discs. Thank you for your continued caring and support!

This is my second time using PT Solutions of Town 'n' Country.  Both experiences have been great.  Emily & Cody are attentive to what you tell them and work very hard to work to improve your situation.   With both experiences I have come out with great improvements and healing.  Thanks for all your hard work and advice.

As a new patient at PT Solutions, my experience so far has been great. The facility is very clean, and the front desk staff was pleasant and welcoming. My physical therapist, Gina, was very professional and provided detailed information throughout my session. She was extremely helpful on my first day, making me feel comfortable and confident in the process. I‚Äôm looking forward to my full recovery and being able to walk for 30 minutes again. Excited for the journey ahead!

Hands down, this is the best PT I have ever been to.  The entire staff is welcoming, warm and ultimate professionals.  I worked with Melanie who is extremely knowledgeable and truly knows and loves her craft.  My husband is now also going and echoes my sentiments.  Yesenia at the front desk is bilingual and is also equally amazing. Cannot say enough and will go no where else in the future! Thx to all!

I am 67 years old suffering from cervical dystonia. These tremors cause constant pain in the neck and shoulder muscles.  I did not believe physical therapy could help since this is a condition of the nerves, but PT Solutions of Zephyrhills proved me wrong. They consistently gave me exercises and stretches to strengthen the neck and arm muscles. There was a great improvement in such a short time. In only 6 weeks my arms and neck are so much stronger and so the pain has decreased immensely. Also my range of motion for the neck and arms have pretty much doubled.  And I can continue doing their carefully selected exercises at home. Thank you to the friendly and efficient PT team of Zephyrhills!

Front desk competent and friendly. My PT technician, Garrett was wonderful.  He is easy to understand when giving information and instructions. This was my first visit and I am confident he will help me get well by functioning better.

Knowledgeable , professional, caring , friendly and respectful staff. I can‚Äôt say enough positive things about my experience at PT Solutions of Zephyrhills. They take the time to listen and truly are caring in guiding you to your goals throughout including an excellent home exercise plan. Thank you again to each and every one of you.

The employees were very nice. Garrett explained my condition better than others have and I appreciate that very much. He agreed with some of my own theories about my pain as well. Very good place to go and close to home
Very able. Malik, Halley, Garret, Jordyn, Jordan, Melissa and .... Have been super! I really feel the therapy is working seeing how my hip/butt is tied when I leave üòÇ.

I absolutely love working with Steph! As an Olympic athlete, taking care of my body is a top priority, and whenever I‚Äôm dealing with an ache, a nagging pain, or just need a recovery session with the boots, she‚Äôs my go-to. What sets Steph apart is the time and care she puts into each session‚Äîusing a variety of techniques to get to the root of the issue, not just treat the symptoms. On top of that, her services are incredibly affordable, which makes it even better. It‚Äôs a relief to know I‚Äôm getting top-level care from someone who‚Äôs not only skilled but also has an amazing personality.

I have seen plenty of PT's for my back and shoulder injuries. Dr. Stephanie is hands down THE BEST! She genuinely cares about her patients and their progress. Every appointment she is evaluating your progress while providing practical feedback to help you understand what's going on. The dry needling, cupping, and manual therapy have helped me significantly. Thank you for all that you do, Doc!

Stephanie is amazing. She knows her stuff. Prior to working with her I was seeing a chiropractor for 2 years and got no results,  I‚Äôve had Stephanie for a few months now and it feels like a lifetime of work. I‚Äôve been able to do things I never thought was possible. All good things must come to an end, I‚Äôll be really sad when I my care with her ends. The conversation and laughs is something I won‚Äôt be able get anywhere else, life won‚Äôt be the same without her but it was nice having her as my PT and I‚Äôll enjoy it will it last.

Stephanie is absolutely incredible at what she does. Her intelligence is so apparent and I feel so privileged to be one of her patients. She is a provider who will genuinely listen to your concerns and not dismiss you. No question is ever a "stupid" question in her office. Something I love about our sessions is that she is vocal about the techniques she is implementing in the moment and why. She has successfully addressed several of my ongoing medical concerns and I feel so grateful for everything she has done and continues to do for me. Highly recommend!

Dr. Stephanie Aubrey came highly recommended by several of my friends. I've been struggling with knee issues for a few years and have not been able to find relief.
I'm so blessed that I've found Stephanie/PT works!
Stephanie is everything a person could ask for and more. She's caring, talented, a great listener so that she can discover your source of pain and very organized in her approach to getting you back to be the best you can be.
I'm a believer ... Stephanie is truly tireless. I can see that she believes everyone has their own unique (injury/pain) issues and her knowledge of different physical therapy tools will assist her in getting you pain free. She's just so talented!  :-)
Really professional,clean, lovely place! They will treat your kid as it's there own! They have a lot of patience with the kids, give them love and attention to every each of them! üíØ Recommended

Pupa PPEC is a center with specialized staff, where love is like magic that fills the Childrens who attended every day with happiness and hope. I‚Äôm this place they receive physical, occupational, language and behavioral therapies, in addition to medical care individualized, thanks to the direction for quality care for the family also manifested by the parents themselves. Thanks for everything. 100 % recommend.
Amazon place for kids! Such an incredible staff. If you are looking for a good place for your kid don‚Äôt doubt Ones! 100% recomended
This is a clean and warming place. The staff members are very professional with my daughter. I recommend Pupa Pediatric Care 100%.
Love this care center for my diabetic daughter! They take good care of her. Very clean and homey.

provider_name: Pain Management Physicians of South Florida
review_text: When I first went here  Dr. Sharma was very kind and caring along with the staff, but as soon as they bought this business/office; she and Dr. Lee along with the staff how they have changed. They couldn't care less about their patients anymore and if you don't get these shots that she wants you to get forget about the cost then they just call you and say they have to cancel your appointment because we haven't received the referral yet and then just forget about you!!! Is this what they are taught nowadays in school? This is not a true doctor because they take an oath or do they not take that oath anymore? Are they there to treat people/patients or are they there to run a business? It can't be both, it's either a doctor's office or a money-making business ü§î ü§∑

provider_name: Pain Management Physicians of South Florida
review_text: Tongue Cancer, and the ensuring surgery, taking a quarter-size chunk out of my tongue, has given me the worst possible pain imaginable for over a month! My doctor referred me to these people. Guess what, you have to be a healthy happy 70yrs old to qualify for a pain pump! I was 5 minutes away from my 1st appointment when the office called me to tell me that I don't qualify! Cancer pain be dammed, strike "compassionate" from their website, I have a better adjective for them!

provider_name: Pain Management Physicians of South Florida
review_text: I made an appointment with Dr Sharma in August. When my husband and I arrived at her office on the morning of his appointment we were told very abruptly that she was no longer treating patients with pain pumps. It was totally unprofessional and very disrespectful especially since the appointment was confirmed the day before. I do not understand how a doctors office can be so unreliable. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend her or her offices. That is no way to treat anyone.

provider_name: Pain Management Physicians of South Florida
review_text:
Dr. Sharma and staff are so amazing! It's not often you find an office where BOTH the Doctor and staff are great,  but this one is the exception. Everyone is so thoughtful and caring.  From the moment you walk in,
you feel that.  The wait time was non existent, yet Dr. Sharma spends time to really get to know your issues.  She HEARS you and conveys that she cares. I have been to many doctors due to MS, and  I feel that this office is the best I have ever been to.  In a world where most offices are part of huge parent companies, this office gives you that feeling of the family doctor that knows and cares about their patients. I highly recommend this office for anyone that has unresolved pain issues. I am blessed to have found them.

provider_name: Pain Management Physicians of South Florida
review_text:
The worst I was paying cash and they hung up on twice repeatedly providing my info to a dizzy unprofessional secretary who answered the phone
I do not recommend this dr

I could post hundreds of photographs of this place.  I love it and I'm grateful to everyone who works here.  we really spend many hours there and each person is absolutely special.  three years ago with jeff, now Ivette, Oday, Mildred‚Ä¶ JESSY!!!  they are all very special.  highly recommended.

Paley Physical outpatient Therapy facility is very advance in treating patients. Very clean and has modern equipments. The Therapist there are very friendly!

My Physical Therapist Yvette was Phenomenal! She did an outstanding job with my recovery! She helped me gained more Flexion and Extension in my knee with her blessed hands!üëç

Thanks Yvette for going above and beyond to help me heal. Thanks for your dedication to all your patients. You are caring, kind and compassionate. You are an amazing woman.

Everlasting GOD will keep using you as his vessel to help your patients. He will be with you and bless you and your family always in Jesus exalted name! AMEN!!!üôè

My daughter and I have been to so many facilities for physical therapy over the years and none compare to Paley. The therapists are very knowledable. They take the time to educate the patient and parents on each exercise and the proper mechanics. Unlike other places, they are focused on their patient every minute of the session. They are constantly watching for proper form and having the patient make corrections.  Our expectations for PT are extremely high after going to Paley. I highly recommend them.

This is the best place to do physical therapy! I saw many therapists over a three month span and every one of them was fantastic. They have a lot of therapists so it is easy to make appointments and to change appointments when necessary.

"A Great Therapist is Hard to Find and Impossible to Forget
And Jeff.H and Katie Carr are amazing people that doesn‚Äôt see a job but a passion and I will forever be grateful for the work and support given to my son Zion Omar
Very welcoming office! Staff are so kind here.  I had a great first time experience bringing my 4 year old son for an evaluation.  Highly recommend!

Palm Beach Behavioral Health and Wellness exemplifies a rare combination of clinical expertise, professionalism, and genuine support. From the first interaction, they take the time to ensure patients and families feel both informed and empowered! Their commitment to ethical, patient-centered treatment makes them a trusted resource in the community and a model of excellence in behavioral health care. All of the staff, both clinical and non-clinical are absolutely wonderful. I highly recommend them!

The staff at Palm Beach Behavioral Health and Wellness is attentive, knowledgeable, and incredibly professional. They create such a warm and positive environment ‚Äî it‚Äôs clear that their team genuinely cares.

They helped transform my best friends daughter from a very insecure teenager into a confident young woman. She has gone from flunking most classes to being a B student and now has the confidence to be looking at attending college. They have helped her overcome lack of self confidence and anger issues. Remarkable transformation.

Alison did not bother to show up to our first appointment.  Our first appointment was an interview to see if she was a fit for my son.  Dont waste your time.  Keep your kids away from these people, if they wont talk to the parent, what do they do to kids minds behind closed doors?

My mother got her surgery with Paley Institute, Dr. Barnhill the surgery center and Saint Marys was amazing. We got transfer to the water first floor. The care was excellent. I have to recognize amazing RNs that worked and CNA‚Äòs.
Fedine, Angelia and  Brenda The attention, my mother got was excellent. The Customer Service physical therapy was amazing social worker Emily set up all the equipment for my mother to go home and even set up her appointment for her physical therapy to start on Tuesday. I cannot say enough words of what an amazing service and thank you for all you did for my mom I am very grateful to the staff.

This is my 2nd round of surgeries and having to recover here at St. Mary's on Waters 3.  Having a PAO done could feel torturous but not if you have the right care team, as I did in July 2025. My family and I are beyond grateful for the care that was provided by a handful of compassionate people with some names I do not remember, but the names I do include Mark, Jenn, Andrea, Bicharlene, Jenny, Aaron, Valerie, as well as Monique and Russell from physical therapy and Hannah from occupational therapy. Truly, everyone who has assisted in my care are very much appreciated. Priest Fr. Jacob was also such a kind soul who brought positive vibes and light to the room as did Andrea, Jenn, and Jenny (November 2024 and July 2025) consistently. Thank YOU Waters 3 for making this recovery round go so smoothly. :)

I recently delivered my baby at St. Mary‚Äôs Medical Center under the care of Dr. Daniel Sacks and I am so grateful for the incredible care I received from both the Labor & Delivery and Postpartum staff.
‚Ä¢	Labor & Delivery:
From the moment we arrived, the nurses made me feel safe, supported, and well-cared for. They explained each step clearly,  and were attentive to my comfort and needs .My nurses -Eulissa, Tatiana , Cate , Carmen , Jennifer were all amazing . Cate and Carmen stayed by my side through the toughest contractions and helped me breathe through the hardest but most rewarding blessing ever ‚Ä¶ they were present when baby arrived !
‚Ä¢	Postpartum Care:
After delivery, the postpartum team provided excellent support as I recovered. Tatiana who I had 2 nights in a row checked on me regularly, answered my questions patiently, and encouraged me with breastfeeding and newborn care. The  lactation consultant -Abigail was especially helpful in making sure my baby latched properly. Debbie the CNA was also superb and gave baby boy his first bath .
‚Ä¢	Facilities & Atmosphere:
The rooms were comfortable  and the staff created a warm, welcoming environment for my family and me.

Overall, I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience. The compassion, professionalism, and dedication of the staff at St. Mary‚Äôs made such a difference during one of the most important moments of my life. I highly recommend this hospital to any expectant parent.

Thank you to the entire team at St. Mary‚Äôs Medical Center for your outstanding care!

After my surgery, I spent four nights here, and I have to say, everyone truly made me feel at home. Thank you for all the warmth and care you gave me, both day and night.

I‚Äôd like to give special appreciation to the amazing nurses who brightened my days and made my stay so much easier: Angeline Gorden, Emily Ward, Betty Jean, Austin Gio, Jennifer Monssef, Judith Myers, Pureza Christina, and Kayara Hamilton.

I am also deeply grateful to the wonderful therapists who helped me take my first steps toward regaining mobility: Pam Sena, Jill Geline, Margaret, and Melissa.

You all turned what could have been a very challenging experience into something filled with comfort, encouragement, and kindness. Thank you all from the bottom of my heart.

Had a fusion and other spinal surgery to alleviate constant pain.

The team that took care of me on the Cantor Spine Center floor really sets the gold standard on helping you recover.

From Lorenz, Andrea. Kaitlyn, Tara, Judith, Austin, Christina and all the staff they were kind, responsive, caring, and checked on me constantly. This is the a team without a doubt. Appreciate them for making my stay comfortable and accommodating anything i asked for.

When you know that someone responds when you call them, it makes you feel confident they are there to take care of you and then when their disposition is one that is full of smiles and positive vibes, makes you feel even better.

I‚Äôve been fortunate not to need much surgery or hospital stays but my mom was treated here as well for back issues about three years ago and the care was also exemplary . It is that consistency that is the thing that matters the most.

I feel like I‚Äôm on the way to recovery faster because the experience was so positive. Food was actually very tasty as well which was a complete surprise as well.

All I can say is thank you to everyone who helped me recover and congratulations for getting it absolutely perfect when it comes to patient care and empathy!

Jeff exceeded our expectations!  He started training our Bernedoodle @ 6months, she is now 1 yr 10months and walks off leash, is extremely responsive and listens quickly.  Thank you Jeff we are very grateful.

Our 80lb sheepadoodle was a bit out of control although we did basic training with him we knew we needed more - he's loving but big and strong.  After reading a recommendation for Jeff and his Palm Beach Dog Academy on Facebook we decided to make the call and arrange for in boarding training .  Wow..what a great experience.  Our dog came home listening to commands and was so responsive to listening to us!  Jeff is professional and caring...responsive and knowledgeable. Highly recommend and worth every penny!

I‚Äôm beyond grateful for this training! We did the 3 week board and train and Jeff helped turn my dog into the best pet possible for us.  Our 1 year old rescue is now so responsive and happy and smart!  Jeff has been doing this for 30 years and really understands how to gently train. And this amazing training includes re-training me whenever I need it :) highly recommend!!!

Jeff has been Hank‚Äôs trainer since he was a puppy.  Jeff is a professional, experienced, and fun trainer.  Hank absolutely loves him and Jeff has an affinity for connecting and training your dog and most importantly teaching you how to do it.

We are amazed with our pup's progress after 10 days with Jeff. He used to anxiously bark at anyone who would come in the house nonstop. Today we have people doing some work on our house and he is being an angel! On top of that, Jeff takes your dog into his home and welcomes them like a part of the family. Grateful to have found him!

Dr. Joshua D. Bello has proven to be a true professional. He‚Äôs friendly and attentive. I certainly recommend him and his services. In the past, I normally would not have selected a chiropractor for pain and joint pain treatment, primarily because as a passenger, during a past auto accident and severe collision, I not only suffered several injuries but I vividly remember the horrific pain, and sounds of cracking of my joints and bones. So, I was very reluctant to be subjected to chiropractic therapy and manipulation wherein I‚Äôd be reminded of those sounds and pains.

Since mentioning this fear to Dr. Bello, he‚Äôs been very accommodating, and the treatment plan and the use of the very comfortable Hydromassage bed, the Mechanical traction and Hand held massager have been very comfortable and effective without the bothersome cracking sounds. My neck, shoulder, back and sciatica pain have been reduced significantly. I have a little ways to go, but I strongly believe Dr. Bello meets his ‚Äúcore values‚Äù that the patient ‚Äòleaves his facility in a pain-free condition and returns to the normalcy of day to day activities without any discomfort.‚Äô
Great experience! Dr. Bello is professional, thorough, and effective. My back pain improved after just a few sessions. Highly recommend!
Great service feeling much better after a few visits from my car accident. Highly recommend Dr Bello!

Dr. Bello is awesome, he's attentive, personable, and communicates well.
I'm thrilled with my sessions at Palm Beach Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation. Thanks to Dr. Bello.
After just a few visits with Dr Bello, my back is feeling wonderful, he's very kind and gentle, recommend 100%

I live abroad and went in with my almost 4 yr old son who has a language delay for intensive courses of speech therapy and OT. I cannot say enough about dr. Rosin and her team, i can honestly say i saw improvement in my son in just a couple of days. The therapists where lovely and caring with my son from day 1, i could only stay for a week but i can say that i discovered so many things about my son and ways to help him overcome his language delay. We were both sad to leave the team because if i could of stayed for a longer period his improvements would of been better, with that said he is doing so much better now! Its been a month and i have applied everything i was thought by team in to his everyday life. It was a great and beautiful experience for us, i would recommend this for anybody who has a similar situation.

We highly recommend Laura and Palm Beach Speech Teach. Both of our boys had severe speech impediments and we are amazed at the outcome after therapy with her.  She uses games and prizes to encourage positive reinforcement. Our boys always looked forward to sessions with her.  They both viewed it as fun and not a chore.  She was promptly on time, very reliable, and was great at communicating their progress. We were not able to attend every session and she was flexible and willing to work with other family members to allow consistency for scheduling. We loved that she had the availability to come to the house as this kept the boys comfortable in their own setting as they learned.  Both of our boys are excelling at school and we know this would not have been possible without Laura.   If you are having any hesitation, please know this is the best investment for your kids future !

Laura is great! We started with her when my kiddo was 4. He opened up to her quickly. She brings fun games for them to play and interact with each other. She‚Äôs always on time and great with communication.  He‚Äôs come such a long way since we started his in home therapy twice a week. Working with Laura has been so great!
Laura is the best therapist I‚Äôve ever encountered! She is not only highly skilled but also incredibly kind and patient! I highly recommend her to anyone!

Laura has been working with my son who has ASD for about a year now. She is very reliable, professional and my son always looks forward to her coming.  He made more progress with his communication skills in the first few months than he did in 2 years at the speech center I was taking him to.  I highly recommend her!

Laura worked with my son for a year and a half (from age 4.5 to 6) and we absolutely loved her! When he started with her, many people outside our immediate family could not understand what he was saying. Laura takes the time to work through one sound at a time, using different games and fun activities to do so. My son has a hard time sitting still and focusing, but she always made it fun for him and was so patient with him. My son loved seeing Laura, and the improvements he made throughout his time working with her were incredible! She was also great at communicating with us about what they were working on, how he was doing, and what we could do to help him ourselves. He recently ‚Äúgraduated‚Äù from her program, and I can proudly say he is completely understandable now and says all of his speech sounds correctly! I am so happy we chose Laura to work with our son, and could not recommend her enough!

I cannot give Dr. Ackerman enough praise. I have had tremendous results with my knee replacement surgeries (right and left), minimal pain and relatively fast recovery.
9 months after the left knee, and 5 months after the right knee and I'm at 90% recovery.
Also, I must praise the staff of the physical therapy department. Some of the process was quite painful, but it was necessary in order to regain functionality. Kudos to the therapy staff for their knowledge and professionalism.  As a final note, The therapist will give you exercises to do at home. You must do these exercises as they will aid in your recovery.

A positive experience during my recent visit to Palm Beach Sports Medicine. My orthopedic appt. was with Dr. Kerr. What stood out the most was how carefully he listened to me and how experienced the staff were. Dr. Kerr examined my leg and explained everything in a way that was easy to understand. Dr Kerr outlined a treatment plan tailored to my needs and answered all my questions with patience and care. I left the office feeling relieved and optimistic about my recovery. It‚Äôs rare to find an orthopedic doctor who combines deep knowledge with genuine compassion. I‚Äôm truly grateful for the care I received and highly recommend this practice.

Dr. Ackerman performed both of my knee replacements and he did an amazing job. He cares, listens and always show concern. His staff is wonderful. He has great personality. I would recommend him as referral to anyone.

Dr. Kerr did a complete hip surgery on my left hip and performed an outstanding operation. Before the operation he was very attentive and empathetic; he took the time to listen and answer any questions I had.  After the operation I didn‚Äôt need to take any pain killer drugs. Now I feel very good and am not limping or have any pain when I walk. I highly highly recommend him.

The entire experience at Palm Beach Sports Medicine was 10++. From MRI to xray to PT and then ultimately total hip replacement, the practice makes a daunting process easy to navigate-all done with excellent care and compassion.
Dr. Matthew Kerr is an incredibly talented surgeon, terrific bedside manner and the confidence he demonstrates allows the patient to be relaxed.
I‚Äôm 5 weeks post surgery, never needed pain meds, almost no visible scar remains and living a normal routine again. It‚Äôs honestly remarkable.
Many many thanks to Dr. Kerr and his entire staff -I am beyond grateful.

Just had my 2 pups cameo and Louie groomed by patty. She did an amazing job. They came out perfect. Thank you patty for taking such good care of my fur babies.  I‚Äôve been taking my pets here for 20 years.   Always exceptional care.

So this was the most beautiful (water fountain in lobby) office and efficient vet experience I have ever had in 31 years and three German Shepherds. We just moved to Port St Lucie and was referred to Palm City Animal Medical Center from a neighbor.  The front desk staff were welcoming and friendly.  Our dog has had on-going digestive issues and Dr. Harris looked at the paperwork and lab results I brought from our vet in Washington State.  She guided us to a really cost affordable solution.  I was so impressed that she did not ask to do "additional tests", but took the results I brought to help guide us on next steps with our German Shepherd.  She is amazing.  The full-service facility is unbelievable.  They have a dog day care play area with a pool, grooming facilities and first class boarding for dogs and cats.  It is so comprehensive and is a one-stop shop for pet owners.  This is one of those true treasures we have found in our new area.

Staff is amazing! From the front reception area through seeing Dr Wolf,  everyone made me feel welcome as my first time foster-to- adoption- mom of our cat Dusty:) I was pleased to see the teamwork and the back-forth  communication between staff and pet parents.
Love you all!!!
Sherri Thompson

I brought my one year old rottweiler named Lucie to this place and I am very, very pleased with the service that I got not only from the front desk but as well as from the doctor the technician and the grooming area. And my lucie was smiling when she came out! Prices were reasonable. And the doctor was very thorough.

I have been bringing my fur babies to Palm City Animal Medical Clinic for three years. My baby Rue has been seen by pretty much every doctor on the facility and they have all been both loving and caring. I‚Äôd like to give a HUGE thank you and say how grateful I am for Dr. Kelly Rew! She is professional, caring, and knowledgeable. You can tell she loves what she does and goes over and beyond for her clients. Best vet I have had by far.

if you want to take riding lessons this is the place to be. Robbin was very nice and had a lot of patience with me she made sure I felt safe while riding Annie. Annie (my lesson horse) was very sweet. They teach you how to tack and groom along with your lesson. I honestly had a blast. I'll definitely be coming back.
Came out here on vacation. Booked one lesson for my son who is getting into riding. They were amazing. We will come back.

Once in a lifetime barn and trainer.
Happiest horses. Pure Positivity!
üíôüíïü´∂üèºüêéü©µüêéü•∞
"Most Smiles Per Square Foot"
üèÜüíùüêéü§©
If you seriously want to learn how to ride, take your skill set to the next level, or you just love horses.. I highly recommend you contact the incredibly talented, supremely knowledgeable and most kind Robin Doneth at Palm City Equestrians.
Robin is fantastic. My son loved that the lesson didn‚Äôt feel rushed and wasn‚Äôt cut short by the time tacking up. It‚Äôs great that the camps are open both for kids and teens.

Great place for experienced and non experienced riders. My 3 year old loved her lessons we gifted her for Christmas last year. The teachers and staff are amazing and work very hard and also have a lot of patience. My daughters and I will definitely be coming back!

It‚Äôs my first time visiting this place, I love the place because it‚Äôs clean, has very big windows so people can see the sun light, they have a lot of workers everywhere, while I was visiting two workers came to check on my friend. The workers are well dressed and very polite. Also I like the check in process, first at lady with a big smile welcomed me at the lobby, then I went to the kiosk and my temperature was checked (which I think is very important) then I got a visitor sticker and could go to visit my friend. Very satisfied with the place. I think it‚Äôs a good place for someone who has no family!

Our visits at Palm Garden were perfect from beginning to end!! All of the staff was so welcoming and friendly and doing a fantastic job of caring for the residents! We were VERY pleased with the cleanliness and competency displayed in all areas. We'll be back!

I visited Palm Garden today and it was an awesome experience the patients are so nice and the staff are very excellent. They made me feel so welcomed that I  immediately wanted to be a part of the Palm Garden family. So I filled out an application during my visit. If a loved one needed rehab I would definitely recommend Palm Garden!!!

My mother was treated like the precious and rare commodity that she is by this Facility. The people are the kindest and most helpful that I‚Äôve seen. We recommend this rehab center to anyone who ever needs to go in for physical rehab, and everyone we have recommended Them too, has also been very happy with their treatment.

I‚Äôve recently had a loved one become a short-term family member (patient) of Palm Gardens Rehabilitation Center, and I can‚Äôt say enough of how pleased I am with ALL the staff members of the Care Team.  They are respectful, knowledgeable, and totally awesome. They are absolutely Angels to the healing ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π of my loved one.  Thank you Palm Gardens Staff!
