review_text:
Palm Garden is so awesome if I had to have any rehab I think it would be my first choice. It‚Äôs nice to walk down the hall ways and get a hello, hi Mr stern or just a smile . I always enjoy coming there knowing my wife is bing taken care of.

Thank you all!!!
Edwin Stern

provider_name: Palm Garden of Port St Lucie
review_text: During my visit to see my dear friend, The Palm Garden was clean and beautiful with good views and easy parking.  My friend was nice and clean in new sheets and tucked in so cozy and comfortable.  The staff were all so friendly and welcoming.  The staff was very helpful also with any questions I might have had.  I would recommend Palm Gardens to anyone who has the need for Rehabilitation and a Nursing Home Care Facility in PSL.

provider_name: Palm Garden of Port St Lucie
review_text: The good friend has been there for quite a while from a severe leg injury. They have taken great care of her. She‚Äôs happy she‚Äôs coming home in 10 days after a long rehab rehabilitation. This facilities is excellent.

provider_name: Palm Garden of Port St Lucie
review_text: Jennifer was extremely helpful on getting my mom into Palm Gardens after we experienced a nightmare from another facility. She called and got all the necessary paperwork and did so while interrupting her lunch. The staff greeted us upon arrival and my got Mom in her room right away. The whole staff is smiling and very friendly. The look on their faces say they want to be there and help get your loved ones back on their feet. They don't treat it like it's just a job. I highly recommend Palm Gardens to get you back on your feet.

provider_name: Palm Garden of Port St Lucie
review_text: We had to make a quick decision in finding a rehab center for my mom, she had emergency neck surgery, as the family had a big vacation planned which she was supposed to attend..with very little time to spare, we were recommended to Palm Gardens. We meet with  Diane, Brian & Allie. They resolved all our issues and accepted my mom. She was transferred to the facility the day we left on vacation. I was worried and very concerned! When I spoke to her she was very happy and was impressed with the attentive staff, cleanliness as well as the therapists. I couldn‚Äôt be happier with Palm Gardens!

This is the best physical therapy place ever,everyone is friendly and helpful.  All the therapist work together so you don't have just one person working with you. Sometimes the make Cuban coffee which is a real treat just like the heated jelly bed. This place gets an A plus in my book!

Very nice and friendly Office Thomas the therapist from God. Unbelievable, nice person treatment that me and my husband got there very professional thank you thank you guys for everything that you doing for us Isabel. Claudia the best wishes from all my heart You amazing. I definitely recommended this Office

Unbelievable, nice and so friendly Office. I am really got pleasure to be there. They provide professional approach in manor Thomas. He is a Magician not so often I I can meet such nice person. Claudia - Unique therapyst thank you guys for everything that you did it. I recommended this office. You be happy.

EVERY one at Palm Rehabilitation Center, Inc.¬† (the front desk staff, the PT who does patient eval, as well as the other PTs & their assistants who work daily with patients; the medical director) every single staff member is warm, friendly, caring. The work the PTs do really gets results: working with various equipment, manual stretching, TENS therapy,¬† manual therapy, including massage (all of the assistants give great massages). I went in with my shoulders, especially the right one, in a really bad state (painful, sore, limited range of motion, etc.) After 12 sessions the problems have nearly completely gone away and I feel great. I definitely recommend this place. Next time you need physical therapy, give Palm Rehab Center in Cooper City a try. You will not be disappointed. They are true professionals. Five stars.
Highly recommend Palm Rehabilitation Center!! Truly amazing place, Marck and his amazing staff really care about your health and wellbeing! Spot on treatments that have helped me tremendously.

Golden people with golden hearts and hands! ‚ú®üåüüíõ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©πThey're very attentive and care about you genuinely, not like other places where they have to perform something for a job. They're also very careful with your healing process, and their schedule slots are also very flexible.

BEST Physical therapy in town!

I have been going to Palm Rehabilitation in Hallandale Beach for Physical Therapy for Achilles Tendon pain since May.  Tom is an excellent Therapist his terrific massage, ultrasound and electrical stimulation therapy has been shown to improve the healing.
Claudia is also an excellent therapist the exercises are very helpful.  I am feeling much better.  Also the office receptionist is friendly and very helpful with the appointments.
The office environment is very relaxing and love how they treat me and the other patients with kindness. I highly recommend them.

Pete and his staff rescued me after experiencing months of excruciating pain in my neck, back and arms areas. They are experienced friendly professionals whom are extremely knowledgeable in assessing your problem areas and applying the necessary therapy to make you feel better quickly. Pete and his staff are great listeners, which makes the environment comfortable and relaxed for you to discuss your ailment. I am feeling much better. It was a great experience, especially the massages. I can truly say that patient care is there main focus. I highly recommend.

I have been to many physical therapy places over the years and DRS Medical Rehab has been the best one I've ever been to. The staff are super courteous, accommodating, and helpful. They actually care about you and improving your health! I would highly recommend this place to everyone.

This rehab facility is very professional and caring.  They make you feel very relaxed and the massage therapist...I just want to take her home with me. She is AWESOME!  Forgot the names of the staff as it was my first visit but all very friendly. Thank you all for treating me today.

provider_name: Palm Sport and Wellness & Palm Halo Cave (Salt therapy) Palm Skin Care and Facials
review_text: The massage in the salt cave was amazing. As soon as the generator was turned on my sinuses started to clear and I could breathe. The 60 minute massage wasn‚Äôt long enough! She worked on improving the circulation in my legs and ankles to help my neuropathy and what a difference it made. She had great technique and knowledge for my unique medical conditions and checked in frequently about her pressure levels. I was amazed at the level of deep pressure she was able to apply and continue over the 60 minutes. Unfortunately it was raining so I could not enjoy the meditation garden and fountain after my treatment, but it is a beautiful and relaxing space I look forward to using my next visit. I highly recommend Palm Sport and Wellness. The facility is clean, peaceful and the staff is professional, friendly and knowledgeable.

provider_name: Palm Sport and Wellness & Palm Halo Cave (Salt therapy) Palm Skin Care and Facials
review_text: Shelyn, is an awesome therapist!!!  If you like a real massage that fixes the root of your aches and pains she is an expert and great at her work. üëçüëçüòÑ

provider_name: Palm Sport and Wellness & Palm Halo Cave (Salt therapy) Palm Skin Care and Facials
review_text:
I had a bad experience with Kimberly (the owner). I had texted her to book an appointment and she accomidated it, but once I arrived she told me her friend had an emergency and she needs to reschedule my appointment and she offered a free massage for the inconvenience. I booked the appointment again with her right then before I left her place for the very next day (she claimed she did not have my number the first time otherwise she would let me know she is canceling so I do not drive there). I did understand sometimes emergency happens. Now at the same moment after I left I texted her the confirmation of the appointment that we just booked for the next day (she did not reply to my text). The next day I texted her an hour before my appointment to confirm my appointment before I drive there ( No message again from her). I still go to my appointment and the door is closed I thought she might be with a client so I sat on the patio outside and waited 30 minutes, meanwhile I texted her and called her and NO answer or reply back. Now imagine that is two days in a row coming in for an appointment and still not getting a massage. What is her excuse this time for not texting her client if there is any emergency (she has my number)?? Then after an hour or more she reply to my message and without even saying sorry for her not showing up or whatever the reason might be. She was not considerate of my time driving there and waiting as well. If I did not show up to my appointment she would send me a bill what about me and my time? She was rude in her text to me and not considerate of my time and not even sorry. I won't recommend this place whatsoever. Do not waste your time and book any appointment with Kimberly!

Total liar for her response. She is unprofessional person....karma to you for treating clients like that. You have my phone , it's just unprofessional practice.

provider_name: Palm Sport and Wellness & Palm Halo Cave (Salt therapy) Palm Skin Care and Facials
review_text: Shelyn is AMAZING. Best massage. I‚Äôm coming back every single time I‚Äôm in town. It‚Äôs a must!

provider_name: Palm Sport and Wellness & Palm Halo Cave (Salt therapy) Palm Skin Care and Facials
review_text:
I found Palm Sport & Wellness online, and when Kim mentioned that Shelyn is excellent at deep tissue massage, I decided to give it a try. When I arrived, I was pleased to learn that Shelyn is also a neuromuscular massage therapist‚Äîexactly what I needed. I had been dealing with pain in my neck, shoulders, and upper back after working on a project at St. Anastasia Catholic Church, where I was installing two large murals and painting frames by hand‚Äîa task that‚Äôs both mentally and physically demanding.

Shelyn was fantastic: professional, knowledgeable, and genuinely passionate about helping people feel better. I can‚Äôt thank her enough for the relief she provided. Many thanks to both Kim and Shelyn!

I know from personal experience that Palm Tree Speech Therapy is the place you want to bring your child. We have 3 children that are adults now that Kathy has done an outstanding job with from the day they were born.  The staff is incredible, welcoming and professional. The therapists are exceptionally skilled and genuinely care about their patients‚Äô progress.

The staff creates a fun and engaging environment that makes therapy sessions something every child looks forward to every week.
The office is clean, comfortable, and equipped with excellent resources. Scheduling appointments is always easy, and they are very accommodating to everyone's busy schedule.
Palm Tree Speech Therapy has made a significant positive impact on many lives, and I am truly grateful for their dedication and expertise. If you are looking for top-notch speech therapy services, this is the place to go!

Thank you!!

Palm Tree Speech Therapy is excellent!! We can now regularly understand our 10 year old son. Brevard Schools claimed he did not need speech therapy after 3, 30 minutes sessions. However, we and his peers were still not able to understand him regularly. Kathy picked up on several sound blends and subtleties in his speech. He enjoyed going to speech. She has an assortment of fidget activities and speech games to keep it fun.

I can‚Äôt never say enough good things about the team at Palmetto Animal Clinic. They always go above and beyond, not just for our pets, but for us as pet parents too. From the moment you walk in to the moment you leave, everyone is kind, compassionate, and truly cares.

The entire team is always so warm and welcoming, and you can perceive they all are genuinely and love what they do.

Dr. Oliver‚Ä¶ what a gem, he is my hero, I admire him as a person, as well as a professional. He‚Äôs not only an incredible vet, but just a genuinely good hearted person. He has always helped and supported my family and I through out the most difficult times with all our fur babies.

I trust them completely with my pets, and that peace of mind is priceless.

I really appreciate everything you guys do for us! üôèüíúüíúüíú

üôè‚ò∫Ô∏è I am truly grateful to have found Palmetto Animal Clinic after experiencing several other clinics in the area that fell short in both quality of care and professionalism. Unlike those previous experiences, Palmetto offered reasonable pricing, a compassionate approach, and a high standard of service. Dr. Oliver was respectful, and took the time to address all of our concerns. The office staff was also attentive and courteous. I now feel confident and reassured knowing my cats will receive the care they deserve in capable and compassionate hands.üíõ üêà on behalf of Manchita‚ù§Ô∏èü™Ω

This place deserves 5 stars. We had great experience. Loved that Dr. Oliver and Luis were so attentive to me and my dog ‚ÄúTofu‚Äù, making me feel better knowing that my baby will be in good hands. They also explained me everything that was going on, what to do about and how to take care of the situation. That is for real the kind of customer service. Thanks to all the staff as well for taking care of me since the moment I step inside the clinic. THE LASER treatment works wonders to my dog.

Dr. Oliver is wonderful. He is very friendly and honest. He‚Äôs great with the dogs. I was a walk in today and waited a little extra long because  they were down a tech but I was patient and they are worth the wait. Dr. Oliver explained everything he was doing and did only what was necessary. I really enjoyed my visit and so did my dog Xena. Dr. Oliver let her run around the office and play with his dog.

INCREDIBLE VET & TECH TEAM!!!... If I could give 10 stars I would

Dr Oliver was amazing when treating my cat and displayed so much knowledge about animal medicine. Showed so much passion for animals and real compassion and care for my pet. My cat had a very complex issue, and Dr Oliver was very attentive throughout the treatment and persistent to find the best solution, keeping the cats overall health, stress, and well-being in mind.

Dr Oliver performed an obstruction surgery on my cat and was impressed at how smoothly it went. I could not be happier to have my dear pet back to health and back to his normal behavior. I am forever grateful for Dr Oliver and all the tech's that saved my cat's life.

The entire team really makes you feel like family when you are there.

Yesterday I left the center. I wanted to express my gratitude to everyone that was attentive to me. Everyone was so caring and loving and affectionate in my treatment during my stay with them. It was almost 2 months under their care. Always everything was so great and the attention was so great with the patients. The cleanliness was extraordinary. The food was always on time, and the medication administered by them. This is my second time at this center. I would like to recommend to everyone this place with my eyes closed. The physical therapists were so great, professional, and very motivated. I felt like I was at home. I want to thank specifically the nurse that was taking care of me. Her name is Yamilet Lopez. She was my guardian angel. Always looking out for me. Always treating me with love, compassion and dedication. Her care was exceptional as well as her advice. Thank you again and I love you all.

The facility is impeccable, and the staff there is very nice and professional. We are so pleased that our loved one is being cared for at this facility.
My mother was there many years ago and the facility is still as clean and organized as it was before.
The ladies  at the front desk are so helpful with the check in process which can be a little difficult, but they do all they can to help you through it.
She so sweet. Always taking the backing off the sticker for me. I can't ever get it off.

Palmetto Subacute Care Center ‚Äì Coral Way

If you value the well-being of your loved ones, avoid Palmetto Subacute Care Center at all costs. My mother‚Äôs experience here was a nightmare, and I feel compelled to share the horrifying negligence she suffered.

My mother was admitted to this facility after a serious health ordeal. Right from the start, I had concerns about the quality of care, and unfortunately, my worst fears were confirmed. Despite my complaints to the administration, they repeatedly failed to provide basic patient care. One morning, I discovered that they had left my elderly mother soaked in urine all night, completely neglected.

But the nightmare didn‚Äôt end there. When I visited my mom later that day, she looked extremely pale and weak. Her caregiver informed me that she had been complaining of chest pain all day, but the staff ignored it, dismissing her symptoms because her vitals appeared ‚Äúfine.‚Äù While trying to cheer her up by putting on her makeup, she suddenly became unresponsive‚Äîcompletely lifeless. No pulse, no reaction. I panicked and ran to get the nurse, who casually took her time to respond and arrived without any medical equipment. For several agonizing minutes, my mother remained unresponsive while the nurse struggled without the necessary tools.

When my mother finally came to, she was in severe pain, clutching her chest and struggling to breathe. Despite this, the staff refused to call 911, insisting they needed a doctor‚Äôs approval. I couldn‚Äôt believe their disregard for her life. I had to take matters into my own hands and call 911 myself.

The paramedics arrived and took my mother to Jackson South in Doral, where they conducted tests but didn‚Äôt have a neurosurgeon on-site. They transferred her by ambulance to Kendall Hospital, where they finally confirmed she had a pulmonary embolism‚Äîa life-threatening condition. If I hadn‚Äôt been there to advocate for her, my mother would have died under their so-called ‚Äúcare.‚Äù

This facility failed my mother in every way possible. They neglected her basic hygiene, ignored her life-threatening symptoms, dismissed my concerns, and showed a complete lack of urgency even in a medical emergency. I cannot, in good conscience, recommend Palmetto Subacute Care Center to anyone who values the safety and dignity of their loved ones.

This place is awful and very unprofessional. My mother had a very invasive surgery, and was in ICU for 8 days. At the hospital she was mobile walking to the bathroom with assistance, and walking in the hallways with the Physical therapists. The doctor said she would benefit from some physical therapy rehab to get stronger. The moment she got to Palmetto subacute Rehab they put a diaper on her and told her she had to do her necessities I the diaper, not to get out of bed. I told the nurse that she's ok to walk to the bathroom with assistance, I was told the following day physical therapy was going to accessed her and decide her limitations. The next day, Saturday,  she was access by physical therapy, and was told she will start her one hour therapy on Monday.  She still was wearing a diaper, and was still bed ridden. even for her meals she was in bed not even taken to a dinning room or not even able to sit in a chair. this is a very humiliating situation for a person that was very active, and even driving before the surgery. How can she get better, thrown in a bed for 23 hours and only one hour physical therapy. After 24 hrs. I signed my mom out AMA. Even the workers talk very loud, and the pts are screaming in the hallway to be helped, the workers just laugh an don't assist them . This place its a nightmare!!!

The worst thing I ever did was put my father here. He was NOT supposed to get an infection and end up dying. He got pneumonia in this horrible location. He was here to get rehabilitated not end up like this. This place is filled with false advertisement and expectations. I blame myself for never getting my dad out of here thinking he would get better. Between this place and Jackson West- where he was taken to - they killed my father. Everyone here in Palmetto subacute is complete garbage.

We have been working with Mrs. Paloma for many years, and she has truly been a blessing to our family. She is not only a highly skilled and knowledgeable speech pathologist, but also incredibly compassionate and dedicated to her students. What makes her stand out are the effective techniques and personalized strategies she uses, which are tailored to each child‚Äôs needs.

For our son, her customized approach has led to tremendous progress. He has reached important milestones in his speech that we once thought would take much longer. Over time, we have seen his confidence grow, his reading skills improve, and his ability to hold conversations become more natural and meaningful. The impact of speech therapy with Mrs. Paloma has gone far beyond just words. It has helped him thrive in school and in everyday life.

Another wonderful aspect of her service is her flexibility and commitment. She traveled to our son‚Äôs school twice a week to provide his sessions, which was an incredible help to us as working parents. That extra effort made the process so much smoother and ensured our son received consistent support.

Overall, our experience has been nothing short of amazing. We are deeply grateful for the progress our son has made under her care, and we wholeheartedly recommend Mrs. Paloma to any parent seeking a dedicated, effective, and caring speech pathologist. She truly changes lives.

Paloma is an amazing speech pathologist. She is professional, honest and she is so caring. Her empathy and connection with the kids it's what makes the process easy. Through play, Paloma helped my son with his speech impediment and now he is happy and thriving.

I honestly can‚Äôt say enough good things about Ms. Paloma. I wasn‚Äôt entirely sure what to expect. From the very first session, it was clear that she not only knew exactly what she was doing but also genuinely cared.

The sessions were always tailored and fun. She‚Äôs patient, encouraging and always found ways to keep things engaging.

Thanks to Ms. Paloma, we‚Äôve seen real improvement and we‚Äôre incredibly lucky and grateful.

Paloma is truly a god send! She poured her heart and soul into helping my daughter, she was my daughters first speech pathologist, since she was 4 years old, not only is Paloma kind and patient. She went above and beyond and helped me in more ways than one finding my daughter the help she needed, thanks to all of Paloma ‚Äòs resources we later on discovered she got diagnosed with ASD amongst other diagnoses. She still this day reached out to me checking in on my daughter. She help me find a good OT amongst other other therapies for her. If you are looking for an amazing speech, pathologist and person look no further

Ms. Paloma worked with my 4 year old daughter for about 2 years. I cannot say enough wonderful things about her. My daughter is extremely shy and felt very comfortable with Ms. Paloma. She always made sure to keep great lines of communication open about my daughter‚Äôs progress with both myself and her teachers. She offered supplemental work, online options and ideas for us to do at home. My daughter made extreme progress in Speech since she began working with Paloma. Paloma notified me when she felt my daughter no longer required speech therapy. We are grateful for her speech therapy services and would absolutely recommend her to anyone in need!
It was amazing! The lady guide was very nice, the other guy was funny too! Absolutely recommend! The trail is nice and riding into the ocean was unforgettable! We went at 5:30pm and it was perfect!

This experience was truly unique. While I‚Äôve been horseback riding before, this was quite different from what I‚Äôve experienced in Puerto Rico. The scenery is absolutely breathtaking, and the staff are incredibly friendly and bilingual, which made communication easy and pleasant.

However, I would advise against bringing small children or anyone who may not feel confident handling a large animal, as this excursion can be challenging and potentially dangerous. Unfortunately, my group included someone who was unable to control their horse and ignored the instructors‚Äô guidance, which made the ride feel unsafe and stressful for both me and my mother.

Had the group dynamic been different, I believe I would have enjoyed the experience much more. Because of the anxiety it caused, I‚Äôm giving this activity a 3 out of 5 rating.

The horses are so cute and have their own personalities. I got to ride Troy and he was trying eat everything on trail he made me giggle with Abby behind me. Very fun experience with these gentle giants. Definitely will be back with some apples. Oh and staff are good people can‚Äôt forget about them making a good experience. They‚Äôll take pictures for you.

I LOVEDDDDD THIS PLACE OMG. SO BEAUTIFUL. Naomi was our instructor. She was so kind.  She did a great job giving us the tour, taking amazing pictures, also held awesome conversation. lazaro was also helping us he was so sweet and helped us get on and get off. If you are going to go horse riding in miami come here!!! So so worth it and the horses are beautiful and very well trained.

beautiful, peaceful walk on horseback in nice company. beautiful views, possibility of taking photos and videos as a souvenir. healthy, well-groomed horses, completely safe. beautiful scenic route along the beach and in the ocean. unforgettable!

We LOVE Panhandle Pets! We have two working dogs and the PP staff is super knowledgeable. At both locations, anytime we have questions about food brands and ingredients the staff is more than happy to help, and they blow us away with how much they know. Beyond that, the food we buy for our pack/fur family is LESS EXPENSIVE at PP than it is on amazon, chewy, or anywhere else online. Locally owned and operated. We will never shop anywhere else.

Excellent service at the Capital Circle Southeast location!  The storekeeper helped me read cat food labels as I didn't have proper glasses with me.  She offered helpful suggestions and answered all my questions.  They also have the cat toy our kitties prefer, right there at the front counter -- feathered bouncy balls.  I have had positive experiences at the North Monroe location before as well.  Good to have two Panhandle Pet Supply stores in town!

We were traveling through town and found that panhandle pet supply was conveniently located to us. I called on the phone and they were very helpful and even went on the shelf to check that they had what I needed. Once I got there that nice young gal helped me with choosing the right size and walked me back to the register. Old-fashioned service like this is hard to find in the big box stores!

Great selection in a clean and well organized storefront. We were having a hard time choosing an e collar for our cat, and they went as far as to show us a pic of their own cat in the inflatable collar to help us choose. :) is was a very pleasant experience and we will definitely return!

Pet owners in search of specialty pet food and expert advice should definitely visit Panhandle Pet Supply. Kate is wonderful and ensures my special orders are always ready for pickup. This store is one of the few places in town where you can find brands like Farmina N&D and Fromm. Additionally, they offer fish oil and probiotic cat treats, making it a convenient one-stop shop for all pet supplies and knowledge. Vade is an amazing source of information, consistently providing excellent suggestions for issues such as itchy skin, yeasty paws, and digestive problems.

After a Very Unfortunate, Rocky, start, I am so happy I gave this place another try. Dr Tripp has changed my life! I suffered for 8 months with sever pain, tired several Dr.s was offered painful injections which i refused, I tried a few Chiropractors , due to different circumstances those Dr's kept being replaced so I never got more than 4 visits with a Chiro. When Dr. Tripp called to introduce his self, I was not very hopeful but I gave it a shot... OMG! He is now, my hero! My Snap, Crackle, and Pop
God.. lol  A life changer and I am so grateful!
We had a appointment. My Mom came out smiling, moving much better then she went in. Staff was all welcoming, warm, helpful and Amazing.

I absolutely love the office. The staff is amazing. They are caring and follow up with me all the time. I love going to my appointments every week. All my questions are answered and everyone is so helpful.

Stopped by the Port St Lucie office yesterday hoping to set up an appointment. The entire staff was super helpful and friendly. Got me in right away. I was so impressed with what the did and how they handled everything, that I went home and went back with my husband to get him adjusted. Wonderful people and I am super happy with everything they did for us! Thank you Papa Chiropractic!!

I was not a fan of this office.  I walked into the office and there were a few people in a large room talking very loudly and unprofessionally. The person who was working on me brought me in a room and left the door open to the large room where everyone else was. I stated that I had never been to a chiropractor before and instead of walking me through everything, he just asked a bunch of questions and told me to get on the table and just started to crack my back. I was very nervous, and the atmosphere did not help.  Then he started to use a muscle massager (pretty sure it's the same one I have at home), and he stops and goes, oh I'm sorry it just died... After that he brought me into the large open room and put a muscle stimulator device on me and left me there, he did check on me once or twice. It was all just very awkward and uncomfortable. I had a lot of anxiety since this was my first time at a chiropractor so the last thing I wanted was to be left on my own in a room with other people. At the end of my appointment the chiropractor told me he would like to see me for more follow up appointments and I asked him what the plan is, and he said he would just do the same thing we just did. Absolutely not. Maybe this is an environment that some people are looking for, but I like privacy when it comes to my health. The receptionist department is the only reason I would leave more than one star for this visit, as they were very friendly and professional.

My 3 year old son has been going to Paradise Speech therapy for over a year now. Mrs. Soraya is dedicated, compassionate, and personable. She is passionate about her career and it shows. The office is friendly, clean, and inviting. We had the privilege to see Ms. Emily as well during the year and she made a great addition to Paradise Speech Therapy. Ms. Emily is enthusiastic, charming, and personable as well. Soraya and Emily have made such a huge impact on my son‚Äôs development. Their guidance and professionalism is unmatched that is why I can‚Äôt recommend them enough.

Soraya is the absolute best! She is so warm, passionate and thorough.

Although we didn‚Äôt end up needing additional therapy after our evaluation, she was kind enough to follow-up with at-home tools and suggestions via email and a lovely phone call.

If you have any concerns about your child don‚Äôt hesitate, this is the office for you!

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

My 4-year-old son has been working with Soraya at Paradise Speech Therapy for a little over a year now and we couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for the progress he has made! From day one, Soraya created a warm, welcoming, and encouraging environment that made my son feel comfortable and excited to learn.

Not only has his speech improved significantly, but his confidence has grown as well. Soraya & Emily are incredibly patient, knowledgeable, and engaging, using creative techniques to keep sessions fun and effective. They truly care about their patients and go above and beyond to support both the child and the family.

If you‚Äôre looking for a dedicated and compassionate speech therapist, I highly recommend Paradise Speech Therapy!! We are so thankful for the impact Soraya has had on our son‚Äôs communication skills and overall development!

Highly recommend Paradise Speech! Soraya is amazing, engaging and really connects with kids to help them.  She gives great direction, fun homework and a safe place for kids to learn! She has a really great system to help kids and a super fun friendly place for lessons!

I only have amazing things to say about Soroya - she did a phenomenal job setting up my child for success. In such a short amount of time did we start seeing such stark improvement with his speech! I highly recommend her to anyone! We will miss her dearly as we have to move to another state and wish we could take her with us!
The best place in town for all my pet & backyard chicken feed. Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Shop local and you won‚Äôt regret it.

The man who operates the store is the nicest human I‚Äôve ever met. I‚Äôm disabled and I have a hard time walking with my Balance. He always brings a big 50 pound bag of dog food out to the car for me and their prices are great and their food is good.

There is a kitty here, it says he might bite but he let me scratch his head, twice! No even attempts at biting. There was a large amount of animal foods. Whether your pet is as large as goldfish or as small as a horse they can feed it! Prices are very good. If you go to the thrift store I reviewed that had ducks, come here first and buy them some food.

Great location. Great selection!
Fair prices.
Friendly family business.
Recommend 100%!

My go to feed store!!! Owners are always soooo nice, products are great and prices are good.
Plus, the cat is my favorite employee. Do not pet the employees.
I was hired to create graduation decorations at this park. I must say I loved it. The pavilion is large, clean, and the peaceful atmosphere is second to none. I highly recommend it.

Wow what a great place for all things family. This facility is maintained in a meticulous manner. The children‚Äôs park and grilling areas are a nice touch. My family and I don‚Äôt even have horses and we still frequent this beautiful facility. Nothing like it in south Florida that‚Äôs open to the public. Great job folks!
Love this place, peaceful afternoons great people! Hope it never changes..

Went there for the Parkland Farmers Market. Best in the area, hands down. Go to parklands website to learn of dates and themes off the market.
Also, if bringing kids or pets. . . . There‚Äôs an amazing playground/ dog park about 1/4 mile away.
Great park. Large recreational areas with trails, playground, and plenty of places to excercise. Bathrooms are clean and air conditioned.

Missy is the best OT around! She was super professional from the first day that we met and did an amazing job with my daughter. My daughter was diagnosed with torticollis at 6 weeks old. She was developing a flat spot on the side of her head and we were concerned that the flat spot would not resolve and our daughter would need a helmet to help re-shape her head. As Missy informed me, and she was right, early intervention is key. She started doing regular OT sessions with me and my daughter at our home from 6 weeks of age. She was very professional and knowledgeable from the start. After a few months of working together and following some homework stretches that Missy had recommended, our daughter's head rounded out and her torticollis resolved. She did not need to have a helmet and she no lounger had a head tilt after therapy with Missy. Would definitely use her again for her knowledge and the convenience of doing therapy at home!
Missy was my daughter's OT for several years in NYC.  We were very fortunate to find her.  She is an amazing therapist  - very experienced, patient & fun.

provider_name: Parting Paws - Pet Euthanasia in the privacy and comfort of your home
review_text:
I knew our sweet precious was in good hands with doctor Veronica. I highly recommend Parting Paws! My heart breaks that we had to put her down, but I know she‚Äôs with my DAD ( Pop) in heaven.
Love you Precious‚ù£Ô∏è

provider_name: Parting Paws - Pet Euthanasia in the privacy and comfort of your home
review_text: Dr. Abby rushed to accomodate my Scout as his decline was more rapid then expected. She was kind and loving. She explained step by step the process and made sure each step was handled with compassion. We appreciated the paw impression and the postcard after the procedure. Highly reccomend, this has been a devastating loss to our family but she helped my baby cross the rainbow bridge peacefully and pain free, from the bottom of my heart I thank you.

provider_name: Parting Paws - Pet Euthanasia in the privacy and comfort of your home
review_text: I had called a handful of agencies when our little baby AJ needed help crossing over. As soon as I spoke with Parting Paws, I knew that they were the perfect ones to help. They were kind and compassionate, listened to my words and tears and made me feel at ease with my decision.  They never rushed me through any of the process and were very sweet to our baby AJ. This was an overwhelmingly heartbreaking decision to have to make and Dr. Abby Regner reassured us that it was the right one. He was ready to go home ‚Äì it was his time to rest. He was surrounded by love and peacefully crossed the rainbow bridge. I highly recommend Parting Paws ‚Äì I couldn‚Äôt have chosen anyone better.

provider_name: Parting Paws - Pet Euthanasia in the privacy and comfort of your home
review_text:
When Cooper‚Äôs time with us was near the end, we didn‚Äôt want to traumatize him with a half and hour car ride to our vets office. My wife found Parting Paws online. Dr. Abby made our difficult time a bit better. For those who don‚Äôt see empathy and love as a weakness this is the way to go. Thank you Parting Paws and Dr. Abby!

Pam and Scott Miner

provider_name: Parting Paws - Pet Euthanasia in the privacy and comfort of your home
review_text:
I would highly recommend Parting Paws. We knew the time was coming for our 15 year old dog, but that never makes it easier to lose a member of the family. It was a difficult call to make but Dr Veronica and the team made the process easier. Dr Veronica was very kind, explained the whole process and even came out on a holiday weekend so all family members could be present as our pup peacefully passed on his bed. We received his ashes in 72 hours and a really lovely note from Parting Paws.

Thank you for helping our Napoleon üåà!

We have taken both our Boxers here since they were pups. Not only do they love going in but they leave so happy! I know that they are well taken care of because of how compassionate all of the staff members are when they are being boarded. They know their personalities both individually & together and are wonderful at accommodating them. We feel confident when we travel that they are in good hands!

We have done boarding, training and daycare for our doggie here. Every single person that works here is lovely. They truly love the dogs and will do anything for them. I couldn‚Äôt imagine letting anyone else care for our pup.

When he was there for Thanksgiving they took such great care of him. Somehow they even got him to dress up for his turkey dinner. (He would never do that for us at home!)

To All Employees, Future Applicants & Pet Owners,
This is a short and to the point experiental review of Pasadena Pet Motel.
In this context, I stopped by said business
to find out if there were any Pet Care position openings. My first visit to said business was fairly decent including staff explaining to me that I would have to speak with Mgr. Sara in order to find out. Unfortunately, I don't recall ver batum as to whether I left my name & contact info in addition to obtaining said Mgr.'s card. Regardless, I didn't hear back from said Mgr., Therefore, I decided to stop by said business for a second time. This time, I made contact with a fairly young caucasian female with  glasses who wasn't Mgr. Sara, but in a rather vague & evasive manner explained to me that said business had no position openings.
In closing, I left said business with an uncomfortable feeling as if said female  had just lied to me in regard to any Pet Care position openings for some unknown reason(s). End of my review...

We have boarded our two high energy German Shepherd babies here for the last 2 years. When we go to drop them off they race for the door, and when we pick them up they‚Äôre exhausted. I know at Pasadena Pet Motel my dogs get attention, exercise, and tons of playtime. I highly recommend this place!!!!

LOVE LOVE LOVE this pet motel! It was my first time leaving my fur baby at a boarding facility and I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the service and care our dog received. They are quick to respond, take all phone calls, and are very passionate and professional. They really made sure my big goof ball was able to play with dogs his own size in small play groups and he almost didn‚Äôt want to go home after all the love and attention the staff give all the dogs.

While I don‚Äôt want to discredit anyone, I feel like the negative reviews for this place are largely from people who haven‚Äôt even been clients and it is too bad because they are so passionate about the dogs that stay with them.

Our dog went straight home for a long nap after we picked him up. He has obviously been playing to his heart's content! I mean just look at that smile!

Exceptional Care from Start to Finish!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about the entire team at Path Medical. From the moment I walked through the doors, I was greeted with warmth, professionalism, and a genuine concern for my well-being. Every single staff member from the front desk to the assistants, the therapists, and doctors, the all demonstrate excellence in both care and customer service. Thank you all for helping me recover! The entire team truly goes above and beyond, and I‚Äôm so grateful for the care I receive when I come for therapy I highly recommend Path Medical to anyone seeking dedicated, professional, and heart-centered care.

I am a patient path medical and i am so satisfied with the service received from the whole staff ! From all the therapist Jesus, Wendy ,Leticia,Neysa,Emily to the front desk Marvel,Melani,Yester,Liana and the doctors Dr. Brown and Dr.Davidman as well as the manager Silvana everyone was professional and courteous !!  The service was the best

My experience with Pace Medical has been great! The staff is very nice and patient. When you come in the receptionist already knows your name, you don‚Äôt even have to remind her. The therapist are very nice and very flexible, they always ask you if you are ok with the exercise they assigned you. It will be hard to name someone in particular because everyone goes above and beyond. I love that they are very flexible with their hours and my busy schedule. I usually go on my lunch break from work and they always accommodate me. If I ever have a car accident again I will definitely come back to Pace Medical. Thank you everyone for all you do.

Was here 2 yrs ago and just came back because I had such a great experience the 1rst time that I had to come back , no need to look for any other place.
From front desk , therapist and doctors the services is always A+
Maria and Jesus have the best hands for massage and Dr Bruce and Dr Todd are so talkative and funny. Everybody makes you feel at home. Thank you all for such a great service. I am always 1000000% satisfy.

This is my first time as a patient with Path Medical. The facility i had rehab with was in Miami Gardens. The facility is clean and well organized. The staff are nice, cordial, helpful, knowledgeable and overall great people!!!
The treatment I received was relevant to my injury and helped me to heal without any set backs. I am more than satisfied with my care.
I commend the staff for their hard work and professionalism.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about my experience at this chiropractic office! From start to finish, the care and professionalism were outstanding. Special shoutout to the amazing front office staff ‚Äî Sindy Ann, Beatriz, and Marlene ‚Äî for always being so welcoming, organized, and kind. A huge thank you to the awesome therapists Ms. Maureen, Andrew and Jose for their expertise and dedication throughout my therapy. And of course, to Drs. Golden and Kimroy ‚Äî your hard work, compassion, and commitment truly made a difference in my recovery. I‚Äôm so grateful for everything this team has done for me. Highly recommend to anyone looking for exceptional chiropractic care!

It‚Äôs unfortunate that I had this unexpected event happen but this medical team made this recovery journey so much better and smooth. Everyone here was super nice and professional. Especially Dr. Golden, Dr. Kimroy, Maureen, Anthony. Most of all the receptionists crew (Beatrice, Sindy, and Hennessy) were super nice. I appreciated everyone help!

From the first day I started receiving services, I knew that the team is top quality, humane and professional, they make you part of it, from the doctors, to the CA, and the Front desk, who are very attentive and beautiful, thank you all for your patience and good vibes

Great environmental and staff. I really do appreciate everything they did for me. All the staff is friendly and kind. It‚Äôs a lot of names to list but all of em get 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è from me. Thanks again path medical.

Everybody at this location were very professional and helpful.  I would definitely recommend Path Medical Hollywood to anyone looking for physical therapy! They made sure my every need was met in a timely matter. I wanna thank the whole staff for the overwhelming support to help me get through this difficult time in my life!

5/5 stars! Excellent care at Path medical, ALL of the staff and doctors are very welcoming and friendly making your visit comfortable especially after being in a car accident! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good chiropractor in the West Palm beach area! Thanks so much for taking care of my son and I for the past 4 months, you guys Rock!!

I wish I knew all of their names but every single person I have interacted with at Path Medical has been incredible. From the front desk to all the techs and docs in the back, they provide great communication and care. Thank you for all that you do!

I just wanted to take a moment and express the amazing care team that the Path Medical of West Palm Beach has. Mariela, Mariel, Sindy, Jesus, Destiny, Carissa, Michael and Kristin have all been involved in my care in one way shape or form. Each and every individual has been caring, engaged and made me feel welcomed. When seeking medical care you want to feel like you‚Äôre improving or taking steps towards healing/recovery. Unfortunately, sometimes there are setbacks and this team has been fully engaged and responsive to ensure my expressed concerns are addressed and have remained respectful and caring throughout the process. I am grateful for this team and will miss them once the process is completed.

The service was professional all staff very professional both dr Bruno and dr Thompson very knowledgeable manel Mariela Sindy Kristen Junior Mike destiny Carissa all very professional and kind I'm going to miss them

I just want to take this time to say thanks to path medical of palm beach lakes, namely, Mariela, Mariel, Sindy, Kristin, Jesus, Destiny, Carissa and Michael you guys has been more than awesome, caring and making me feel at home, the entire team is just 100 % Amazing. Thanks a million.

My mom was in an assisted living facility and ended up in the hospital and rehab. We tried the assisted living facility after she was no longer able to stay in rehab. God answered my prayers with my introduction to Jessica and her team at Path of Life. My mom arrived in a wheelchair and has not been in one since. She is thriving at Path of Life. It is a very loving, family atmosphere. She is receiving excellent care. It is the perfect place for my mom. I‚Äôm very grateful.

We have had the most wonderful caring experience at this ALF. My sweet friend, Ruth, has lived there for 2 years. I‚Äôm her power of attorney. It‚Äôs in a private home and well maintained in beautiful Wellington. Previously we were at another facility in West Palm Beach and were very unhappy. But here, at Path Of Life, I cannot say enough about the women that work there and the top notch thorough personal care they extend to Ruth and others who live there. There are only five residents and two caretakers at all time. It‚Äôs truly amazing and did not come at any additional cost than what we were already spending at the other facility. The owners of the facility, Jessica, is always available and takes care of any questions that I have. The girls that work there have become part of our little family and they take such good care of Ruth and I cannot say enough how it‚Äôs made my life easier because I can sleep at night knowing she‚Äôs well taken care off.

I was a long term employee at "Path of Life ". I knew from the moment I walked in the door that it was a special place. A place I definitely felt I wanted to be a part of. My first meeting and interview with Jessica Hernandez clinched it.
She has such warmth, love and compassion for not only our residents but her caregivers as well. I loved my time there with all of our residents. They became my family . We spent a lot of quality time with each one of them. Some of my favorite times was looking through family photos and they would tell me such wonderful stories about their families. Our mealtime was family time as caregivers and clients ate all together at the dining room table. I miss all of them and being a part of such a wonderful work environment.

Path of Life Assisted Living provided superlative care throughout my husband's long illness. The staff is knowledgeable and caring. They are capable of meeting a wide variety of clients' needs expertly. The facility is warm and welcoming. I heartily recommend Path of Life. At a difficult and stressful time Path of Life can be relied upon to provide care for the clients and support for the families.

The amount of personal care I‚Äôve witnessed at Path of Life is exactly how I would want my loved one to be cared for. I‚Äôve witnessed patience and genuine warmth by the caretakers at both residences. In addition both homes are very clean and constantly kept up . Highly recommend .

This place is awesome, very cozy environment, employees are all very nice , waiting room is pretty comfortable, and very good when asking what kind of therapist you would like , male or female, the rooms are nice and comfortable, and my therapist, Maria , is very kind and makes me feel comfortable with my own feelings . Also they allow stuffed animals and don‚Äôt judge , teen approved !!

Pathways Counseling is amazing. Of course, you‚Äôre always a little nervous for a first therapy visit, wondering if you‚Äôll feel a connection, but from the moment I walked in, I felt completely at ease. The office is beautifully decorated, warm, and welcoming, and their online portal was so easy to use and beautifully organized‚Äîit made getting started stress-free.

My therapist, Marie Sherman, radiated warmth, professionalism, empathy, and genuine listening from the very first moment. Opening up to her felt natural and safe, and I left feeling truly heard and understood. I am so looking forward to my future visits with her.  I also had the pleasure of meeting the kind and gracious owner, Roberto.

The entire staff is amazing‚Äîthank you, Heidi, Yolanda, and Laksmy, for being so kind and helpful. I felt safe, respected, and cared for from start to finish.

If you‚Äôre considering therapy, I can‚Äôt recommend Pathways enough. It‚Äôs clear why every review is phenomenal‚Äîthis is absolutely the place to go.

I admit I am biased, but I also have met most of the staff here and each and everyone of them I will attest a amazing and have a passion for what they do. Finding the right therapist for you is like finding the perfect gloves or coffee mug for you its more than a simple checklist. I would be surprised if you couldn't find what you need between the team as your right fit.

The staff here are absolutely wonderful‚Äîkind, down to earth, and genuinely caring. You can really tell they love what they do and that they put their heart into helping people. The office itself is welcoming and easy to get to, which makes the whole experience feel even more comfortable.

I have been seeking counselling at Pathway for about four years. My therapist I find is very helpful caring and to the point with her suggestions and guidance.. The office is also very helpful and understanding and professional I would recommend them definitely as I had gone to a few places prior to this and was not pleased in the Spring Hill Florida area.

Wonderful experience! Being a surgeon I was not looking forward to the rehabilitation phase as I was recovering from a wrist fracture. Denise is extremely knowledgeable and attentive.  She is very creative  and encouraging  in accomplishing her goals for each session. I enjoyed our sessions and actually looked forward to going each time. I highly recommend Pathways Therapy Services.

Denise Comiskey is one of the best lymphedema therapists in Florida! She is incredibly knowledgeable and clearly molded by years of hands-on experience and deep clinical training. She is an expert in this field; great educator and great clinician! Highly recommend!!

Denise is an expert at what she does! I had the privilege of having her as my instructor for the Norton school for lymphedema. Her knowledge, experience, encouragement and passion for teaching set me up with a well rounded education as a CLT!

I‚Äôve been seeing Denise for about two months, and my progress in regaining flexibility and strength has been much faster than I expected‚Äîall thanks to her expertise in guiding my recovery.

She provides effective and enjoyable exercises, and she‚Äôs always willing to share her deep knowledge about why each one is beneficial for my specific needs.

I highly recommend Denise for your occupational therapy needs!

I have been a patient with Pathways Therapy for the past two months. My experience with the treatment has been very positive and I have seen significant improvements in my overall health. As a person that has dealt with Lymphedema for over 20 years, I can honestly say that this is the first time that I actually feel ‚Äúhopeful‚Äù. The reduction of swelling has been amazing. Denise Comiskey (therapist) is awesome. She is knowledgeable, compassionate, caring and supportive. I would definitely recommend her services.

We love all the therapists!! Our two sons have learnt emotional regulation skills and worked on so many other skills too! The therapists are patient, skillful, knowledgeable, warm, and super child-friendly. They share wonderful parenting tips and tricks to help address your child‚Äôs needs. What a wonderful wonderful practice!!

Wonderful experience! I love that the Ms. Tiffany is very thorough and helpful. Ms. Tiffany goes above and beyond to assist me and my children. Im very grateful and appreciative of her helpfulness and kindness. Each session I received knowledge on my children progress and what they‚Äôve worked on, and how it correlates to their proposed goals from their evaluation. If you‚Äôre looking for OT services this is the place to be, will be satisfied as a parent, and your child will learn and have a wonderful experience!

I‚Äôve come here a few times to handle school and sports physicals for my kids, as well as quick check ups when they weren‚Äôt feeling well. They‚Äôve gotten much better about wait times over the years, and I always have a pleasant experience with the staff. Erik in the front was especially helpful and polite during my son‚Äôs visit today. We appreciate you guys!
